1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag sa dang / aHsa d+hA hrI la ma da rtswa hU~M sa la \u0f7f/ bdag dang/ 'gas pa 'dum dang lcag shis rdo rgyu
1b2(rnying rgyud): sdig pa stobs chen gsang pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rjeg shed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
1b3(rnying rgyud): 'das chos thams cad ldan gyis rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bkod pa'i snying po ma pa dbyings rnam par dag pa'i thong / rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ rang bzhin na gyis thus
1b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ rdo rje snying po dregs pa 'joms pa nyid dang / dul gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / ma skyes lam la 'dun pa rnams dang /
1b5(rnying rgyud): sal gnas pa'i sems dpa' rnams dang / 'dregs pa rnams dang / khra ma thogs kyi bdud po mo dang / gri thogs kyi gang dang / zong zags
2a1(rnying rgyud): rlom ma dang / 'angag rten gyi gas pan rnams dang / zung byed pa pa'i phyog bsas kyis pa da / da gtan dngas bdag la stsogs pas la sa
2a2(rnying rgyud): bskor te zabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ chos nyid mnyam pa chen po ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pa zhes bya bar lhan gyis grub par kun la khyab par
2a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// des 'khor rnams sems 'drogs par gzigs nas 'khor rnams la rang bzhin 'di bstan to// e ma ngo mtshar zad kyi chos// ma skyes ye nas gnyis su med// rgyu dang rkyen med rang byung ba// de las kun
2a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung thabs bas ma yas// thams cad nga yi rang bzhin las// ma g.yos mig yo cir yang gasngal// snying po nyid la g.yo ba nyid// ces gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gis de khro na nyid so so ma yin pa
2a5(rnying rgyud): mthong bar gyur to// denas na skyong ba drug pa 'joms pa das bcom ldan 'das rdokyi 'chang chen po la 'di ska kyis gsol te// hud kyi rang bzhin rdo rje nyid// rjes gsum sangs rgyas kun kyang dngos// gsang sngags
2b1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ngo bo nyid// che ba'i yon tan byas par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen po la sprul pa sdung ba'i tshul 'od zer bye bas la phyogs bcur bkye'o// 'od zer de dag gis zhing khams thar
2b2(rnying rgyud): cad du khyab par mdzad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa brgyud de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba/ rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du mdzad de/ rtsol ba dang bral ba'i lam mngon du gyur par gsungs so// de nas rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan
2b3(rnying rgyud): 'das la gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes khyod// mi rtog dbyings las srub zhengs la// 'khor gyi tshogs rnams dbang spras shig/ ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zil gyis gnon pa
2b4(rnying rgyud): khro bo 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa la bzhugs te/ 'byung ba lnga ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang / mtha' dbus med pa'i pho brang / 'bras bu'i lam thams cad kyi snying por rig pa snying pos zin pa'i thabs chen po bgrod du med pa'i lam khang par can
2b5(rnying rgyud): las khyang par dang 'phagra pa/ rmad du byung ba'i stozla dang / nges pa'i sbyor ba du marol par 'chang ga rab tu khros pa'i tshul 'chang bas 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar mdzad pa/ thabs kyi nges par sbar pa'i stobs kyi sa las thams cad gtan la phab ste/ las ma yin pa las myong bzams
2b6(rnying rgyud): ga dang / las dang rdzasra pa thams cad gnad lakhor te srog dbang du bsdus so// des 'jig rten gsum por btugayos so// ldeg go btu ldeg go// thang ro rung tuT dkun tu 'ur ro// chem chem mo// 'jig rten gsum po 'jig le khad do// 'khor thams cad brtsal te dbang po te yang /
2b7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan gyis stobs kyi stobs khyad par can du rdur nas srog gi dngas ma gsal bar mdzad de/ de ma thag tu 'khor nams myos shing dran pa nyams pa las log ste/ shin tu phreng cing mi bzod pa chen por gyur nas/ rang ranga'i srog gi snying po thams cad
3a1(rnying rgyud): salas// dan du na// srog nga sa sarnams ga na du nAdu na d+ha nas rgyasan/ da na na 'ang
3a2(rnying rgyud): srugs pa nas rdzogs pa ga pa cig du / 'phags pa mad pa lag shin ma na na san// ngan
3a3(rnying rgyud): rdzun na la di ga ces mi hU~M/ shegs / sa btsun pa'i sa swA hU~M/ yang kyi rtags pa dbang bsas nas// dky-i la na nardzogs pa'i// drug gsan 'dag rnal gang// rgya
3a4(rnying rgyud): gags sa // dzu/ nganas sa ma
3a5(rnying rgyud): gas pa rnams sa/ sa du ngan pa dag ma
3a6(rnying rgyud): nga sa
3a7(rnying rgyud): sa
3b1(rnying rgyud): na// bdud dang nga gyung pa sa// / na'asams thathams ca da zhes// zhom rnam sa gag da// nga bzhin ga zhugasags // bad gshugs pams ga 'dus nas// sangs byas /
3b2(rnying rgyud): rgyung de// rnam pa mig ngos pa// sangs rgyas mthu yi nga 'brar 'jug/ rko bas dang nus pa kun 'das pas// mkhyen pa nyid kyang bachags par 'gyur// dkyil 'khar yongs rdzogs thig la che// babyung bzhi le nas nam dag slong // lhun gyis grub pa'i ga
3b3(rnying rgyud): mau khang // rtog tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// ma lus 'dus pas thig le che// sdang srid dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// ma bskur bltar med ye nas bskur// skyes bu rig pa'i rtsal ldan la// dbang mchog chen po rgyun tu gnas// dka' thub dam tshig/
3b4(rnying rgyud): sdom pa'i don// chos rnams ma lus kun cig le// ngo bo chos su byang chub sems// 'khor 'das sbyin grub dang rdzogs la// dam cig chen po de ning gsung // phrin las ma btsal rol pa'i rkyen// lham ldan grub rol par shed// dum gsu margyal ba'i phyir
3b5(rnying rgyud): rlabs spongs// ma lus 'dus pa rdo dzani bka'// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras pa'i chung // sde sbeng dkyil dakhong nga mtshig dbang // las dri la sgrub pa gsang sngags dang // ngob 'brel bcas r+g+hang can// rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byeng ba// gsang
3b6(rnying rgyud): sngags rgyad kyi nges pa bshad// tsas gsungs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gas pa'i rgyud las/ gsang tshig sngags kyi sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po rdo rje mi
3b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di sa cas gsal to// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// gsang sngag sa ba de nyid gang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// rdzogs pa mthu bas ldan pa kun// bkang bzhin nyid ji rta bu// lhun grang phyag rngu chen po las/
4a1(rnying rgyud): byug pags// du / ga pa dang/ da/ //
4a2(rnying rgyud): phyag ded dpon nos// rigs kyi bdug par zhugs pazhig/ grags pa sngags kyi sor khrigs nas// bzod pa mtho' pa las batshan// brda 'don mgru pa lkug par spyad// ngagasang dag pa grags su spyad// sha la ga keng dus rnams pa pa// 'dag
4a3(rnying rgyud): tshigs pa sha zag bstan// sngags chog phra mo'i stobs dang ldan// rtag pa'i khyu bo y-i par bsgoms// lus che yan lag dgas la bltas// don gyi gdang stobs pa rnyed par// dngos po la ni sla bzhin nga// gsang grags bka' bag pog pa pas
4a4(rnying rgyud): dus ma yin par tshe khyad nas// na dag rdo rje myal bar ltung // bzhi brgya bya bzhi'i nang rnams spong // tshad mesam na te 'debs ze ba// ba~Mskapa pa bganas batha gnyis 'bar // tshagang gnas nas bag la pa'i zhing // 'khor zhing sdug bsngal zung pa
4a5(rnying rgyud): nye 'khor ba dra bod nas// bstsal pa gnyis su skra ga tsang 'khyams// de ma thang byin sgrib pa'i gnas// s+ya ba gnyis dang dud 'grong gnas// de ma nar rngu 'phrul rdzas 'das te// gshin yul 'dreg shi byeg pa bar// phyag ma bar brngu drug bcuganyis rangs// thod dam 'ar
4a6(rnying rgyud): bA zangs// gzhin nag ra gyur// bdud dngam ma thags cid ga // bajug pa da padags// byed dag ga bde// lus che dasas dgas pa ma// das su ci drug/ so nyid ge zung pas brdzan
4a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pam byan/ cad ce ma chung ga sa // kyar drug sa nga gargyan pa// mang ladu chub pa shing dbyar/ 'o sa yar 'thug mi gyung// di sa ba bza/ gas pa
4b1(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i ma dpung dang kyud bsreg/ de yis 'jig rten dung byed pas// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs brgyud nas// bku' bgros rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bkye// stong pa'i rang bzhin de stong bkye// stong pas nag po'i sde pa stongs// sangs rgyas rdul snyed zhing khams
4b2(rnying rgyud): des mthul te rigs gsum mngags// ya ma badz+ra ta ya'i sku// rang rang lag cha 'khor sprul nas// nad dang mtshon cha'i chad pa ba gzir// sha khrag dong bdud rtsir gyur// mthub sde gsum thal la khang// des mdzub nas bka' te// khrob sngab
4b3(rnying rgyud): ba mdags// rdorje srin po 'khor dang bcas// nag pogadug pa bsgral bar gzas// ye shes me ye sras mchog sprul// nag po tshe ldog padagra po yi// dkar nag tsed+ha'i dkyil du gzas// btab pas khro bo sbe rtsegs kyal// rdo rje srin po'i 'a'ong ba dgas rnas/
4b4(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs kun gyi dgongs pa bsdus// gsang sngags ripa kho na// dngas ma chen po lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga nyid de rtogs pa'i// rigs lnga'i gtso bo smyig tu can// nag po cha mthun brjed pa'i kra// zil gnon phyag rgya chen po nyid// sbyor nye ma skyes
4b5(rnying rgyud): 'gag med pa'i// spyan grub ye shes thams cad mkhyen// lhun por rab lta bur brjid/ rnam thar dbu gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyud dadrug 'khor bsgrol ba'i rtags// pha rol phyi naphyag yo shes drug/ skye ba rnam bani dag pa'i rtags// tshad med zhabs pa
4b6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul bzhi// sa byud brtan pas thams cad gnon// gnyen byed skyom zhing sdud pa'i dbang // gsal byed khrag chubag chags bsreg/ baM gyis rkyen med rang shugs ldang // sdang byed go 'byed khebs 'og chub// rgyu rkyen babs pa dag ma lus// bde ba'i bu nyid
4b7(rnying rgyud): spyo dpag med// stong las kun 'byung bas ma dpag dka'// nag pogadu pyid sna tshogs sprul// yum bcwa byams pang byung // de bzhin rigs ldan seng gi stag/ gdug pa la shes khro zung 'bar// zul dang chos dbu tun dgu dang // gar dpung bla dbu mas
5a1(rnying rgyud): thang sa// 'a pa nga mi rjod// con ga tan na gas nga dag nag pa ga mang bal tag nan// pha la bag bad// drug pa brtsal te 'ad phyu// la rlabs d+ha mnas kyang // dakhang dang sa dang dang
5a2(rnying rgyud): mdapa da hU~M// nag du phyim mings michags pas/ sa sanas dus pa ste// rdzu chu ya dan pa/ 'a brgyam ba mdza ma// tshig mtha nan dunan/ 'du cig
5a3(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin partsed// ci bzol las rnams bka' bzhin tan// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbrang mad kye+e ng+ge// 'khor gyi las rgal gang la bsgos// de nas rdo rje khros pa'i sgras// gang+gAm blo mi bza 'di 'i tshogs// ra lde rjo 'u'i lam rnams
5a4(rnying rgyud): sangs cas bka' 'khor bsrung la stong ste// brtan pang rigan rdzogs pas sgrol// nirnams kyis// gas gsungs pas/ ma'i mas kyil mkho chen pa'i sang ma gyur ba'o'i// 'angapu dpa la gzhi sa po gra
5a5(rnying rgyud): gsung ba'i rgyung las du 'artsal ba'i le'u ste gsam pa'o// / nga nas mthu grangs kyi bdag pa rdo rje snying pas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ho sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// ye shes dbyings las sprul pa pa// drin las
5a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes rjod// lasra rnams kun gyirtsa badz+ra// bdag pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rlung // rdeg pa nag po stobs chen gyi// las kyi rnam grangs ji ltab// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsal// zhes gsal pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyisadri 'i ngon
5a7(rnying rgyud): bag do// stong ba don gyi gas rgyud la// rtseb yan las gnyis su bcud// rtse ba'i mimari gsu pa rdzob shad // gas dang chog gi sbyong 'dang // rdzogs pargyabs kyis gnom pa dang // gdug pa 'dul ba'i las su gsungs// gsang
5b1(rnying rgyud): na sa gas/ rdzog pa gyu sa/ nga / d+hAs smra mas sa/ sa ga nga du
5b2(rnying rgyud): gzhos pa la// stong drog gcig tu bsdu pa dang // rang rangagand kyim pa'i dzin ste// dag ga dang brog 'phrog gzir dang gas // mtha' snad las rnams rdzogs pa ste// d+ha ba gsum gyis las sbyar nas// mes byas mas mchis rnams da /
5b3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' bar spangs gzhir gnan// stobs pa shig drug dbyung la bcing zhing // zug pa dbyung dang gsang lam dgag// de bzhin gdug pa 'dul ba yang // stobs chen lha dang drug po sngags// tan dathAl rdzas dnga' rtsa byed ldan// dzi na las phyo /
5b4(rnying rgyud): bcung gyi smag so// mthung rdzogs dang logaganon gyis// las kyi myong brdzogs par bshad// yin lag sbyor ba bstan pa ni// dpapag cad sbrul pa'i las kyis rI// rdul ma 'i zlog 'byung ba dbrug// de yis las rnams 'brub par byed// slo /
5b5(rnying rgyud): btsud thob ltar gsal bas// rno m+bA skyobs chen dang ldan yin// de dang mi ldan dang 'ching bas// ya bag sha mi skyong bas bshad/ 'dzom dpal khro bog shin rdo rjeg pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ dngos pa'i sbyor ba'i don bstan pa ji pa'u ste ba'i
5b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang rdorje rnying pos bcom sbyin 'das la gsol pa// kyai rko 'bar bya'i rgyal po ste// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes khyod// snod brgya de'i byung bzhi ldan grub po'i// gzhal med po phreng dam pa gang // phye med don nyid
5b7(rnying rgyud): sha bar// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor Ta// rtag chags rnam dag 'a bras bu gang // zhes gsol ngas/ de nas btse bldan 'das kyis 'khor la rgyas par ba shad de// rang bani ni mi gnas nyam nyid dang // lhan gung la zhes gzhas pa
6a1(rnying rgyud): rin chen dung srod btan par gnas// phyin ga nyes me ga da' grubags pa// brag sum sa thaMng naga'abar pa byings// rnags dmar po dbang glel// lhag pa 'al nas yangam khar sa na// sngags 'bang bcus ces pa
6a2(rnying rgyud): drug 'obs// rdo rje'i phreng bzla tshangad bzhi// bar khyams dmar po sgo khyung ldan// bre bzhi skol ta babs ldan// rtse mo gan pa lpags 'bar ba mtho// zhwa brgyad klu brgyad zhing dang ro// rdab dra lted chun 'byung sbal// glang rkye 'brug pe ge sta //
6a3(rnying rgyud): sbal chu sri rA ga nam lcags zeg/ zhing dang zhing chung zod pa khyad// khyer lce mos mdzes par byas// me bskyed dbyings nas ya~M nas gsal// drag br-i ma ya pho brang du// klu 'bum gnyan khris bdag stong // phyogs stong pa nyihrIng+gA'i gang na// dbus
6a4(rnying rgyud): zil gnon ldan thub bu// mthing na gzug chen ta la'i mdog/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhubs bzhir bgrang // g.yas bkra mu ta 'dra bas// de nyi ba dang rngam par gzigs// g.yon pa ldag gnyen zhigasol// dbus mthing dgra bgegs sa pa
6a5(rnying rgyud): dong ba khyer lor la rmi g.yas// ba con gtsun shing sdizla mdzub 'bar// grang che ko skyon dur khyod chas// sbrul dang rin chen tsid+has brgyan// dbul ri gA lnga khro bo'i sgra// dregs pa'i steng dngade na ga'i mgos// do shal khro bo'i chas ka rdzogs// de
6a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyings nyid khros pa'i bya// yum ni dam med chos stod thongs// mthing rag myed rgyabs po 'ong 'byu// ni ba'i thags ka ma pa'i ste// zhing dza phrag dag 'jigs// 'khor lo / gan bsnams// yA ba'i thugs kar rdzogs pa te//
6a7(rnying rgyud): dang/ nga ga bsdus// rdzogs pa thugs pang byas / gas buM/ skyeb kyi gas byud// 'do gas lag / zhe' ngas jud/
6b1(rnying rgyud): ldan/ sa// num mau med pangs su// u sa ga// sa// rgyu bangasas su gnas// 'a bdag gang dun rgyas dang // nas // rgyam pa ga lags sa// sus
6b2(rnying rgyud): ba// rad las byung zhing 'phrul bar snang // don dam gnyis mau ga cig ga dgas// togacigs dpa dag rdo rje'i sras// sri ga sum pa sa da myung dza dang // mgadod bris rje 'i la gyis gnon// ni srogashin me pang dang // bdud dang ma rtag
6b3(rnying rgyud): dang / spyod pa nga na / dus // bdi / nga 'ag sa shA sa pa /
6b4(rnying rgyud): sems mog grangs sa myong // mgog cang chomag rten 'azhal 'chang // srid pa'i rnas pa 'cha' ba dang // mi khris pa 'byin zhing shu 'a rnaM ma// 'di rjo nga rji zugs 'brel// shes pa dngas snyigs byed par byed// 'bras thams sra nag ma
6b5(rnying rgyud): sa ngas ga ni sa
6b6(rnying rgyud): gapa gas chen gyi chud las/ ga kyil la rdzogs pa shi 'a na/ nam ma das gsol pa/ bar ba na la cu// badz+ra tha sa shes byer// man
6b7(rnying rgyud): 'o// phreng pa'i ma bang bgang // rang bzhi sa pa gyu gas// che ba la la ga sa// seMng kyis bya shi // de dag ngas pan dun sa// gas / sa
7a1(rnying rgyud): kyang ba da/ bkang // skyob pa don gyi gsung byags bshad// dang zhin ngas smos da // grub med pa'i skyegs pas// rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan gag ste// ngab stsas sgrarab shad// das gas saN+Dal 'i nga
7a2(rnying rgyud): dbus// yang zhing dri bas pa'i sngags// skud dgasung dang thugs kyi gnyed// ngani gcig pani gnyis pazhi gsum yin// rgyal bstan cing ba nyid// chos sgra med dam dag pas// thig pa nyag gi ga smos bra la drab// anI ma gyis yig mchog
7a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro don rdzogs pa'i 'greng bus brgyan// e yi ye shes las snang ba// dregs pa dbang bsdus sreg snying dadus// phyag tu zil gnon sbya ru bsgom// a yi ye shes las byung byas// sbyor ba las kyi rgyal po srin// sprul pa tsho bdag nag por rngam/
7a4(rnying rgyud): yas ye shis las byung ba/ rlung gi spobs skyes dben byed // gshen rje la mdzanar rdzogs// mi yi yi shes pas byung ba// brjid dang par byed pas na// mamA na thams ma rdzogs// he lo ye shes las byung // dkris pa'i ga nga
7a5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa 'joms// d+ha khyA ts+tshal ba snying badzags// dran gyi ye shes las zung ba// srog dang dbang po las bzlas nas// las kyi 'tshe bdag chen po rdzogs// steng gi ye shes las byung ba// gdug pa ma skas gnas su 'joms// khyung po drug
7a6(rnying rgyud): nag gnyis su rdzogs// khrig gi ye shes las byung ba// dregs pa 'joms pa'i rdo rje rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// bsreg cing skem tha~Md gnas su spong // zhe sdang gdug bskul na ga jigs// ma yi ye shes las byung ba// kr-i las pa
7a7(rnying rgyud): mngag bste// bdud mo khrag gi ral par rdzogs// tsaM yi ye shes las byung ba// sngang srid mig dang tha bsdus nas// rus sgral rngam pa'i srung rdzogs// ya yi ye shas las byung bas// las kyi rlung gis 'phrul zhing sgrol// srog bdag shin pa'i sru rdzogs/
7b1(rnying rgyud): shang // rgyusnang sa nang las na// drag ga ma bang sablang ba gang// darnam pa ma ldan 'dus skyes gsung sdugs 'di dag blug sung thugs na smra thudu/ ga dun pam steng drug ma sam/ drus gsus la dun nga /
7b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur rdza da stong bar bshad// e lpags yadzubs phrag shig dun// e li la shas mas byung ba// snying sreg yAg 'thung nyid do// rigs lnga'i sgra gzugs kyil gnan // lcags kyi la shwAs las byung ba// dmigs madra ma pa nyid chas kyi
7b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// me lang ye shes ya ma'i sku// rlung gi stobs kyis rab tu 'gugs// rngubs kyi ye shes lus byung ba// mnyam 'dra ye shes rdo rje'i sgo// phyi dang nang gi dbugs rgyan gcod// mug gi ye shes las byung ba//
7b4(rnying rgyud): nan tan ye shes khyam+ba khang sku// srid gsum sto ru 'chang bar byed// shig gi ye shes las byung ba// sran rtog ye shes mkha' lding sgra// srog lus dngas snyigs 'byed pa'o// ka yai ye shes las byung ba// las kyi gshin rje sprul pa gsum// las/
7b5(rnying rgyud): rnams thogs med me shes so// dun g+hi la shrIs las byung ba// rgun gyi lta brgyad sgrog gshing bzhi// pot+ta sprul babs ma 'das te// rnam pa yi ge nga D+ha// sngags ni shes sgobasbyin byed 'joms// 'di la 'jig rten dngos grub mchog
7b6(rnying rgyud): lus 'gyur gyir snying po don// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi ga tAr// me zang sngags kyi yon tan mdzod// rin rten na mtshon ma ma 'das// rim padu ma 'di ni gcig rdzogs// rtswa bsngags kyi lus su bshad// sa ni sA gr-i dzu ma ste// bas dang ba
7b7(rnying rgyud): dang dbab sprum// yang sngags kyi shos gyi 'brug// ces gsungasas// 'jam dpa lagashin rjeg shong po rjog pa ngas rgya pas// gas sdig pargyan pa'i la glang grwa// de nas yang rjong byung bas gas lapa// khyem
8a1(rnying rgyud): ga blags pashad padu ga dan// dad pa gdug 'bras ba so// da sa ga // yang dug pa nanas pa sha smrasmrasapa// zhesags la sa/ sa pamaldan 'das kyis lags canan
8a2(rnying rgyud): ba ni zungasas// zhogam shis ldan srin byed pos// tha med bya chub 'drub ba// pa kyil byed cam/ rjod papa sa byabs rjid chen pa mas// bdag dod pa yin pastan pa 'din// dkon mchog pa ma 'don ched de// bstan pa'i bar rtsod byed pa dag/ bal
8a3(rnying rgyud): zla med kyang chu bsgyur// de ma yin na mnar med na// las kyi nA dza srid por 'gyur// drar rjod gnas sa mtheg ri dog sa// dben par 'dug la bas ma gtan bya// grangs gsum kyis grangs la// gnod zhag dang drug rgyas pa// 'thab grang gsu
8a4(rnying rgyud): brtseg cing gis bskor// drang khrod ras sam rgya sh+log la// wa~M khAg drug gis rabathugs steng // dug khrag rdo sa la de dag gis// mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// dbus su grags ma ldan pa la// phyi rim gran la// thab lung
8a5(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru dgod// rA mtshams bris la sngags kyis bskor// g+ha~M ma~M mu khyud nu ma thal// shan po gsod byed phra gri dgod// tha ma mu khyung dag la ni// 'khor la rtsibs ni lnga gnyis gcod// rtse mo nang dung stan byas la// yang gsang ba
8a6(rnying rgyud): gcig gas lpags dgod// srid pa rus skal lto bar bcu'o// gre gong khrag da rling dkar dag/ las k+Shi tha~Md pa khag yel dgang // 'khor lo grugasum steng du yang // kha skyer zung dmar bzhi la babyung // 'thab gnas nang du tho dang nA dra//
8a7(rnying rgyud): zas la sde dung bdug/ mtshon mchibs kyi bar bar du// bla yi sprul pa brgyad dang ni// yang sbrul bcug nyid dri zhing dgod// gla rtags gang byung rtags sbyar ba dag/ phyag tu zilaganon gyur ba sgoms la// zhag grangs bdun nam pacu bzhi'am/
8b1(rnying rgyud): shugacig tu brnag pa bya// bsgom bskal drag sngags bsnol mar brdeg/ drag sngags dbugs kyi rta zhon nas// gsangal ma dgra nas tsit+ta brim// srog dang shes pa dngas snyigs 'byed// snying po stong ngam brgya bar du// drag po thun gyis gsad pa brtsam/
8b2(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha bsnol ma'i sngags rdzogs nas// gdug pa gnas pa'i sarba gnan// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// e myags yi rngubs mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i srog la phreng shag buM ril/ dun dun dzA hur thums nr-i dza/ dgra po'i srog la phreng bred dza dzaT
8b3(rnying rgyud): ril shag zang / dgra gro kyi// bruM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i rtsa la thu ma ril shug rbad/ dgra po'i srog la ka dus ling thul+la ril shag zad/ dgra bro'i srog la phur buM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la le nan bu rol sheg rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la gzir zla ral sha
8b4(rnying rgyud): zad/ dgra bo'i srog la yaM shig bruM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun gzir thun b+h+yo/ gsad pa drag po mchog gi las// sbyor brkyang pa 'di nyid do// sdebs na mtshon cha bsnol ma ste// gad mos sngags kyi spu grir bsnol// de yis las kun
8b5(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// bla chen bzhi dang sprul pa brgyad// yang srul bcu gnyis chags sdang lnga// gang byung rtags sbyar drag sngags gdags// srog la zhing sha ga dza tsit+te theng shag rbad/ srog la thun mug dza tsi te phreng shag rbad/ dgra po'i srog la
8b6(rnying rgyud): hur b+hu dza tsit+ta phreng phreng thun shag rbang / dgra bo'i srog la dza thun gzir shig tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thu na gzir tsit+ta preng shag zad/ dgra bo'i srog la yaM yaM nr-i dzi tsat+ta breng shag rbad// rtags dang sbar ba spu gri ste// brgya stod skabs su zab par
8b7(rnying rgyud): bya// de ltar drag po'i las rdzogs nas// 'byung ba'i ltog shag gshin rjel// bskal ba gsum gyi bar du gtad// thugs kyi stobs kyis mnan nas kyang // gdon mi za ba'i pho brang gdab// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje sdig pa stobs chen
9a1(rnying rgyud): la/ gas nga du ba nga/ ma 'du nga ba canan byung sa sa da mas da na// 'ang byatha da 'dus //
9a2(rnying rgyud): 'dren thos kyi dbyings su raswa pa~M// rjod thob stobs can rnab 'byor gyis// phung byed sdig pa stobs chen gyi// gyad gnon 'phrul 'khor sbyor ba brtsam// srin po gadrug pa'i thod badra// gti mugag la brtadra// stobs rnams ma rjes dag la//
9a3(rnying rgyud): bris te ga khrag pa bya// phungs thug khung dag tu yang // rba du bcas gtid du bca' ba zla// drar khrod ras sa ma r+g+ha shog la// phung byed sdig pa'i spyo ba rba// stobs chen kyang gnon 'byor myor bang // phyag rgya zil gnon ting 'dzin gyis// drug
9a4(rnying rgyud): 'a 'ang ba sa ga
9a5(rnying rgyud): ye ma zlos pa'i sras// gnam lugs ung mo so brdar bcad// drag po sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// dang gshed dang la 'bebs par byed// bdud bzhi sdig pa kha dbu yis// rnam shes rtse bcad me mang gsod// srog dang shes pa rangs
9a6(rnying rgyud): skyigs 'byed// dug dang rbang phung zangs lpags phyes// gnad la dbang cing dang gshed da nga rkor// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// e phyags ya rngubs mug shig ka dran/ dgra bo'i srog la phreng du 'brums TI \u0f7f khrag snying dums delang shag dzang/ sgog thum
9a7(rnying rgyud): dam dzaH khrag chung raM/ steng thun zad srog la mA ra ya d+ho/ bsang pa mchog gi drag sngags te// bdun nam dbu'i sa bu bzhir bya// drag po'i thun dang nad kye rdzas// yang nas yang dung rdeg par bya// sarba na slang drog nag stong gzeng zer shag re nad/
9b1(rnying rgyud): bshig pa'i sngags su bshad// gal te las de ma thub na// 'khrul dakhong tob dbug par bya// e ya shag myags dran rngubs gzug/ dgra bo'i srog zla ril ni chung dza thams khrag snying la thums de shag zang / srog paH khrag b+hA ri la dza snying thun nyung nga
9b2(rnying rgyud): srog parngang mA ra ya thun to// sngags kyi ltod krug nag po ste// kun la byas na snying khrag dzag/ las kyi sbyor brdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo dril la tse t+ta gzhug/ gdug pa'i gnas sam bka' rten nam// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'og tu mnan// brgyang
9b3(rnying rgyud): pa khyag so rgyun mi gtsad// baN+Di bon po mu stegs dang // las kyi rgyal po rtags 'gor dang // seng ge kha 'thab la sogs pa// sdig pa stobs chen 'di yis 'joms// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ stobs chen kyang
9b4(rnying rgyud): gnon gyi lo'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo klu la gtad pa'i phyir/ 'chi bdag par bu nag po'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dben pa'i gnas sa ma nA ga gnas// gtan re gdug pa'i sa phyogs su/
9b5(rnying rgyud): ga shing shun dang dkar la// a mu ka yi gzugs bris pa// yan lag rigs bzhi za bar bre// sbal pa khod stong nad thub la// klu yi dmod pa 'bum phrag gsum// rdzogs dang ri lur sngags shing gdab// kham sa'i par du kha stang gzhug/ kA ma
9b6(rnying rgyud): nor brgyad dang bcas pa// sngonang ma sbed pas zil pa bzhag/ chos drug debs zil nas kyang // nyi ma wang du khyer la gtad// thu bdud shan pa'i ting 'dzin bya// grwa yid yod pa 'di dag go// nA garngu yab le nA ga shig ro la zab zib/ dus pa
9b7(rnying rgyud): chege mo thun sod zung // nag po klu yi dug mdang ste// zhe sdang khros pa'i dmod par bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyung las/ klu'i dmod pa nag po'i le'u steng dbu pa'o// / de nas rje
10a1(rnying rgyud): pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// kye mardo rje chang rgyal ba// gsad pa'i sbyor ba de ltar na// 'jig rten lha sbyin dregs pa can// gtum po gadrug pa 'di dag kun// stong srog bstan ji sbyar bsdu// srog snying dgog
10a2(rnying rgyud): gzir gnan dang // bshig dang khab cing byang dgrol dang // dug mda' dbyung ba ji ltar lags// dam tshig brdar dang zhi ba dbang // yang dag dpa' bos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dmar len yang gsang ba snying po
10a3(rnying rgyud): don gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// stong phrag brgyad cu'i gdon gyi rigs// dug lnga'i shes pa yul 'dzin pa// lus ngag sems kyi 'du byed kyis// dregs pa zhes su gnas par bshad// dregs pa'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs pa dang gshed rang gis byed/
10a4(rnying rgyud): yi 'khor lo 'di lta ste// dur khrod rgya la rdzas byugs la// gti mug ltog shag mkhyud bzhi// e dbus drag po dbang dang ldan// phyi dam las kyi rdo rje ste// yang logs mtshon cha drug gnyis rtsibs// de bzhin mtshon cha brgyad gnyis ldan// de la drag sngag
10a5(rnying rgyud): joms byed ga ni// dkris dang nags ga dang mi // tshog pa rdo rje sngags byas// phying ma thams cad sbyang ba sa// da rdzogs gang dang su g-iT+Ti// mtshams dang su na gtsang ba 'dzin// nod pa' byu dza par bsha// gsal
10a6(rnying rgyud): ldan zhag gsum gzing // mtha' ru bka' rten las phyogs gnan// 'pho ba med pa'i las zhes bshad// de yi gsang sngags 'di lta ste// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun// sarba tsit+ta yaM shag hur khaM 'dri nan/ gzir zad/ sa bA ga ti
10a7(rnying rgyud): gnor sbyar nan/ ha la yam thun gzing / phur thums dza/ shag rbad/ gzing zad/ lus dang spu gri srog dang snying // bsdebs na nges par gcod par byed// snying po brda sbyar gzir bya'o// de yis las kyi sbyor ba 'joms// zos nyid ye nas
10b1(rnying rgyud): gyis bug/ ye shes dkyil 'khor rang bzhin med// sprul pa sna tshogs log rtog 'dul// tha skad chog rnams don gyis stong // de don ldan pa su nyid// gsad dang gnan dang srog kyang med// bden don ma rtogs dregs pa yi// sems ni rlung gi khams te
10b2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ srid gsum sha khrag srog dbugs 'byin// khams gsum gnas bskyod rlung gi yi ger gnas// de don bod pa ming dang rnam shes ni// nges par bstan pa 'di lta ste// shrI badz+ra kro d+ha hUM/ ya ma ya/ ma ma ru lu ma/ dun ting ki la ya ta/ dzaH
10b3(rnying rgyud): bam/ dak+Sha/ rag mor/ dran te mye/ sA \u0f7f/ shwalang/ sun ldan pa/ yaSh+TaSh+Ta/ yag sot+ta/ sho dzi/ rbarba ni/ tsA dzaH/ badza d+had+hi/ sa r+b+bag \u0f7f/ aM k+sha shang/ thug nan kyang rnams na/ mA ma rbang/ de rgya ya nan/
10b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rnga phyung zad/ grA tIs nan tata/ tsi she a mA ka tshig mon na/ 'drud zang / kha zlam srog gzir nan/ b+h+r-itAM/ sa ma yang sangam/ byer rje da paT/ shrIn ting ku ru si hA/ lus dang phra gri ming dang babs// skyor bas las kun 'grub par byed// dmang
10b5(rnying rgyud): phyin yang gsang mchog gesas// skyi dang smos kyi dngadaganang min// snod srog ga ci ga ma 'dus ni// nga ti dkang srang la gtong ba dra// badz+ra las nA shai dz+nye brjog/ so so'i chos kyi mtshan nyid can// zhi ga shin rje thung nga dang // mam smid ma na
10b6(rnying rgyud): po bdud// mu stegs rgya'akhro btsan dang ngo // drung sbyin po srog bdag ging // gnod sbyin po mo 'gong po ste// thug 'dag sri can gdug pa gsume// snying po'i rnga skur gzing zhing gcod// dmar len yang gsang mchog tu bstan// zhes gsungs /
10b7(rnying rgyud): 'a gas pa ngam pa pag shin rjeg shing na rdzog pa mas chen gyi byud las/ dmar len yang gas nga mchog ga le'u brgya 'o// // dadapa bcom ldan 'das kyis srung bang sbyar ba 'ad gsungs sa// gsalab gsum ldan sngags pa yis/
11a1(rnying rgyud): ba kya
11a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul 'khor rim pa rdzogs pa dang // rtsab spu kri'i bsdeb bshad pa// dmar len yang gsang skabs kyis te// phra mo'i sbyor ba bshad bya ba// rtsub bo dab gzing zhing srog/ mA ra ya yi skabs sbyar ba// klad du dgug pa yang dag bshad//
11a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' sdad sbyor brdzogs pa ni// lin la sogs gnad kyis te// rdegs pa dang gnad gshed ma yin// drag po'i spu gri'i 'dod dag tu// bshig pa'i su gri'i so btag pa// spyi dang skos kyi bshig pa ste// mis byas de min byas pa nyid// bshig pa'i sngags
11a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag bshad// bshig pa srur nag mchu yis 'grub// spyi yi tha ma gcod byed bor// 'bru drug sngags kyi spu gri gdab// rdo lcags zangs phur gzugs la gdab// klu'am gdug pa'i dug rnams 'byin// mun sel sngags kyi rtsa chud dag
11a5(rnying rgyud): gcod byed logs su kha zam brjod// 'byung po bgegs dang mi ma yin// gcan gzan gdug pa kha chings yin// sngon dmar tshon gyis klu gzugs sam// gnod sbyin nad kyi mtshon du rtsa// kha za ma logs su byad dgrol gdags// / byad du bcug
11a6(rnying rgyud): las nges par thar// shin tu bgegs rnams bka' nyan na// dbang sdud dam pa de bzhin bya// yang na 'bru gsum sbyor ka yis// dregs pa gan ma thar skyel bar byed// gtsang gtor ljags bzlas bsngo ba dang // shAn ting ku ru mthar ltung na//
11a7(rnying rgyud): mi srun dregs pa zhi bar 'gyur// phyi ma gsang mnan rang gsheng mthar// nam mkha' bar snangs gzhi la// mnan pa'i las rnams rdzogs par bya// dug shing phung ba byon brlabs te// shin tu mi bgrangs dregs pa can// mngon du rdzas rgod du bas
11a8(rnying rgyud): gzir// de yis myur du brlag par byed// phur gdab rdzas bdug khro mo bskor// sarba du raM unan gzer rnang srung nan srog la myog rbad/ srog la kI li kI la yaM/ trig nan bi g+ha nAn/ snying gzer srur nan hur thums dza/ myags zums ril zad ya/ de bzhin
11b1(rnying rgyud): thugs rdzas dang de// gyur brlabs pa'i las 'di dag/ rdzogs pa 'dams pa'i mchog tu bshad// bshig pa myong ba bshad byab// rgya shog thul 'khor thugs mkhar dang // zhing g-igs rdzun thos la// sngags pa shog sngags rim pas dgang // rdzang+ra /
11b2(rnying rgyud): ze'i bar dag rtsa// khyi mi gro dang a mraka/ sbyor ba rdzogs dang gnan pa re// rdzas rgongs sogs drubs bdug/ khyad par bzhig pa'i las su bshad// 'jigs pa 'jam dpal gzhin rje sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud la/ lung ba khyad par gyi le'u ste bdud
11b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas rje zhing bos bcom ldan 'das la 'das dkyis gsol to// tsam sangs rgyas su // ye shes 'ardzogs ldan bsra// dug gsum 'joms pa'i ye shes thod // 'gro ba'i lus la gdug pa'i nad/
11b4(rnying rgyud): nyamang ba// spyong ba'i rkyen po ltar lags// nad kyi mtshan nyid nga // / de nyi dgas pa'i sbyor bgang // yang dag dpa' thos pa sha par mdzu/ sogs la pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi saHsa par bshad do// sdigs ma lnga ma dus ti nga
11b5(rnying rgyud): sa yams drag po dz+wa la'i nang // 'gro ba yongs la khyab pa'i chu// skye dang khyad par bsrung bya nyams// mtsham med rke na rag gnas// las ngan ljin nas gnas ngan srung // las kyi rnam par ljin pa bshad// 'byung bzhi 'khrugs pas na pa
11b6(rnying rgyud): 'dur rnam di rgyas par bshad// rigs dang rang gi thabs las dang // tsal bapyad ci gtang lam dang // rnyeng shig tad tham gdang gzing ro// rtag zug phrad ces byab// bar cho da gdon bsregs 'phrul 'i chen// nad rigs pas dang
11b7(rnying rgyud): tug/ nga dod ga dang gas // bas nga sngags kyis padad da med// na / zhes da pa / 'as du ga ni// nga tshigs 'a ga pa /
12a1(rnying rgyud): zag pas// ji gas lag gabs par // sha sa dang bur byed// dra gag so lagasaso// dmangs rigs dang g.yas nasu gas// spadas pa dang ga yon ga 'dug// 'a banas ste// du
12a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid lnga phrag gnyis// rgyas rnam gzir rje khro la bur 'tha~Mng // dram pa'i na du ba gad pa yin// sus thun gyi zhing bapa laganang/ ga yid du shes par bya// sha bakhrig mdag kyi na lnga// pags bskyil zhugs pa yin// sras srid byed sus
12a3(rnying rgyud): di s+yAd// rtag tu zag 'dzag gdong pa dmyang // kri zhing tsog po khrag nad yin// blo snying na zhing 'dang pa dang // snying mi dga' zhing dran pa nyams// khong sbyar don la na dkrugs pa'o// stobs shod kyid lug nyal nyal po// skying khum rko bas la zhugs par bshad//
12a4(rnying rgyud): dbang ngomatha pa tha zed // ngangs rtogs kyib brgyad ba zugs// dgi byung grong zhing bang ba dang // tshig migs pa la m+bu d+hi// bad ba dag lakhrugs pa bshid// rtab kya brgya mig cul // sreg tsu dam mardzogs// rgam thugs pa yin #
12a5(rnying rgyud): yan lag 'a thams dang rings pa dang // zhabum chu ba'i nang du dong // gso ba'i thabs ni du mahe// nang la ldan te grul ldan // rnab smin chog sa rdzogs 'tho ba dgazungs// 'ang ba dpal ga shi rje'i rgyal po ga stobs chen kyi chung lus/ ku dadag so ba'i
12a6(rnying rgyud): bcuganyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan das kyis phying po don gyi mdadag/ gdug bakhrular dag zhidu da pa ba steg yod pa'i stor ba 'dig sungs so// dgas pazhigadol ga 'gro rigs// kun 'joms sbyor ba byu ba te// gde dgasu pa ra
12a7(rnying rgyud): shog dgal la // dpas pajig pa ba / na // song po latsha ga te tsa// de 'i sa sargya gnyis ldan// zod ci mongabs ga/ sa
12b1(rnying rgyud): 1 sa / ma ma // ga ldang chu/ su //
12b2(rnying rgyud): sa / ga tu
12b3(rnying rgyud): da/ sa / mya smra sa gyu// /
12b4(rnying rgyud): sa smras
12b5(rnying rgyud): rnam/ na sa smras na ma
12b6(rnying rgyud): sa
12b7(rnying rgyud): du ma sa na brji bye pas byud / sa gangag she ma 'i ga 'as su sa su su rudus
13a1(rnying rgyud): sa // ga da blan dun/ su / da gas su pan du
13a2(rnying rgyud): ses gsol bas/ de nas bcom ldan das kyis dri ba'i don legs par bshad no// klu dang gtan dang sa bdag gi/ dug gis zin pa 'di skye ste// chung rigs dug gis rtse zhing 'brings// rje rigs dug gis tsha shing bsreg/ dmangs rigs du yang zhing shes
13a3(rnying rgyud): bral ze'i dug gis zung zhing 'dar// de do pa sbrul drugag sngam thong // reg pa'i drug gis gzer bar byed// rangs drug gis myos par byed// mthong ba drug gis cal jug byed// nang gzhi'i brtag pa 'di ltas// rgya'i rigs mthong pa'adug gnad// dus
13a4(rnying rgyud): kyi sha yang bem par myong // 'thibs gling dab ba zhis na// tI ma'i bang gnyis lus mi byed// tham ze bsam pa'i drug na ni// lus slang mdog sa sbom por 'ong // drang zhing dasil la mdzon// rjes brgyad dag 'a lus med// rje ri kAl drangs dag nang
13a5(rnying rgyud): sa rgya sha 'dur dgong sha na// dmangs rigs reg pa'i drug nad ni// lhas 'dra sa rgong skying ldang 'dra// nyi mnu nas na ba'ong // ngag sem man dang dgu 'joms sngags// skyong bganyis su brjebs na gyi// sdong nA brtag pa 'di lta ste// rgyal dgas ma
13a6(rnying rgyud): yi gdon gnod na// rtag tu rgyal po dkor bdag gnong // bram ze rigs kyi gdon garjod ni// sa bsen klub seMmatsho ldan gnod// rje rigs klu mi gdon gnod na// klubatsan drag bcan yam gung gnod// dmangs rigs gdon na dam sriganod// rang
13a7(rnying rgyud): gnad kyis gzing shing bamed// sdigs ma can ma 'di sa ste// btsun pa matsa dang ni// man dang grazung bloT skyed // byed gsang gA nga dang // bung med nag mi la ba can// na chung gzhin nu thogs me dang // sring ma tha~Mng meng bya ba dang // dngag
13b1(rnying rgyud): gdag sa sa pa bya 'das/ brgyad zla du ba tu // bong byu sa// drang 'jogs sa pa TIgags/ de nga drug grus sa// dunangs sa ska sas ba sa
13b2(rnying rgyud): zungs drugan draH// sgra dang glang po zhon pa dang // dmag dpon byed dang ri la'ajog/ bzang ba'i rtags su shes ba bya// yid kyi dbang po 'bral ba'i thal// sril mngon la bden miH// rang nyam pa dbang podrod la bte// ces gsungs so// 'phags pa 'as
13b3(rnying rgyud): drug pagyus/ dang dgang rjo da smyigs gas 'a mas/ su lu 'diska la 'ang gad brtags pa// / A // skyemi da byings
13b4(rnying rgyud): rol ba ma sa// rang bzhin dpang rgya bcwan du nyid// 'a la nges par bgang dugs // zhes gsol bas/ dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa rigs pazhi'i gcin po// phyag tshogs pa bshad do// kyi med dbying sa las rol pa \u0f7f//
13b5(rnying rgyud): n+ya Ti'i gnon gyi gzugs can// rigs pa'i yul bum du gnon bcad// phyi nang srog gshed tshe rgyang bcas/ sa bskyed dbyings nas rdzogs par bya// de yang ji sa zazhe na// rang gros byam la phung po dag/ las yi shes ma yis cang // sras kyi sa
13b6(rnying rgyud): bri bsgeg sa nas kyang // gsung sngags ye shes me 'od kyis// na matogs rig nad dang drug/ sgrib pa'i thang po smin / bsag/ yang nas yang dru natanaH// shes pa'i do tshal gnod pa// bskal ba mod bung 'bar dbus pasas// yang na tha la pas
13b7(rnying rgyud): da // phreng gces kyi 'o// mal gsang drugs ze sa san nga can // rdzogs pas ma yong // 'ang nga bas yig sa zang nga// shad pags pa
14a1(rnying rgyud): da / // nga// ma zus// shos pa gyu s+ho// dus sa /
14a2(rnying rgyud): bskor ma // sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs// gnas sna spros te dalegs pa dgrag/ sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po rtsa// sa dang chu dang me rlung gis// 'byung bzhi'i gnyen po'i mtshon thayis// srog 'phrog garjing zhing bcad gtubs nas/
14a3(rnying rgyud): 'khrul 'khor nang du 'chang // kun la srid pa'i khyams khang nas// sngag+h+ra kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du bya// rgyal rigA bya khyud stobs kyis bshig/ rje rig phyag na rdo rjes bsheg/ dmangs rigla gdol pa gshin rjes bshig/ bram ze khyams khang lto bar bshig/ phyag rgya rdzogs dang sems
14a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' rdzogs// gang zag shes pa'i stobs dang sbyar// kun la srid pa'i dus sprul te// sngags kyi phreng ba 'gyed dang spud// yul la dmigs pa gsum du sbyar// rang bzhin lha la dmigs pas ni// grib byang rdzogs pas dbyings su thim// drag po'ing
14a5(rnying rgyud): sngags sbyin thang 'bru// wu gri dums gcod byed mchod// bdug srung rdzas gong du ba yis// mu dang gnyan dang sa bdag dang // ma mo rgyal po the'u rang brtan// klu ba sen mo dang dam kyi dang // mdze 'jel sogs 'joms par byed// rang bzhin dbang sbra ti
14a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin te// 'phen pa'i rtazhes dpa' bos bshad// 'phags pa 'ang ma dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ gnyen po lha'i rtog pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'ad
14a7(rnying rgyud): di da ces gsol to// e ma yang gsang rnal 'thor che// g+ha me rtog pa snang na// phrin las grong 'dzegs mdzad pa'i// phyag thabs ma gtan lachings mchog/ thim pa sbyor ba 'i lta Ta// bad ga dgas pa dang tsar bzad ma'i// thugs
14b1(rnying rgyud): skyong kha gang // dregs pa stobs kyis gnan pa ste// las pa rdzogs pa bshad par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgyabasam gtan gyi las 'dre dag bshad do// dben pa'i gnas spya maN+Dal bshams// rin chen bus par med na
14b2(rnying rgyud): bcud// sna dgu'i chu dang dri zhim dgang // dri dang snying po 'tsho byed dgang // kha rgyan mgul chings me tog mdzes// bdag nyid phyag rgya'i skur bsgoms la// thugs ka'i snying po 'od bcas 'phros// dngos rtog bsreg sbyang gzhal yas khang // gdan
14b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa zil gnon su// lhun gyis phub pa'i lha rgyud bsam// yid kyis sprul te mchod phul nas// gsang sngags brgya stong bzlas shing bstim// lha rnams 'od kyi gong bur chu// bkrus pas nang du gzhan chags sbyong // spyod pa sngags kyis bzu bang
14b4(rnying rgyud): bshad// snyid grang phyag tu sngags gsal bsang // rtsa rgyud dag cing zhen chags skyong // 'khor lo rgyan gyi khrus su bshad// rdum rtog phrag chags 'dzin med grol// sta ba chos nyid khrus su bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rdza bas
14b5(rnying rgyud): gyi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags kha tham srog gzir/ sbyar nan/ 'drid phyung / hri shag rbad// spyi chings sgo yi kha chings mchog/ phyag rgya bsam gtan srung ba de// srung ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang sred pa'i sbyor
14b6(rnying rgyud): babashad// yid mthun gnas su rdzas bsags la// maN+Dal dkar po dri spos ldan// thab khung zlum po dbus su ste// khru gang kha khyer mdzub gang la// sor bzhi zheng du rnam par brtag/ khru gang thur brkos pad+ma brgyad// 'khor yug dkar pos mangs
14b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// lung ma glar ma phang ma la// hom shing khru gang pa rba \u0f7f// yam shing sor brgyad de nyid la// dbyibs dang kha dog dkar la zlum// 'bras bu nas chan rtsi mar dang // me tog dkar po su gul dkar// 'o ma dang bcas mchod pa dbul// me lha dgang /
15a1(rnying rgyud): sa tug pag/ spyad// sas s+ho// / 'anas pa na sa sa phyugs bas na
15a2(rnying rgyud): gar ma tsam phud 'i ba la sa nA~M ga~M shAn ting a mu ka dz+nyA na sarba shAn ti ga du s+'uH// tshogs pasas/ sde'i srung tha med 'grub// nyams pa bskang zhing dngos grub myur// 'jigs pa brgyad la sangs par rgyab// phan gangags zhi ba'i spong bar bshad
15a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang gadrug rngub tshur gcad d+hir// drag po dam ro len sbyin pasreg bshad// sa gsum 'khar gong chu gsum lA// maN+Dal khu gang dpangs su brtsegs// dbus su khru gang me thab bo// kha khyer gsum ldan thung la brko/ kha khyer ba ze gang mdzu bu
15a4(rnying rgyud): so ga nyi sa yo pa// rgyama'i khragags pa / tshogs rje rdu 'du na 'am ma theg pa'i chags// yang logs pathog rje ste dgras par \u0f7f// mi pa dul ba da bcad// mchod rjes pa rjesag
15a5(rnying rgyud): nga'i rdzas// tsha ba'i rdzas dang myos pa'i rdzas// mthun rdzas la sogs dgod par bya// rgyagra ma steng du ming byang khar// tsher ma can dang dug shing bcig/ khrag dang dug gis rab tu bran// thab khung ri las me swa bskyed// mchod 'bral me lnga
15a6(rnying rgyud): kA ru// ye shes rang gsal stong bdag med// chos sgra'i ngang las phyag rgya'i sku// bgyid la grwa rkun zad cing sdebs// 'phrul dang bcas pa drag sngags bcas// rdzas kyi mchod pa me sbar bsreg/ rkyen gyi sbyor ba 'phro 'dra min// rtsol dral ji bzhin ldan
15a7(rnying rgyud): grub// nam mkha'a' khor lo gyi 'joms gtsad// sbyor ba rdzogs dang dril zod gzhan// drag po che gcod sbyin sreg mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di dag su ga sung thugs rdo rje las rngon to// e ka hU~M dun la ma
15b1(rnying rgyud): khrag ra ma tsa ya/ sa nA ga du ri/ sa nA ga unan gzer phyung / srog la dun ri tsit+ta theng shag thun rbad ye maM/ gnod byed 'byung po dz+wa la raM mA ra ya phaT phaT// rdzogs dang zod par rdzas blug la// bka' rten 'og gam dur khrod gnan// drag po tshar gcong 'khor lor
15b2(rnying rgyud): bshad// de nas dmar len yang gsad mchog/ gnan pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'khor lo ling+ga thal pa rnams// gang yin thod par thugs nas ni// chos gcig dang ni bcu drug la// sbyor ba mkhas pas gnan par bya// zhi khrog shin rje phur pa
15b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// 'khor lo rus sbal thod chen gzhug/ ma hA man d+ha la 'og tu gnan// ma mo bdud mo srin mo rnams// nyan thos thod gos bka' rten gnan// bdud dang mu stegs mgon po rnams// ga yag rur 'obs khung sgo drung gnan// rgyal po
15b4(rnying rgyud): dge brten dkor srung rngams// spyang zod sgro la ma srang kha ri ga nan// btsan dang srog bdag bri bo rnams// sha ru sbrang thod god gsum ga nan// gru bdud mo dang phug bdag mo// bon po'i gos gtums lha khang gnan// the brang chags 'gong gshi
15b5(rnying rgyud): rdog rnams// glang ngur bcug la lam mdor gnan// sri can chung thod them 'og gnan// sa bdag gru gnyen mdze 'dre rnams// 'khor lo phag pa'i lto bar gzhug/ phag thod bka' rten gad gnod gnan// log nag rdo rje rgya gam ldan// laM la
15b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen ri rab brtan// rus sbal skyo bar stobs kyis gnan// gdon mi za ba'i pho brang gdab// gdug pa'i stobs kyis gnan par bshad// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// e dun ka yaM/ sarba tsit+ta gzir nan/ hU~M laM staM b+ha ya nan/
15b7(rnying rgyud): mA ra ya nan// dreg pa gnan pa'i 'khor lor bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po sdig pa nag po stobs chen gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las sbyor/ 'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje snying pos ba

17a2(rnying rgyud): na na
17a3(rnying rgyud): su
17a4(rnying rgyud): rna sa sa
17b1(rnying rgyud): ser 'dren bshal chen po ste// cho bachu ser nad rnams sel// gzhan yang kun khyab bzho dang // skye tshes gdong gi chu ser 'dren// pad+me kun khyab zo sha dang // gser gyi ma tog srung na yang // yan lag chu ser 'dren par bshad// gzhan yang bcang /
17b2(rnying rgyud): len ldan bshad pa// dkar ba cig thu bskal byab dang // rgya mtshog ser gyi bye ma dang // man 'dzir dang can dmar dang // 'bri ta sa 'dzin mon lngab dang // seng ldeng tsan+dan ma khwa dang // sh-i n+da sleb na rab tur ba// so song gtong nga mngal la
17b3(rnying rgyud): sha dang dus pa rtsa khrag dang // klo stong mkhal ma nang khrol dang // rgya ser nag po tha dag sam// gzhan yang bcud len spyan sbyar ba// tsan+dan dkar po seng ldeng dang // bdud rtsi dam pa chu gdus na ni// mer dkar 'om spang rtsi mar// sma na che ser naH
17b4(rnying rgyud): po sam// lus kyi stobs ldan pa thag rgyas 'gyur// se rjengs mi rang da de// tsan+dan dkar ba 'bras grags ma// nem pa ma hA ni sa pa dang // kar sA rin rgya ser dem// seng lding ngo mau gdus pa dang // 'bras bu gsu ma dang / gral dag
17b5(rnying rgyud): skar rdo rjes ma ra// cod zhe spang rtsi kar sngar// brgyad len rtswa ser nag po skem// skabs sgra rgya ser 'dren pa shal gtong // 'grib 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// bcud len sman gyi sbyor bar bshad// mthong ba'i drug gis rin pa na// gapur bu
17b6(rnying rgyud): yas btab nas kyang // sbyar ba'i khaH zug par bya// mkhas pa ste tshogs kyi gas gzhug dril// kha grangs drug gis bzung bas na// khong dug pur gtang bar bya// rtag tu phye ba shal nang bshal gyi// mtshan rtsa gter zhing khrag ngad gdon/
17b7(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i dug gis zi pa ni// tsha ba gsum gyi sman sar gtang // drod bsten bsil ba'i zas sman srang // reg pa'i drug gis zin pa na// a drar lo sman mar gtang // 'byung ba'i nad rnams gso ba'i phyir// rtsa bkrag tar zhing khwa gang na ga don/
18a1(rnying rgyud): ga 'du pa na rna ma sa ga nan na na das/ rnas tu gas/ sa/ du na du
18a2(rnying rgyud): ba sem// chu ser nag po 'joms par byed// gzhan yang rgya ser 'dren par byed// kha ni yon por song ba na// me yo'i ngos nas chu ser dbyung // mig skems lcibs dag nas dbyung // mtshul ba 'gags na snga bshal bya// tshwabragasu ma dang tsang
18a3(rnying rgyud): darjod// thaMng 'gagasan po ca gsang // kar rgyan 'bru shong ma dang btags// 'byung ba 'khrug pa'i nang dang drug/ gas pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// chu skyer nad rnams 'jom sa par byed// 'phags pa 'dam dngul gshin rje'i rgyal po rin
18a4(rnying rgyud): stongs chen gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'tsho byed sman gyi le'u skye bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdorje snyid pos bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bregs pa 'joms pa'i bcom ldan 'das// bkod dang gsal btab gan
18a5(rnying rgyud): badz+rab zhing // mchod pa pa shA tshul btung par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ gnas bcom ldan 'das dregs pa 'dul bas lce rnams la bskyed cing drags dam gad nas rgyal ba 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings rgya brud nas// drag po ma yiganas
18a6(rnying rgyud): nas// kwa 'bram gtan khris bdag sto klung na// phyogs stong mate 'jis pa'i 'i// babasred shes da hU~M thaM gdan// den// drug rje ba rnam tshogs 'joms pa'i zhwa// sangs kyis thams cad 'dus pa da nyid// ye she sa rnam pa'i rgyu
18a7(rnying rgyud): na du// nga phyagadrug rnabs pa zhirang bzad// g.yas dag ga po dang par da 'am mthing ngam// gams dang rgyal nas su// g.yod dang kru bram gtan zhugs pa// dbyin na mthing 'jam pa sa// spang ba rlos par gyu /
18b1(rnying rgyud): dad+ya // sa bdag sde brgyad lha min gyi// dbang po lnga dang tsita gsol// phyag drug mtshon cha 'bar ba yis// zhe srung grag nyanas bdag dang // dgra bgegs mgo lus tshal par gzhag/ dpral bdud dang skyin po dang // batshan dag stegs rgyal ba re/
18b2(rnying rgyud): ya the sacan byas/ man brjod kyi sagro bcad nas// dogal cing dang thang bas bcan// rgyal rig ldan gyi grong khyer brgyan// rdo gas mgyur chu tshangs srang bcan// zang nga shi kyis phyogs sa dang / sa gang
18b3(rnying rgyud): brgyan// rigs ngan gdol pa zhabs 'og bting // 'asu rigs drug nas sraza// mtsho ba dgu khri cang phur gtams// spyan nas 'jigs pa'i me 'brar zhing // shangs nas rlung nag 'tshu bas ma lang // dbu sgra sbyar bsugs// gsug tu 'damar dag
18b4(rnying rgyud): me chen 'bar// sku dgrar bsngo ba'i dam nyams dang // gdug pa'i sa bdag su gnyan bsreg/ gang la bye ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i myod pa choms// lus srog dbang po dang // rtsa rgyas
18b5(rnying rgyud): dang bla ma gyo skams/ byin sreg cid na gdung du me'i zhas du rtog/ sdang 'i dab dang nod de'i dgegs// mchod pang bus po/ ram ka ti// zhes byang// g.yon gyi phyo klan yum chen mo// ma gcig rdo rje khros ma ste// sru mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// gdug pa'i ral pa sun lha ga
18b6(rnying rgyud): ral pa'i zar bu re ru la// gser g.yu me tog rgyun cha 'phyangs// gdol pa'i klu dang thod pa yis// dbu dang phyag zhangs lha tshigs brgyan// zhal nas mi ro rnor 'phrul// spyan nas khrag 'dzag Tu lu lu// shangs nas chung nag 'tshubs ma
18b7(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa dgra snying phyur 'khyud la// g.yon pa snying khrag gcol skyob// drag tu bskul zhing zad tsaman// mtshogs 'brul yang gzir zhing sngangs// ma mo'i sbyin thang dgra la'o bas// gang la byag khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin gyi
19a1(rnying rgyud): gsang dgas par ra ba choms// lus po ga dbang ba dang sa kyigaH// mabyas pag dang tham tsham mas// lag non thugs kyad kyig 'kho nas// 'byung byas myed sa pa las// dang gas sa // gas kyadang /
19a2(rnying rgyud): marAN ni// sku mdog skyug nag 'brar ba la// rngam zhing dregs pas dgra bgegs 'dul// rna ba'i grong khyer sbrul gyis brgyan// tshangs pa'i mgo bcad do shal byas// g.yas pa 'khor lo rtsibs bcu yis// dag bshegs mgo lus tshal bar
19a3(rnying rgyud): gshos// / g.yon na tsi rta dmar po bsnams// 'gral byed tsi rta khong nas 'byin// drag tu bskul zhing rbad tsam na// bdud dang srin po'i don skying 'byin// btsan dang 'gong po srog bdag 'joms// dug lnga'i gdug pa khros pa yi// sa bdag gu gnyan
19a4(rnying rgyud): gzir zhing bsreg/ gang la bya ba khyod she kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho snyoms// ya ma hA tsa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'byung ba
19a5(rnying rgyud): me yi dngas ma las// rin chen rigs kyi khro bo ste// rdegs pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba yis// phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'i rtags// zhal gcig rngam zhing gtsigs pa yi// dregs pa can dang lha srin rnams// srog dang
19a6(rnying rgyud): phral nas zlas su za// tshoms dang mche ba gtsigs pa yis// gdug pa'i glu gnyan zhal du gsol// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse dgu yis// ye shes dgu ldan nyon mongs 'joms// g.yon na tsi N+Da'i phreng ba yis// dbang chen rdegs pa ban du 'khol//
19a7(rnying rgyud): zhabs gnyis byed kyi dor thabs kyis// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs zil gyis gnon// dbu dang phyag zhabs lha tshogs rnams// sbrul dang rin po che yis brgyan// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du srol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i
19b1(rnying rgyud): nga choms// lung khrog dbang pa dang sazlag bya// rma rgyas thab dang dras rgya snyoms// dregs pathags kyi dkyil 'bor nas// 'byung ba rlung gi dang sa ma pas// las kyi rags kyi khro ba ste// rus sa la rnam pa'i man na// nyon mongs lnga yaH
19b2(rnying rgyud): gcong // skye ba med pa'i khams su spyad// thugs kyi gseng mdzod chen po \u0f7f// lha smin mi shi snying po 'chang // dmigs pa'i da ma nyams dgra bgegs kun// lcags zer 'bar ba'i stobs kyis khrag/ spyan gyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'asreg
19b3(rnying rgyud): bzhe dus mA'i stobs kyis non// dmod pa drug po'i chad pas chod// mchod rten drug gastobs kyis non// gang la bru brjod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang sbyin myur du k+kol// de nga rdegs pa'i sgo bcom swA// pus shog dang
19b4(rnying rgyud): dngas b+hiSh+Ta s+ye// malus ngag dang bram tsho snyoms// sreg tsug gadrug pa 'dul byed pa// 'byung ba N+DI mi drangs ma las// padz+ra rigs kyi thabs// b+ha byung rgyal po mdzu che// 'bod lo 'bang ba gdog pa la// ra kyi mtshon na bu gros garnams
19b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha'i gshog pa bdebs pa yis// gadrug byed ma lus gshog cing gtug/ spyan mi gnyi ma'i gzigs stangs kyis// bag zugs rgya mchog tang nas sems// rdorje 'byung ba'i mchu dpal phyi// gdug pa'i bu rgya skr-inas 'dzin/
19b6(rnying rgyud): gsum kyad ngas pa'i zhal bzad pas// gdug pa'i kun la long dugs la// gdal na ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yi myur du tshul// zhe sdang dregs pa'i byor ba tsams// lus srog dbang po dngos gyi// rnams bsha
19b7(rnying rgyud): mas// yang hrul drug sa/ nga na gas// sra ga shog pa tshan chag// klu badz+ra pa zan pardeg par mdzad// gang ma ga rdzum pa 'is// nyams pa ga zug zug la sa// 'jang gadrug pa'i sgra ga // na
20a1(rnying rgyud): stong thams pardeg/ dab pa'i 'a myong nas bshag/ drag su rlangs pa dpa la gtang// da 'ang dudag mad 'argyab/ gdal za spyod shes kyis// dmyigs paklu yid myur dranal// nga gas
20a2(rnying rgyud): rngoms// sras klog dbang po dngas nyig rtse// sa ng+yas b+hag dang tha tsho snyoms// shar to rlob kyi phyogs bzhinas// tha dgrags son pa chen po zhes// dmanyams dam bgegs pa blagatshig/ chen mo 'dzis byed pa'i dag dang // 'dring pong zhing
20a3(rnying rgyud): bI'i// rdung ba'i da bgegs thug la// mang ni snod tshul bzhin bsngal bangad mdzod// rje mtshatshan pa'i gtid dram na// 'chi bdag bye ba dgra'i bzhugs// las kyi mtha' rdzing byed min pas// nyams pa'i dgra grogs myur du stsol// 'thung
20a4(rnying rgyud): na/ da rdzogs pa pa brgya ba // sa pa 'digasmra pa sa nas/ gan nas pa byugs/ sa byim 'i drung chud menabs/ shes pa gang lan byung chul// par byo la
20a5(rnying rgyud): drog bang po dngas skyes kye// rba rgyas thAg dang tham gyi snyoms// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpalag shin rjegasheng po'i rgyal po sdig pastobs rkyen gyi rgyang las// thugs dam baphrul bya dang brjod pa'i le'u stebargya dgra /
20a6(rnying rgyud): nas rdo bye pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad rjes gsal to// kye ho phrin las rdzogs pa maM// rdo rje rjeng chen rgyal po ni// stobs chen kya gnan rgal po khyang/ gdug pag sum po lag gnon dang // yan lag spyad bkrus par shod// cesag
20a7(rnying rgyud): sa/ de nas bcas ldan 'das kyis/ 'du rgyas par bshad de// rdzogs kyi byas pa rtongs med na// ngamachog bshegs pati dzin pa // mchod do ba nga byung shing // dmigs pasgyur du mchod na/ sngags kyis rtags ra/
20b1(rnying rgyud): she bstan da na byung // btub dang nga ba shes pas ba// sngags thos kyis cang mabyag/ ra ba la 'o TIgacog // phyagag d+ha pa sa gas// byas// nazugs nga nga mags pa
20b2(rnying rgyud): bzhig rdzing rjod pas rten la 'dug/ blun ba rjes sngar gang bzhagags sa pa // bsgom dang sngags bzlas zin las bcol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rtags kyikyi mngo me brlog cing dkrug pa 'a gagrangs so// ertags ju
20b3(rnying rgyud): drug shag d+hA na/ san+na ga drug/ bla na thams car// dam tsi nAg srog la zed dbyed rtsa ladun dran// bam shag srung nan zang / satsug ro lcags kyi ched / zug te sog la drang // zam shig ga sgang nad/ dbugs pa zang gze pa kyi la mdzad/
20b4(rnying rgyud): blon na myig la b+h+yo// phrin las rdzogs rjes drar khrod dam// bka' rkyen byin can 'og tu mnan// ya bAg+na sha ya tam su// thab den 'grub ba dzag par 'gyur// stobs med byas na rang 'tshangs// ma ma ha zhes byar bshad// gzhan ya
20b5(rnying rgyud): tog gzhom blan// bam chen mi ma thod pa ra// des bo'i yul dbyibs 'dres thug// sngo dang rtsi shing rdzing yur dang // ser srang yul wA bcas pa gzhug/ mnol khrag drug dang byung bag thab// bla ma dpya yi yul dbus gzhung // gang 'ig
20b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i lo 'bras brgyag// gal te byebs par mA myur na// sa bdag nyid la phreng bas gdab// dud bdug rdzas bsreg drag cal \u0f7f// / 'jig rten brlag par yang dag pashud// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go// ma du na ka ye d+ha t+pa la dzig nan/
20b7(rnying rgyud): 'dril shang thar pob jo/ mar tsa sha TIg nan/ tho bo dag mo yob/ nyid thugs khrag la dag she dum/ ye ma nA ga gzing nan/ drag tu hriM gro shar sher dril nan thob/ 'bras bumo tog 'joms pa bshad// gzhan yang yul khams srung byed na//
21a1(rnying rgyud): yang mal can // nang gdon na byung gsag pa sa// sprin rnams shing ge byung po bsag/ snga sa rgya martags pa pa ma// mdun d+ha/ san ga bya ma thal na rdzu/ shogs/ spyod/
21a2(rnying rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ 'bras bu yul khams bsrung bar bshad// gzhan yang ltas ngan las byed na// sgyed khru sreg pa ri bong dang // mon pa'i tsit+ta dbang po lnga// gzugs la sngags sgor 'bru gsum la// sngags bzlas gza' skang 'jom pa la// dang bra/
21a3(rnying rgyud): gnas la tshud pa na// ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur// e dun kA yi/ ag chos khong dril chu marbad myag ru leng has pho baM/ a ga mo ka ti khug chug khu bo hi btson phob khu le phob du ling has phob/ ti khron khug chug myos ti a ai du
21a4(rnying rgyud): tas phob/ mus khu ldi mug khor gyi rgyags/ du ling has pho bcu bathub du ling hAs phog// lhas ngan sbyor ba rdzogs pa ni// rang rang sngags dang rdzas kyis 'grub// ltas ngan sprul pa'i sbyor bar bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgya
21a5(rnying rgyud): zlagasang nag po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ yan lag gi sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ e ma sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku// che ba rang byung rgyal po khyod// stobs chen kyang gnon
21a6(rnying rgyud): bka' yi chud// rngag po mngon du phyung ba 'di// dang po gang nas de ltar byung // rgyud don bstan pa ji ltar lags// yongs su rdzogs dang gtad pa gang // zhes gsol pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba'i don rgyas par bshad do// rdzogs pa 'joms brda
21a7(rnying rgyud): 'badag/ longs spyod 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang // byangs mas sprul pa'i dge pa 'dzin// mya dang mkha' 'gron la 'thong ma// bdud dang srin po shab phyogs// nyi zla dbang drug dgor sung ga nga// su byed tud dul seMg nong rkyen gru// gnyi
21b1(rnying rgyud): gshed kyi dag 'dun kun// da la brag 'gyud rol pa 'ang // rnamatog mtshan pa rang sol ba'i// rdorje bde bachen po 'di// chos nyid kyi ba ma dbyings nas// bstan pa'i snying po ngas pa 'don// stong phrag bdun dang ba rgya phrag brgyad// thabs dang shas bya/
21b2(rnying rgyud): dga'o// pra 'atul ba don rdzogs pa// nga nya rjem por lam// gsang bdas pa'i ba drung byung // spobs che smra thub thal gyis gnon// chos chug par rangags lab// yang dag dgongs pa gnyis mi dpol// 'jal pa pa'i phyi
21b3(rnying rgyud): dogs// chos dang chos can chos nyid gcig/ rnam shes gzung 'dzin rang snang shugs// lce spyod man dag thabs cig dang // 'khor 'das snang srid don dam gcig/ bde dang drug bsngal chu 'bras 'das// rang bzhinang dag nyid chen po
21b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// so mkhrug par rdzogs sangs rgyas// ma skyes skye med gnas las 'das// kye 'jig 'gug pa spyod dpag med// bde ba'i ye shes rogacig mnya ma// e ma mi 'gyur stobs ldan gdong // bgrod thabs shAl ldan pas lang // seng de'i/
21b5(rnying rgyud): bral po bkur bar b+ha/ nor bu'i phreng ba bar meg rbad// gnas dang grogs po yang 'ong bston// dgon pa'i gnas su mi ga yel bya// gsang sngags nus pa 'byung bar bshad// tsha gsum nus dang myos pa yang // rjod dang dbang po dang rnams brtan
21b6(rnying rgyud): em bka' gyung rol pa 'dri// lag na rdo rje khro bo'i tshul// tshogs gzhan dad ma pa' 'bo chags// gshon ga shed kyi dag 'dun kun// snying po na bka' klu dgatu // 'di la 'jig rgyun dngos grub mchog/ ma lus 'dus pa'i stob
21b7(rnying rgyud): med// 'di la yun gyi don ldan pas// che bas rgya ba'i yon tan rdzogs// snying po 'di las gzhan med pas// snying bdon gyi nga dub shad// ces gsungs so// de nas 'pho mang po dka' mgu yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ngod+mo dang /
22a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// bde na dang lus thabs kyi bya thag 'char// gnyis med 'bras byas byams gsum rgyas btab nas// 'gyur ldan gyis zab pa phrul 'drung// ma ga kyangs la
22a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra// phyag rgya zil gnon dregs pa 'joms pa'i sku// dbang gru ga tum rngam chen po'i skul bdud// phyi med dbyings las thugs rjes don mdzad pa// drug gsum nad sel ldan gyi rgyal po ste// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po khyed la phyag 'jol 'dud//
22a3(rnying rgyud): bskyod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po zlags nub po thug pa stobs chen gyi gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad cing rjes bya yi rang bya'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / 'phags pa 'jam dpel gshin rje zla ga sa nag pa
22a4(rnying rgyud): mchog tu gsung bsdig pa stobs chen zhes bya ba rgya'i yul du grags pa rdzogs so// / sngags dang / mtshon che dang/ bka'i bdag po gsum gyis rgyas btub po// g+haN+ya n+ya/ rab tu gsang ba'i rgyud 'bras cu rdzogs pa zhes bye ba/ saing+ga pa
22a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs gyad kyi yul du dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis/ u rgyan dpal rang byung gi mchod rten d+ha rmA tsakra chos kyi 'byung gnas nas/ mkha' 'gro ma la zhus pa rim par brgyud pa/ ba la yul gyi slob dpon pa su d+ha ra dang / ngan du
22a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje khri gtsug gos bsgyur brdzogs so// / rgya gar skadang/ ya ma kr-iH/ s+'u r+b+ba tarmA bathun tA na rbAd+ham/ bod skad du/ gshin rje nag po gsang bde yon nyid kyi byud 'thun zhes kyai hA/ bcom ldan
22a7(rnying rgyud): 'dis 'jam dpal gshing po ma ba yum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal la nyid kyis chu'i dang las gzugs srug lagasum cug drug par bzhengs te/ phrin las rnam pani spun ces khyab pa'i
22b1(rnying rgyud): gzhas yas pang gying yong rdzogs gsal ba bo brang po shes pam thu pa'i dog min ci gnas na/ yum pa d+ha me dang gnyis du med par bathugasas// de'i dus da con 'dus pa'i 'bor yang la shas dang la sa las thub pa dang bab TIg las dgas pa can pa
22b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i ngang las bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs las rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs so// kye ma ho// 'khor 'das thams cad 'khor lo'i dang // 'khor lo thams cad 'jam dpal don// de nyid rig pa byang chub sems//
22b3(rnying rgyud): ba chen por sangs rgyas so// oM a ho// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal kha thun gyi rgyud las/ gle gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal chen po des/ srid pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
22b4(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// de'i dus ra rtson gsod byed la mdu zhes byab/ ris kyi rog tu dkyil lakhor gyi rkang na pa nas pa la sogs pa'i bdu dang / gshin dang / srin pa dang / ma mo khrag 'thung dang / lcemazin rnams shin tu gdug pa che ba
22b5(rnying rgyud): da rnams kyis srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad za zhing gsod pa dang rngam par gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ya mAn+ta kas/ yum be tA li dang gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad de/ sra sa ya ma rA dza sprul nas gsod byed ya ma rA dza'i lcags mkhar ba tu 'dun
22b6(rnying rgyud): gzir ba las/ de rnams shin tu dngangs te srog dang bral ba snyam du gyur nas/ 'jigs pa'i sems kyis bstod pa ni/ gtum chen dregs pa chen po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang byed bdud 'dul dur khrod zas kyis brgyan// khro rngam gdug del
22b7(rnying rgyud): srid gsum thal bar rlog/ sgrol byed spu mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khor// gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad wa// 'jigs byed yaM ma rA dza'i s+phu la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces sbas te/ ho ma rU dza du man ta ka ra na pra ta dza ya a ru ki snying la gu ma
23a1(rnying rgyud): rbadang / ni da shag pa pa mar la snang gang ma ran nag po la ma srog la phra mug pa mang la zang / mar na zang zad / bdag gi smod pa rig par bdas// dpa' bos bzhes su 'bangs su maH// zhes dbus kyi gsod byed chen pas
23a2(rnying rgyud): de nas sras mdzag ya mad+ha dzas bka' stsal pa/ nga la bstod pa phrul ba yis// phan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyis// nga ye lha la ba stong pa dang // 'khor bcas rjed kyis srog snying phul// zhes gsungs so// de'i dus su ga
23a3(rnying rgyud): snyamA ste/ rnam pa kha'i dbus na yang bltas pa las/ srid pa gsum gyi rtse mo na gzi mdangs dang ldan pa'i g+ha ya mAr+tha ka mthong ste/ shin tu byed pa'i dbang gis bstod pa ni/ nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od skyong phyogs bcur 'gyi// gdug bye
23a4(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha mang pos bskal pa'i mi ltar 'bar// rab brji gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// skyes smras te/ dbus kyi la dwags dang gshin rje rnams kyis rang gi snying po phul ba ni/ ya ma rA dzas do ma ya/ ya modo ru ta yo da ya/ yid yo na la
23a5(rnying rgyud): yAg+ne ya dz+nyA ni d+ham ya d+hi phaT/ ces phul lo// de nas sha zan dam po yab yum ces smras pa/ oMn la ma nul te gsod la rngam ga shos la mer sris la rgya bram pas b+ha ma/ sar+b+ba \u0f7f lpag gu mas dgra po'i snyid phyung zhig/ de'i tshem mo dang khrag 'drang na
23a6(rnying rgyud): kyis rang gi dmong pa phral te smras pa/ ma mA e ka dza d+h+wa dzadza/ rtag dag sha mud+d+ha g+hing la mo dz+hats+tsha/ e kar+Nahi mi tsa rol po ri la zad rtag rag shA Tu re la zad/ rakro ti ku mdza dza khal ma gre ts+tsha b+h+yo/ re ma ti sr-i la bi ril rbad/ thun mugs rnye la rdu
23a7(rnying rgyud): zad/ ya la mon na tan ma mi rkyongaH/ skyid par ga srogs tu byam mas/ zung / skyeng 'tshal ba med pa la drang // ces smras so// de'i dus su gza' daphrulas smras pa/ 'a tshal po mu me ba sham ki ba ta hUMn na lam sta nya yinan/ zhes slo
23b1(rnying rgyud): nas pang byam bdag bcag sa dang snyamaldan barba kyis smras pa/ oM lam mangs dam lan/ bral dras par badzad nan/ seM dag d+hang dag rdang rdzogs tshal ba nan tshal pa dang/ a sbyang gshegs mkhas sum bldan na/ oMs d+ha
23b2(rnying rgyud): grang thar tsanan/ a mraka mA da la nan/ A~M a kr-i d+h+wi ka mad+g+ha shrI ya man+ta ka kA la nI pakA la nA nas du ba rbad ru l+ra D+he / rdul tsa pa ya ni tI shwa ra na naH/ a mu ki mA ra ya nan/ ni mA ra ya/ ne ma ra dra/ ya ma d+hi ya ma khyag tshal ba ba rig/ dwadza /
23b3(rnying rgyud): hU~M phaT/ badz+ri tsadr-i lteng zad/ mu ya ma pra ya ma snyid / ga tshul 'di/ ya mA~M rA dza sha dz+ra mu tshul ti grag/ ling du la ling zad ling / a mu kaM cho ma ling swAhA/ bdag cag bstan pa bsrung bar bgyi// zhes smras so// da'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dam
23b4(rnying rgyud): tshig snying po bsgrag pa ni/ oMts+tshi trA~MHbe kr-i tan nas ma ya hU~M d+ha baT+Ta swAH/ zhes bka' stsal to// dam na thung nas mna' bgrags te/ btsun pa bsrung bar dam bcas ta zas sbrul du bstan pa bshig pa 'i dgra bo'i srog dbugs sbyin te/ gtor ma
23b5(rnying rgyud): dang ngam rdzas phog nas bka' lus mi 'da' bar bka' bsgos pa ni/ oM ya mAn ta ga hrIHSh+T+r-iHmany+dzu shrI sa ma ya u ne u ye dza/ zhes bka' stsal to// ma mo khrag 'byung thams cad kyi snying po'i mgo yon tan gyi sngags kyis gnan pa dang gshin rje'i mgo gnan
23b6(rnying rgyud): 'bru bzhi pa bka' stsal bya/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shI ya mA nu kA ya ma rA dza/ zhes bka' stsal to// ya mAn+ta ka zhes pa ni/ gshin rje'i mgo gnan par bka' stsal to// de ltar thams cad btul te bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas nas dajig rten pa bde ba lnga
23b7(rnying rgyud): bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur to// 'jam dpal khathun gyi rgyud las/ dregs pa btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas thugs las phul pa'i
24a1(rnying rgyud): na man su smos/ / sa /
24a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa /
24a3(rnying rgyud): pa / ga sa/ rten gan da/ sa zin pa dkyi // phyogs smyi ga/ 'di /
24a4(rnying rgyud): na gas po'i dab nas dug nga 'a ga su/ di sa pas su bye sa pa/ na pa ngan pa badzin ci ni tshul ba ba / me li tig zhin badzin
