24b5(rnying rgyud): sa
25a1(rnying rgyud): yum dang mchogs bskyal// khrag ldan dag na pa ga phyug// dpag pag zhan mags/ oM skul rab na / bal shA las nga kun n+yan/ bkra/ thun nan/ gastonan/ blag nga
25a2(rnying rgyud): drag/ a mra ki khong khrag la lA/ nad rnams so sor btang ba dang // ban+de la sogs gsad pa ni// man ngag dam pas bya ba yin// thun drug dril ba'i man ngag la// mda' yis gzor bar bya ba ste// theg pa ma yi mda' zong ni// zlang
25a3(rnying rgyud): khara'ang gling btsul// drug gis myos byed rakas 'jig/ nyung dkar mtshan la khram shing byab// dang la bur pa gud ba par bya// lpags pa na 'bras rtag 'grogs na// ro langs ra nag poT// yang na thugs kyi krung bzlog \u0f7f// las rnam bra
25a4(rnying rgyud): nas dur khrod du// drang srong sngags dang dmod pas gnan// gtor ma gtAng la phrin lngas gzhol// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal bathun gyi rgyung las// byed par las la bkrol de gsad pa'i ny+tsan+d+he swA 'o// / de nas yang dag
25a5(rnying rgyud): bshad bag// las kyi n-i ma dA ni// nasu 'byor bab shes 'dod pa na// tshe yi man+t+ra 'disar bya// oM a kr-i ta ka ya T+Ta ka kA la sa nga 'du tu byung // zhes pas tsa ba rgya ba// rgyo 'i dngos grub chen po tho// gar yang mye
25a6(rnying rgyud): dngab ltadzin// drang dag coM d+d+haH/ yun ti sprin drug du tsar shar she/ dri la phob/ byeng dkar dag la sngags te'adang // gzhan yangs rab bcad parnaM/ oM pA la nub tsa yab dngas sha sha la mo ha ya hU~M b+ha la hUM phaH/ ha~M hu~M sh+'u la li te rdo rje dzini
25a7(rnying rgyud): a ru ti swA tAM/ pheM sman yang nr-i// skye 'bra ma thung dkar dgel bsngags// gang dang phyogs kyi gtang byas na// 'chang par 'gyur ni tha tshom med// rnying dang 'dra te shin rje zab// gzhan yang snas ngan 'bebs 'dod na// ya ma ni ra kyi
25b1(rnying rgyud): dpagasangs so// la ya pang 'thun pa lus/ lus / dag pa// ma nan// / ya man ma nan//
25b2(rnying rgyud): zabs kyang rnam pa jug d+habazed// gcig pa ma ma mas tshugs pa ma// drang rtsod b.rab ba can dang ldan/ chog dgan shA / ldan nyid la dadapas bstod// sa btang pa da 'al
25b3(rnying rgyud): bsod pa'i le bdun pa'o// / de nas bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' thal pa/ e mnyang yi rgyu 'dzin// rnyed kyi nying po dpon nyi sapati/ thams cad las khya gyu pa yi smra/
25b4(rnying rgyud): pa la ba/ kun la bstan na 'jig 'gyur la/ zhig nas sems can dasal byar rtse/ 'on tan sangs rgyas kyi brtan pa la pyo ra 'i dus bri/ sangs nas tsha ba'i yon tan ba pa yin pa pa shin tu brtag cing ga 'byor// zhes masungs pa/
25b5(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal brdzun gyi rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su babyung ba'i larje brgyad pa'o// / gshin nag pa gas ba khon nyid kyi rgyang rdzob bye brdzogs // / da 'di 'ang ma dpal gyis ga' ga ngas nas/ la gas tha
25b6(rnying rgyud): thaska bsags pa de la babaste/ des bkri shis pa ldan gyi dga' rab rdo rjes/ des 'jam dpal bshes gzhan la/ des gtsug lag dpal dag la/ de dud+ha ral/ rnaM sa yang bdagatar ma/ bka rigs la du mi rung ngo / #
25b7(rnying rgyud): bshadang / gshe ba bdun gas na sa 'di dang
26a1(rnying rgyud): sal sa
26a2(rnying rgyud): su sa
26a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ na
26a4(rnying rgyud): su
26b1(rnying rgyud): dag su/ sa ma dngas sas rdzun/ sa dbyu// sam / ya na ga nga sa dag sa du na gams sa/ ma
26b2(rnying rgyud): nga nga sa
26b3(rnying rgyud): mag/ sa gsung ba'i/ ma das da dang mirig ma nA na h+yam/ nyim ma// sa gas saso// du ngas bya pa na stong/ 'i rtogs bsta rnam pa'i du gnyis pas
26b4(rnying rgyud): nas yang rnye kyisnang bu nga / yum me // tshig sa thas sa / skyes dngadabang // rnyenas pa dzin mur rdza ma r+d+hes / nyes gnyis pa'o// dzad/ tshig sang gsas par // dmarnyan ma
26b5(rnying rgyud): gi sa nga rgyas/ sa ma
26b6(rnying rgyud): nyes bran // zhes ga sungasas// 'ang ba dpa pa na ce ma shud las/ nga ni mye nganang gigs pasang bzhir ba 'i ste sum pa 'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byab// gas dang bri snang brjod pan/ yam dngas dpal/ sa
26b7(rnying rgyud): ma sa yi/ langs pa
27a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ zan ma srung sa d+hA Ta/ sa gnyis pa'o// yad lanang ma Te/ dal nang ma ny+dzam/ ma nings skyes/ ning pa ste yang lo// ngas / yang yin/ ya sa mnang// yang 'an dam/ gam dA yang bcwo/ sa pasum sa
27a2(rnying rgyud): ya ma hA ni pa/ kI ya hA ni d+ha ma ya/ ya ts+tshin d+ha ma ya T+wA~M/ d+hi ni rA ma ya Sh+TA ya/ ni ma yak+She yadz+dza/ rA ma ya T+Te ma dz+nyA na~M/ ma ya g+ne ma b+hanr-i d+hi/ che ge mo mA ri ya d+h+waM phaT/ nyim bzhi pa'o// gsing ba'i gsang ba ltar bstod nga ni/ la// zhes pa la sogs sa
27a3(rnying rgyud): g.yam su bskor ba gsang ba'i gsang // gong mas sbyang la shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun phyi ma'i rgyud las// 'khor lo gsang pa'i phyi dang // gsang ba'i gsang ba ltang bskor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de napa
27a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang bka' stsal pa// de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba yang // dang po bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// de nas mdun ngogs bud med bsnyen// de nas sum cu rtsa gnyis pa// dril lam yang na bcu bdun dril// de bzlas nyi shu drug dag la// 'khor lo gyi
27a5(rnying rgyud): ni'acu gnyis pa// sbyar ci lum bu drug zag gis// po dag blo rdzas dpe zung bzhin// bris la bden pa grub pa yi// sngon lam btab ste nyi shu bdun// de tshe nyi ma dang blor bskor// mtshan mo dril lathun gyis zab// nyi shu brgya la gnyis pa
27a6(rnying rgyud): brda // nyi shu dgra la gsum pA bsko re// gnam stong nyi ma bzhi pa bskor// chos gcig thun bya dgo dra ka ni// dur khrod dag tu gnan pa rtsa// lan gsum bar du spogs shing bya// de la bla stong yang dngol// sa ma yangang sum cu rtsa gnyis dril/
27a7(rnying rgyud): smad 'khor mo bkar la gnad// gyi yi phyi nang gsang bzab// nang deng gsang ba bskor bar dka'// bsnyen rdzogs thub pa thob nas bskor// des ni gang yang badrag par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / sras mchog ya mdzangs gsol pa/ bcom
27b1(rnying rgyud): na dam byud da'i stang bdag gis gzung ba bste// las gsol byas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud 'din ga shin nag thun khon nyid kyi spyad phyi ma zhes bya bar bathung zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gsu ba'i phying ba dang da /
27b2(rnying rgyud): pa bya/ bsgrub par bya zhes gsungs so// gshin rje nag po kha thun de kho na nyid kyi rgyud sbyim las grub pa'i man ngag dang / rgyud bzung zhing bcangs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / gshin rje nag po kha thun gyi rgyung de kho na nyid kyi mazhes byang rdzogs
27b3(rnying rgyud): gro rub sud+ha ras gnabs sangs rgyas ste shes rin po tshol/ b+ha sa yo'i dgon par gnang ba'o// #// au// bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// gu ru ba sa d+hang la// lus te gtan la legs par phab// srol ma na
27b4(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i bka'// yang dben logs la sbas pa yin// las 'phro can dang 'phrad nas kyang // dmal gnas pas spyod par shog// rgya gar skad du/ shrI A yuHpa ti kA la ru tAr+tha b+hu ba kr-ita tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal tshe bdag nag po
27b5(rnying rgyud): sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das dpal che bdag nag po phrin las thams cad yongs su rjog pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i
27b6(rnying rgyud): snying po can/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin de/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' dbyings rnam par dgu pa'i gling / sems nyid kyi gnas/ rang byur ma bsrings pa gsal ba'i gzhal yas kyang na/ 'khor dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas
27b7(rnying rgyud): dang / se la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyid kyi ngo bo las sprul pa'i lam la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin rnams dang / sku'i tshogs dang / nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gshin rdo'i gshed gyi dge 'dun du ma dang // thag skyugs pa mam
28a1(rnying rgyud): na tun du na rdzun gas du rdzu du na na rgyu tu na
28a2(rnying rgyud): gyu ma shA san nga da // / nga /
28a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil bor rnams sangs sa 'dra pa du gshegasungs/ mi ga 'ilas bzhengs nas/ dbyung nga btsun da dang du la thags sa/ kyibs tham saca dag so pa gyu te/ na /
28a4(rnying rgyud): na sa /
28a5(rnying rgyud): sa cang bya na smra// 'as gse me // dan ming ba dadams da ga ngananan me pa / sems pangs mgrol bar rjor ni/ byam ldan 'ad ma can pal dug ces gas na//
28a6(rnying rgyud): sa la pa
28a7(rnying rgyud): 'bod thas pa gnas jig drugs nga ba na pa rung // ya ngas 'a/ nga pa 'as sa
28b1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7fga rna pa// danas kya ngab gdulas mag mos pa'i 'du ma nan 'dus pang ba lags byu ba/ ba smranan 'das grags papa 'dabata s+ho// du na las kyang // sam da
28b2(rnying rgyud): zhi ting 'dzin las// spyan ces brang pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // phyag tu chen po rdzogs pa mdzod// ces gas // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar mnyam pa'i ngang las bzhengs te/ sangs kyis thams cad kyis bsrab #
28b3(rnying rgyud): chen po dang bzhin ldan gyis thob pa'i dkyil 'khor 'drigasangs s+ho// rang bzhin chos su mnyam nyid las// sprin gyis grub pa'i bgrang ba ga/ ye shes med por gzhupa las 'ang // kun 'byud mig pa brtan par gnas// blo bzhin di da
28b4(rnying rgyud): pabs d+hA ra rgyanA rnams ldan// klu brgyad lha brgyang tshangs pa'i zhing // rus spel glang chen phyug gcig 'brung // zhing dang shing drung thod pa skal// gnam sngags blo rdu'u srin thog/ d+ha ma'i gling bu keng rus brtan// e yi ma zang thong mkhar ba'o/
28b5(rnying rgyud): mkhar bcu gnyis bcu drug ldan// khyams dang bla chad blo bzhir ldan// rang bzhin ldan gyis thub par gnas// de la gnas pa'i rkyeg rgya 'o// rgyal chen mo maM batha~M rje// zla brim gnyen zhes 'a sahU~M// nga bzhid
28b6(rnying rgyud): mahe brgyad dang nyi zla'i gdan// nag po dug chen bsgril ba'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dka ga yod dmar mthing nag dbus// gru gtanas bdag zhing chung sbal// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje g.yas// metson gtu
28b7(rnying rgyud): ma ga yod// glang zin zhing stod lhag sngags sbed// dbul rin chen gzho la yis nang // rigs pazhi gru brgyad thaMd pas mangs// bdud srin ze stegs rgyal po batshan// mdod rnyed shal byas// rin pa da na dbus mdzes/
29a1(rnying rgyud): hu phyag zhabs sbal// bdud mo mthir nag thod sbrul brgyan// tsat+ta b+han d+ha 'khyud dang stobs// thugs kang gsod byed srug nag gcer// rigs bzhi'i rgyan dang thod pas mdzes// 'khor lo tsa d+ha g.yas g.yon gnas// zhing
29a2(rnying rgyud): phul dang lha du ma 'bral// ya ma'i thugs kar badz+ra ni// lhung nag rdo rje snying phreng bsnams// zla brgya'i gdan la gtan lI gsol// rin chen dbu rgyan rigs bzhi'i mdzes// gdug pa 'joms mdzad dregs pa'i su// dregs pa'i thugs kang dum
29a3(rnying rgyud): gnas// sde ba thig le khrag dang dug/ mtshon cha'i spu la sded mo lcags// tsit+ta 'od kyi gsang mdzod na// lha srin mi yi snying po 'chang // dbul d+hA khyung gdug pa 'dul// sru dang gshog pa mtshon cha me// ma chu dang sdeng mo gnam lcags dbang /
29a4(rnying rgyud): zlazo zla'i spyan dang choms// gdug pa Ta zhing zhe sdang sprul// phrag sor khrung mo lkug nag gnyis// rdzu dang gshog pa mtshon cha me// gdug pazla zhing dri badzin 'khrul// nu mar seng ge brjid pa gnyis// mtshon cha du me sder mo dpal// 'phrul
29a5(rnying rgyud): gshog pa khro chu'i so// dgra bgegs za zhing lha dum 'phrul// sog par stag chen rngam pa gnyis// mche bzang phud lder mo lugs// glo sgying nang rol snying khrag 'thung // sta zung zhe sdang gdug pa'i gzugs// dug srul me 'bar dug khrag zags
29a6(rnying rgyud): dug lnga brkam chags bsreg cing 'joms// gang dmigs rtsa khrag klad khrag 'thung // dug sbrul blangs pa dgra la 'gro// mgung dang zhabs kyi yong bu'i bar// ye shes khro bo tshon gang ba// di yi karma tsikra 'gro// su N+ya'i gdan la phyi nang sung // ye
29a7(rnying rgyud): shes 'khor lo nyi ma'i 'od// thams cad gla snying nang rol za// phyag rgya chen po brtan par brjid// dbus na brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// thugs kyi sprul pa mngon phyung ba// mon pa dug chen dregs pa'i lus// dbu dgu phyag dgus tset+ta bsdams//
29b1(rnying rgyud): phyag dbus tha dang dan sbyang khrag/ da dang dpung po lus srog 'bral// bdud pa'i brtulas la bskul// sha chan k+ta keng ngas 'da'// dbugs sreg pazag ma dang sa cha srog 'byung // yum dang bcas pa pyad ma 'a ba gang// wAn kyis krub
29b2(rnying rgyud): tshul du gnas// lcags mkhar phyogs bzhi'i gzhal yas na// srog gtsor gyi yi mon pa gshed po bzhi// dug mda' lcags gzer gnag la 'tshong// khyab pa spyi bcings so bdang gnag/ pho brang phyogs bzhid lhun gyis grob// lcags
29b3(rnying rgyud): mkhang brgyad kyi khams khang na// las kyi sprul pa gshed po bzhi// yum dang bcas te tshogs brgyad 'joms// sgo med bcu drug lpags mkhar na// kuM ka shwa za dregs pa'i tshogs// mngag pa gzhan tshogs ldan gyis thug// dregs pa'i
29b4(rnying rgyud): las dang sbyor ba'i grangs// bzhi dang brgya drug bcu gnyis brgyad// de bzhin lnga dang bcu drug brgyad// snying po don la bcu gnyis gsum// de yi snying po mchog bsdus lnga// dbang gi btul zhugs bzod dang wa// rim ga dam tshig gnyis
29b5(rnying rgyud): gsum// chos nyid mig yo bsam gtan lus// rdzas dang 'dod pa bskul ba'i ldan// srog dang las dang e ka la// bsdus nas rang dbang gcol phul// byin drabs dang bcus thig pang bsti ma// sangs rgyas kun bdag de bzhin gshegs/
29b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du ldan gyis grub// drug sngags mngon du byung ba'i rgyud las/ khro phreng gzho ma ste dang bdo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zag sngags 'byung bya'i gling gzhi 'di gsungs so// rtsab pi 'gyur byang chub sems// gcig ni
29b7(rnying rgyud): gzhi'i nga bzhin yin// chos kyi dbyings ni skye med pas// sangs rgyas su gsus ye shes thugs// sems dang lus la bag chags btas// sngang de srung po'i chos rnams kun// byang chub sems dang dbyings su ngas// badzad pa
30a1(rnying rgyud): gnas dang gan gnag/ spros pad pang can dag pa'os// 'brag mad dang dag pa'i gas// bu 'bren na mas chags pa thugs// sams lus bgachagasags pa bdug// bdadang dus gas pa
30a2(rnying rgyud): da dag ni byang chub sems las b+hang // 'pho ba'i chud la dag chags pas// chu rkyen gyi med bag chags pas// 'brang ba rnam shes phreng por 'dzin// skang mi mi tog tu rkyen bral// bde ba rtse ched dang gis stong // D+yan 'bras pa c-ig rdzag
30a3(rnying rgyud): su mi gnas ye shes su// don gcig rig pa ya dge 'brel// 'khor 'angs snong brgyad stong zhing dper// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgyar gas ma/ dbyings las ya
30a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa yi// rang bzhin sbyin thab y-i/ ShA rags la// hru drug gnas pa'i 'gro ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rdoni// rgya 'bras dpyirang med chos gsal// ye shes rol pa'i phyag tu bstan// rang blang thugs kyi rol
30a5(rnying rgyud): sngags ye shes rol par shar// ye shes bde ba'i thig le las// drag sngags thugs rje sprul par shar// chos su bde ba'i dbyings nyid las// drag sngags sprul par dang byang shar// kye med rnam dgra rang bzhin las// drag sngags kyi ba
30a6(rnying rgyud): shar// sbyor ba kun 'bya rdzogs pa'i gzhi// drag stegs mdon du glang bya'i d+hAd las/ drug sngags 'byung ba'i gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ma lteb med pa'i bang las/
30a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul rdug sa mngon du blang po'i rtsa bar sbyong ba 'di gsungs so// drag pa nye bar myor ba ni// dur khong gtan ri dben gnas su// 'brel pa gsum dang ldan pa yi// grogs dang dpa' brtul dmed pa bca'// de la sgor 'dis //
30b1(rnying rgyud): dral brathabs pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po ni// cho srog bdag pa la madrogs// srid pa'i rnams khang tsorta pa// dwangs ma bzhi dang ser bcad// rdza bran drug dang brgyad gnyis kyi// mdud pa gsum drangs gshing gsum// ldan pa'i thig pa 'od kyi tshul
30b2(rnying rgyud): sar+b+ba me rlung nam mkha' dbus// pa thag tshon gang rang sA'i 'od// kun 'dus snying po bcu gnyis gnas// dbus kyi nam mkha' skye med las// steng 'og dngas ma bag chags tshul// brten pa'i sbubs nad kyis dang bdud// drod kyi skabs nam
30b3(rnying rgyud): gshin 'bru// chu yi skabs na rus sbal dregs// rlung gi skyabs na me dang bskyed// kun gyi steng 'og rtsa dang rlung // ye shes lnga yi 'od du gnas// mdud pa bzhi yi 'brel chen la// mi 'gyur rdo dpal mtshon cha'i sngags// srog lnga gnyis dang srong shag
30b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis// nyur bum gnyis dang hri dza gnyis// srog 'phrog stobs kyis drag sngags gnas// phyi rim 'brel chen rtsa brgyad la// bshig dang byad 'grol drug mda' 'byin// zhen bzlog gsang lam zug pa 'byin// thams cad gzir zhing rang gzir nas/ yang /
30b5(rnying rgyud): lags bcu gnyis rgya mdud lnga// gdug pa'i snying gzer rdzogs par gnas// sir bcu gnyis sbubs dag la// gab pa sngags kyi phreng bas gang // de bzhin gyi yi bcu drug la// dbang skad sngags kyi de bzhin gang // dngas ma bzhi yi mtshams bzhi la/
30b6(rnying rgyud): brag bzhi pho zag 'joms pa yi// drag sngags gnam lugs thog chen gnas// dus sbal lho bo'i gsang mdzod la// lce seMn mi yi snying po sba// 'bru re bsdus nas god pur gnas// de las yon tan du ma 'byung // las kyi 'khrul 'khor gang brtsam 'ja
30b7(rnying rgyud): geng chos las la nye ba yi// nye bar gcig tu dril bsdebs pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po ni// yang dag rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ste// zhing nges la sogs chu bzhi la// thig skor bzhi dang ldan par bskor// bar khyams sbal bcas rdzogs byas la/ dbu
31a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi dang // de bzhin phyogs mtshams brgyad du brtag/ srid pa'i khyams khang stob na// bya gram rlung de srag mar gnas// dang po tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang // zung thig de bzhin cha mnyam la/ dbus
31a2(rnying rgyud): klu gsum na kham gsum// gyi rim phyogs bzhir rgya gram dra// dbus kyi snying po gyogs bzhi la// 'khrul mig ljags mkhar gsum gsum gnas// rgya gram mtshams bzhir khrag gi mtsho// chung re rtsa ba 'khrul 'khor yin// yang logs zlum po mu khyud chu/
31a3(rnying rgyud): ts+li gzeng ba su ci bas/ snying pas kyi ba yin// yang logs bus ma phyogs brgyad de// rjeng rdo rje ya// snying po'i rnam lag gnyis gnyis san// las rnams dgas pa'i sagaganas// rlung dgA shid kying yong pa sngon// bai dra
31a4(rnying rgyud): 'ad 'angs // gshing gyi dag brnam pa'o// dran pams kyi 'i // pa sa ga ga na // ma sa rgya/ ba // rnam sa
31a5(rnying rgyud): tsha ba'i snying po drag sngags dgod// 'khor yug rbad dang bsad pa'i sngags// gang bsgrub lto sbyor gnas mthun dgod// phyi rim rdo rje rtse brgyad la// ming gi 'bru gsum dang por bre// gsod cing gnon dang 'phen pa yaM/ lha gri so gsum rdzogs par dgod// mtsho gling bar
31a6(rnying rgyud): byams rwa dbus la/ sdang dang gnod pa de bzhin bri// ming gi 'bru gnyis srog dang sbyar/ gang 'dod mtshams su de bzhin blang // b+hu ra nA ga gdug pa'i ha la'i mtshon// b+hi la khong 'dus khong dregs can// 'bar ba kA li ya ma'i klong / kyo bA kAM b+ha gur b+ha sha yaM raM e
31a7(rnying rgyud): myo te// prA nga la ni sbyar ba'i mchog/ sbyar bcas mthod par ga zung// zhag bdun sngags rgyur grol bal// dras sbal pa pa' jal 'bar bca'// thad ba rgyag ma dus sbal skor// sbyor ba kun ldan yu la gtad// sngags kyi rtsa bdepa la bdag/ zhag/
31b1(rnying rgyud): gsupa nyin sa nyin lag gnyis// gsang dang gnan bzang kyi dus// rig pA bde bas la ma'i gling // 'khor la rtsa ba'i sbyar ba yin// drag sngags sbyor ba 'dis bya// a ka he dun pa 'i lhag bu ral shag ya// dgra pa' srag m+bA ra la mA gzung / so ga sum tha
31b2(rnying rgyud): srog lathur gyi// gsod pa drag po'i rtsa ba las// phrin las sbyor ba'i rdul po yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po mngon du phyung ba las// gsang chen ljags kyi dmod par dril// yang gsang chen po'i sbyor ba ni//
31b3(rnying rgyud): ra s+ya sam shid ras la// mu khyung bdun dang ldan par bskor// de la bri zhing dgod pa ni// dbus su gru gsum drag po las// brnag pa pho mo'i ming dus bri// zla kham bsring ba de bzhin bri// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// 'dren pa'i stobs kyis 'bru ba kar
31b4(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha'i rgyal po bcu gnyis la// khro ba stobs kyi 'bru gcig dang // tshe srog sdung ba'i snying po gcig/ khong khrag 'brel ba'i 'bru sngal// gsod cing gnon pa'i rdza gr-i brgya// dgod pa'i gnas mthun lho sgor dgod// phyi rim mu khyud bzhi po la// rigs pa
31b5(rnying rgyud): kyi rabs bsdam// dza~M ba thod pa'i phreng bar gnas// drug pa sreg pa'i me ri 'bar// de dag tshe srog 'char ba yi// rus sbal ston gnas par bri// srid gsum ston 'chang zhing gsod// tshe srog bdag po'i ston yang // mi 'gyur brtan par ye gnas
31b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin las kyi 'khor lo bcang // 'khor lo lho sbyor thod par bca'// thod pa'i 'og ma me re e// lteng ma rus sbal rgya tha ma e// sbyor ba kun ldan gru gsum kyang // drag sngags dmod pa zhag gdun bzlas// bcu drug gam ni tshes gcig la// gnan sngags
31b7(rnying rgyud): thod par gdug pa gnan// nya stong las kyi dmod sngags bskul// sngags kyi dmod pa 'di lta ste// oM ka ya ma he dun gying khrag ra matsaya/ dgra bo'i srog la hur bru~M mA ra ya nang / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba thams cad gzir ba'i las 'di gsungs so//
32a1(rnying rgyud): las kun gyi ba pi// gas can gcig tu dril ba 'di// drag po yang na nyung sbyar ba'i brjod// khrag nyan sa bdag gdug pa dang // ma margyal po btsan the'u rang // mdza rims drag po sems kyi bdag/ snying gzer 'du
32a2(rnying rgyud): sa gzir// slong ban tshogs rdzas kyis thug/ srid pa rgyas bral lo/ be bri// mu khyung rim pa gsum du bskor// de bzhin 'phrul mig bcu ga nyis ldan// tha mar 'phral mig rtsa sbubs bdun// stobs can gzir ba'i 'khor la yin// de la dad
32a3(rnying rgyud): ne// dbus dang \u0f7fskabs drag po la// sa dang drag snying po hA// gnyis pa'i 'khrul mig bad+hag ti sa la// che ba'i ting po bcu gnyis dgod// kyi 'a la mig sa bdun la// snying gzeng bdun gyi sna gri dgod// mthing nag dang dang yod pa bca'/
32a4(rnying rgyud): bsras dong gi zhugs bcas sngags// da mod pa'i thun dab bgom shing bsreg/ bor thun mtha' ru gnan gzir ba// rang yang phyag tu gsal bar bskam// de yi gnad byed 'joms shing gzir// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e kA ya ma ka dun rdor rag sha ru \u0f7f/
32a5(rnying rgyud): snying gzer zur nan rbad/ sanA ga steng gzer 'drid phung rbad/ san+na ga steng gzer srog la myog rbad/ a nA ga snyid gzer dun rbad/ san+ta ga snying gzer yaM ba b+hag rbang / sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+pa la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sarba un na gzer phung zad / thal 'a
32a6(rnying rgyud): byan rnyer ba rdeg/ gzir ba stobs kyi rgyal po yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa lho dkrug gis gzir ba 'di gsungs so// man ngag drag po sbyor ba 'dis// khyad par mdze rims gso ba'o// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// shong khu bu bzhi chag
32a7(rnying rgyud): dgang sa da du bskor// dbus su gragasupa sbyang ngo yang // blagasam mo ba can rgyar po// kyi ma 'jal mag bcwaganyes pa// rtsa ba'i drag dregs 'thubacu gnyis// tha mthibs chen bdu ga pa// kong bug sbyor ba'i spusreganas// dzas kyi cu khor
32b1(rnying rgyud): ba / nas// sa na mas pan// gas nga smra/ / gas/ sa sanadu sa / ba /
32b2(rnying rgyud): man po kyi nga sa kyi dag pa ga ga sa// gagu ga sa la gas pa sa ba / thad du la bcig sa gdug pa sa po gas pa //
32b3(rnying rgyud): 'di gdug // dadams thagasas yang na // gsas y-iHmA m+sa mthang pa 'byor// sats+tsha sa ma mig sa sa/ 'gas pa 'a yar da kyims gtus ma mi ma 'o//
32b4(rnying rgyud): kyi kyi men// bya da mi 'ad/ 'ad dag // nga bzhi me ma thalas dpa sa ni// sa pa bye ba ga mdzin la ba // dngas ga ga pa gzigs pa nyid rdzogasaso//
32b5(rnying rgyud): mas tha~Mng // rlabs sa pa pa ba gags// 'jam mi gdag pa dad bcugs kyi sa// ma baches dag par sa mi nga / gags pa ga tshul ga ga
32b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ ga kyi ma / su / / stsu/
32b7(rnying rgyud): da / na dngas sa/ thul pas zlas pa sa da// ngas gas gas lalams mas pa // bdag padapas dpa pag ba pa dang // la mngagazugs pa sa sa/
33a1(rnying rgyud): shul ba ga na ra tu dag/ gas rdzags thor brdab po di // e ka las kAdun bye ku shA rlaH/ sa hAg sanan gAzar byung sur nAr/ thog sa phyog na dang // ded 'byor ba mtha sa// ja
33a2(rnying rgyud): mngon du byung ba'i rgyud lam/ thun mong gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dag po mngon du byung ba'i khang par gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// srin pas drag po'i rtsa ba 'di// rtsa ba rnam pas su gnas/ sen gcod las
33a3(rnying rgyud): ru bkod// gsad pa mchog dang lo thog gzhom pa gnyis// snying gzer dgu dang nyi shu rdzogs pa yi// gsang ba mchog gi skyong ba 'di lta ste// zhi khrog shin rje phur pa ma mo dang // bdud dang mu stegs the brang rgyal po btsan// gnod sbyin srin po lha min dud 'gro ste// klu ga nyan
33a4(rnying rgyud): bdag dkor srung gul bum gang // las dang srog gi nyid po btsud du bsdus nas dril// shes rab rtsal dang brtul zhugs ldan pas spyad// blo chung rtog pas rang yang 'ching bar 'gyur// nyams dga' dang sems dben pa'i ngar khrod du// dpa' brtul dag po sngags byed mod
33a5(rnying rgyud): bong // de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa 'di lta ste// shog bu mu bzhi mtho gang la// thig skor rim pa bzhi dang ldan par bskor// dbus su gru gsum bla sems ming dang rus// phyi rim gcod pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// de la rtsa ba'i snying po me rlung ljin thang gnas// de
33a6(rnying rgyud): mu khyud zlum po la// bsrub pa gzhan gyis rbang dang gsad pa'i sngags// yang sogs mkhar gyi kA t+pal mig bcu gnyi sA la// ral gri rdo rje rgya tham bsnol mar gnas// ral gri bsad pa'i su grir+b+ha gra ma gnon pas mdzes// de gnyis rus spel khra mo'i lto bar bri// 'artser
33a7(rnying rgyud): sa 'jug dang thag gis drun/ mtshon rtsa'i mtshams dang skrag mthugs ma pa// bdag pa'i ming dus m+b+ha // rjod ma dngag zlas thod pa'i na dug cu// rdo thod nang du ltar mdzod kyi// thod pa 'og par bdag pa'i ring dus rje// srang bcas gra gsul
33b1(rnying rgyud): sum rtsegs gakhrag/ ga brtul la la shes ma bcwa ba brtug// zhug bdun dag sngags med pa mchog ldan pas brnas// ba bar baphrul chen brtag pa'i yul la rgya// gzar zhing btab la dzud pa bca'// khrug gadrug pa'i gtan la gta par
33b2(rnying rgyud): drag sngag pa da mod pa rtsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di// lha srin kun gyi mthu dril drag po yin// drag po skyugs kyi dmod pa 'di lte ste// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la sgrog mAr ya rbad/ srog s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ srog la rkun no// 'di dag mi 'gyur
33b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyisu lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ras sam shog bu lu bzhi la// dbus su rusaphral khor stong dbyibs dang zlum por bri// yan lag lnga mjug ma lto ba na// gcod pa drag po'i 'khor lo
33b4(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis// 'byung bar bris la rba ba'i drag lpags dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig brda gnyis la// srog bzhi gnang gyi'i bu dang tshwa dril dbabapa dgod// sbal ba'i lto ba'i dbus su yul bi yid dang ser ba thob ces bri// de yi 'og du yul lce ser srung ba'i
33b5(rnying rgyud): nan Ti// byang log spyod rnga gza' yi gzing sngags bre// mjug mar yul lha de bzhin gzir sngags bri// nyo ba g.yas sum po'i gzir sngags bri// lto ba g.yon dus bdag sgra gnyan gyi// rang gnad gzir la dbab pa'i drag sngags bri// mtshon mjug dang khrag gis dang bud la
33b6(rnying rgyud): sbal ba pho mo lto sbyar thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dgun zla gsum gyi nya stod nyin zhag phu bla re bzlas// dpyid tshwa gsum la zhag gsum chu dril bzlas// dbyar zla gsum la rten gzhi'i sbyor ba bca'// thod pa dong bur khrag dang dug thugs la// nya dang ltong dang nyin zhag lnga ru bsgres/
33b7(rnying rgyud): chung stong la rten gzhir gzhug/ s+ye ring sbom mthon rgya mdud la 'dren tshul// gzir thab du ba dag po gzir dang bzhi// tshi la gsum thun dang mnol khrag du ba'i rdzas// dug chu sngo sna 'om drag po thong // nag gsum khrag dang nyung dkar thabs kyi rdzas// lugs dang seng lde
34a1(rnying rgyud): pa gzir ba'idzes// drag sngags lus la dbab gzing ba zhe// gza' dang ma mo yul gyi lha ba tsan dang // glu gtanas bdag gzir la dbab pa'o// mA labs drag pa myor ba stobs rgan na// la mnol lag khragang po ga/
34a2(rnying rgyud): dril lcags gdab pa'i phur pa la// dang po sngags bzlog drag tu srog pa bya// des mabebs na drag sngags 'byung ba dkrug/ rdzas kun bsreg ladu bas lha 'dre dkrug/ gya mdung dbus kyi rta las chu mig dkrug/ gri mo yug mo mno ma don mang la blang // tsha yi rgyal
34a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs la ba rdeg/ drag sngags spyi dril sgo bzhi po sor brdeg/ spogs pa'i rgyal po gsang ba dam pa yin// las kyi rgyal po grogs pa mchog tu gsungs// de yis ma phebs sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// rtse gsum chu gsum mtshal gsum tsha ba gsum// mche
34a4(rnying rgyud): 'dang chags ltos 'gro gsum// rtagasum gzer gsum sngags gsum rdebs la dbab// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di sa ste// e ka ya ma he dun snyed khrag ra ma tsal// ma hA de wa ma ma rak+Sha sa nA ga pr-i phreM hril shar phob/ ma mahA ga zha la mu trag zing nan phu dpa ma phro shar sha
34a5(rnying rgyud): 9// pa hA ya man+tar+ya la srog la gajing nan gro shwa hril pho pa/ de wa lun na gzir la phreM shar dzi la pho ba/ sa nA ga srog la phur the gzir nan phreM shar hril po ba/ ya tsa ma ra khag snyid du na haM ma ya kA ye/ phob shar dril po phrig nas sha rag ma la do bI ta ma ma sa ra pra phob/
34a6(rnying rgyud): ya ya d+hat+pal ma rje nan sog la gzir jil lo D+ha shar po/ prams ranas rnyis gzing zi nan/ gr-I 'u da shar srog zil shar pong / ya badran dag sha rag mo tra mu kha ma hAr nan kham shar thig zer zil phob/ khrag snying ma yug zing ya de nan shar badz+ra pa shar pob/ e
34a7(rnying rgyud): dunam ga ra pa me ti khrag ra ma tsa la/ pra ya de ba ma rags nAg rAm+bu la/ sarba un na laM yaM dzaM mr-i shar shang spel nan gzer po 'gro/ gzi shing mthu dbang stobs brdzus la// rnam grangs lnga dang ldan pa'i las// 'di dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// ma brag 'joms pa
34b1(rnying rgyud): na sa sunan su su na rgyu
34b2(rnying rgyud): nas
34b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa ma sa /
34b4(rnying rgyud): sa
34b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid dong bur thod pa mnan// me ldog gyad dang dregs pa bsgom// thod mkhar steng drugadug pa'i byang // nyi shu gcig dbus mchog zung rtag//
34b6(rnying rgyud): rgyu ga gas sa / ma m+mu/ gyung tshul // sa pang kyis tha// mngags pang/ nya ba dag pa ni rigs kyang // kyil na /
35a1(rnying rgyud): 'dril zhing spa spangs pa// sra ni gtum ning lnga bar gnas// drug po gtum chen rdegs pa yi// ngag sngags mtshon cha 'di ste// oM ka yam gdun 'di dag shar+b+han+te/ sa nA ga ting gzer na/ sa nA ga cid gzer dug phyung zab/ sanA gcing da
35a2(rnying rgyud): co zad/ sar+b+ba ga ting gzer thun zang / sa nA ga snying gzeng dun de zang / sarbA ga snying gzer lo thun tshad / sar+b+ba gA ti trag zer de blan zad/ sa nA ga snying gi zer srog la zad/ si nA ga snying gzar ci phyog zang/ sa nA ga rtid gzer byin la/ san+ta gau nyid gzer rtsal mad/ sa
35a3(rnying rgyud): gaspring gaper nan 'dring zad/ sa nA ga snying gzer phreng shAg zang/ sa nA ga snying gaper tse skabs rbang / sa nA ga snying gder khrag rdzobs zang / sa nA ga nyid gzer sbyar nan rbad/ sar+b+ba ga rnying gzer zhi nan zad/ sa nA ga nying gzer sun na zang / man+ta ga ting gzer men na nad/ sarbA
35a4(rnying rgyud): ga snying garer srog la dran dun rbad / si n+da ga snying gzer srog la dun dun shagazang / sanA ga b+hing ga re tsit+ta Not+ta du Te shag rbad// rig bzhi rgyad la zhen pa dang // ba mo kha 'khor gdug pa kun// brkam chags las kyi dug zhugs na// drag po sngags kyis 'joms shing 'byin// gdus/
35a5(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs 'joms par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snying gzer dgra pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// snying po rtsa ba'i man ngag bcud// gsang chen rtsa babrel ba'i las// drag po mngon lhung sbyor ba'i bcud// snying gzer gdug pas thams cad 'joms/
35a6(rnying rgyud): phrad sngags kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag stob gzhan bsrung gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud mo rgyal po btsan// klu gtan sa bdag the'u rang gi// ma lus 'joms byed rgod kyi sngags// b+hi la'i khong 'dus khong dregs can// b+ha ra b+ha nag po ya ma'i klong // khyad par gyu
35a7(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// dur khrod dongs zhing ras la// mu khyud lnga ldan dus sbal stor// dug khrag sna tshogs sbyar te bri// gru gsum 'khrul mig thod mkhar bzhir// de 'og lcags mkhar bang rim brgyad// yang logs gnas pa'i rtsa dubs dgra// phyi rem cibs chen bcu drug 'phos
35b1(rnying rgyud): drag po sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus su gdug pa'i snyir ba ming // klubam ma mo rgyal po btsan// the zang gshin rngog snying po med// thod mkhar 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis 'ad+ma// phyi rim lhags mkhar dregs pa brgyang // pa/
35b2(rnying rgyud): logs rtsa sbubs snying gzer dgu// phyi rim mtshon cha kun 'joms dgod// kha sbyar sbyor ba kun ldan dang // gsal gsum zhag bdun brab cing gzir// bzlog cing 'byin pa shugs kyi mchog/ gcod cing 'byin pa spu gri mtshon// bsreg cing g.yeng bas me chu rlung /
35b3(rnying rgyud): sdud cing 'chang bas sa yi mkhar// gzir zhing mnan pas thog che nas// rtsa bar bcas pa mtshon la me// rtsa ba gcig la yal ga stong // 'bar ba nag pa zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po dug dar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi dum bur bsdus// bdud nag rag shA ya
35b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i glong // e kA pho brang thod pa'i gnas// 'khrul 'khor dang bcas re bas gril// hom khung bsdus la stong stong bzas// gsal ba khyab par stobs kyi lha// rdzas dang lta ba sbyor ba'i sdebs// 'dun pa mchog ldan yin pa brtag/ dbang bcas bgrod pa go mtshan mtsha
35b5(rnying rgyud): rigs la rgyun du stong stong gzug/ nya stong sbyor ba drag po brtsam// thun mong bsrung ba sbyor ba brgya// mngon zhugs sbyar ba drag po nyid// gsang pa'i sbyor ba spu gri dang // drag pa rtsa ba bcu gnyis bsdeb// dmigs pa'i ming rus khams spyad la// gang gnod zhen pa stobs
35b6(rnying rgyud): la gtad// mkha' 'gro'i gzas kha dgral 'ab// drag po thob gzer snang ba'i mchog/ gser gyi dgu rdzog banam lcags thog/ ri rgyal sbal chen spa bri mo// drag sngags ston pa gnyis su bstan// e ka he du na ya ma ra thA ka dun dz+wa ra/ san+ta ga mdzag snying gar ba
35b7(rnying rgyud): sa nA ga tsatr-i sting gzer zad/ sa nA ga dum snying gzer zad/ sarbA dar+Ne tri snying gzer dzad/ sanA ga dug phyung snying gzer zad / sa nA ga kham shag snying gzer zad/ sa rba ga srogatig rting gzer zad/ sanA ga sbyir la snying gzer zad/ san+dag snying gzer sbyar nan drang / sarba spunan /
36a1(rnying rgyud): nas ma /
36a2(rnying rgyud): sa
36a3(rnying rgyud): sa # du sa gdas 'as
36a4(rnying rgyud): 'a / sa yang ya / / sa
36a5(rnying rgyud): thal / ba sa/ dzin la
36a6(rnying rgyud): sa/ #
36b1(rnying rgyud): gcod pa// the 'gyur ba mo sbyor ba yin// dbugs kyi nyas brgyad yul la 'phang // bsrung ba la sogs kun grangs na// tse/ 'i gnas na dngas sdigs 'don// dbang ba zag gcig lar gnas// tan la thod par zhing ba ba// drag thabs spong ba 'dis te/ rA/
36b2(rnying rgyud): dun ya ma snyid khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la nr-i dza hur zhums shag rbad/ dgra ba'i srog la ma ra ya khe shag dza bu zad/ dgra bo'i srog raM yaM h+yar sta ma b+ha ya nan// las 'di mi 'gyur bstan pas na// bsam gtan ye shes 'od 'jog pas// dman pa gdug
36b3(rnying rgyud): da'adral nas// dman pa'i yi ge rtsa srog gcod// dngas ma sdud nas dbang po 'a'o// mnan pa nam mkha'i khams dang sbar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag pa stobs kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// sngags dang 'khor lo man ngag sdebs pa'i las// dur dzad
36b4(rnying rgyud): la globs thar pa bya// dbus nas grangs la thig skor lnga ru bskor// phyog bzhi tshangs pa'i thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// dbus su gru gsum 'khrul mig bzhi dang mtshams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi dang mtshams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi gnyis ldan/
36b5(rnying rgyud): ra dakhyams gshed bzhi'i khang pa yin// de yi phyi rim mu khyud zlum po la// stobs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba 'joms pa'i gnas// yang logs chu yi khang pa mu khyud zlum po la// khyams khang gnas su bslab pa'i snying po rdzogs// tha ma'i 'khrul mig drang
36b6(rnying rgyud): po bcu gnyis la// mtshon cha'i rgyal po rlung ri sbyin thang gnas// myos pa stobs 'brel rdong pal kha sbyor yin// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus dang mtshams kyi gsang mdzod gu gsum sngar// tha sams chags pa'i snying po ming nus bri// lugs
36b7(rnying rgyud): mkhar bzhi la 'dren pa'i 'gru bzhi dgod// de yi phyi rim lcags mkhar brgyad pa la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags 'bru brgyad gnas pa dgod// de le phyi rim mu khyud zlum po la// thams cad gzing dang bshig pa'i lu gri dgod// yar logs khang pa mu khyud rdum po'o// gang bskum
37a1(rnying rgyud): sun smra su na/
37a2(rnying rgyud): na sa
37a3(rnying rgyud): sa
37a4(rnying rgyud): sa na sa /
37a5(rnying rgyud): da / sa/
37a6(rnying rgyud): na
37a7(rnying rgyud): na na dun
37b1(rnying rgyud): bsngags yang thal du nga/ kau shogasas pa ngas paca dgas// rang dgas pa mangs 'dus // byas kyi ba nga bu jug// 'om pa dgapa/ gnang nga na pa'i bya // dang nas pa
37b2(rnying rgyud): sa na pa kyi sa sa gas // sa /
37b3(rnying rgyud): da sa sa nga med
37b4(rnying rgyud): pa sada'i papa sa sa par nasathas mig tu da
37b5(rnying rgyud): ma / dasu sa y-i pa// thabs da pa / bdur bu bani ma
37b6(rnying rgyud): dkyi / 'i sa smra sa / 'a da phyi ci
37b7(rnying rgyud): tu na// bad hU~M phyogs men po mas// 'tham me gi sag tsu pase pa ga cu/ ga tu / rgyal po dge bzhin na byung drims// 'phrul la kho skye shi rung ba gadrung/ nga la gyi mad
38a1(rnying rgyud): dmig ba nas// d+ma// / byab da nga ga ba da rnams// pa ba pa da // bcud cigs ga d+ha na dag // tha dugazhanam pa dang na
38a2(rnying rgyud): sa bdag ny-in mdze' rnams// 'khor ro ga rdzo 'thong bar gzhug/ 'og zod bkab rten 'og tu gnan// bani ba tigs gnyis 'dzin pa rnams// khyi drod bzugal gyi tshang gnan// bri gnon rje ngod nam dog gan // ting 'dzin spong ba ba ga
38a3(rnying rgyud): bsu// sa yi sbyor ba garten pa'o// drug sngags me chung mtshon cha'o// parba trUMng+ka ra br-i la? shwag nan ga pa za kyi// ba dang nam mkha'i mchod rtan can// 'khrul 'khor mye rnyeng kun 'joms yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung dkrol ba'i bya
38a4(rnying rgyud): 'dag zungs so// drag pa rnal ma btsan thabs dkrol ba'i las// drug pa byed dpa las kyi rim pa 'di// rngog po nyim gyi khor lo maN+Da las pargya// 'byung brjin kyi 'kho la par lding rten la bcu'o// gcod pa sngags kyi 'khong lazhing ngas rgyal bca'
38a5(rnying rgyud): N+Dal bu bzhi khrag gis 'thos par byug/ dbus su bu gsum khru gang 'dom re la// kha khyer gsum la rtsang bcas zlal mthong bas bskor// de yi byi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// tha mthong phreng me ri sod de bzhin bskor// dbus kyi phu gsum
38a6(rnying rgyud): gzusus brtan nying de re// 'byor gsu ma la gzugs dang mi rgyang // gung gnod thogs dang bcas pa rdzogs par gre// 'amang ma drug grags bris la dgod// gra zad pabazhe ma drag po'i rngas rnams dgod// hom shing btsug la mthing nag dang sdis dag /
38a7(rnying rgyud): da dkrol pa yi mab ma yin// 'byung gyibs kya ba ba ca dran// kyai shog rgyal khriba'idas rnams cu// thig ga gsang can tu byud chu por \u0f7f// dbus sa rgyabs 'gyung rig brgya nyis ldan// yang logs pabyung gnyis ma
38b1(rnying rgyud): ldan// tha ma thug su ma dbyibs la gdug pa'i rabs bsam// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa no// rgya tha ma dbus su gnond kyang mong gzugs ra// chu gra mar bzhir yo dang de bzhin mong // 'khrul mig brgya gnyis rtsa bdag pa rdzogs// da
38b2(rnying rgyud): tsA bsal byad 'akrol skya gri mtshon// thig gnyis bar du me chung a mya ka/ babyor bcas la bar snad mkha' la brdeg/ wa chu ga zir la me sbal thun gyis gzer// myos pas bran la rdzas bsreg dmigs pa bsgyur// gtsang mas bka' la
38b3(rnying rgyud): kun gyis gzir// drag po khyad par byed dgrol gsang ba'o// rnal ma bkrol na du baphyed pa sngags kyis brab// thun brab bslus la cha lugs chan cig gsal// btsan thabs drag po e yig zu ru// drag po'i rdzas bsreg brab cing bdugs la bkru/
38b4(rnying rgyud): rgya btan par bskyed la kun 'joms drag po brdeg/ las kyi rgyal po byad 'grol sngags kyi nA// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka du na dza ra sad kar ya/ sarba un na gzer phyung du ra~M tri tsa s+phar nan srog la hur yaM sha// yaM ma ta ra tsa sa nA ga
38b5(rnying rgyud): sarba ru raM ye bye shag byung / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byug pa dbyung ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo drag po bri// thig skor rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gnod byed ming dang gzugs// 'khrul mig
38b6(rnying rgyud): dag po rtsa ba'i sngags// ci 'a tshan bcwa gsum gru bi rbab bong sod// dir kyang kha sngor thod pa dong du bca'// dag sngags brdeg pa'i dus su gsul ba gsum// gang dmigs sras dang gnas khang bdor la thab// drod khrag zun thim gar dmigs thong
38b7(rnying rgyud): nga / ma du nga srung 'ang bye 'du cal/ brgyad ma nga drag po las brtsam// rgya ba byas dang gang 'dod su par byed/ 'gas kyi rgyal logs pa' das ste// ag sa ma du ba ga ba/ sa 'dzi'i 'dri byed srog lab
39a1(rnying rgyud): drug pamasas 'byin pa'i sbyor ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan pa brjog pa'i stong ba 'di ga sungasas// du rjod rgyal 'thal 'khor bdang // thag na gas ma la du dbus grags pa// dbus sa drug tugasags
39a2(rnying rgyud): mdzod ming // phyi rim rtsibs bcu spu gri sgra// phyi rim 'khor yug rgyo dang ming // / bkyor thod chen dar ldan bzlas// khrag dang dug zun gang dmigs bzlog/ 'khor lo thun bdeg lam du gzhug/ dbang po dril zhing sngags chus bsdu// brgya yis rdzogs nas
39a3(rnying rgyud): lo glang dur gzhug/ zur bun mtha' chu bka' rten 'og tu gnan// drug po sngags kyi rim pa 'di skye ste// aM ka yan du na dza ras da kar ye/ sarba sha dz+r-i e nan ya~M 'drid blo// me chung stobs kyi 'khor los bzlog pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang
39a4(rnying rgyud): lam dgag pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po las kyi sbyor ba 'di// 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su pho brang zlum po snying po 'bru drug dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// yang logs bcu gnyis rtsibs la gsang
39a5(rnying rgyud): lam drag sngags dkod// rtsibs chen gang gnod ming dang sbyar// 'khor lo dril la 'bring chen rwa du gzhug/ khri brgyad bzlas la lam srang them 'og gnan// rgyun du btu brgya dus drug nar mar spyad// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka d+ya
39a6(rnying rgyud): raM sa dka ra ya/ man tra du ma ma hA ragA du rI b+h+rUM li zang // drag po gsang la ma dgag pa yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi dug mda' khong nas dbyung ba 'di gsungs so// bkra mi shis pa'i thod pa dur ma la// spyi bo nas brtsams su khyung bzhi drang ngo /
39a7(rnying rgyud): dbus su bu gsum gnod byeng khrag gis bris// de sa phyi rim 'dor yug gang gnod sngags// yang logs gdug pa sbrul gyis bskor// zam mo ri nang du star ba'i// khyod pabring bzhing la su gyung bzhi ru bdor// dbus bu rdzogs pa lnga 'i snying
39b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ smra/ smra / smra smra smra/ smo ga //
39b2(rnying rgyud): sa su ldan
39b3(rnying rgyud): na
40a1(rnying rgyud): gdug tub 'dzid// gdu zugs smad cing drug par gnod// rang dupa phrog nas gang dmig su dred// nus pa 'argal dang sgra dang datun// dang bzhag sobs dang ma gnas// mtshan ma rnas pa stobs dpag yang //
40a2(rnying rgyud): mdzod sgral dmigs pa'i ming // ba s+t+ra swA lA ba star bzhi smos pardeg/ dab dag nas gsam drug rje ning bsrem// drug pog rnams par snang sbyar// dag sags myong ba 'di lta s+ho// e ke ma nye ga gdung sa da kar yA/ sar+b+bA mi den 'dzi
40a3(rnying rgyud): shag tsug gzir spyad nan chung ma/ rdeg pa bsrung bkun kyi mchog/ sbyor ba thams cad 'tshul zhing 'thag// de nas yang ldan 'das ces las thams ca kyi mAbar rjes tsod kyi sbyin bsreg 'di gsungs so// dzAg pan+de sno ba sreg pa'i las/
40a4(rnying rgyud): gang gan sa la mu la khrig gis byug/ das sgra grags ma kha rtse gas pa dang wAr// gyi nang cag gang mdzu ba gang de ba legs// 'khrul leg bcu gnyis rtsipas min nyi shu ga nyi sa// mu s+yAng num por byan lnga gnyis gcig/ zam pa dang
40a5(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'o// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gang dmigs gzugs la khru gang hom shing gzug/ 'khyer blag pa gzugs brtan meri kyang // 'khrul mig bcu gnyis drag po rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs mtshon cha spa gri sreg pa'i
40a6(rnying rgyud): sngags// mu khyud ban+d+har sbal spul ny+dza yI sha/ sha chen tsha ba drug gi ri lu brgya// thun gsum chil gsum dug chu'i mkhrag/ sde sde chung dang mang nag bdug rdzas dgod// zhing ras rgyal gong bzhin bris la bskul// bdun nam dgu rud mod sngags bzlas shing
40a7(rnying rgyud): bskul// ma nyis mtshon bdag tshig pa'i las la 'akab// bsngal dang ga/ sngags brgya mas bsreg rdzas btab cing dngam// gang dmigs bdug sa gtsang bas khrus kyis dgan// hU~M rjes thul su dag pa'i jing thud dpag// mam-ing bzang pa seng gro la dag par ga/

41a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// dri la gcod pa'i 'gor y-iba~M// dbus nas TI/ rgod rdza du bdor// dbus dang 'brug migakyigs ma ba bzhe// mtshams panang zhing gi ka ba ba 'aM// yang tshogs mig brgyad mtshams brgyang sbrul// bzhi pa 'bor yug bcu dbyabyo gnas
41a7(rnying rgyud): bra lamam mig nyi thal// gcod cingag na pa'i migaganas// dbus dang lam bzlab kyi gnas// brgya ces dgral migs pa dgas// ra phrug dang bsnyen pa sags// bar da gas pas sngags pathang // mying gas

42a1(rnying rgyud): yang logs bcu drug su rme dgod// 'byor thod pa yang bcas dang // wu bsgom sngags bzlas drag tu bskal// bdun du brtsams la thod ba bca'// mu khrud 'bod drung dganan sngags bskul// khri stong brgyab rang gshod dab
42a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' chu srin po'i sbom du mnan// drug sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka he ya mdun tsal khrag ri snying dgra po'i srog tur zhums mA ra ya rbad/ sog swA b+ha ya nan/ srog la thun rbad/ rmugs s+ho/ drag po seng ge'i 'chi sgod yin// gzhan yang ga
42a3(rnying rgyud): drag po'i las// rigs min gzhan gyi sbyor ba gzhom// po nya gzing zhing slar bzlog pa// drag sngags nus pas gzhan dbang spyad// mu stegs can gyi lus srog 'bral// dred mo ral pa gsig pa yi// zhabla mas 'khor lo'i rgyu byas la// sa dkar thong
42a4(rnying rgyud): rus pa bsku// dbus nas rdig skor lnga ru bskor// dbus su ming rus rba kha ma lpa// mu khyud gdug pa 'khrul mig sngags// mjug nas bzlog la spu gri sbar// gyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// g.yas g.yon mgo gyogs mjug ma la// 'ben pa stobs kyi sngags
42a5(rnying rgyud): gzhi dgod// rang sngags ming bcas bskor ba zla// gyi rim rtsibs rkyen bcu gnyis lnga// gcod cing gnon pa'i su mi dgod// dag dag zla sbyo'i thod par gzhug/ sbyor ba kun ldan bdag dbang sdud// sngags pa stobs kyi 'od tu gnan// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di
42a6(rnying rgyud): ste// ya tsa mar khrag snying ma ya dun he ka e srog ladun chug zad d+ho/ srog la khaM shig b+h+yo/ srog la breng shig b+h+yo/ thog la ya shig b+h+yo/ dang po'i srog la gzir kham hu rA bruM yaM shig mA ra ya rbad/ srog stam b+ha ya nan/ pho nya rang gshad dbab pa yin/
42a7(rnying rgyud): drag po las kyi sbyor ba yin// gzhan yang gsang ba'i rimi pa ni// ni rang lpags shun khru gang la// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsum sgor la// mdog dang ldan par phya gcad bya// zhing gi srad bus zhig gdababacom// dbus nas theg skor lnga rnga bskor// thig mdung
42b1(rnying rgyud): ba ga pa'i// phyogs pa zhing 'bral log bcu drug gcod// mtshams bzhed gsang mdzad dag pa'i gnas// yang grogs partson nyi thugacod// bkrupa mig bzug nyis pa'i sngags// phyi rim dkal mig bzhi bcuganyis// grags maN+Da /
42b2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul mig brgya bcu drug/ gsang mdzod mtshams bzhi dbus drang wa// dbus mtshams bsgrub kyi tshe srog spang // 'khrul mig bcu drug spu gri mthun// yang logs bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// 'khrul mig bzhi bcu dgab pa'i sngags// gcod cing
42b3(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa'i spu gri ldan// lnga pa mtha' yi bzhi brtul// thun bzhi dbang sud gsad pa'i gnas// drag sngags rgyal po skabs dang sbyar// kha skur sngags pa tsa lo'i mgor// rtsang bcas lnga bsgom dmod pa bzlas// thon nas ru bzhi 'khyil bar gnan//
42b4(rnying rgyud): sngags gnam lcogs sbyor ba yin// de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// yang gsang 'phrul gyi snying po mchog/ bde ba gnas kyi mchog ldan du// 'dus byas la sogs dge sogs brtsam// sngon du
42b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i chos de bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bstan pa yin// snying po dang bcas gsal brtags pa// rdo rje chu bo'i dka' mi bcag/ rgyal tshabs kha dog dbyung // tshangs pa'i thig gnyis rgya gram gdab// rba thig gnyis ti mig sbyong // thig skor su khyud
42b6(rnying rgyud): lnga dang ldan// dbus su rtsa ba'i 'khrul mig brgyad// phyogs bzhi 'khrul mig gsum gsum drangs// mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mun khang bzhi// gsum pa las kyi rdo rje la// rgya gram sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// bzhi pa mtshon cha bdun gnyis rtsibs/
42b7(rnying rgyud): lbab rigs bzhi rabs bskor// 'khor lo dam bkun dril pa no// de la dgod pa'i 'bru rnams ni// dbus su ku ru phyag rgya'i sku// brjid pa'i tshul gyis sgrol krung bzhugs// gzhan yang sdigatsug gcer bre ring // thag ma ming rus gsang mdzod paH/
43a1(rnying rgyud): tha sems 'chang ba gshed kyi mdzad// rdzogs bani 'bral mig dug sa la// mag zugs ma drung nam ma pa'i 'tha// mjug par mthung bdud yodrugs// g.yasas 'dud dang gzhin byung // gsan dusas bye pa mas
43a2(rnying rgyud): 'brug sum spong ba bcu gnyis lus// g.yas g.yon nal ma de bzhin bzlog/ rgya gram bzhi 'i snying po la// 'og phyogs srog dpog thams cad 'gugs// mjug mi lha dang lhas srog 'byed// drag yas mkha' 'grog can la 'bebs// g.yon gyi rna la ga
43a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngabs// 'bod dradadags dang de bzhin sbyar// sbub dang thun mong go rim sbyar// rtsi bas la lus brog gcod pa yi// yang gsang spu gribacu gnyis mchog/ thams cad sbrul gyi rabs bskor// kha sbar dur ma dong dang chang // rten bzhi khyu mchog dra dang wa// dang
43a4(rnying rgyud): bsrog brog bsnyen pas dgug/ gnyis pas gzir zhing rang dbang bsdu// nub gsum pa la rbad cing bzlog/ bzhi pas rang gshed bdud du dbab// lnga pas rtsa srog gcad cing derje// gcig gis gzir la rten kun bca'// khri yis phrugazi lakhyil par btu/
43a5(rnying rgyud): rlung 'dor phyogs bzhir thod mkhar gdab// dbus su khyu mchog khwa dor gnan// drag sngags khri tshor rngam par bzlas// drag sngags sbar ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma he dun snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ ya ma tA ra~M dun du na sarba tsita breng shAg kadun raka shag/ e ya ma
43a6(rnying rgyud): srog la dun du na dzA dza/ e dza ra ya mA tsit+ta b+he shag thA be sha yaM srog la bru~M ril ya ma tsita dgra be'i srog la dun rmugs thun b+h+yo/ sarba tsita ru bruM s+phur nan gzer bru~M trig nan/ khaM shag thun b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la breng breng / tsi t+ta dun rmugs yaM sha ga mA ra ya rbad/ gnan pa
43a7(rnying rgyud): mi shig sa ste b+ha'i mchog/ ru bzhi rdo rje'i rgya gra ma yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gso ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// de dge sbyor ba bzhi yin gyi// drag po las kyi mtha' rgya ru// mchod rten dkar nag sbyor ba dang // bka' rten bka' la srung ba dang /
43b1(rnying rgyud): gnod byed ma lus dbye ba'i phyir// drag po'i snying gzer bcu gcig bsngags// de dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir// shri phrad drag po kun 'joms bsngags// srung ba kun gyi rgyal po ru// phyag rgya bsam gtan mchog tu gsungs// mtha' ru rjes gcod sbyin bsreg
43b2(rnying rgyud): 'o// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dur khrongs la sogs pa la// rdzas bzlog nag po'i bka' rten bca'// gdan khri grang po sbrul gyi bca'// bang rim bzhi la stag dang gzig/ dom dang seng ge 'debs shing rngam// bum pa drag po rtsibs bcu gnyis/
43b3(rnying rgyud): mo mtshon cha 'brug gis 'degs// char khebs bya khung gdug bza// dregs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// 'khor lo e steng rdzogs pa'i 'bru// bum pa'i rtsibs pa rtsa ba'i sngags// bang rim dang po gab pa yi// gas dang
43b4(rnying rgyud): bshig pa'i sngags kyis mdzes// gnyis par rgyan gyi yig 'bru'i mdzes// gsum par mgo dgu'i drag sngags dgod// bzhi par dbang sdud sngags dang ldan// dmigs pa'i snying po brda ming sbyar// khams dang bcas la de bzhin sbyar// gdan khrir thod pa ba
43b5(rnying rgyud): na/ nas / ga sa sa sa da na/ gyu //
43b6(rnying rgyud): gnan// snying po 'bu re ming srog kun// gro ga mdal khrag dug gis gyis// brgya brgya skabs dang sbyar la las kun brtsam// brgya brgya mtshon cha bsnol mar brdeg/ me tog dang bcas lta bu brtag/ bskor zhing bsrung dang bsad pa'i las la shis// gzhan yang
43b7(rnying rgyud): dkar por bca'// dur khrod phungs g.yul bkyes// dug chu mnol khrag gdug pa'i sha/ tsha ba sme ba ldan byas la// khru gang rus sbal chu srin 'brug/ srul dang phag mo sdig pas 'dengs// bum pa mtshon cha drug gnyis rtsibs// drag po nang du e
44a1(rnying rgyud): tunargyun tu tu rgyu na
44a2(rnying rgyud): ma ga
44b1(rnying rgyud): no/ rgyad pachags panar// rdza ba'i 'gyur bdug nyis dgrod// tsa ma 'ogs gsum spu srir// bris la zhag bdun du shil bzlas// mtha' bu zhag gsur bzlas la gdab// yul dbus phyogs bzhi'i tsal// mchod rten mam gang ba// rdul da ba
44b2(rnying rgyud): bi lag/ dkur nang zing por de bzhin sbyar// dru byin gyis de bzhin parlab// ston TI ba chung ston la bsdu// gding ba zlog rang mda' rang la 'bang // lkugs pa lpags bzlas drag la 'dril// e ga he dun snying blag ra ma tsa ya/ sa yanA pa
44b3(rnying rgyud): las na rdzas can gyi mdzag bzlas pa// yang gsang skyong ba'i mchog tugasang+yas// gzhan myed sbyang ba'i mchog // gragatunas bdag gdug pa yi// yeng ba yin da dngan// rgyu shog rgyalas kyi myur bri// dgras nas thig skor bzhing/
44b4(rnying rgyud): bdud bzhi dug rmongs bzhi 'joms bskor// dbus su drug po bub gran na bzhi// ma mo rgyal po mdze'i dri can// rtsi yi gsang mdzod gsum la gnas// sa dang rtag dbus su bsdu// phyogs bzhi gasdang ba'i 'phrul mig ni// sngags ma khar gsum
44b5(rnying rgyud): tha mal// rdza ba drag po lus dang ldan// mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mum ba bzhir// gdug pa gsum gyi gzugs bris la// lus srog thog pa'i 'bru kya dgod// mu khyud gsum par gdug pa'i gzugs// tha ma gyi yi mkhyud la// 'a
44b6(rnying rgyud): sbubs bdu gcig gnas// dmigs pas bkug rjing mtshams su gzir// gnyis 'joms drag sngags bcug cig gnas// dras phral cha yi 'khong mo ni// yon tan 'phel 'grib sna tshogs 'byung // sku gi mtshams su 'dod pa 'gyur// gcod
44b7(rnying rgyud): bcu ga cigagasang la sbyar// drag po las la mngag pa yin// mkha' 'gro zas la 'pho ba'i tshul// gdug pa'i gnas su brnag pa'i gzugs// bsdus la zing dus snying po khams// gcod pa su gri ma tshams su sbyar// dkyil 'khor dbus su kya
45a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ brdas padag/ phyag ci'i laganon gas la byas pa// dmod pazhin mtshan khri khri nas// 'bar 'thod pa sngags kyis bskul// mdugs bzlog sas cwo / lag // klan 'joms pan ga ga sus thobla dab// gdug /
45a2(rnying rgyud): bcom dang shen cag su gcod// yid kyi dbang po khrul pa 'i// banam chags rgyan gyi srogathogs nas// gsang mdzod sun pang gzugs la bsku// me rung stobs kyis 'khrug cing 'a'o// rkyen med kyor ba'i stobs dpag med// srid pa'i thams 'ad seM /
45a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gnad mda' yi sbyor ba yin// mgo gcig dong rtse gnyis pa'i tshul// rgyud gcig dang bsdig sngags kyis dbye// gsang ba'i thod pa 'khor lo sngags// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i tshul gyis dbye// ming rus khams sogs sngar bzhin brtag/ spu bri drag
45a4(rnying rgyud): gsum du bsgyur// yang gsang mchog gi snying po bcu// drag po mi dpal stobs dpag med// sbyor ba phag thod steng dang 'og/ rdo rje rgyal po bzlas pa bya// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ srog la phreng shag thum ril dun dun dza/ sa nA ga sog
45a5(rnying rgyud): rje dza/ dzu pa shag/ sa nA ga tsi zlum ril shAg/ sa n+yag rtsal chad bu ma ril shaka?/ sa drwag dr-i ling tsu ril shig/ sa n+tag srog la bur bruM ril shag/ sa rtag khe nan bla ma ril shag/ sa nag snying gzer srung nan buM ril shag/ sa nag du sem masog
45a6(rnying rgyud): gzer zad chung bu ril shag/ sa nA ga tsa tri shU la gzir nan tha~M ril shag/ ron tri yang shig nan gzer zla ril shag/ snying po 'bru gsum 'bru drug bdun// 'phos pas a mu ka dang sbyar// dgu dang bcu gcig brgya dang gsum// gzer zhing gnan pa mchog la
45a7(rnying rgyud): snying ga per bdun larbad dang dran// bdag pa'i byung khams la brdeg/ dab dang zug 'phreng shag tham 'dun du nang / dgra po'i theg sa bring zeng dang thungs gag zang / dge po'i phrog sa drad can gag cad/ dang pa'i klur la shag dzad/ dgra pa la sa
45b1(rnying rgyud): rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la ka dum ling bruM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thu ma ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la khaM nan bruM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la snying gzer srur nan buM ril nan/ dgra bo'i klog gzir bruM ril nan/ dgra bo'i srog la yaM shig
45b2(rnying rgyud): ril nan/ 'di dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// lus can mchog gi sbyor ba yin// 'od zer sngags kyi rta lang sgron// 'phen pa stobs kyi dbugs kyis 'dren// 'dril ba rang shugs khams dang ldan// srog gi yi ge rang las blangs// 'gugs 'bral ba shig pa
45b3(rnying rgyud): nyams ldan// srog dang rtsa rgyad lam bcas yin// gang stong gnyis dang kyil myur// 'brel chen bzhi dang 'byung bzhi smin// sangs rgyas khams dang bde bar ldan// rig pa stabs dang bgrod par bcas// de ma yin na rang 'ching bgrod// sngags kyi yon
45b4(rnying rgyud): dpag tu med// rtsa ba gcig la don gnyis ldan// dril dang bcas pa gcig tu gnas// gtor dang las phreng de bzhin bsdeb// dbye ba bsdu ba bsdus te brdeg/ che ba gsum 'dus pas ma dpag dka'// u bu na yi gnas chud bzhin// zin pa 'chor bar
45b5(rnying rgyud): byed 'joms// mkha' 'gro gzhan tshogs zhan chags kun// bzas kha dka la spo zhing bsgyur// rnod dpal mtshon cha thebs la gzi re// rang gnad rtog pa'i rgyan las bzlog/ thod pa gzir gsum mdza' dra bca'// sbyor ba kun ldan de nyid gzi
45b6(rnying rgyud): pa gros lam du stong dang sgor// rdo rje gsang ba'i lam du drongs// gang gnod gdug pa'i lag tu gtad// gsang ba mchog gi sbyor ba yin// gdug pa gsum dang byed bsung dang // btsan dang rgyal po mdze 'dre dang // bskongs nas dbyer sngags kyis
45b7(rnying rgyud): brdeg/ sngags pa rgyal blon yul srung rje// thod pa khams dang sbyar la bsdeb// bsdebral phrag sngags bcu gcig bstan// drag sngags bcu gcig yang gsang yin// gzhan yang srung ba bcu gcig las// rgya shog pu zhi gnyis la// dbus
46a1(rnying rgyud): bya bya//
46a2(rnying rgyud): byung drug cu ba da// dbus sa grags mthod pa bkang // gnyis pa dang thul mig bcu gnyis la// zad pa'i blang bas kun la bskyed// gsum par 'phrul mig nyi shuH// bzhi bar bas byin sum drug te/ yang /

46a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pab/ ta dulas bye bag sa oM/ mi do// ga sdigs te nga/ ngag byubs nyi ngang/ sa nga ma 'i rgyag nga/ ma bdadags dngar thab
46a7(rnying rgyud): dang// bzod sa da// bdud pa ma rdzogs myongab zhidi sa// gsang pa'ig 'dreg sa byas 'o// 'aso laca 'du rang pa thams 'as ga bca'// gas sags
46b1(rnying rgyud): gar shor shA 'dzeg/ mtha' drug nga gnod de nyid sa// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dgra bo'i tsit+ta myags rbad dgra po'i srog la myog ti ya shag rbad / srog la lugs te drang / kham shag rdu ril myug rbang / dug byung khram shing zang / dbuk+sha mthang gzer zad / tshal bur chug ta
46b2(rnying rgyud): dang gtor ba nyin dang mtshan// rdzogs nas gzir zhing li ng+gar gdab// mnan pa rbad chud nan bzhir sbar// sta~M b+ha ya nan/ kha gso las kyi thun bsgral nas// brab cing 'phang ba'i drag sngags brdeg/ dgra bo'i srog la thun thad dzI/ nA ga gu hA tsa ma rI/ ti pa ri byA sarba ti/ nub s+ya swa sar/
46b3(rnying rgyud): su men ta pa khu ba bzhin// hA la tsam ri yi stobs// 'joms byed skyobs kyi 'khor lo yin// gzhan yang bsung ba kun gyi mchog/ de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rin chen bdud rtsi dri dang chu// rdzas dang bcas pa'i stegs bu la// lnga bsgom sngags bzlas rtag tu bkru// phan lag/
46b4(rnying rgyud): bum pas bsrung ba'i mchog/ zil gdon sdug rgya'i grwa gsal bya// rdzog pa'i sgo ba'i srog bgrus la// drag sngags brgya brgya rgyun du bzlas// bsam gtan rtsa ba'i bsrung ba'i mchog/ dbul nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i sngags// rtsi bas bzhi 'dren pa'i snying po e// thug kar
46b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i 'angor po sngags// rtsibs bzhi'i dbus na 'bru lnga'i mchog/ lte ba 'byung ba'i 'khor lo sngag// rtsibs bzhir he dun ya nga ma// gsal bas stong gsum dbang du spyad// 'khor po rgyan gyi bsrung ba'i mchog/ drag po sngags kyi dmod pa ni// snying po dang dang shugs kyis gang
46b6(rnying rgyud): rngam tshig drug po gtum po'o// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ stobs kyi drag sngags rtsa ba la// rno dpal mtshon cha kun 'joms sbar// sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha thams srog gzir bur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad/ sbyor ba kun gyi mtha' sdud du// !
46b7(rnying rgyud): chen las kyi rtsa ba 'di// 'khor lo sbyin pa sreg sgo bsdebs na// gcod dang 'bigs la sogs pa'i las// bsung dang bslab pa kun byed yin// thabs rnams ldan dang mi ldan pas// bya ba kun 'grub badrag par 'gyur// 'di dgang de dang rtsi dpa pas// di k+ka dang ga tsa de la sogs
47a1(rnying rgyud): bsrung dang bskyab pa kun byed pa'o// gsang chen 'phrul gyi dakhor po 'di// gdams shing grol ba'i rim pa ni// gru la rdzas kyis byang bar bya// par snang 'khor pos las kun byed// sa ye 'gor pos bsreg cing 'joms//
47a2(rnying rgyud): sor gsum ldan klu gsum dbus// zla kha mo dmar po 'brug nas brnag/ phyi'i ma rdo rje rgya gram pa// snying po 'khrul mig gsum gsum drang // rtsa ba'i drag sngags kun gyis lus// yang logs rdo rje'i bya ba 'dral// 'khrul mig pa gnyis bcu drug+sa
47a3(rnying rgyud): drag po thabs kyi spu gri dgod// mtshams nas zla kham dbus gnas su// don gnyis sdud la ming sogs bri// rdzas ldan par snang kha sbyor bca'// las kyi rgyal po gcod pa yi// bar snang mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yin// yungs gsum gyi stegs pu la//
47a4(rnying rgyud): dang dug gi chag chag gdab// bam gyi srad bus lnga ru bskor// drag po 'khor lo khaM khyer gsum// phyi nang chag chag dbus mthogad// dkar dmar mthing nag ldan pa la// rtsang dang thod pa de bzhin me// mthing nag len tos shing dbus//
47a5(rnying rgyud): kram phung ba'i ming // yang logs rtsibs la rtsa ba'i sngags// rgya gram rtse brgyad spu gri ming // gdug pa'i khrag dang dug gis dri// phyi ri ma thong phreng me ri'i mtha'// sres pas yi 'khor lo yang // rus sal srid pa'i lto par bri// bug dang khrag gis
47a6(rnying rgyud): babya// sha rA tshil sna mar khu chang // dug sna ri lu lha yi grangs// nyung dkar nyung nag skye tshe 'bras// zangs phye lcags phye rdo phye thun// pho nyas gzugs gtub bstab pa bya// drag sngags bcu yis bsreg rdzas dbul// kya gum ra yi 'dab brgyad du// ba
47a7(rnying rgyud): kr-i zugs pang+ge 'od// drag gas sbyor ba me dang 'dra// oM ka he dun lam stong khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dbu bo'i dog la dun thug / DU thams nga lari/ dam po'i srog 'brang shag rbad/ na rdzi kA zad/ kha ma dz+wa lar/ bzung dang
47b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i las dran pa// tshul bzhin sbya nano la ltar// drod dang mi ldan dang la gcod// bcug sa rnal maHba gcig/ yan lag su gro mo sbyar na// las 'gyed sbyor ba shes la bad// rig pas pad pa'i klong las 'phyang // de ma yin na rang bye du/
47b2(rnying rgyud): drug po rjes gcod 'khor la me// ban ga parnyan gyi rgyal po yin// drag sngags mngon du byung ba'i rgyud las/ yad gas mchog gi leT ste drug pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyi 'jam dpal rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la ga la ba bta /
47b3(rnying rgyud): rdorje snying por dbyung ba// drag po sngags kyi dmod pa la// snying po don gyi ngan sngags kyis// gsad gso dbabag rtsad gzir gnan gyi// rtsa bar dril pa ji ltar lags// rdo rje snying pos rdzogs par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drag snga
47b4(rnying rgyud): bgyib pa/ theg dpa kyirdzu pa dis su sa/ sa stong brgyas ni// ma cad pa nas // shA ma rim ba rdzog// 'thun tha pa pag ma dang / kun cu tsho ba'i bar ba dang / bar bag
47b5(rnying rgyud): ma dang // phag mkhong pan 'khor po dang // zung byed sdig pa'i 'khor lo dang // yan lag po thog 'doms pa dang // lda ni thun mang sbyar ba gsungs// dmar len sngags kyi snying btan nas// stong ba gsum du rje la brje ba dang // mtshan ma mngon ster gyur badz+ra/
47b6(rnying rgyud): dmar len mar gyi zhun mar 'dra// de ni stobs chen drag po yin// 'bru bzhi las kyi rim pa ni// dur khyod dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad la// brtul zhugs dmod pa drag po bzlas// dur khrod rgyal tsakra bcang // mu khyud bzhi
47b7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan par bskod// skye bar sru ga sum bsgol mar bri// gnyis pa de bya tham pa// e dun ka 'bru bzhid gang // gsum pa byamam pa// srog dang phreng byed ni thog gsum// la dang dran dun bzhed ste// srog la zung dang lam sha drug
48a1(rnying rgyud): pardags brgyad// yang chogs rgyam mardzogasas sa// chog dang rngad dang byed dang byung // drugs dang nga te 'i da shag/ 'ad+ma dang ba rnams d+ha gaspyod// mdabyangs sprul sa par btu'// blangs shes la'ar
48a2(rnying rgyud): bzhug// de yang mtshan srung phag mo'i lhor// gnyen nam mchod rten nag po la// nyin gsum mtshan gsum gang brtsams 'grub// kham shag rtsa rbang / srog la phyog zad/ khyer phyung mu gti ling shag long zad// rtsab kun 'byung 'khor lo ni// gsang chen
48a3(rnying rgyud): bar dril ba ste// yang gsang sbyor ba drug gnyis lnga// bde dang smin par byed pa'i sngags// ha la nag po dug 'dzin ltar// sbyor ba bcu bdun bag dang ldan// don gnyis mngon du spyod pa yis// brdeg pa'i dran sngags 'di lta ste// bla chen bzhi dang sprul pa brgyad//
48a4(rnying rgyud): yang sprul bcu gnyis chags dang bzhi// gang byung bsad pa'i sngags bzhi bsdeb// rtags med kun 'byung don gnyis drug/ de bzhin lo thog gzhom pa bzhi// chu 'dril zor 'phang du ba gzir// chu rgod 'khrug pa rdzogs pas 'grub// dmar len sngags kyi mthu
48a5(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas// las kyi 'khrul 'khor mtshon char bcas// snying po kun gyi mthu dril nas// 'bru brgyad dmod pa'i lus dang sbyar// gsang chend mod pa'i las bcu yi// rigs rtsol las dbang gnod pa'i gdon// sngags kyi brdeg pa drug dang ldan//
48a6(rnying rgyud): lha jug phyir 'thung zhan dang bzhi// kun 'byung rtags med 'ong nas ldang // gang rung mtshon cha drug sdebs la// brjod pa skabs dang sbyar la spad// rtags med kun 'byung gcig tu dril// kun gyi rjes gzod pa sgeg cing gzir// rgyal ba'i drug le mdu
48a7(rnying rgyud): gas// kun 'joms sbyar ba'i rgyal po chen// rba ba'i thong ma skyes pa ni// gru bzhin mnyam dus thal stor// ye shes lnga yos thaM blangs la// 'gading 'jug mar cig gang gdag// de bzhin go gnyis sa drangs la// thig pani rtsa ba

49a1(rnying rgyud): !// na byung sa bdus// ga pa shA // da pa dus pasas gyu// gsu pa byud smras// sa sa su d+ma//
49a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis cu she'i bya// dril ba mthan ci rdzogs blangs nas// sbyar ba mchog gi rgyud stsagyur ba// grags spang nga byud mel bdag/ kun kyang dus sbal sa par bcad// rtagasung skang stal drags drung // dran hU~M gas zeng 'dum pa /
49a3(rnying rgyud): bden// sngags kyid dbye bu 'di lta ste// e myags sna rngubs rmugs shig kadun/ dkri ba'i srog 'di shag \u0f7f// / zeng shag zang / dam po'i srog la thun thugs suM rbad/ dgra bo'i sgrog la nr-i thur thum tso/ phred byeng thun she ga zang / dgra pa jig pa
49a4(rnying rgyud): thun gzeng shig zad / dgra po'i srog pa thun gzing dzaH/ br-id shAg rbad drung / damra ba'i thog la ya yi ning mini/ phreng shag zad rdzi sa ra ya n+yad/ ha btang ta btang do lcags da klung kr-i te nan yal yal / zad/ hU la ta la tsom de kham shag rbang / ha la ha la yaM ya /
49a5(rnying rgyud): gling byedang dun du dang / srog la gzer nan phyogs ladzad/ 'dzubs kyi/ khwa shig tu rgyags cang / de badzidri nas nag rag cir rdzun nu thul gang byarang rab/ ther gyi zhis khrim shar shang rgyu hU~M/ dem khrig brel lam shag pas lag/ nA gang ba grang /
49a6(rnying rgyud): sa tsa gzing nini shwar sha hrung ye/ hUMl dril pob/ phur lnga 'a myo shag rlig zer thun zung / tsa myags thun raM zad/ kun 'byung rtsa ba'i sbyor ba mchog/ las kun so sor brdib pa yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab bzugs kyi 'dzir lo 'dig su
49a7(rnying rgyud): sa// sbyor ba'i rgyal po dmar len gyi// drag po thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di// ni rang gos la rgyu blangs te// sbyong ba kun ldan pa gta// khru ba chags pas sdug tsha bya// 'phrul 'khor rim pa bzhi du bskor// drag po dbang sdung phyag mra'i ming // rtsa ba'i
49b1(rnying rgyud): 'khong pa lpags mapar brgyad// ye shes las dang tsang bdud// mkha' sbeng drags pa rus sbal yum// dngas makun 'byung steng pos dgang // yang logs su khyud bldan zadagasad// byang ma phyogs mtshams 'khor lo brgyad// yan lag
49b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bzhe ga nyis lhan// mu khyud gsum gsum drag po dbus// tha ma gadrug pa'i rabs bskor// yan lag rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi// bod pa ming gi 'bru bzhing ldan// sa khamargyag ma 'bru bcu gnyis// me khams dbru bcugs dpa'i sngags/
49b3(rnying rgyud): rgya khams drug gnyis srog dbrog 'bru// rlung khams bcu gnyis thams cad gzir// 'debs dang drod mtshams bcu drug rtsibs// lo thog 'jom pa'i sgras dgang // de bzhin g.yeng dang bskyed pa'i mtshams// rtswa thog 'bras bu srun pas dgang //
49b4(rnying rgyud): rbod dang chu mtshams bcu gsum rtsibs// thams cad sreg pa'i 'bru yis dgang // g.yed dang 'debs mtshams bcu gnyis rtsibs// gdug pa gzir ba'i 'bru yis dgang // gang bsrub 'brel la kha sbyar bca'// srid pa'i khyams khang ston gnas// da
49b5(rnying rgyud): ldan thod pa dong du bca'// gang byed spu gri zhag gsum brtsam// yan lag so so kha sbyar la// thon nas gdug pa'i klu la gtad// bde ba'i rgyal po gdug pa'i mtshon// dmig pa'i rtsa dang khong du 'phang // drag sngags dbye ba 'di lta ste// e myags pa
49b6(rnying rgyud): rngubs mug shag kAdun/ dgra bo'i thig la hrur thum sa// breng sha ga mA rA ya rbud/ dgu ba sgrog thun gzing nur khyim thong shig sbyang nan sta ma b+ha ya nan/ sarba sunan nu ril slar nan shang+ku 'drid nanas nA ga zums ha la ha lA ye yi srung nan tu bru~M/ ri thun mug
49b7(rnying rgyud): ribs ci thang dag thibs rbad/ yul 'dir ser ba in na ka mr-i/ mtsho trai la dz+wa la de dag zeng blo/ rjeg shar sher po bser ba sha trU~M s+t+rai b+ha yan+sa sha ya phaT/ drag po dmar le nagapa pa po// brnag pa thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// gzhan pang yan lag sbyor ban/
50a1(rnying rgyud): bzh-i/ mapa// / sa sa ma rjeg pa ba sas// rdog btud pa dang ska // gangs nga phrul bas ga// sgyu sa ga gsus/ sug kyang du byang dag /
50a2(rnying rgyud): pa gsum dang thebs bzhir ldan// mig yo cal med rang snang shugs// yul dang 'phrad na shugs kyis 'char// rtog med spyod pas 'chi snyed grol// las gsum sbyor bas rkyen med bsdu// snying po dngas snyigs 'byed kying sbyar// gcig gis
50a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' khrung rten la'ang bsdu// 'bru gnyis tshul du snang ba'ang 'byed// rtogs pa ru bzlog 'khor rgyun gcod// bde la ma 'jog pa rgyan ldan pa'o// rten pa'i 'khor lo 'di lta ste// dur khrod res sam shog bul// gsod pa'i rgyal po gajug pa 'joms/
50a4(rnying rgyud): byad bag mo'i lteb ru// muM khyud rim pa lnga ru 'askor// dbus dang brag ma dbang bdun gsod// mum byang gsang mdzod tshe srog 'chang // phyi rim rgya gram 'khrul mig brgyad// sna tshogs rdo rjer rabargyad ldan// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo snying po gro chog/ phyi rim
50a5(rnying rgyud): ri mu khyang zlum// gang sbubaM bsad pa'i sngags kyis gang // med pal 'khor lo gshed kyi 'bru// rno dpal mtshon cha lto sbyor yin// yang logs mtshon cha rtsibs bcu gnyis// dmar len srog gi spu gros dgang // rdo dpal 'khor lo stobs dpag ce/
50a6(rnying rgyud): gcod cing 'bigs par ngar brjes yin// thams cad gdug pa'i rabs bsdam// zhe sdang gdug pas khong nas skem// mdze yams drag po'i 'khor lo yin// gdug pa kun gyi sbyor ba mchog/ phag mo mtshon cha sna tshogs sde// klu gnyan sa bdag za yi
50a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul// gnam thog mdze rims kyi thugs gtong // de mar len srog gi sngags kyis mdzes// 'khrul 'khor rdzas dgu'i thang pas phyug/ khams dang snying po ming rus rnams// gsang mdzod mun khang lngal bri// khrims dang mur na gnod pa'i gdan/
50b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo kha sbyor thod par gzhug/ steng ma pho yi thod pa la// sbrul dang rgya gram me ri ldan// gnon cing gzir ba'i sngags kyis dgang // dmar len sngags kyi dayod pa dbab// dpal rnal mas gcod cing 'jo// kha gso 'khor lo thod pa dang // drag
50b2(rnying rgyud): sngags rnal bzlog 'grol mar brnyeg// thon nas gnas kyi 'og tu sba// nya stong thod pa ling+ga dang // brgya brgya mtshon cha bsnol mas gcod// rtags thon cher gnod grul gtad// rtse chud bcad pa'i sbyor ba ni// nyin zhag gsum dang phrugs gcig
50b3(rnying rgyud): bzlas// thon+da nas 'khor lo thod pa gzir// dug shing me dang dud pas bdug/ 'khor lo rgyang pa rdzas kyis gril// rdzas kyi phag mo'i lto bar gzhug/ sbyor ba kun ldan gru la gtad// sngags kyi rgyal po shugs kyis grangs// ma byang sbyor ba'i stobs
50b4(rnying rgyud): zhan na// 'khor lo du ka dang tsha ba khrag/ sre ba lnga dang mnol khrag bsku// sngags rnams dug dang ming rus khrag/ dkrug sngags lug dang lugs min bri// chu rkyen ling+ga dbus mtshams lnga// lus dang yan lag 'byung ba dkug/ lha srin gnad la bor te gsod//
50b5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i snying dang kha ru gtad // drug sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e rgyags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ dgra po'i tsit+ta breng shag dza srog la hur zums rbad/ thums hu ral srog dza shag breng ta tsi dgra bo rbad/ dgra bo'i sog la breng shag hur thams shag
50b6(rnying rgyud): rbad/ srog bum chur la dza shag byed tsita rbang / phag mo khang yan nye ba'i rgyu// no dpal mtshon cha rnal ma yin// gzhan yang spyor badrag po'i las// sngon du 'gro ba sngar bzhin las// khyad par lha srin dbyug pa'i las// sdig pa chen po'i ltob ru// mu Sh+ya
50b7(rnying rgyud): rim pa lnga dang ldan// dbus la sogs pa snga ma bzhin// bcas pa drag sngags dkrug bzlog dgod// gsang mdzod lnga la ming rus khams// zla kham gsum la srung ba'i lha// rgya gram 'bru brgyad drag po'i sngags// snying po 'bru bcu rtsab dkug/ 'khor yug
51a1(rnying rgyud): lha srin gang bsgrub sngags// mtshon cha'i rtse mo bcu gnyis la// dmar len spu gri dgug la dgod// sbrul dang mu ran gnod pa'i ming // khwa sbyong zhing ras rgyal bri// lcags kyi sdig pa'i lto bar gzhug/ mgo dag kha dkyus gcod
51a2(rnying rgyud): gyu ya /
51a3(rnying rgyud): gi rlangs pas gsod cing bsreg/ mchi ma khrag dang 'a chu dug/ rnga ma mtshon cha'i lo ma yis// gdug rtsub rtse dang srog rtsa gcod// gsod pa'i sdig pa lho sbar la// thod pa kha sbyar nang du bca'// mon nam radra chad thod nang gzhug/ gsum mam
51a4(rnying rgyud): phugs gcig drag sngags las// dug lnga brkam chags yul la rbad// rgyal blon stobs can dngas snyigs 'byed// 'byung ba lnga yi 'og tu gnan// sto bla chen 'byung ba'i dgral gtad// gdug pa gzir la dgra zla bsgo// dbang chen phyag rgya de bzhin
51a5(rnying rgyud): brtag/ ka la ka ba po mo byed// sna tshogs rdo rje bu gsum sprul// snying po ming bcas brda gsum bsdu// brag sngags dgug pa 'di lta ste// ya rngubs e shag dun myags ka lugs/ dgra bo'i srog la shag phreng rnga tset+ta bru~M hu ra rbad/ sdig pa lto steng dkrug
51a6(rnying rgyud): gyi las// kun gyi mtha' ru sogs pa yin// de dag thun mong sbyor ba'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// brda don thabs kyis grol ba'i las// ba dang jo ma zho dang mar// zhun mar snum gyi snying po'i tshul/
51a7(rnying rgyud): po'i sbyor ba gsum dang ldan// gas dag so dang ba pa'i las chen yin// gsad pa khyad par sbyor ba dag/ g.yang min brtan dang grol dbang dag/ stobs ldan myong ba'i snying phyung 'di// gang thun chus la 'khor lo bca'// rdzas dang phreng ba'i sbyor ba yin// dang
51b1(rnying rgyud): rtul drug po'i stobs kyis spud// gdug byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// srid pa'i khyams khang srog sdud bca'// khyams khang lto na brnag pa'i gzugs// spyi gtsug snyid gar mtshon cha bca'// mu khyud gsum dbus ming rus phri// phyi rim chu gram rtsa ba'i sngags
51b2(rnying rgyud): yang ngogs bcu gnyis spu gri mtshon// rus sbal lho yi phyogs mtshams las// ci bas chen bcu gnyis rtse mo na// gsang ba drag po'i spu grirang ldan// phag mo'i lho nang rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtse mo nang bsten spu gris gang // 'khrul mig khyams khyang
51b3(rnying rgyud): rus sbal dgang // gnan pa'i drag sngags mtshams su brdeg/ bskyod pa'i bcu gnyis yan lag mgo// don gnyis bsdus la sbyor ba brtsam// kha sbyar dur mar brnag pa'i rten// rgyu rten drug bcas tsog bur dgab// snying grar 'debs byed sor
51b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa na
51b5(rnying rgyud): gi thig le bde la ma bgrod// cig shos thod par sdud cing gnon// 'debs spyod yang 'phrul la yi las// zhag gsum dmar len mod pa por// dam chog drag pos rang gshed bslang // lus srog thal nas srog gzir 'byung // phrang ba khri yis snying la
51b6(rnying rgyud): gzir// phur pa byin can gzer du gdab// gdug pa myos brnams brgyal te 'gro// gsum dang ldan rje yal srubs// thod mkhar rten gyi rten 'brel lha// brnag pa'i rgyud pa gnod cing 'joms// dbang chen dregs pa po mo 'khol// srog gi thig le
51b7(rnying rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// kai kaM las kyi rim pa yin// stong nyid ma skyes bde ba 'god// bde nga'i ye shes nyid du 'bar// thig la de pa'i spos dang bral// kheg so mthu ru bor de 'asreg/ dzan spong 'di te// e phyogs ladubs lugs shaka ka dun/ rgya 'gyo/
52a1(rnying rgyud): tsiskabs rbad// ba rta phyogs la rdza dza shag/ phreng la srog dang / srog stam b+ha ya nan/ srog la thun b+h+yo/ bde byed tshangs pa'i gnas su dbab// dmar lenu snying phung sbyor ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo thog gzhom pa'i
52a2(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// thams cad sku gsung thugs bdag nyid// ye shes rig pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// tshe gnas dbang po lo thog 'joms// las kyi brnag pa snang snad min// rim pa gsum ldan phag mo'i ltor// dbus rdzaH t+ya gram rtsa ba zlum// rtsibs
52a3(rnying rgyud): chen tu byad gnyis sbyor ba bzhi// kha byor yul sung la sogs rten// thod chen phag thod spyang ki rdzas// bdun 'bum nyi khri 'bum gcig brtag/ rtsang dang skyer phur gta' la gzer// zor thab du ba spogs dang rnal// khAg sna dgu dang tshe rdzas dgu// khrag du gzhod
52a4(rnying rgyud): seng rje lcags// gzugs brnyan dkar nag kya ga nas mar// mon nod nang du dar gyis sril// 'bum gcig bcu par rten la bstim// dbyar dpyid tha chud rab nya// ston zla gsum la ha gsum brgyad// bzhi dang bcu gcig nyi shu dgu// gang rung lo thog 'bras
52a5(rnying rgyud): sud// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// phreM phreM shar shar hri la nA ga snying gzer chud/ raM bruM yaM shig hril b+h+yo/ phreM shar hri la b+h+yo/ phreM shar r-i thun b+h+yo/ nA ga snying gzer sprid/ ye shig b+h+rUM shwar/ dragA sngags sbyor ba rgyal po yis// sman dang rtse thog
52a6(rnying rgyud): joms pa'o// thams cad zungs thub snying po mchog/ byin rlabs drag po kun 'dul gsang // bde ba nyams kyi spyan grub gsal// thams cad zil gnon sngags dang yul// snying po srog dang brderda' ming sbyar// gzir zhing myos byed dbang po 'chal//
52a7(rnying rgyud): srog 'phrog pa// las dang sbyor nga rgyan gcad bstim// rten gyi mdog la gnas su dbab// phag mo'i lte bar mya kram e// nyi shu gnyis cibs gdug par ldan// gru gsum gang gnod gzugs dang ming // rgya gram de bzhin rtsa ba'i sngags//
52b1(rnying rgyud): mnyams da ga sang mdod na grubs nga// TI thug sa la sug// !4 dag ga gzad pa// zhagag sus drugs panas pazlogalaganan// gang gad meng dang // gzhi ma zlag kun gyu mug tud/ ma thugasas ba
52b2(rnying rgyud): gnad kyis dkrog// mau ga'i bi dmyi stobs kyis nga// phrin po mtha tsa~M gas pa ste// seMs dang stor ba dngag tsud ga rtsod// seM chags yadzubs grags gag gdun/ san tog N+DI na ldanan/ kau shag ste ga zer 'dzid byung jig nan gag na
52b3(rnying rgyud): kyiyan lhag/ yis// rdodu ba bya 'ams par byed// brgod pa pa nyis med na// rang sa 'i snyas su 'gyur// rnams cad 'joms par gdon miH// don sa 'a com ldan 'das kyi skye mar pon las kyi gas rgyan gyi gyur/
52b4(rnying rgyud): pa'adi gsung sos// las nalus byin gyi mchog bzlas pa// rtsibagacig kyitshul bayin/ sa sa na nga spyod pa'i thangs/ spyor brgya dang ldan// rinag du dzin ldan pa// ga ba kyings rgya bag zungs la// gas
52b5(rnying rgyud): chag cagazor thun bca'// ga sh+log mnol khrag maung // zhing ras dus chen zhabs mal// dug dang tshwa ba bdag pa'in// bcas 'thod rten 'thom nag dang // h+yeg las sbyor bsor brgya gnyis// tsug sa sgra tshugs bdag pa'i brnaM// rgya tshor rab ma
52b6(rnying rgyud): naguH// gas la gsum mchog gi zugs sngags bskod// rang nyid che ba'i don dang // jig la 'dril babar mi cid// dang podag meng po bskor bya// klang mi kro ngas drag tu bzod // dgra zog rgya batshon ga mar 'dabs tshul// rna lams su
52b7(rnying rgyud): drug kyi cher dri'i rdzun pazhir 'dus/ gzug drug tu 'joms shing skabs// dbugs te than sngags drag 'azhi ga/ srog zugs rgyu tsa nga rag// ma langs gdangs gsum phyogs 'thun// dgra ste thung rgyas brjos cu
53a1(rnying rgyud): snun// dbang pon ma shes khams dang ten// rab ba gsum gyi brda' phan yin// bskor phyogs g.yas g.yon dbus mthar sbyar// mtha' ru gdon gsum gang rung bdag/ gdug pa me dang mabar bu// zor ldan las
53a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis brdze bsal brtsam// de yi 'pho tshul gnyis dang ldan// ma yengs brten dang grol bas 'phang // ra nag chad pa seng ge kha// gang yang dogs pa med par 'joms// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun sngags drag po 'di gsungs so// e myags dgra
53a3(rnying rgyud): lo'i srog la ba ma ril kha rbu na yaM nAd/ ya rngu bus srog la hri la myags thun shag rbad/ mugs shagra srog la gzer bruM ram thun rbad/ ka Tun srog la mA ra ya thun rbad/ dus tshod nyin gnyis de bzhin mtshan// brdeg pa dang po'i las de'o// bun ka sha ga mugs
53a4(rnying rgyud): ma thugs ma/ dkying ga na / badzin ma mthun pa ma na da/ ngas kyad
53a5(rnying rgyud): dun tsid+ha rngubs sha ga rbad// de bzhin bzhi bskor sngags kyi sgo// drag gis las kyi gnad du 'bebs// bsgral ba bzhi skor bla sngags bzhi// zla gcig dus bzhi rtag tu bya// kun 'joms drag po me dang 'dra// dug khrag gnyis ldan bde ba'i nyams/
53a6(rnying rgyud): rten gcig shes pa dngas snyigs 'byed// dang por yul ldan dmigs pa brtag/ bgrod pa'i stobs kyi gdengs gsum ldan// dpa' brtul stobs ldan dmod pa brtsam// rad nyams shugs ldan gang brtsam smin// ye shes nyon mongs bde dang
