53a7(rnying rgyud): smin// rang 'chings thabs grol ldan dang min// bden pa gnyis 'dzin don med yal// bde ba'i rgyal po rang las shar// me bcos bcos med bcos dang bral// e yi ye shes las byung ba// chos spu nam mkha' las drag rdzogs// ka yi
53b1(rnying rgyud): mi shes las byung ba// las dang slor ba dzin cing rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// phul zhing brgyad na srog dbugs rdzogs// lcags kyi ye shes las byung ba// srog spad las sbyin thar bar maH// rngungs kyi ye shes las byung ba// bsreg sems rngamam
53b2(rnying rgyud): sa trog// grags kyi ye shis las byung ba// don gsum ma yangs rme g+sa ni rdzogs// shag gi ye shes las byung ba// 'bral ba gsum dang thar ba rdzogs// dun gyi ye shes las byung ba// 'chi bdag dang badz+rad snang gis 'ardzogs// 'brel chen paH/
53b3(rnying rgyud): ni 'askrod pa ste// l-i ga sngags kyi gsang tshig nyid// rtse ba bzhi yi grangs don yin// col bral rang nyams shugs kyis snang // drag la 'dril zhing che ba'i stobs// yin par rtog med rang shugs ldan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla rkun monya thal mngag
53b4(rnying rgyud): drig su sa// tri sa kyi skal ba mngon byung ba// shang gyi phyogs nas grags pa// dung gi mon pa se ge'i mgo// da su kun dgrazhal dgrag dngas// phyag dgrag pas dag g+ha/ zhabs dgras spyong khA k+sha zhal thAH/ sun du gras sa
53b5(rnying rgyud): phyi'i byin sa ngoms// ting dbus dpa'o yid la 'dzin// drag klus myo khong nas 'byid// zhal dgus pa mngang med par gsol// sngags dgras/ ga la myos shing 'thung // dgra po zla dang sgrol la shog/ ka 'i rdu ting / rgyagasug pa thu pa'i tsu/
53b6(rnying rgyud): ba rtogs dang ma da// lpags kyi mon pa gzhi po// dbyung gra spyan dasreg yang ga gangangs// phyag gzhabs / sa// zhabs da s+ho stong pa sa DAg+sa/ spyan dbus du 'i mdas ngoms// ting dkyus da 'o yid pa dzin/ 6
53b7(rnying rgyud): dbang byis yang pa gas/ sa gi ra nga gang yang / nga su na/ 'du gas nga sa tha gas pa// seMs pa byaman
54a1(rnying rgyud): ngas ldan dpag la dgrag dang smra// phyag dgra zhabs sa // zhabs dkyus sto ga susargyal lkug/ spyan dgras dag slo ldanas 'das sa// s+yAng dgras da la yodan// zag dpas so/ nas coM// 2
54a2(rnying rgyud): dbus kha mngar med par gsol// ljags dbus khrag la myos shing 'thung // dgra bo zla dang phrol la shog/ rak+ka hu ti dun ting ro lcags dgra bo srog la bruM ri li li b+h+yo/ byang gi phyogs nas bla 'grags pa// gser gyi mun pa khyud chen la go// dpya dgu dargyan dbu
54a3(rnying rgyud): zhal dgu gdangs// phyag dgu zhabs dgu tsit+ta dgra// zhabs dgus stong khams zla la rgyug/ spyan dgras dgra bo'i bla nas 'joms// snying dgus dag po yid la 'dzin// phyag dgus tsit+ta khong nas 'byin// zhal dgus kha mngar med par gsol// ljags
54a4(rnying rgyud): dgus khrag la myos shing 'thung // dgra bo bla dang phrol la shog/ karma b+hU ti du na ting ro myags srog la bruM ri li li b+h+yo/ drag po mtha' sdud spyod cing 'dzi la// pho zang thig le bde la bzhag/ yon tan lhun grub rin po che// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag 'byung // s+yo
54a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ma las kyi gnad// dmar len sngags kyi mthu brel nas// 'khor lo mtshon cha'i rgyal po'o// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud lus/ dmar len snying po don gyi man ngag gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan
54a6(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis yon tan thob par bya ba'i rim pa 'di gsungs so// tshe srog bdag po'i don dag ni// rnam grangs lnga dang ldan pa'o// dbye ba ngo bo yon tan dang // las dang 'bras bu nges par bshad// dbye ba dag pa rnam pa lnga// rang bzhin lhun grub tshe bdag dang /
54a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes lhun gru zil gnon dang // phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshe bdag dang // thugs las 'khung pa'i tshe bdag dang // las las grub pa'i tshe bdag go// yon tan rin po che lta bu// kun 'byung 'phel 'grib med par gnas// lhun gru 'tshe bdag dang ma lnga// rgyu rkyen 'phro du rtsol dang brang // phyag
54b1(rnying rgyud): chen por lhun grub pa'o// zil gyis gnon pa'i tshe bdag ni// sbrad srid ye shes rtog las 'das// rtog bcas 'khrul pa ru bzlog phyir// rin chen gzhal las lhun grub na// stobs kyi gdan la de bzhin grub// rang bzhin gsal ba'i ngang nyid las// ye shes lhan
54b2(rnying rgyud): gyis grub pa'i sku// lhun po ri rab brtan ltar brjid// srid gsum sbyor ba zil gyis gnon// bdud mo kha 'bar gsod byed mas// myos byed khrag skyugs ma mo'i tshogs// ma lus zil gyis gnon cing 'joms// gsod byed bka' yis byin brlabs
54b3(rnying rgyud): gnon// bregs pas gnyen dang sa bdag pho mo gnon// bya khyud klu bdud klu srin gnon// khyud mos sa bdag sa srin gnon// seng ges rgyal glon stobs chen gnon// stag gis dud 'gro gdug pa gnon// zhe sdang gdug pa'i sbrul nag gis// sngags
54b4(rnying rgyud): dang de med pa rigs bzhi'i klu// tsha ba'i nad dbal zil gyis gnon// srid pa'i khams khang rus sbal gyis// srog dbugs bkag mdangs tshe srog 'chang // rang bzhin chos su skye med las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul lhun gru'i skus// rtse ba las kyi
54b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa yi// bdam chags skye med dang du grol// dngas ma'i thig le bcud la bsdu// snang srid bde 'gro ma lus kyi// tshe srog yi ge gnyis bskus 'chang // phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshe bdag gi// gdan las yab yum bya khyud dregs// rgyan gyi sngags
54b6(rnying rgyud): dang gab pa'i sngags// lus srung drag pos 'joms pa yi// sprul pa'i tshe bdag nag po ni// zil gnon thugs kyi skul ba ste// dbu dku gnad dgu mi nad 'joms bdud yin// theg pa dku yi don ldan nas// 'bras bu rigs lnga ye shes bzhi// skul ba sna chog
54b7(rnying rgyud): bas mdapag dka'// las kyi tshe bdag nag po ni// 'byung brteni gzhi'i rngam gri 'og shed na// mi dge bcu yi las dbang las// yi dwags rgyal po 'chi bdag sku// sha thog kaM 'khor dang bcas// dbang spang sngags kyi las kun byed// las kyi rnam
55a1(rnying rgyud): grangs 'dri lta ste// rgyab bzhi dang yan lag bcas// ldan grub tshe bdag nag po'i las// rtsa ba gnyis dang yan lag bcu// khyad par brgya dang bcu drug yad// b+hU ba man dag rtsa pa gnyis// yan lag phul na nyi shu dab// ril
55a2(rnying rgyud): rloms// sus kyi gzasrung // phyag cagacig dkril// Na ba gsum la yan 'gal// spel ba'i tshe bdag ma ga dgra'i las// sbyor ba brgyadags pa'i mdza // las kyikyi bdag nag po las// sbyong ba'i dam
55a3(rnying rgyud): grangs brgya phrag gcig/ drug cu rtsa gcig byed par gsungs// tshe bdag nag po'i ngo bo 'di lta ste// thams cad chos srung ngo bo gcig/ ye shes lhun grub chen po'i sku// sna tshogs sbyor ba skyal pa'i sku// rol pa gsum gyi ngang du rdzog/ 'bras bu'i gnas tshul
55a4(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// chos nyid 'gyur med rang bzhin las// rang byung ye shes phyag rgyar 'bar// thams cad sdang stong ye shes su// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// sna tshogs ngos gzung med pa'i sku// snang stong ma 'gags bde chen nyid// 'khor 'das gnyis med
55a5(rnying rgyud): brdam pa'i gror// rtog dpyod phrin las rtsol las 'das// ting 'dzin 'du 'gro gyen las 'das// bgrod thob col med lhan gyis grub// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs// theg pa kun gyis bgrod pa'i mchog/ sku ma spen grib phral la rol// ye shes bya
55a6(rnying rgyud): tog brjod 'das// rang rig rang gsal dang blad sgra// sna tshogs snang la ngos gzung med// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ tshe bdag gi rnam grangs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / gzhan yang bzod pa'i rim pa ni// sems nyid ban
55a7(rnying rgyud): 'dig nas su// rang nyams brtan pa'i mtshams bcad la// maN+Dal chen po bya bar brtsam// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rdzogs nas// dur khrod dbang ro rgya blangs la// thugs kyi sprul pa mkha' khyab sba// grag rgyal dri yis khrus byas la// maN+Dal dbus su brtan par ba'
55b1(rnying rgyud): rang gtan tham pas sum mar snar// dngas grub gang 'dang dragasngags gdags// gzhan cigs gtor ma ba cad d+ha spad// zur bskam drug chags su yangags// tags dang ltar la ltos rab zlas// bams 'i nga // chab ga bar dang byang pa
55b2(rnying rgyud): bdag/ dreng po grang brnam shes la// yum dkyil 'ar rdzogs par btag/ skabs dang byor mtshol babasam// tshogs dang byor mchod pa'i sa// kyi rnyed mchod sogs suni mi gcang // rang sems thag ldan rtag so'o// rlobar co bdug gi nom pa/
55b3(rnying rgyud): abacad la bus dang lhur// phyag ca kra shis gzung ma brtag/ sngags skyes rgyal rigs bram ze'i rigs// lang tsho mtshan ldan byas byas la// gas ste gzurnams g.yon nas la byud// b+hag gsang ba'i tshe thang du// snyan grub dkyil 'khor rdzogs par btag/
55b4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i phyag rgya yos// gsang ba'i lha la gsol ba gdab// gyen brlabs btul lcags 'jugs brtsam// khrus dang me tog 'jug pa yis// brda chen sku dang ba ma dkyil 'khor// gsang ba stan grub maba' la 'jug/ brtul grags soni 'gro'i rim pa bdun
55b5(rnying rgyud): bum pa se mthing sme babyung // gyen cha phyag mtshan drag po'i dbang // gter ma rak+ta bdud rtsi bstab// lung bstan gzengs bstod dbugs dbyung bya// gsang mtshan brtan pa mi zlog sbyin// dam tshig chos bshad gdams pa bya// bka' bsgo mna' cha gsang 'a bsag
55b6(rnying rgyud): ra bskyed bu la tshogs kyis rol// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// slob ma gzhug phyir gsol ba gad ba// lhun grub dang bzhin gnas pa'i pho brang nas// ye shes rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub pa'i lha// ma lus mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// slob ma mtshan ldan yum gyi
55b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// brtul zhugs drag pa'i stobs kyis gzug tu gsol// dade chen mnyam pa'i bzang gsing ba ru// rig pa'i brtul lcags stobs kyis gzug tu gsol// slob ma mnyam pa'i don dang bzod pa 'dod pa yis// me tog rin chen 'dod pas mdzes thas
56a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang bcas bdag cag man+ta ma pA yi// rdo rdo rgyal po dag la gsol ba gdab// ston pa'i sgon ma bcom ldan 'das// lha dang slob dpon dgongs sngags la// rdegs pa stobs kyis tshul bstan pa// 'gyur med pade zed
56a2(rnying rgyud): nal// dregs pa'i lha tshogs dgongs su gsol// b+ha ga gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// dam tshig dka' thub sdom pa'i mchog/ rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la dgongs// gsang ba'i sgron ma bdag la dgongs// ye shes
56a3(rnying rgyud): bor pa bdag la stsol// me tog rin chen dbyig bsdus la// bde chen gyi yi 'jug pa brtsam// phung po lhun grub tshe bdag rten// bam chen mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jug pa nang gi lha ngo bstan// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang du// me tog dor la lha ngo bstan//
56a4(rnying rgyud): gdong g.yos dang ldan slob bskyed// bal shis mtshan ldan gas pa'i phozang na// gnyis med sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyar ba'i// byung chub sems nyid mi 'gyur bde ba'i mchog/ po zong sun gyis grub par bzhugs pa dang // sdeb lnga dang bdud rtsi spor ba
56a5(rnying rgyud): sems// byakra shes mdzad ldan ta t+ta brtul zhugs sbyin// mi 'gyur btan pa'i mu dang ye shes bgrod// gsang ba gzungs ma slob bskyed lablang // no// bde che na gsang ba'i pho zang du// thabs chen gsang ba'i bde bang la// dbu ma rtsa chung sa bon bsre/
56a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i chos gyur 'gyil// rtsal ma 'od daphros longs spyod spu// mnyam par gnas pa byang chub sku// spos bral kun khyab sprul pa'i su// brtan pa thob pa rdo rje'i sku// yab yu ma mnyes pas mnyes par bya// sbyor ba dag pa'i phyin rlabs las// rdza brgyad bde ba'i
56a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyis// byang chung thugs dang rje ba 'gro// bkra shis mtshon ldan bum par bskyil// brtul zhugs rab 'byams dbang bskur bya// hoH/ rig pa'i stobs ldan sbyor ba'i gnas// 'bral pa'i bgazags smin lta bu// ye shes rol pa'i smon mes bsal// mnyam/
56b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal po brtul zhugs longs// e ka ya ma pra ts+tshi hoH/ mtshan ldan bkra shas babang du// drag po stobs kyi lta bstan// bkra shis bum pas dbang bsgyur bya// taH/ ye shes spyan grub bum pa yis// brtul zlazla dag nga 'dabang bskur bas// 'khor ba rnam dag chos srung
56b2(rnying rgyud): gsal// rang byung ye shes dbang thob shog/ oM ka ya ma thu zhig po ho& hoH/ 'bras bu brag 'thung gyi shes wAr// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan grub pa'o// mun cha stobs kyi dbang sbyin bya// glang chen rtag/ grang zhing lpags sgral// skrod pa snyed phreng keng rus bcan//
56b3(rnying rgyud): rI hur khrod dbang bskur bas// dregs pa'i mthu stobs dbang thob shog/ oM ka ya ma ha sti ma hA nA ga ka pA la tsit+ta dz+wa la ni ro hoH// hoH/ 'khor ba 'dral byed 'khor lo dang // nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri dang // chos nyid mtshon pa'i rdo rje yis// mu gsum mnyam pa'i dbang
56b4(rnying rgyud): thob shog/ e ka ya ma tsakra khaD+ga badz+ra hoH/ be con dug lnga zil gyis gnon pa dang // gdug 'joms byed pa'i gtun shing dang // log rtog brkam chags 'joms pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis// rig pa stobs kyi sgo gsum dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma tsit+ta hu ti sa rA pa hoH/
56b5(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs spyod pa'i ro la mnyam par rol pa ni// hoH// pad+ma rdo rje mnyam sbyar nas// pad+ma rak+ta byang chub sems// 'am chen sme ba'i don dang sbyar// brtul zhugs rol pa'i dbang bskur bas// mi zad kun gyis dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma a d+hi pa ta sid+d+hi hoH/
56b6(rnying rgyud): los spyod dag pa'i dbang bskur bya// 'chi med rang byang ra sA ya na// bkra shis mtshan ldan lhag pa'i rdzas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbang bskur bas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma sarba pany+dza/ a mr-i ta dz+nyA na shud+d+ha hoH// bkra shis
56b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub ga'u ru// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i cho bskyil nas// rang rtags tshe yi dbang bskur bas// 'chi med mi 'gyur brtan pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma A mudz+nyA na sid+d+hi hoH/ snod kyi 'jig rten gtor snod du// bcud kyi 'jig rten gtor mar gsal// 'gyur
57a1(rnying rgyud): brda rdza gtor mad+hIH// ldan grub pan 'byung gtar ba'i na// 'dzin chags med pa'i thabs ces das// e ka ya mAm hA ba thA kA/ da hrul sas 'anapa la// zhi byas sa pa da // gca
57a2(rnying rgyud): po bang chen gyis// lus 'dra'i bdeg sheg / ga 'thung // darje cang canajigs par yin byas// bka' pa tha yang brlag par bya ba min// bzlab thas gag la tshig sag ster slong // gal tu 'das dang la bar rung// 'di
57a3(rnying rgyud): dal ba'i na// tshul 'di bsung na dngos grab 'thab// nya mas nu man med dmyal bar spyang // rdo rje'i chu 'di khyod kyis 'angs// brjod ka yid ma ho// 'dod pa'i chags larol pa // drug thugs mngon du phyung ba'i klud las/ bis chen gsung pa'i dbang gi
57a4(rnying rgyud): le'us dgra pa la// gzhan yang gdus pa na zugs na// mtshan nyid tu pas las rnams sbyin// de yar mi 'dis te// rtul rigs ma gnas dus nad bskyed/ rdo rags lag gsas rgya bsgrim// bram zla lags yan zug tu na rje
57a5(rnying rgyud): gams nasupa gam// rdol pa dngag pa sa jug/ bas la thal 'thas gas// thun dadu thu nar 'jug/ mying rgya thag parjid bya / dang ga cigazug pa gces / ga gsas pa pa da // yang sa dang
57a6(rnying rgyud): byug/ rdzi thabs gzer na blang ba gtung // 'joms pa chags mags rngam shes// ragra ma pa rnas pal 'dug// kye mi dang par dang thal// gdug pa rtson pa kyang la 'dug/ rtswa'abog pa la mangs bya ba'i la byung // sa mams na than
57a7(rnying rgyud): dang po rdzal ming lams bsdad// brtsa bzhi skabs la 'dug/ bdakar thab zung ma khris dad babyed// tu dung 'chal ga yang chal dang 'thabs// sha rus g.yengs pa brtags lnga 'byung // bru bdud kyusan sring dang 'thob// klang tha ba zum da 'ang
57b1(rnying rgyud): ma mos rims nal blo nad gtor// rgyal pos spro 'bog 'tshal dang bsdad// btsan gyi gzer nad gre dang bsdang // the brang glo bur hur thum gtang // 'don pa rtags ni bzhi dang ldan// yid kyi dug cag khor nas spong // dmar len mchog gi sngags kyis gdon// reg pa'i drug
57b2(rnying rgyud): ni col bas 'dzin// shi phrad phyag rgya nyin mtshan gdon// mthong ba'i dug ni mdze shus 'dzin// mgo dgu sngags bye sgo sgor shis// kha rlangs dug ni shA bkras 'dzin// gzhan yang gdon pa'i sbyor ba ni// sngags dang 'khor lo sreg pa'i las// 'jug pa'i rjes
57b3(rnying rgyud): gcod sngags kyis gdon// mgo la sogs pa gdug pa las// dri la gtor 'khor lo lho sbar bsdeb// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsum gyis gdon// mgo la shi phrad nyin mtshan dang // lho sdebs gtor ba'i sbyor bas gdon// lag g.yas zhugs la snying gzer dgra// de
57b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin ga yon pa te thA gcig/ nang pa g.yas lagadug pas gdod// g.yon la sti bzug sbyong bas gdon// zug dgral ba rbA ga cig pas// rtsa bA na zhugs pa 'tha brgyad shes// dbugs dang rdzi khang cu gcig gtor// rjen kun thugs na gnyis ga ces brdzeg
57b5(rnying rgyud): drod la thugs na lnga tsho bsdeb// rlung la thugs na gnyis por gyi// Na lam bzug cig gtsor thang yang // sa me tsal sum stobs dgrag/ rtsa bzhi gdug pas 'byung ba'i rlung // dbugs nas phyag rgya chen pas badzin// chog mgo bdun ya dasde bdun brdeb// kha ras
57b6(rnying rgyud): zhugs la shi 'phreng brjeb// Nod+hAr zhug la bcu gcig dkrug/ bu bdud bu srin bdun pa dbug/ du me 'bra gu'i sbyor ba brjeb// ma mo la sngags sems dang gtsad// tso// 'bru dbu'i sbyor ba yis// lho 'bog la sogs 'joms pa'i mchog/ dza ye 'bru dgrangs
57b7(rnying rgyud): bsdebs pas// gzer dang dri yi sbyor ba 'joms// ro rje bcu yang dra brdebs pas// glo bur nad dang mdze yams 'joms// mchog tu snying po maN+Dal// dmar len sngags kyi snang mo zung // kun 'joms rtags rnams med pa'o// drag sngags mngon du gyur ba'i khyad pas/
58a1(rnying rgyud): nad kying zad ting bstan pa'i ba'u skye bcupa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid gtan la bab pa 'di gsungs so// ma bcas chos sku le brda pa ni// gdod nas gnas pas lkug pa len// bkres bud med pa
58a2(rnying rgyud): yin// phyogs ris med pas kun la khyang // mtha' dbus med pas brdal ba yin// rang rgyud med pas 'gyur ba med// mi byed mi shigs rdo rje'i sgra// srid gsum khams gsum 'khor ba yang // ming tsam btags pas sgyu ma ste// rang bzhin med pas nyams pa
58a3(rnying rgyud): yid// de ltar btags pa'i chos rnams kun// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems// sems dang chos nyid gnyis med pas// rtag pa chen po bde ba'i sku// khyad chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin// chos sruraru sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas// bde ba'i ye shes rang la
58a4(rnying rgyud): shar// sgyu ma lhan grub yul la rol// dzag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ chos nyid gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang 'khor gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rje des/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ drag sngags
58a5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar gnas// dka' thub sdom pa ji ltar gsungs// sbyor ba'i rgyal po ji ltar bsdeb// drag po'i sngags rgod ji ltar lags// rdo rje snying pos rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis/ rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa bsdus
58a6(rnying rgyud): nas bkod do// drag po sngags kyi rtsa ba ni// rim pa bdun dang ldan pa yin// 'dun pa gsum dang lta ba gzhi// yin pa gsum du dag pa bsde ba gsum// gsang lcags gsum dang gnan lugs gsum// 'chab lugs gsum dang 'pho ba gsum// gsal
58a7(rnying rgyud): don can 'grub// glang chen grangs so stsol po gzung // bde ba mchog dang thugs rje'i gzungs// gtsang sme med blang zil gnon slob// yige lha dang mtshan chalas// lus dang yan lag bsrung gsang bsdeb// rten can rten med sbyor ba'i tshul// 8
58b1(rnying rgyud): mnga' ba blangs gzhing granas// thugs rdzo chos dang lo shes nas// phral dang 'gang na ra ba la// lha dang 'bar lo gzas pa 'o// lha dang thags dang yul dang dmigs// dal sa dag gragasan pa dngas// dgazugs mngon du byung ba rtang gas
58b2(rnying rgyud): drag sngags rtse ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / gzhan yang dka' thub sdom pa ni// dpa' brtul sngags kyi dmod pa la// gtsang sde la po g.yeng ba min// gsang bub shes rab spyod pa can// dpa' brtul stobs dang nyams ldan pa// spo
58b3(rnying rgyud): khyad par dka' thub bskyed // gdug pa gsum gyi sbyor bral// tshig sum brgyad dang rol de bzhin// dri mum chung zil pa la// brtag pa gsam gyi spong bas thang // yon tan dka' thab kun dang ldan// phyag tu bstan pa'i sgrar gsal bya// rang lus dmigs pa gzhan
58b4(rnying rgyud): mi bstan// 'bumatsho dag sngags rgya d+ha mig cid// nye stong drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam// dkar thub drag po'i myong ba yin// bsrung ba'i dam tshig sngags kyi srog/ bcu gnyis gcig gis drang don can// kun gyis dang du bang bani// rdo rje rang gi ri mibashi // mngon
58b5(rnying rgyud): dogs med btul zhugs spyad// 'khor lo srog mthar gnan pa zor// gzir sogs dbab pa yan lag yin// nga mchog gzugs la rtag tu 'jug/ gcan gzan rgyal po gsang ba min// za ma tog tu dug mi blag/ rin chen lha thag bsreg mi bya// gangs kyi hu du
58b6(rnying rgyud): btung ba min// bdud kyi snod ngan nang mi brug/ mi shis snod du ma dngas mi dbub// snod ngan seng ge'i zho mi brug/ yid bzhin nor bu bsreg mi bya// gnam lpags ur mo nang mi 'thang // stag gzig rol ba'i lhag mi bsdu// rdo rjes gtams pa'i brag mi bshig
58b7(rnying rgyud): rje ba'i rmang mi tha'o// spen pa sel ba'i sgron migs // rdo rje skye bo'in mi gnang // rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rtogs mid bye// rdo rje rdo rjeng gi ma par mi bshig/ rin chen rgyal mtshan kyi mi dpog// thun mong sngags kyi mchog yi ni// rtag pa'i dmatshig rnam pags
59a1(rnying rgyud): bzod pa brtul zhugs blta ba'o// drag sngags mngon du byung ba'i rgyud las/ dka' thub dam chog gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsu/
59a2(rnying rgyud): so// de yi las rim 'di lta ste// rtsa ba rnam pa gsum du bsrung // gsad dang gso dang lo thog gzhim// gsad pa'i las ni lnga dang ldan// mtshon cha bsnol ma gnyen bsreg gnyis// lto shal log then thun dang lnga// drag po bsad pa'i skabs su sbyar// sangs
59a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas thugs kyi bcud bsdus pas// gab pa mngon phyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ rang sems dben pa'i dur khrod du// dpa' brtul sngags kyi dmod pa bor// shog bu gru bzhi mtho gang la// thig skor gsum ldan zla gsum mthong // tha sems ming dus lha rnams kyi/
59a4(rnying rgyud): rim 'khrul mig lcags mkhar bcu// rtsa ba'i snying po me rlung skyi 'dang gnas// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// ral gri rgya gram bsnol mar gnas// ral gri9/ dpa'i spu gri la// rgya gram gnon pa'i spu gris mdzes// de nyid rus khral khro bo'i lto bar bri//
59a5(rnying rgyud): cha gnyis byas la dug dang khrag gis byug/ sgron dmar dang bcas thod pa'i dong du brnag/ pho thong dmod pa mo thod ming rus brnag/ tshe bdag bsgoms la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// zhag bdun rtag sngags dmod pa na ma tshig ldan par bzlas// drag tu bskal gyi na
59a6(rnying rgyud): brnag pa'i yul la mdag/ drag sngags dmod pas gsad la gzir zhing thod pa bcang // 'khor lo thod pa gdug pa'i gnyen la gtad// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs drag po'i skabs dang sbyor// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma snying khra ga ra ma tsa ya/
59a7(rnying rgyud): dge pa'i srog la rmugs ti sha ga zad/ dgra bo'i srog la stan ya nan/ gzhan yang gab lngas gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// gru gsum ming dras zla ba masrung ba'i lha// 'khor lo rtsibs bdun mu khyud phyi ru bya// mtshon chas
59b1(rnying rgyud): gcang pa rtso mal// mang bcas su me bdun pa dgod// tha ma'i rtsibs chen dgu pa la// 'dren pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dang // khong khrag 'brel ba'i 'bra lnga dgod// mtshon ma'i bdang ming dras bris// rgan rdzam zod pa kha sbyar gzhug/ rjod pa sted ma mra
59b2(rnying rgyud): khrud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su rgya ga ma lte bar mi dang ldan// ral yam 'bru bzhi bsnol mar bri// muM khyud gnyis par rigs bzhi zla brgyad bsnol// mu krung gsum pa sbrul nag brgyad kyis bsnams// sbrul gyi gseb tu ga rnan pa'i sngags kyis dgang /
59b3(rnying rgyud): khrung blam mi sted ba // thod pa'i khyer gyi canan gyis bskyod// thod pa 'ag men khyung thub pa gsus// dbusas sugasus kyim nga gsulasan// nidang med sa thug ma rdzogs par gyi// mabyu gnyis par skal ba srid bal brnam// b+h+ya /
59b4(rnying rgyud): gyi gseb tu ming rjes ma rin// thod pa'i bar dran cad pa'i na mar mi gzhug/ zhag grangs nyite shu bdun du rtse// gdug ba'i gtanas barbu ba nos lAgan// gdug pa'i drag sngags 'di lta ste// A kA ya ma snyid khrag ra mA tsA ya/ dam ze'i srog la mu gti sheg rbad/
59b5(rnying rgyud): dag po'i srog stam b+ha ya na na// gzhan yang gang sras gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo mu khyung rim pa gsum du bskor// rus sbal gzugs gnyis lto ba stong par ni// rus sbal lto bar brnag pa'i ming rus bri// de yi phyi ru gnon pa'i gdon rnams bri// dug dang
59b6(rnying rgyud): khrag dang tsha ba'i rdzas kyis byug/ bral ba lta sgyur gyi dra drag po'i sngags kyis bskor// tha~Md pa snyeng mar nAgA r+b+he b+hanA n+ta b+hi// thod pa 'og ma na ga oM tra~M tsa\u0f89\u0fa4na ces kyi/ mthing nag dril la cang bcas dong du gzug/ gong ltar sngags bzlas mtha' dru gtan
59b7(rnying rgyud): gnan// 'bum phrag brgya dang 'i tshe brgyad cu dbye// lu ma 'khyil pa'i dbus su nam gyi gung lag nan// lci srin kun gyi pho brang btab par bsam// ngag sngags dmod pa sbyor ba gsum dang ldan// e ka ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya zang / yam/
60a1(rnying rgyud): gleng khrag mams/ dam pa'i srog la d+ha ga d+hAd+d+hAnad+hA d+hA ya dan/ dgra pa sog lag zir man+ta/ gzhan yang gnan pa jug pa'i mtha' skad hA// gzhan gyi yod pa / bas can pan// rang ga sbyor bahrI sA la zhag sas mthod pa/
60a2(rnying rgyud): gzer// TI tsa bskal byin rnamachog drug tu bzlas// thod pa gdug la dmigs pa'i tsho rje waM// gzhan gyi snying pa tshangs pa'i rgyal gyi// mid byeng kyi rnams kyi bsnyen dang gas dpe ni// tham yang dag drag zigs bzo// thod ga gakho la 'i bris bkod/
60a3(rnying rgyud): pa steng pa'i dbus su ma dang Ti// de yi kyi nub rten bsgrub gas pas bskor// nyin mtshan mtshams su bsdubacu drag tu bskul// tha ma yang dag dradrug sngags rdzogs par bri// thong pa'i phyi nang du gdang khrag gis byug/ bsgrub sngags brgyab d+ha bag sngags tsho re/ 6
60a4(rnying rgyud): zhag bcu ru yul la bsgral gyi na rbad// me rgyas skra shad bcings la dang po'i gnas su gnan// gsad pa rnams gnan la 'bru bzhi yang // khro tsho drug tu drug pa'i sngags kyis gzir// e ka ya ma snying khrag ram tsa ma/ dgra po'i srog la khram shing zad/
60a5(rnying rgyud): ka ya ba ma ra/ dgra bo'i srog stam b+ha yanan/ thun b+han mugs ra n+ya/ drag sngags dug mda'athun gyi sbyor ba ni// gang la lhor dang mngon sum 'joms shing 'pho// de yang rten gyi thod pa gling mangs su// thun khrag sna tshogs thod pa ming rus bca'//
60a6(rnying rgyud): gsum bran gsum khrag gsum brdeg pa'i rdzas// skyer tshor rten la thod pa dar gyis dgab// gsal ba zhag dgra mod pa dbab// brgya brgya bzlas shing thun khrag dag la bstim// drag sngags bskul bas dug mda' khong du phyel// rtsa gcod khod khrag rkam nas shas
60a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i'o// sngags kyi grangs las tshad kyi sbyor ba min// drag tu bskul gyi na thod khrag zor du 'phang // thod pa'i bu ngan drag po sngags kyis 'azlog/ lus bskyod rngam tshig sgra dang bcas pas bya// dregs pas bskyod cing rngam pas yul la 'gro// drag po sngags kyi sbyor
60b1(rnying rgyud): ba'adas te// a ka pa ma thag la dmyags bran rbad d+ho/ khrag ca la zang shag thun nang d+ha/ ra ma stong ma thur mo thun zad / rtswa khrag zlum shog thun zadaH/ gsad pa gsam zlal drug pa rtags// gnyis rnal mtha' gsu ba stong ba ma na// dag padra/
60b2(rnying rgyud): brtag pa thabs kyi sgor ba blang // rig pa gsum dang ldan pa la rbaH// gsang ba las kyi rim pa brje ba dang sbyar// snong ba gab pa'i snying po byas dpa yin// drug sngags mngon du phyung ba'i spyad las/ sbyor ba drag pa'i leT swA ban+d+ha bzhi pa'o// / gzhan
60b3(rnying rgyud): yang bathog gzham pa'i sbyor ba 'di la ste// drur dzod ras sam shogs gru bzhi la// dbus su rus sbal rtswa bstod par the// 'khor martsi bas chen bcwa gnyis dag dang san// 'dzin pa'i 'bru bzhi 'byung ba'i 'bra lnga pa// dab pa'i sngags bzhi rtsa dri la
60b4(rnying rgyud): thog gzar// gta' mthod pa 'dra gnyis gcig dang gsum// khrag lnga po lnga 'bru gsum thal// rten gnyis 'bru gsum tshol gsum dang // thag nas yul rten 'jug pa thod pa'i rten// sbyor ba gzhom gyir khrag dang drag gis gdab// dpe bdun wArus
60b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud gsum dang sbyar// khri brgyad gang dmigs khri yis lam du gzhug/ dmigs pa gsum gyis gnas yul rten la sbyar// chu rgod 'khrug pa ri ru rdib nas 'joms// drag sngags sbyor ba bzhi ru brje ba// e ka ya ma pra ma thung ya ba ma/ rdo wa~M zil rdzil
60b6(rnying rgyud): nyid 'dril pri/ hril shar shar yaM yai 'u bathil b+ho/ pro shar shar b+hi ta rak+ka shar shar raM thun yi shar pho ba/ nA ga gzir nan dril phob/ de ba yun na gzer phob/ ma ma ra k+ka ga zir pheb/ sa~M si ya maH shu la gzi nan trai la shar pho ba/ 'bras bu rtsi thog skye shing
60b7(rnying rgyud): 'joms// lus dang yan lag 'dod par sbyar// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ lo thog 'joms pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / gzhan yang srung ba'i sbyo ra ba ni// rim pa brgyad dang ldan par bya// bzhig pa 'khor lo gzugs dang pa
61a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gdug pa gzir ba gsam// khab cing dang gzir sbyor ba mchog/ drag po sngags bya sbyor ba khyad par gyis// gzhan gyis sbyong ba bshig cing gzhan byeng gzing ba de las// bya dag lag gdod gzugs de'i//
61a2(rnying rgyud): ga dbying po za zla sngags kyis bskor// gsus song bcug la bu gsum kyang bcas panag/ mthing nag dung khrod dang ram de bas gsums// zhag gsum byabs la mtha' ru bka' ten gtsun// gcugs la bshig pa'i spyod pa dang po yin// dri khyod das
61a3(rnying rgyud): snying po brda med bri// sngags kyis bskor ladug chu tsha ba bsdu// la tsha'i gzung sbal pa'i lto bar bza'// zhug gsum thun bzhi rabargya dang bcu zab// thon nas du bas bdugs la seng ge'i khog par gnan// brdal gshig pa'i sgo ba gnyis pa'o//
61a4(rnying rgyud): ngas pan nga gas ma/ mjig su ba ya bul sa/ 'ang bam kyibs padu bgo pa'i byam // sa lo bar dag da pa drugs
61a5(rnying rgyud): padz+ras yul la jug tu chad// drug po sngags kyi sbyor ba gcig gis b+ha// e ka ya ma g+has mdza ni ya/ sarba sha tru~M sta~M b+ha ya nan 'bri zang / 'khor los bshig pa'i myor pa gsum pa'o// gzhan yang klu gtanas bdag gdug pa'i nad da ran// shog dag pa
61a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs ni Sh+Ta gachags kyis bskyod// nad khrag dug khrag tshabs zhing rus skyil// thod pa nga du mdol khrag zhag bdun zab// nya sto sa bsgom gzing sngags mtha' draganan// sa dang rdeg su yi mtha' dra ba// brda dang ming khrel ting gze sngags kyis bgror/
61a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin spring ba phaga'od chu mchog gan// dur mched bka' rten gnod pa'i sa rbag nan// gzhan yang gadrug pa gzir ba'i 'khar la ni// drang khrod ngas dang shogs gra zhing// theg slong rim gsum dbus sras rmeg// dathul mig pani gnyis te nyas pa'i
61b1(rnying rgyud): cibyas bcad du zhes padug pa zhan chagasug cang // ngas rgyal la sags thebargyang man la khrag byug// than nas gzi shing mtha'adug nan paH// hetha mthubar pa/ sadrug nga gzung stsog pa chog zang / sartag nyid srung nan nan/ gzhan ya dag da dang /
61b2(rnying rgyud): bcing ba// sbyor ba gzhan ming sngags kyis bya// sarba tsit+ta gzir zla bi gA nan/ gzhan yang stobs kyis bdag po nang gzir na// rgya shog gzugs byas lto bar 'khor lo bca'// thig sgor gsum ldan dbus su ya dang ka/ 'khrul mig bcul gshig pa'i sgra
61b3(rnying rgyud): nga // mna' 'a'i ba ci kyi rtsibs par dug ra jugs// rtag tha pa rten kyi tha rjin/ nga nyid rkyen migs pa sten ba // thugs bzlas da pa nga byu ba ba/ rdug pan nas dag gsams
61b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyi stor ngas te/ m-ig la mabyung ning sa/ e bcing nan du dza bang shag pa/ radage sa 'jug pan gyi cwo yang byur// mchog tugs pa nga ga ra ma gnas// jigazugs maspyon du bya dnga'i rgyad las bad+mo bya ma po'o
61b5(rnying rgyud): b.rudrug pa'o// / de nas yang bcom spyan 'dus kyis ga dgas bang da kyi sbyor ba 'digasungs so// spyod pa las kyi mtha' spangs// dbang spad las kyi lakhong lo btag// las co bdag to na// srid pa sngags kyi 'khor lo gnas/ rje
61b6(rnying rgyud): na te// phred pa'i 'byor pos // gyis kyi bo thaMng // de'i phyir ma dzu mi ni// gsang ba dag pa'i dgas kyis dag // gnyis pa ba rigs thab na// gnas pa ra ba'i dgas cis dgang // rjes kyi'i bdaganyis pa
61b7(rnying rgyud): yang ga sbyong ba'i drag sngags te// gshin rje ma mo bdud dang rgyal// ni rjes can gzer ba'i sngags// snyi gzer gdug pa gzir ba'i sngags// kho mo ma ning 'pho ba'i sngags// bcu gnyis las kyi skabs kyi gnas// 'thul mig bzhil brda yis gang // kun
62a1(rnying rgyud): thag 'thar ba yan// las kyi yan lag zal la ste// thun gyis gzugs la bdag pa yin// mnan pa la sogs gong bzhin snar// mtha'i mtha' du shes pa gsangs// skabs dang skar la thung phying chud// g.yang
62a2(rnying rgyud): sen pade pa'i byams kyis btags// gdeng dang ldan nam chog tu bsngags// sngags kyi dkyi pa 'di lta ste// ka ta~M d+han rak+Sha dzad/ ya ma nye sang dag zung / kha thang dgazang / klas ni babyud/ nga ba dkar yi drag po'i srog mA~M re ma d+hung / ya
62a3(rnying rgyud): smye ka ngo 'dri ma dan/ mAHsa dzu rba ra nan/ bla mas ra drug zis nan/ d+hA ti ts+tsha mA rA la rbad nan/ e ka ny+dza ka mo mA ka~M ya ma he sa bla ma thag dz+riM dza thil gAr shar drug gro ti shing pad+mo/ sro sha rA sha ka ma 'i ma / sa~M nA ga tsi rgya
62a4(rnying rgyud): gr-i shar shar trag tA tri la snying gzer kham shig thob/ oM ka te ka 'di ma he katrA~M ma~M he kaM sa ma sbyong dgas mdzad/ dz+wa rang sa dA kar ya d+hu phaT/ e ka ya ma heka 'drim yi rig mo ma b+h+yo/ oM ka ya sa he ka 'dre ma ya sa rba tsa t+ta gzer thub te/ oM t+pa ya ma hA/
62a5(rnying rgyud): sangs dkar ya d+hi na das rba sha d+hi dag zir thun b+h+yo/ e ka ya mdun sgyog du dza ri ya ma sha hU~M sa dkar ma thun/ gzer dzad b+h+yo/ e ka ya ma ka~M du ne dza res da kar sha dz+nyA na gzing thun nang / dA ra sha druM sa da kar yA dzad/ ya ma he sang zla ma khrag tsa tra~M sha dz+r-i bdag zing rnga
62a6(rnying rgyud): sang sa ma sa da ka ra~M ma/ sanA ga sha trUM snying gzar cu rbad/ ya ma ka ru na dza ras dkar ya/ d+ha tI ya sha~M hUM len na thun gzir zad/ ya ma raka thun drang / 9)N+Di ka s+ya ma nA ka snying gzeng thun/ rtsa ba 'dris thi ba nA ga zu dag zing drang / ma de nyid dag slang dan
62a7(rnying rgyud): ar+thag dra // mA ra yanAn/ rgya tha par drug sbyar nan/ s+thAs b+hA ya nan/ a ka ya ma dzum thi bar dru ga ga gzing zad 'dri mdun / h+ya saM yo mdun sa mdzes rba shon mnan/ de dag las kyi sngor ba kya// don rjen rdzogs kyi rtsa 'angosaHnga nga
62b1(rnying rgyud): kye sbyor ba ban// sku yi bsnyen ma mtha' du myar// drug par sbyor na rang ba nyen// rlig pa'i stobs kyi myug byas 'byung // las rnams rtsa bar dril ba yin// drag sngags brgya gnyis gcig gis rdzogs// drug sngags mngon du chung ba rgyad las/ dang
62b2(rnying rgyud): sdud rtsa ba'i lodu skye bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i don 'di gsungs so// sbyor ba mi shes sgor byed pa// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ma shes na// btags la don gyi por 'dzin pa yis// mngal bye grong ste
62b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdud kyis zin// thabs lam gsang ba'i don dang ldan gyur na// snang srid chags pa'i spyod pas me bar kyang // gnyis med phyag rgyar grol ba'i 'bras bur bgrod// sgrol ba mi shes sgrol byed pa// skye shi med pa'i gding dang mi ldan na// stsol bas stsol ba
62b4(rnying rgyud): mu stegs 'khrul pa ste// las kyi srin pos bcings pa'i bdud kyis zin// byang med rdzogs pas srog kyang gcad du med// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgyar rang po'an// khams gsum sems can dus gcig srog bcad kyang // tshes su bde ba chen po 'gro
62b5(rnying rgyud): pa med par rtogs// spyad du med pa'i phrin las ma shwar na// dpal mtshon byed khrus med spyod pa ni// las kyi rnam smin dmyal ba'i btson rang chung // tshol ba byas pas rtag pa'i bdud kyis gzir// spyad du med pa'i phyin las spyod shes na// lha sri gyur
62b6(rnying rgyud): ming dang mtshang spos nas// las la mngags nas pho nya kun rbad kyang // blang dor med pas rol pa'i spong par dag/ bsnyen pasla brtsol mad sngags don ma shes na// gyi nang rtags la brten nas srub byed pa// me shes srog la rtsol bas rang bdang rangal 'byor
62b7(rnying rgyud): mnar med dmyal ba'i gnas la the tshom med// bsnyen pasgrubartsol med sngags kyi don shes na/ srid gsum mkha' 'bo 'dus pa'i srog dngas ma// sgra srin kun gyi srog spying dril ba'i mchog/ drag gi oM dang yan lag sgor bani// rdo rje'i bzlas pas ye shes pa
63a1(rnying rgyud): pad shAr// gang mthong ci spyad ldan grub mtha' gnyis grol// nam mkha' rin chen ldan po rgya mtsho lngar// don gnyis smin pa yon tan lhan gyis grub// ma brjings po la med bzod pa'i 'bras zur zhen// sdang nga
63a2(rnying rgyud): drug dza dag rnam du// sang+yas rgyas byaka seM ga drugasu me shes nyim shing // sngags kyi goman na ga zugs me drung // ma shes gnyis med du mchos myi gsul/ dreg chags mngon du byung ba'i rgyad las/ col ba dang thab pa'i rtso byed pa'o//
63a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mgo dgu pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// rnam grangs sbyor ba bzhi ru bkod// nal ma'i 'khor lo sngogs pa gnyis// lo tog gzhom dang bsrung ba'o// rnal mra'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ngur khrod gdug pa'i bde gnas su/
63a4(rnying rgyud): khrod ras la 'khor lo shrI// sme ba lnga dang tsha ba bsku// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru bskor// gru gsum zla kham lcags mkhar bzhi// mtshams bzhi rdo rje'i ka bas 'dag/ thod pa'i ra ba brgyad gnyis ldan// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu drug la// mtshams
63a5(rnying rgyud): chen ka ba de bzhin sa ri'i mtshams// de yi phyi rim srul gdug chun pos bskor// srid pa rus sbal khra bo'i ldan gnas// de dag dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su brnag pa'i ming rus hrI// zla kham gsum la pha mes dur du song ba yi// de bzhin brda
63a6(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i snag tsha khrag gis bri// zla kham gcig la srung ba'i lha rnams bri// 'khrul mig bzhi la spu gri tshan bzhi dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// drag po dbang sdud las kyi rgyal po gnyis// khro bo rngam pa'i sku dang bdud rtsi snying po gnyis// gshin rje
63a7(rnying rgyud): dang ma mo'i snying po gnyis// chags phyed ma dang srin po'i snying po gnyis// shan pa btson dang dmu mi snying po gnyis// shan pa las mkhan spo byed snying po gnyis// dregs pa can dang nam mkhad snying po gnyis// srog bdag po mo gsod pa'i snying po gnyis// rang dang lcags ma
63b1(rnying rgyud): rabar ba gnas nganas// drag tu bskul gyis gan pa dag ladzad// 'a bar la margyan can drug zhugs me dpa 'jug/ 'khrul 'a khrongs nang m+bu zag can 'das// lus bya sha sngun gcad khrag dang bag+sa cags rnams// shas gtan
63b2(rnying rgyud): dang dbang po yul las 'byed// rte na gcig pus la shes pa kun bsdus thim// bskor 'khor lo tha~Mng pag zur gzhug/ nyin mtshan dril gtor ming bcas swa li sbyar// bod pa'i gsobacu thun gyi mu mi dgad// ri rgyal zab dang glas
63b3(rnying rgyud): gyi dgu brog ltar// sbrul gyi gsab tu gnan pa'i sku mri dgod// gser gyis gzhi ri rab brtan ltar bzlas// gru gsum nang du brtag pa'i rten rnams bzhag/ mthing nag la bcad gasmad pa'i sbyor ba bcom// brgyad dam brtseganyis
63b4(rnying rgyud): dril gtor drag sngags bzlas// sbyor ba thon nas thod pa gzir zhing bca'// ri rab pho brang gdug pa'i klu la gtad// nya stong kha gso thod khrag drug bza' 'phang // rngag po sngags kyi dmod pa 'di lnga ste// e ka he dren ye ma rag
63b5(rnying rgyud): mdo mun dzi/ shes tsang kring shu skyid / dgra po'i myig la nr-i sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ srog staM b+ha ya~Mnan/ srog la nr-i shag rbad ya~M thun to/ me rlung sbyor ba las kyi mchog/ nal mas gsad pa'i spor ba yin/ drag rdzogs mngon
63b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u skye bcu drug pa'o// / gzhan yang gas dpa'i sbyor ba ni// mgrub rdzogs na lho dkrug bcwang// ras la thig skor bzhin bskor// grags ma kham /
63b7(rnying rgyud): mig 'i buM drug rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu drug spu mi mtshon// tha mi sprul bzhi'i rabs bskor// gcod cing gnon pa'i 'khor lo yin// thasamapa' ma badrug po'i gnas// gadrug pa theg cod
64a1(rnying rgyud): pus sems rten 'thal 'jug pa'i drung // srog dbugs 'chang ba gshed gsang mdzad// rtsa gcod dbugs thal mtshan rgyan drug/ srog dang las s+thA pa rdzogs// dang po gdon pa
64a2(rnying rgyud): rbab/ las spangs shes sprin phyag rgya brtan// gdug pa'i mtshon cha ngar blud la// drag sngags lho dkrug khri brgyad gnyis// mtshan mo bskul gyin dril ba'i sngags// thon nas tha~Md dam par gdug pas gdab// mu
64a3(rnying rgyud): dukA ka zer kha bra sngo ba skyed// shes pa'i khyad par gsum ldan 'phang // dbang po rdo myur gsil 'tsho skyed// gdeng gsum sngags slong rnas par bgrod// drag sngags skyong ba 'di stede/ e ka h+ye drad rag sha sa
64a4(rnying rgyud): shu tre shaM mug tri snying / dgra bo'i srog la yongs thums shig zad/ s+yAM pa ya gzir naM na/ srog khyer yam shig hri thums myog thun b+h+yo/ gzhan yang lngas kyi rim pa ni// sprul pas po thog gzhom pa las/
64a5(rnying rgyud): khrod dras pa pa shog bu la// thig stong rim pa gsum du bskoradabus su gru gsum yul gyi ming // blags spring ba gzhom pa bri// b+hi rib 'thal mig bcu drug la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags napa ma da
64a6(rnying rgyud): thim rtsi ba chen nyi shu la// dbab pa'i spu gri drag po dgod// rus sbal lto bar sbyor ba balnga// kha sbyor thod pa zhabs ma mgrel// khrag sna dug sA sngon brdeb// sprul pa'i bsgom gyin bsrul la bzlas//
64a7(rnying rgyud): bzon nas gtang ma gzhug/ drag sngags stong du tshun mi bcad// ston zla gsum du dbeb pa bcam// zor dang du ba zab dang gzir// khrag dang dug rdzas sngo sta dug/ lcags phur drag sngags khri bzhir ldan/
64b1(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i rten dang gzugs lnga brdeg/ chags pa kun g+hu m+b+ha tha brel ba'i// sngags kyi rgyal ba 'ad lta ste// A ka N+ya dun ma ma shan+ta mAn rje sha mar krung shu steng thos pos shar shwar nA ga hur nan rdo gro shur shur dzi dzu
64b2(rnying rgyud): zag tu phobazo d+hag/ dzam snying gzhi ta nan mo/ shar shar zil mo/ lo thog gzhom pa zag po'i las// thod pa stobs ba ldan pa / gzhan yang rgyal pa'i tshe bdag gis// gsung bzhin gzing ba 'di
64b3(rnying rgyud): lngaste// thams cad gcig tu zil pad+d+hi las// shog dugu bzhi na mnyams// 'khrul 'khor rim pa gsum du bskor// srid pa'i dus sgral ts+tsha bar bri// dbus su gru gsum gang gnod d+hi//
64b4(rnying rgyud): myig bcu drug ca ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu bzhi su bri cibs// las ni sna tshogs rtsa ba gcig/ zla kham me tog bsrung ba'i 'a0/ bcu bzhi bkod la skabs dang sbyar// khrag dang drug rngu tsha ba bsra/
64b5(rnying rgyud): thod pa dang bcab sbyor ba brtsam// zhag bdun sngags bzlas drag tu bskul// lha bsgom bkang rten 'og tu gnan// sngags kyi rtsa ba gnyis su \u0f7f/ bcu drug bcu gnyis rdo dang shes// rig pa do bas
64b6(rnying rgyud): dang badz+ra phyis sbyar// drag sngags myong ba 'di ny-i / oM ka hU~M dra na la mar shi na mun dri sha ye+eb+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba dA dr-i an na gze zung srung rnon thog la tshogs rbang / drag sngags mngon du ltung ba'i rgyud las/ @na
64b7(rnying rgyud): lag gi sbyor bang bdu ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sngags yongs su srid pa'i don 'di gsung mchos su byang chub sepas// phyi gag med pong por gdapa//
65a1(rnying rgyud): bcos pa chen ldan gyis kya// smre shes cig yodang 'ardzogs// thabs kyi rgyal pad+mo yid/ gsang ba yang skye sa rtogs pa'o// drug spyugs kya mad pa gad ngas// kun tubang
65a2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis spang // bde ba'i lam can gzhan las min// ye shes rig pa snang bar spyad// rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon srung 'di// ma 'ongs dam ldan spang byed na// da yang dam las mi g.yel bsrung // 'aN+DI bdag dgas pa stobs
65a3(rnying rgyud): kun// dam chog bka' yi 'khor lo kyangs// e ma ho rig pa'i bka' rgyad 'di// bde ba'i lam can dag pa dang // mA bsgribs lam la gnas pa dang // 'chi bdag tshogs kyi dge 'dun kun// rig pa'i lam la zhugs pa
65a4(rnying rgyud): dang // 'chi bdag dregs pa myos pa dang // 'joms pa'i tshogs dang khrag phyogs tshogs// phung byed mngag pa gdug pa'i chags// 'khor na gnas pa'i dam can kun// sangs rgyas bka' yi rgyud 'di zang // gnyis med
65a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa la gnas// rdo rje gtum podzo da'i tshigs// rdo rje khri khrag 'thung dang // rdo rje gnod sbyin srin po dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang // da la la gnas shing ma g.yel spangs// sangs rgyas bka' yi yon tan badz+ra
65a6(rnying rgyud): lang // che ba'i yon tan gsum dang gcig tu ldan// khro bo'i snying po dregs pa ma mo drag po dang // bcu dang sum sgril rin chen phreng ba ltar // dam par sbar la gnyen po gcig tu bsgrub// dbang sdud phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin gzir/
65a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho me dang 'dra// rdzogs pa stobs chen phyag rgya brtan byas la// snying po bcu gnyis rtsa pa gcig tu dril// yan lag gang 'dod su gri thems// gang dung sbyar na rin chen snying po 'bru// bsnyen pa gsum ldan bde ba gcig gi dang /
65b1(rnying rgyud): snying po bcu gnyis mi 'gyur thig le la// bsrung ba'i rgyal po dmar len mtshon dang sbyar// gzir ba'i snying po gang yin mtshams su 'pho// rnam shes 'phrog pa 'bru gcig snying la bsdu// mtshon dpag dka' na skye med nam mkha' dbrog/ shes la rkyang
65b2(rnying rgyud): deng sbyor ba'i tshad dang ldan// 'bru brgyad rtsa ba gang dmigs su grir ldan// 'dod pa'i don bzhi snying po gcad nas dbrog/ nyes la gnod byed mtshon cha rang gcod de// man ngag ldan pas bde bar spyad na no// rang sem stobs ldan ye shes rig
65b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsal// 'ching med grol bar thar pa'i lam mchog 'bras// de med rang 'ching mnar med sa la rings// thabs med spyod bral gded med bgrod ma thob// zla ba re dang yan lag brda' mi sbyor// sun 'byin grol med 'ching ba'i gnas las
65b4(rnying rgyud): bzod// blo yengs che ba'i yon tan bsam mI lang // grol ba'i phyag rngu yang dag 'phags lam ldan// 'di de bde dud sbyin par byed pa'i mchog/ sa ny+tsa so ma ha// mi tha ril taHrI/ nag de war rnam// ya ma kA yi bde ba 'thod // ma dag bya bso/
65b5(rnying rgyud): shu ta// ye shes rig pa'i klod du brdal// 'di dag bde ba'i lam can de// smin cing bgrod pa'i thabs mchog rgyal// a yi ye shes las byung ba// skye med rnam dag chos skur gsal// a yi ye shes las byung ba// drag po sreg byed nam mkhar gsal// sangs
65b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas skye ba'i cho 'phrul lo// bde ba'i lam can snying po kun las 'das// nor bu gser ldan rin chen rgyal sa thob// bka' yi bden pa bde ba'i dngal bzhag/ ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la/ 'khor rnam rjes su yi rang ste mngon par bstod do/ 'khor de dag gis
65b7(rnying rgyud): bden pa mthong bar gyur to// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // dpal gshin rje'i rgyud khri drug stong pa nas/ dreg po rnong pal mtshon cha'i skabs bton pa'o// snying po man ngag gi rgyud rdzogs so//
66a1(rnying rgyud): rtag skad du/ many+dzu nAn d+hiHta shad+ha guh+ya tar+tha/ pad skad du/ 'jam dpa' thub snying gzar gsang pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rnam pa'i rgyal po gdug pa ga pa la sgru ba dal phyag 'tshal //
66a2(rnying rgyud): donas rdo rjesnying po yis// rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa'i tshogs// kun nas kyis dang ba'i gyur te// 'de chen yab la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho sangs rgyas kun dang bzhin// rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid// skyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// mtshams
66a3(rnying rgyud): yas ngan sung spyod pas// nang dang gra na dri ma yin pang // sa yings drag pa dz+ha la'i dong // 'dra'i grongs la khyab pa la// srung ba'i ris pa brgyad du gsol// de nas cag rgya chen po yis// ban chags la// gis tshig
66a4(rnying rgyud): dbod pa yis// bcud lnga'i snying po gso lar mitshig/ 'khor la ngas par dkra' thung te// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid // mtshams med las dran kur spyod pas// mang yams drag po nyam dang // nad ni rngam pa gsum yin te// spyi dang khyad par la
66a5(rnying rgyud): sdom par gyur pa kun nyams dang // mtshams med nye ba'i rnam sbyin pas// gnas ngan ltung ba'i rigs dag la// las kyi nam sprin nad 'byung bar// drung mabris bang kan 'dus pa yis// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i
66a6(rnying rgyud): 'du ba smin pa'i nad 'byung ba'o// rigs dang rang gi glang thabs las// rtsol ba byad kyi gtad khram dang // rang gi gnas su ma phyin log/ de lnga'i byin las byung ba'i nad// rkyen gyis bslang ba'i nad 'byung ba 'i// de yi nad rigs bstan pa
66a7(rnying rgyud): sngags dang sman gyi spar ba bsdebs// grags la phan gnod mtshor bangar // sman gyi na gnod che ba na// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad dang bas// 'tsho byad ldan gyis bcos pa // dgas rnams 'dres kyang phan gdod med/
66b1(rnying rgyud): yang na phrab gnad meng // de ni nam sbyin las yin pas// 'dus bstsu / d+hA tsi nas b+hA// sngags la pan gnod na byung da // bas la ldan gnang mapon na// tsun+ta nag grags kyi sbyong ba na// nang pasgral dga' ba dang // nub
66b2(rnying rgyud): na nas nyid mi dga'// lus la tshe ba'i khrag skyes pa// gru la nad kyis zin pa'o// de la gdug pa'i nang dang drug/ rigs bzhi gdol pa kha 'khor // 'dug pa nges pa'i tshad mas brtag/ rgyal rigs mgo nas 'jug par byed/
66b3(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yas la 'jug/ bram ze lag pa g.yon la 'dug/ dmangs rigs rkang pa g.yas la 'jug/ gdol ba gang pa g.yon la 'ag// kha 'kho lus la khyab pa ste// dag sngags 'khor los drug drungs ga don// kyi 'jibs rgyal
66b4(rnying rgyud): rigs sa yi dug/ grang ba bram ze cu yi drug/ tsha brje rigs me yi dug/ yang g.yo dmangs rigs rlung gi dug/ nad kyi mtshan nyid do shes na/ snying gzer 'khor lo gnyan por gdon// rtags med klu yi gdon gnod na// lhag rgya bas
66b5(rnying rgyud): gtan cho ga bya// kun nas zhugs par gyur pa la// yang gsang thugs kyi 'khor lo bskor// rang bzhin drag po btson thabs kyi// dug gsum nad dang zhen chags dpral// bsam gtan byas kyi cho ga dang // phyag rgya chen po'i sbyin sreg bya/
66b6(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpral khro bo snying gzer gsung ba'i rgyud las/ sa yams kyi nang brtags pa'i le'u ste skabs dang po'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sa yams drag po'i nad de dag gi gnyen po/ drag sngags 'khor lo 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba lus
66b7(rnying rgyud): kyi snying po ni// shis la tshan che rdo la myur// klad du che la rgyal po 'dra// pra gri dum skabs kyis te// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze dang // dmangs dang gdol par gyur pa dang // bsu ta dang 'phye bo dang // rkang gcig gel pa mgo mang dang /
67a1(rnying rgyud): gdug pa med nga sa yams dang // stod kya thams pa mgo dgra ta// sang dgas pan gnyan tha dgas// gra bdud sbyin la sogs pa// ma moN+Dalu ba btsan mngonan// las dang sto ba stobs kyis
67a2(rnying rgyud): gtsang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa gsum 'dul gyi gsang rdzogs 'di gsungs so// e myags ya dzu bas mya ga shasha ka d+han// e ka hUM du na ya ma snying khrag dra ma tsa ya/ sa nA ga tsota ri mugs rbad/ khrig la myags tI yaM shag rbad/
67a3(rnying rgyud): drug phyung thAg sheg tsid+ha zad/ khaM shag bru~M ri la dz+wa la rmugs rbad/ tsatri mA ma dbugs la zang gzer zad/ sa nA gA rtsa la hur bru~M rbad/ srog la thun chad b+h+yo/ sa nA ga ma hA ga snying gzer zad/ sa nA ga tsatri snying gzer nang / sa nA ga d+ha me snying gzer chad/
67a4(rnying rgyud): sa nA gak+She Ni snying gzer zad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga khaM shag snying gzer rbad / saM nA ga srog snying gzer zad/ sa nA gA b+ha~M snying gzer zad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbyar nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer dza/ sa nA ga snying gzer dug phung nan
67a5(rnying rgyud): zad/ sa nA gA snying gzer tsitakhas nan chad/ sa nA ga snying gzer byin nan nang / swa nA ga snying gzer du re nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM bzlog nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog lan na/ sa nI ga snying gzer tsit+ta phyogs nan dzad/ san+ta ga
67a6(rnying rgyud): snying gzer thu mi ril nan rbang / sa rbA ga skyeng gzer tsal nan rbad/ san+d+hu ga snying gzer ya nan 'drid nan nad/ swa nA ga snying gzer beng shAg nan zad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsik+ta khas nan rbad/ sa nA ga snyid gzer khrag zabs nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying
67a7(rnying rgyud): gzer srur nan rbad/ sa nAM ga snying gzir hi nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer u nan tan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer e nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la dun dun nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta thums nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer du ya
67b1(rnying rgyud): mag rlan drang / sa n+tag snying gzer snar nan drang / sanA ka s+t+rai gzer 'dri byung nan cang / sa r+d+hag sting gzeng srog la phyogs nan zad/ sa rta ga snying gza nga nan dang / san+ta ga ting gzer la bzlog nan thad / sa nA ga ting gzar tsa ldanan sa
67b2(rnying rgyud): rA ga snying gzer u nan rbad/ sarba du raM a nan 'drid phyung snying gzer Ti ril shag rbad/ he sa ma ya thi pa ra ya sa nA ga snying gzer gyur nan/ sa nA ga srog la dun dun shag/ sa nA ga tsit+ta bruM ril shag/ sa nA ga rtsa la rbad bruM ril shag/ sa nA ga dum ling shag
67b3(rnying rgyud): la nig srog pa hur thu mra ri la shang // sa rA ga snying gzer sbar nan dr-i ril shag/ sa nA ga du me ma ma srog gzir zad buM ril shag/ sa nA ga tsa tri shU la gzir nan hU~M ril shag/ sA nA ga nr-i tre yaM shig nan gzir br-i ri la shang // sa nA ga srog la br-ing shag mr-i ril rban
67b4(rnying rgyud): dun dza/ sarbA sa snying gzer sarba u na ni gzer phyung zad/ sa nA ga du raM i dan 'drid gyang tsit+ta snying gzer b+hai ri la shag rbad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer zad/ sa nA ga duM ling buM ril shag/ sanA ga duM ling bruM re la shag rbad/ sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha zam srog da
67b5(rnying rgyud): krung nan 'dring phyung tri sha ga rbad/ sa nA ga/ tsit+ta ro lcags rbad/ khrag sa myogs ti rbad/ srog la mugs ti rbad/ dug phyung khri shing zad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga ma trig snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga tsa She snying gzer tsit+ta rbad/ sa
67b6(rnying rgyud): nAg sIng gzer sbrang nan rbad/ sA nA ga snying gzer skur 'dri phyung zad/ swA nA ga khaM shag bruM ri la hril myags rbad/ tsa tri ma ma dbugs la phreng gzar zad/ rtsa la nyur thu ma zad/ srog la thun zad b+h+yo/ sa nA gra dzaM la phyogs ti rbad/ khaM sha
67b7(rnying rgyud): hU~M ril dril phyogs zad/ sa nA ga duM ling buM ril shag/ sa rA ga rtsa la zad b+hai ril shang // sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myag kha zam srog gzir srung nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad/ sa nA ga steng gzer lhung nan drad/ sa nA ga ma thag snying gzer zad/ sa nA ga tsit+toro lcags
68a1(rnying rgyud): zad/ dum mthogag par nu la shag ca \u0f7fga nga la shag/ sa nAg du lcag zung ci la shag 'du/ sor+than tham gagasang la shA// 'jug pangs par bgags pa// rdzag sags 'thal nga /
68a2(rnying rgyud): re res gdon// rtags rnams 'khrugs sam kun nas zhugs// shi zad drag sngags bcu gcig pa// nod pa la mtshon cha'i drag sngags bsdeb// sa nA ga d+hang / pri du me srog paphreng breg/ rtsal dun dran sbar nan khaM shag zad/ sa rbag srog la thed/
68a3(rnying rgyud): phreng du dun tI la nA ga dzaH/ sar+b+ba ga srog la phreng phreng rnga dzo d+hi ra la shag/ san+tag srog pa hur dun dun buM la shang // sanA ga tsi t+ta b+hai r-il shag/ san+ta ga rtsal rbang thAM ri la sha // sa nA ga dr-i ling khas tsu ril shing // sa rA ga srog la b+h+r-i la shug/
68a4(rnying rgyud): nAg le nan ci la shing // sa nA ga steng gzeng skur nan po ril shig// du ma maM mog gzing TI la shag/ tsani shul gzing na tha~Mr la shig/ don ji yang shig rgan garji tha~M la shang // ngag sdigs med dpal 'khor lo mthod // gdug pa'i ngagashed rang bas
68a5(rnying rgyud): babs// 'khor lo med pa'i mtshon chen gyis// bdag / srang gzhan skyob bstan pa'i yul// yang gsang thugs kyi sngags su bshad// 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sngags kyi le h+ye steskapas gnyis pa'o//
68a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po sngags kyi rten/ drag po rdzas kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// lha phyogs dur khrod ros dang // phungs gsum la dug chus sgra// grug khung gru gsum sdug tu brji// kha dog drug po sdang gis bskor// dung
68a7(rnying rgyud): ras sa ma rgya shog la// dug khrag tsha ba'i rdzas byugs la// mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum thig ma gsum// 'khor lo bzhi gnyis bzhi gsum bcig/ phyi ma phyags mkhang
68b1(rnying rgyud): rdzog par ldan// shi rgyad kun 'joms ba ye// rgyal rigs 'joms pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa rim gsum dbus// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsardza ba'i sngags// rdza sdug dkun snying po mchog/ rtsibs rkyen bcu drug shImra da nga gas/
68b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rigs 'joms pa'i 'khor lor gsungs// mu khyud gsum la gu gsum dbus// byi rim kyi gram cu ba'i lus// nyi shu gcig rtsibs phag mo'i lhor// bram ze'i bu gnyan 'joms par bshad// chu khrud gsum la rus sbal sbyor// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis
68b3(rnying rgyud): rtse sdug 'dun// dmangs rigs 'joms pa'i 'khor lor bshad// ma khyud gsum la grwa gsum dpas// su kyang bcu gnyis bcu bzhi rtsibs// gdol pa'i rigs 'joms 'khor lor bshad// mu khyung bzhing 'brib gnas bzhi// rgyagam rtsa ba mtshams
68b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor khro ba sgor thong par brug// 'ing+ga 'brug drung ga na rgyal gzhug/ byang dkang drug khrag thun brab// zhag grangs nyi shuH gcigatu// drag po'i 'khor lo nyin mtshan bskor// b+had+ha mI yi tshil bu dang // khyi ga spang ki'i d+hakA pa dang // mdo tol rje
68b5(rnying rgyud): skya dang ni// ra dug re lcag thar na brjod// nya sbrul wal pa'i sha dag dang // gu gral nag po'i dud pas 'dug/ mgrol khrag myos pa'i khrag bzla ba cing // brtul zhugs rdzas dang mtshon cha'i dpal// las rdzogs 'khor lo phag thod dam// sri tsa
68b6(rnying rgyud): tha~Md per rab thubs la// bka'i rten byin can 'og tru ga nan// gzhan yang gdug pa'i nad zug na// baspu dang byug pa'i sgor ba ni// sbrang zug tshor ma gla chu dang // skrod dang tsha sna btsod khwa dang // ra dug 'od rtol gu gul dang // ka ra bi dri chen dang /
69a1(rnying rgyud): ga pur tsan dAn kar chu dag/ mu zi d+hi chen ldang ros dang // ti tsa mar dkar ba zla dang // gu grul dug rag zhob bsu// ra dzA r+b+ha tshwa kha rtsa tshwa// dadug pa spudri chen dang // ga zung grwar gum pa zla ba su/
69a2(rnying rgyud): sha ro ldang ngos dbyi mo tshe// dur byid sna tshogs thabs kyis sbyar// dug dang mu zi skad chu bsku// byug dang bslu ba'i rim pa'o// gla cirtsi sgog s+ya sha chen dang // dri chu dang ni zil pa la// brtag pa gsum byas sngags bzlas la// khong du btang
69a3(rnying rgyud): bar yang drag bshad// 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gyi gsang rgyud las/ rdzas dang 'khor lo'i le'u ste skabs gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po zil gnon 'di gsungs so// thog mar shes
69a4(rnying rgyud): rab rtsal rig la// stong nyid snying rje'i rang bzhin las// skye 'gag med pa'i ye shes gsal// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bkrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rngams// 'khor lo rdo rje ral gri dang // be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub
69a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar// rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dpal chas brgyad// phyi nang srog gshed sprul pa dang // sgrol byed yum dang bcas gsal bas// sa bdag klu dang gnyen dag gi// snying ga la sogs sngags 'phros pas// gdug pa can gyi ltod dkrugs te//
69a6(rnying rgyud): srog dang rnam par shes pa kun// thod pa'i 'khrul 'khor chen por 'chang // 'khor lo yig 'bru me dpal dang // chu rgod sbyin thang rlung nag 'khrugs// ri rab mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yis// rigs bzhi'i dug rnams 'joms par byed// gdu
69a7(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i 'khor long brgyad// rnam smin tham la lus nyid bye// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo lo// dbus su ye shes chos kyi sgra// phyag za pa gnon gsal ba yi// sngags kyi 'ong zer mtshan cha dab la// 'thos pas dbugs kyi kyi deng nas/
69b1(rnying rgyud): dngas ma' \u0f7f dang thun dang // sha nga pags paras miganas// na dang dag rnangs kun nas// bad+ma brag la sogs nas// srod ma nga ba mngag phywan// 'thun par bsam shing shes pag ngan// nam ldan gzhan lhas ngas/
69b2(rnying rgyud): lnga// sngags kyi 'od zer 'bros pas ni// baspu'i bug dgung thim nas// sngags kyi dbugs kyis nang zhi nas// blugs la mun pa sel ba ltar// ye shes 'od kyi gong byung bsam// myos pa'i khrag dang mtshon mjug/ drag po rdzas
69b3(rnying rgyud): lji dubya yis// gya dang gnyan dang sa bdag dang // ma mo rgyal po btsan ze'u thang // klu bdud mo dang dam gri dang // sdod blar gyur pa la sogs pa// rang rang gnas nas srog 'phrog ste// myos te 'khrul 'khor skyo bar bca' // bas mA ga tan sems
69b4(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor long bshad/ 'jam dpal khro bo snying gcer gsang ba'i drung las/ dbang sdu 'khor lor bstan pa'i le'u ste nga sa bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan tham pa'i cho ga dang / phyag rgya chen po sbyin
69b5(rnying rgyud): sgeg gi tshig 'di gsungs so// maN+Dal dzi dang me tog mdzes// rin chen bum par rin chen bcud// 'bru dang spyan tshogs dri dang ldan// gtsang ma gza' skar can ci Ta// kha rkyen mgul chengs rab ldan ba sham// sngags pas zil gnon sur bsgom
69b6(rnying rgyud): lo// thugs kyi snying po 'phros 'dus las// bum par phyag rgya'i lha tshogs bsam// drag sngags brgya bzlas bstim zhing bzla// ye shes chu dang sngags kyi zer// spro zhing lhal pas zhan chags spong // bsam gtan bsrung ba'i spod pa bshad//
69b7(rnying rgyud): lartsag rgyags la pa yis// gas sngags gsal bas ma byud dag// ye shes gong thar bags lag// thugs la 'khor lde'i spang bar bshad // rna ma tog pa ga chags sbyin la phra// nam mkha' la thang 'do mngon// bsam gtan seM /
70a1(rnying rgyud): kyi sbyang bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag rgya sems kyi bsam gtan gyi sngags 'di gsungs so// sar+b+ba \u0f7ft+ta ro myags kha zla srog gzir sbyar nan 'drid phyung khri shag chad/ kha chings rgyal po gas ba
70a2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ bsam gtan 'phrul gyi srung bar bshad// phungs gsum gyi thag khung ni// 'khyor gsum pa gru gsum brtsig/ kha dog nag pos byug pa'i dbus// sna tshogs rdo rje lnga dgra mangs// gang gnod sa gnas rdzas rnams la// ga
70a3(rnying rgyud): pagasum dang sdong tha bri// snying ga gdug cing rab tu gces// ming rus grog sen gang ba// dug gi ril b+ha brgya rtsa brgyad// mai rta khyi dang gdug pa'i shwa/ dug gsam tshil gsum gri hang bcas// til dang yungs nAg tsha'i gsum// ma
70a4(rnying rgyud): 'o ma sme ba'i khrag/ nyung dkar rdo phye lcags zangs phye// bsreg rdzas rdzogs dang rnal 'byor bya// thab khung raM las me lhar bskyed// thugs kar phyag rgya'i lha gsal bar// rdza sa dang ling+ga dbul bar bya// pho nya gtad zhing gdab pa dang // drag
70a5(rnying rgyud): sngags bzlas shing bsreg par bsam// sa nA ga du ri nA ga U nan gzer phyung srog la du raM/ tsit+ta breng shag bruM rbad e raM/ sa nA ga snying gzer du raM e nan 'drid phyung / sa nA ga tsit+ta thi ril rbad/ dz+wa la ri mA ra ya phaT phaT/ ces pas gdug pa bsreg par
70a6(rnying rgyud): bshad/ thal ba gnon cing gzer bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang ni bshang bya ba// nyon cig khro bo rol pa'i tshogs// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin dag/ sbyor ba rnam pa gsum gyi bsdeb// bsde ba dang rkyang ba nyams kyis brtag/ brdze ban
70a7(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i snying po la// spu gri mtshon gyis sngol mar bsdeb// bag chags zhen pa khrus kyis spang // gdug rngu basbyor ba me yis bsreg/ las dang sbyor bathun gyis bzlog/ 'byung ba 'khrugs pa sman gyis bcos// zhes gsungs te 'khor la gdams so//
70b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'di dpe gcig las bskuras mdzad//
70b2(rnying rgyud): 'ja mdapal zabo rnying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bkru ba dang sreg pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste skabs lnga pa'o// / snying gzer gsang ba'i kyang rdzogs so// phra byung dug cu rtsa gcig/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud / 'jam dpal gshin rje 'bum
70b3(rnying rgyud): dam par 'akod pa las/ gdug bkra 'dul byed le'u bkol ba'o// bal po'i rgyal po bas ta dang / bod kyi yod+mo bsrung na sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// / rgya ga wA dang / sarba bi R+Sha sha ta g+hAk+ShA ma/ bod skad du/ drug
70b4(rnying rgyud): po zung byed kyi chud ces khyab/ rdzogs pa chen po na gi ti la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ rika ri ka bya rkang phug don zangs phrag zhes bya ba na/ dregs pa lha'i bdag po bze nag po zhes bya ba/ mu stegs rnam bzhig dul ba'i
70b5(rnying rgyud): don che dang / dka' thub sbyin slong mdzad pa la/ gdug pacu gzhan mang po'i sgra sgrog pa byung yang / yid chags shing g.yo ba med de/ ka ri kA'i thazang rnams nas bathor ba la nagasum byas nas/ rdo rje'i brkyang phyag btsal te/ mgrin gcig tu
70b6(rnying rgyud): pa/ e ma'o// dregs pa chen po lha yi gtso// babs la mkhas pa'i thugs rje can// dregs pa chen po'i bka' bzhin 'gyid// ces smras so// de nas de ma thag tu bdud gcod byed nag pos/ drag po mtshon cha'i char 'di phab bo//
70b7(rnying rgyud): trag rak+sha kha la yi shud/ snying la 'dus 'dus/ pra tsa la tha tsal bu ba tsika thub tsi ka phaT/ ces mtshon chu'i char 'di phab ste 'di skad ces gsungs so// drag po chung ba 'di bzlas kyis ma spangs khyed rnams thams cad kyang / deng 'dir las rnams
70b8(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin gyis/ zhes gsungs te mi snga bar gyur // drag zi ma byed kyi snying las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste sa po'o// / de nas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// rdzogs pa'i 'dag po lha bdag
71a1(rnying rgyud): du 'phrul ba dag pa slogs ngag/ zags drug gas dbupa zlas// spang ba na pa nags pa ste// drag 'ad ba pa / lags// ngas ltu rnan par// byung bab// sang pa 'jas rnams de ltar lags/
71a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i lan ji ltar bzang // rdegs pa chen pos bka' brel pa// drug po dbab pa gnyis yin te// rigs ma rtse 'dus srin gyi dbyibs// de ni 'argyal badzad kyi gnas// sngags sgo yin pa bai dring sin gnod sbyin bsngags// zhes gas
71a3(rnying rgyud): so// snang bka' stsal pa/ sra shid kyang bsnam babrel la// tsar rog pa'i srog d+ha gla dgas// zhag gsum bskabs nas cing gnyis// de kyis mgo nga phyogs sa bskul// sngags senan tan smang pa la// len sngags kyis
71a4(rnying rgyud): ra bzi// sum bsgril gas sgo yin+da zhes bshad// rang tsa shu ti pa tsaka tsa la mi ma tsal/ rag la shAdz+wa laM/ dza li shan shang kA ru shA rtse/ rag srin gyis mu rus khas zang / drag po zlog bslab 'di yis ni// las rnams
71a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dang yis bshad// 'khrur la gyi ci du sa la lha dbang // srog chags rnams la bya ba'i phyir// srog lha dag lha dbang drag cig/ de bzhin rdzas la brten zas te// rabs chad nag po'i me long g.yon// gser dngular gan 'khar ba
71a6(rnying rgyud): zhing // bcu gnyis bdud noman chad yid// dum bu gsum pa'i nang du 'asreg/ lin gang la 'dod pa'i dbyibs// rdzas chen pos ni zab cing dgug/ sngags kyi nan tan shes par bya// dzag ser 'dod pa 'di ltar bya// tha ba na
71a7(rnying rgyud): grong myong btsu// chu ga dkar po can ni 'grub pa'i gnas// bshan mthong thogs ma bzhi dgrag/ dzas ni rtsa mig dmang mgo ru bsngal// thog seng ji ltar 'dzings mo// las rnams 'grub par bcol ba'i phyir// tham
71b1(rnying rgyud): nag po mchod par bya// dgug pa snying po'i sngags kyis bya// gnod sbyin lag na pho so rnon pa dmar po yis// sngags kyi dam tshig 'di brjod do// rnal 'byor chen po skal ldan gtso// las dang skal par ldan pa yis// gdeng tshugs
71b2(rnying rgyud): phul la bya// de min gyis ni bya ba min// byang nas lho ni gsang chog yin// zhes gsungs te// dam tshig 'di gsungs so// ma mo gnod sbyin thams cad kyi mthu dang byin gyis rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod pa ltar du grub par gyur cig
71b3(rnying rgyud): ces nas 'di gsungs so// na mo ru tra ya/ mi hr-i hi ri bri sha du/ kA la tse ba la ti ti li ling shar/ mdzor ta ba ho/ si ri sha ri b+ha ra ka ti/ gr-I pa ting / rak+kakri ba ta ya/ ta ra tsa ta ra tsa/ ir tse i ra tse/ pa sau ra/ sha li paM
71b4(rnying rgyud): ka ra/ du ma shwan tI punan du ngur chud/ kA la dru pa tsa 'dir chums chums/ srin gyi byar sad swA hA/ zhes pas gnod sbyin pho mo la sogs pa la mgrin gcig tu smras nas 'dod do// dag po phung byed kyi rgyud las thog sder dbab pa dang /
71b5(rnying rgyud): drag po phung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// dregs pa'i bdag po lha bdag gtso// srid pa ltud byed phrin las gang // sa bsla dbang pa de bzhin bsgrub// de yi rdzas rnams ji ltar bsog/ de
71b6(rnying rgyud): bdag lnga yis bka' stsal pa// srid pa sbyar byed 'khor lo la// las kyi ma mo thams cad rdzogs// 'bras bu thams cad bcud len ma// lo nad rims kyi mda' bdag mo// de yi dkyil 'khor 'di ltar bya// dug sna tshong bar bsags mas te/
71b7(rnying rgyud): gtsor ni mu zi nag pos bya// de yi phyogs bzhi khu re ba do// rus sbal po 'og nag po la// de bzhin lab sum snying ngo rje// gling bzhir rab mdangs kyis 'byar// phyag dang dang kyi gur tha ba zhag/ 'dzam gling nyi me krung bum stod pa
72a1(rnying rgyud): sas// / sa na smras na/ smra du // mas /
72a2(rnying rgyud): gyur/ das sa 'dzi nag chags // zang gas pa gsa'i shes par \u0f7f/ kyis mthugs // ri dang mdzan byen yin// gig ga smrapa las she dran kyi gas / nan
72a3(rnying rgyud): gdod pa'i // gzhon na ra drug pa bya// mtshan sa khyod bya klus/ dgu pa'i sa brngub pa / gdung la kyi 'i la ban/ rdzog pa'i ltas na tshogs sogs/ dmakyig dzig pa
72a4(rnying rgyud): mas
72a5(rnying rgyud): drug pa zad byed chung las/ gas sung dag pa 'dzin tan da sbyin gi zhi na/ denas myang ba sa bka' stsam te// srin ma thong ba 'di ltar NA~M// khrigasum mthong nag dbus sa srung // gragasum ma
72a6(rnying rgyud): tha~Md skam gzhag// rtsa ra srona'i sdig pashegs te// sngags dang 'd-i smad par \u0f7f// gshed gi rab rkyen myo dmang bcing // de nig rtsa gcig zung drug nas// srin mo bdud kyi sngags kyis b+ha/ drar drung shal su rba bahe ba/ dun
72a7(rnying rgyud): sha khrag khrig khrag la yA/ rna la ma rnal te gsod la rngam// sris la med mer chums zad dza dza~M/ de bzhin drag po 'di yis bzlog/ ces gsungs so// drag po phud byed kyi rgyud las/ srin mo phung bzlog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
72b1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thams cad bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// thab zab nag mo 'di ltar bcag/ dur khrod thod pa mtshan na la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i ling+ga bca'// sde ba gsum gyi snying khrag dang // drug snga tshang mar
72b2(rnying rgyud): bsog par bya// dkar po gsum gyi sbed bu gzug/ chos bzhi'i bskur sbrang man chad nag/ zla ba zer ka yan chad du// drag po'i shing la me sbar te// drag pos ji ltar 'dod par bsreg/ thod pa phyogs su gril nas kyang // bsnyen dang
72b3(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur sngags kyis bya// bsnyen thun nyid ni rdzas dang bya// ces gsungs so// drag po phud byed kyi rgyud las snying thun zor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i dmar nag gru gsum la//
72b4(rnying rgyud): dbus su du ti'i thod pa gzhug/ mu zi nag po gtsor byas te// dug sna tshang pa bsog par bya// gtsong ni me yi zil pas bya// gzhan yang khrag sna tshang bar bsog/ dme pa rog po'i snying dang grod// snying ni kha ma phor nang du gzhug/ grod par mthun pa'i
72b5(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnams brug/ dbang bskur sngags kyis bsgrub par bya// drag drag gur len ser ser tu btub/ e be sha tra be sha/ ru be sha kha thun b+h+yo/ sa thaM sa thaM/ shog thaM shog thaM/ baM mugs thaM mugs/ ni tiSh+Tha dza la kha'i/ dang po gsum gyi sngags kyis
72b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub// gdong pa rdzas kyi 'khor lo gzhag/ bdun dgras ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub// / da la yams chen po yod par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// drag po grub byed kyi rgyud las/ ma mo phung gsum me'i drag po phung bzlog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
72b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'bras bu nag po'i rdzas rnams dang // nag po mthun pa'i sa blangs te// gleb nag po ni khrag dang bsres// mthun pa tsit+ta gtang bar bya// gang la mthun pa'i ling+ga bya// mi rus za lhag khrag gis bris//
73a1(rnying rgyud): man na da// / sna / // gam na/
73a2(rnying rgyud): dam
73a3(rnying rgyud): ma nas na ma na/
73a4(rnying rgyud): na/
73a5(rnying rgyud): na snya sa
73a6(rnying rgyud): na ces ka' la// gag / sa/ nan pa ma sa drams // gtung/
73b1(rnying rgyud): gruthul dkar nag dang // kar+b+ba n+ya ga tung mthus nas ni// drug cu bzhi pa'i nang dra ba srog/ bstod mdzod dag ga 'di yis dpab// rdzas rgyan 'di mis zad par bya// dzAsnyan nyi ma bzang ba dang // drug zan sna ca 'in nga // rgan
73b2(rnying rgyud): 'i rjo na // phrin las bzhi yid dkyil 'khor gi/ 'dus la lcib min la dbang // de bzhin gyigs ts+tsha shes par bya// nang dri lan med pa la dgod// lto ba gnyis kyi snying ba rno// dbus su gdug pa'i snying ba// gsun gyi bar ma
73b3(rnying rgyud): dbang me ng+ge 'd-i ste// na pa'i gakyis bsgrub pa ga// mod padris pa maldan nga / ma ched yang sa// ra ga ba kyi// ga rnams gsag n+d+ha// ma mar 'dzin pa'i byi ngas pa// sprul
73b4(rnying rgyud): la ba'i nyis theg bsong // rdzi dam pal gyis kha gIr+thad la// dag sngags 'di yis drig phyur / rtag dun trai li shad seM dz+wa la sh+tsa/ oM ba shra ma~M ki d+harA mi shig ki dz+wa la nyi/ ma tsi hi swAhA/ brgya'i ste thod par gan ba
73b5(rnying rgyud): thun ni g.yas sam gyogs sa 'dza/ rdo 'phrul ji ltar 'dod pa 'am/ zhes gsungs sa/ drag pa phrang byed kyi d+hang las dzin las tshe 'brel gyi le'u steg tu pa // / de nas ya mi nang cho 'phrul 'di gsungs so//
73b6(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnams 'di ltar bsog/ ya tsa dkar po'i lcags rnams dang // bya las byung ba'i zis pa dang // me yi zil pa rdo dang lcags// slar ba lag tu blangs nas ni// mthun pas de bzhin sa bon dbyung // de bzhin rdzas mthun bsreg pa
73b7(rnying rgyud): bya// gsung chen sol bas rdzas de zhib tu btags// gagon nag po bsgrub pa'i rjes// me 'ong dkar po gra gsum bri// de bzhin rdzas rnams thug par bya// sgrub pa de bzhin ya tsal// rdzas kyi dbang bskur gshed chen gdags/
74a1(rnying rgyud): yanga' bdag gtsug pung can la ba kang // de bzhin dag par bladaH// rtsed shing rdog shing dran pa'i gang rnams la// rje gsum pa yi rmi phrug bdag/ sngags kyis spar bar bya ba yi// zhes drag sngags dang /
74a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// s+phar ma smas tsar du na re tsog ri ma la mdun yaM/ shing rI du rur cog laM/ zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ drag po stag hom gyi rgyud kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces
74a3(rnying rgyud): di sa rgyud / da dzin nas sbyis// gzha dang gis gcing ba / deni yun lag rgyu pa gyur/ gzhan mdu pa'i rgyas byungs// rigs padadag gis sbyin pani
74a4(rnying rgyud): dang na dag gagram// me dpal drag pothor ba 'byung // shabab can rgyams bcos paraH// rol la sa dugs lta gyur ba la// cig par ste shi ltar brjod// de rnams bcos pa 'di sa \u0f7f// dmachog bslaba'i byas nas ni// ga
74a5(rnying rgyud): po rnams la// skul mgo dgu 'am bdun pa dang // lnga pa gsum pa de bzhin bri// gzhan yang longs spod sna tshogs bri// shing sna tshod pa gsog par bya// 'bras dang mtshal dang sna tshogs sman// de bzhin gzhan yang bsag par bya// glang bu
74a6(rnying rgyud): dam ba zal dmar ngas// gzhan yang zal chags dag la ni// mdangs ldan brgya yis rdul bcan// chu long me long dbul par gang gis// dang snga tshang ba re la brgyan// bris pa'i longs spyod de dag gis// las kyi 'khor lo nag pa la// de ba
74a7(rnying rgyud): sung pa bya// rten 'brel sngags kyis yang dag dasug// de nyid bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan// blang ma'am ni mo rigs shing // brgya'am 'grang le rten mtshamarje// de bzhin gang pa bskyon par bya// zhag bdun rnang par rdzogs ngan bskar//
74b1(rnying rgyud): dbang nga bya bathab sa// sras mthor bar gyis drug zhug// mthu rgyad rnal mas dbang batha nga// na ba 'jug par thugs rgyas 'ang// zhesugs sa smra/ drug bzang za pa kyadu la sa/ mdzung mnyin na 'du
74b2(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dam tshig gi sngags 'dig yongs so// chu sbrul thang yul gdug pa yi// khrag skam nyung dkar gya grul nag po yis// ming bri bdug dang brdeg par bya// de bzhin gdug pa'i gsobarta gzug/
74b3(rnying rgyud): rig nang du gzhug par bya// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis nan tan bya// sgrub pa drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas// drung drung zeng zeng / sha la yaM/ sho 'ub khyed/ sngags longs/ srog chod cal 'dus 'dus/ snying sha srog la rbad chad/ ya ya rna la marnal
74b4(rnying rgyud): dze/ ting 'gyur 'dus zad nI dza/ zhes gsungs so// rngag po phung byed kyi byung las/ drag po phreng bzlog gi le'u ste bcu ga sdam pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i dmu rdo 'di ltar 'phang // rdob smin
74b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngag khra bzhi// lcags dang 'khar ba dpung dus mgo// drag za'i snod du bsog par bya// thAl bas kha bcad rang gi 'og/ sngags srung nag mo'i dgug sngags kyis// dgra'am bcu gcig bsgrub gyur na// de nyid 'phar dang ldeg par 'gyu
74b6(rnying rgyud): kha dog chang pa'i 'bi 'bir bzhugs// drag sngags 'di yis gra ba par bya// dzag hr-i de l+le dral gyi ni ya bral/ ma mthag bral/ thug pa/ nr-i mtsho tsho phob/ thub thub bi ba shig shig/ bi ba nag po de la ma/ de nas yang 'di sad ces
74b7(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal te// gagon nang du 'in gzhug/ drag po 'di yis gzir bar bya// drug sde tshang ba 'asogs byas te// thab pag gon nyid la'o// bsreg pa mchog gya yi sngags// chu mig ngo ru 'asreg par bya// zhes gsungs so// drag po rdzar
75a1(rnying rgyud): khyed kyi rgyud las/ da mdzo dbab pa dang / klu'i drug sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khwa'am shA na'i kha nang du// drag po'i ljags kyis gnan par bya/
75a2(rnying rgyud): stag sbyangs las la mngags pa yin// mthun pa'i ling+ga dug gis bri// khyi bya kha khrid ming dang spel// de bzhin ka ko'i gzugs byas la// stag sbyangs las la btang ba'o// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ stag sbyangs las la/
75a3(rnying rgyud): btang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal ni drag pos gsad pa'i phyir// lha klu mi gnas pa nyid du// drag po'i tsher ma bsog par bya// gzhung dang mthun par dkyil 'khor bri// dgra bo'i lin

76a6(rnying rgyud): ha zhag bdud ba sgrub paT+Ta// ma sbyin par du wa zhing gab// gA ya chen po dbyer phying // gal te rnal 'byod srid bslab 'dod// gang mogs dpa ril bu gzhug/ rdo ba dkar nag nyi shur// de yi nang du bgrang rlung bya// mtshon chen gyi shu \u0f7f gcig la/

76b1(rnying rgyud): gsug/ bzlas bya dang pa pa lan// brnam pa la/ myur nga thang pa/ blang ba tan gtul/ 'dunaH pa la ya/ byangs byas/ rdzas chen bsgrub pa pas byu / kA da pa bzhin du 'thab// rjes gsung su/ dA /

76b3(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin pa so rgyas par zags te/ dgyes pas ho zhes gsangs nas/ rkyen me tog gtor te/ thaM ti sa m+b+ha ya ti/ zhes ny-i nyid na 'cheng du// da rdo rjegasang pa'i bral na 'jug/ ngargyal rdegs pa brtul nas ni// bzod cig yangang
76b4(rnying rgyud): bang chen te// bcom ldan thugs mchog bstan la gnas// nga rgyal 'dul gyir de yi ched bzung ste// yun ring dus na 'tsho bar 'gyur// de nas skul mchog las rab la// de nyid du ni gnas par 'gyur// bstan pa bsrung mdzad dbang dang ldan
76b5(rnying rgyud): gsang mchog dang po'i sa la gnas// gtsor ni de bzhin dmachog 'dzin// rgya mtsho'i gting gi pha na de bzhin// bskal pa yun du khar me dbyung // dgos 'dod de bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma ni// gser dngul bya gang nang du thug/

78b1(rnying rgyud): kazan ma gdang bgazhag/ sha can yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yi badrug pa su btsun// s+yA du theg las mangs par bya// btsun lag gnyis pa gzha// da dang batshan dang po ldan// ngan pa nas tha las gardung// a dza
78b2(rnying rgyud): ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gnyis pa// che mchog he ru ka yi snying po ste// gtso bo'i sngags su shes par bya// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbul gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan/
