78b7(rnying rgyud): pas sbas// de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang tsatshan gsum par ldan// mtshan gsum pas 'og tu sbas// ka tsan yi ge dang por gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu sbas// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan/
79a1(rnying rgyud): ta tshun yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ya tshwan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ka tshun yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu smras// de la dbyangs mig bzhi bas brgyan// ya tshan yin
79a2(rnying rgyud): de'ang byis kyi ga gapas / de ma mas na ma / ga zhugs cugs ga/
79a3(rnying rgyud): chen snying por bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ pa tsha na yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de ngang tsa tshun gsum par ldan// ya tshanA gsum pas 'og tu sbas// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyad// mtshan
79a4(rnying rgyud): ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ka tshon yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yige gsum pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi
79a5(rnying rgyud): ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs phrig zug pas brgyan// steng du thig pas mdzes par byas// mtshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang na tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis gcad// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge ra
79a6(rnying rgyud): dku pa// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu 'i// gasdang sngags snying po ma 'khrul pa// phur pa rtsa ba'i snying por bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ thams cad kun gyi dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhi// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu smras/
79a7(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta chen yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig 'acu gcig brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yig lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// ta tsha na yi ge
79b1(rnying rgyud): pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge dang pos sbas// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ sa tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de dang tsa
79b2(rnying rgyud): na lnga par ldan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pas sbas// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yi ge drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yi ma gcad/
79b3(rnying rgyud): oM a kro he ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hAny+dza hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu bdun pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// sku yi snying por bshad pa'o// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ ka tsha nA yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yi
79b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs lig drug pas brgyan// pa chen yi ge dang po gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thag lces
79b5(rnying rgyud): mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang rnga tshan dang por ldan// thams cad kun gyi dang po gzhag/ rin po che yi phra yis gcad// oM kA la rU pa hU~M phaT aH/ gsang sngags yi ge dbu dgu pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po ma
79b6(rnying rgyud): gsung gi snying por bshad pa'o// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ sha tsha na yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu sbas// de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// rin po che yi mu yis gcad// sha tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ Ta tshon
79b7(rnying rgyud): pos 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas bgyid// rin po che yi phra yis gcad// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bdun pas brgyan// ta tsha
80a1(rnying rgyud): yig dang pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lngapa gzhag/ slar yang ta tshan lnga pa gzhag/ sha zan yig bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yi gadrug pas brgyan// sbyang du zhig las mdzes par
80a2(rnying rgyud): bya// ba tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi hA yis gcad// oM d+hIHSh+T+r-i She kr-i tA na na hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu gcig pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed po yi// thugs kyi snying por bshad pa'o//
80a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ sha tsha na yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tsha ni yi ge dang po bshad// ba tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan lnga par ldan// de dang tsha tshan gsum par ldan// de la dbyangs yig lnga par
80a4(rnying rgyud): ldan// shi tsan mig dang pa gzha// ma tsan gsas pas 'og tu smras// de la dbyangs yig pazhipas bcan// ba tshan la ga la pa gan// de la dbyangs mig zhubs brgyug// rkyen ma gdang pags/ ya man gsang bas dbyu sa/
80a5(rnying rgyud): ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang pos spras// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ rin po che yi phra yis bcad// sa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/
80a6(rnying rgyud): tshan yi gi dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan//
80a7(rnying rgyud): sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ rin po che yi phra yis gcad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ @
80b1(rnying rgyud): yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ mtshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de dang tsa tshan lnga par ldan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum par ldan// de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge dang po gzhug/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu smras
80b2(rnying rgyud): de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang pos spras// ka tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po
80b3(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// co tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de nas dbyangs yig bcu gcig gzhag/ ka tsha na yi ge dang po gzhag/
80b4(rnying rgyud): tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// de nas tsa tshan gsum pas brgyan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ rin po che yi phra yis gcad// ta tshan yi ge dang por gzhag/ ya
80b5(rnying rgyud): tshan gsum pas 'og tu sbas// de dang ka tshan gsum par ldan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang ka tshan dang por ldan// sha tshan yi ge dang pos sbas// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga bas brgyan// ta tshan yi ge
80b6(rnying rgyud): dang po gzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu sbas// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ tsa tshan lnga pas 'og tu smras// de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// de dang ka tshan lnga par ldan// kaM tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ ya tshon
80b7(rnying rgyud): yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dag ka tshan gsum par ldan// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ ya tshan dang pos 'og tu sbas// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// rin po che yi phra yis gcad// ya tshan yi ge
81a1(rnying rgyud): gams pa gan/ dadag/ nag ma na/ lag lags na/ du gzu sa sog cags / na shAn// smra nga la rgya gas/ ldan 'anan chung
81a2(rnying rgyud): de la dbyang yig thabs brgyan// de dang bzhin rdzun/ tsun lag gsam pa ken/ sbyar pa tsan gsum pa gan/ tshan mo ni gnyis pa gzha/ ya rkyen yi ga bzhib bzhag/ ma tshan yigs pa// hUM \u0f7frna ma ga
81a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan/ de la dbyangs leg gsum pas bcad// mtshan mig bzhi pa gzhag/ ya mo dang pos rig tu smras// de la dbyings yig bachags bcad// mtshan mi ga dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ga bzhi pa ga 'ag/ de la bya sa yig 'dra
81a4(rnying rgyud): bcan// de dang ga chen lnga par ldan// tshan yi ga nga sog // de la dbyangs yig gas sa ngas brnyan// dedag tshad par ldan// na mig gsum pa gzhan// pi tshan mig sa pa gzhag/ ma tshan meg bzhipa gzhag/ mtshan du
81a5(rnying rgyud): pras// de la dgrangs yig bcugasas brgyan// pa tshan yi gegs ma pa gzhag/ ya tshan dang pos 'og tu sa// de la dbyangs yig brta ga sul bar+d+ha naM// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ tsa tshan la gle gsum pa gzhag/ rin pa
81a6(rnying rgyud): tha yis gnad// shA tshan yi ge gsam pa gzhag/ tsA tshan wabs 'og tu sbas// de la dbyangs yi ga gas ma pas brgyan// de dang gi tshan lnga par ldan/ ka tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ ma tshan ma ge gsum pa gzhag/ de dang ka
81a7(rnying rgyud): dang por ldan// pa chen yi ge wa pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ga gsam pa gzhag/ de 'og mtshan gsum pas spras// de la dbyangs yog brgya gsum btsun// dwe dad+ya ka ts+tsha nA gA sam pa dA wAn+ta// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ pa tshan yog
81a8(rnying rgyud): de yan gyi ma ma da tu du sogs la sngags pa du re re las mabyung bangabya
81b1(rnying rgyud): nga'adod thugs babral mthung bas chung/ shog 'ang sngags padu la nu/
81b2(rnying rgyud): pA gzhag/ ya tsha dang pas byag thams// da la dgrangs lag bcugasam bcad// brtan lag bzhi pa gzha/ ma tshan da pos lag tu smras// da la dbyangs stsog brtags pa brgyad// don po rgya mtha ma sa gcad// oM sa mA ya
81b3(rnying rgyud): shwe swa dza ya m+ba n+ta// ts+yaita ngan d+ha dzaH/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI yaman+ta ka ya ma dA tsAm ma e kAng ti \u0f7f/ rdeg dza dkA su snying kha ku ma ma g+hon+do/ raka la~M ta ku mdzu kha la matin+ta / ya ya lon can dag ma ma d+h+ya d+h+wa dza ra/ ste pa dag mo srog la d+hoT+Ta/
81b4(rnying rgyud): gseng sngags yig dathab rgya rtsa wa pa/ 'jam dpal gshin dzig shed po yab yum gyi// yon tan snying por bshad pa'o// ye shes 'jogs dbu dra gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge wA pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la
81b5(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ta tsha na yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig ba tu gsum brgyan// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan//
81b6(rnying rgyud): yAtshan yi ge dang po gnas// ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum btsun// ya tshon yi ge gsam pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs
81b7(rnying rgyud): yig lbu pas brgyan// Ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ mtshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ ta tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ ya
81b8(rnying rgyud): chen yi ge dang po gzhag// de la dbyangs yig bcugasum brgyan// ta tshan yig wa pa gzhan// de la dbyangs yig gsus pas bstan// mtshan yig gsem pa gzhag/ ya tshan yi ga dang po gzhag/ ka tshan yi ga dang pa gzhag/ de 'og sha tshan gnyis
82a1(rnying rgyud): bas// ga mas shAg // ga dang pa gzhag/ nga pags// gas/ tu /
82a2(rnying rgyud): ma tshan gyi ni dang pa gzhag/ chen yi ge dang pog zhag/ chen gnyis pas 'og tu smras// ta tshwan yi ge lnga pa gnag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas bgyur// mtshan yi ge ge sum pa gzhag/ bcan m-i hU~M lang gan
82a3(rnying rgyud): yatshan yi ge dang po gzhag/ shra tshan me ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de 'og dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// sted du thig les mdzes par byas// pa tshan yig gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang na tsha chung por ldan// i ya ma rnadzes do me la/ @
82a4(rnying rgyud): Na yo ya/ yang mo ni ra mak+Shi ya/ yaT+Te yadz+dzi Ni rA ma ya d+hi phaT/ yid bzhin no dbu lta bu'i sngags// gsang ba rin chen thugs kyi gter// yig 'du sum curtsa gnyis pa// mgo dang mtha' rten gnyis dang lan// 'khor lo 'ad
82a5(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags 'di// 'jam dpal ga shin rjegasheng ba yi// byin las sngags kyirtsa bar bshad // ye shes lnga rdzogs dab drug zhag/ 'tshan yi ge gsam pa gzhag/ de dang co tshan gsum par ldan/ thog mtshan gsum pas smras/
82a6(rnying rgyud): tshun yi ge dang po gzhag/ de dag/ tshan lnga par ldan// Ta tshan yig gsum pa gzhag/ sha chen yige gsum pa gzhag/ mtshun yi ga gsum ngag zhag// de 'og batshan gsum pas sbrel// tI tsha yi ga gsum bag hA // de la da
82a7(rnying rgyud): ga' pas brgya/ shatshan mog gnyis pagan ngog/ ngagi rgyan nga chub mi sring ga'adri tshu sa na ma mgre nga na/ 'dradra
82b1(rnying rgyud): lagagasas pa gdun/ gnan log pa'i ga gzhag/ brgya logadang bga'/ ga dang bgan/ na migs pa gnan/ dal sangs sog gas btud// dastong thog pas 'angs par \u0f7f// ngad+ha du/
82b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang rnga tshan dang por ldan// mtshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang natshun dang por ldan// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa gzhag/ de 'og ya tshan gnyis pas spras// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// sha tshon yi gi
82b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// rin po che yi phra yis gcad// oM badzi tsaN+Da sarba trAShA na ta ka ha na da ha paHdr-i hU~M phaT phaT+Ta swAH/ gsang sngags yig 'brunyi shu gnyis// phyag na rdo rje gtsum po yi// pra 'i snying por ba dang
82b4(rnying rgyud): ba'o// ye shes 'jogs dang drag nAg// tsa tshan yi ge dang po gzhan// de dang cu chen lnga par ldan// Ta dz+nyAn yi ga gsum pas klas// bai chen yi ge lnga pa gzha// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// ya tsAn
82b5(rnying rgyud): ge gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum btsun// sha tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ Ta tshan yi ge lnga pa gzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig jug pas brgyan// de snyed thig les mdzes par byas// pa tshan yi ge
82b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang rnga tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis gcad// oM badz+ra tsat+ta ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT// gsang sngags yig 'gu bcu pa 'di// phyag na rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// gsung gi snying por bshad pa'o// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru gzhag

83a2(rnying rgyud): na
83a3(rnying rgyud): su

83b1(rnying rgyud): mag nga mgadag/ da'ags can gsum par dradu// dal dbangs yog bcugasam brnyas// ta can mgagasam gunag/ gcan ma ga tug gnan// del dbangs mi gangs pas sa / mad dbyig las 'angs srung ba//
83b2(rnying rgyud): du ma rdzam/ na mama'i ma yis ga// man mo/ N+Dal/ sa rdzogs mige tungamamathas dbang brje pas/ nan ngan// pa gas
83b3(rnying rgyud): gas pa ga dag/ garjen yi glegs pa pa gzhag/ mtshan yi ge gsam pa gzhag// de la dbyangs mig lnga byas bstan// tshan yi ge gsam pa gzhag/ sha chen yi ge bzhi pa ga nag/ de la dbyangs yigazug pas d+ya /
83b4(rnying rgyud): trig ses mangs par bya// ya tshan yi ge gnyis pa gzhag/ de dang na tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi tha yis gcad// ga r+b+ha Na hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge 'bru drug la// gser gyi bya khyud rgyal po yi// gas dang sngags kyi snying por bshad/
83b5(rnying rgyud): yi kye 'bru 'dra ba'i lerje ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal ga shin rje gshed pos zhus pa/ me ma 'dre gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi bye brag nges pa rnams// 'gro la phan gyir bshad par zhu// zhes zhus pa dang /
83b6(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ che mchog nye ru ka yi snying po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// lu yi snying po yin par bshad// pad+ma dbang chen snying po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi snying po yin par bsha
83b7(rnying rgyud): gzhin du'i nyi po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi snying po yin par bshad// 'ja ma dpalag shin rje'i ting po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yon tan rnying po yin par bshad// phyag do nga'i ting pan/
84a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// zin las stong pa yin par bshad// tha khrung rgyal bang rkang ba ni// tshogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thabs cad kyi// shin las snang ba yin pa 'byu// su gsung thugs dang ya
84a2(rnying rgyud): dang // yin las dag dang ldarnams ni// re re la yang wardza ste// sbrul lnga ste gsung la lnga// prak+ku la wa ste yon tan ma// zin las dgu la lnga dru bshad// zad par thabs na gas bas te// sngags ni thams cad 'grub par da// rig pa sems kyi rung ba
84a3(rnying rgyud): las la sngags pas sngags zhes bya// khyad par thams cad gas pa ste// sngags ni thams cad 'grub par byed// sems kyi dranu pas bzung ba ste// kun la bsngags pas sngags zhes bya// rlig pa sems kyi thig le ste// len pa'i phyir na spang
84a4(rnying rgyud): bshad// sdang ba lu yi rang bzhin la// bskur ba'i phyir na phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs de thams cad kyi// gsang ba sngags kyi snying po la// srog ces bya ba'i ming yang med// gsang ba srog gi snying po ni// me rtag chos can yin pa'i phyir// 'a
84a5(rnying rgyud): pa la gnas pa'o// gsang ba sngags kyi nyid po ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// thams cad kun la gnas par bshad// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud kyi ma las/ sku gsung thugs son tan phrin las rnam pa lnga dang // gsang sngags dang /
84a6(rnying rgyud): rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags dang / snying po dang / phyag tu dang / gsang bsrog gi snying po dang / gsar bsngags kyi snying po rnams bshad pa'i khre'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas kun tu bzang po la/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyis
84a7(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i don srang du// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sngags kyi 'brel ba ji ltar lags// kun bzang yab kyis bstan du gsol// zhes byas pa dang / ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka'astsal ba// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa
84b1(rnying rgyud): riragaban du 'di rnams la bi ti a to gang 'dun
84b2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi se bangs bshad kyi// nyon cig 'jam dpal ga shAn rje'i gshed// oM badz+ra kro t+ta r+m+ma k+ShA da NAM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bI dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ni kro d+ha nI la dat+na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M phaT/ oM prar+tha kro d+ha Ar+tha a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hA ya grA Sha
84b3(rnying rgyud): oM ba gron sa par ngo/ t+pa la/ a~M ba po d+ha am+b+hi tI Ta r+b+ha d+hi phaT/ oM bA bo ti nI la b+hA bi dzA ya bru~M phaT/ oM bAdz+ra mod+ham tra ba la dz+haM Ta/ sa pa rnams ni phyogs bcu ga tsho ba chen pa bi r+b+ha 'i gsang ba sngags kyi phreng ba'o// las kyi sngags kyi bye
84b4(rnying rgyud): dang mthun par bshad/ de nas yang dag bshad b+ha ba/ oM shrI he ru kA/ kro d+hI shwa d+hi s+t+rI/ g+h+r-i ha he phaT/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu b+h+yo/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu b+h+yo/ ma ma yo gri nI ru lu b+h+yo/ nyid bzhi mu kha le d+hI shwa r-I b+ha ga pad+ma ra ya bde klong 'dus 'dus snying dza sha yu
84b5(rnying rgyud): ba rtan / ni
84b6(rnying rgyud): padz+ra bi d+ha ma ta ye/ badz+ra kha rAg bi d+ha ma to ye/ badz+ra sring 'gro bi d+ha ma to ye/ badz+ra A ka~M ba dz+ra ako/ padz+ra t+ta'aM/ badz+ra nI la/ badz+ra la nata/ badz+ra zang 'gram mA raM na/ badz+ra zang 'gram mu raM shwe/ badz+ra ba dag snyid kha rag/ dza ga r+yaH/ rA kar kA kha mun rdza sa
84b7(rnying rgyud): dun tra ba rak+Sha/ pra ka ra tiShab+h+yo/ pa shI bA ti shaM b+h+yo/ b+ho b+huM ka ro ka/ ba rota d+ha rota/ ni la chu mi ha/ kha T+wAM ga/ da la tsa la/ pad+ma tsAn+da/ ma nur ga to/ ting saM tid si/ e A ra li/ nu byi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ mu b+hi ru lu b+ho/ nu b+hi ru luTo/ thAg
84b8(rnying rgyud): drag shA ma ste \u0f7f/ praT+TiN+Di \u0f7f/ pra sho / / badz+ra ga nyi to/ blo/ grub ti \u0f7f/ \u0f7f/ a d+ha maH/ tal dunaH/ mahA hA sIH/ rabu kyi/ ga n+d+had+hIH/ pit+tiSheH/
85a1(rnying rgyud): brda maH/ askaMt+taH/ sarbaH/ dAHdaH/ rASh+Tab+hUH/ na/ shwAH/ ra ti ba \u0f7f/ rba rti mat+taH/ e kaHrat+nats+tsha// man tarats+tsha/ sang+ga kaH/ b+h+ra ma \u0f7f\u0f7f/ ma ma Na na/ badz+ra a gartAH/ ba
85a2(rnying rgyud): su ta nAb+h+yo/ ba rba Sh+T+rI b+h+yo/ mahA kA lI dz+ya/ badz+ra tsaka wi b+h+yo/ badz+ra kr-i \u0f88\u0f90 saN ho/ badz+ra la s+pho dang b+h+yo/ de rnams nem mojug cu rtsa brgyar 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags su shes par bya'o/ las sngags gang b+he sti dang mthar par gsungs pa
85a3(rnying rgyud): de na laM yang dag bshad bya ba/ mA ma snying khar kA/ mA ma rAH/ rag mo nyid khrag mu mthun tAn/ tha ga ska ma snying te ko/ ma mgyo b+ho/ Ta lu ru lu b+ho/ snying kha dag ma/ ma mas ma ya daM ngo / zu snying kha k+Sha ni zang tsu li ho/ snying kha dak+Sha ma
85a4(rnying rgyud): gas sa gas pa ska bas sa smra sa s+ho/ des mang ga / gag
85a5(rnying rgyud): shes par bya/ las sngags skyed nga mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma thag da klA mun+ta kha mung+ga du war+tha luts+tsha b+ho/ rakro ti tu dzadzaH/ kha la ma he b+h+yo/ ru lu ru mu h+ya/ dwe ni e ka Ta ti sgrol byed ma'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags ts+li
85a6(rnying rgyud): mthun par gsungs/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ ma thag ra k+sha tsit+ta.a du nan da dzaH/ de ni dkar mo 'bum gyi gtso mo nyi zla thod phreng can gyi sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs// thag dag thig cig tsi d+ha thing hring dza dzaH/ de na
85a7(rnying rgyud): mo 'bum gyi gtso mo sdug ting rgyal mo'i sngags lnga shes par bya'o// las sngags kyi dang mthun par gsungs/ ma mdzag dkyu pra bi sha dzi dzaH/ de ni nag mo 'bum gyi gtso mo nag mo'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags kyi dang mthun par gsungs/ dad
85a8(rnying rgyud): gas sor bzhag/
85b1(rnying rgyud): rmo ga mo las kha gcig sa dril bar byag// de nas yang dag bshang thub/ rdang ngang pa la sna thag ma nga/ dan su mnag ma ma ka'i sngags sa shes par bya'o// las rtags kyi dang mthan par gsangs// de nas yang dag bshad thab//
85b2(rnying rgyud): raH/ ma thang rba 'a dran hU~M/ rag so kA dran to/ smyug lcags dran dun chung ning / lhag lcags rgya dran byo/ ya thAnA ya shri zad tu bram ze nag mo / ru wa tsa pa la d+ha ti kle sha phaT// dza sod sod/ dran dun nying du la yadza/ du ru dza la ri ha d+hadza/ nga ma h+nA /
85b3(rnying rgyud): de rnams ni bdud kha nag po bzag med dang / srin po kha 'bar 'og gya dang / bal mo sun gsum dang / ma mo phrang zed ma'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las lcags kyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshang thab// suM badz+ra rakA te te ke te trag
85b4(rnying rgyud): zang zangang / ma ma dag mo rtag sha shre/ nAg du ma ba la b+h+yo/ baM sha me ge du d+ha ma shing ga dz+ra ba ting / rA hra la sa dza gror gro steng ca sha mA la to// rag mo dag mo du ru ro ru tsa pa la snying pa rag ma kyi/ rag mo dag mo/ tsab mo tshab mo// brag la su sha moH/
85b5(rnying rgyud): ma rag mthag mo shig shig snyeng kha rag mo b+hi/ rag mo snying rtsa la rba rba tsa ba snying kha dag gu si ta na ma shag mr-i shwa ga madz+dza/ de rnams ni srin por k+Sha nag po grog phreng can dung sbyin mo phag mdo// khrag mig ma dang / gza' gdong mi srid lnga'i sngags su shes pa
85b6(rnying rgyud): bya'o// las sngags spri dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sa tri ma ya// ba tse tra yo gI shwa ri/ ma ma tsiH/ dung dun dzadzi/ de ni bso mo snying ban ma bzhi'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags ste dang mthun par ga
85b7(rnying rgyud): de ngas yang dag bshad byag// ma hA kA la dra ba'i sdus/ a tho ba/ mahA pa shatan/ na rag sa ha sarba thAta ma pa ma/ yam tshan dun du / de ni 'tsho bdag gshi rje nag pa'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang bathun par gsungs/
86a1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad byapa// mim ba / na/ de ni dbang ldag tshon pa'i grags su shes bla na'o// lasnasngags sri dang mthun pa dgas sa// mAH la ga ya da d+han/ den na ra gas rnam na
86a2(rnying rgyud): hA shes par bya'o// las rdzogs kyi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad byab// maran cang rdung thal nA~M/ de ni ya bdud pan gyi gtso bo nag po ma'i ba rnangs can zhes kyang bya// zhes rje ngang dkar zhes pabagyi/ ya'ang kyi sa lo nas kyang bya
86a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i chags su shes par bya'o// las sngags sde dang mthun par gsungs/ de nas yang dag bshad byab// bi ha rarAH dza/ de ni srog gi bdag po chel po la byin ta tI'i ljags su shes par bya'o// las ljags kyi dang mthun par gsungs/ de nas yang
86a4(rnying rgyud): dga' shad rgyab/ su ru ber dza NA ShA dzadza/ de ni gnod sbyin srog bdag gi rgyal po gnod sbyin ma du tse'i ljags su shes par bya'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ mug da kyi ril/ ti gas so ba de/ ban rtsi la ba'i/ badz+ra kA li kI la ya/ tri sha ra ka ral
86a5(rnying rgyud): wi/ badz+ra swA tra sa ma ya/ ra 'dze dzo dun b+h+yo/ de ni glo bur dang ye 'jogasam bcu drug tu'i bdag po ging chen po rdo rje legs pa'i sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags spyi dang mthun par gsungs/ de nas yang dag bshad byab// sarba
86a6(rnying rgyud): dza/ don rdzogs pa'i lhas na skye bcang kyi sngags su shes par bya'o// las sngags smi dang mthun par gsungs// de nas yang dga' shang bya ba/ kAl ti btsa/ thA ga raH che go mo t+ti kra la s+ye shan thos zos zhig shrIg rdza ma rnam/ thA la r+tha ya/ ku nag pas
86a7(rnying rgyud): dpung chen po dzaH/ de ni mdzend las kyi 'khor lo'i sngags/ 'chi bdag nag po mgo dgu pa'i sngags su shes par phyir// 'di yi las sngags rnam pa gsum// rnal ma bzlog dang lhod dkug gsum// shin tu gsang ba'i 'khor lo bskor// bka' ga
86b1(rnying rgyud): chung sde ji steng du// gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams cad la/ 'di bzhin kun la shes par bya'o// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi phreng pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas
86b2(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gdan las bzhengs te/ lag pa dang / mgrin pa dang / mgo bo dang / rkang pa dang thams cad kyis gar gyi brda sna tshogs pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la gsol pa/ kye ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das/
86b3(rnying rgyud): sere ba zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ lo yi nad ces ji ltar lags// klog ces bya ba ji lta bu// 'byung ba rlung zhes ji lta bu/ de rnams 'byung ba'i dus rnams su// ser ba 'byung ba nges pa na// dus kyi char pa 'byung ba'i tshe// ser ba med pa ji ltar
86b4(rnying rgyud): lags// ma bsrubs par yang 'bab gyur na// bsgrub nas nges pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan bdag la bka' drin gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal khyod nyon cig/ ma 'ongs rnams kyi don phyir du// nga yis/
86b5(rnying rgyud): khyod la legs par bshad// ser ba zhes bya de nyid ni// sngags kyi 'od zer bas ma pas 'gro// ma mo mkha' 'gro las mkhan nyid// mkha' 'gong ro 'brug gi sra// gzi ma dngas glog tu 'jug pa yin// de yi ba rlangs srin du 'byung // de
86b6(rnying rgyud): srul pa ser ba 'bab// des na se ra ba'i sgra dra nges// dbugs ni 'byung ba rlung yin te// shin tu dgra la grang bar 'byung // 'dis ni ser ba'i sna yang 'dren// 'di rnams ser ba'i sla ru nges// klu yid ro 'brug gi sra ru 'byung // de yi gzi
86b7(rnying rgyud): klog tu gyur pa' tshe// de yi kha rlangs sprin dang nathun 'thibs// de yi sprul pa char pa dag tu 'bab// 'di ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhi grang dathugs// dpedon gnyis su de bzhin khyad par che// de nas ser ba'i ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// 'khor lo rnam pa gsu/
87a1(rnying rgyud): drangs// snying gar gnam gzer nam mkha' 'khar lo can// rnamam pa'i dkyil 'khang shin tu zlum zhing 'thil pa las// dbus su dz+nyAn dang sbyang du 'aM// 'og di la dang shwar du shadra// oM d+ham bkang chu byar 'a
87a2(rnying rgyud): ngul bkod steng skod to// thams cad byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin pas// gzas pa'i yul du de bzhin gang bar bsgom// bdag rter ri rab 'khor lo tsan// ri rab chen po shin tu brjid pa la// lte ba ngas yi mjal bsgom// yig 'ang 'gam
87a3(rnying rgyud): gong bzhinaH// sa gsor zhing yul lde phreng 'khor lo can// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo can// 'dababacad dbus su bum zhing 'khyil ba bsgom// yig 'bru bkod pa gong bzhin skur// khrag gsum nyung dkar rgyal po dang // sgying dang ku phu la dag pod
87a4(rnying rgyud): drug sna gsum la spyad byas nas// ser ba'i bu bzhag ri wa b+ha// shes rab can gyis 'gyur ba dang // shes rab chung na gsum du nges// dang po la ni nyi ma shar sbyar te// gnyis pa la ni chu chu 'ab ba'ang// gsum pa la ni bya rgong gzan la brgya
87a5(rnying rgyud): pra 'dra// rngag po sngags kyi 'od zer las// bdag nyid ye shes tshogs kyis gang ba dang // rdzas rnams mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs kyis gang ba gnyis// yul gsum gshed ma'i tshogs kyis gang ba gsum// dbyer med gcig gi ngang dugs la//
87a6(rnying rgyud): gangs la chu ba'i sa byang sa ngas pa ngas pa shes gas/ skyes sa ni kyi ngas de sa pa ga po nga po / sa byangs nas
87a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs// thod pa 'grol la 'chog cing 'od byung na// gzer gyis nges par 'bebs zhes rgyal bas gsungs// phur ga 'phang zhing 'od byung bur gzer gdag/ bzla pas gang ba ces nges par kyal bas gsungs// nyung dkar 'phar zhing sngags sgra mang du sogs
87b1(rnying rgyud): gang gi yul du phran gyis phab gyur na// nyung thun 'bebs zhes nges par rgyal bas gsungs// ser ba'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'o// ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las// ser ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal//
87b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa/ kye ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// thog gi de nyid bshad par zhu// zhes gsol pa dang / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// rdo rje thog gi rnam pa ni// lo grangs rtsis kyis shes bya
87b3(rnying rgyud): gang zhig rta yi lo byung na// drug po sngags kyi dngos lung myur// sbrul gyi lo'ang de bzhin no// gang zhig bri ba'i dus kyi tshe// de tshe 'di bsrub ma yin te// phag gi lo yang de bzhin no// 'jug tu mi 'drod dus byung na// ta yi TA ba rta yi dus// yul gyi
87b4(rnying rgyud): sbrul gyi dus// nyi ma'i dus tshod rtsis la 'jug/ gar 'bebs sa yi tshod der yang // gzer gdab pa yang de bzhin no// gang zhig dngos grub 'byung ba'i tshe// rta lo min pa'ang de bzhin no// ming gi rnam pa so so yang // las kyi 'bras bu gcig pa ni// don
87b5(rnying rgyud): g+h+r-i man ngag gcig yin no// thog la dbye ba rnam pa lnga// dang po gser gyi thog yin te// gnyis pa la ni lcags zlog go// gsum bzangs thog yin pa ste// bzhi pa 'khar ba'i thog yin no// lnga pa la ni rdo rje'i thog/ mdor na rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/
87b6(rnying rgyud): ye rdzas rnams bstan pa ni// khrag gsum nyung dkar rgyal po dang // snying dang gu gul nag po dang // so na dang ni de yi grogs// gyi lag pa'i khrag gam ni// na chung ma yi khrag tu gsungs// 'di 'phang ba la rnam pa gnyis// drag po skags kyis 'pha
87b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // drag po rdzas kyis 'phang ba gnyis// drag po sngags kyis 'phang ba ni// mA ra ya la thil btags la// b+h+yo zhes rig pa grangs la 'phang // 'di la rdzas kyis 'phang pa ni// gri mo'i sra shad bur thog la// zhing gi ras bal dkyil byas la//
88a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ shes rab ga ya ba kang la// lan gas ma bskar la 'gangs thasu na// gang 'di gnas sna 'bebs pa dngas// 'ad ya nga 'don bstan pa ni// b+h+ring ga chos sbyi gal// me ya la thugs mdzan ma
88a2(rnying rgyud): rje mo nyid skor bstan pa dang // yi ge myong bzhag g.yas par ma// g.yon par ri bkod dkyil du dz+riM// de 'og byol de steng yi// dran gyis kun tu khyab par bsgom// mAr ya dang thogs zin// dz+wa la raM zhes mthar bzhag pa// gser byung ba yi dag sngag
88a3(rnying rgyud): yin// mayin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na// pad dkyil me yi 'khor lo ni// gong ma bzhin du bsam par bya// nyi shar lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'o ma rak+ta spros pa ni// bdag nyid me dpung chen po'i las// ting 'dzin sngags kyi 'od zer las
88a4(rnying rgyud): 'o mar nya so mazhu// mye tshong dkyis nas thang byas la// grong gims ca dkyi ladu bzhag/ khrel bad+ma snre la dang khrel// mda' lta bu mo ting 'dzin gyis// gang du gcig tu dril ba dang // gser thog rgyal ba'i ting 'a gyis// dkyil du brgya
88a5(rnying rgyud): 'phang bar bya// gang 'dod gnas su zhags par nges// 'di yi dus tshod bstan pa yang // bsrub pa'i dus tshod ta lo dang // sbrul gyi lo gnyis dus yin no// zla dbus kyi nges pa yang // rta dang phul gyi zla ba'o// nyi ma'i dus kyi nges pa yang // tang
88a6(rnying rgyud): sbrul du nges pa'o// 'jug pa'i dus chod bstan pa'o// thebs pa'i dus chod bstan pa yang // spen pas khams gser gyi dus// lhag pa phur pa rdo rje'i dus// mig dmar nyi ma me khams zangs dang lcags// 'di la las rnams 'grub par gdon
88a7(rnying rgyud): za// gshed mthog la dbang po'i dus tshang bstan pa ni// rdo rjes khams spen pa'i dus su 'jog/ gser dang la zangs sngags mig dam dus su ba rde// 'gro byeng lcags kyi thog ni phung pa'i dus su 'dzeg/ 'di la zor brgya 'thabs par gdon
88b1(rnying rgyud): mas sa// thams lags rdzu na ga nas ma sa na du gas sa na /
88b2(rnying rgyud): na pa'o// de nas 'dus dpal gshin rig she cesabacomaldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gas la s+ho// byed pa'i chen pa can ci ba byung pa lags/ la snyarnams thab pa 'ir/
88b3(rnying rgyud): rnams 'byung dugs pa// degad ces gsol dang / gan sa pan rje bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ mid las thams cad byed pa la// sngags kyis rnams ngas bshad kyi// 'gro la na bye byas pas nyon// ba gis bzhen pa dgangs mi
88b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad gagos par byed pa'o/ sa bsnyen par grangs pas ni// thams cad dbang dusrung par byed// laT kyis bsten par grangs pas ni// che ba'i che ba'i mthu dbang 'jams// rgyo yis bsnyen par grangs pas ni// thams cad las la bus rje
88b5(rnying rgyud): byed// ma mil bsnyen pa ga sa pas ni// sems cad las la 'dug par byed// gang da rigs par skrag nas ni// su zhes bya ba'i / 'arjod na// khams gsumanyams cad 'thags par byed// rdzogs thams cad spang par byed
88b6(rnying rgyud): nga ba gas so// 'gatha mgams// zad nigs mi gtsud pa'i chags sa// myu das sa pa// gamed pa'i gsugs yin pa shA/ rdul zhes kya ni// rig pa'igs sa shes pa //
88b7(rnying rgyud): byang ba rdzogs sa ming mi kyizhes pa// zhi nga 'a rjegs/ nga bgyi / nga kyang rdzordzogs pa ba / nga sa nga ga dran pa
89a1(rnying rgyud): an ta ya pa naces pa// dam pagags rnams cang gsang shA'o// Ag ma shes pa// skyes pa sag pa'i sngags sa bshad// u d+hA khrigs pa// blad med thams cang 'drazla pa ste// bas rdza
89a2(rnying rgyud): cad gi ba byed pa'o// sr-id+l-i su ru sA TA ni// thams cad rgyas par byed pa'o// wa shaM sa ru Ti zhes pa ni// thams cad dbang du spyod pa'o// thA ma ya dang rbad dang ya// dmigs pa'i mgo bo 'khor ba'o// las ni sorba bshad pa'o// rak+ta tsa ra yang ngo //
89a3(rnying rgyud): ya zhes bya ba ni// khrag tu byug par byed pa yi// las kyi sngags su shes par bya// mud tsa ya dang zad dang ya// dran pa myos par byed pa yi// las kyi sngags su bshad pa'o// mA ra ya dang zad dang ya// gsod par byed pa'i sngags su bshad/
89a4(rnying rgyud): b+ha ya dang nan zhes pa// maMnan pa'i sngags su shes pa'o// trig nan zhes bya'i sngags de ni// thams cad gzir ba'i sngags su bshad// tsit+ta nad dang nan zhes pa// drag po gzir ba'i sngags su bshad// rbad dang nan zhes bya ba ni// btsan thabs
89a5(rnying rgyud): gzing ba'i sngags su bshad// he mdun dang pho ba ces pa// ltas ngan bsgrub pa'i sngags su bshad// khu ba he dang phaT ces pa// ltas ngan 'phad pa'i sngags su bshad// li tsa rbad ces bya ba ni// thog dang ser ba gcod pa'o// dud phrom zhes pa ji ga
89a6(rnying rgyud): sngags ni// ser ba 'dril ba'i sngags su bshad// shar la b+h+yo yis bsul ba ni// ser ba lam bstan sngags su bshad// che ge mo yi lo tog la// A be shA ya a zhes pa// gzan la dbab pa'i sngags su bstan// raM raM zhes pa'i gsang sngags
89a7(rnying rgyud): ni// jog gi dril sngags dag tu bshad// dri la dang shar dang b+ho zhes pa// thog rnams dbab pa'i sngags su bshad// 'dus kyi zil dang blo dang po ba// thog gi 'phang sngags dag tu bshad// khrug khrug ye ya zhes pa ni// glog dang rlung gi ga
89b1(rnying rgyud): su bshad// 'ur 'ur chem chem zhes pa ni// 'brug gi snying po dag tu bshad// shing shing ku ru zhes pa ni// srin po gdong dmar snying po yin// che ge mo zhes bya ba ni// btags pa ming gi snying po yin// gsang ba srog gi snying po dang /
89b2(rnying rgyud): btags pa ming gi snying po'o// dmigs pas spras la bzlas par bya// rgyud nas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams la// mkhas pas 'thung dang 'jug pa dang // dkug dang rdeg pa shes par bya// bka' gsang chud sde ji snyed du// gsungs pa'i
89b3(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad la// 'di bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dzaHdzaHhUM hUM baM baM hoHhoH/ ha ha hi hi hu hu/ he he ho ho swA hA/ sa ma s+t+waM/ b+h+yo g+ho ya ya/ phaT phaT/ dz+wa la raM/ hU~M ri la/ hUM hUM/ rbad nang/ rgud tud/ sad sad/ zad
89b4(rnying rgyud): chud ling / brud TaM/ zad ye/ zad phaT/ zad shag/ zad myog/ zad ya/ zad thib/ zad myog/ zad myag zad chug/ rbad blud/ zad raM/ zad nan nan/ dru pa sang / thA ga sang / tsit+taM sad/ br-i r-i la sad/ rak+ta sad/ sti sta sid/ !r+d+ha sad/ ru pa
89b5(rnying rgyud): bA ga rbad/ tsit+ta rbad/ br-i ri la zad/ rak+ta rbad/ sit+ta rbad/ skaR+Sha zad/ zang huM/ shig byaM/ khas khas/ shag shag/ shig shig/ sad ya dubadzub/ rbad khas/ tshal pa tshal pa rbad/ sing tring dza / A She sha ya/ A be sha ya I/ pra de sha
89b6(rnying rgyud): phaT/ b+hin+na sha ya rbad/ badz+ra a du sha ya dzaH/ badz+ra pA sha hUM/ badz+ra g+ho Ta baM/ badz+ra g+haN+De hoH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ gardza ga sa m+bA ra ya phaT/ ha na ha na mA ra ya phaT/ da ha da ha mA ra ya phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa mA ra ya phaT/ b+han+d+ha d+har+d+ha mA ra ya phaT/ hu lu hu wa mA ra ya phaT/
89b7(rnying rgyud): teSh+Te mA yaM phaT/ hA tsan+da mAr ye phaT/ b+hin+da b+hitA mAr ya phaT/ s+phoT s+pho Ta mA ra ya phaT/ zan min phaT/ bran gyo b+h+yoT/ ha ya dza ya/ bai sha ta la ha la ts+tsha b+h+yo phaT/ e s+thaH/ raM sAH/ baM lAH/ sa? hU~M/ oM maH/ ya~M maH/ rai maH/ paM maH/
90a1(rnying rgyud): saH/ mchags sbyar sa/ mnags sngar yang / ga sa pa'an/ rnartag ma med pa du/ ga pa mad smralas/ ga tu sa dang / mAH su ru / ga sa ma
90a2(rnying rgyud): ge mo re zang / de ge mo mA ru sa phaT/ chege mo bached/ ba che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ che ge mo yu~M rbang / rje che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ oM che ge mo pA ra ya phaT me/ yaM che ge mo wA ra ya phaT yi/ raM chege mo ma la 'dzi / br-i ri ge mo spangs para'o/
90a3(rnying rgyud): mo sbyar pa pa waM/ kr-i bar la me che ge mo myur la laT// me lAka sha man la che ge mom+bA rA ya ya/ ko ShiN+Dal che ge mo ma r+ya ya phaT/ ra~M dz+wa la maHla che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ba~M ni mat+pa la che gI ma mA ra la 'a / su~M ste ste ma nyal che ge mo mA de Ta/ mdzu
90a4(rnying rgyud): che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ thang thang dza/ go ha ya/ che ge mo maN+Da la zad zang / nan steSh+Te ya nAn/ dA li pU ya/ dz+wa la ni sbyin ni ma tra man+ta shwa ri ran phaT phaT phaT/ ngan sngags gtsug lag gi d+had las/ sngags kyi so brgya dang lnga bcu rtsi gcig pa bstan pa'i
90a5(rnying rgyud): bdun pa ma// de nas 'jam dpalag shin rdeg shed pos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sdom pa de ga shegs bcom ldan 'das// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// nyams sa blang ba de ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang /
90a6(rnying rgyud): skyon po bran tu bzang pos bka' stsal ba// sngon du 'gro ba'i las dag ni/ rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes lha sI bsnyen bsgrub dang // 'jig rten dregs pa'i bsnyen 'drub gnyis// rnams su grang ba'i rim pa ni// dam pa la phyoshes pa
90a7(rnying rgyud): bcu ning bcu gsang brngu ba dang / gsang rkyen bab ba dag mi// yeng gas gtang byu / nga kyis bkra// lus byung ga nga rdzog la gyi can dag par bgyu // rgyal d+ha do ga
90b1(rnying rgyud): sa gang yangags gta/ / dang// chagalas snangs pa rnams// smrag zlab ga bang // ca sa pa bas// rdzas dang sngags da/
90b2(rnying rgyud): paklasas gyis de// ten 'brel 'jom pa'i nas mthu yis// las rnams 'grub par byed pa'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// zhi bzlum po dkar ma'o// byas pa kra bzhi ser po'o// dbang la thag ma dmar po'o// drag pa
90b3(rnying rgyud): 'bring dag go// rked dang mchod dang las kying sa// 'khor lo baspyod dang pan gyi snrum sa// nga dkang shAng dag khrag dang du// lcags kyi zangs khyod kyi dang // gdapa lpags gre zhugs rbang pa dang // drag shing dgra gi sung pas ga ga// gang
90b4(rnying rgyud): gyi gzhung da // las mkhad gang yin srog nyid dang // dmigs pa gang yi pog skyed dang // bred la skyeg byed pas byas// ma thos pas tho ba ni shes byas la// las kyi bzlas pa gang 'dong \u0f7f// bdag nyid yong ma wa ba dz+ramaH//
90b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'tho dums// sngags bdag dam byung bskul bas// ji la 'dod pa'i las rnams do// dgas pa tha~Md pa pa bany-i// zhi kyis pa'i tha~Md la sa dag// rang gi las dang rnam phyugs sa// las gakhrag te sreg dag ma
90b6(rnying rgyud): rngag po'i las dri thams dang kyi// lus gasreg gcod pa'i ril pa ni// sreg dang po dang mnan pas gcad// ga te bsnod na mas chog tung byeng // sngags pas phrin las mgrub na// rjod du bdod rnams tshogs bsug \u0f7f// denas panyid ba grugag nga
90b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'ag pa sa med sa byur / pa / 'a gas pa
91a1(rnying rgyud): las rnams bya'o// de nas sngags pa dam can des// rang la bar tshad mi tshugs phyir// rang gi nyi dmagang bsgom pa'i// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin btsun par bya// tha mal lus su mi gsal zhing // snang stong gnyis su med par
91a2(rnying rgyud): de nas las rnams grub pa dang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sngags bdag sung ma dmanan la// mchod pa 'bul zhing dam chog bskang // rdo rje'i sa la gnas kyi par// rang gi yi dam chun du bsgom// skyed lam bka' yi ge zhung bzhin
91a3(rnying rgyud): stong gnyis su med par 'grom// na sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud las/ rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi bsgom bsrub dang / phrin las nyams su gang ba'i le'u ste bgyid pa'o// / ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud kyi ma'i yang
91a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya ga sad du/ hri lo ka'i dz+ha ra~M tan+da/ 'od skad du/ 'jig rten gsum gyi shes pa bskal ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan nga
91a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba gsum gyi 'dag po gnyis su med pa'i thig le 'od zer jog sna tshogs pas 'azhigs pa/ rdo rje phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid/ pad+mo chen po las yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gsung dri ma med pa'i
91a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdo rje yongs su 'dzin pa/ ting nge dzin la mad brnyes pa'i thugs rang bzhin lhan cig yongs su grub pa'i yid bzhin du nor na pa che/ yon tan kun gyis 'artsod pa'i rgyal po nings pas ldongs pa'i lam mkhan chen po// gti mug gi mu pa la ba'i
91a7(rnying rgyud): shi tusra ba'i brag 'joms pa'o rje/ rgyam chen po snyam pa'i mchen pa/ rlung kyi rnag zhib byed pa'i 'dag nyid/ rang 'onan gyis 'od gsal 'gran la khyab par byed pa// gang layang de ma med pa'i sbyin las can dul ba bye nga / thugs tha kyis dang
91b1(rnying rgyud): sa babad dun su mnag phyogs gsum bcos malus pa'i bdag nyid/ 'dig tan 'ams sa su phrul rnams rnamagapa skul ba'i bang bdag/ ma du sa thams cadayongs su sa sa ngag pa sa ga sapas grang nas sa
91b2(rnying rgyud): ma nga kyi ma sa pa'i bu khyen go nyams pa zatha da ba sa pa da / can mamam thong da rjemed pa la sarjeg pa'i dag nyid cen pa su tha'i ji dradas par supa lamang sa shes de/ ngang min granas na bu da ga sdang da bla sa ba chog ded pa ci
91b3(rnying rgyud): mayongs su thub pa'i btsun mo'i nyug mo bung yun gyis byab pa/ bur dzod cigazhal yas ba 'arje ma pa d+ma sna tshogs pas steng dang 'og tu brgyan pa/ dbyings sna tsha ga dang / kha dog d+ha ro gri dang / 'dod 'ayon tananam pa rje dang / rinas rkyen ma pa tsho granga'i ngan kyis dang thal/ yinas dam nga dag
91b4(rnying rgyud): dpe dang tshad las 'das pa'i sa/ phyi dang nang med par phyogs bcur 'khrigs shing / rnam par dag pas khrums pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med par ye nas rang byung gi gnas na/ bye brag gi rnam pa can du bzhugs so// rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug cher 'o//
91b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang ba byed kyis 'gran pa/ nam ma ba'i mtha' byas pa dang / rnal 'byong mchen no/ longs sngod yongs brdzogs pa'i bdag nyid ma rnams dang / nal 'byor chen pa'i thaskad thams cad dang ldan pa/ btsun mo yongs su grub pa'i bdag nyid dang /
91b6(rnying rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i gzhi dang ldan pa dang / he drug rol pa'i tshogs/ dpe thad thams cad byi ba/ yongs su grub pa'i bdag nyid chen po dang / gzhan yang rkyen las sprul pa'i sras ci tshogs/ grangs med cing 'jod du med pa rnams dang / rig pa las dri /
91b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sras kyi tshogs rnams/ rnal kyang ma'i tshogs rnams dang / thabs yongs su grub pa'i dbor rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu mtshan mi la sogs pas nyams pa mi mnga' bar bkrugs pa/ wang 'bruska kyis gang pa da /
92a1(rnying rgyud): kun tu gang zhing khyab nas bzhugs so// nyid kyi btsun mo yang nyid kyi sbrul dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'khril te/ byang chub sems kyang por thams cad snyoms pa mi mnga' bar 'du mang da// 'khar du 'dus pa la tshugs de nyid la/ rnam
92a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje chos rab dam pa dang / btsun mo grub pa mo dang / gnyis sa med pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan/ bran jo bo la bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ se
92a3(rnying rgyud): dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad ni/ thig le spros pa med pa bzhin du gzigs so// 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i chos thams cad ni/ shel gyi mtshan nyid dri ma med pa ltar gzigs so// dus gsum gyis 'dus pa'i chos thams cad ni sdang ba la so
92a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin du gzigs so// srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad ni/ yongs su grub pa la sogs par gzigs so// bsam gtan la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ni/ thams cad 'byung ba'i chos su gzigs so// snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos
92a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag tu gzigs so// ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag thams cad bden pa'i rnam pa can du gzigs so// sa'i khyad par la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ni/ stobs kyi khyad par can du gzigs so// ji ltar grag pa'i chos thams cad la bcom ldan
92a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis gzigs so// kun la khyab par gzigs so// rnam par gzigs so// / de bzhin du sngar 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams kyis kyang gzigs so// rnam par gzigs so// de bzhin
92a7(rnying rgyud): du phyis 'byon pa'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams kyis kyang gzigs so// rnam par gzigs so// rnam par gzigs nas kyang brjod pa las 'das te/ don dam pa bcos pa ma yin pa'i ngang la bzhugs te/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan thams cad rdzogs
92b1(rnying rgyud): 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor ba'i chos thams cad bcos pa ma yin pa'i rgyun du rnam par gzigs la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i ye shes stong pa chen por rnam par gzig/ des nam mkha'i mtshan nyid tsam du 'di/
92b2(rnying rgyud): yin no bar yang bstan du yod pa ma yin no// de nas yum kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po/ dgongs pa chos nyid la chos kyi dbyings la mnal nas bzhugs paM la glu 'dis bskul lo// e ma// ye nas ma bcos bde chen
92b3(rnying rgyud): yangs ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa dam pa'i dbyings// ye nas ma bcos rang bzhin dbyings nyid nas// snyoms pa'i thig le 'azung bar mi dmigs kyang // thabs la mkhas pas su yi khyad par ni// dbyibs dang kha dog bdag la bstan du gsol// me bcod
92b4(rnying rgyud): pa nas bdag gis bskal pa yis// 'od zer snga tshogs bdag la bstan du gsol// rdo bo nyid las sems can dan du bskul// brjod med bu mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// ye nas rnam dag nam mapa'i rang bzhin la// khyab pa'i thugs rje chen pos dgongs su
92b5(rnying rgyud): gsol// ho zhes bskul bas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bskul bar mkhyen nas/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tsho chos thams cad 'od zer ldan pa'i
92b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid du gnas so// de nas yang ya ma gos dkar mos glu 'dis bskal lo// e ma ho// kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yongs la khyab// ma bcos dbyings nas g.yo ba smon lam dpang // ji ltar gnas pa skra yi bye brag tu// bde chen khyad par bdag la bstan du
92b7(rnying rgyud): gsol/ ho// zhes bskul bar mkhyen nas/ bde ba chen po'i ngang las smon lam gyi dbang gis/ rtag pa'i cho 'phral rnam par ston te// zla ba ta gang ba lta bur mngon du phyung ngo // rdo tshe chos thams cad brjod pa dang bral ba'i ngang du gsal bar snang ngo // de nas ya
93a1(rnying rgyud): maHk+Shes bu 'dis bskul pa// a maH// tsad yadagasas pa'i skam rdzogs pa sbyidags pa// yenas ngag la rtog pa'i skal dngad pral// da rtags gsal zhid rnam par dgu pa'i sa// 'ongs mya gas pa'i skyem chog 'an
93a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// hoHbskul par mkhyen nas/ sa sau'i sku'i bye thag turnam par gsal bar gyur to// rdol tsho chos thams cad dri ma dang bral ba'i nga dugasal lo// de nas yang sum dmachog grol mas sgra 'das bskul lo// oMs b+h+yo// ma ba dz+ra glags la zhing rnam
93a3(rnying rgyud): dang bral// yongs ma rdzogs pa'i wa ni sna tshogs 'byin// sems kyi de nyid la 'gugs gsal ba'i 'od// so so'i lam rnams bdag la bstan du gsol// hoHbskul bar mkhyen nas/ so so'i grwa'i bye brag tu gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yum sangs rgyas/
93a4(rnying rgyud): gyis rnam par mdzes pa'i spyan gyis migayo ba gzigs te/ rmad du byung ba'i 'tshod/ rna tshogs pas mdzod de/ glu 'dis bsgral lo/ ma ho ti e mangs ma d+hag mi hU~M tha ha pa/ zhes rnam par bskul pas/ rol pa'i sgra tshul rnam pa bzhi dang ldan zhing ye shes kyi
93a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin sangs rgyas yab tham sras dang bcas pa gA dri tha pas gzigs par gyur to// de nas yang oM A.A hU~M zhes brjod pas/ 'khor ji snyed pa thams cad nyid kyi sku la bsgru ba mdzad du// de nas yang yum kun tu bzang mos kyu 'das bsngal lo// e ma to// yenas
93a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i dbyings// ye shes rkyen po'i ngang nyid can// 'o dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas su/ bdud rtsig zung gnas par mdzod/ hoHbrtul bar mkhyen nas/ rol chen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur to// dang rtso mas thams ca rol bachen po'i ting
93a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la gnas par gyur to// de nas rol pa'i bdag nyid las su 'dis bskum ma// men to// skyon gyis sogs bad+ma d+haga'i mngag/ thams cad rgyan kyis mthus yongs su brgyan// bsrung med pa brtson po'i thang chub sems// ye nas na ma dag chu ba'i kun bzhin
93b1(rnying rgyud): hoHthams cad dri ma dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin du gsal bar gyur to// de nas yang rab tu mdzes mas glu 'dis bskal lo// e maho// rab tu gsang ba'i byang chub sems// kun k+Shi bdag /
93b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kun gyi dngos// rab tu brtag dka' kun gyi rgya// kun gyi 'byung gnas chen po yin// hoHbyang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe chos thams cad byang chub sems kyi rol pa chen por gyur to// de nas yang yum gyis byang chub sems kyi
93b3(rnying rgyud): 'dis bstsal lo// e ma ho// gsang ba rol pa dur khrod gnas// rol par mkha' 'gro thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang // de 'dra bcom ldan bde chen chags pa'i gnas/ hoHbde ba chen po rol pa la chags
93b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur to// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las gsang ba 'di gsungs so// e ma ho gsang ba'i bdag nyid can// e ma sngags kyi bdag po can// e ma rig pa'i bdag nyid can// e ma ho gzung ba'i bdag nyid can// brtag par
93b5(rnying rgyud): 'i phyag rgya can// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// snod bcud sran gyi bdag po yin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi// thig le spros med byang chub sems// dus gsum sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i sa// sems can nyon mongs sel ba'i sngan/
93b6(rnying rgyud): drug lnga sel ba'i rtsi mchog yin// ma rig mun sel smon me'i mchog/ de nyid bde ba chen po ste/ rang rig lta ba shes bya mchog/ spos med byang chub sems nyid de// yongs rdzogs bde ba chen po 'grub// ces gsungs so// rten gyi dkyil 'khor 'di ltar
93b7(rnying rgyud): e skyong pa med pa'i ting nge 'don 'di srung ngo // yaM smin par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di byung ngo // raM sdud par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di byung ngo // baM gnas par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di byung ngo // sr-i dag par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di byung ngo // te spo bar byed pa'i te
94a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin 'di phyur to// pharu shin tu smos pa'i sgra 'di gsungs so// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi don las byung // bde mchog gsang ba gsum kye gnas// rdo rnga 'khyur gyu na rgyan rgyan// badz+ra ral
94a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyan// nyi ma'i 'od zer kha dog mdzes// mchog gi gnas la mchog gi rgyan// bla re 'od zer lnga yis dazigs// rgyal mtshan bzhi yis rab tu mdzes// 'bar ba'i 'phan gyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs// rab tu zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor la// sgo drug dag gi
94a3(rnying rgyud): rab tu brgyan// gdod nas dag pa'i 'khor los 'khrigs// rnam dag rgyan ni mdzes pas brgyan// 'byung 'jug gnas pa kun gyi zhal// dus gsum bde gshegs sras bcas gnas// zhes gsungs so// chos thams cad 'od rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba la
94a4(rnying rgyud): gnas par gyur to// ched du brjod pa'i bu 'di gsungs so// hUM de ni bcom ldan ye shes mchog/ dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi yab// khams gsum kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// bde bar gshegs pa'i gshegs bral ga nas// shin tu gnas pa'i ting 'don can
94a5(rnying rgyud): brjod bral brjod med de nyid gsungs// thabs dang shes rab las byung 'od// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis bzhugs// dz+r-IM a haM/ zhes brjod de pho brang chen po'i dbus su bzhugs so// 'jig rten gsum gyi shes pa bskal ba'i rgyud las/ mi rgya chen
94a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma to// bcom ldan gsang pa'i bdag nyid che// khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pa/
94a7(rnying rgyud): nyan mongs dra ba ldag cing bdag/ ye shes lnga le ngang tshul can// 'od zer wa yis rab tu 'jigs// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// thams cad kun la khyab chen po// nyon mongs spyan pas spyong pa dang // bgrod pa'i lamal brten pa'i byer/
94b1(rnying rgyud): thag dang dkyil 'khor drug/ nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri ste// dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba dang // 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor dam par gnas// bde gshegs bcom ldan thags la gnas// khyod kyi ngo mtshar zla 'phrul can// gsang ba zlas
94b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs rnams 'chang // ji ltar ji ltar chen pa'i sems// rab tu gdung ba'i sems 'chang zhing // rnal 'tha~Mr rnams la sngags brtse'i phyir// bdag cag 'khor bcas zhu bar 'dzu// nes gsol pas/ bcom mad 'ang myang pal ku tu
94b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ thabs dang bcas pa'i dngos grub mchog/ bde ga shegs rjes 'thung slob dpon nams// de yi mtshon nyid bshad par bya// rtsi nang nam chog mi skye zhing // rgyud dang mardo rje dag pa mabyas// thabs mkhas ting 'dzin rjod rtsod ban/
94b4(rnying rgyud): sdod gsum la ma mongs dang // tog bcas phye tshol thams cad sel// gsang ba kres pa'i thabs rnams su byed// dad pa rnams la skyeng ba med// gsang ba'i rje stong drug rnams can// tog bcas sngo dang na rnams mi sted// gsang ba'i chos rnams sem
94b5(rnying rgyud): das
94b6(rnying rgyud): spyod kyi thug thabs yin pas// mI \u0f89\u0fa4nga mi 'dod 'bang bsrang la// mdog dkar gzugs dgra sto bas dang ldan// gsung dri 'chang ngo mo 'byung // rtag par sems can don la dga'// sems can sgrol ba'i thabs la mkhas// skad gdangs
94b7(rnying rgyud): ban// bcom ldan thag 'a chun de// slob dponas par shes pa ma// nang chos la sa mongs rtse// byed par shes pa phrad pa 'tshogs// rig pa'i gnas mtshig sa gags nas// chos spyong brgyarnams mngagasas byud// bla
95a1(rnying rgyud): 'khur zhing mched la gdung // sems can ci dga' spyod pa byed// thabs kyi bye brag rnams la mkhas// gcig gam thams cad mtshan nyid kyi// don mthong dge ba tha dag yod// gshin rje'i gshed po'i slob dpon yid/
95a2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi zhabs rnams khyad par ston// rtag par zlos shing phreng du dga'// snying po sngags la dad mos che// blo gsal reg pa khyad par yod// spyod lam rnam bzhi seng ger spyod// glu gar rol ma rnams la dga'// mchod pa'i bye brag zangs
95a3(rnying rgyud): mkhas// lung bstan bka' bzhin byed cing gso// spun la dung zhing sems can sdud// pad+ma dbang chen slob dpon yin// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing // sngags rnams ma 'dres so sor mkhyen// shes rab gsal zhing brtson 'grus che// phyi nang
95a4(rnying rgyud): rgyud shes cho ga skong // thabs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs la// gang dang gang lam rmongs shes// las kyi bye brag thams cad la// lhag chad med par thabs mkhas shes// gsang ba mchog gi thabs rnams sbed// che mchog he ru ka yi slob dpon yin//
95a5(rnying rgyud): zos brtson yon tan kun gyis brgyan// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum// de yi thabs kyis thams cad 'dul// de yi spyod pa ma 'gags med// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// rjes su mthun pa'i thabs mchog gis// ji lta ji ltar 'dra
95a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // thabs mkhas dang ldan ting 'dzin gsal// gnyis med blo ldan brtul zhugs che// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i slob dpon yin// de nas slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan// lus mdzes rtag thongs snyan snga// mgrin pa de dang ldan slob dpon 'a
95a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor na'i las ma pas sman la gdung // bden pa'i cho ga/ sgra sbyar mi bcug/ yang ba thos brtsod ston mi nus// pad dkar zhes bya'i gang zag de// he tra ka yi slob mang brdung // thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal 'chang zhing // rin chen sna tshogs sbyin par
95b1(rnying rgyud): Sh+Tha// du' su dug hA/ byu pa / tu sa // thamags dbang sus nga g+sa// dbang rgyun pangs dang rtam// da na dang dugs pa'/ gas pa dan/
95b2(rnying rgyud): pa ni// gshin rdo'i gshing po'i slob ma yid// dge btu tug slod ma dge spang // bde 'jas khro ba'i sems mi 'byung // grug rol mo sna tshogs ston// mdog mdzes can dan dri dang ldan// stod bye byed cing gang pas// yani lag bde 'angs
95b3(rnying rgyud): 'brang med // skem tho sen mo zangs 'dra dmar// sbyor ba'i yan lag thabs la mkhas// dang ldan thos brtson snying rje che// pad+ma zhes bya'i gang zag ste// badz+ra dbang chen slob mar bzung // dpa' zhing snyid stobs shin tu che// phyi nang 'dul ba'i chos
95b4(rnying rgyud): mkhas// lhan sdug phrin las dag la mkhas// dgongs pa nyams len mu stegs bzlog/ lha log sun 'byin yang dag 'god// bde ba'i lam sbyin thabs la mkhas// bco mkhas rig gsal bla ma skor // 'dzin la mkhas shing brjed 'gyur
95b5(rnying rgyud): sa smra
95b6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs sgyid rje snying rje che// skyong bzo lus la ga pur dri// thos med de rgyal mang du lha// rjes su bzung ba'i don med pa// tsan+dan zhes bya'i gang zag de// khrag 'thur rol pa'i slob mar bzung // gong gi yan lag kun tshang zhing // rgyal po sde bcas
95b7(rnying rgyud): sbyin byos bstod// sra stegs spobs bsngags pa brjod// sngob bzhi yis skye bor 'khrur// dkyil 'khor thadag las la mang// gsang drug sbas gab man dag thub// slob dpon 'brang zhing spyod pa yangs// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i slob par gang
96a1(rnying rgyud): sa ma da na/ nag sa sags pa // rlung gzhanag/ dang na pang// du ga/ sa pa san ga// na narna
96a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de na sa dpal rdo rje sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la bskor bzlas nas/ mchod pa sna tshogs bapral te/ kye ma gsang bdag kun gyi bzang // rnal 'byor gdug
96a3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba la// 'di yi las dang don ched dra// dkyil 'khor dam pa mi 'tshal lam// 'jig byed chen pos lung bstan gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor las dang don ched du// rdo rje sems dpas khrus pa legs/
96a4(rnying rgyud): don rnams bde bar ngas bshad kyi// ma yengs dgra pa'i sems kyis nyon// ye shes rang snang dkyil 'khor la// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rang snad dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom// ye shes rol pa'i tshogs chen kun// thugs dam/
96a5(rnying rgyud): dbang gis rang bzhin gyon pa rnams// nam dag nga gi bde ba dam par bzhengs// gsang ba'i rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab ste// ngo bo nyid dag ngang gis rang bzhin med// bdag dang tshogs bcas ma lus de bzhin te// ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i
96a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// de thob 'bras bu mthar phyin sa la gnas pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su bsam// bdag nyid ye shes bde bas gang ba dang // gzas pa gshed ma'i tshogs kyis gang ba gnyis// sngags kyi dug mda' khong du 'phang ba dang // rang gi gshe
96a7(rnying rgyud): mas srog la dbab pa dang // rang gi sngags bcad dmod pa'i yi ge ste/ drag po'i dus su gsal ba'i yi ger bcas// mkhas pas spyi dang man ngag gzug par bya ba yin// tha mar rab tul dang bcas pa'i snying po ste// gtan bcas bsgrub par bya ba'i
96b1(rnying rgyud): na ni// brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong bzlas par bya'o// 'bum ma mkhri ru bzlas par bya'o// gnas yul gnyis dang srin mo dbang phyug tshogs// kun gyi gsod pa'i drag sngags 'di yin te// shwan bzhi dang bse mo re ma ti// 'khor lo chen mo bzhi ru gnas
96b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil du ma bkod g.yas su ya// g.yon du ra bkod dbus su phaT// 'og tu ni bkod g.yas su dza// g.yon du kyo bkod steng 'og rbad kyang dgod// de yis las rnams 'grub par ngas lung bstan// dang por kI la la ste 'bru dbu ni// 'jam phras
96b3(rnying rgyud): dug tu bzlas par bya'o// nyi khri gsum ste drug yin no// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ don dam snying po yongs su grub pa'i tshe// bzlas dang ma bzlas tshig gi tha snyad yin// de nas rang bung bzlas pa chen po ni// ngo bo nyid kyi sngags kyi rang bzhin no// de 'a
96b4(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa don gyi snying po ni// ma bcos rang byung snying po'i sngags yin te// zab mo'i bzlas pa yin zhes tshu ru bstan// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las// mA ra ya yi bzlas pa bya ba ste// bzlas pa mthar zin bya// 'di 'dra'i bzlas pa ye shes mcho
96b5(rnying rgyud): tu 'phags// gsang ba'i bzlas pa zhes ni rgya ru bstan// dngas ma 'dus pa'i ngo bo las// 'od 'bar ye shes rab bskul bas// khrag gi dmig bu mgo dgu dag tu gsal// dbus ni mgo ni dbus kyi srog rtsa 'dzin// rtsabargyad nang nas mgo brgyad
96b6(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas ni// yul brgyad gnas brgyad dag la stob par byed// nyi ma'i snying po bzhin bu 'tsher zhing gsal/ brjod pa kun las 'das pa'i snying po yin// steng sgor 'bar bas dmig bu bcu drug 'gyur// de steng dmig pu sum cu rtsa gnyis so//
96b7(rnying rgyud): tu 'dzag pas drag cu rtsa bzhi ste// de yi 'og tu dmig bu lnga ru 'gyur// dang po gnas pa'i sa bon las// zed pa oM dang phaTal gtug/ slob ma nas phaT la gdug/ bskul ba ma nas byol gzug/ mtshon cham nas thad la gzug/ 'gugs pa
97a1(rnying rgyud): nas dza la gad+hag/ mnan pa ma nas nan lagatag/ rbad nan zhes ni gzir bar b+ha// dz+wal bam nas grol la gtug/ dbab pa mnas zil dang shar dang phab lag cag/ tsha ba ma nas ral gzug/ rjem dang
97a2(rnying rgyud): shar dang phab kyi mtha' ru las rnams dbye bzhi// de yi rten byas dam pa'i byang chub sems// ye shes lnga gas la don dam dbyings nas bskyod// rten 'brel ga nas lugs gsang ba'i gnas byin rlobs// sa dbus dmig dang bcas pas snying po 'i/
97a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma lnga yang shugs kyis 'byung // bzlas pa mthar phyin 'bras bu chen po yin// rang gi bzlas pa yin zhes rgya ru bstan// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis bzlas 'di bya// gang la btab kyang snying po len par nges// gal te bzlas po 'di dang
97a4(rnying rgyud): bral ba ni// dus min tshol bar chad byas nas ni// 'bras bu ngan song gsum du ltung bar nges// bzlas pa 'di la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa ni// tshe rang nad med phun sum tshogs pa dang // lus ma bor ba nyid nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa// @
97a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas nyid kyi sa la gnas pa yin// dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa rtag tu 'bul// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga las rab tu grub// rdo rje gzhon nu 'khor lo rgyas 'debs gnyis// ye shes chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgom// rtsa ba'i lha yab yum dang /
97a6(rnying rgyud): yan chad kyi phrin las so// rtsa ba'i rang bzhin yang dag gsungs// rtsa ba'i lha yi bye brag rnams// ji ltar sngags kyi mtshan nyid gsungs// srung ma rnam gsum las rnams kun// 'di las bsad pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'dag la bka' drin
97a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje nges pa khyed kyis ni// dregs pa can dag bsgral don du// zhu ba'i rnam pa legs so legs// nga yi bstan pa bsung don du// rnam gsum 'khor lo bshad bya ba// ma yang yid la brtsan
97b1(rnying rgyud): gyis// dang sa ma 'dus pa 'ad pa las// 'da'ab sa shas rab bskul bas// khrag ga dmig pa mgo pa dag tugasal// spo bcu'i dmigs pa gang bzhin shes par byar// dbus su ma dang g.yas par la// g.yon par ta tang bas srungaH// na /
97b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi ngan la bsgom par bya// ye nas gnang dang mig nad med// shAn bzhi dang lha mo bzhi// sa bdag mched bzhil sogs pan// rtag dang chad pa yod med dang // brjod dang pal bsam yul las 'das// rang bzhin gnas pa'i snying po de// len pa
97b3(rnying rgyud): na mar snang // de 'dra'i don chen ma mthong ste// nyon mongs lnga yi dri mar gso// de lan phyir na 'khor lo sbyar// deng gdeng na phyir ye shes kyi// bye brag rnam gsum gsungs pa yin// de la dbang bskur byed par ru// thabs mchog dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi
97b4(rnying rgyud): nas na'i dbang byas de ma // rang gi yo shes len zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rgya ru bstan// phyi nang gsang bde shes D+ha// gsang chen dang ni yang gisang gter// de dag rim par shes paraH// ye shes mchog sbyar dam pa la// rang gi rang ba'in
97b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin te// bden pa'i snying po rang bzhin las// yang dag don du mkhas pas brtag/ gsung ba'i tsher 'di lung bstan// rdorje phrang pa'i le'u stegasum pa'o// / de nas ston pa kun bzang la// rdo rje chos kyis 'di gang byas// se
97b6(rnying rgyud): thamal cad dag mchog khyad par can// don rnams mA lus gsungs lags na// 'didon 'jug 'tshal rdul 'byor te// dug lnga drug gsum dbadwags na// zhe sdang don rnams bstan lags na// dmyal bskal ba ji ltar lags// 'jom ldan bdag pa/
97b7(rnying rgyud): bka' drin gsungs// 'jam dpal gshed po khyod kyis ni// dug lnga bsgral don zhu ba legs// so so'i bye brag khyod la bstan// nga rgyal dug gis khengs pa rnams// spangs nas bskal don rnyed pa min// rang tha bcings na gnas ngan len// skyon rnams rnam
98a1(rnying rgyud): par 'phel bar 'gyur// yongs su 'angs pa'ang myu de/ nga'o rnam pa'i sems 'chang dang // gzhan las thug pa'i stobs 'ang shing // rnams mag pa'i 'phyagan / sbyangs pa ba na 'gas s+ho// dab ga
98a2(rnying rgyud): sngags don dang // sbas pa'idon nyid ma bcings pas// gab pa'i mchog de rnyed 'gyur ro// gzhan lang rgyal dbang bsgyur bas// zhen pa'i tshig gi gzhan don 'gags// de yi 'bras bu log par rnyed// de yi bden pa'i cho ga mi 'byung // spang bas mra stegs lam du
98a3(rnying rgyud): 'a/ da mas rgyal can po la// dun la ma a ga saH/ tog med pade ba'i lam gnas shing // yA sh+tha ste can pa gnas byung // dge pani stong chen zab ma'i nang // nabu rnyed kyil 'khyong mapa'adzan// maTar byed lta nga grub paH// yabya
98a4(rnying rgyud): med bde bsags la// nam gu nag mo'i tshogs bcas kun// rang rang chud ltar gsal bsgom ste// mA ra ya phaT yi ge ni// dbus swa mA dang g.yas su ya// g.yon par ra lte g.yas su phaT// 'og mar na bkod g.yas su dza// g.yon du blo bkod steng du zad kyang bkod/
98a5(rnying rgyud): deyis las rnams 'bru ba ngas lung bstan// dang por a gro 'bru bdun no// 'brum phrag bdun du 'azlas par bya// hi me gsum ste drug yin no// oM a kro ta ka dz+haM phaT// bsreg pa'i sa bon mthar bzhag la// byang chub sems chung dam par 'gyur// stong dang len pa'i ting
98a6(rnying rgyud): gyis// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gsal// ma las gyur pa'i bdag po de// pad+ma d+ha ga'i mdog 'dra bar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmachog gis// 'od 'bar ye shes rab bskul bas// lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgur gyur// rtsa brgyad nang nas mgur du zhugs// rnam shes
98a7(rnying rgyud): kyi bcud rnams len// dbus kyi mgon dbus kyi srog rtsa 'dzin// steng du 'phros pas bcu bdun te// de steng sum cu rtsa gsam mo// 'og tu 'phros pas drug cu rtsa bzhi ste// dbus pa dang ni drug tu hA// gsang bar 'phros pas lnga du gyur// bcud kyi dngas
98b1(rnying rgyud): dri ma meng // rin chen rigs kyi dmachog ste// mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// grub pas de yi ngo bo 'od du gnas// zos pas de nyid las byung ste// matog dang bcas yi ge zad// log tog can gyi shes pa lan// 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgya ru brtan// de na
98b2(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal gshed pos 'di skad gsol lo// rgya 'bras ngo bor zhugs pa ni// gsang sngags bdag po khyod lags na// dkyil 'khor nyams su len byed pa'i// rnal 'byor dam pa gang dag gis// ting 'dzin dang la mi gnas tshe// de tshe bzlas pa mi gnas
98b3(rnying rgyud): rdul tshon dkyil 'khor brtan ma ste// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de ma lags// rdzas kyi 'khor lo ma lags te// 'khor lo chen po bsgrub pa las// gsang chud ji snyed 'thung gyur ba'i// bzlas pa'i gsang sngags ji ltar lags// bzlas pa'i thabs rnam
98b4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lags// de la 'bras bu ji ltar 'thung // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' tshul cig/ 'jam dpal gnod pa spyod kyis ni// nal 'byor las dang don cha dang // sngags don zhub rab tu legs// sngags dang babyas thab pa 'bras bu na// gsang bar ba shu
98b5(rnying rgyud): pas nyon// dang po mtho 'bru bdun ni// su gsung thugs kyi bzlas pa ste// 'byung dang sdud dang gnas pa nyid// gsang ba gsum po len pa yin// me ni rang dbang byed pa ste// dri la thog gi snying por gsung // zang ni bsad pa'i sngags yin te// la
98b6(rnying rgyud): su bstan// mar ya zhes bya ba ni// gang bzhin kun la shes par bya// dbang snying kun lagasal gyis la// thugs kyi snying po gnas la zhugs// gnas pa'i ngo bo gas la la 'tshor// 'bras bu mA ra ya ya~M len// yang dag rig 'dzin 'bras bu 'bar ba rtse// yodan tan snying po da
98b7(rnying rgyud): chen// gsang bzugs kyi bzlam pa ste// 'phro 'dra 'thung ba'i gnas mchog gis// thugs kyi 'bras bu len par byed// gshin rje gzhod po'i rtsa ru bstan// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas pad+ma sems dpa' yis// bcom ldan
99a1(rnying rgyud): 'di ska thus// byam gsang pa sngags kyi bad// phyogs brdungs pag rdzogs pa yi// ye shes gsang ba'i rang bzhin las// nga bo nyid las 'bras bur 'byung // dbang chen gas du sngags kyang lags pa// 'jom ldan 'das kyis rna
99a2(rnying rgyud): bstan gsol// de nas kun du bzang pos bka' stsal ba// oM las byung ba'i snying po de// ma 'odra don du zhu ba legs// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya// lus ngag yid gsum gus par nyon// 'dod la chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mtshan ma'i dbang la 'chel das ni
99a3(rnying rgyud): de yis 'bras bu rlag par byed// spangs pas don rnams rnyed pa min// rab tu bcings nas gnas ngan len// skyon rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// yongs su dag pa'i 'dod chags te// spyad pas 'bras bu chen po thob// spangs pas bden pa'i tshig mi 'gyur// spangs
99a4(rnying rgyud): pas mu stegs lam du 'gro// me tog dang bcas yi ge oM// ha ya gr-i ba hUM drug/ yi ge bdun pa rtsa ba yin// grub pa de yi 'od du gnas// tha ska ni dang tha tol// dam pa'i chos las 'byung ba yi// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te// pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig go// yod
99a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bo las byung ba// rdo tsa hUM nyid 'bras bu yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pas// 'phro 'dur gyur pa'i dngas mdung // le ga rgan lta bur gyur pa ste// mA ra ya li ting 'dzin gyis// khrag gi sbal pa mgo dgur gyur// rtsa brgyad nang nas mgo brgyad zhugs// dbus kyi
99a6(rnying rgyud): gon dbus kyi srog rtswa 'dzir// gnas yul bcu drug sbeng mo bcu drug ste// steng du 'phros pas smang mo bcu bdun te// de steng 'phros pas sum cu gsum// 'og tu 'phros pas drug cu rtsa lnga ste// gsang ba la ni lnga yin no// ye shes tshogs kyis gang ba dang // sbal pa'i
99a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis gang ba gnyis// sreg srung las 'grub mchog ge las// bsam ldan gnyis kyis de 'thub po// 'khor ba'i bag chags rtog bcas thun// gnas ngan len pa thams cad kun// gdong nas sangs rgyas nyid gnas pas// ngag dang ma dag gnyis med de/
99b1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin rmongs la gsang bas na// skal ba can dag gsang ba nyid gsal ba// nyon mongs lnga dag gnas ngan len// pad+ma'i gsang rgyad thams cad du// mA ra la yi de nyid 'di// thams cad kun la 'di bzhin brtag/ bden pa'i snying po rang bzhin pas// rtsub pa
99b2(rnying rgyud): shes chen po des// wA yi gnas sa bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i rgya drangs lung brtan// brgyu bang chen gyi le'u stel pa'o// / de nas kas he kyus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad kris// kye bdeg shegs bcom ldan 'das// dug rjes shin tu gaH
99b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// ma sa'i bye brag bstan lags nA// khrag dog dbang gyur sems can rnams// 'di la nan tan ji ltar grol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan gsol// phyag dog sems can don skyer du// khyod kyis zhus pa rab tu lags// nga yis bshad kyis gus pa
99b4(rnying rgyud): bad da/ sa med pa / mig pa dgang// sa pas sa pa skye mamos / da/
99b5(rnying rgyud): lhag sra na stobs snyoms pa// da yis log pa'i lam bstan \u0f7f// spangs pas bden pa'i chog mi rnyed// spyad pas gsang ba'i gsang don dang // sbas pa 'don nyid ma batshangs pas// gab pa'i mchog nyid des nad 'gyur// gzhan la phrag dog dbang bskur nas// rgan
99b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan don 'gegs// de yi 'bras bu log skyed kyi// de las bden pa'i chog mi 'byung // spangs pas pra rtogs lam du 'gro// spyad pas phrag drug chen po yis// don pa ma lus de gnas te// rtog med bde ba'i lam la gnas// ye shes chen por de gnas 'gyur// de yi don nyid
99b7(rnying rgyud): bshad bya ba// rtsab brgyad ni snying po'i mchog/ a ru lu ru lu duSh+ya ng+ge// 'khor ba rnam thal byang chub sems// 'di ltar snad ba'i chos nyid ni// ye nas rang gi rang bzhin dang // ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas// gzugs dang phral sogs pa la// rab tu brtag gsal dngos
100a1(rnying rgyud): med bsgom// dang pa nyid bsgrub byang chub sems// de rtags don rab gnyis su gsal// mtshan dang dpe yin ma grol shas// nyon mongs mi gnas rnga ba nyid// da r+g+hA yul dmigs ya shes smin// rnam par dag par lams da la/
100a2(rnying rgyud): gi bud gdo rnam shes ni// 'bru brgyad dag tu yang dag gnas// ji ltar brtags pa'i song po la// mA ra ya yaM phrang ba ni// rab tu g.yo ba'i byang chub sems/ dadus ma 'das pa'i poni// leb nana' bar ba'i mdog tu sdang // de las shel gyi ma dog tu spang // de las she kyi sdig 'gyur/
100a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad nang nas mdo brgyad lu// dbun zhon mogasa'adon// steng du 'phros pas bcu bdun te// de steng sum d+ha rtsa gsum mo// 'og tu 'thos pas drug cu lnga// de 'og gsang ba lnga ru brtag par bya// de ltar rab tu rtags gsal na// bdag gi lus 'di smra mar steng // ga
100a4(rnying rgyud): gshed ma'i tshogs kyis gang // de yi don rab gnyis su 'gyur// lus des sems kyi ngo bor len// bsod nams mthu las grub pa ste// snang ba yongs su dag par mdzad// bde gshegs gzhal yas bsod nams rdzogs// de yi rjes 'gro sdang ba dang // snang ba
100a5(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes te// ru wa'i 'phro 'du sbyor ba ste// dkyil du ma bkod g.yas su ya// g.yon du ra bkod g.yon du phaT// 'og mar ni bkod g.yas su dza// g.yon du blo bkod de stang nad kyang bkod// de yi las rnams grub par ngas lung bstan// bstan pa las
100a6(rnying rgyud): grol byang chub sems// de brtag ma nyid ma gnas gyur// rtag du d+ha las byang chub sems// chos dbyings dag pa'i gzhal yas te// de la sems brtan gsal gyur na// don nyid mi sdang rten 'bral shes// ye shes lnga yi gzugs brtan gyis// ltar sngar ye shes
100a7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya// bye brag mang po'i byang chub sems// 'bras bu shes pa yin zhes bya// sgyu ma'i gsang byung rdo snyed du// gsungs pa'i sngag rnams thams cad la// 'di bzhin kun la shes par bya/ kAs te druga' la zug drug pa'o// / de nas 'adz+ra ha rugs/ @
100b1(rnying rgyud): dpa gsang bdag byas canal// bkod bathas nas bcang byug das/ nga gsang ba'i mabyung bas mdza// das pa cad pa gsang sa// samathag sang ba byas par// dus gang la 'dra' bas med pa'adabyungs/ thegs pas rgyas bu 'asam sanan
100b2(rnying rgyud): 'dul lam tshar bcad ji ltar bgyi// yang dag dpa' bos lung bstan gsol// bcom ldan dgyes chen dbang po yis// de skad zhus pa'i tshog gsan nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// hUM zhes brjod nas rang la bsdus// 'jig rten khams kun mi dmigs te/
100b3(rnying rgyud): yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin du// thams cad ma lus gsal bar byas// de nas bcom ldan mngon rdzogs sku// ye shes wa las rab 'bar ba'i// med pyang nang na rab 'jigs bzhugs// glang las sngags kyis rab babul bas// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur/
100b4(rnying rgyud): dang rten can de bzhin te// sngags bzlas pa lis de nyid gsal// oM hUM ha ma phaT b+h+yo dza// sngags 'dis bde ba'i las gsal nas// rgyan dang rol mo thams cad kyis// bde ba'i gnas mchog khyad par 'phags// tsal 'khor lo las byung ba// gser las byas pa
100b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor lo bcu// gsang chan rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid ni// thugs kyi sa bon las byung ba// stabs dang bcas pa'i dbang byed pa'i// gzhi la 'das pa'i dngas ma rnams// gser gyi dmig pa mgo dgur 'gyur// rtsa brgyad nang nas mig brgyad krugs// dbus kyi ma
100b6(rnying rgyud): srog rgya 'dzin// steng du 'phros pas bcu bdun te// da stang sum cu rtsa gsum ste// 'og tu 'phros pas drug cu rtsa lnga ste// de bas 'og rnams lnga yin no// 'phro 'du 'di dag thams cad kyang // mgo lus sna tshogs pa ru btag// chags pa thams cad bsngal nas ni/
100b7(rnying rgyud): rdzob don dam gnyis la 'god// bden gnyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la// rang bzhin grub pa'i byin dba' phyir// gsang sngags zab mo rab bskyod pas// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan 'dren mchod// rang rang gnasas
101a1(rnying rgyud): ba bgrags pas// dbang d+ma byang dbab thams cad rdzogs// yang dag dpa' bas na thub// shes pa ldanasangs rgyas pa// su gusung byugasas bdag // 'a ba gags // sa ba
101a2(rnying rgyud): na las das sa pathams cang rdzogasamadza jos rgyal pa byu pada'i snyed gakyang ngedas / A sa de' bzhin srid la zhes par \u0f7f// bdud mam bsad pa'i la ga na nyid de// brten par gnas te 'dral yang // mAr lan dam pa gsas chags par bya// ma nga
101a3(rnying rgyud): lo lngar theg pa'i tshogs su brir// ma lus bu rje tshogs su debazhin byeng// ma lus bral gyi tshogs tha bur byangs// men pa dbu dag dun la shes par bya'o// rdza brgyad dang nga mgo brgyad khrigs// thog mtho / das sa pas brta 'dan 'gyur// de ste
101a4(rnying rgyud): sul cu rtse gsum te// 'og tu 'bros pas drug cu rtsa lngar 'gyur// de 'og rnam pa lnga yin te// g+hu ru spang ra sdig pa kho nar des// so so'i gakhyor mo chen po ni// sdig pa bung ba spel du brtag par bya// mA ra ya ye yi ga ni// dathas su ma dang g.ya par yor ra lte ba'i dbus lungaT
101a5(rnying rgyud): shod la pa phy-i// g.yod par byang bye nga ba kyar pa nyid// g.yas da yang ba ngas su shes par bya// ya rdzogs thal ba byung che lta // na bzhin thams cad sa la/ nga ma 'ad
101a6(rnying rgyud): 'das dpor rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das byed tu bzang po la 'di nang kyis rgyas so// log pa'i shes pa dang 'gyu la/ yang deba'ang nabs mi nga' ba// rdzabacwa ma slongam la// yang thabs de rangags/ rang bang dab 'i pa 'gyur // des pan gang yar 'ag/
101a7(rnying rgyud): kyis lung bstan gsol// zhes gsol pas/ dang la kun tu bzang ngos bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya dus kye ba mang // skal med dad dang mi ldan pa// gang zhig drags pa ya sra ba don du/ khyod kyis lus pa rab tu lags// bden don rab tu rtogs par byed// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dor da
101b1(rnying rgyud): da las kyad 'a bstan pa ma// thu ba sams // sa rnal pa rnams panal// rdulas ba nywar bA dus/ 'ad na gas bya sa rgyag / sa nga na / nga bya da la// dam rnam
101b2(rnying rgyud): nyid ni// bse dang thun kye nad yams gtor// de nas dung gi mtshan tad ni// rgyo 'bog mdze brak+ka b+ha ma gtong // de nas tshogs kyi mtshan nyid ni// spos kr-i n+ya 'gagand rnams gtong // pU ra la yis kun tu gsod// des ni las rnams skyeb pa ste// mtha' da byed drug pa'i rang bzhin ni// bsta
101b3(rnying rgyud): don rnams dag pa ste// dag pa nyid na dag pa med// mi shrIs pa li bo las// dngas ma'i sa bon las chung ba// dbus su m+b+ha bkod g.yas su ya// gAyon dur byad dbus sa \u0f7f// 'og par dra bkod g.yas su // g.yon du blo bkod sde 'og zad kyang dur// de yis las blang byur ba
101b4(rnying rgyud): rtsol dang bral ba'i rang bzhin no// dngas ma lnga 'dus jo ba ni// shel gyi brabyung ba mgo dgra dgu tu byur// rtsa brgyad nang nas mgo brgyad zhugs// dbus kyi mgo ni srog rtse 'dzin// steng du 'phros pas bcu bdun te// de stang sum cu rtsa gsum mo// 'og tu 'gro ngos drug ru lA/ de 'og
101b5(rnying rgyud): lngarnga 'gyur// dang po g.yo bar gyur pa ni// ljang kyi dag mya ga bong du 'dren ces bya// phung ba rjeg+sa kyis gang ba'i// gzung ma sgrog la 'bebs zhes bya// khams gsum sems can la gnad mo// 'di yis gdug pa 'joms pa te// 'joms pa nyid na 'joms pa med// bstun pa'i rang bzhin 'od la
101b6(rnying rgyud): bcas// gsal ba'i bod dang brgyas paste// yang dag don chen zab mo mchog/ gsal ba nyid na gsal ba myed// rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// mA ra ya yi maru bstan// dkyil du ma bkod g.yas su ya// g.yon du bkod dbus su phaT// 'og mar ni bkod g.yas su dza// ga
101b7(rnying rgyud): drA n+ya Takad steng 'og zad kyang dgod// dzadi yis las rnams 'thub pa'i kyar brtan// zangs kyid mig pa mgo dgur gyur pa de// rtsa brgyad nang nas mag brgyad buH/ dbus skyo mnan srog rtsa 'dzin// sgo ba'i rim pa gang bzhin shes par bya'o// mA ra ya zhes pas yi n+ya ra bstan// dbus
102a1(rnying rgyud): bkod g.yas pa// g.yon dur dkrod dngas smras// 'og mang ni bkod g.yas sung// g.yon par rgya bkad snang 'gazad kyang bshad// sgrub sngags snangs pa ga yas par// nas dang rlu na na nga nyid lang /
102a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin med// bdag dang tshogs bcas ma lus de bzhin te// ye shes tshogs can rdzog pa'i rang bzhin te// de thob 'bras bu mthar phyin bde ba gang // gshed mas khrog la 'bebs pa'i gshed bdag dri// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su gsal// rang gi sngag bces dpyod pa mi ga ha/
102a3(rnying rgyud): nga dag pa mam dpu ga tu byu// lag cad dngul sa/ dngas kyim nan byag nga// dadu 'thos pas na dag du 'gyur// da'o gnam pa ra babyung // gnas phyag shed pa kyis byung ba// 'bra spya pa dang rgya lang mang kyang ba
