102a4(rnying rgyud): par sems// gsang ba bzlog med be'u rang rgyar bstan// bse dung lcags dang gsum b+hi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga tA sha ya kro d+ha sa pra dA ya han+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgo dra bkra bo 'dus pa'i skad ces bya ba/ bco ldan 'das
102a5(rnying rgyud): dpal kun tu bzang ba he rug la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid la shes chen po dza ba/ spug sung thag kun gyis grub pa/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ye shes thag rjo'i rol ba// gnyis su med pa'i theg le/ yongs su bkod pa'i pa/
102a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad nas thams cad du sru ba grang la te// li pye mi 'gag na pa ra bzang por ye nas mangs rdzus pa/ ces kyang btsal du dpa// mi 'gyur bar gyur ba med pa// ma bcos pa bcos pa med pa// mi sdang ba sdang ba med pa// mthab pa bsgrub tu med pa/ gnyis su med cing ba
102a7(rnying rgyud): mngang pa/ thams cad mi mom yi dang po sangs rgyam byed/ nyid la nyed gsungang med pa'i dgongs par cas thams cad 'das pa gsangs te/ chos thams cad badz+radang ma cing brjod pa las 'dasebs/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad de sa
102b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa'i dang bzhin du 'dus ma/ chos thams cad bas ma du med rjeng bsam pa las 'das pas/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub rjesems bde ba chen por 'das so// chos thams cad 'byung ba mad kyanga' pa byang layang dag
102b2(rnying rgyud): mngon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad / yid rang byung gi ye shes btsal ba med par 'dus so// dul gsum kyi sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa med pa'i thig le chen por 'dus so// de nas phyogs bcu'i dris gsus gyi sangs kyis thams cad
102b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin de/ mtshan dngos po thams cad la yon pa 'di 'dra bar grub cid rtag pa med la/ thams cad chos nyid du sangs rgyas pas/ sbyong zhing chad pa ma yin te/ thams cad chos nyid bde ba chen po'i ngang du sangs rgyas pas/ 'gro yang dang
102b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad yin sa phyogs deng rnaMs/ dbyibs dang bdo gded par thub pa med de/ thams cad la shes rten po'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems/ yenas kyis kyang ma thas ma btsum pa dang / na
102b5(rnying rgyud): bya' bzhin du yanas gnas te/ dz+ha ltang 'dul ba'i don la dri bzhin par gnas so// de yang sems kyi mtshan nyid so sor 'don pa'i don gnas skabs kyis mdzad de/ yang dag par na sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad par/ ng+yas ga
102b6(rnying rgyud): 'bu ming pa/ mnam pa'i chis nyid/ ma rtsu pa la shes// thams dang byang chubasams kyi rang bas nangasangs rgyas par 'dzad / byeng dru gyi las cir yang ma min panyid// rang 'ar gyu kyis ba 'angs
102b7(rnying rgyud): de rang brgyan gyi 'bar ma/ skug sung thugs chos su 'byung ba mad pa/ brjod pa med pagasung mi yang rab/ rnam par martog pa ye shes kyi dgongs par 'dus so// chos nyid dus gsum du 'gyur ba med de/ dbus dang tha pa gas
103a1(rnying rgyud): ma tu / na na na na na/ su du
103a2(rnying rgyud): su
103a3(rnying rgyud): ma pa la na / /
103a4(rnying rgyud): gag gi
103a5(rnying rgyud): na da /
103b1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud las le'u dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rang bzhin de/ ye shes chen po'i rol par shar bar mkhyen nas/ sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs par mdzad de/ ched du brjod
103b2(rnying rgyud): nga// mnor ma bcos de bzhin nyid// mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral// ma chags chags bral yul las 'das// cir yang ma yin cir ma yin// rang byung rang zhi brjod dang bral// rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi// rtog pa'i dngos po zil gyi
103b3(rnying rgyud): gnod// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// skye med sems nyid yi dam lha// zhes gsungs so// chos sku skye 'gag med pa las// ye shes chen po rol pa'i sku// dngos med rtog pa zil gyis gnon// mthong nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// rnam par
103b4(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i dbu gsum gyis// srid pa gsum po sgrol bar mdzad// pha rol phyin drug phyag mtshan ni// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje dang // be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub 'bar// rgyud drug gnas pa'i log lta sgrol// tshad med bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul rkang //
103b5(rnying rgyud): ba rnam bzhi stong bdag med// glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi yab sa bskor// stag gi pags pas sham thabs byas// skam rlon thod pas rgyan du byas// rigs bzhi'i klu dang sa bdag gnyen// bregs pa brgyad po phyog
103b6(rnying rgyud): mtshams bsnol// ma he glang po brdzis pa la// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin to// rgyal ba'i sku nyid yin par bshad// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ dbu la rdzogs pa'i rigs lnga'o// yum ni dmig
103b7(rnying rgyud): zad rtsos byed byengs// gnyis su ma dpang bral gnas// mo la An+dan g+h+ra/ 'di ni gas rdzags rgyal ba hU~M// tha ba da nyid 'bar ba yin// mtho tag padz+ra k+Sha/ skye mad ma shes zla ba'i // gshin rjeg shad pa bgags kyi rgyal// 'byung ba
104a1(rnying rgyud): rdu nas na/ ga nam/ na / mang ga sa// 'brug pa pa pang nagan/ na rnanamags na // nag dag rlab sa te// 'a
104a2(rnying rgyud): gas pamo// chos kyad bye stsa la ming ban// gzhang dugashi dag rgyun rje ma sa pa rtag \u0f7f// chos rnams ma 'arnams so rtog/ 'dugs zang po pana'i sang // / tshigs pa
104a3(rnying rgyud): dal la// TI gtsug du la go rdzang bur gyur// bdag shugs gsung gi dzin cad/ badz+ra Sh+T+ri/ tsan ma hA SheN+Da// chos rnams mi long ltab ro// rnam shes phung po rje'i thugs// lag na ri khro ba'i rgyal// ston bdag 'jal/
104a4(rnying rgyud): pas mthid dag 'di gas pa'i sa// bdag shegs drugs kyang ba nyid// badz+rak+sha ma kI la sa par brtan// bya ba thams cad zab pa yi// 'du byed ngan rdza pa rnam pa ni// lus kyi thal po nyi d+ya// 'jig pa sa~M rba// yang das ched gas pa'i r+tha/
104a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs rkyen las ba nyid// ye shes ldan kyis thub ba ni// rgyab tu rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba'o// ma~Mn ces mi 'gyur chags pa med// bran 'byung babyed pa sa// rigs kying dag pa sa pa// pra rba rji bris drub labar bang 'dod
104a6(rnying rgyud): lung nga gshog pa mtshon nagyi// srung gi ba nas lha 'bab pas// gdag pa gcing dang rjog par byeng // sang ga lang lkug pa gnyis/ la nas rdo rngamang ngo'adra// bar mtshams med pa gdushing 'dongs// ga can dam phyog gnyis// bas
104a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus gshog dang gtub par mdzad// sbal gdug 'ang banag tshal// 'anas ma 'bar 'azung ga/ ba byung mthong kyi bang ba la// zha' das 'gas bral thugs shing grol// la ngakyis gdod pa
104b1(rnying rgyud): dzub tha// nam dag padang rnams can gyis ban// da kyad 'dra shA yangs// sbru la ma chog sa nga la 'a dang // rnam par dag pa rnamasapa 'ad thongs// rgyagasungs rgyu rgyags tha dgas s+ho// bsam 'das da ma da na gsang // gra
104b2(rnying rgyud): mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje gsang ba nam mkha'i thugs// mnyam nyid mi ga yos sor gsal// kun rig snying po ye shes mchog/ thugs lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// yid bzhin nor bu chen po ste// mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang rig 'bar// man rnaM ma yod
104b3(rnying rgyud): han bas ma las 'das// ldan gyis zab mdzad rtsong la 'dud// mi mdzad pa nyid mdzad pa rgya// mchags chags bral 'dod chags mdzad// thams cad ma lus sgrol ba yi// phrin las mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rjes su gsung 'gas yon tan phrin las ya
104b4(rnying rgyud): la rdzogs sheng ched du rang la bskyod pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud las le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub par mdzad de/ e ye ba la
104b5(rnying rgyud): ched du brjod do// e stong nyid ye shes rdo rje'i sku// nyon mongs zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// nam mkha'i rang bzhin rdo rje nyed// ces kyang mi chod mi shigs pa// gdod nas ma skyes sems nyid do// yaM ge ye shes las byung ba// gtum khro phrag dog 'joms mdza
104b6(rnying rgyud): pa// sra mkhregs dong tshe rnam rtog 'thor// ra~M gyi ye shes las byung bas// srang 'dzin 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// kun tu me 'od 'bar dang 'phros// 'du klong 'khyil bas 'khrigs pa'o// paM kyi ye shes las byung ba// dregs pa'i nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa
104b7(rnying rgyud): chu grong sbyin zang gzhugs pa la// mtshan ma'i rtog pa 'joms par byed// mo kye ya shes las byung ba// mongs pa'i gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// sra mdzegs btan pardarje che// rdo rnga 'od zang 'big pa yis// rmongs pa'i sun nag chen po 'doms// 'byung ba can
105a1(rnying rgyud): rkang pa rang med pa'ang ldang /
105a2(rnying rgyud): po bcom ldan 'das// kun la rang bzhin gnas pa de// wAn gyis grub pa'i ye shas kyis// gur ramar bsgril ba 'tshal// cis kyang mtshugs ces mi shikra// 'byung ba lus kyi dkyil 'khod ni// ye shes chen pang rang
105a3(rnying rgyud): bzhinaH// nga 'akror r+b+ha pa// mye med dam mang rlo du lams// 'gag pa 'byung bldan gyis thab// thams cad byed pa yu nying ming // rten byung bzung gnas// gan sachosas 'byung ba ga pa'i gabyed// nyon rdzongs 'doms pas parnas
105a4(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog gcod pas 'khor lo'o// gcod dang 'dral bas mtshon cha yin// snang tsam nyid na rang bzhin med// bdun pa dbyer med nam mkha'i ngang // snad srid sku gsung thugs nyid de// rlom pa dbyer med nam mkha'i ngang // de yi rang bzhin de nyid do// zhes gsungs
105a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud las le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i rol pa/ yi ge rnam par 'phrul ba sku gsung thugs rdo rje brjod pa/ gsang sngags don ni lam yin te/
105a6(rnying rgyud): par byed pa las su 'gyur// de phyir skyes bu chen po'o// thugs las mgur gyi bum par grel// zla kham dkyil nas ljags rtser bkram// zhal dang sku yi rnam pa las// kun la khyab par shar ba'o// sku dang gsung thugs lhun grub pa'i// phrin las rom pa chen po ste/
105a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs kyi dril snying po'o// thog mar 'byung ba'i yi ge lnga// mkha' ltar dag pa sems kyi dbyings// chos kyi 'byung gnas chen po ste// drag po dbang sdud yi ge dag/ gsang sngags rgyal po dbu la bzhag/ g.yo brlang la sreg pa me// sAd sa chu len sra brtan pa
105a8(rnying rgyud): 'byung lnga'i dbyings nas blangs nas kyang // gsang sngags phreng ba'i gral la bzhag/ kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa ste// 'ong nas 'byung ba'i yi ge dang // skyes bu can gyi rang bzhin dang // de bzhin snyan dang shangs dang choms// 'byung ba'i yi ge slon ma'i 'dra//
105b1(rnying rgyud): ldan mag la gnas sag/ na lags// nab mag da dang/ na 'ab dung bdus pa la/ na mang can danag/ da da pa dang / na nga nga sa// gas du byaman ma
105b2(rnying rgyud): dating me dang zhwa yi ba ras nas thang // de 'og pu maM le gA yang // gshin rje gshang na zugs las bslang // de bzhin gsung gi yog yang // gsong byed ngam can thugs nas blang // thugs kyi miga'i med pa ste// rdo 'dzags byed bugs la sna nga //
105b3(rnying rgyud): bkrenang bral la gzhag/ nga 'og gsum tshan gas ma yin te// gnang dgra 'joms bathal la bzhag/ gsang sngags rgyal po brgyad gnyis pa// bcu dkyil ba'i ga'u nas// blangs te thal la gnas pa'o// thugs ky-i yi ge 'bru badz+ra pe/
105b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i brags las drang // nga 'og zil gyis mnar bya'o// 'bar ba na khung bugs nas sprul// da 'og gsang thugs 'thab cad de// gshin rdzod rgyal po las kyi bdag/ mun las thams cad byed pa'o// darjes phan las rdzogs pa'i gsus/
105b5(rnying rgyud): sa la ba bya/ ga ni bya ldan / la ba sa sa/
105b6(rnying rgyud): sa su / ya du / sa g+sa / / pa sa ma/
106a1(rnying rgyud): thog ma nam mkhang nga zang // gnyis na 'thar byed jal// gsum pa 'bar byed 'angs// bzhi pa smad kyang ngang la// labs byung rngag// drag pa smra ba dang rngu yin// bdun padon sun du bshad// brgyad pastan la dbapa sa
106a2(rnying rgyud): bcu pa rdo rje 'bar batshams// yi ge'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o// mtha' nas dbus su sdang ba'i tshul// 'khrul 'khor rgyal po rnal ma ste// srog dang snying po ldan par bya// thems dang gzir dang ldan pas ni// sred med bu yang 'joms par byed//
106a3(rnying rgyud): ga'ang sa rdzas ci dgos// dbus nas mtha' du sbrel ba dag/ las kyi 'khrul 'khor bzlog pa'o// lha rnams gnad la dbab pa'o// gyi dang nang du 'gro ldog ste// dkrug pa ar la gtang ba yin// ma mtha' 'khor 'das dral bar byed// shes ba
106a4(rnying rgyud): pas su brjod// rdo rje nas ni choms kyi bar// 'bar ba'i 'khor los 'thub par byed// gsang ba bka' la 'khor lo 'di// bdag shegs kyil bas mi zag na// bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa// 'jig chen gzhan dag ltaH sgom//
106a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po 'di dag gis// bsrung dang bzlog dang bshig pa dang // gsang dang stobs gnan gshed du dbab// dbye dang phal ba la sogs pa// las rnams ma lus 'grub par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyang
106a6(rnying rgyud): le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rol pa chen po'i phrin las/ gdug pa 'dul ba'i rnam par 'jal ba chad du brjod pa/ bdeg shegs sngo rdal dgongs pa ste/ lnga brgyad kun gyi snying po yin// srin po gdug pa la
106a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// mu stegs dregs pa rdzu 'phrul can// lha srin dregs pa ma lus 'joms// bra mthe na sngags la sogs pa// thams cad balkog cing bshig pa ste/ dzo nang 'gras spobs 'joms pa// drag pa sngags grod las mtsha ba 'di// yid
106b1(rnying rgyud): 'dab krags nyams dga' bar// dpa' brdal ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// s+ya shes pa yis gas pa la// drug tha las kyi man+t+ralaH// seMn/ bang ris ga d+haH// rna ti bya ba 'di da/ rten du 'ad dang/ da do
106b2(rnying rgyud): las rnams so sor bya ba yin// gang yin pa rnag pa'i rdzas blangs te// dbang po dad cing tshad ldan la// ming rus spyong po gdub par gyi// tsar rog po dmigs pa'o d+her// g.yas su mo rgyud bris pa gdags// de bzhin ge yon da/
106b3(rnying rgyud): sngags pa bris la gdags// tshon gyi zag pas bcings pa dang // mgo deng gA la sre g.yon ris par brag/ ka ra bI ra bral po se'u// bya ma bA myadza las bdug// srin tshad dkar nag drag po'i mdzor// ga dang dun dus dang klung la//
106b4(rnying rgyud): dris su 'jig/ gang gi rangs nas rdzas blangs la// gzugs bca' mying dang yi// ci// zhing lpags rgyal drag sngags ci// 'khor lo byas pa'i khung dra dril// mon nam phag pa'i'athod par mnan// gri lpags shing shing tsA pa~M la// ji ma'i zag gi
106b5(rnying rgyud): brden/ gang yinas de de dmigs pa// zhag grangs gsum dung pyod pa dpab// gsal ba gsum dang ldan pa yis// sras mchog phyar ba stong la gdab// dka bar ltar na bdu bdu 'ang// dzo nas la~Mn mdzad cad dam/
106b6(rnying rgyud): can 'og du mnan// zhe lteng dag sngags 'di dag brjod pa'o// tshig rdo dri AHd+ha ya dza/ snying la dran dun dzA/ a muka myag zad/ theg nar myog zang / un na shag rbang/ sbyang nan bla ma de la rmad/ e tra dz+haH/ phreng shag
106b7(rnying rgyud): rAg srog phreng phreng dru dun dang/ e ya ma du rutsha nas/ ming dang dus su 'dzag par bya// bsad pa las kyi zhwa gri 'di// bdeg shegs nus pa dral ba'o// che ga mo thig dang / nr-i rbar tha~M / rnaM m+bi 'dzad/ tra~M rgyag blong la/ mAr mdzad/
107a1(rnying rgyud): thA ya tra bdad m+b+ha mAr ya phaT// a mu ka trig nan/ a Tar thung ltar yanang / myag grong la m+bAr ya nang / drag sngags nus pa dril ba'i mchog/ phyin las ldan gyi rtsa bar gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ams cad byed dang /
107a2(rnying rgyud): pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud las le'u ste drag pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rol pa chen po'i phrin las/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba brjod pa/ mi rtog dbyings las sku bzhengs pa// bcom ldan dpal chen gshin rje gshed/
107a3(rnying rgyud): mthing nag chen po 'jigs pa'i su// dbu yi gtsug na 'bar ba khrung // phyag g.yas dregs pa lha ma srin// sde brgyad spyi yi rang bzhin te// las kyi gshi rje mgo dgu pa// phyag g.yon dregs pa de yi yum// lha mo nag mo dbu bdun ma// spyan ni sdang mig
107a4(rnying rgyud): tu blta// zhal nas ha ha zhes sgrog pa// rdo rje'i sku dang yan lag rnams// kla rigs du mas brgyan par mdzad// chags med pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ dbang gi rgyal po dpangs bsnyed do// rdo rje drag po brjid pa po// phrin las rdzogs mdzod he ru ka/ gru gsum mthing
107a5(rnying rgyud): nag 'bar ba'i dbus// bskal pa'i mi dpung 'bar ba yi// gnyis med rol pa'i byang chub sems// sngags kyi 'phro 'dus gdug pa 'dul// dregs pa gzir dang byas pa bshig/ zhen bzlog gnas spor zug pa dbyung // bcings grol sde brgyad dkrug pa dang /
107a6(rnying rgyud): rar ka shed rang la dbab pa'o// zhes gsang sngags 'di dag 'thon te// oM ma kro ti ka ya mAn+ta ka nan ta kra shrI many+dza kA la d+hu pa/ g+h+r-iHd+hIHti mu kha ye/ a che ge mo a/ I che ge mo I/ u che ga mo u/ u na u ne u ne/ u u u/ saM d+ha ye/ bya tsa ye/
107a7(rnying rgyud): du ru ye/ tsa d+ha ye/ byi ta ya/ ha la ye/ che ge mo tri ga nan/ a dur rdung / cheg mo phyag rngu ri la rbad/ e ba tsai \u0f7f ma he ka/ tri yi ha~M ka/ tsa dur thar ka/ b+his mdzan dzas dkar ya trA~M phaT/ bshig pa'o// ya ma e sarba bu ya dzid+ha sarba duSh+Tan u u rbad bum pa
107b1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ d+hanas mthoH/ yun sunasan/ !pAka ya mA dA ya phaT/ banag pas// he ya ma ma du rnam ma nga rtag/ tsakA ma sa na du/ dzangaHdza Na gA ga na tsal/ bdan ta ya ma sa tsAm/ byang chung dza/ thA pa /
107b2(rnying rgyud): pa na tra/ ma tid tug / rgyag rgyag nang / sarba du d+han la ti d+haH/ bai ta phyung phrabaT/ s+yAng byung / dbyung ba'o// sarba bathAM bri gA zir zad/ kr-id+ha ya ma rbud/ mi shig thog shig/ gdun dadun b+h+yo/ dran d+h+r-i ga ti ma zad sdig/ /
107b3(rnying rgyud): byi pa ga dadu / zad rathang tram d+hi lkog dzaM/ mdza drang thog ma ma rbud/ nag po tso/ stod kha rag zis kyi dran dur zad/ d+hi na gyis ma grog dran dun trig nAn/ ma hA rA dza dun dun zang / \u0f7fhi ti drin dang / thaM pa la ma shug mo srog tig nar/
107b4(rnying rgyud): la dang / rdo tsor nadan dran zad/ ha~M li hu la bor la dran nad / srog cig nan cad/ badz+ra sAr+thA ruH dradun dran nad/ badz+ra swA d+ha a hri dran dan nad/ a ka shaM a dz+ra snyed la dag dun dran rjod/ a Thatsi srog la mA ra ye rbang / dzin nan/ rA thu la mad can
107b5(rnying rgyud): nyi bral tsun mig par shin shing na na tug nan/ drug byigani don ma du cig pa theg zang / ru waM dul bu ro la tsha/ mdunas nas/ dzad mas kar la/ ma m+b+har ya rbang/ the gzeng / dran to// rig po phyug/ ngan she mo ngal na
107b6(rnying rgyud): mo mA ra ya zad/ khung tra dun dun k+She ma na smrig nan/ shong khri mo ro na mA ra ya rbad/ thag ma mA ya k+ka ba rag ru ru dzi dun dun rbad/ ma ma lhag zhug/ ma bdun srog tig nan/ rmad tha~Md la/ dbug dang ma gar dag shig la sogs// rang gshad dbab pa la
107b7(rnying rgyud): kyis so// rgyal ba dgongs po 'dus nas kyang // spu gri mngon par brjod pa'o// bsdeb kyi rgyal po las kun byed// yang na rang gnad stobs bshig pa// 'khor lo nyid kyis byed pa yin// gdeng chen gsum ldan dpa' bo yi// thams cad 'khor lo
108a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa / rdzun ma su ma da sus na sla sa sa
108a2(rnying rgyud): drag pas bsad pa'i las dag de// gzhan gang gdug pazug nas maH// mar pa 'ang dang / na gnan gnas// tha~Mng thal dag tu bsgrub pa brnam// dag 'bang ba'i mjal la// dang ldag gshi shA// a r+tha k+Shakangs ga
108a3(rnying rgyud): drag dang mchol khrag kha shog pa// me nang shwa zan tshwa rtsa yis// 'khor mo lang+ga bI bar bya// dud khrod ro yogs la shis// e gnas gdug pa'i mtshon gyis bskor// nang du mod nam rabs chad mag// len byed tag gdags pa tI// gzang modang cad mkha' la
108a4(rnying rgyud): mAr ya po'i rga la// yig 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis te// 'ching dag gshin rje'i drag sngags rnams// was gnad rtswa yi nang na gnas// des bskul gnas bzhir 'khor ba yis// rtsa bzhi bcad pas las su 'gyur// grong nyid ngang las gshin rje'i gshed/
108a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i su// rigs kyi bdag po lnga ldan pa// rdzogs par rang bzhin ldan gyis grub// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstims// rang sdang dbyer med rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje'i sku lnga'i thugs ka nas// rang rang dugs mtshan yig 'bul//
108a6(rnying rgyud): rang sngags kyis bskor ba ni// byang chub lam gyi sgron ma yin// nag po dug gi mtshon cha yan// gri lcags sher shing lung pa la// sde ba'i bag gis par thung la// gu phul yungs kar la sogs pas// gzi brjid 'bang bdU ta ba ni// sras mchog la
108a7(rnying rgyud): snod rdzo zan po la// ral gri'i sgra 'phur ba'is// klan gnyis ma la tsho che gro// lag na ril gri'i rdzig mdzab 'bang // smad ni lpags phreng nung gsum pa// mthing nag 'bar ba 'jigs par bsgom// de rdzogs sngags rgyal po 'dim/
108b1(rnying rgyud): ya ma ra na d+ha Ti ra ya// las kyi gshin rje thams cad kyi// srog gi ngo bo bsrung ba'o// rtsu ba drag po'i gsang sngags la// spu gri nyi ma bzhi pa yi// tshangs pa la sogs gnas rnams bod// 'khor lo dang gi rgyud las ldang // ya mA rA dza
108b2(rnying rgyud): ba ma ya che ge mo klang khrag a mu kha phyag rbad/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ rak+ta tsa ra ya che ge mo mgrin brag trig nan myog rbad/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ mur tsa ya che ge mo ste khrag u nan shag rbad/ yak+She ya d+ha ni rA ma ya/ mA ra ya che ge mo'i rkeng
108b3(rnying rgyud): bu re la rbad / nyi ma bzhi du dang ba k+She/ kun du sngags kyi bar bar brab// ni m+be ya rbad/ ma ra du ya ma snying ya ma khrag chen mo'i srog sa nr-i bu ra dzuM dza/ phreng shag raM ye zad aM/ lnga ru las kyis kyi ba bya// mtha' brtul lam
108b4(rnying rgyud): phun bzung 'thub khrung phran rdzas brag/ mtha' ru khur gdab gzir byas te// ral pa tshal dgu'i lag tu gtad// lho phyogs 'o na khrung rtsing pa'am// yang na bka' rten byed can nam// byang du ba bltas chu gag dazang // rgya gram lam ma ma 'jig
108b5(rnying rgyud): don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab// 'khor los mtha' las brtul ba yin// srog la ming rus rte nA la gdags// zhag grangs bdun gyi bar dag tu// leng+ga gsum la rim pas brab// lgang na las 'di 'grub pa yin// skad chen 'byed na
108b6(rnying rgyud): larnag/ tha mar dgrang zlog chen po bya// ra bkral khrag la zor byas 'phang // snying gshag nang du ling+ga gzhug/ khar btsang chog khung dag tu gnan// yang na gre gnas sa ru gnan// brtag pa las kyi thun kha ste// bya ba sngas na dus min pas/
108b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs bka' yi chad pa yis// rang gi rgyud kyang brlag byas nas// rdo rje dmyal bar 'byams par 'gyur// bde gshegs sras mchog yur pa ste// dngas ma 'dus pa'i srog rten la// dkar nag mtshams su mA ra ya// dngas ma 'dus pa rtsa bzhi
109a1(rnying rgyud): mdo// tsa d+ha srog gi gzhi la gdab// 'od zer ze ba 'das pa bzhin// phur ba nyid la 'dus pa las// khong seng byang chub sems bcud nas// spyi bor phyung ste dang la bstim// tshe bkrag rang la bsdu ba'o// de ltar bstan
109a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i lan ste// gnan na ma yang na bsreg par bya// de yi gsang sngags bstan pa'o// kI li kI la ya tri ga nan thig nan/ snying gzer spud nan nr-i hu ra hUM dza/ myag dzA ril rbad ya/ gnod gdug rnam gnyis gang yang rung / btab na lha yang brlag
109a3(rnying rgyud): par byed// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud las le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rol pa'i phrin las rdzogs par brjod pa/ chos dbyings skye ba med pa las
109a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes rol pa'i thugs rtse yis// ye nas chos rnams skye med las// rtog pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal ba// de dag bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// 'phrul pa'i tshul du phrin las so// bde gshegs nus pa dril ba yin// gsang sngags rgyal po
109a5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid kyis// 'dod pa'i don kun bsgrub pa'o// bzlog dang dkrugs shing dral byed pa// 'di dag las kyi mtha' dag ste// gsod pa'i sgra gri ldan pa yi// 'thung ba lnga yi lus ngag yid// bla gnas dgu 'joms tshul du bya// ma yengs srog
109a6(rnying rgyud): gting 'dzin pas// bdag nyid su lnga 'o rang bzhin du// ye shes lha yi tshogs kyis gang ba yin// ti 'dzin dkyil 'bor mtha' yas mchog/ las su rung ba'i rnal 'byor pa// de yis mi 'thung gang yang med// ting 'dzin grong du la 'dris pa/
109a7(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs rgyal ba de yin pas// sangs rgyas zhes pa gud na med// bstan pa stobs su gyur pa yin// bka' don las kyi mtshan ma dang // 'dod dang log par dam nyams pa// gnod sbyin byung ba bskal bar bya// bden pa'i don nyid ma mtha
109b1(rnying rgyud): byas// lus ngag yid kyi 'angadra byed kyis// lus dang sams su snang ba'o// 'byung ba lnga la rten bcas nas// nyon mongs 'bral ba snang ba dag/ rang las thung bas gshed du dbab// a la ra ba laM/ 'byung ba gshed du dbab pa na/ rak+Shan
109b2(rnying rgyud): mo ha/ drug gsum gnad la dbab pa'o// ra ka de ban mo te na ma hi hi shwed+d+ho/ drag lpag nang la dbab pa'o// kA la wA/ tsaH/ zad chad bre ri le/ chung chung sad sad rbad nan/ srog la tho la rtso nr-i rngo zad nan/ staM b+ha ya nan/ gsum drug dgra hU~M
109b3(rnying rgyud): sa// lus ngag yid gsul gcod par byed// lci dang bye brag so sa y-i// rje brgyad la sogs dregs pa la// ring rang ga shed du dbab pa'o/ rig sngags la sogs gzhan gyis byas// be shig dang gi shed de dbab pa dang // ngag gnan dus
109b4(rnying rgyud): stobs dpral ba sogs// rgyab dang ldan pa las rim gyir// dus gsum bdag shegs thams cad kyi// dgongs don thob 'dus pa yi// 'byung ba ye nas lun grub pa'i// lus kyi rnam par snang ba 'dra// rtog pa'i dbang gis mdzan pa la//
109b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang gis dngos por snang // yongs med yanas mngon sangs rgyas// ye nas thal ba'i dkyil 'byor yin// rtog med ye shes gzhal bas khang // rdo rje phreng po yan lag rnams// ye nas ldan grub rdzogs sangs rgyas// swa lnga'i rang bzhin
109b6(rnying rgyud): shes sgra// bskyed pa la dgos dang bzhin gnas// bde gshegs spyag sung 'gas btsugs// rgya mtsho dngas pa'i gna'agyur lar// skang la rang bzhin med pa'o// thugs rnaM mi nas stong ba nyid// rnam par tog med ya byas so// stong pa nyid
109b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul ni// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// spyan dang mchod bstod byar med de// rang spang dbyer med spyan drang mchog/ gnyis mdo rol bas mchod pa yin// de nyid gus brtson bstod phyag go// phrin las sna tshogs rol pa'i gyad/
110a1(rnying rgyud): mar snang ba'i chos rnams la// rol ba thams kyi bye brag rnams// gnyis med 'bras bur rgyas btab nas// ma 'byung klong na rdzogs pa che// zhes phrin las thams cad rdzogs par brjod do'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
110a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud las le'u dbu pa'o// / bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dgongs don khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// bde gshegs kyal ba'i dgongs don zhes bya ba/ dgongs pa spyi dril gyi rgyud/ ba la
110a3(rnying rgyud): yul gyi rgyal po ba su d+har dang / rdo rje yang dbang gter gyis b+ha ra sa'i brag phug tu/ bsgyur zhus gtan la phab pa'o// sngags dang mtshon cha bka'i bdag po gsum gyi rgyas btab nas bzhag pa'o// / sa pa ya// rgya gar ska
110a4(rnying rgyud): ya ma kA la pa tranI la ta nA/ bod skad du/ gshin rje nag po chu thig sngon mo'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ sngon gyi dus na byang chub sems dpa'i gnas/ shaM
110a5(rnying rgyud): dung rab tu dga' ba'i tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la/ bdud dang lha byin gyis mu stegs log lha'i sbyor ba byas pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi 'od zer las lho phyogs ri bo rtse dmar nag 'khyil ba'i
110a6(rnying rgyud): dur khrod kyi dbus na/ dur khrod kyi ma mo dang / gshin rje'i gnas na/ gshin rje nag go 'chi bdag 'char ka nag go bya ba de rab tu khro bas 'bar bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de la ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul pa/ spyan gyi 'od zer dang / thugs kyi sbyor ba brtse
110a7(rnying rgyud): ste bskyod pas/ bdud lha byin rab tu dang ngas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'od srungs dang / cang shes ko'u di n+ya la sogs pas/ bram ze ma mya ngan las 'das ma bya bar bayul bas/ bram ze ma des/ 'chi bdag nag po 'char ka la 'di skad gsol
110b1(rnying rgyud): kyab com ldan 'das kyis bdu sa byanam bathul bas/ drug lnga'i dang bzhin stegs log pa'i bsgrub la thugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las da pa 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das ni thags pa'adang las mag so/ 'khod na gnas pa thu bya kyangang na /
110b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i byor bas mthul bas// 'di 'dul ba'i byor ba mdzad par bu zhes gsol pas/ 'chi bdag chen po ngas/ 'bar ba rngam byed khros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka nas 'od zer nag po bkyebs/ 'jig pa drag po'i thog phab ste/
110b3(rnying rgyud): rab dbang phyug dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / bdud lha byin dpung dadag yog tu brnyas pa rnams padang shing ldangs nas/ brgyal zhing 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dgyes pa'i brda' mdzad nas/ 'khor tshe dang ldan pa sh+tsa
110b4(rnying rgyud): bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / cang shes ko'u di tsa la sogs rjes su yi ring ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpalag shin rje 'chi bdag nag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so legs so khyod legs so// bcom
110b5(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal khyod legs so// 'char ka nag po khyod legs so// byang chub sems dpa' khyod legs so// phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba la shod cig/ khyod kyis rab tu shod cig/ rab tu gnas par gyis shig/ ces bka'
110b6(rnying rgyud): stsal to// de nas 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po des/ dbu ri rab kyi rtse mor thal bas/ steng lha'i 'jig rten dbang du bsdus so// zhabs rgya mtsho'i gting du thal bas/ 'og mu'i 'jig rten dbang du bsdus so// phyag bar sdang gi khams su brkyang bas/
110b7(rnying rgyud): ra rab dang bar snang gi lha srin sde brgya dbang du bsdus so// baM thu byebs ya las/ 'od zer bye bas yabakye bas/ bdud kyi dmag dpung rdul du brlag go// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sngags kyi rnam pa mang po phral lo// chu thig sngon po'i chud las/
111a1(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi'i le'u dang po'o// / de nas 'chi bdag nag pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig nga yis bstan par bya// bram ze mdzes ldan ma la bshad// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba yis// rnam bzhi'i 'khor ba
111a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad la/ log lhas 'tsho ba'i bdud rnams kun// 'dul ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// bsgrub dang gsad dang bskang ba dang // bzlog dang gnan pa'i las dag byed// dang po bsgrub pa'i las dag la// drag po bsrub pa'i gnas dag tra// da
111a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bri dang rdzas dgra ma dang // rten dang drag po'i sku bcas dang // bskyed dang dgug dang spob dang // bzlas dang mchod dang ting 'dzin dang // zad cing las la sbyar ba dang // zor dang thun dang mdos dang bzlog/ 'khor lo bca' dang bsreg pa
111a4(rnying rgyud): dang // kha tshor gso ba'i las dag dang // gnan pa dag tu shes par bya// dang po maN+Dal bri ba ni// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal brtsig/ zur gsum 'khor lo bri ba ni// nag po'i tshon gyis bri bar bya// e dug mthing nag zla gam can// me ri 'bar ba'i
111a5(rnying rgyud): tsad pan can// mchod bzlog bsrung dang bsad mnan gyi// de la rdzas kyi rnam pa ni// tshang ba dag tu dgod par bya// de dag rim du dgod pa ni// dbus su mu rten dgod par bya// dud khrod sa la 'chi bdag nyid// dag po'i chos dang ldan par bya//
111a6(rnying rgyud): na bum pa tshe rten can// bzlog na mchod rten rab gnas can// gsod na spu gri sbrul zhags can// gan na mchod rten de bzhin no// 'khor lo bcas dang ldan pa ni// spang ba'i 'khor lo skye bo'i gtsug/ bzlog pa'i 'khor lo stong ga ste// bsad pa
111a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo lte ba ru// mnan pa'i 'khor lo gsang ba ru// rigs bzhi sbrul gyi rkyen cham ldan// sa steng sa 'og gong ma'i gnas// sa bla'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// lci gtsug ral pa gyen du brdzes// sa klu 'dul phyir yan lag la// gang la dam
111b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rten dang ldan// sa 'og 'dul phyir mjug ma sbrul// ri rab tshul 'dra'i gra gsum ste// gru gsum nang du dmigs pa'i ming // thod pa sgam por dag chu thug/ nang du bsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor ba byor la/ tshon srung dag gis
111b2(rnying rgyud): rgya gram bcing // de yi steng du rten dang ldan// de yi phyogs bzhir phur pa bzhi// 'chi bdag nag po'i sprul pa ni// brje nag po spyi gtsug sprul// bon po sngon po lkog ma'i 'og/ zhang blon nag po lto bar sbal// mon pa nag po thags ka nas// sprul pa'i sras bzhi
111b3(rnying rgyud): cor gyis sbrul// de la bskor te de yi gnas// ma gshin lha tshogs rtsang gis drangs// gtor ma chen po'i dbus su ni// 'chi bdag zhal phyung dpal bshos dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs dang bcas// de yi spyan sngar dgod par bya// 'bru zan nag po de rnams la//
111b4(rnying rgyud): kong bu zur gsum rtsang dang bcas// sdong gcig ma dang me reg ma'i// 'phangs rtse rtsang dang bcas pa yi// dag po'i kong zor dus su bsten// zor gyi rnam pa grangs su dgod// chu thig sngon mo'i rgyud las/ bca' gzhi bstan pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o//
111b5(rnying rgyud): 'di yi ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// bdag bskyed pa dang gzhan bskyed pa// 'khor bskyed pa dang gsum du 'dod// de la dang po bdag bskyed pa// mi dmigs pa dang gsal ba dang // hUM gi rang bzhin gsal ba dang // yaM dang de dang baM dang laM// de bung rlung dang me dang chu// sa
111b6(rnying rgyud): ri rang de bzhin te// b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang du'o// thod pa rtsibs dang zhing chung brtsig/ ka ba bzhi la lham gdung dang // dral grab brkyang bzhing las byas// sbrul gyi 'phar gdugs zar tshags// khrag gi zham chu 'bab pa la// mthong nas nyi zla 'char ba
111b7(rnying rgyud): de nas dbar po rtsibs drug la// rtsibs brgyad mu khyud sgo dang ldan// mthang ro dang gang dmigs de// chu grang snying du ni zlas mtshan// de sted b+h+rUM las rdo rngar gyur/ oM ts+tshaHd+hIH kr-i tA nan hUM hU~MhUM phaT/ ces pa'i sgra dang bcas pa yi// nag po zhal gcig phya
112a1(rnying rgyud): ba pa// za mtham pa ma smras // tu stsas gyu gdas// sa padas can du gyul// nan gas // ya dpa / rnan pa na// brgyad pa rnam nga
112a2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba gnon// nag mo mi thag dbyas par 'brel// thang dzan stobs dang 'thud po'i tshul// dal mdan du bskyed par// 'chang kad pa sbrul gyi madz+ra// tsug gdangs pa'i gdangs kau cad// gang gad dang nas dang ldan// sprul ga
112a3(rnying rgyud): dmigs de rangango // ra ma ti dang ldan pa de// drug mo rmed kom zlal dang rgyal// de rgyab ma mo bdun dang spyan// dkar mo mgyogs byed byung la zhon// gnam gyi dkar mi dang srid pa'i rgyal mo dang // smras pa'i mamogasum dang rdo rje ljang gshog rten/
112a4(rnying rgyud): dkar ro lan phran cad de krung na bdu// ma long ga mab dang sa ba dz+ral// su rnams parjog byengs mo badren// g.yas nam nag ta nig bdu// g.yas pa dang nag g.yon pa yod mya na// rnag po bkrag med ya rje dge khyong // rog pa mthan
112a5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi bar gcan// kha la du srid pa ba la thal// zangs kyi b+har can dang bdun po ni// re lde nag po bdun gyi bshan pa yin// srid pa 'i rgyud tu bdun bzlog pa yin// g.yon gyi phyogs nam mo bdun gnas pa// e ke dza ti nag mor mar+d+ha/ 8
112a6(rnying rgyud): dz+wa la sogs te mched bzhi dang // lho 'byangs ma dang bal mo nug mo'i tshogs// nad rgyal khung nas dang nag la du gsol// ral pa'i gseb nas khwag gi bu yug 'dzubs// kA rnams ldog byed ma mo bdun yin no// bya sangs dang ni tal ba dang // tshar dbudang
112a7(rnying rgyud): ni ya ba ti// 'byung ba dmang na ga rdeg pa dang // a ba glang mgo chos kyi rgyal po bdun// kham papa ma kyi rgyal pa thogs pa ste// ro langs lto bya'i tshogs rnams bzlag pa med// bcwo pon po zhing bron modapa pa'i// sprul pa bzhi yang phyogs pazhi dag na gnas/
112b1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gsal bar mos pa byas// yig 'bu dag las ma bskyed rang bzhin drag pa'i shugs/ rnga thag sngon ma'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i la'u nyeg/ sum pal// / da nas dkrug pa'i rting 'dzin ni// bdag gi zla las 'ong zer 'phros// rang bzhin gang
112b2(rnying rgyud): nas ye shes dbug/ bstims la mchod pa 'bral ba ni// bdud rtsi rak+ta gtor ma dang // gnyis su med pa'i gtor ma bya// bdag don gzhan don gang la dmigs// de la gsol ba gdapa la mchod// de bzhin gnas pa'i cho ga bya// bstod pa bya zhing dngos su
112b3(rnying rgyud): blang // mu Tig sngon mo'i rgyud las/ stim byed sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas drag sngags kyi sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ oM hrISh+T+r-i i kr-i tA na na hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHhUM hrIH/ d+hi la a mo ka ni a mr-i ta/ raSh+Ta ba lid+ha kha Sha ShA hi/ mchod pa 'bul ba
112b4(rnying rgyud): sngags so// sha re d+hoH/ ma ri d+hoH/ khrag ma ma b+h+yoH/ tsa ri snying b+h+yoH/ snying b+h+yoH/ ma ri thod khrag la dzaH/ khrag ri snying la yaH/ dz+r-i hr-i tshodaH/ mu l-i chongaH/ sha lo tshadaH/ shal gying kying b+h+yoH/ sa ma ya a ti pra ma neH/ bar du na bzlogaH/ 'chang ka nag po rtsa ba'i drag sngags so/
112b5(rnying rgyud): au ga na ma ye g+hoH/ sa yar b+h+yoH/ rgyang yer b+h+yoH/ rgyang mo b+h+yoH/ ser N+yad dz+ha b+h+yo b+h+yoHbyaH/ rgyang yer so daH/ mu yer sodaH/ mi reng sodaH/ dgra snying la dz+ha b+h+yoH/ dkar mo bdun gyi sngags so// au ru lu ru lu ha ha ya g+h+ra bi ril khrag la rbadaH/ rus la chemasaH/ dpra sti
112b6(rnying rgyud): lad+d+hanag mo bdun kyi dag stabs so// oM rul duldan pa la yag shug pabyo/ dang // yag mo 'alta ba rjo// dag ma khal ba coM/ yag so ba la ba / badz+ram+b+ha thar pa dag
112b7(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo/ ma mo bdun dang ro langs bdun gyi sngags so// oM ya ma snying b+h+yoH/ ya ma khrag b+h+yoH/ sarba thA ta b+h+yoH/ ya ma ra tsa hU~M/ ya mr-i rbu Tu b+h+yoH/ dgra lding la n+ya t+ma d+d+hoH/ gshin rje bdun gyi sngags mo/ tra ki dzAH/ ru lu ru lu la~M la b+h+yoH/ nag po srog bsdul
113a1(rnying rgyud): yak+ka par la gyiH/ mdos 'bang ba'i lugs so// nag po pra mu ya/ ha ra ya/ nag po ga byas/ he lam pa tha / nying la thun gyi gyub+h+ya// glag nal tsa la skyob la ldan/ myur yaSh+TAH/ ha ra ha thar thar/ nya
113a2(rnying rgyud): snying la b+h+yoH/ bdud po mi za na bdun gyi drug sngags so// oM ha he mo ha hri ta ya/ pa ra ni hUM phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yos ma yang zlog 'ablog/ a la la pra mo hob+h+yob+h+yo sa ma ya bzlog bzlog/ kong zor gyi sngags so// hri nag mo du na ma snying pa tra la dun// khra
113a3(rnying rgyud): sngags // d+hud+d+ho TI mu b+h+yoH/ rdo zor gyi sngags so// dzI pad+d+hi ma hUM hUM ya ya yaH/ skye b+h+yo kyo/ mda' zor gyi sngags so// rak+Sho ti sarba d+hi raM a b+he dz+wa la raM mA ra ya phaTaH/ sbyin sreg gi sngags so/ sarba sha d+hu na tA ya mA ra yaH/ ba
113a4(rnying rgyud): sngags so/ badz+ra tsi du na rbad rbad swA hAH/ snying khrag dun khrig rbang rbad sA hIH/ bruM shig khrug ling rbad rbad swA hAH/ snyid khrag la dran chu g+h+ra rbad rba da swA hAH/ tsa ra ba bzhi'i sngags so// ka sha ka sha brag tshal shag shag pA ra ya rak+Sha snying mod ya ya brang brang zhu
113a5(rnying rgyud): ril di la rbad rbadaHya ya kha lar klu chung drung tsakra rag/ chung chudaHdum bu rag bung chudaHtsit+ta ra k+Sha rbad chungaHlas kyi sngags so// oM bud+d+ha pa tra d+h+r-i na ma s+thi ya d+hi kA nAM sarba ta thA ga tA naM/ sarba trA prA Ni ha tA pAstiH/ d+harma tA ba lI hrIH/ a sa man+ta to man+taH/
113a6(rnying rgyud): shA sa ni/ ha ra ha ra/ smAd s+pha ra Ni/ bi ga ta rA ga bud+d+ha d+harma tAM/ sa ra sa ra sa ma pa lA/ ha sa ha satwa ya tra ya b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA ba ra/ yak+Sha Ne dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swA hA/ shA ri'i bus byin kyis brnyeb pa'i ring bsrel dbul ba'i sngags so/ oM ya
113a7(rnying rgyud): tu pri b+hU we/ he hu d+he Sh+Thi ta thA ga to h+ya wa rata hiSh+Thany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha i waM pA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hAH/ rten 'brel 'di 'od srungs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ring bsrel dbul ba'i sngags te g.yas pa'i sngags so// na maHwad sarba ta thA ga ta ha ra ha ra b+h+rUMH/ cang shes ko'u di rgya'i
113b1(rnying rgyud): gas na tu ga tun da na na
113b2(rnying rgyud): ston 'brel ba ga gis 'khor lo dang / nga rdzog pas dang mngon pa'o// byi ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ba pa 'khod lagag cas// dang du dag ga ma phrag sem la// mA ra ya ya~M lan \u0f7f// de ltar bsadang bya ming dang rjem//
113b3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sngags// 'a gros pa nyid 'bral ni// byacu gnyis 'khor ba lpags dug na/ mazang ba kyis byed gnyis kyis bcwo// dbus su ming da rjes dang gzugs// gsang pa'i sngags ni mA la// stong dpa gas
113b4(rnying rgyud): rAs A li kA li dang // sngags ni rak+Sha ces pa sbyar// bzlog na bzlog ces bsgyur ba dang // gong ras 'azlog pa'i sngags kyis bskor// dbus su ming dang rus dang gzugs// gsad pa'i sngags nI mA ra ya// gong ras gsod pa'i sngags kyis 'dor
113b5(rnying rgyud): mnan pa'i sngags kyis mtha' mar nan// nga ba'i 'byor lo dang la gr-i// sgrog na zhing ras dag la'o// gisad pa dur khrong ngas lngapo// man nu ba dugachod ga yam pa la'o// br-i dus rdo tho bsrung bya'o// dbrog pa nyis byed 'o// gas
113b6(rnying rgyud): sras dpal 'o// mnan pa zo ngas pana'o// rnga theg ldan mo'i rgyud las 'char mtho ba'i le'u gyi drugapa // 'di ma ngos byu 'o// lo gdon pazhidu shes par \u0f7f// phreng ba'i mangs dang 'jog pa'i dang // ba
114a1(rnying rgyud): k+ta dmar bas bkadra ba yang 'dus
114a2(rnying rgyud): mnan pa' ste// ma tra 'bag tu bca' ba dang // drig dam me mo'i bsnying po dang // bca' ba las kyi man ngag bya// ring bab theg pa bang rim ldan// spyang ba dag la glang bcu dang // ma gshin bshas bu bca' ba dang /
114a3(rnying rgyud): byang bu bdun gsum nyi shu gcig/ rlung gi phyogs su gdab pa dang // mchod rten bca' dang mar me bca'// 'khor lo lto bar gzhug pa'o// bzlog pa 'char ka 'dra ba la// kong bor brgya'am nyi shu ga cig/ bshos bu zu dgasum khrag drug can/

114a6(rnying rgyud): dpal zhal du bya// gsod na glang po che yi zhal// gnon na ma he'i zhal du bya// srung ba rang gi gnas khang du// mchod pi bya zhing gsol ba gdab// bzlog pa khang steng mthon por bya// gsad pa gru gsum nang du'o// mnan pa chu mig shul du bya// drag po
114a7(rnying rgyud): mdos de'i phyogs su btang // rol mo'i bcas dang ldan byas gzhug/ zor dang bcas te gtang bar bya// chu thig sngon ma'i rgyud las/ mdos kyi skong gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dang po srung ba'i las ka ni/
114a8(rnying rgyud): 'chatsa ka'i gzugs brtan phyag tu ni// tshe bum de yi nang du ni// tshe rten dkar gsum mngar gsum dang // srung ba'i 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// dbus su gang bsrung ming dang bcas// bum par bcug la bzlas pa dang // nad pa la sogs srung byed na// maN+Dal
114b1(rnying rgyud): dkar ba'i steng du'o// gtor ma sna tshogs rin chen dang // bal tshon snga lnga'i srang spyad bcus// yungs kar sngags kyis nad pa bskor// de nas gtor ma'i nang du gzhug/ gtor mas mchod cing bzlas pabya// mtha' ma bdor zhing sbyin sreg dang // kong zor 'ang
114b2(rnying rgyud): ba kun kyang bya// khri'u dag la gtor ma gtad// rten 'brel sngags kyi bum pa'i nus// bkru zhing sngags kyi sbyor ba bya// seng ldeng phur ba lhar bskyed la// srung ba'i 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// nyung dkar brgya dang rtsa brgyad la// 'bru 'dun rel sngags 'bru ba
114b3(rnying rgyud): ras dkar nang du gtums pa dang // de la mchod cing bzlas pa dang // mdos long sngags kyis kong zor 'phang // mjo bo dag la dkar gtor bca'// srung srad mdung pa brtse dang ldan// rin po che yi bum pa ru// chu sde brgya dang sman sA brgya// rten 'brel snga
114b4(rnying rgyud): kyis bsngags pa gdags// phyir dkar steng du khrus bya'o// gu gul bdug cing sngags kyis brab// sbal sbrul mang po'i gzugs byas la// bskor zhing gtor ma'i nang du bub// mdos lor kor bu zor du 'phong // ser ba dag ni bsrung ba na// 'chang
114b5(rnying rgyud): ka'i sgra mchod dung steng // yang na ser mtho'i rtsar bzhag la// 'phrog pa'i sngags kyi 'khor lo dang // phur par bcas pa'i mgul dra ni// thal pa dag dang nyung dkar la// bsngags la de dang mthun par bya// rims nad gcod na 'chur ka'i
114b6(rnying rgyud): dmar gtor bal tshon dang tshon dang // nyung dkar nyung nag sngags dang bcas// pho mo'i gzugs dang bcas pa rnams// kong zor bcas la 'phang bar bya// tshon srad sA lnga'i srang srad la// stegs kyi mdud pa brgya dang ldan// de ni bsung pa'i mchog tu 'brung
114b7(rnying rgyud): yul dang khang kyim gyogs rnams kun// drag po'i rdzas kyis thub par gyur// gtor ma sngags dang bsgyel bas kyang // sde brgyad kun gyis mi tshogs so// chu thig sngon mo'i rgyud las/ srung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad
115a1(rnying rgyud): pa // bzlog pa thab las/ la// ba sa sa thags dz+ra/ mngasas nag dngan ta mas // mdas rgyas tsu ra byas brnyan// rkyen dngadu bzhud// bcas
115a2(rnying rgyud): 'e 'dra 'brag la// dug chus sbyangs la zhal gdangs pa// phur ba lag tu bskur ba'o// po mi tshogs su kha bstan b+ha// 'khor los bzlog pa thabs brgyad la// ming rus bcas pa dbus su'o// rtsibs la rtsa sngags bzlog dang bcas/
115a3(rnying rgyud): geng ras meng dang bzlog ces ze// mu khrung bzlog pa'i sngags dang ldan// bo b+his ta rA ma hrI// g.yas skor byas te zhing ras la// 'char ka'i lto bar bcas pa'o// gtor ma'i dbus su 'char ka'i sgra// gru gsum dmar po dpal bcoM
115a4(rnying rgyud): dang // cang dkar mtsho dang lcags rgya dang // dug khrag dag gis brub pa'o// mangs ni 'char ka'i 'khor dang bcas// ma gshin nyi shu rtsa brgyad chags// dmar nag dar dang kong zod khrag/ gtor ma ba la tshon dang tshon dang // zor ni kong zod chag
115a5(rnying rgyud): zor dang // gtor zor mda' zor 'ur rdo dang // srang zor gtor zor 'phang ba'o// sbyin sreg 'char ka'i mdun du bya// ljags dang bskul dang rdzas dang bcas// nyi ma phyogs dang dus dang grangs// yang nas yang du bya ba'o// zor kha bzlog na yungs kar dang //
115a6(rnying rgyud): khrag dug thod pa'i nang du'// rtsa ba'i sngags dang gtor zor sngags// spel zhing kI la la las bcol bskul// rA hu la yi phyogs dang baspyan// byal bzlog byed na gtor ma dang // 'ur rdo rje thor 'phang bar bya// 'chi ba dasgon dkar gtor dang // dmar gtor bcu
115a7(rnying rgyud): gsum sngags dang bcas// chos ston bcu gsum sdigs dang bcas// gtsug tor dri ma med pa dang // rtsa sngags bzlas shing rtsol ba bya// dz+nyAn 'brel bzlas shing tshwa tshwa gdab// rmi lam bzlog na rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa bya// rang gi sngal kyang bkru
115a8(rnying rgyud): lagang dmigs cad+ma dang ga tso ming bzla/ 'dra min/
115b1(rnying rgyud): lanyal// mtshan mngan pa bzlag pa na// zong de dag tu 'phang bar bya// lhas ngan bzlog na mdas kyis bzlog/ mangs ni maN+Dal steng drug ta// khA 'phang dag tu brtsig par bya// rus sbal bzhi dang grang chen bzhi// mnar lta 'bor dwags dang // gang+gA
115b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs la seng ge bzhi// 'dab chags gzugs la bya byung bzhi// de la steng du 'char ka'i sra// zung gsum nang du dmigs pa'i ming // dwe 'i khal brtseg par bya// de yi mtha' mar me mar dang // kong zor spel ma dgod par bya// bcu gsum pa rdzam
115b3(rnying rgyud): mu thig sngon ma'i chud las/ bzlog pa'i le'u stedas pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byag// gsad pa'i las ni 'di la brtson// bu gsum nang du ling+ga dang // thod pa rwa ni bca' bar bya// skyer mda' ster gzhu stong pa dang //
115b4(rnying rgyud): zor nag po der bca'i skye// de laM kha la 'chang ka'i sgra// khyim dang cu zhags bskur ba la// glang chen gdong can kha nang du// ming dang rus brgyas gzhug par bya// rabs ched thod par dakhrag dang // kha ma dang bcas te bca' bar bya// de yi nang du nga
115b5(rnying rgyud): myang gar ni ga // yang bas 'i ga \u0f7f// rlung mthal / dmathus pa mdzu par // gang bar lamags thar // rnam pa brgya bcu ba / pa 'ang dang // dad pa gas dang sa

115b7(rnying rgyud): man pa dkrugs shing bzlas// kong zong khrag zing sdug la bdag/ gsad mdas gtar ma'i nang du baNa'// 'angs zhangs dung longs// dpral lo gzugs bcas la// srul nag 'khyil bas pa dor zas la// len dag dang bcas la 'phang /

116b2(rnying rgyud): sa mo'i 'phang rtse drug po'i kyang // sor bzhi pa btsug la bzhag/ phur ba re dang yungs kar re// mAr mor dang skya ba shos ra// sha stAr dang khrag sA re// rabs chad khang pa'i dud pa dang // chang nyes pa yi spang mar sbyar// gsum dang bdun dang brgyag
116b3(rnying rgyud): ma// nyi du rtsa gcig brgya rtsa gcig/ ji tsam ngan pa'i tshad du wAr// rtson srud sngon dmyu thar rdol// zhing lpags zur dza'i ma la daH// grags sa'i sgra la 'dag kyang bya// sngags pa dmar nAg chas su zhugs// dus drug kho nar 'phang
116b4(rnying rgyud): bani// rtsa ba'i sngags dang kong rjor sngags// bcol zhing las la 'phang bar bya// dri khrod rdo la dug chus byug/ gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gong dang mnyam par 'phang bar bya// skyer ba'i mda' la ltas ngan so// dam po'i khag gos
116b5(rnying rgyud): thug par bya// sngags ni drag po'i sngags brdeg la// nyi ma 'i'od zer 'phang bar bya// bsnyen pa drag po ba zlas la 'phang // slanga'i nang du shang rdo thug/ ra la sog pa g.yas ngos maM// men bris te nang du gzhug/ nyung dgang thang nag dang drung /
116b6(rnying rgyud): dril dmigs par ldan pa la// de la mu Ta'i sbyor ba bya// bud med gcig gis slang nga 'gyur// sa lnga 'brub thang lin can// gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs dang kyar// g.yon nor bdud dang g.yab mo bdun// de nas de yi dang du rtag/ ma gzhar 'phrul
116b7(rnying rgyud): yang brdud/ ngol po 'drang nga ba sa pas kyi// gang la dmigs pa tho dang bcas// pa la zhwa le lda pa sa// yang mi grub shes ca dang bcam// dang nag jug par ga zag pa dang // 'ang dang khrag drug rdzogs dang po a// 'phangs
117a1(rnying rgyud): ra dngan pa'i lang
117a2(rnying rgyud): gangs 'ad // jun / ng+gA gag/ du y-igs dpa'an na ga sa/ na pa ngas sa shAg na
117a3(rnying rgyud): brtsi// oM pa la yi pra lung bya// mu pa pa li nyams pa la// drag po gtor ma'i bzlog mdos 'dis// gang yang rung ba rlag par byed// rang bsrung ba yi mchog tu 'gyur// gong kha 'dral na shin tu bsngags// gang yang rung ba'i thed par grub// rgya gram la ma sdar mnan la thub//
117a4(rnying rgyud): yi thog tu gtor ma thub// rgya gram 'bang ba'i them la gzhag/ des ni thams cad dbang du spyad// drag po'i zor gyi las kha 'di// gang la zhugs kyang brtson par byed// rA hu la yi las sbyor bya// gza' brtse ba dang phyogs brtsis la// de nas dmigs pas 'phang per ba// chu thig sngon
117a5(rnying rgyud): mo'i rgyud las 'phang bzor gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // gzhan gyi sngags zong mnan pa ni// he ru ka yi ting 'dzin nam// yang na phyag na rdo rje bsgom// karma Na li las kyang bya// dgra 'am yang na bgegs kyang rung // shog bu dag la ming dus bre// rtsa ba bsil ba'i thun gyis phreng
117a6(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyis dgrag gzhug bya// gang nayod pa'i tshogs nas pa// pha ra la de mtshig nyams rtags pa// phyang ba nag pa phyogs su brdab// srid pa'i lha 'dre bsra ba'i phyir // mig bcupa logs kyang gyon// che ba'i brgyal 'byed pa'i phyir// zhing lpags dag kyang gon par bya// rtsod sa/
117a7(rnying rgyud): lu zangs med pa'i phyir// tha~Mng dzardo rje rgya gram ze// sbyin chad lam par dgag pa'i phyir// lam yang mtho rang rgya tham bcad// gtan nas thar sa med pa'i phyir// rgya gram drug gi dang du gzhug/ rtsa sngags gdong zong sngags bcas brdeg/ spel mar zhag gsum gtong mar gdags// de 'ag ma
117a8(rnying rgyud): pas las rnams 'brab// des ni migs pa gdon maH// 'cha ga nag pa gong gnan yin// chu thig sngon mo'i spyad las sngags zong mnan pa'i le'u su bcu ga sum par// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// de nas rig sngags slob ni// dag par ras bubage la// bcu nga
117b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su 'khor lo bkod// de 'og bshan pa bzhi yi stegs// phyogs dang rim pa de bzhin no// bar ma rtsa ba'i sngags dang ni// mA ra ya dang spel ma bri/ tha ma bas dpung gru gsum par// ming rus bris la mtha' ma bskor// sha ri d+yo yi sngags mgo la// ma rig pa gnyis brjengs pa/
117b2(rnying rgyud): mgo gcig gi phyogs ma nor// g.yas g.yon bskor la tshon skud dkri// 'char ga'i snying gar gzhug par bya// 'char ba nag po'i sku la ni// dang po rin chen sna lngas byug/ de nas khrag dang dug gis byug/ mchod rten g.yas g.yon dmar po la// dkris ma'i mchod rten mthing nag go// lag pa phung nga khri
117b3(rnying rgyud): la// g.yas su rgya gram de 'og tu// thod sbra ma ling+ga gnan pa la// rgya gram snyed du 'char ka'i sku// rtsa sngags bzlas la gnan pa bya// chu thig sngon mo'i rgyud las rig sngags zor spro ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsreg pa bya ba'i las la 'ad// zung dug 'khomag bdam
117b4(rnying rgyud): sgo can// tsher ma can gyi shing brtsegs la// bya rog 'ug pa wa ta ye// tshang rtsi bsgrags la bud shing bya// rgyu ma'i thag pa'i skud pas dkri// ba la rtsang dang rgyu zhags bsnol// mang nag khrag dang sha dang tshil// rus pa zhun dang dug dang Sha ga/ 'ur dkar nyung nag dag dang ldan// de yi rim pa de shes/
117b5(rnying rgyud): lin mang po gtubs pa dang // sbyin sreg ji tsam ngan pa bya// de yi nang du 'chi bdag bskyed// mdun du rA bu la yang bskyed// sdig can me blang shan pas bsreg/ 'chi bdag dkug nas me la bstim// dang po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul// de nas 'char ka nyid la dbul// phrin las rnam bzhi mas
117b6(rnying rgyud): dang sbyar// rtsa sngags dag dang spel la bzlas// rnga ma tha mar bstab dang dngul// yang nas yang du dbul bar bya// 'char ka nyid kyi mdun du bya// dbang dang dgug pa'i sbyor ba bya// bskul dang drag sngags sbyor ba bya// bdun badran re la ba liM 'bul// yang nas yang du dbul bar bya// 'di ni drag po'i las
117b7(rnying rgyud): gaM/ sbyar 'a bas yin pas dang du 'gyur// byung po ma ru sa sbyin la// bab ma lnga du gyur bya// do nag bgegs kyi mdza // rtsa ba'i sngat+pal lAr ya// dang po gshin rje ma dpal bskul// de nas 'thang ba bskul bar bya// sbyi sreg re la bskul par// bcug cing bstims la
118a1(rnying rgyud): paraH// rtse s+ya 'dzag mar yi dwags gzugs// ma bar nag dkris la baNar kar gzhug/ gu hral dud pas bskor zhing bdug/ gang gnon de la bskor zhing bsreg// Na ba sngags la pas sngags btags phyung ba btab cing drag tu bsgyur// gzub la d+hIn sreg pa ba
118a2(rnying rgyud): bam lnga bcu'i tshad du bya// 'dis ni klu rnams gdug pa 'dul// dbang du bya ba'i las yin te// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// tha ma dgaso pa'i las dag bya// TI sgra 'dzag ma'i sbyor bde// yang na 'char ka'i 'og tu mnan// chu thig sngon ma'i rgyud las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // pang ni
118a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i las dag ni// gcan gzan thod par ling+ga bcug/ rdo nag bla nor gzhug par bya// phur bu btab pa'i sbyor ba bya// ban+de pon po zhang blon dang // mon pa nag po'i sbyor ba bya'o// de sngags rtse sngags bsdeb pa dang // las sngags bsad dang thun sngag brdeg// de yi mdos dang bcas pa bya// rung gsum dang
118a4(rnying rgyud): sngags dag dang ni// khram dang thod pa de bzhin no// yang na de yi sbyin sreg bya// kho na gcig pu bsngags pa ste// bdun bdun dag tu sbyor baH// drag po'i sngags dang sbyin sreg kyang// de rwa dmigs la bzlas pa bya// rtagra ni du ma gang byed yang // brtags la de yi las la sbyar// dang po'ajam dpal ba
118a5(rnying rgyud): 'cha ba 'khor bcas bstod pa dang // srog gi ra tsA bzhi po ni// tha ma mde'ur bskul ba'ang // de yang 'di la shes par bya// skyugs kyang de bzhin dus rabya// she/ s+yAta seng ga'i gdong // bas dang byin grag dus drug tu'ang// dbang rgyal bya ba yin// bsten dus bajam dpal zhib la// stob 'du
118a6(rnying rgyud): po yin// mjug ma khyab mjug d+hA hra la// de la lha srin sde brgyad 'bor// ma mo'i 'khor bcas bran dang g.yog// chu thig sngon mo'i rgyud las gas dpa'i le'u snyi rdza dras/ lo// / d+hu thig sngon mo'i glang dab las// mjug ma zla yi myong ba ni// khyab 'jug tre+e la dang sbyar// oM pa sha mi ki rA hu la dur/ dz+wa la te
118a7(rnying rgyud):  kyis #
118b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i las dag spos ci dgos// bzlog pa'i las la shin tu bsngags// nA thig sngon ma'i byung las mjugs bya'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas srul tshig tu bstan pa ni// hUM ma 'gags lhan rdzogs thub pa'i gnas// stospyong gsum 'jig rten kun gyi bdag // mtho ris ngan song kun gyi lam// 'chang
118b2(rnying rgyud): nag po gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten ma mo thams cad kyang // khyod kyi sku yin la brten// ma mo 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// gas pa bdud kyi tshogs bcas kyang // rtsed kyi zhe rdzing tshil brten// gshin rje 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// gshin ze'i las mkhan thams cad kyang /

118b4(rnying rgyud): las mdzod cig/ gan bya cog nas gshen rje bdun// g.yon gyi phyogs nas las mngon cig/ drar khrod ro langs nag mo bdun// 'jig rten gnas pa/ srin mo bdun// bka' nyan mon pa nag po bdun// ban nag bon dag rdzu 'phrul can// zhang blon mon pa mthu bo che// gza' dang rgya skar klu ma tshogs/
118b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ba dang g.yog khyong kye bka' nyin tu 'phral ca/ ma nga sa dbang spyad ma thoH// dregs pa tha ma bram cig+sa/ rdza 'phral drag pos nyams pa 'drab// satho byur bar gnas 'dir ga shegs// bcol bde las rnams 'grub par mdzod// gang la mdag pa don mi chung // nyams pa'ang
118b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus la bab// chu thig sngon mo'i chud las bcol ba po nya'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba dang // bdud dang mu stegs 'dul slad du// chung bshad phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams// tshoms par gyur cig gzhan ma spel// 'jam dpal
118b7(rnying rgyud): po bzlog pa'i rgyud ces byab// 'chi bdag be ba a ta'i rgyud ces kyang bya// 'char ka nag po bzlog pa'i chud ces kyang / rA hA la dag po rje ma byed kyi rgyud ces rgya'o// chu thig sngon ma rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//
119a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ yak+Sha dras ti ma pa a ti tan+ta/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gdong gsum pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa d+mas gcig na/
119a2(rnying rgyud): skyon gyi dus na/ byang chub kyi shing drung rab tu dga' ba'i gnas ni/ bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdud dang lhas byin gyis mu stegs log lha'i sbyor ba byas pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi 'od zer las/
119a3(rnying rgyud): sa ri bo rtse gnyis dmar nag 'khyil pa'i dur khrod kyi dbus na/ dur khrod kyi ma mo dang / gshin rje'i gnas na/ gshin rje nag po bya ba gcig gnas te/ rab tu khros pas 'bar bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin sa gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer gyis bskal nas/
119a4(rnying rgyud): spyan gyi 'od zer thugs kyi sprul ba bkye bas/ bdud lhas byin rab tu sngangs so// der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'od srung dang / cang shes ke'u di na la sogs pas/ bram ze mya ngan las 'das ma bskul bas/ bram ze des 'chi bdag gi rgyal po 'cha
119a5(rnying rgyud): ka nag po la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ bdud lhas byin ma rungadra bas/ dug lnga'i rang bzhin mu stegs log par blta ba'i lta ba la zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa 'di la/ bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje'i
119a6(rnying rgyud): drang las myi g.yo/ 'khor rnams ni sde brgyad kyi rang bzhin thugs rje'i sbyor bas mthul bas/ 'jigs byed 'di 'dul ba'i sbyor ba mdzad par zhu/ zhes gsol bas/ 'chi bdag chen po des/ 'bar ba rngam byed 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ 'od
119a7(rnying rgyud): de dag po thug ka nas bkyes nas/ 'jigs byed drag po 'thog phab pas/ bdud lnga byin g.yog dang bcas pa rnams/ 'dar zhing sbeng nas brtsal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rab tu dgyes pa'i brda' mdzad nas/ tshe dang
119b1(rnying rgyud): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / cang shes ko'u de na yA la sogs pa rnams kyang rjes su ya rang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal 'chi bdag nag po de la bstod pa 'dis bstod do// legs so legs so chod lags pa/
119b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'jam dpal khyod legs so// 'char ka nag po khyed legs so// thi bas na khyod legs so// zhes bstod nas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba rnams la yang shod cig/ khyod kyis rab tu gnas par gyis shig
119b3(rnying rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// de nas 'chi ba dag nag po des/ dbu ri rab kyi rtse mo la thal bas/ steng gi 'jig rten dbang du bsdus so// zhabs rgya mtsho'i gting la thal bas/ klu'i 'jig rten dbang du bsdus so// phyag par snang khams la brgyad pas/
119b4(rnying rgyud): snang gi lha srin dbang du bsdus so// da lta bye ba sa ya las/ 'od zer bye bas yab kye bas/ bdud kyi dmigs dpung rdul du brlags so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ sngags kyi rnam pa mang du phul lo// gnod sbyin gdong gsum pa'i
119b5(rnying rgyud): rgyang la po/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'chi bdag chen po des bka' stsal pa/ nyon cigang yis bstan par \u0f7f/ zhes bram ze mdzes ldan la bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba yi// rnam bzhi' 'khor ba
119b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis// log lta rna ba'i bdud rnams la// 'dral ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// bsgrub pa dang ni bsad pa dang // bslang bzlog pa yi las dag go// dang po sgrub pa'i las dag la// drug po bsgrub pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor bu dang
119b7(rnying rgyud): shram dang // rten dang drag po'i sbubacas dang // bskyed dang dkrug dang gnas spong ngo // bcus dang mchod dang ting 'dzin dang // zad cing las la btang ba dang / khror dang thun dang mangs dang bzlog/ 'khor la bca' dang sreg pa dang // kha char gsong
120a1(rnying rgyud): las dag dang // mnan padag du shes par bya// dang po dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// dur khrod sa la dkyil 'khar brtsegs// zur dug 'khor mo dra ba ni// nag pa'i tshan gyis bri ba
120a2(rnying rgyud): dri 'bar ba'i cod pan can// de nas rdzas kyi rnam pa ni// tshang bdag du dgod par bya// de yi rang bzhin dgod pa ni// dbus su su rten dgod par bya// drag po ras la 'chi bdag nyid// drag po las dang ldan par bya// bsdang na bum pa
120a3(rnying rgyud): bzlog na mchod rten rab gnas can// bsad na spu gri sprul zhags can// gnon na mchod rten de yis mnan// 'khor lo bcas dang ldan par ni// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo spyi bor gzug/ bzlog pa'i 'khor lo snying gar te// bsad pa'i 'a
120a4(rnying rgyud): lte ba ra// mnan pa'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i gnas// rigs bzhi sbrul gyi rgyan char ldan// sa steng sa 'og de bzhin gnas// sa bla'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// spyi gzugs ral pa gyen du brjes// sa bla 'dul gyi yan lag la//

120a6(rnying rgyud): tshan skud dag gis rgya gram bcing // de yi steng du rgyan dang ldan// de yi phyogs bzhir phur pa bzhi// 'chi bdag nag po'i sprul pa bzhi// brje nag po spyi gtsug sprul// bon po nag po skags ma'i 'og/ zhang blon nag po lta bar sprul// mon pa nag
120a7(rnying rgyud): po thugs ka nas// sprul pa'i rdzas bzhi rje dar ldan// de la dgod cing de lag nas// ma gshin lha tshegs rtsang gi grangs// gtor ma chen po'i dbus su ni// 'chi bdag zhal phyung dpal gtor bcas// nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs dang bcas
120b1(rnying rgyud): de'i kun sngar dag par \u0f7f// 'bru ni nag pa'i rnam pa la// kong bu bu gsum byung dang bcas// sdong gcig ma dang mas reg ma'i// 'phang rje dang ldan thang dang bcas// drag za kang zor dus dang ldan// zur gyi rnam pa grangs su dgod// na rbA
120b2(rnying rgyud): na gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ bca' bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas ting 'dzin bstan pa la// bdag bskyed pa dang gzhan bskyed pa// 'khor bskyed pa dang gsum du bya'o// de la dang po bdag bskyed pa
120b3(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs pa ru gsal ba las// hU~M gis rang bzhin gsal ba las// ye dang raM dang baM dang laM// de 'gyur me dang rlung dang chus// sa dang ri rab de bzhin te// b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang du'o// thod pa brtsegs pa'i zhing chung brtseg/ ka pa bzhi
120b4(rnying rgyud): dang phya ma gdung dang // dral phyam chang pa bzhi la bya// sbrul rigs thab tshag zar tshogs// khrag gI zham chu 'bab pa dang // mthong nas nyi zla 'char ba'o// de nas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang // rtsibs drug mu khyud sgo dang bcas// ma
120b5(rnying rgyud): dang gang dmigs te// chu blang steng du nyi zlas mtshan// de steng hUM las rdo rjer gyur// oM hrIHb+h+rU~M wi kri ta na na hUM phaT// ces pa'i sgra dang bcas pa yi// nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// dgra s+thA sdig mdzub phyar dang gdengs// dbu skra
120b6(rnying rgyud): nag gyen du 'khyil// glang chen stag dang zhing gis brtson// sbrul dang thod pa skam rlon phreng // brkyang bsku ma bgrad pas 'byung po gnon// nag mo mi sdug mnyes par 'khril// thod rlon stob dang 'khyud pa'i tshul// de yi mdun du bsal
120b7(rnying rgyud): 6ra ka nag po sbrul gyi mdog/ spu bre gdengs pa'i gdengs ka can// gang yang rang rang chas dang ldan// zhal ni gang dmigs de rang ngo // re ma ti dang ldan pa ni// nag po dred zhon khram dang rgyal// de yi mdun nam mo bdun dang ldan// dka

121a3(rnying rgyud): bdun// g.yas na mi nag rta nag bdun// g.yas na dar nag g.yon gshog gdengs// nag po bkrag med ya gzhir nag po dang // sog po mi za na lcags kyi bar ga can// kha la ru ce dang ni srid pa'i kha la nyul// zangs kyi byi ru ha na dang bdun /
