121a8(rnying rgyud): mgon 'grub bkra shas/ 'a
121b1(rnying rgyud): drangs thub blang // gdang gsus pa'i rgyud las/ bstis pa'i laduste bzhu ba la// de nas drag pa sngags kyi sbyor ba bstan pa na/ oM Ak+Sh+mI wi kr-itA naHd+hI ba Ta pa Ta s+yAt+ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags sa// b+hUSh+Tamachogal pa /
121b2(rnying rgyud): ti ba li Ne khA ti khA hi/ mchod pa 'bul ba'i sngags so// sha ri b+h+yo/ mari byo// byag/ ma mab+h+yo/ tsir snying d+ho/ snying byo/ ma kri thong khrag dza// brag ti snying la yi/ nir te tshod/ nA ga chod/ mul tshad/ sha lo chod/ sha la k+Shid kying / d+yo d+he/ sa ma ya a[рд╜]
121b3(rnying rgyud): pra ma ni mar na bzlog/ ni sa ra na bzlog// 'char ka nag po'i sngags so// oM ga na ma yer b+h+yo/ sa yer b+h+yo/ rgyang yer bya/ rgyang mo b+ho/ sa rkyang rnga mo ma b+h+yo dz+ha dz+yo b+h+yo/ byang yer sod/ mu yer sod/ me rang song / dgra snying la byo d+d+ho/ dkar mo bdun gyi
121b4(rnying rgyud): drag sngags so// yo la su sh+tsa lazla ba ril khrag la rbang zad/ rdzas la tsha/ dgra b+hing d+had+harmAts+tsha b+h+yAM/ nag mo bdun gyi dag sngags so// oM ru wa ra~M l+r-in pa la/ a shug hU~M dz+ha dzaH/ yag mo kha la kha tshad / rag mo khal ba rtsod no//
121b5(rnying rgyud): kha la khe tsho b+h+yo/ kha la N+ya N+yaits+tshe ts+tsha dz+yots+tshar+N+Na dz+haiM/ ru lu rba lu nag mo hA ha d+hA d+ha r+d+har+d+ha d+h+ya d+ha b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma mo bdun dang ro langs bdun gyi sngags so// ya ma snying b+h+yo/ ya ma khrag d+ho/ sarba 'bute d+ho/ yaM ma rA \u0f7fD+ho/ ya madz+r-i trAM/ yau ma rA dza b+h+yo/ yaM yaM rje thrig shi
121b6(rnying rgyud): phyed khrag la b+h+yo/ ya ma dag snying la d+h+r-i b+h+rU~M b+h+yo/ gshin rje bdun gyi sngags so// tra ga rak+Sha ru lA ru lu baM ril b+h+yo/ nag po srog lus khyer la/ ya thai baM ril b+h+yo/ mdos 'phang ba'i sngags so// nag po phra ma yang ha ro ya/ nag por k+Sha bur/ he dra ba la
121b7(rnying rgyud): thun/ gan/ ni ni lo tsa ya/ srog la thun/ mA ra ya thur/ he ra ha ra/ hur bu ru/ nyams pa'i snying la b+h+yo/ gdong zor gyi sngags so// mo ha he mo ha hr-i da ya/ sar ni hUM phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo sa ma ya bzlog bzlog/ a la la pra mo he dz+yo dz+ya/ ya ma la bzlog 'dro
122a1(rnying rgyud): sa bya gagasas la nga ba ma// rdzugs// nangag pas/ gas
122a2(rnying rgyud): dzi sarba tA ra a ga ne dz+wa la ri mA ra ya phaT/ sbyin bsreg gi sngags so// sarba sha trUM nA sha ya mA ra ya/ bsad pa'i sngags so// badz+rA tsig dran rbang zang swA hA/ snying khrag dun khrag/ chad rbad swA hA/ bruM shig khug ling chad rbad sA dA/ snying khrag lA 'a
122a3(rnying rgyud): mug rbad rbad sA hA// tsi ra ba bzhi'i sngags so// ka sha kha shu blag tshal bshag shag/ ma tra shag/ ma tra shag/ mA ra ya rak+Sha snying gong tshod ya/ ya par bri ba zhung zhung / ril dril rbad rbad swA hA/ tsa tr-i rak+kha rlung drung / kha la rak+Sha rbad chud/ ti swa
122a4(rnying rgyud): pu rak+Sha rbud chud/ te tsi ta rak+Sha rbung chud/ las kyi sngags so// oM bud+d+ha b+ha dra hUM/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba bid dra pra ti ho// ha ha ba ha hi/ ba smai ba lI nAM/ shA ri'i bus byin gyis brlabs pa'i ring bkrol g.yon pa'i sngags so// oM
122a5(rnying rgyud): ma ta dri a n+taM/ ta ta ma ti sha sa ni/ ha ra ha ra/ sla ra sma ra ni/ bi ga ti ri tu ra tasmr-i ta/ sa ra sar/ ma ma sa la/ ha sa ha sa/ dra ya dra ya/ ga ga nag ga na/ ma hA yak+Sha ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na/ sa ga ra swA hA/ rten 'bre la 'od srung gis byin gyis brlabs
122a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchod rten dbus ma'i rab gnas so// oM ye d+ha nA he tu pra b+ha ba he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo na ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na ye swA hA/ cang shes kau de n+ya'i ring bsrer g.yas pa'i sngags so/ namo tri da sarba ta thA ga ta ha ra hUM/ ya mAn+ta kas gyi kyis
122a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'char ka skye ma byed kyi sngags so// prad+d+ha hri b+h+yo/ sor ba bzlog pa'o// gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya// 'khor lo dag la sngags dang ldan// rten 'brel spyi yi 'khor lo
122b1(rnying rgyud): srung zlog bsad dang mnan pa'o// bri ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// phyi ma 'khor ma 'khor yug gsum// nang du gu gsum gnas pa la// mA ra ya ya lang+ga b+he// de mthar sngags dang ming rus spel// de mthar 'char ka nyid kyi sngags// de yi mtha la
122b2(rnying rgyud): ten 'phrul ni// bcu gnyis 'khor lo lcags su gzhug/ mtha' ma lakhyil byed gnyis kyis bskor// 'char ka nag po'i lto bar ro// zhi ba'i 'khor lo rnabs brgyad pa// rtsibs brgyad dag la 'char ka nyid// bsrung ba gang bsrung gong ras la//
122b3(rnying rgyud): ces pazi// dbus su gang bsrung ming dang sngags// hrI Sh+kaM ces pas mtshan pa'o// bong ras mA li kA li'o// sngags ni tsat+ta R+She sa pA sbyar// bzlog na bzlog ces bsgyur ba'o// gong ras bzlog pa'i sngags kyis basbyor// dbus su ming rus gzugs
122b4(rnying rgyud): dang bcas// bsad pa'i sngags mtha' mA ra ya// gong ri sa bsad pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mnan pa'i sngags mtha' mA ra nan// srung ba'i 'khor lo dar ras la'o// bzlog pa zhing la bri ba'o// bsad pa dur khrod ras la bri// mnan pa dur khrod
122b5(rnying rgyud): g.yam pa'o// bri ba snga dro bsrung ba'o// bzlog pa nyi ma phyed na bri// bsad pa nyi ma rgas pa'o// mnan pa tho rangs bri bar bya// gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bri ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / 'di yi mdos su bya ba la// khe ga
122b6(rnying rgyud): don bzhi ru shes par bya// bsrung ba'i mdos dang bzlog pa'i mdos// bsad pa'i mdos dang mnan pa'i mdos// ma tri 'bag tu bcas pa dang // rak+ta dmar pos bkang ba dang // bca' ba las kyi man ngag bya// ri rab brtsegs pa'i bar
122b7(rnying rgyud): rim ldan// bsrung bdag la glad brgya dang // ma gshin bshos bu bcas pa dang // byang bu bdun gsum nyi shu gcig/ glud kyi phyogs su gdags pa dang // mchod rten bca' dang me mar bca'// 'khor lo lto bar gzhug pa'o// bzlog pa zar /
123a1(rnying rgyud): ka'adra ba la// gang zur brgya'am nyi shug cig/ bshos bla zur gsum khrag du bcas// maH dang nang dkar ba ba dang mtshon// zur rnga 'dun dang brtas pa'o// bsad na drag pong ba phyogs bya// 'chang la
123a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang // kong zor nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // khrag zor nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // leng+ga thun gyis brab pa dang // ma mo'i gtor ma zor du bcas// 'phang pa mnan pa'i las bya ba// gdong zor bcas la mdos kyis mnan// 'char ka'i zhal
123a3(rnying rgyud): bskur la bca'// mnan pa rgod ru dag la mnan// mchod rten bzhi dang bcas pa'o// bzlog pa 'char ka ma bsgyur ba// bsrung ba 'jam dpal zhal du bya// gsod na glang po che yi zhal// gnon nam he'i zhal du bya// bsrung ba rang gi
123a4(rnying rgyud): khang du// mchod pa bya zhing gsol ba gdab// bzlog pa khang steng mthong bar bya// gsod na gnas khang dag tu'o// gnon na chu mig gsham du'o// drag po'i mdos de phyogs su sbags// rol mo dar dang bcas pa yas// zor dang bcas
123a5(rnying rgyud): 'phang bar bya// gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ mdos gtang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dang po bsrung ba'i las dag ni// 'char ka'i gzugs brnyan phyag tu ni// tshe yi bum pa de nang
123a6(rnying rgyud): tshe rten dkar gsum mngar gsum dang // bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// dbus su gang bsrung ming dang bcas// bum par bcug la bzlas dang mchod// nad pa la sogs srung byed na// maN+Dal dkar po'i steng dag tu// gtor
123a7(rnying rgyud): tshigs rin chen dang // bal tshon lnga lnga'i thungs dang bcas// nyung dkar sngags kyis nad pa bskor// de nas gtor ma'i nang du gzhug/ gtor ma mchod cing bzlas pa bya// mtha' ma bskor zhing sbyin bsreg zla// kong zor 'phang ba kun la bya/
123b1(rnying rgyud): dgal gtor ma dang // rten 'bal sngags kyi bum pa'i chus// bkru ba'i sngug+sa sbyor babya// seng ldeng phur bu ltar bskyed la// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// wang dkar brgya dang zla brgyad la// 'bum bu la sngags 'brang dus/
123b2(rnying rgyud): ras dkar nang ngag tum pa dang // de la mchod cing bstod bzlasas// mdo long sngags bzlas klong zong 'bengs// mdzob dag pa dkar gtor bcag// srang skad mdud pa brgyad nga ldan// che po rgya mi tham pa dag// 'brung brgyad dang
123b3(rnying rgyud): rten 'grepa sngags kyis nang pa dag/ phying dkar steng du khrus kyi'o// grwa gral bdug cing sngags kyis byab// hral sbal mang po'i gzugs d+has la// badz+ra ni gtor ma'i nang dragazhug/ mdo lang klong du zong du 'ang ngas// ser ba bsrung na 'cha
123b4(rnying rgyud): sru// me thog mthong bar gzhug byas la// mchod rten dkar po dang ni dmar po ma// yang nasar po'i rtsa drug zug par bya// bzlog pa'i sngags dang 'khor lo dang // phrar pa bcas pa'i maN+Dal d+ha ni// thal chen dag dang nyung dkar dang /
123b5(rnying rgyud): lade dang ldan par bya// re sma nang gcod na 'char ka'i lu// dmar gtor bal tshon dar sna dang // nyung dkar nyung nag sngags dang bcas// phag mo'i gzugs dang bcas pa rnams// kong zor bcas la 'phang bar bya// bal tshon sA lnga'i
123b6(rnying rgyud): pa la// sngags kyi mdu pe bcu dang ldan// do ni ba ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// yul dang khang khyim phyogs rnams su// drug po'i rdzam b+his thub par 'gyur// gtor ma sngags kyis bskul nas kyang // sde brgyad kun gyis mi tshugs kyi/
123b7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'i byud las/ bsrung ba'im nga na// nas yang dag pashang thub// drug pa khrid na 'dis // rnam pa bdun drugs par bya// ba pa bzlog dang sngags thos ga/ mkhong mas
124a1(rnying rgyud): gtor mas bzlog/ mdos kyis bzlog dang zor gyis bzlog/ sbyin bsreg dag dang bdun du'o// bcas bzlog 'char ka'i 'dra 'bag la// dug chus byug la kha gdangs pa// phur ba lag tu bskur ba'o// /
124a2(rnying rgyud): popa phyogs su kha bstan bya'o// pho mo'i byang bu bdun bdun bya// 'phan chen dbus sra phyar ba'o// kabI rab gnas ldan pa'o// 'khor los bzlog partsibs brgyad la// ming rus bcas pa bsdus pa'o// ce bas la rtsa ljags bzlog dang
124a3(rnying rgyud): bcus// ko de ras ming dang bzlog ces pa// mu khrud bzlog pa'i sngags dang bcas// b+he ba sa hA re ma ti// g.yas bskor byas la zhing la bris// 'char ka'i lto bar gzhug pa'o// gtor ma'i dbus su 'char ka'i spu// gru gsum dmar po
124a4(rnying rgyud): bshos dang bcas// nyung dkar dmar po dgra dang ldan// nyung dkar mtshe dang zangs dang lcags// khrag dug dag gis bran pa'o// mdos ni 'char ka 'khor dang bcas// ma gshin nyi shu rtsa brgyad tshogs// dmar nag dar dang bal tshon dang /
124a5(rnying rgyud): kor zor dang ni khrag zor dang // gtor ma dar tshon sna lngar ldan// zor ni kong zor khrag zor dang // rdo zor mda' dang 'ur rdo dang // slang zor gtor zor 'phang ba'o// sbyin sreg bcas pa'i bdun du bya// sngags dang bskal ba'i rdzas dang bcas/
124a6(rnying rgyud): nyi la phyogs dang dus dang grangs// yang dang yang du bya ba'o// zor kha bzlog na nyung dkar dang // khrag dang thod pa'i nang du'o// rtsa ba'i sngags dang gdong zor sngags// spel zhing bcol la bzlas pa'o// rA hu la yi phyogs dang bstan// byol kha
124a7(rnying rgyud): bzlog na gtor ma dang // 'ur rdog dong zor 'phyang bar bya// 'chi ba bsru ni dkar gtor dang // dmar gtor bcu gsum sngags dang bcas// chos ston bcu gsum sngags dang drang // gtsug tor dri ma med pa la// rtsa sngags bzlas la gang
124b1(rnying rgyud): dpogs pazlas/ na yul bzlag sa rgya bdug/ rnalas 'thos ma pa 'gags// bcam cad du bzlas par bya// 'dag sa byung bsgrangs smra/ rtags phyogs sun 'ab sa// matsun mngan pa bzlog na// ba
124b2(rnying rgyud): 'phangs pa'o// lhas ngan bzlog na mdos kyis bzlog/ mdos kyi maN+Dal snying du ni// khri 'phang gsum du brtsig par bya// dus sbal bzhi dang gling chen bzhi// mi nor lho 'gros ri dgas dang // gcan gzan gzugs la seng ge bzhi//
124b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs la bya khyung bzhi// de ya~M kha la 'char ka'i gzugs// zla gsum nang du dmigs pa'i gzugs// de'i khal gtsigs par bya// de yi mtha' mar me mar dang // kong zor sbrel te dgod par bya// bcu gsum pa yi gzugs su
124b4(rnying rgyud): gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ bzlog pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsad pa'i las ni 'di la brtson// gru gsum nang du ling+ga dang // thod pa rus dang bcas pa dang // sder mda' skyer gzhu stong pa
124b5(rnying rgyud): dang // gdong po nag po der bcas te// da y-i ba la 'char ka the swa// bya ma dang rta gags bsdams pa ste// glang chen gdong gi kha nang du// ming dang drus bcas gzug par bya// rabs chad thod par gakhag dang // Shal dang btsas
124b6(rnying rgyud): bya// de yi nang du gcig shos pa// dmigs pa'i ling+ga bye bar bya// zor gyi rnam pa bdun pa bca'// brje bon po zhang blon dang // mon pa'i sngags dang spel ma bya// rtsa sngags las sngags bsad pa'i sngags// de ltar spel la 'azlas par bya/
124b7(rnying rgyud): chos grangs brtsis la khor du 'dag/ bsad pa'i 'khor lo tshon spyad bcings// 'char ka'i lto bar mA ra ya// phrang ba btab la sbyin bsreg bya// tha ma mon pa'i dkrug sngags dang // ko zor khrag zor spug cing brdeg/ bsad mngos gtor ma'i da
125a1(rnying rgyud): dkyis bas dpa'i bu yang lub zung
125a2(rnying rgyud): byar// rkang ji sras dang dur khrod sa re// rA hu l+yA yi gzugs byas la// sbrul nag gaN+DI la bas bskor byas la// ling+ga dag dang bzlas pa yang // man+ta man+ta spel zhing bzlas// sngags dang bsgral gyis 'phang bang
125a3(rnying rgyud): 'chang ka'i thod pa chu mig mnan// des ni lhas byin m+bAr ya// 'char ka nag po'i zhal nas gsungs// gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mnan pa dag las
125a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// sdong gcig ma dang mes reg ma/ bas de cing mnan pa'i bu yin la// khyad par drug gi sngags kyis bskor// tsakr-i hr-I nan/ gr-I g+h+nA nan/ a r+thinan/ thadAnan/ dza~M d+hanan+ta/ mA ra nan/ nangad du khams 'i gzugs dag na// steng gar ba
125a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo gzhug/ tshon skud dag gis rab tu dkri// gru gsum nang du bcug pa la// 'chang ka'i sku yis mnan la bzlas// rtsa sdigs mnan sngags sbrel ba la// tha ma ming dang nan du bcas// 'khor lo'i sngags mthar nan du bcas
125a6(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa bya zhing rdo rjes brdeg/ rdo rje rgya gram g.yam bris la// hrIHSh+T+r-i bzlas shing bsdig par bya// gtor ma gtong zhing dmod bcol bya// sngags kyis bskul zhing las la gtang // tha ma dmigs pa'i rten de mnan// chu ma~Mg tha
125a7(rnying rgyud): bltas gsham du mnan// pho rgyud gnon na brag gi 'og/ mo rgyud mchi yi nang du'o// the'u rang rkang gcig shing gi drung // pha bong nag po klu la shis// gad pa'i 'og tu bsen mo mnan// pho sri dur gyi nang du mnan// btsan ni brag dmar tha me
125a8(rnying rgyud): mnan// gzhan yang gang gnon spu gdung rten// rgyal po mchod rten 'og tu mnan// mnan sa gang rigs pa dang sbyar// mnan pa'i dong du gru gsum bu// de yi nang du ka pA la// de nas rten dang kun kha 'khor// rgya sngam dag gis kha
125b1(rnying rgyud): dga' bo klu yang ldang mi nus// des ni klu ldan mang yid non// bskal pa rdzogs kyang khar mi 'byung // bka' las 'das par mi nus so// gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ mnan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dang
125b2(rnying rgyud): bshad bya ba/ bca' bzor gyi las bshad pa// phra po nas nag mi kha can// yang na dur khrod sa dag la// nang du khrag gis brjes pa la// drag po'i keng bu zur gsum pa// brag nag mtsho dang yungs kar dang // dme khrag thig pa re de la/
125b3(rnying rgyud): sa ri mod tse drag po'i rtsang // sor gcig pa ni btsug la bzhag/ phur pa re dang nyung dkar re// mar me re dang lhab shos re// sha s+tha re dang khrag sta re// rabs chad khang pa'i dud pa dang // chad nyes pa yi sbrang ma sbyar// gsum dang bdun dang
125b4(rnying rgyud): bar+d+hagasum dang // he shraH gcig brgya rtsa brgyad // ji tsam ran pa'i tshong dang ster// tshon skad sngond mar 'phrul tog la// zhing lpags khur ngo mthil du sbyar// yug sa'i ske la 'dzags bya// sngags pa bar nag chas su zhug so// dus
125b5(rnying rgyud): ga pa dang gdo bya zhugs// tshang la ma // da pa ngo sa drug rgyas s+ho// dad ngangan pa'i 'i byor paso// 'i sa pa / byung po'i snang la
125b6(rnying rgyud): dmo po'i khrag gis byug par bya// sngags ni drag po'i sngags 'debs sbyar// nyi ma'i zer la 'phang bar bya// bsnyen pa drug po bzlas la 'phangs// sla nga'i nang du sho rde'u byug/ ral sog pa g.yas g.yon la// lin byas la nang
125b7(rnying rgyud): gzug/ drang dka zung zhig nang rung // nga dang nga yi dmigs par byen// sA waM mu ShUr sbyor bar bya// thang med bdun gyis slang khyer// sa r+b+ba 'brug zung min pacing // gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs dang sbrar// g.yas pa skor bdud pa
126a1(rnying rgyud): g.yan ba skar bdun// de nas de yi nang du grug/ ma gshin bskul ma zo yang brdung // rol mo sgra dang bcas pa dang // gang la dmigs bzor dang sbyar// ba ling zhal dang ldan pa la// mar me lha ba shos cang dang
126a2(rnying rgyud): bcas// dar nag phrag la gzug par bya// nyung dkar sngags dang khrag tu bcas// 'phang zhing bsil zhing rak+tar bcas// cang te'u brdung zhing rak+tar bcas// lha mchog bskul dang dar nag g.yab// dmigs pa dang bcas 'phang bar bya//
126a3(rnying rgyud): rU tra gos kyi mgo gzhug bzlog/ rU tra'i a breng gdab par bya// mA da nyid dang rta ra gzugs// dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa brtsam// o rta ya yi sbrang 'dul bya// mu la a la nyams pa la// drag po'i gtor ma bzlog mdos ni// gang yang rung
126a4(rnying rgyud): bas rlag par byed// rang bsrung ba yi mchog tu 'gyur// gong kha 'dul bar shin tu shis// ra dang sha ba'i thod par brub// rgya gram mnan pa'i brag snar brub// de yi steng du gtor ma blug/ rgya gram 'bar ba'i thibs la gzhag/ de yis thams cad
126a5(rnying rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// drag po'i zor gyi las ka ni// gang la zhugs kyang 'bar ba'i thibs// rA hu la yi sbyor ba bya// gzang brtsi ba dang phyogs brtsi pa// de la dmigs la 'phang bar bya// gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ 'phang bzor gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis
126a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byu ba// bdun gyi ting 'dzin sngags gzar rnam pa gsum// gzhan gyi sngags rnams mnan pa ni// he ru ka yi ting 'dzin nam// yang na phyag na rdo rjer bsgom// karma he ru ka las kyang bya// dgrangs
126a7(rnying rgyud): bgegs ni gang yang rung // shog bu dag la med bris la// 'og ma'i taTI thun gyis thab// ting nge 'dzin gyis dgug gi zhug bya// gang na yod pa'i phyogs sung bang // pha rol da mchog nyams rtags su// phyir ba nag po phyogs su bdang // sri
126b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha 'dre bslab phyir// mig brgyam la gos kyang gon// che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed par phyir// zhing zhags dag kyang bgo bar bya// phyogs su thar pa med pa'i phyir// sted du dza rgya ga ma bya// phyin chad bar chad med pa'i phyir// lam man
126b2(rnying rgyud): gnan par bya// gtan du thar pa med pa'i phyir// rgya gram drug pa'i phyi rim bar du bzhag/ rtswa sngags gdong zor dag la sdeb// spel nas zhabs su gdong zor sngags// de 'og mnan pa'i las rnams 'grub// de la dmigs pa gdon mi za// 'char
126b3(rnying rgyud): ka nag po'i grong non yin// gdong gsum pa'i rgyud las/ sngags gzer bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rig sngags spo ba ni// drag po'i ro ras gru bzhi la// bcu dang gnyis su 'khor lo 'dod// de 'og
126b4(rnying rgyud): shan pa bzhi yi sngags// phyogs dang rim pa de bzhin no// bar ma rtsa ba'i sngags dang ni// mA ra ya dang spel te bre// tha mar bsad pa gru gsum du// ming rus bris nas thun la bskor// sha ri b+h+yo yi sngags mgo dang // ma rig pa gnyis
126b5(rnying rgyud): bsdeb pa la// yig mgo gnyis gnyis bsdeb pa la// g.yas g.yon bskor la tshon skad dkris// 'char ka'i snying gararag zhug par bya// 'char ka nag po sU la ni// dang po rin chen sna lngas byug/ de nas dug dang khrag gis byug/ mchod

132a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa
132a4(rnying rgyud): na tshon+ta tshin+ta b+h+yo/ gzhan gyi zod gtong la b+ho/ ma mo'i dal kha la b+h+yo/ zhes pa la sogs btags byas la// ting 'dzin bsar te zor 'phang ngo // mnyes dbang gzugs b+h+yo yis gdab// rjes la phyi mig mi blta bar// nang du 'od la rta bro brdung // cho bsti ma tshol nan tan
132a5(rnying rgyud): zhal bsro bkra shis brjod par bya// dmigs pa med pa'i blo yos su// dge ba'i rtsab bsngo bar bya// zor gyi skabs te drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// 'char ka nag po nang thAg na// song ba'i mdos la nan tan bya// gzhan
132a6(rnying rgyud): ga du// ma gu na pa ga na na na ma la/ sa ma rta ga sum
132a7(rnying rgyud): las la gtsor bya'o// gzhan yang gnan dang gsad pa la'ang // las kyi khyad par shes par bya// dregs pa pho gdon bzlog pa dang // srid pa mo chud bzlog pa dang // klu yi gnod pa bsal ba dang // rde'u khro bos bzlog pa dang // drag pos phur mjug bsdu ba dang /
132b1(rnying rgyud): zong kyis gsad par bya ba dang // de rnams tshar bcad rim pa ste// nyan can na pagaso ba dang // su lugs dang mdza 'a phya bcad// 'chi ba bzla dang rmi la ma bzlog/ pha tshan byal ba bzlog pa dang // da la yams dmas nang bcad pa dang // phyag gong bsrung dang bang ba
132b2(rnying rgyud): bsrung // dmag dpung ba zlog dang shaM khag cad// shA bud sbyin thang bzlog pa dang // lhas ngan bzlog dang zong gtong bzlog/ de rnams phan gdags rim pa ste// las kyi kha bsgyur rdzam dang sngags// so so'i sbyor ba shes par bya// las mjug garten bsreg 'ang
132b3(rnying rgyud): pa ni// kun lagaces pas bsgrims la 'bad// gzhan yang glang po'i sbrang mdos dang // bdud sha nag po'i mdos dang ni// zla tshes tshe yi mdos nyid dang // dmag dpon bzhi yi skong mdo so dang // ma mo gshin rdo rje mo bdud// so so'i sgos mdos bya ba dang // shing gi mdos dang /
132b4(rnying rgyud): 'bru yi mangs// da sogs stor ba bsam las 'das// rang rang 'dod pa ji bzhin bya// gzhan yang gsad par 'dod pa na// g.yag rur li zla badrug byas la// de yi snying gar ster pa yi// mda' la ltas ngan bya gsum gyi// sgo bskyon gyi mo khrag gis thug/ du rtser bstan la
132b5(rnying rgyud): gzug par bya// dug shing dag gi phur ba la// dug chus thugs la snying ga gang ba// skugasum nang nga bajug byas la// khrag dang thang dkar dag gis zab// dri ma ni drim rin/ snying tI shAt-i sha/ ya ma s+t+raing ya ma khag/ tshal po tshal pab sa de la/ ma nga ste la/ dam pa
132b6(rnying rgyud): dAm s+thA nag po snyam nyi kA na na/ ti la drong pa brag shin na/ sa po dz+hang dza zang / nag po'i nying chud la' ma ral la/ mAr la srabs ri la zad/ nag po nyid la shang ya shwad ya nraH/ badz+ra kA la kI la pa/ thAn las rbang ya/ las phran chags kyi skabs te bdun pa'o// / gzhan
132b7(rnying rgyud): nig po'i ngan sngags myong sreg pa'i drud ces byab/ chu thig sngon mo'i chung bya mardzogs sa// / gzubs par rdo rje khrig drug gis dka' baspyad nas bsrung ba'o// bzhes na gas su das gzhan 'a rje da
133a1(rnying rgyud): rgya ga ran dang / Ar+ya mas+sa shrIsar+b+baHts+tsha d+ha ra sa ha man+tatAt+tAN+Das/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal mched bzhi'i sngags byung ces b+ha ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khro ba 'jigs byed kyi stsal ba la phyag 'tshal
133a2(rnying rgyud): la// 'di skad bdag gis zas pa'i dus gcig ni/ 'og min gyi gnas rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tha bzang po 'gro ba rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin dgongs nas/ 'khor rnam pa bzhal
133a3(rnying rgyud): gang ltar 'jams pa bzhin du ston pa la thugs rjes bstan pas bye rlabs kyis/ mkhyen pa'i la shes thugs kyi dgongs pa las// byin rje log kha blta sems can rnams// thA ba gnas su thugs rjes drang ba 'don blang dadu// k+She brang sbra
133a4(rnying rgyud): las khro bo'i cho 'phrul bstan/ de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po ya mAn+ta ka da 'khor gyi khro bo rnams kyi dbus na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khro bo'i rgyal po ya mAN+Da ka dpa' rdul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nyid kyi byin du
133a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes rnam pa bzhi las/ rigs bzha'i khro bor gyur te/ ya ma rA dza dang / myos byed 'bar ba dang / Ar+ya ma ru dang / ral pa tshar dgu dang bzhi 'thon te/ de bzhi'i so so'i thugs kyi sbal pa las/ dbang sdud ma ru tse mched bzhi'i
133a6(rnying rgyud): ru bstan no// dus kyi rnam pa gtsigs su shes pas 'khor rnams dang / thabs dang shes rab kyis thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de dag gi nang nas 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza la sogs pa bzhi'i byin gyis brlabs te dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sprul
133a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sbar bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la dbus phyag btsal nas bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye the bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin med pa'i chos bshad pa/ 'khor ba'i khyim tsho drang ba'i phyir// ma 'ongs shAkya thub pa ma//
133b1(rnying rgyud): bskal ba bstan pa'i tham la// mtshams med wa yi las dka'athung // sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnyan par// gnod sbyin gdong dmar dbang du 'gyur// des na wa sran sde brkyang bri// gaH pa chen po ba rnams kyis// khro bo rnams kyi drung na gnas//
133b2(rnying rgyud): rab 'jigs chen po bka' stsol cig/ dpa' bo chen po bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa dang / khro bo ya mAN+Da kas phyag rdo rdo rjes gsol pa thugs su chud de/ tsang me gsung bar zhal 'dzum par mdzad do// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes cang mi gsung ba thugs/
133b3(rnying rgyud): sazad de/ 'di gad ces gsol to// dpa' bo chen po smra bo// sangs rgyus bstan pa gan du gyur// gad sbyin pa nga par 'dul ba'i phyir// gca ba sal bka' stsom yad// rtsis blangs pas/ rgya srin rje babyed gtso bzhi la sags
133b4(rnying rgyud): khro bo rnams dang lha srin sde brgyad thams cad phyug na rdo rje'i drung du thabs cig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bkang stsal to// / ma hA ra k+ta maN+Dal zhes gsangs pas/ 'jig rten dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ stong
133b5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten thams cad dmar po khrag gi rang bzhin du gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing rngams te ji lta bu'i cho 'phrul yin snyam pa las/ de'i dus su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sems can rnams kyang
133b6(rnying rgyud): brgyal bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'o zhes/ phyag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu smras so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i cho 'phrul de thugs su gsal te/ phyin ci log du bltas pa rnams
133b7(rnying rgyud): dbang du bsdu ba'i rtags dbang gi rang bzhin du bstan to snyam nas gtso bo chen po bzhis kyang / 'jig rten gyi dbang gtod par thugs su gsal to// phyag na rdo rje dang thabs cig go// de nas yang dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
134a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i byin rlabs ngomar to// 'di lta bu'itho 'phrul ngo mtshar tsho'o// sems can thugs rnga'i dbyung thag chad cing ngan sang du ste ba rnams la jo 'phrul bstan pasa'o// de'i 'o
134a2(rnying rgyud): tshig bstan du gsol ces pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ya mAn+ta kas thugs kyis gsang mdzod nas phyung / mthu ragasang ba'i bum par dril/ ljags kyi dbang po la bkram ste bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje khyod nyid kyi thugs la yod bzhin du 'gro ba 'don
134a3(rnying rgyud): du/ gtso bo bzhi'i don dang nges tsheg/ dag zhub legs so// dngas bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'khor ba'i rgyamatsho drang ba'i phyir// gang ltar 'dul ba'i rlom pa bstan// byin gyi log tub bsdus pas// sems can drang ba'i don slad du// gamar ram
134a4(rnying rgyud): gur grum kha dog las// skad zil 'dra ba'i spyaru bstan// kun bzang zhi ba'i sku las ni// nga nyid rdzob chen por gnas// 'jig rten dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// thams nyid chu bo 'i rang bzhin bstan// nga yi thugs kyi yang sprul pas// dbang pog
134a5(rnying rgyud): po bzhin du bstun// dmar ba dbang gi rang bzhin la// rba ni chags pa'i rang bzhin te// con zhe sdang nyi tshe zhes// des na ma ru tse zhes bya// gtso bo bzhi yi lag na ni// skye 'gro'i tshe srog gnas bya'o// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal ma ru cos
134a6(rnying rgyud): mched bzhi'i sngags chud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang ni mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs dang // dus ngan tha ma'i rnal 'byor pas// gsung
134a7(rnying rgyud): gi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyis// lha chen gtso bo rnams lani// byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol// bdag cag rnams la bstan pa yi// ji ltar bgyi ba'i rim pa bzhin// dpa' bo chen pos
134b1(rnying rgyud): bka' stsol mdzod// ces pa'o// dpa' ba chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig khro bo rol pa'i chags// gsung gi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya// da ni khro ba'i rgyal po ste// rnam shes chog brgya dngapa la nyon//
134b2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi yang sprul las// sgrol byed gshin rje ma ru tse// 'gugs byed srin po ma ru tse// dbang sdud bdud pho ma ru tse// sgrol byed gnod sbyin ma ru co// gshin rje srin po bdud dang ni// gnod sbyin la sogs sde brgyad kyi// kha lo bskyar bar dbang ba skur te/
134b3(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i sngags ni 'di rnams so// gnod sbyin phyogs nas skor byed pa// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nu mo bi shA mA Na s+ye/ na ma ha na ku pa ra s+ye/ gu h+ya ka te pa te t+ye ba na ku pa ra d+ha'i sha mig/ a nu ru pa su ru pa/ tsar+ha kha na nA ga tsa tsa kaM h+ya mo he sa/ kAn
134b4(rnying rgyud): sa ra na he ma ka na kra ha ka/ tsa la tsa la pa tsa paH/ lu lu su lu swA hA/ 'bod zad dgyes te bsad pa dang bzhi'o// oM d+ha ling shang ka du/ d+hi za ya kra rlung / pu gye mkha'adang / rba du pra pra du ma dum/ shaMg shig/ 'bod rmed pagyis te bsad pa dang bzhi'o/
134b5(rnying rgyud): o rnalam rnal te gsod la rngam/ gshog la mer/ pris la nr-i thu bis thu/ lcags kyi sra/ 'bod rbad dgyes te bsad pa dang bzhi'o// oM bdud pra ma ya/ bdud pra ma ya/ snying mgo tshod du ru du du/ ha ra hi har ti/ snying la dza ri nag po ti pa
134b6(rnying rgyud): bi dwe/ steng la pa tsa tsa pa ma ril rbad/ nag po nyer ba ma ri la rbad/ nug po he ra ha/ gu ye hu ya snying la dur dur glo tsa bo ril rbad/ 'bod rbad dgyes te bsad pa dang bzhi'o// 'jam dpal maru tsa'i sngags chung las/ rtsa ba sngags kyi le'u
134b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdzas kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// gsod pa'i phyogs nas gsad par bya// gnod sbyin phyogs nas gsad par bya// gnod sbyind dmar ldan dmar la// gshin rje dkar po gnyang nag la// sr-i
135a1(rnying rgyud): postsog chags sder rdugs sa// bdud cing ma khrag thug pos bya// skrag ca thug cang la sogs pa'i// kludang khrag dang snying rnams ni// brten pa'i rnas sa bas gyu par bya// tshil chen pa yul la sogs pa// dbye bar
135a2(rnying rgyud): su bsag par bya// drag po la sogs rdzas rnams ni// bsad pa'i rdzas su bsag par bya// bzhi po sa sor bsgrub na yang // rang rang srog chags mnor dang // phyi ma'i rdzas rnams gzhung bzhin bsham// tsar dkar po gnya' nag la// bzhi kab
135a3(rnying rgyud): kyang skyon med ces// khro bo chen pos don du gsungs// rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa bzhi// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir bzhugs nas su// mched bzhi'i sgra ni gsal bsgoms la/ spyan drang mchod pas thugs dam bskul// yang na dka' thub chen po yi//
135a4(rnying rgyud): gyis rjegs can mAnas ni// spyan drang la sogs gang bzhin gyi// snying po gdun sa khrugs nasas// bod cing thugs dem rjod paskal nas// gdong dmar gtad de dam bad na// sum dzugs ma gyis gdon po / 'a med pral paH
135a5(rnying rgyud): gas rgyud las/ sa ma pa pa ng+ge nas nga denas nga ga pa sang byab// mtha~Mng ga thogs sa sa// thugs gas sa tshul/ man pa sbyin// gang brgya
135a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin la// sgo dang sgo khrud rim bzhin ldan// mthing nag dbus la bskyed rdzogs te// 'khor lo bzhi la gtso bo bzhi// rdzas ni gnod sbyin phyogs nas bskor// dug gtor dang ni sbab gtor dang //
135a7(rnying rgyud): hom dang phur bu rim bzhin dgod// dug gi dbye ba'i sngags bstan pa// ya ma rA dza kra ling pa sang sang / kun pa sang sang / klu ling sang sang ku ta nan/ yol ljags saM ku ta ki hUM phaT/ kun la bzhi sdom sngags su bstan/ phur bu dang ni drag
135b1(rnying rgyud): po'o// de yi drag sngags bshad par bya// rtsa ba'i drug sngags bzhi pa la// mjug la btags ta brtag par bya// mA ra ya dang zang pos brjod// na rna sar+g+ha wA ra N+DIg la ya dz+nyA \u0f7f/ sra ba bzhil btags la bajug// rom la gdong dang
135b2(rnying rgyud): bsreg pa'i sngags// lung dang ldan par brjod par bya// tha byang bsreg cing nyung dkang brdag/ oM grA m+b+ha dang gan um paN+Da shA~M kra mA ra ma bzang / yag gso dmar mA ra la/ adz+dza ShI nA ha kr-i bar/ ya\u0f89\u0fa4 ba la k+Sha bri zad / gdong dmar bA ru la za
135b3(rnying rgyud): shrI de ba ta ta man+ta b+hi gri ba kha la dun ti/ gdong dmar mA ra ya/ many+dzu b+hI de ba gri ba kha la shag snying mgo tshad/ yun dung tang zad/ dgra bo pa ra ya rbad/ de ba yaD+ga shrI ku ru ma ta rba ba ta ka re hi na/ kha la shAg snying kha la yaM/ mgo rbang dgra bo mA ra ya ri/ sder pa
135b4(rnying rgyud): ho ma la me sbar te// gtor ma'i ling+ga lhag ma kun// spags la spyan sreg rab byas la// dmar po mched bzhi zhal ga dadra bsam// dgra bo gdong dmar gsol bar bas me// dmar po mched bzhi drag sngags rtsa bzhi la// gong ma'i drag sngags de
135b5(rnying rgyud): btags te// gdong dmar chog par rab bsregs la// thal bar rlung la bsur byas la// nges par mA ra gdon mi za// shar gyi bdud kyi dam rdzas ni// shar gyi dmar gtor bden pa'i rdzas// rtsa ba'i sngags la kha raM gdags// bod cing brten pa'i gtor ma
135b6(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal ma ru co mched bzhi'i sngags rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / phrin las sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rtsa ba bzhi sdom rgyun du grangs// oM ku mA rA dza many+dzu shI ya mAn+ta ka ku mA rA dza/ bco lnga sngag
135b7(rnying rgyud): gyi phreng ba 'di// mu tig bltar la bcus pa 'dra// rgyal ba rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs// oM ni ye shes lnga dang ldan// ku ma rang bzhin bskyed pa'i sngags// many+dzu 'jam pa'i khro bo ste// shrI ni bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal// ya mAn+ta ka gtso bo'i sngags//
136a1(rnying rgyud): n+ta/ bamA bzhi pan// bzhiskang gcig tu bste// las dang grib ma bzhin du bskrun// bdun 'dzum tha pa rjod b+h+ya// tshe dang shes panas martogs// Na 'dod du las 'byung bar 'gyur// gdang dmang 'dul
136a2(rnying rgyud): bar 'dod kyang drang // dag ga ma bsam pas 'grub par 'gyur// sa bon snying po rgyu dang 'dra// d+hu dz+nyA dzA dzA yang nA drug bar du bya// de ni bskyed pa'i sa bon yin// bdag gi rnam shes tshogs las byung // oM many+dzu TI kr-i mA rarA l+ya mAd+hika ma ru tsa ras pa hUM Ta/
136a3(rnying rgyud): bcu dgu sngags kyi dril sngags 'di// chu bur rdol ba'i tshul bzhin du// rgyal ba rnams kyi byed du brjod// brjod pas gtso bo bzhi yi sku// rgyan dang su mdog phyag mtshan ldan// rgyal ba'i skugasung thugs yin phyir// bzhi po dril bas sku gsung thugs/
136a4(rnying rgyud): de dag sngags su gsungs pa'o// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka dza la dza la kA ya hUM phaT/ oM nas hriM dang phaT kyi bar// bcu bdun brjod pa su yi sngags/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka wak+ka sha ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM nas hUM dang phaT kyi bar// bco brgyad brjod
136a5(rnying rgyud): nigasung gi sngags// oM a kro d+h+r-i ka ya pAr+tha ga tsiHsa na/ tsits+tshahots+tsha hU~M phaT/ oM nas r+b+ba dang phaT kyi bAr// bcu dgra gsungs te thugs su bstan// sa bon sngags dang bstod pa'i sngags// rgyani rtse ba'i bco lnga'i phreng // sre gsung thugs kyi sngags dang
136a6(rnying rgyud): drug/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// mthu dbang che bar byin gyis brlabs// sgrol zhing 'dul ba'i drag sngags ni// dpa' bo khro bos yang dag gsungs// 'jam dpal ma du tse'i sngags rgyud las/ rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs shing
136a7(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / dpa' bo khro bos yang dag bshad// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bsnyen pa ste// yon tan sngags ni las la sbyor// oM d+ha ra phaT/ oM dzod bsring sod ta sod/ oM ru ta ru D+ho m+ba ra
136b1(rnying rgyud): nan// oM hAHm+b+ha ma ma man tu dag po sngar pa/ don yon tan sngags sa bskrun// las kyi gnyed gtad thugs dam bsngal// dgra pan yi t+pata dang/ dgra ba ya shangs/ rma chu pa med dag par mAr ya dzan/ dgu la drang yang phaT/ rbangs ma la d+han gra zan
136b2(rnying rgyud): ya/ dze nan nan/ thugs dam skul ba'i sngags zhes bya// dkyil 'khor byin bskyed sngags bstan pa// oM shrI many+dzu ya maR+Sha dza ma ma e ka dza TI dza dza/ bcu drug brjod de byin dang ldan/ 'jam dpal ma ru co'i sngags rgyud las/ las la sbyor ba'i sngags
136b3(rnying rgyud): kye le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mnan pa'i las rnams 'di lta ste// thod pa gcig la 'khor lo bri// dkyil du mA ra ya yi ming rus gzhug/ thal 'dam drag gis kha bcad la// nA ga gnas pa'o lung pa /
136b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chen po'i gting du sba// gshin rje rgyal po'i lag tu gtad// rA dza bsgral ba'i g.yang gzhi ste// ra snying nang du ming rus gzhug/ pags patI nang du dril nas kyang // kun 'gro lam gyi bzhi mdor sgra// btab pa'i ming rus du phur 'god// ra yi kha
136b5(rnying rgyud): yi bslang bar bya// shwa gro ga sum mdor sba bar bya// sngags ni gang dang gang byed kyang // mched bzhi'i dam tshig sngags kyis mnan// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i ta mon ta dgra bo mA ra ya nan/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i ta mon ta dgra bo mA ra yai na ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i ta
136b6(rnying rgyud): mon ta dgra bo mA ra ya nan/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i ta mon ta dgra bo mA ra ya nan nan// ga ya ma leb dag la bris te mnan// khro rgyal rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// phris las rnam bzhi'i bro yang bzung // don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab// 'jam dpal ma rba tso'i
136b7(rnying rgyud): sngags rgyud las/ mdan pa'i la sa dang sngags brgyan pa'i la gyi badrin pa na// / de nas yang dag ngas gsungs pa// me rnams srog gi stong baT// klarnams srogag snying pon// ldan mas srog gi slong po ngas yin// ga
137a1(rnying rgyud): srog na sbyang bka min// 'drerna mas srog gi snying po drug pasdu yin// shaza' sog na ma ba yin// srin po'i srog ga snying po dzang ste// byol srung srog gi snying po tsat+ta len// dmyal dra srog snying du nas
137a2(rnying rgyud): ze rang srog snying byi dri yin// snying po de rnams bstan pa ste// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod pazhi// ba mu she la dug gtsang sbran// dkar po yan lag thub bu zhin// me tog dkar po dung bzhin 'ong // de gnyis snang byed mod bcug la// rang
137a3(rnying rgyud): dang bdud ni zhi// de ni zhi ba'i las su bstan// de las rgyas par bya ba ni// yig 'bru gur gum nyid kyis bris// bdag nyid tshe dang dbang zad rgyas// gzas pas las dang rnam smin rgyas// dbang du byab khrag gis bri// mngon spyod bya ba khrag sna gsum//
137a4(rnying rgyud): bdag gi gos dang rigs kyang byastan// 'dug stangs phyogs kyang rim bzhin no// DUr bzhi rgyas pa gser phur ro// dngul dang zangs lcags de bzhin no// grum po zla gam zur gsum mo// oM Tu b+h+r-iSh+Ti/ dz+dza chu mo/ sngags de dag gis lci bskur zhing //
137a5(rnying rgyud): gang la bya ba dgug par bya// oM dz+luM b+hu bru~M d+hu hU~M ru su 'u dzu Ta hUM ru gang / na mo badz+ra ma b+hi ta kro tA ya dza la ma ra ka ra ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dz+wa la yA ta su ta sarba nA ga ma ra ni/ sa ra sa ra bi sa ra bi sa ra/ sarba du sha ni hU~M phaT/ sho sha na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oMN+DohrI tsinyA han
137a6(rnying rgyud): na hUM d+ha sa da ta ni ts+tshin+da ya hU~M phaT/ khro bo 'bar ba'i yang snying 'di// 'jam dpal khro bo'i sngags yin te// phrin las rnam bzhi'i phur bu'i sngags// drag sngags phrin las mngab gcig/ nga yis so sor bshad kyis kyang // las 'di kun la brtsam par bya/
137a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzem dpal dmar po'i sngags rgyud las/ phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas pang dag nges gsungs pa// nyon cig phyag na rdo rje dang // gtso bo bzhi dang khro bo'i tshogs// nga yi bka' stsal rgyud 'di gang // sangs rgyas
137b1(rnying rgyud): gyi sku gsung thugs// sru yi mchog bshad par bya// nges par ston pa'i bu ru dang // gzhan dag nges par sgrub pa la// ngan sems dbyar sems mi bya zhing // dkon mchog spyil gnod pa yi// gnod sbyin gdong dmar la sogs pa// gnod par byed na A yangs//
137b2(rnying rgyud): de dag shin tu bsgral bar bya// gsung gi dam tshig 'di lta ste// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mig cad// chos 'dzin du mi smra'o// thugs kyi dam tshig thub pa'o// de lta bstan pa phan chod nas// lnga ba rgya mtha' mtshun chad du// shin tu gsang zhing grub par gyis//
137b3(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i dngos grub pan chad nas// 'jam dpal dngos grub yan chad du// ya li nas grub tu mi 'dod tshe// de tshong yi bstan pa 'byung // rnal 'byor gzhung dang ldan pa yis// gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa las// gzhan du bstan na rang nyid brlag/ 'a
137b4(rnying rgyud): bu mnar med dmyal bar skye// dam tshig mnyams des thub na// rgyal ba rnams kyang dgongs par mdzad// nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// gtso bo bzhi yis chos skor srungs// don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dgra byung nges par bros pa'i tshe//
137b5(rnying rgyud): khro khyed bzhis g.yel gyur na// phyag na rdo rjes dbang mdzod la// ye shes chen po khro chen pos// rang la rang men rdul du chog/ dam tshig nyams pa'i gshed ma mdzod// sku gsung thugs kyi rang nyid dang // nga yi bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin du// las
137b6(rnying rgyud): len bzhin dam bsrung na// ci 'dod bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub// dngos grub sgra gsung zugs thob ste// sku yi dngos grub tshe dpag med// 'khor dang 'dab kyang shin tu rgyus// gsung gi dngos grub sgra spyan thob// las kyi rnam pa ci byas kyang // legs
137b7(rnying rgyud): ging sbyin pa'i sman yang thob// thugs kyi dngos grub shes rab ste// bla ma phyi ma don kyang shes// sa badz+ra rim gyis bgrod par 'gyur// kun nu 'od kyis yang non// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa par thong// des ni bkang stsal shin gtod// spyad 'di gnas pa

138b1(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// hoHzhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid la bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rtog med spros bral chos dbyings ni// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dngos med spros bral la// rig pa spros
138b2(rnying rgyud): mi rtog bsgom// kun tu ldang gi ye shes ni// chos nyid kun khyab yenas don// ma rtogs sems can 'khor ba la// snying rjen ma mkha' lta bur bsgom// rgyu yi ting 'dzin ye shes ni// skye ba med las sems nyid sde// skye ba'i cho 'phrul dpa
138b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar gsal// thams cad skye ba'i rgyu ru bsgom// sems nyid hUM gi byin rlabs las// 'byung ba dbang chen sa bon spro// e yaM ra bi suM r-i kaM b+h+rUM// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // ye shes 'bar ba gnas chen po// mtha' dang dbus
138b4(rnying rgyud): med nam mkha'i rgya// phyi dang nad med chos kyi mkha'// b+h+rUM bi shra bi shud+d+he/ de dbus e las grwa gsum ni// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// pho brang zla gam mu khyud ldan// gru chad bzhi du rnam par gsal// dbus su rak+ta 'khrugs shing 'khyil/
138b5(rnying rgyud): dregs pa nyi zla'i gdan stang su// sems kyi rang bzhin yige 'bru'i mchog/ hUM gi rnam pa 'di nyid las// 'gyur ba'i sku ni rnam par 'jigs// oM many+dzu shrI ku mA ra/ ya mAn+ta ka ma ru tse de pa ta ye hUM/ yang dag dpa' bo phyag rgya che// gshin rje'i
138b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po nyid du gas la// zhal gcig stan gsum phyag gnyis pa// dur khrod myed chu kun ldan bsgom// dpa' bo de yi thugs ka dang // ljags dang shangs kyi spyan nag las// yi ge 'bar ba dza' zlos pas// 'jig rten dregs pa'i
138b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs btul nas// dpa' bo bzhi yi sku ru gsal// gong bzhin bskyod pa'i snying po brjod// kun kyang dmang po spu ched// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gtum bgo can// gtsol bka' nyan sgrol ba'i ging // rgyan rnams so so gsal
139a1(rnying rgyud): bar bsgom// de la dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// gsang sngags 'di yis rab tu bya// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la kA ya hUM phaT oM a kro ta ka yan+ta d+ha ka b+hA ga sha ya ha na han hUM phaT/ oM a kro he ka ya mAn+ta ka/
139a2(rnying rgyud): tset+ta pan ts+tshid+hA ts+tshiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ de ltar ting 'dzin gsal rdzogs nas// dmar po'i 'khor lo bca' ba ni// dur khrod ro ngas khatshon la// khrug chen dug dang thal chen gyis// mdog bsgyur srung bzhir brkyangs te bskam// ro sol dug dang thal tsha
139a3(rnying rgyud): gsum// de dag sbyar ba'i stag chos bris// de nas 'khor lo b+hA ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte ba nas// shar chub 'khor lo rtsibs ban+d+har TI// de nas gsang sngags dgod pa ni// mA dang tsa dang pa dang yA// phyogs bzhir 'khor
139a4(rnying rgyud): la bri// ru dang te dang tA dang hUM// mtshams kyi 'khor lo bzhi la bri// oM dang phaT ni shar nub bo// bsgrub bya'i ming rus dbus su bri// gnod sbyin phyogs nas brtsam par bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni bcu dag la// nyi ma'i maN+Dal bcu gzhag la/
139a5(rnying rgyud): ya ma rA dza yab yum gyis// shar nub gnyis la g.yas g.yon no// phyogs bzhir ma ru tse bzhi'o// mtshams bzhir bse yi mon pa bzhi// de lhur bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas// pho nya btang la bkug cing gsad// ting 'dzin rtse
139a6(rnying rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod bya// grangs kyi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // thebs byed mtshon pa'i dus dag tu// 'khor lo gzhung dang mthun pas gnan// des ni mi 'grub mi srid do// mgrub lan gsum spogs par bya// dmar po'i sngags rgyud phyi ma las//
139a7(rnying rgyud): sa ma ti yi rim pa dang // dbang bskur ba dang 'khor lo'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas srin po'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces zhus so// bcom ldan ya mAn+ta ka yang // mi mngon chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs

139b2(rnying rgyud): las bshad phyir// srin po bdag gis gdungs te smras// bcom ldan nyid kyis byin brlab mdzod// ces zhus pas/ de nas dpa' bos bka' stsal pa// dzaHhUM baM hoHa ma ha na sa nan/ ka nan ta ka par skye/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa mA ya dza/ de yis
139b3(rnying rgyud): khyod kyi las dag bshad// thod chen bzhi yi wa thod bzhi// yang nA gaN+DIg la rab tu bsgrub// rak+tas bkrang la gsang sngags bri// dpral ba ra ya nA~M g.yas su dun// lhag par rgyun bri g.yon du yaM/ hrIHSh+T+r-iH'i sngags dang spel bar bri//
139b4(rnying rgyud): yis bskor// pa cazhi rdo 'i khyo sa bskyod// gaN+DIg yon du meng dus gzugs/ mkhang dag brti sa la snrel 'khor gzhag/ gsang ba'i sngags rnams bstan pa / pa pa mre swA / da ni yang snang pa'i sngags/
139b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i drag sngags bstan pa ni// oM shrI ma s+thA ya ma rA dzA/ aM ka dza ti dza/ br-i dzA che ge mo mA ra ya/ oM sa many+dzu shrIm+bA tra ya mAn+ta ka/ a kro te ka/ badz+ra ta kro ta ka/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta rbad/ thu ma ri li l-i b+h+yAM/ sngags bzlas yungs kAr gdab par
139b6(rnying rgyud): byA// rat+na tra yA la sogs pa'i// gtso bzhi rtse ba'i sngags kyis zab// de nas pal mo'i drag sngags ni// oM ma ma ma la laM/ gro lo rno che gran las na ya/ ma ti ti ta rbad na thum ri li li/ sha ti ti ta rbad na bu ma ri le li khi na ya rbad na zlum ra ma li/ 5
139b7(rnying rgyud): ni la sti rba na thu ma ri li le/ dgra bo na la rbad na TI ri li li/ bar bar b+he hrIHbzhi skor gnan// shin tu rdzogs nas thun du 'phang // thims pa thams kyi mtshan ma rtags// mjug tu lung dang ldan par bya// las mthub ci rtags 'god na// ga
140a1(rnying rgyud): bklags la thod par bsgrub// ging rgyam pa mad phrin las D+ha// b+hIHdang tshig sngags kyis gnan// 'jam dpal ma thun+da'i sngags spya dbye ma las spyan drang ba dang thod pa srub pa len gyi gnyis pa'o//
140a2(rnying rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces lus so// ya~M At+t+waka gshin rje gshed// thugs chen po'i byin rlabs las// 'khor ba'i dam sra gdul ba'i phyir// mya ngan mau 'dra' bzhugs su gsol// thugs rdo lbal bkrol ba'i gling /

140a4(rnying rgyud): gus pas/ oM kum d+hA ngaM/ la zham du tses ma ya ti sta lhan/ khyed kyi las ni bshad par bya// gru gsum zla ga ma 'khor lo bzhi// sgo ldan dkyil 'khor bris nas nI// de la rdzas dgod gu gsum dbus// lho d+h+r-ig tshogs bcad mang

140b1(rnying rgyud): skad ces thas kyi// lugasung gas pa rdzogs pa// yaswA\u0f88\u0f90 gas drugazhung// ma gra na pasmra m+b+ha nga \u0f7f// TIgacig dang ngas zug cus // zlagasang gas dang na la sa las// sbrul ba k+kol gang drug 'jig

140b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' bos bka' stsal pa/ oM many+dzu shrI ku mA ra nA mo// a ti pu ho// pra ti pu ho// khyod kyi las ni bshad par bya// rme sugA dang nI nag po yi// sog pa dag ni g.yas pa la// gang yin de la bkug cing bstim// ma yengs brtson pa'i

140b6(rnying rgyud): nA// gshin rje nyi dkrung brlag par bskur// khrag dang sol ba sbyar ba yi// gtor ma dgong btang las gnyer gtad// 'jam dpal mchu co'i sngags chud phyi ma las/ phyag btsal ba dang srog bslab bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//

141a1(rnying rgyud): brlag pa'i phyir// sh+tsa khrag snying gi mchod pa bzhes// dug lnga rtsad gcod mchod par bzhes// sbyin bsreg mthun pa'i las 'tshal phyir// bdag gis dga' bar smras pa la/ yang dag dpa' bor byin rlabs mdzod

141b1(rnying rgyud): maru tse// ku ma rA dza sgrol ba'i ging // da sha grIb bdud kyi ging // ya ma rA dza gnod sbyin ging // khams gsum sgrol ging chen po bzhi// spu gri dbyug tho ral gri dang // zhags pa thogs pa'i dmag dpon bzhi// 'khor gyi ging bran mang bas bskor//
141b2(rnying rgyud): las byed chen po bzhi la bstod// gnan pa mthun pa'i las 'tshal phyir// bdag gis bskyod pa smras pa la// 'jam dpal nyid kyis byin brlab mdzod// ces zhus pas/ de nas dpa' bos bka' stsal pa/ na mo dat+na tra yA ya/ tsa la pra tsa la/ shig
141b3(rnying rgyud): ga mi ni pA hA// khyod kyi las ni bdag gis bshad// bya rog 'ug pa'i dang ru la// 'go ba'i lha dang ming rus gdags// sngags bzlas yungs kyis brab par bya// 'khor lo thod pa ga yang gzhi la// sdod mar lcags za ka dkar nag dkri// la tshwa'i rgyas
141b4(rnying rgyud): btab rebs gyil// la chas rgyas gdab zhabla mas gril// rgya ni rdo rje rgyu gram gdab// dkyil du laM bris ri rab bskyed// gnas pa'i las ni rnam gsum ste// DA ga gnas pa'i pho brang dang // mkhar po che'i sgo srang dang // shwa grog sum mdo dag tu
141b5(rnying rgyud): gnan// gnod sbyin gnas pa'i mdun srang ngam// rgya gram lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am// dur khrod chen po'i gting du sba// maN+Dal chen po'i gting du bsam// yang na hom khung nyid du gnan// lhag ma rlung la phyar te gnan// gshin rje 'bar ba'i
