142a1(rnying rgyud): rmi khyed la mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// sangs rgyas bstan brgyas gyur nas// gshin rje mang po bsrung bar zhog/ log par lta ba'i sems can kun// rlung rnams
142a2(rnying rgyud): t+ya brlag par shog/ bla med byang chub sa thob nas// khyed dang mi 'bral 'grogs par sho // khrag thun mthun pa'i las 'tshal shog/ bdag gis rlon lam smras pa 'di// bcom ldan gshin rjes byi rlabs mdzod// ces sa pas/
142a3(rnying rgyud): nas dpa' bos bka' stsal pa/ oM e sa hu/ pes hu sa ma ya bag sha ya// khyod kyi las ni bdag gis bshad// thod par rabs chad nag po 'am// mtshan dran rgod pas thun snod bya// zhag sna bcwa 'am yang na khri// sod pang dug rang
142a4(rnying rgyud): bsres la blug/ rgyung chen gzungs zag btags la bzung // rab tu gsang ba'i thun skyugs bzlas// ji ling shang ka ru/ snying khrag rtswal breng breng / dgra bo'i srog tsa dun chad// sngags de yungs ker ske tshal// sngags lazod pa'i
142a5(rnying rgyud): khrag la bstim// khol la rlangs pa byung ba dang // 'dzeg cing 'gul nas 'phang bar bya'o// bdag nyid mdu tse ru sgom// dbyug blo phyar te stag lkugs bgo// 'jig rten lde 'dre thams cad la// bden pa dang zor la ma bas la bar bya//
142a6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje bskul te khrag thun 'phang // thod pa bub na gdon mi za// g.yas g.yon bltas na pho mo la// tshur la bltas na rang la gnod// dwangos kyis sod na bsgyur la bya// lo zla gza' skar gdug pa'i dus// ram phyed dag la brdeg par
142a7(rnying rgyud): zhes bka' stsal pos/ lha sri sde brgya rje su yi ngas te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// 'jam dpal ma skyo'i sngags rgyud phyim las/ sngon lam dang thun dang rjes su le rangs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
142b1(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal ma du tse'i sngags rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// // de nas yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das ya mAn+ta ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// rang rig ye shes blo dang ma ldan pas// bsnyen pa ma rdzogs las la bskul
142b2(rnying rgyud): snga ba// rdzas dang lag cha gzhung bzhin ma rdzogs shing // rtags dang mtshan ma dus la ma phyin pa// sgrol bdag chen po'i sku la bzod par gsol// zhes bag chags sbyangs nas yang 'di skad ces zas so// rgyud 'di'i gzhi rnams dpa' bo yi/
142b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i don du bdag la shod// ces pas/ de nas dpa' bos yang dag bshad// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid las// dus gsum srid pas bsdus pa'i chos// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba yi// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i rgyu las byung // da
142b4(rnying rgyud): por zhe na rtog bzlog pa'i phyir// ji ltar mos pa dam pas 'dul// de bas 'di ni gdong dmar don// sku mdog phyag mtshan phyag rgya ni// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du bstan// gzhi nyid snang med gcig gi dang // dper ni spyir 'dod sker 'a
142b5(rnying rgyud): bas// las kyi brtson 'grus rim pa bzhin// gshin rje gcig la las bcwol myur// de bzhin so so las nyid la// bsnyen zhing bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i// sgrol ba'i las nyid bshad bya ba// ku ma rA dza brdo lnga'i phreng // 'khor
142b6(rnying rgyud): lo sgrub pa'i bsnyen pa ste// sgrub pa'i sngags tshan bzhi po rnams// nam gyi gung dang tho rangs rtse// nyi ma shar dang dgong gi bar// sngags bzlas rdzas kyis brub par bya// srog las drang ba'i bsnyen pa ni// shrI maH yi gsang snga
142b7(rnying rgyud): la// rtag tu grangs pa'i bsnyen po yin// de la sgrub pa'i gsang sngags ni// rnal ma thi lang sngags gnyis po// gong ma de la btags te bzlas// drag po phung pa'i sgrub sngags so// rdzas la bgrang ba'i bsnyen po'o// @
143a1(rnying rgyud): yA'i bsnyen pa yin// kru ling rdza sa la sogs pa// bsgrub cing lga dang dbye ba yin// thod pa'i bsnyen par grangs pa ni// b+he ma rtswa'i gsang sngags dang // mthu tshol gsang sngags ni// yi ge bcu gnyis la
143a2(rnying rgyud): bgrang // bsgrub cing gnad la bor ba ni// shrIm klus dbu gnan te// rat+na ya la sogs pa yi// mched bzhi'i rtsa ba'i drag sngags la// bse yi lha mo'i drag sngags spel// bar bar ming dang rus bcug la// mA ra ya yi sgra dang
143a3(rnying rgyud): bcas// dzo de badzi la sogs pa// bdud drang bas mo'i drag sngags dang // srid pa'i ma mo'i drag sngags dang // zor thun dbab pa'i drug sngags dang // gshin rje'i kham sngags bzlas pa dang // phur bus gdab dang bsreg gzhan sngags
143a4(rnying rgyud): drag po'i las sngags zhes su bshad// rang sems bskyed pa lhar bsgoms pas// rtog pa dong ba'i dgongs pa ni// shi nas las kyi srin por skyes// de phyir snang la rang bzhin med// ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis// nyon mongs spong
143a5(rnying rgyud): nga ma gtogs par// zhe sdang gdug pas dmigs la sgrol// dmyal bar skye ba mnar med len// de phyir thugs rje'i gzungs zag gces// sgrol ba'i phrin las gsungs pa ni// rgyal ba'i lung las gsungs pa ni// sbyor ba'i/
143a6(rnying rgyud): mchod pas bskang ba ni// bu mo shin tu mtshan ldan la// chags pa'i bu mo ming bzhi ma// bkug ste stim la sbyor dag bskul// b+ha ga gsang ba'i mdangs 'bul bsam// tha tshig shin tu bsres pa dang // mkha' gsang byin gyis
143a7(rnying rgyud): brlang pa tsam// byang sems mkha' la phebs pa dang // 'phags pa yi dam lha yang mchod// bdag nyid dngos grub blang byas nas// srid pa'i dbang can pho mo rnams// spyan drang mchod la de dbang bskur// mngag pa'i las la bskul pa
143b1(rnying rgyud): lus la bstim pa'i lha ma rnams// dga' ba'i yad kyis gshegs su gsol// 'bras bu sten par byed pa ni// blta ba dang ni dmachog yin// 'di yi dmachog bskrun pa na// pad mar gang dmar sha pang bsrung // khwa dang sbas pa mtshan ming
143b2(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i rjes rnams tshogs par bya// bdag nyid bdud chas 'jug pa ni// lhag par sgra yi dam tshig yin// ma nor sngags bzlas chu bo'i gzhung // skad mi gcig dang skyes pa dang // smra ba spangs te bzlas pa ni// tshad du 'byung ni
143b3(rnying rgyud): bstod bya// dkon mchog spyi dang bla ma la// ngag gi nyes pa sbyang bar bya// lhag pa gsung gi dam tshig yin// ting 'dzin mi 'bral rgyun du bya// lta ba dang ni spyod pa ni// mthun pa'i phyogs nas spyad par bya// bshad cing bstan par mi bya ste/
143b4(rnying rgyud): sbrul ltar gdug pa'i zhe sdang gnong // brnag pa zugs kyi dam tshig yin// bsnyen bsgrub las la sbyar dus bsrung // rgyun tu spyi yi dam tshig bsrung // dam tshig srog ltar bsrung ba gces// dam tshig gzhung ltar bsrung ba dang // bka'
143b5(rnying rgyud): dbang gzhung du zhu ba dang // phyi nang gsar ba'i dbang bskur zhing // lung dang man ngag de la bstan// de ma yin la bstan gyur na// bdag kyang phung la gzhan kyang brlag/ rgyu dang yi ger bris pa 'di// skal ldan rnams la sdang bar gyis//
143b6(rnying rgyud): zhes bka'i stsal pa dang dbang phyug chen po shin tu yi rangs te'i stong do// / 'jam dpal ma du tse'i sngags rgyur las phyi ma'i phyi ra rdzogs so// / rgyu gar skad du/ yaSh+Ta ma du tso betA li b+h+yaHhaH/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin
143b7(rnying rgyud): mdu rtso ro langs gsang ba'i spyod/ bcom ldan 'das drag po 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ ri bdun gyi byang phyogs kyi ngos la/ gnod sbyin rgyal po maru tse zhes bya ba gnas te/ lha dang lha ma
144a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad dang g.yul 'gyed pa/ mi dang dud 'gro la sogs pa thams cad gsod cing / mi sha dang rta sha mi lpags la sogs pa khA longs spyod pa/ de lta bu'i lus mkhan de las kyi dbang gis
144a2(rnying rgyud): gnas dpa 'khod do// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ zhing bsnol ba'i stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das drag po sgrol ba la zhus pa/ g+he kyai dpal ldan drug po skol ba lcags// rnams byed gsod pa'i sems can 'di/ @
144a3(rnying rgyud): sgrol lam 'dul ba dang // las las bzlog gam zhen pa dgag/ ces gsol pa dang / dpal ldan drug po sgrol bas bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho sems can chen po 'di// sgrol dang skyong la brtson pa yis// 'dis ni bstan pa bsrung
144a4(rnying rgyud): ba yin// dus la bab par bstan pa'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas 'khor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba byas nas/ shin tu bde ba dang bcas pas yid rang ngo // ro langs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u
144a5(rnying rgyud): dang po'o// // bcom ldan 'das drag po sgrol byed la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam bzhi las dang ldan pas mnyam pa dang // sgrol brtson las la mkhas pas bshad par bya// zhes dam bcas so// de nas 'phags pa kun dga'
144a6(rnying rgyud): bos gsol pa/ sems can la sogs bde ba dang // bka' yi bstan srung bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ rngam pas bshad pas nyon cig/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ 'di sa ba rnal 'byor dam can gyis// gcan gzan dang
144a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thod pa la// drag po'i rgyan gyis brgyan byas la// sgrol bdag gnas su ting nge 'dzin// bla rdo gsal ba'i rten gsal te// gal te de yi bka' bcag na// sgrol gang bdag po'i dam tshig bstan// de bas lus la bcang ba'o//
144b1(rnying rgyud): dri yi dmachog nyams gyur na// grol ba'i thod pa drang ba'i sngags// 'dun ched du gsungs pa'o// b+hags thig pu ma he he pra mab+h+yo// hrikArba lu pram ha ta dgra pa'i khyim du 'grams shig/ rlung ma ma chod du zangs shig/ ces pa ni 'dren pa//
144b2(rnying rgyud): de nas byin rlabs bshad par bya// sngags dang ldan pas bsnyen pa'o// oM badz+ra ma hA de wa dzit+tA dz+wa la b+h+yo b+h+yo// bkra shis grangs ni rtswa gcig go// bzlas te gzhal yas khang nang du bsam pa'o// de yi nang du byas ma bya ba/ sgrol zhing srog bas
144b3(rnying rgyud): maru co// sha med sgeg cing keng rus 'chang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dam rI// thod phreng do shal sbrul gyis brgyan// betson g.yas la zhags pa g.yon// yi dwags pho mo'i steng na bzhugs// g.yon na gnyer 'byung ro langs ma/
144b4(rnying rgyud): kham nag ral pa gyen du 'bar// ral gri g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// ha la ha la'i sgra 'byin ma// ti ra'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o// dpa' bo ro langs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sgrub pa dang bca' gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
144b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba// ro langs gnas nas dgug pa ste// ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral bar// the tshom med pas bsgrub pa ste// ro langs gsang ba'i ma ru tse// snying la srog gi 'khor lo ni// 'di ltar gnas par shes par bya// dbus su a
144b6(rnying rgyud): las bskor ba ste// sgrol ging rtsa ni bco brgyad do// g.yas pa'i rtsa dgu bskor ba'i sngags/ ru ru tra ga sha shal gyi sbyang // 'bru dgu g.yas pa'i rtsa la bskor// rtsa dgu g.yon du gsang ste bskor// ro la mu ti steng kha rag b+h+yo b+h+yo/
144b7(rnying rgyud): bco brgyad rtsa dang yi ge dag/ gnad dbab dkrug pas bcu dang srog/ rang dbang med par mtshan ma ston// de ltar du ni bsgrub par bshad// ro langs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
145a1(rnying rgyud): yang ni dpa' bas paka rgyu/ ga bdag gtung ma bshad byug// de lung la gnas d+hag// klung mkhan par brnyan m+b+han+ta// dgang pog dag dang // g.yul dubs rang
145a2(rnying rgyud): gang khad dpa' bo dam sa bya// rgyal phog pa'i bdud ci yang // bsres te sngags kyis dbul bar bya// zhes shad dpa' bo rang spyad par shA // nga la sa gas dab byed pas/ yub pa dang srog sngags na pa'i
145a3(rnying rgyud): rgol zhing de la phyag tshul nas// gang la bya ba gnas sgyu khrugs// klog ni rtog shog sa// kar+ya~M bya ba'i waM// basmad pa'i drag sngags bzlas par d+ha// dr-i nga tha gags
145a4(rnying rgyud): gang phrin pa// khyer du gnas nas dgug par bya// sho du srog gi chung sbyinatAM// zlog rgya nag po drang bar bya// ngo langs nag po 'dzul pa'aH// 'od zer nag pa spyod pa dang / kaM ke b+hag krug 'dren ni// lkogag ma sbyin dmang chan
145a5(rnying rgyud): 'anas na // de ldan pas sngags 'di / 'i dran po snyam pa ba tan dgra bo saphaT// klas rab gnas nas de ga // yang gsang dge tu 'atsun pa yin/
145a6(rnying rgyud): ro// de la sa 'gugs par bcom med// thog bdag srog ni bzhugs 'byung bas// dargyags kyad pas dpang bstan pa sa// ro ladus gsang ba'i rgyud las/ zla thugs pa'i lce skye pa//
145a7(rnying rgyud): dmachog pa phyag 'tshal nas/ thabs dpa sa khye di/ sa pa da na pa'o// del sa pa'i ma su rlo// byangs te rgya gcug bas// dang la zhir gsod pa pa/
145b1(rnying rgyud): chen las la rngam bte// de nas rngam pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM t+ta ki rA dza badz+ra tiHhU~M b+h+rUM/ snying la za ba d+hoHts+tshiSh+ThamA rarA ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra han ha na ti tsakra hUM phaT/ pu tri pa la mdzod mA ra ya swA hA// 'di dag gsungs pa gsod la
145b2(rnying rgyud): dzam// 'dis ni gsod par gdon mi za// 'khor ni stag sbyang mang po gsod la rngam// de yis lus srog bral bar gdon mi za// spyugs pa klu dang 'khor tshogs las la 'gyed// mche ba gtsigs pas rang la 'jigs pa ni// srid
145b3(rnying rgyud): pa gsum po g.yo ba dag tu bstan// de bas drag po srid gsum bdag po bshad// thams cad ro dang shu la rngams pas na// des na gsang ba'i sha rgyad yin par bshad// dpa' bo gar mkhan gyi rgyud las/ rngams shing bsad pa dang shA la rol pa'i
145b4(rnying rgyud): lde'u te drug pa'o// / grub pa'i dus dang rtags bstan pa// dpa' bo rgyang la log pa'i rtags// rab 'bring tham la sogs pa// dpa' bo d+h+yad du be sha par bya// lus dang ldan pa rtags 'di 'byung // rkye ga mon dang
145b5(rnying rgyud): sprin dag byung na// 'di dag rab tu 'grub par bshad// thod pa 'gul dang 'od 'byung zhing // sku dngos bstan pa ni grub pa'o// rdo rje slob dpon byung na dam tshig bslang // mdze can la sogs dman pa'i rigs byung na// dam rdzas bstar zhing ma
145b6(rnying rgyud): la bstab pa bya// sprin dang ser ba 'tshub ma dgra byung na// nges par drag po grub pa'i rtags// bslab khang 'chog cing chem sgra chen po ni// drag po'i las la myur du shis// rgyal sras btsun chen zhub can dang // de ltar byung na drag po'i las la
145b7(rnying rgyud): shis// hal pa tri k+She le la// de yang drag po'i las la shis// ra mda' khri log byung na gnod sbyin 'khrugs pa'i rtags// de ltar byung na 'dzab dang bsnyen pa bsgyur// dus su rtags rnams mthong na mi 'khrugs brtan pa thob// ro langs
146a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dud las/ thub byed rtags kyi la'u sde bdun pa// sa dpa' bangam pa yis// dus thongs pal nan ma'irdzogs// gnod sbyi drug zhal stobs ldan ma// banas drag pa
146a2(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya// 'jig rten drug galas la byas pa yi// can drug canas nag la// yang na kham nAg mdog can la// dka' thub can gyi khru gang bri// gting du thu dang gyen du brtsig pa ni// de yang dge 'a thub rten gyi / thul shis//
146a3(rnying rgyud): drag po 'jigs pa'i tshon gyis bris// bang rim gsang ba'i ngo ldan gsum pa la// 'og ma dmar po srin mo'i mkhar chen la// gnam lcags yur mo'i gzer chen btabapa la// skyed na nyon mongs de mA tI// khram srang de shig mo /
146a4(rnying rgyud): ni// skyes pa shi ba'i khrag gis chag chag btab// drug dang sbyar ba'i gtor ma gtang bar bya// rkang chen la sogs gling bu 'bud par bya// rtswa skyegs khar mgu gul dud pas bdug/ drag po dbye ba'i sngags ni bstan par bya// ram dzag
146a5(rnying rgyud): mr-i n+ye bye// srid pa'i lhag nyan ma ny+dzu zhang lga dang // li ku lha dang po lha dgra lha rnams// bya m+b+ha rlung gis khyer ba lte bur bsam// de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni/ khro chug nam lcags thun ma'i gnyis la// skung napa
146a6(rnying rgyud): pa rjod pa paca'o// nal 'byor pa yi rigs kyi byab bshad// dka' thub can gyi kha dog dmang po dzin// yang nagacer du gyu la sgrub shig la// rnga ma chags pa'i bdag nyid do// dbya thig gis brgyad par bya// mini sbed la
146b1(rnying rgyud): bdag mo ste// thal chen las kyi mtshan mas mtshan// thod pa tshe srog dbang mdzad pa// zhag chen gsang ba'i zo ris bstan pa'o// gcer bu dpa' bo'i ting 'dzin brtan par bya// zhing lpags ti ra'i tshogs kyi gdan steng na// gdan mchog yin
146b2(rnying rgyud): gding bar bya// sha chen rkang dang tshil bu la sogs pa// phreng ba mchog kyang de tshe bgrad bar bya// pho sngags bstan pa'i bla 'gugs g.yas nas bskor ba ni// za byed pho yi ting 'dzin ldan par bshad// ro langs sngags dang ldan pa'i drag yul can
146b3(rnying rgyud): de tshe sngags bzlas g.yon du bskor bar bshad// skyes bu drag sngags bzlas pa ste// gzhan gyis thos na snying khrag 'thung bar bshad// gsang ba'i sngags de grangs dang brnyas pa bzla// oM me mjug b+h+yo// dgra bo nr-i bi hri rol rol/ gzer su
146b4(rnying rgyud): tri ma he/ nag mo thum ri la l-i li/ snying 'byin tri ga ho na phyung / nr-i sha ku ru kha so ba ti yaM/ sen men yaM/ dgra bo pra be sha ya ma/ ru tra yaM snying rtsa chod/ srog prig prig shaM shaM khyer b+h+yo/ khu le za khu le za snying la rgud/ lce dur ma sod/ dus tshad
146b5(rnying rgyud): log na rang gi srog rtsa gcod/ des na gsang ba'i drag sngags yin par bshad/ drag po sngags kyi mtshon tshwa'i chang 'bebs pa 'di skad do// oM ma tsit+ta rak+ka ni ra mA ra ya rbad/ rak+ka ra k+ka ni mA ra ya rbad/ hri ni mA ra ya rbad/ ga ta ga ta ni mA ra ya rbad/ de
146b6(rnying rgyud): dag bzlas pa bya ba yin// ro langs gsang ba'i 'khor lo bskor bar bshad// dpa' bo gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud las/ 'khor lo dkrug pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpa' bo gar mkhan mchog/ gshin rje gshed po'i dang
146b7(rnying rgyud): rung du bstod pa'o// hUM nam mkha' langs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gshin rje dmar po ral pa can// d+hu dza myur du bsgral ba'i phyir// sgrub pa'i gnas 'dir dam la shog/ ces dam bsgrags te bstod do// de nas dpa' bo gar mkhan la/
147a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ 'khod sems dpa' dang sems ma la sogs pas/ bstod pa gang dang brgyas padi/ r+tha/ sngon gyi rgal ba'i lung phog sbyar// ma srog bdag po mtshaH// sgrol gi dbyu bar dam brgyas pas// da ma
147a2(rnying rgyud): 'di la kha raM khA haM/ zhes gus pas mdzod cing bskyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa/ rnal 'byor can gyi rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// ma rba co ni gar mkhan mchog nyid de// gar mkhan mchog nyid rgyal po rnam thos sras// rnams
147a3(rnying rgyud): nyid karma he n+ya ka/ don la the tshom med na rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'grub// dpa' bo gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin dmar po'i tan+ta/ gsod byed spu gri'i so/ las kyi mchod// man ngag gi nying khu/ bdud kyi mda'/ las kyi gshin rje
147a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'o// gshin rje mthod dmar po'i rgyud tsha rgod dmyal ba'i las rdzogs/ garlabs kyi man dag// drag po'i sngags rgod/ bstan srung sbu gri lta bu'i rgyud pad+ma dbang rgyal gyi bka'// rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shri yam
147a5(rnying rgyud): ru tse man+ta tar+b+ha shAs+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gshin rje ma ru tse'i sngags chud bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ dpal phyag na rdo rje chos kyi sku las longs su
147a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs te/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa las/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdod dmar ba/ gdul bar dka' zhing gdum pa rnams la dpal phyag na rdo rjes ma ru tse pa ta ye hUM/ zhes gsungs pa las/ sgrol gang ge bdag po
147a7(rnying rgyud): 'jas dpal mdu tse/ sku 'od zer dang bcas nas 'thon te/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// e maho bcom ldan mthu stobs bdag// zhe sdang gdug pa'i sems can dang // phrin las zhibs mi 'dul bar // gdu
147b1(rnying rgyud): pade dag ji ltar gdul// zhes smras pas/ de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes/ ma hA rak+Sha sa N+Da la zhes brjod pas/ khrag gi rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa/ rba rlabs 'khrugs pa gcig tu gyur to// de nas aHr+d+ha aN+Dal d+ha/ zhes brjod pas
147b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor brdal ba chen po gcig tu gyur par gnas so// 'jam dpal dmar po'i sngags rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang rab tu ngo mtshar te/ oM ma ho// 'di ltar ngo mtshar tshwa 'phrul ngo mtshang rab
147b3(rnying rgyud): 'di yi rjes su bsrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsgral ba'i tshe na ji ltar bgyi// 'dug pa'i gnas ni gang du bgyi// bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs ci tsam bgyi// gza' skar dus tshod gang la gtad// ces 'jam dpal ma du tses zhus pa dang / dpa
147b4(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal ma ru tshol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'jam dpal mdzu co// dang po gdug pa 'dul ba'i tshe// bdag gi lus po'i ngo bo de// 'jam dpal ya m+b+han+ta kar bsgom// lag g.yon sbyor ba'i yum du bsgo
147b5(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yas na sgrol yum bsgom// kha nas sngags bzlas dmar por bsam// nyung dkar rgyal po pho ha'i tshogs// gdug pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom// hung dkar 'phang zhing sgra skad bsgrag/ zhu dung brdab cing dbang gzug go//
147b6(rnying rgyud): mig kyang gnams bar du blta// bdag gi sems kyang 'khrugs byas te// bdag kyang zos pa ma yin te// bdag gi lha rnams zos par 'gyur// dus kyang zhag bdun gdab par bya'o// 'jam dpal dmar po'i sngags rgyad las/ gdu
147b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'dul ba ji ltar bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag 'di zhus pa// gdug pa bsgrub pa'i gnas ni gang // zhes zhus pas/ gdug pa'i dul mdzad mnyan par byos// shing gcig rtsa dang brag phug dang // zag
148a1(rnying rgyud): dang cu ba jig sas// lagang gzugags// thug ga/ gas// snal byung ba du nga// thugasonag gu lugs//
148a2(rnying rgyud): lam// ni rgyas dbang drag gnas dag// dang mar marjod sbyin cig nig gis// tingag sung dang myi d+hang s+ya// mardzogs rin gyis spyan bya// grol du klu dang mtshad byin na// bsrid dang bden bdu byin badzig pa// blang ba ga
148a3(rnying rgyud): skye// b+hab gnas skar yang gtad zhes// ngan kyi da phre las tsam// phyogs bzhi kyi ba'i dzin g+sa / sa myong bri las mchod pa 'phrul// sa lda na pang pa / sbed pa'i slob
148a4(rnying rgyud): mdzod// byin du bshags snang dag pa \u0f7f// 'jam dpa la dmar po'i sngags rgyud las/ gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag 'di zlas pas// bsnyen bsru zhag zung sa ji ltang zad// rape 'dzu
148a5(rnying rgyud): ma bshad du gsol// zhes nus pa dang / rab ni zla bsum rgal// 'bring ni zhag ni brda phrag gsum// tham zhag ni bdun phrag gsum// yang na bdun gyis phrin las 'grub// de las myang la 'dud mebya// 'jams dpal dam
148a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ da gag / des nga dag ng+yas// ga ga // de la gdu pags pagang dugasol// 'am pa // dgas
148a7(rnying rgyud): dzin pa dang // nyi mo sbung su pa rA ga smin// zlab gzas zin pa dag dang // sbyid thugs ga song la bya// gza' sgor gdug pa dag la gtad// blon pa phru bu mi ga dmang pag/ dbyug pa ta dang bzung //
148a8(rnying rgyud): byed 'grod 'dre yin nal/
148b1(rnying rgyud): phur bas gdab// dus ni 'brug sgre chub ma gdab// dus ni gang yin gnas su bya// mnyes par byas la dam can la// dbang gzug 'o dod rab tu 'bod// gdug pa'i grub brten ma byed ces// bsgrub pa dang ni las su sbyar// 'jam dpalang bar/
148b2(rnying rgyud): so'i sngags rgyud las/ dus tshod gdug pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas sgrol ging ma cu cos/ mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bcom ldan dpal chen po// de ltar sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor
148b3(rnying rgyud): bas/ gzhal yas dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri// dam rdzas gang dang gang zhig bsrog/ de yi nam rdzas ji ltar dgod// spyi yi yan lag ji ltar bya// zhes zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig sgrol
148b4(rnying rgyud): gangs // dkyil 'khor bya ba'i thas bstan pa// snying na dkyil 'khor gnyis su r+b+he// 'am dpal skye ba snyedan dkyil 'khor dang // gdug badrug pa dkyil mchong yin// de yi dkyil la bar brtsig pa'i thabs// 'das pa
148b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi lham pa la// dbus su gru gsum dong zhig brko// thod pa skam po gdug pa la// gzas pa'i ling+ga bsgrim ste bri// mA ra ya zhes 'khor bar bskor// de dag gong ma'i nang du gzhug/ gru gsum nang du de bcug la// sa mar mnyam pa'i byi dor
148b6(rnying rgyud): bya// khyod kyi pho brang btab par dmigs// khrag sna gsum gyis chu gA chag btab// gnam sa gnyis kyang thig byin brlab// ma hA gu ru pad+ma ti he pra ma/ zhes pas sa thig rim par btab nas su// de nas tshon brlab phyogs su bkye// dbus su
148b7(rnying rgyud): srogasum mthing ga ze// myong ma thugs dbang gi tshul// dam phyi ma thum po // phyi ma yi shes rtsibs bzhi dgod// gling dkang gyi sa nab mar dang byung nga // rtsibs mtshams dmang po slo gi rigs dang spyad// gdus
149a1(rnying rgyud): drag po'i dkyil 'khor ni// shar g+hor 'drug khung gru gsum zi// zla ga ma dmar la thal chen bskor// kha la me ri 'bar ba bri// mkhas pas de dag rab tu bri/ 'jam dpal meru tse'i sngags rgyad las/ dkyil
149a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang sgrol ging ma ru tses/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces zhus so// gsang ba'i dam rdzas phyi nang dang // srub dang bsnyen rdzas bstan du gsol// sgrib dang drag pod ma rdzas
149a3(rnying rgyud): ni// bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni 'di ru bstan// ma ru tse yi dam rdzas ni// khyi phag dmar khra'i sha khrag dang // thugs dam shel gong smug pos bskang // spyan gzigs tshogs pa'i sha khrag gtor// dpal chen khro bo mi bzad par// shwa chen yod pa'i cha
149a4(rnying rgyud): gcig dbul// khrag dang sman phud dam rdzas bzhag/ mAM sa chen pos sna drangs la// sha sA khrag sna tshogs par bsags// tshe dang bsrung ba'i rdzas kyang bsags// slub dang bsnyen pa'i bya ba'o// drag po'i dam rdzas bstan pa ni// de yang
149a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis sde dbye bar bya// rten du bya dang gsad pa'i rdzas// rten du bya ba'i dam rdzas ni// tsar dkar po gnya' nag skor// gzas pa'i gzugs bya thigs pa dang // gangs kyi dum dang bsrung ma'i lo// bor bu'i bdud rtsi grog mkhar sa// khrag gis
149a6(rnying rgyud): sbrus la ling+ga bya// ming dang rus dang lo la sogs// shing shun zis la snying gar glan// mA ra ya dang zad kyis kyang // de 'khor 'doms su mA ra ya// de yi mgo bo dza yis bskor// dpral ba dag tu ming bris la// yugs sa'i zhabasams
149a7(rnying rgyud): gzums byas nas// dkar nag btags la ske ru gdags// tsar de la gzas par dmigs// gdug pa bapral ba'i rdzas rnams ni// phur pa dang ni hos shing dang // spro dang nyung dkar thal chen dang // btsan drug gu gral thod pa dang / rgyan
149b1(rnying rgyud): skud la sogs rdzas su bsog/ drag po'i dam rdzas gzhan yang bsog/ 'jam dpal macu co'i sngags rgyud las/ dam rdzas bstan pa'i la'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpral ma cu cos/ dpal phyug na rdo rdul 'di skad zhus so//
149b2(rnying rgyud): bsnyen bsgrub rdzas ni ji ltar dgod// gnas dang bzhag pa'i rang bzhin du// sgrol ging gnod sbyin ma ru tse'i// rdzas rnams dgod pa bstan pa ni// sgrub pa'i rdzas ni 'di ltar dgod// ma ru tse yi rdzas rnams ni// shar gyi 'khor lo nyid la'o// sman phung
149b3(rnying rgyud): dpal gtor shar lhor bzhag/ bsrub pa'i rdzas ni tshogs par bya// drag po'i rdzas ni 'di lta ste// tsar la sogs rten gyi rdzas// shar lho byang shar mtshams su bzhag/ hom shing tsher ma can rnams ni// lho yi 'khor lo nyid la dgod// du bcu
149b4(rnying rgyud): phur bu byang du dug/ blo yang dug gi steng du gzug/ gtsang dang lung dkar thal chen dug/ shar lho 'brub khung rtsa ru gzug/ gdug pa'i rdzas rnams ma lus dgod// 'jam dpal ma ru tse'i sngags rgyud las/ rdzas dang thun dgod pa'i le'u ste
149b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'o// / e ma dpal chen gsang ba'i bdag/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gsang ba spyi yi yan lag ni// rim pa bzhin du bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / dang por mtshams bcad gnas byin rlabs/
149b6(rnying rgyud): sgrib sbyang sman gtor byin gyis brlab// brda' dang gar gyis sgo dbye bya// dus gsum zhi khro rgyas par mchod// bstod dang bsnyen pa rgyun du dbul// blta ba spyod pa dam tshig dang // dbang dang dngos grub 'di ltar blang // phyi dang nang du sdang ba kun// rang
149b7(rnying rgyud): dani med pam yin to// rangab tug rmongs se srung // rdo banyid na rang bzhin med// des na lhar bsas pa 'brung// gci dang me gtsang sha dang khrog/ dus gsum dag dang ngas drugaH// spyad da nga gang snang ba// gnas phyung
150a1(rnying rgyud): gsung sra dang // spyod lam pa spyod lam bya// rnams nga dros pabar // gsang ba gsum dang langs spyod pan// mabyed ga sngags dang smad bsgrags// sngon med gzhan la rang zugs// dmangs chag
150a2(rnying rgyud): gsang yang bsdam// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang yang byin// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma 'grub/ 'jam dpal ma ru tso'i sngags rgyud las/ spyi'i ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang 'jam dpa' ma ru tses/ dpa
150a3(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho ngo mtshar rab tu che// de ltar bgyid pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las dang go rim bi gyi rim dang // sngags kyi ngo bo bstan du gsol// bsnyen pa srub pa'i sngags ni gang // las la sbyor pa'i snga
150a4(rnying rgyud): ni gang // phrin las drag po'i sngags ni gang // de rnams ma lus bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / legs so// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don du dris pa legs so// da lnga ngas bshad kyis nyon cig/ yid thud la sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
150a5(rnying rgyud): srungs shig/ dam las ma g.yel cig/ ngas khyod kyis snying po bstan gyi// de yang dang por bsnyen pa'i sngags bcur phye la bshad do// rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags ni// chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la/ snying rje'i gzugs brnyan hU~M la bya'o//
150a6(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa'i rgyun gyi sngags 'dis bya'o// oM many+dzu shI ya mAn+ta ka/ ku ma rA dza/ bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags 'dis bya'o// oM mag+hu shrI ku mA ra ya/ ma ta kA ma ru/ tse pa ta ye hUM/ yum gyis 'dis bya'o// tsa ba tsa ba rag mo shig shig snying rtsa ma la b+h+yo
150a7(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo/ spyan 'drin pa zhengs su gsol ba'i sngags ni 'dis bya'o// prang+ku ba~M hoH/ sa ma ya/ saSh+Ta shrI ya rbo ta ka/ oM ka rA ti/ es ma la s+t+waM/ oM bA ma rA la ti ta ma ta kar rnam // bzugs su gsol ba'i sngags na 'dus phyi// oM
150b1(rnying rgyud): mahA d+hI ya pAr+d+ha ka ku mdza pa/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha wAn/ phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags ni 'dis bya'o// maN+Da b+h+ri kra mA rA ya na mo/ a ti pu ho// pra ti pra ho// mchod pa 'bul ba'i sngags ni 'dis bya'o// many+dza shrI pra mA ya pA dzam+b+ha sa Sha ti/ a mr-ita khA hi/ rat+ta Sha ti/
150b2(rnying rgyud): tsat+taSh+Tha he/ tse rbu khA ti/ sru gsung thugs kyi sngags 'di'o// sku'i snying po ni/ oM a kro ti kA ya mA nA~M ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ kA ya kA ya b+h+rU~M phaT/ gsung gi snying po ni/ oM a kro ta~M ka ya man+ta ka lpA na ya d+he/ ha na han thung Ta/ thugs kyi snying pan/
150b3(rnying rgyud): a kro ti ka pa tAn+ta ts+tshiSh+Tapan/ ts+tshits+tshats+tshid+ha hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor byin bskyed pa'i sngags ni/ oM many+dzu b+hI ya man+ta ka/ ma ma e ka dza nI dzaH/ oM rna la ma rnal te gsod la rngams/ bshos la mer/ pris la chu mas/ thu bis bru/ lcags kyu/
150b4(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal ma du co'i sngags rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / kye kye dpa' bo mthu stobs bdag/ las la sbyor ba'i sngags ni gang // de yi phrin las ji ltar bgyi// zhes zhus pa dang / de nas yang sbyong ba
150b5(rnying rgyud): drag po'i sngags bstan pa'o// oM nu pa ta phaT/ mdzod ta ba kri ta ba ba song d+ha sod/ oM ru sa ta rus te/ b+h+yo hi b+h+yo ho// mA ra ya nAn/ dung a du ya baM zad/ rus ta rus ta/ ya maR+Sha dzA na ni/ dgra bo mA ra ya dzAdan/ ya ma rA dza las kyi gser/
150b6(rnying rgyud): ga b+ha phaT rbad/ ma mo las kyi gnyer yang gtad// rtsad la dgug pa'i dbang bskur ba/ oM maM du tse pa ta ye swA hA/ 'ug pa'i sngags gdug gsang ba 'di'o// drag dkra ma ra ya s+ya/ bya rog dbye ba'i sngags 'di'o// drag mkha'
150b7(rnying rgyud): nga ya dza/ bya rog dang du g.yas pa la/ gzas pa gang gi ming dngus pri/ 'ug pa'i dang ru g.yon pa la// dgra bo'i po lha bri bar bya/ spro gnyis dug gi nang du gzhug/ srung ba'i lha dang dpral pa'i sngags// ya mar dze ku ling bu sangs
151a1(rnying rgyud): kun \u0f7fsa swAng / klu li ng+ga sa ku tan nan/ yo lcags sa k+Sha ta ki dz+nyAphaT/ lha lnga dag dang dpral bar bya// drug dang chang la sngags shing spangs/ yungs kan dwag la sngags lnga bstim/ na mo bag ta bu me me
151a2(rnying rgyud): pa ra pa bun na/ nan ShI tsa ka la swA hA/ dug gis yang bskyar ngar yang blud/ sum ro tsam byi ro lA shu ni na mo na ma swA hA/ 'jam dpal ma ru tse'i sngags rgyud las/ las la sbyor ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
151a3(rnying rgyud): de nas phrin las dag po'i sngags bstan pa/ dang por gzas pa dgug pa'i sngags/ ta ku kA par bar mar te ni dza/ aM ku sha dza dza/ ling+ga la tshe srog bstim pa/ nr-i dza a be shwA ya a a/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// de la be con rdeg pa'i sngags/
151a4(rnying rgyud): dun zhugs pa sha ha la ha la tsa la tsa la pa tsa la hI ma ti ma/ rbad na rbad na/ chung bu ling zad bu'i mi shwa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ de nas phur ba gdab pa'i sngags/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ ya ma ka many+dza shrI mA ra ya/ ya ma rdza dzas rab tu
151a5(rnying rgyud): mAn+t+ra tses ni gdab pa ni/ oM krA ma hA dza ma ny+dza b+hI/ ya man+ta kA ku m+bA rarA dzA nI dzi/ mA ra ya nad// khyod kyi ponyas gang ba pa'i sngags/ oM ya mAN+Da ka kI li kI la la/ sha mA ga tsa ya hUM phaT/ ske tshe lung / thal chen sngags/ oM g+ne many+dza pra tsus
151a6(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing shaM kad+hA udz+nyA sa ma/ hri ling shang du tse/ e ka dza ti dgra po'i srog rtswa mA rarA ya/ rags laMng+ga zab pa'i sngags/ tri ling shang ka ru/ steng khrig la drud/ dri zar kA rbad Ti/ snying khrag rtsal phreng breng / gardzas pa po yi srog rtswa dun rdung /
151a7(rnying rgyud): mo srin mod mod pa'i sngags/ thag kA la nu dza/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ rak+Sho ti ku dza/ khal ma hi dz+ye/ ma ru lu ru lu d+d+ho/ drag rakra kha mudza d+d+ho/ ru lu ru lu ma ma ma yai/ gramags la pa tiSh+Tharbad/ rdza Tu ma ri li li rbad/ sha ti tiSh+T+rIH
151a8(rnying rgyud): 'di rnams 'atingatra yang rug
151b1(rnying rgyud): zla padang/ da ma mas/ na rung ba'o// khargyad pa / na dum ya / drug na srog zus d+ham/ ngasu k+Sha// srog la g+san+ta// gang nan gang na pa/ than gsanas na byas/
151b2(rnying rgyud): ji ling shang ke ru kang+ka kyai gyi/ rna la ma rnal te kaM kaM king king / khyi khrid khrid ma mo ro la dun d+ho/ yab yum gnyis med gsang ba'i sngags/ oM shrI ma ny+dzu la ma rA dza/ ma ma oM ka tsa ti dza dza/ gnod sbyin drag po gsang ba'i sdigs/ na ma rat+natra
151b3(rnying rgyud): ya// na mo be shra pa Na s+ya/ ma hA rA dza s+ya/ na mon ta ku bI ra s+ya/ gu h+ya ka a d+hi pa te d+hi pa ta/ ku pa ra ma d+ha'i sha mi/ a nu ru pa/ su ru pa/ tsan+d+ra kha na tsa baM/ he mo he sa/ ka nA ta ku pa ra na/ he mA ka no kro ha ka/ tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pra tsa/ yu lu pu lu
151b4(rnying rgyud): srin pogatum po gsang ba'i sngags/ ra dang mi byung ngag po// drag pos sngags shing brdeg par bya// oM na la marnal te gson la rnams/ gshog lnga med/ skyes la chu ma/ thubis rtswa lcags kyi sta/ mA ra ya lo tsit+ta 'byin can/
151b5(rnying rgyud): dz+r-i sha ku rdo n+di na kudz+r-i kha so ma ti maM/ chu ti laM/ sau yaM saM yaM/ snying tshal parbad/ snying la phur sngags 'di yis gdab// rang rang so so'i sngags bzhag la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya/ dz+wa la ma la ka lA ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tra dz+wa la pra dz+wa lA/
151b6(rnying rgyud): sarba dag de/ swA mAr/ dri slong ba ltar/ sarba shAn rdzing y-i/ ta ma hU~MpaT Tas \u0f7f/ an ta gan tang/ dz+nyAn d+hapa/ gnatan thAH/ na mAs man ta ba sho a k+ShaSh+Ta/ ling byings hA/ sgo byed gshin 'i dag sngags 'di/ drug ngos
151b7(rnying rgyud): nga yin pa// theb cing yang dang yang du brdeg/ mo tri li ga / d+hi/ dri za pahA/ rdzid du dbye ma 'di rnardzas/ phra drangs dus she ga mAr pa/ gshe rje ma tshog gsang pa'i sdugs/ grong gi ledru dag n-i// drag pos ra pa sngags shing brdeg
152a1(rnying rgyud): y-i/ ma tam ma/ rnam na // / ma
152a2(rnying rgyud): dus ta mu ta mar du/ mA ra yaM ya nan/ tsher ma can gyi drug shing la// stong gi sum me lta ba skyed byas te// me lha gzhil yas khang byin brlab// gzhung dang mthun par rab brtags te// khro bo 'khor bcas 'khor lor bskyod// dbug gzhug
152a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa dang // drag po dag la bsngags pa ni// so sor rang rang sngags kyis su// mchod pa gzas pa dbul zhing bcol// bdud po yam shong shin tu sngags// oM bdud pra ma ya bdud pra ma ya/ snying mgo chod/ du ru dar+ra/ ha ra ti ha ra ti/ snying la
152a4(rnying rgyud): yis// nag po ti paH pa'i ti/ snying la rtsa bai ri la chad/ nag po he dum pa d+ha la dzad/ d+h+waM ma hA ya/ snying la dur ngur/ glo rtsa po ril rbad/ myos dang lcags dang lho 'bog dang / tshig can// bdun chud brlag par 'gyur// sngags shing ling+ga hom du dbul/
152a5(rnying rgyud): don dang ldan par shes par byos// de yi gsang sngags 'dis kyang sbyar// oM ku mA raM/ ha na ku mA many+dza b+hI sh+ya mA ra mA ru kha rbad/ yar+tha nad/ many+dzu shrI ba mA ra mra d+he he 'grib/ yak+sha kha la yu ti rbad/ mA ra ya/ many+dzu shI de ba daH/ many+dzu shrI ki ba kha la/
152a6(rnying rgyud): dun ting mA ra ya/ maN+Da thI da ba grI ba/ khA la shag snying pago tshod/ spun du ting zad/ mA ra ya/ ma lA shrI da te ta ka ra hin kha la shig/ snying kha la yaM/ mi go rbad mA ra ya/ gdug pa'i shing la me sngar te// gtor ma lirna rdzas rnams dbul// khyod kyi rngachar
152a7(rnying rgyud): gas dang ni/ pa la~M yaM/ krol ging la laM/ madra tsa las la mo ya/ 6 'byung hUM/ srog la ya/ dran du/ ling zad ti dzang / do ni len gtub pa'i sngags// yon tan lags la rang sha dang // pral chag bcas pas 'jig pa
152b1(rnying rgyud): sngags ni gdug pa 'di yis so// a no rang gi sham bu la/ ana? rA ga khA hi/ pra rba ba na khA hi/ u pa tI tsan dra khA hi/ ta kra pa ra ma ra khA hi/ bsngal dang bcas pas bstab par bya// gdug pa'i tshe srog phral ba'i sngags/ A yu She ti thA/
152b2(rnying rgyud): pa ye swA hA/ de yi tshe srog bdag la thim/ A yu bang sang ha ra na b+haM/ gdug pa'i nyon mongs lnga po de// rigs lnga bde gshegs sras su bskyed// g.yas g.yon sor bcu yig 'bru dgod// 'phros 'dus su yi ngo bor gyur// sbyong ba
152b3(rnying rgyud): su bsti ma dang sbar// sngags brjod byin gyis brlabs la gzhag/ mnan pa'i gdug sngags 'dis su bya/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i ta mA ra ya na na/ 'jam dpal mchu tse'i sngags rgyud las/ drag po'i phrin las kyi sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis
152b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang 'jam dpal ma ru tses/ mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho shin tu ngo mtshar che'o// bdag gi rang bzhir mtshan nyid bshad pa ngo mtshar che'o// de yi 'tha
152b5(rnying rgyud): byas bshad du gsol// de ltar shes byas rnal 'byor pas// grub pa'i rtags ni ji ltar 'byung // sngags kyi tshad ni ji tsam bzlas// dus ni gang gi dus su dar// phrin las go rim gang gis thebs// zhes gsol pa dang / mthu stobs kyi
152b6(rnying rgyud): pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig sgrol ging ma cu tse// grub pa'i rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung // bsnyen bsgrub dag la zhugs pa'i tshe// mi shar 'ga' tsam byung nas su// go cha nyod ma 'dod dam zer// gcer bu dag dang 'grogs pa dang // kun
152b7(rnying rgyud): bran dang bka' nyan byed// ci dang bsam pa yo yang mthun// bsgrub pa dag la zhugs tsam na// rang nyid go cha 'chang ba dang // mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang // ma dang me ri 'od du 'ong // rlung 'tshub pa khu pho nu dang // zhang blon rogs por byas nas
153a1(rnying rgyud): pa// byams pa ma can de// bsgrub pa nga shA ma smras pan// mamangs sug pasar byed pa dang // dmags drang dang 'dang 'dod// dang grus gdang nag ga/ bsad nas du du ma zad dam bangs
153a2(rnying rgyud): byung na grub pa'i rtags/ 'jam dpal mdu tse'i sngags rgyud las/ rtags dang drod kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags kyi tshad ni 'di lta ste// bsnyen sngags 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas// srub
153a3(rnying rgyud): sdig ni khri phrag gcig// sgong sngags stong du bzlas par bya// 'dzeg rdzogs brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// bsnyen pa ku mAr zhes brjod// sgrub pa raShA tra yA ya// sgor sngags rduT zhes brjod pa// brdeg pa'i sngag zhis //
153a4(rnying rgyud): del dgas pa'i rigs mas/ nga sanyim gyu/ sa pa 'o/ ga sa / dang
153a5(rnying rgyud): bzlas// phyi ma drag po'i sngags rnams ni// sdang bas brnyas la bzlas par bya// rung chung thor thor bzlas mi bya// drag por ma yin bul ma yin// gzhan gyis bar du chod pa man// de bzlas nyams pa'i d+hu ru 'gyur// drang ngung zong thong bzlas byed /
153a6(rnying rgyud): nardo rje ngas ma bshad// sbyor ba'i sngags tshan lnga po ni// drag po byed na bzlas par bya/ 'jam dpal ma du co'i sngags rgyud las/ bzlas pa'i sngags tshad kyi le'u sde bcu bzhi pa'o// / kye gyi gsang ba'i phrin las bdag/ drag par sla pa'i
153a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar// zhes gsol pa dang / phrin las drag po gsang bar byos// gzas pa dgug cing dmigs pa'i chu// tsar dgal bci' gzhi dag la// gzas pa'i len de la bstim// drag dang sgo dang phur pas gdab// lha lnga dag dang dpral bar byed// ra~M ya
153b1(rnying rgyud): moni// tsar dgra bzlog gzab par bya// ra dang g.yang gzhi mgo mi dpral// tsit+ta'i nang du ling+ga gzhug/ g.yang gzhi'i nang du bzhag nas kyang // rang sngags sham bus bsngag cing brdeg/ phung ba bzhengs la rab tu gdab// mi dbyang tsa ra'i khar ba
153b2(rnying rgyud): spyod kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa des// drag por gdags shing de la brdeg/ bzlas pa rab tu rdzogs pa dang // tshon sna lnga yi byang drug zhug/ de nas hom la me spar te// ling+ga lhag ma bsreg par bya// de nas tsa ra'i g.yang gzhi de// ngur khrod
153b3(rnying rgyud): dang // gdug pa gnas sar rab tu skye la// nya dang stong la mchod pa gdab// lan gsum dag gis ma grub na// khyod ni rab tu brlag par 'gyur// 'jam dpal ma ru co'i sngags rgyud las/ phrin las kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// /
153b4(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo mthu stobs gsang ba'i bdag/ de yi dus ni gang du dar// de dag ma lus bshad du gsol// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i sku gsung thugs// 'jam dpal sku yi rig 'dzin dang // phur pa phrin las dngos grub dang // ma mo chod gtod dngos grug yang
153b5(rnying rgyud): de tshe nga yi dngos grub dan// dkon mchog bstan pa 'khrugs pa dang // chos byed gcig gis gcig gsod dus// de tshe sangs rgyas bstan pa srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang de ru bstod// de tshe bstan pa ma bsrungs na// phyag na rdo rje nga yi mthus//
153b6(rnying rgyud): khyod ni rdug du brlag ste 'gro// zhes bka' bsgo ba mdzad do// 'jam dpal dmar po'i sngags rgyud las/ bstan pa dang dus ji tsam na dang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal ma rba tse dang / lha rnams dang / kru na
153b7(rnying rgyud): dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang // ma mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho ngo mtshar shin tu yang ngo mtshad/ de ltar bstan pa shin tu yang ngo mtshar te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs par bka' tan/
154a1(rnying rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa yang shin tu bsrung ste/ dbu 'phang yang shin du bstod/ ces dam bcas nas/ dpal phyug na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ste shin tu bstod do// e mnin
154a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag/ mthu dang gzi brjid rang tu che// stong gsul 'khor po'i gdug rla ba can// khyod kyi bka' ya phrin las pa// khyod dang chos su khyad par gcig/ gsang ba po la phyag 'tshal 'jud// ces gas de tshig la yi ger brten nam
154a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa'o// de nas lha dang klu kun gyis/ 'jam dpal maru co la b+hu stod dur khrod kyi chas brgyad la sogs pas ni brgyan/ phyag cha rgyan dang ni ldan/ bdud dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang srin mo btul ba de la bstod pa/ dpal ldan dbang phyug
154a4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten myong ba'i gtso// cise pas bstod do// 'jam dpal ma ru co'i sngags rgyud las/ 'khor rnams rjes su yi rangs nas bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / 'jam dpal mchu co'i sngags rgyud rdzogs so//
154a5(rnying rgyud): rdeg pa po mo 'dus pa'i las kyi drung / khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kying gi/ bde ba chen po'i ngang las sprul pa rnam pa gsum
154a6(rnying rgyud): byang ba ni sku'i sbal ba 'jam dpal/ thugs kyi sprul pa phyag na rdo rje/ gsung gi sprul pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang gsum mo// des rnam par gzigs nas dus dang rnam pa thams cad du ri rab kyi byang phyogs lcags ris yongs su bskor ba'i nang nas/
154a7(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin stong phrag bdun gnas te/ des sems can rnams kyi srog la ni 'tsho/ sha ni gra khrag ni 'thung ba las/ sprul ba rnam pa de gsum gyis gdan tshogs kyis bka' bgros chen po gcig tu mdzad nas/ gdon ris dang bcas pa btul lo//
154b1(rnying rgyud): rmo ba'i gyur bstsu / gang na byud/ drug pa rnams nas dmal btags pa// gan du/ rgyal ba las bsnanas pa// sangs byas pa bstan pa byasang pa dang / dkum rgyagagasus pa dpa la nga bshad pa dang / dkal nan pa cu
154b2(rnying rgyud): pa dam bcas so// gleng gzhi'i la da pa'o/ don sa na rnam pa ga shed kyi rnags kyi sprul na/ byAg na ga shi skyem dag ma po thos pa zhin tu yang 'i skye/ ras la nag rten du bkyil ba/
154b3(rnying rgyud): hrInA rnam pa sna tshogs pas bstan pa/ me'i 'khor lo g.yas rlung gi bad+ma g.yon/ zhal gcig phyag dang zhabs gnyis dang ldan pa gcig tu byung ngo // des ta d+ya hr-id yan hUM zhes brjo pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ga mdun la yis byung ngo // dan
154b4(rnying rgyud): oM shrI ma~M s+tha la me mam/ e ka NitsI ngo zhes brjod pas/ shin tu yang 'jigs pa'i nga ros khas blangs pa ni/ 'jigs byed khro rgya la sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin pa mid do zhes gsol ba dang / khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis bka'
154b5(rnying rgyud): pa/ sgrol byed chen po khyod kyi 'khor ci mtshan nyid ston cig ces pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nyid kyis/ 'khor yongs su bsdub mdzad pa ni/ bdud nag dang rtags sha d+ha can dang / re lce 'gong yig dang / rag pa sgri bcings dang /
154b6(rnying rgyud): nag po 'dzum med dang / nag po bkrag med dang // ge le rmas la sogs pa bdud ris mang po dang / lcags mchu sngon po dang / sha ka li nag po dpe/ lcags tho nag po la sogs pa gnod sbyin rigs mang po dang / pra ma hA dang / shel gi
154b7(rnying rgyud): dka po dang / zangs ma can dang / bse zlab can da / gsar gyi rnyog pa zin la sogs pagang gi tshogs pa ba dang / yam nang dang la gyig shin / phyogs rkyong gigashi rje la sogs pa/ gshin rje rigs me pad
155a1(rnying rgyud): e ka dza nI dang / nag mo la pa can g.yog dang bzlas pa dang / dmar mo bse khrab can bzhi g.yog dang bcas pa dang / sdug nag 'bum gyi gtso mo dang / nag mo khrag 'dzag ma la sogs te/ mama'i rigs mang pos bskor
155a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor yongs pa bsdu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sgrol ging marda cos khro bo'i rgyal po nyid la zhus pa/ bsgrub pa'i gnas dag gang du ga// sa gzhi gzung na ji ltar gzung // bston pa'i dzus su ji ltar bya// las la gzung na
155a3(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin ma mo gang rnams dang // mthun pa'i dam rdzas ji ltar bsog/ las kyi mtha' sdud ji ltar bya// zhes smras so// dam tshig gi mdo skad kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // sgrol byed nyid kyis nus pa'i meng// dpa' ba chen pos bka' stsal ba// de bzhi
155a4(rnying rgyud): bdag gis skal ba ni// gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i gnas dag ni// ri ngogs shin tu zab pa la// brag phug stong pa rol khung yod// yang na rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram// brag dmar seng ge mchongs pa 'dra// gnod sbyin bslab pa'i gnas su shis// dur khrod rab tu 'jigs pa dang /
155a5(rnying rgyud): nags 'dabs sa sug stong pa rba// ma mo bslab pa'i gnas su gis// lha khang kun dga' ra ba dang // mchod rten gtsug lag khang dag tu// shing gi gnas dag yin par bshad// rkang gcig shing dang bzhi mdo dang // rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ri rtsi dang // yang na rang nyid gang dag pa/
155a6(rnying rgyud): yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// dregs pa mo ma bslab pa'i gnas// gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / 'ja ma dbyangs zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rigs drug sems can thams cad dang // sa gzhi la gnas pa can// sa bdag rta gu gdang /
155a7(rnying rgyud): dang // lha srin sde brgyad thams cad la// sbyin gtor rgyas par btang ba dang // gser skyoms btang las rin bcal// bslang zhes bya ba 'i tshig kyang brjod// lha mo sman pa dpa' du gzug/ dkon mchog mchod lamakhyen par gsol// de nas 'jigs byed dag shin rje
155b1(rnying rgyud): nge dzin du thugs byas la// mnga' gsol phur pas gdab par bya// gzhan du mi 'gro der 'dug bzung // sa gzhi yongs su bzung ba'i leT stelnga pag// rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa dag dang ni// bdag cag rnams kyi srog snying dag/ mtshan ma ma thob par du ni// g.yeng ba med/
155b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems kyis bzlas// bye bas ya nyi khri dang // bdun 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bsgrub// rgya gar ngan sngags bzlas pa dang // dge slong dam chos bshad pa dang // slob dpon dbang nod byed pa dang // klad la nyi ma shar ba dang // go mtshon bstan pa'i mi dag dang // sems
155b3(rnying rgyud): gsod pa dag mthong na// g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis bzlas// kha la thor pa byung ba dang // lding la sha khrag 'dod pa dang // mi dga' phya sangs khyer ba dag/ sngags rnams grub pa'i rtags yin pas// bskang gso bya zhing ting 'dzin bsar// so so'i mtshan nyid
155b4(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// grub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // bsnyen pa'i dus su bya ba ni// khro bo chen po nyid kyis gsungs// zhes pas sprul pa'i khro bo de nyid mi snang bar byas nas/ skad cig ma de nyid la shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi khro bo zung
155b5(rnying rgyud): nas/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang ldan// gdug pa'i mtshon cha dpal dang chas// bcu bdun yi ge sngags kyi tshig/ drag tu zlos shing gzi byin ldan// 'khor rnams rab tu 'jigs shing skrag/ khro bo chen po'i gzi byin gyis// 'khor rnams rab tu sbag
155b6(rnying rgyud): ni// bred sha 'thon nas rab tu spras// dpa' bo chen po skyabs su mchi// 'jigs byed chen po skyabs su mchi// khro bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ bdag cag rnams ni bka' bzhin bgyid// ye shes lha ni ji ltar bsgrub// bsnyen pa'i grangs ni ji ltar dbul//
155b7(rnying rgyud): sa gsol pas/ khro ba'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs sgrol ging rgyal po khyod// 'khor na gnas pa'i dregs pa can// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol// dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' 'di srungs// 'gal byad cham la dbang pa'i phyir//
156a1(rnying rgyud): khyed rang rang gis srog sbyir smos// ting 'dzin rnam gsum ma bzhin bsgom// hUM las ye shes thob bskyed// bzlas pa'i mige bcu bdun po// g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis bzlas// byang chub sems la nan tan pa skyed// shes
156a2(rnying rgyud): du bsgom// jo bo'i rgyal po spyan drangs la// tshogs dang mchod pa bzang du bsham// sha khrag dmar gri gtor ma dbul// gang bdud ma mo khyed rnams la// thunA gtor dam rdzas gtor ma sbyin// khyed rnams srog snyi yul bslang // zhes bka' ra to// de
156a3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis bag bzhes la brdabs nas/ A la la ho dpa' bo chen po mtshar ro// bka' bzhin bgyid do// zhes pas blangs so// de nis 'ang la gshin meg shed gis snying nas dang ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// ba hoH/ oM ma hi sa na kan taka
156a4(rnying rgyud): dziHhUM bi hoH/ sa ma ya/ na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ na mo be pra mahA s+ya r+d+ha/ ta ga ta gra par mar ning / na mo tra tra mA mye/ na maM bi shra maN+Da s+ye ha/ na mortan ber s+yahA/ pa rbak+Sha ta ba ti nyi pa na sa par/ a nu n+yas su pen ta/ ga pU na/ sar+b+ba be na ma ba he mo ha sa kan natas pa
156a5(rnying rgyud): ma kan/ lu ha ka/ tsa la tsa la/ pi tsA patsa/ pA lu pu lu swA hA/ oM a kro ti ka ya mAn+ta ka dz+wa la dz+wa la kA ya hU~M phaT/ oM a kr-i ta ka ya mAn+ta ka bAk+ka la hUM/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM a kro ti ka/ ya mAn+ta ka tsit+ta pa ni tsan+d+ra tsin+da hUM phaT/ oM shrI many+dza ya ma rA dza/ ma ma/ e kA dzaH
156a6(rnying rgyud): gtum pa yA ya ma ru co las la ye yaM/ du yaN+Tit+tamA ma ya Sh+T+r-i/ oMnA la mnal tig sa la rngam gshas la mer/ bris la rgyam thubs bu/ lcags kyi spu dgra po'i srog tsa lA rA yaM/ bdud bra ma ya/ bi dr-i mA ra ya/ snying mgo tshod/ dun du rba/ hA ra ti ha ra// 8
156a7(rnying rgyud): sa ya / nag pa ti bcab / dgra pa'i snying la sreg rtsa pa'i mdzad/ dag sa gas ma cad/ tra yat+pa ya sra ma'i stong sa/ du rgya pa la chang / yang ni skyon bag tu drug/ yang na rtsol bdun chung tshad/ drin rdo'i tshum na
156b1(rnying rgyud): shes par byu // rnayang gangag yagasadas byas ba dus/ rnam pa dgagags/ dgra pa cag sa / nas / ba yA/ la nal/ 'da'agams/ gleng dgas / ngag pan / ga gsu
156b2(rnying rgyud): ru lu ma hi b+h+yo/ dza myo ba lanag mo dran gyi/ tham pa ya bar tsiH/ yo gI \u0f89\u0fa4nga yaM/ ya ma \u0f7fta thA phaT/ dzag ragarbad paT/ he khri badren 'jam grang satshad na/ de ma thag te gsod par byed// bye bas yaM grangam tshang na// sa kyi dgos nyid nyid par/
156b3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas 'jam dpal khro bo yis// las la gzud pa'i thabs 'di gsungs// drag po sngags kyis bsrubs nas ni// mur du gsang pa'i las bya'o// srog rtsa bsdams shing snying rtsa gnon// de la mkhas par nan tan brgyad// dag po
156b4(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis gsang ba ni// oM ts+tshaSh+T+r-iHba~M kr-i tAn na mon ta dgra bo mAng du/ hrIdz+dzaSh+T+r-iHbaM kr-i ta mon ta dgra bo mA ra nan/ oM d+hIHSh+Te bi kr-i ta mon te dgra bo mA ra ya/ oM maro ta bkri ha sod/ sod/ dgra bo ni sod sod/ mA na pa ba ya ya/ oM ra ta ra ta mA ra ya ma rang / dgra
156b5(rnying rgyud): ra ya phaH/ gshin rje las la gzung ba'i len ste brgyad pa'o// a gyi khridar khrid rol khrug 'thung / ka ki kau ka ke ya/ tsinA dam rol khrag 'thung / kaM ka ka ka kaM kaM ya/ snying la za ba'i d+ha ma la ga rol khrag 'thung / kaM kaM kaM kiM kiM ka la/ tang par la to
156b6(rnying rgyud): gyi si hU~M phaT/ shIg shag rgyo ts+tsha ba ya yang rlung / dzag rak+Shab mun d+hA A kadza ti snying kha rag mab+ho/ thug rag sa mA ya/ dgra ba'i snying ling drud/ ma ma sgrib bya rag// rag mo dun d+ha/ drag sham mi steng te ka ma ma du lung la b+h+yo/ ma ma ni snying tsit+ta dadza la thun d+han/ nga
156b7(rnying rgyud): thag pa mthun/ // ma sbyang la yam b+h+yo/ mamanag/ ma mdzang rjo / mams sa la/ dgra padri ma ma mong sod/ rgyal ma babu ma ngas / ma mo las la gzung ba'i la' ste dgupa pa// rdza la rgyas narnam pa gnyis// rten pa'i rdzas dang ba
157a1(rnying rgyud): brten par bya ba'i rdzas dag ni// khyi phag dmar khru'i ga dang khrag/ tsita dung dkar dag dang bcas// a mr-ita dang rak+ta dang // sha chen yod pa'i gtor ma dang // sha khrags tshogs pa li dang // shing thog sa tshogs de bzhin no// ma
157a2(rnying rgyud): da spang // baphezhal chen gyi klag ma dang // zhal dang chas pa'i bgos dgag dang // sbyin gzigs gser sems gtsang ma dang // 'dzum tshogs pa'i gtor ma bshams// sgrub pa'i rjem dag bstan pa ni// 8/
157a3(rnying rgyud): shin tu lhangs pa las// sor brgyad pa dag bsngags par bya// tsa ra dkar po gnya' nag dang // ra thod ling+ga gdug pa sprul// 'jigs byed thod pa nag po dang // gnod sbyin thal sbyar nag po dang // dug dang nyung dkar ha neg dang // pho rog zhag pa'i gdan da
157a4(rnying rgyud): gu kul nag po dbye ba'i rdzas// lcags kyi spyil por dmigs pa bca'/ sgrub pa'i rdzas brtan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas sgrol byed dmar pos 'khor gyis bsad pa'i las bstan pa/ oM ba badz+ra tra bai shra ma drab sha a ba ta lo ke/ ya na ma ga
157a5(rnying rgyud): snying kha la rab+ha ga dun gdun/ a ga gan rbad/ ji khang la ma dra dra rbad/ hU~M b+hai ru lu ma hAb+h+yo/ oM ni rak+Sha mu thums rdal tral dun du na yaM yaM/ oM shel gyi chu gnyen dkar po thum ri la rbad/ oM linar lang rak+ka bI ri la zad/ ma ti ma ga ti rbad/ oM snying kha la
157a6(rnying rgyud): rakA ga du nA gdun a ke ne zad/ rdo khar lam dra dra la dral snying dral/ srog srog rnying srog/ thig thig pa zad/ ngat+yo shi ni ling ra ti shi na li ba drA ho shi na li dA la ho shin ling / snying to sha ling no te shin ling hra ta hang hu la b+h+yo/ suka ka dgar po
157a7(rnying rgyud): po'o hU~M// dza ma ha ba har ti la ti ma ha ba hab/ gang kang ging kar/ shul bul/ badz+ra patra/ rna tan ni dran/ ye mAn+ta// da sha slo ba pa de sha dI ba/ he ha ru luT lu ha ta lu/ karba na ka rba na/ yak+ka ya katsi ta ya ba
157b1(rnying rgyud): dza ya/ 'khor rnams kyis bas dab le rba ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bo yis// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i thabs bstan pa// dkyil 'khor gru gsum zla ga ma dA mar// 'khor ma rtsibs bzhi ma khyud bcas// rga
157b2(rnying rgyud): dang rgo ni me ri'o// shar du dam rdzas me long ni// lho ru ma dza hom dang rdzas// nub tu khro rgyal bdun dang bcas// dug dang yungs kar thal chen dang // lcags phye rdo phye rdzas su bcas// ha zhal bdud kyi bsrub pa yin// mar zhal ci 'khor la/
157b3(rnying rgyud): ma mnan pa'i thabs su bcas// gang la bye ba gdon mi za// rnal ma bdud kyi sgrub par shis// 'bub khung nag po'i dkyil 'khor bcas// hri ling lha srin sde brgyad yin// 'khor lo dmag dpon zhal du brngas// ruka bcu bgi dgA yin par bshad
157b4(rnying rgyud): 'brub khung dbang gi zla gam bzhi// phur thun dmar po bse khrab can// gru gsum zla gam dmar po dang // grwa bzhi sgo chas pa ni// e ka dza Ti hom gyi las// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gshed po bzhi// ri rab rgya mtsho'i 'og tu man ni// dkyil 'khor ba
157b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bo yis// mtshan ni yang dag bshad pa ni// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag sems kyi dbyings// snying rje chen pos yongs la khyab mdzad cing // hUM nga nyid rjes su dran pas khro bo ngi hu/
157b6(rnying rgyud): dbang chen brtsegs pa'i gzhi ste gzhal yas khang // de nas 'jigs byed khro bo'i mtshan nyid ni// mthing nAg char sprin nag po'i mdog 'dra ba// rnam thar gsum ldan dbu ni rnam par 'jigs// ye shes drug gi phyag na bsdams pa ni// rgyud
157b7(rnying rgyud): sgrol ba'i phyag mtshan rab tu 'jigs// dregs byed tshar gcod gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// dur khrod 'bar ba'i chas kyis rab tu brgyan// mor smug nag 'bar ba'i dpal du bcas// g.yon na khro mo khro gnyer ma gnas pa// khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i
158a1(rnying rgyud): yang gangs// can du pa sa gsum pan// d+hAm nag sa ma thad pa// gdum ga rdulags panas// zas lam byed pas pa ma// gsas nas gnas pa// kla na smra// rmad nga
158a2(rnying rgyud): rnabyas// su kri mtshon thogs gsod la dga'// lcang lo dmar bkang snying du bcas// g.yas nas bskyed pa khro bo'i gzugs// dmar po gcer bu ral pa dbyil// sum duH gsum dbang du spyad// gsal byed g.yas la rtsod d+hi dge yon// rgol byed dpar
158a3(rnying rgyud): sa ni// dmar po kham pa spa yang brdzes// ngal gri ga yas la sdigs mdzub g.yon// skye srin sde brgyad 'khor gyis bskor// khrag dang zhag gi mcho 'khyil// mig ta shA thang mar brdal// de ltar yan lag rdzogs par bskyed// bsgom log rtsa ba'i
158a4(rnying rgyud): leng ste bcwa gsum pa'o// // de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bo yis// dam tshig 'di ni rab tu gsungs// dkon mchog mchod cing slob dpon bkur// byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya// 'di ni kun bzang stong pa dag/ rab tu gnas par bya ba yin// kha nas
158a5(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas// yid la khro bo'i rgyal po bsgom// chob stod dge bdun mi gcad// brtul thugs sdom pa dang nga blang // khyad par spyod pa'i dam tshig ni// khang pa tshig pa'i gam mi 'gro// lugs sa ma dpal mi 'dre// chal gyis
158a6(rnying rgyud): ldog pa'i khrus mi bya// pad mar glang dmar na mi za// ba dmar ngo ma mi bzung ngo // 'di yin gzhan la s+tha mi bya// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams rab tu dag 'anas/ yi rab tu dang bar gyur to// sa ma yang mtshig gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
158a7(rnying rgyud): da dmang pos sa pa/ sgung du bas dan ltar bsad// drug pa'i rdzogs pa ji ltar la bya// ces spras pas// khro bo'i rnal pas bka' phram pa// nga yis bye pas brlabs pa yi// grags 'dis khyed la dbang ba
158b1(rnying rgyud): nga rtag la las kyis shi/ mo lag // \u0f7f gshag dka n+daH/ bang zla pa la/ shag gagang du/ 'thang 'thung gyus kyar/ ga / ma maH/ trag / nga / dbugs pa byugs ma la ga/ bathun+d+ha nga/ khA la la nan ti tad+han/ na/
158b2(rnying rgyud): mo zhig mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ging rak+sha mA ra ya gtum po N+ya ga ya/ sha re wa dril/ shag ri chug phreng / kha long // pa yagA trag du long ya/ rag mo rag mo// thor thor gshog/ ning la ting ting khrag ma b+ho// trag ragA nag mo dun b+h+yo// dun ting ma las ladun po/ che ge
158b3(rnying rgyud): mo gzeng la/ bas pa drag thugs kyi bcol par// / de nas la me dpal khra ba yis// 'di skad rtsis ni bka' stsal to// nyon cig sgrol ging dmar go khyod// gzhan gyi gasngags partog 'dod na// sngags pa sgra dang bcas babri// rab tu dbya
158b4(rnying rgyud): tshig dag bya// khrug pa mi mchod rten pa cig/ mchad pa'i las rnams bshams na ni// daD+ha'i bzeng zhal lcags kyi gzang // 'ang ma dpal nag pa'i rab gnusaH// tshe ga nang du yul nas ni// mtshad pa bstis cing bskor ba bya// phyogs drung yangs nas thun dga' nga//
158b5(rnying rgyud): rab gnas bzang po'i 'og tu mnan// des ni rigs sngags gdon mi za// bsnyen dang thun gyis bzlog pa bya// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang las kyi mtha' spang 'di gsungs so// gang la bya ba gnas gzhis// mchod
158b6(rnying rgyud): rten khang dur khrod dang // chu srin pa dang sbrul gyi lce// gong gsum zam thu rgya gra ma lam// btsan dang ma mo klu dang bdud// lha srin sde brgyad gnas yin te// ya ma rA dza'i zhal ru gtsang // nag po gshin rje'i 'og tu gzer// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab//
158b7(rnying rgyud): par bcug la~M rgya yis gdab// de ltar byas na gdon miza// las kyi mtha' thu dkyil skye bcu bdun pa // dregs pa po mo'i las rgyud rdzogs so// / dregs pa la po 'tshul pa'i chu rje gteng bzhad rtsal lagatad pa/
159a1(rnying rgyud): chag sa nga/ TI ha la Sh+T+rI thal pa tam sh+tsa r+tha/ bo ga dang / rnamachog ral pa'i drung can pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bta dbang can te drug la phyag 'tshastsa la// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i das gcag / ba
159a2(rnying rgyud): 'das dbang gi rgyal po// dus gsum ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i ngomo/ pad+ma dang rdo rje dang 'khor mo dang rin chen dang / las kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin/ rigs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid/ rol pa'i phu 'phral la mang brnyes pa des/ don rtsas nyid bye ba med
159a3(rnying rgyud): rtags 'gag pa med pa cho 'phrul gyi srung bzhugs so// 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba dbang gi gnas chen po na/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams gshegs shing bzhugs te zhugs par gyur pa'i gnas/ chu rin po che dang / dur khrod la rgyas pa'i dbyings dang /
159a4(rnying rgyud): dog za dad cing ngo bo nyid gcig pa ste/ de yang dbyings las ye shes gsal ba'i gzhal yas khang / kun tu khyab par gdal ba chen po na/ rigs kyi yab dang / rigs kyi yum dang / gzhan yang sems dpa' dang sems ma dang / rmi skyong na la skar bcas pa yang
159a5(rnying rgyud): zung nga ri mtho pa'i tshul cis/ tIl la mar bzhir khyab par gnas so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na/ bad+malas kyi sems dpa' nyid/ nyid kyi sgra gdung thugs las zod te/ smanas nyid na bka' nang pa'i sabs pa dang ldan pa'i grub pa nyid du bdugs
159a6(rnying rgyud): mchog rol pa'i nAd lapa kye gzhi'i ye // / de nas dbang gi rnal po rgan po das/ dus gsum dang srid pa gsu ma dang / 'khong ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la/ sku 'phrul gyi sman gyis khyab par gzigs //
159a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gzigs pas/ chos thams cad kyang chub kyi sems ci mtshan nyid/ stong pa chen po'i rang bzhin/ spabs ma las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid du dakhon 'a tang nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs sa// de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' de rang gi stan la lang
159b1(rnying rgyud): te/ bcom tan 'das dbang ga rgyal ba la/ gang gi mtshad pa'i sprin gachags kyis mtshad dalan bcwagag tad du phyag 'tshal nas/ dgangs bcos kyi dbyangs la man la bzhin du/ skad cas gsam to// em bang mchog gsang ba'i bdag
159b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams kyi de bzhin don// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// bdag la sogs la bshad du gsol// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' sprul pa/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ khyod kyis zhu bar spongs pa legs so// legs par yi
159b3(rnying rgyud): rdung zhig/ 'dini sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad dang / da ltar dang gyis 'byung ba'i rgyal pa rnams kyis ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur zhing dka' ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de kho na nyid byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de ni brjod du'ang med la/ snong du gyur pa
159b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir ro// khyod kyis la dris shig/ ces bka' stsal te/ ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas 'khor ris med kyis pad+ma sems dpa' la bsgo ba mdzad do// 'gro ba rnams la snod ji lta ba bzhin du tshabastan cing / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma
159b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la byin gyis rlobs shing / sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskul pa dbang gi rgyal po'i thugs su chud de/ ston pa'i zhal du bltas te gnas so// de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ ma chags pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces
159b6(rnying rgyud): te// don dam sems nyid skye ba med pa la// ston pa dang ni gnas dang 'khor// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba ci// zhes gsol to// bkang stsal pa/ chos kun sems kyi rtsa ba ste// tshab de nyid ston pa las// gud nas ston pas stsal ba min// bdag nyid chen po byang chub sems
159b7(rnying rgyud): rgyu dang 'bras bung bcas pa'i chos// byang chub sems la gnas pa las// gud na gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gzhal yas byang chung sems// 'khor ba'i bu rten phung po lnga// 'khor bganas thur phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya nyid byang chung sems// 'byung ba gnas zur yum ldan
160a1(rnying rgyud): u sa// da pa // gas so// / su sa// ga/ /
160a2(rnying rgyud): ste// rlon pa med pa'i byang chub sems// yid ces kun bzang yab yum ste// nyon mongs gnas gyur sprul spa drug/ gzung 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// 'bral pa bzlog phyir shar ba las// gud nas stsal ba ma yin no// rtsa ba nyid rtogs pa na// cing yang mi
160a3(rnying rgyud): bkag chos kyi dbyings// lta ba ma bkag sems nyid yin// spyod pa ma bkag rgya mtsho yin// bsgrub pa ma bkag sems nyid bsgrub// phrin las ma bkag sems kyis kun la rol// dam tshig ma bkag sems la bsrung du med// mchod pa ma bkag sems las
160a4(rnying rgyud): longs spyod pa'o// snying po ma bkag sems nyid brjod dang bral// sems nyid ma bkag sangs rgya'o// ting 'dzin ma bkag dang la shar// 'khor rnams mtshan ma med pa las// mtshan ma 'byung ba rtag pa'i sku sel to// de nas 'khor rnams byang chub sems la
160a5(rnying rgyud): 'khod de stong pa'i ngang las zhi ba'i skur bzhengs te 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// dus gsum gyi 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rgya dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams/ stod pa chen por gyur pa ni/ dpe nam mkha'i mtshan nyid tsam du yang / rgyun du yod pa ma yin no// rta mchog
160a6(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i tan+da las/ byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas las kyi sems dpa' chen po des/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// las kyi sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor// 'gro ba ji snyed dad pa las/
160a7(rnying rgyud): ma dad par na gyur pa yi// las kyi phog lham dad pa// D+ha dang rkyen ni gang las byung // ma dad pa ni ci yi phyir// rigs dang sde ni gang du gtogs// 'bras bu smin pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dka' thub
160b1(rnying rgyud): can gyi sems can de// legs pa'i rgyu las ma byung ste// med pa'i gzung 'dzin rtog ngan n+ya// rkyen ni chags sngang la sogs te// wA ba lag pa nyan mongs lnga// de yi las kyi dbang bcan nas// 'bras bum dang D+hanA smin// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs can de// na/
160b2(rnying rgyud): ni dbyung po'i rigs su gtogs// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po/ ma dad de ni ji ltar 'dul// btul nas yon tan ji ltar thob// ma btul ba yi skyon ni ci// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
160b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// log lta mthu bsnyems sems can de// bden pa'i gzhung gis gdul bar bya// ma btul ba yi skyon bstan pa// phyin ci log tu chos spyad nas// lha dang mi yi srid brlags te// don las nyams pa'i skyon yod do// dug gsum rtsad bcad 'khor
160b4(rnying rgyud): dong drug/ sangs rgyas zhing khams rab tu rgyas// de nas zhi bas 'dul bar gzigs pas/ rA tra nag po des se gol lan cig brdangs pas/ mi 'dul ba'i nga rgyal skyes te/ gau ta ma khyod kyis bdag 'dul ba ni ma lags te/ rang rang gnas su dka'
160b5(rnying rgyud): thub la dengs shig/ ces smra zhing kha T+wAM ga 'khrol zhing mnyan to// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ ma dad pa'i sems can chen po zhi bas 'dul bar gzigs pas mthul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rigs lnga rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin chen rigs
160b6(rnying rgyud): dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / de bzhin rigs dang / las kyi rigs dang bcas pa rnams kyis zhi bas mthul nas/ bka'i bgro ba mdzad de/ rdo rje rigs kyis bgros pa/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung na// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa ni// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin
160b7(rnying rgyud): hublo zhing gtum par gyur// shin du khro zhing gtum pa la// zhibs phan par ma gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// khro ba de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul chen khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag bsreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa
161a1(rnying rgyud): mag/ sa // / m+b+ha/ na gas slo rnams / skang sta //
161a2(rnying rgyud): da// rtsA rnams pa shesang par bsgru/ tshal ba'i las mi mi gdul pa ngas// zhes bsla sa// nga ba da dgas kyi bathom pa/ khyim sems can sadas rgyam rtogs pan rnams// mdadasems can can padza// na pa rlabasas yo
161a3(rnying rgyud): rten ni// mangs bdud b+hinA d+hA na~M// 'di na gdul bar rjes pa'o// zhes bzlam sa// de nas pa ng+gA rigs kyis bsgos pa/ se mags mchag gas dab mtshogs// mdad pa ma sems can 'di// rna mangs bdud kyi gnyinyis te// srid pa
161a4(rnying rgyud): g.yang sar bzung // 'di ni gdul ba 'os pa 'o// zhes bgrams// de nas las rigs kyis bsgos pa// kye ma sangs rgyas tshogs chen rnams// mdad pa yi sems can 'di// nyon mongs drug gsum gni zas te// thams cad ma lus badz+rag

161b3(rnying rgyud): rak+Sha mun ta maN+Da la/ ker ni ri ti dza la me la kam ma ting+ga rag sha thAM/ de nas 'byung ba rim du shar// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i nam mkha' pa// phrag dog 'bar ba'i 'dzub mar ldan// chags pa ri bA'i na klong dkyil// gti mug chen po'i sa grani pa// dkyil chen
161b4(rnying rgyud): me ri 'bar// dbang chen 'byung bar shar bar mdzad// nang dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad/ 'khor rnams bskyed de btul nas bsgral bar gzas pas/ ma dad pa chen po de/ zhe sdang gi me sbar/ chags pa'i rgya mtsho gting nas g.yos/ mun
161b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i kha rlangs sprin ltar gtibs/ phrag dog gi zug rngu ni bslang / nga rgyal gyi de'u bskyed de/ nyon mongs pa'i s+pha ru lu dang kha T+wAMg 'khrol zhing rdzogs par gzo ba las/ dbang gi rgyal pos gdug pa'i lag cha phrogs/ kho'i nyon mongs pa'i sgra ru lu ni/ oM dang
161b6(rnying rgyud): bar du bcug ste/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M zhes bzlas pas/ dregs pa can de skyes bu lce bcad pa bzhin nyams so// dbang gi rgyal po des/ dam mi 'gam pa rI dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ lha gdum lha gdum/ b+ho ga du ma tho gdum/ shig shig phrug cig/ a hA a hA/
161b7(rnying rgyud): d+hA hA/ 'a bar/ snying spar drung / ya ma thA dza/ drug pa'i sngags ngas brlab pas/ lus dam pa bcu gsum dub TIg/ dur thod pa rkyang du bshig go// reg pa gzhal yas khyeng du byas so// zung sa la sogs pa thams cad 'khor du byas te sbyong re/

162a3(rnying rgyud): sul pa 'byung // d+ha li zhes brjod do// de nas gan po las sgra dang / gsung dang / rtag pa dang / ye ge ming po 'gos/ hU~M dmar po las yi ge yin sa/ gzhal las ni bskyed/ kyai rin po che la nang du khrod 'ab dang / pad-i'i gad /

162b1(rnying rgyud): du gangangs pa // ta mgo ljang gus byung ba'o// ma dad pa chen ba tshul dang bstan te bsgral po// rang gis rang la yi ge d+hi la bstod pa/ d+hU hUM gis srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud/ sngags ngan sang gnas rnams stongs par mdzad// hwags ma rigs mun khang gtan na
162b2(rnying rgyud): 'joms// hUM gis thams cad 'jigs shing thams cad dbang du sdud// hUM gis dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku yang bskyed// hUM gis bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol// hUM mdzad hUM gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal 'di brjod do// sku bzhi gcig tu bsdus
162b3(rnying rgyud): pas kun tu zhal// phyogs bzhi rigs bzhir 'bar ba'i skur bstan pas// spyi mthun lnga lngar snang ba nam mkha'i can du ston// rigs kyi dbang rnams rdzogs pas thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// hUM mdzad khro bo chen po brgyad kyi snying // chad par bcug nas nang dang bsres
162b4(rnying rgyud): te gsol// byams dang snying rjer ldan pa'i tshul mnga' bas// rdo rje lugs kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang // be con rnge'u chung b+han+da shel gyi rnge'u chang 'dzin// thod rlom thag dang bsres pa gsol// phyogs bzhir hU~M gi kun du skra grags pas// rdo rje byin chen 'bar ba gsor
162b5(rnying rgyud): zhing brdeg/ gdu bu dbu rgyan sbrul nag mi srun pa// hUM gi sgra grags bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// sdigs pa'i rtse la bskal pa'i me 'bar bas// ma rig rmongs pa'i mun nag sel// mi ldogs la 'gro ba 'dren pa'i rtags// thabs kyi zhags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud//

162b7(rnying rgyud): kyi chas// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje bcas pa'i chas// dbang gi bsde khra ba smug po gzing bar bgrang ba'i chas// dbang brjid mnyen lcag sprul nag rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar gsal dbang srud ting 'dzin che ba'i mchog/ mnyen sdug tshun 'gyang dang kyings/ sdug
163a1(rnying rgyud): bsngal tam thag skad chen 'byin// oM t+ka shwats+tsha ba ne/ yanasum pa/ spyan tu ti shadz+dza/ zhes cha ba'i smonas nyid la bkad pas// de nas yang d+hulas/ oMs kA bklang kar kar gnas mnas sa dpas/ tham gsanas can
163a2(rnying rgyud): rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun pa la/ tshul mo bag tu gnas bzhig bskyed do// g.yas na yid bzhin nor bu bsgoms pa/ g.yon ni rin chen tha me tog bsnams pa/ de lta bu cig bsgom mo bsdu'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ gzhal ma khang dang /
163a3(rnying rgyud): ma pa skyed kying las bstan pa'i le la pA // / de nas yang dgas pa de dag thams cad bdud dang tshangs pa deng / chen dang / krung nga / dbang drug chen po dang / gza' la sogs pa rnams/ rang gi tshob stan rtse mny-i hU~M// ma
163a4(rnying rgyud): ma dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mnyan to// rten gyi gzhal yas khang las/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams ni brlan/ thugs rje g.yos te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang gi rgyal po la dbang bskur to// yab yum gnyis spong ba mdzad de/
163a5(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems sprin las/ sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos te/ yum gzi ldan pad+ma can la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum du bsngags te/ byang chub sems kyi gzi brjid ldan par byas/ byang chub sems spros pa las/ 'khor ba cu ldog
163a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir/ ru dpon ni rigs kyi he ru ka lngas byas/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad nir mngar gnyer/ shar phyogs su dza ni spros/ ye shes dpag gis 'phen dka' ste/ mthar byed khro bo bzhi phyogs bzhir gdan tshogs bcas/ 'khor ba'i phreng ste
163a7(rnying rgyud): 'du na sa rgyu ga rgya du bya

163b1(rnying rgyud): na gyu phyogs byas ga rnasas bya/ mab mang zhug sus pa tu na byud+hags ca rnags pas/ zab nagasas kyang gas 'ad/ rnags pas gang dgang babs nas/ gdug sa ca
163b2(rnying rgyud): char du phab/ rtog cig zung tshongs mi gtang zhes dir dir sgrogs so// yum gyi b+hag gru gsum gyi dbyings su shar/ yab kyi rdo rje pad+mar shar/ de nas dbang gi rgyal pos gdug pa'i 'khor ye shes las bskyed do// de nas yang yab yum ma chags pa'i sgor ba mdzad/
163b3(rnying rgyud): yang smin las/ ha haha ha hahahata/ zhes sbas/ hahahaH/ zhes smras pas/ na ma dang mag brnyan mang bzung // hU~M hrI hU~M d+hU b+h+rUM/ zhes thos pas/ khrob mag dkru chags pa dang / mgro ba zugs pad/ mge bdun
163b4(rnying rgyud): brtsegs pa dang / mgo gsum brtsegs pa rkang pa gcig pa cig byung / de nas yang byang chub sems las/ mA mA mA mA/ zhes spros pas/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi spros so// de nas byang chub sems las/ li l-i li li li li li li/ zhes shar

169a7(rnying rgyud): luT lu phaT me Ar li dz+dza hrIHsa bskor ba'o// mgrin pa longs spyod kying khor lo gzhal yas nas/ I las yi ge hu luT wa phaT e A ra mi hUM hrIHdzaHsa bskor ba'o// tsit+tarin po che'i gzhal yas khang nas/ hUM mthi ga la rba lu hu lu phaT//
169b1(rnying rgyud): Ar l-idz+dza hrIHbyas bskor bang/ lha bskul pa'i gzhal las nas/ skas po las hA luT lu dz+nyA phaT/ e sbyar ba dz+nyAM b+h+ya \u0f7fsa bskur ba'o// gsang ba'i gnas kyi la rlung las kyi gzhal yas nas/ hA ljang gul yi ge tra lutra lu hU~M phaT e Ang gi
169b2(rnying rgyud): bskor ba'o// bde chen 'khor lo 'dab ma sum cu gnyis/ mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug/ tsat+ta chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad/ lte bstsal pa'i 'khor lo drug rngurtsa bzhi/ me drung 'khor lo gzhudang ba dang dbyib sa/ das po gnas
169b3(rnying rgyud): lugs de ltar gsungs// nganas bsdus pa 'brub rgya spros/ de las sbos dang bsdus pa'i/ lha rnams rdzogs pa gsang ba'i snying po'i don/ dbang gi rgyal pos bkang stsal to// dang po zhi ba'i bsnyen pa dbul// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la // bde
169b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs thugs mnyes 'gro ba'i sgrib pa skyong // oM ni rigs lnga yab yum snying po'o// hu lu gong ma sems dpa' brgyad du ste// 'og ma sems ma brgyad du'o// phaT ni mchod pa'i lha mo ste// e dang A ra li ni thub pa drug/ hUM ni sgo mtshan mo bzhi// hrIHdzaH
169b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis ni sun bzang yab yum sngags// de ltar zhi ba bsgrub par gsungs// de nas khro bor bsnyen pa ni// oM ni ye shes lnga ste khrag 'byung yab yum mo// hul gong mgo rI ma brgyad / hra lu jog ma sing he phra min babyung / phaT ni slob chen po bzhi/
169b6(rnying rgyud): A ra li na dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ hUM hrIHkhro bo'o// dzaHni yang sbal sum sprul don/ de la bsnyen pa dbul zhing 'gro ba'i sgrib pa spong / de yis byang chub 'bras bu thob/ dbyings kyi zhi khro gsang ba'i sgrub pa'o// oM na ya sham lnga ldan pa d+ma ha ruka/ hu lu gong
169b7(rnying rgyud): mdab mo dang / srog 'brum/ hu lu ga mi sder mo can dang gshog pa cin no// phaT ni kham rgya mo drug/ e dang An long ba ste// ra dang pi ni dmus long ngo // hUM ni mgo brtsegs khro bo zhi// hrI ni spang gi ze byed brgyad// dza na gyibargyad rngam pa'i tshogs// de ltar/
170a1(rnying rgyud): sasus na su na/ /
