170a4(rnying rgyud): sa /
170a5(rnying rgyud): ga/ ma sa
170a6(rnying rgyud): dngas kyi ba dang / mtha' byan ma byar// rgyu thal ma na bdag go gzungs ma bya// ci rten du gyur// dang rdzam ra thaba'i tha/ 'byung ba gsung banas cang mthal/ des cid dpa pa ston pa dzin
170a7(rnying rgyud): bad po dang // dad ma la thogs bsgral ba byed// bcomathun 'das kyis pa // drug jingag kyi chen 'du chags so// ga na shi dzi dran // sa bka' te/ bad ba gargal ba na/
170b1(rnying rgyud): lhag lkog la/ pa a mr-i ta me tshogs kyis btab// rtag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsgyur/ dam tshig gi rjes su slob ste/ b+h+yo zung gsum gyis bsad/ blo thang gsum gyis bos/ khA hi thang gsum gyis bstab/ le thang gsum gyis sbyangs nas/ rol du bcug
170b2(rnying rgyud): pa las/ dbang phyug ma rnams kyis gsol pa/ gar gyi dbang phyug ngo mtshar che'o// dri phun sum tshogs pa gda' na ye shes kyi dri lags sam/ ro phun sum tshogs pa gda' na/ bdud rtsi'i ro lags sam/ sgra phun sum tshogs pa gda' na/ ye shes
170b3(rnying rgyud): kyi sgra lags sam/ bdag cag rnams ni ston pas kyang mthu skyes pa snyam bgyid do// bdag cag rnams ni sngon pas kyang rdzu 'phrul skyes pa snyam bgyid do// rig pa skyes pa snyam bgyid do// tshor ba skyes pa snyam bgyid do// dug sman du gyur pa lags sam/ zas
170b4(rnying rgyud): kyi gyur pa 'gas la/ jis dag pa'i dus ma la gsus pa/ de sar bya sa pa brjin du thab / sa ma hU~M nam ma ldan pa 'dum pa/ mad bye mi byed rnams kyis dga' bska mdunadasaso//
170b5(rnying rgyud): chub don du gnyer ba yis// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i byin rlabs kyis// rtag tu smon du gyur par nges so// zas bdud rtsir gyur pa des so// de'i phyin rlabs kyis nga'i zhal mthong ba dang / rta'i dbyangs thos pa yin no// da'i zhal mthong ba dang rta'i dbyangs thos pa'i byin rlabs
170b6(rnying rgyud): kyis/ yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis sgrib bsnyungs nas/ g+hu lus kyi 'gyur shes kyi thogs pa med pa'i dbang thob bo// de nas sing ha dza ma tha la bis mi te zhes brjod pas/ skan cig gis lus rdos pa can bor nas/ gser gyi seng ge sbyin gsum pa/ 'od zer 'a
170b7(rnying rgyud): ba/ rdo rje'i gshog pas brgyan pa/ seng ge'i mgul pan b+hu ru'i ma 'od dmang bor la yi ge sbyong ma po kha zag tu yod pa/ de ni dbang chen gyi zhabs kyi bri'i mthongs bzhid/ du gadrug brdzu de/ bapyid ston/ mjug paskor nang du bsnol te bzhag nas/ rgya klog
171a1(rnying rgyud): mkhan du bskos so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ las kyi dbang phyug ma dam la btags shing gdan du bting ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la/ las kyi d+ma sems dpas 'di skad ces
171a2(rnying rgyud): gsol to// tsam bcom ldan gang gyi bdag/ baphrul baspyod phyag rgya der bshad de// ye shes lha tshogs 'di rnams la// dgyes pa bstod na gang gis bskyed// gnang nas bskul na ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bcom
171a3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ bstod dang mchod pa'i las ni 'di lta ste// zla gam bsil ba'i dur khrod nas// dbang gi rgyal po gar gyi bdag/ rtogs pa'i ye shes dbu lnga 'bar// dri med zhal gdangs ye shes 'od//
171a4(rnying rgyud): sku lus dmar po zhabs ni srid gsum sgrol// ye shes rgyu yi don dang ldan// 'bar ba ye shes mtshon cha 'dzin// rgyal ba'i yum chen thugs kar sbas// dri med ma chags pad+ma'i stan// na bza' gsum ni brjid du che// thugs rje ye shes gshog pa bar// ye shes mkha'
171a5(rnying rgyud): 'gro las la 'gyed// dbang gi rgyal po khyod la bstod// srid gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// dpal gyi khyi brgyad las la khye// zas su gtsang sde med par za// de phyir mangs sha chen zhim// skom du kha mngar med par 'thung // de phyir khrag dang dri chus ngoms// bang ni
171a6(rnying rgyud): ngal dub med par chug/ de phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyong // shar gyi phrogs nas chug pa'i khyi// dri za 'dul phyir 'brug pra wAr// 'brug phra ldir zhing lha chen 'dul// lho yi phyogs nas rgyag pa'i khyi// glog dmar lcibs shing gshin rje gnon// gshin rje'i/
171a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo sha za ma// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// rdo rje byung 'brug klu gdon 'dul// klu 'brug stong gi snying 'byin po// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// gnod sbyin skal tshigs dra ba 'joms// gnod sbyin stong gi snying 'byin mo// shar lho mtshams nas
171b1(rnying rgyud): drug duduH// dang srong ma skad drung blon pa// me na sbyo ga snying byin ma// nyon ba mtshams nas rtag du rjeH// sbyin po'i thod dus zas san// srin po'i thag 'thung dbang sngom// rngu kyang ma rnam sa nas rgyug pa'i kyi// rlung tu rnon mong bdan gcod// rlung
171b2(rnying rgyud): gi snying 'byin mo// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa'i TI// hi thA gza' skar khalang ka/ dbang ldan ting gi snying 'byin po// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// kun kyang mi bzad ci 'dran// rab pa ser smi ni la khrigs pa dadra// pra min thod rus khrel la// ku ku
171b3(rnying rgyud): tsa'i dus la bab// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// rdo rje'i gshog pa gdangs pa yis// khams gsum ma lus zil gyis gnon// rdo rje'i sder mo btsum pa yis// srid gsum ma lus zas su za// gzan gyi mchog ste klu rnams za// de phyir khyung chen gzan pa
171b4(rnying rgyud): rol// rgyud drugacig car gyur ming byed// gnam du ston pa'i byin rlabs las// dkar mo'i tshogs dang ser mo'i tshogs// sbyin ma'i tshogs dang dmar mo'i tshogs// sbyang thupa sogs sna tshogs pa// ser smin bzhin drung khrigs par byed// la la 'do la zhi
171b5(rnying rgyud): la la rdzing // la la dbab cing la la rol// sha chen tshogs la gshegs su gsol// ka tag sha kA ta ga sha a ru ka dza/ phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// blang ngor med pa'i mnyam pa la// phyogs bcu stong khams
171b6(rnying rgyud): yi khron// khron du mgyur gang yang med// srid pa'i khron pa rko thabs re mkhas// de ma khas thabs kyi rgyal po ste// tshoms ni 'bar ba'i rang bzhin la// zhal ni phag rgod mche basprul// shangs ni ngan song khron pa brko// skad ni bral bum tshogs la sdog/ kye shi rtsad nas
171b7(rnying rgyud): gcad pa'i phyir// gdug pam pus gzhom par bya'o// zas ni sra g+hi med par za// tshems nis d+hi med par 'joms// dpa' bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// sbas pa'i tshogs kyang gzhom par bya'o// dmyal tshogs me dpung gsang pa'i phyir// snang srid ma lus zabar
172a1(rnying rgyud): thA// gti mug gnas su byung ba'i dzir// hU~M dang na gyi skang stabs ca/ rdul rbamra/ tshul latshal ba// kha khA pa/ raSh+Ta \u0f7f/ sman tatan ta chom/ ma hang rbag ka pa/ zhes gdug pa'i ro bsngags so// rga mchog do
172a2(rnying rgyud): bstod pa dang las la bskol ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la/ las kyi sems dpas yang gsol ba/ kye ma dbang gi rgyal po las kyi bdag/ dbang gi lha rnams ma lhas kun// spyan drangs pa ni ji ltar lags//
172a3(rnying rgyud): bdag pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// spyan drangs pa yi las dag ni// se gol tsam gyis snyan gsan dbab// dbyings nas spyan drangs 'di ltar gsungs// skye med chos
172a4(rnying rgyud): brang nas// cho 'phrul 'bar ba'i skung bstan pa// zla gam dmar po'i gzhal yas nas// bcom ldan dbang chen he ru gshegs su gsol// gnyis med ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// gzi ldan pad+ma yab yum gshegs su gsol// ye shes dgu yi ngang las skur
172a5(rnying rgyud): bzhengs pa// dkyil 'khor dgu yi lha tshogs gshegs su gsol// tshad med bzhi las khro mo'i skur bstan bzhi// sgo ba g.yog 'khor bcas pa gshegs su gsol// tshom bu lnga dang ye shes 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus
172a6(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// zla gam zhal sprod dkyil 'khor nas// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ma lus gshegs su gsol// bla ga ma dgu brtsegs dkyil 'khor nas// hUM mdzad chen po 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// pad+ma 'bar ba 'dab brgyad dkyil
172a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas// khams gsum rnam rgyal yab yum gshegs su gsol// gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ngan song sbyong pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol// 'khor lo rtsi bas bkyang 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus
172b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// yig 'gro 'du thugs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// phyo gas sems dpa' dkyil bar 'khor ba rgyas gshegs su gsol// gnyis med rdzogs pa'i dkyil lubar nas// mun gyis sgrub pa phyogs bcas gshegs sa gsol// 'bar nga /
172b2(rnying rgyud): rgya dgu// dbyings nas don du spyan drangs te// gdan khri rnams la bzhugs su gsol// mdzes shing sbas pa'i gdan khri la// ye shes lha tshogs bzhugs su gsol// sha khrag rlon pa'i gdan khri ni// mdad bsgral ba'i gdan khri la// mkha' 'gro tshogs
172b3(rnying rgyud): bcas bzhugs su gsol// lhag zed lhag lkog ga gol// lhag skud 'khor bcas bzhugs su gsol// i ta pa hu lus ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ zhes rim par bzhugs pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+na lasaM/ dbang gi lha rnams bzhugs su gsol ba'i le'u ste bcu
172b4(rnying rgyud): dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po la/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// dbang gi lha tshogs 'di rnams la// phyag 'tshal ba ni ci ltar lags// gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos bshad du gsol// skye med chos dbyings dang las
172b5(rnying rgyud): skur bzhengs te// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' bar// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum bsgral kyang nyes pa'i skyon ma gos// 'dam skyes pad+ma lta bur sku 'khrungs pas// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ rgyal bas bsngags
172b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // srul skra rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lhar bzhugs pa// dbyings kyi lha tshogs kun la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol phyin rdzogs 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// ye shes ma g.yos chos mchog dang la gnas// dkyil 'khor dgu pi
173a1(rnying rgyud): lha la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa 'dul phyir sprul pa'i tshogs// las mdzad chen po kun la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes phyag 'tshal bar gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// /
173a2(rnying rgyud): nas las kyi sems dpa' des// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan gsang ba gar gyi bdag/ e ma ngo mtshar thugs rje'i bdag/ mchod pa chen po'i las dag bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ 5
173a3(rnying rgyud): las kyi sems dpa' khyod nyon cing // mchod pa chen po brgyad yod de// ma dang chen po bsgral ba ni// phyag rgya chen pos sgrol ba'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas dgyes pa bskyed pa'o// dang por phyi nang phyag rgya chen pos mchod ngo // de nas chos thams cad mnyam
173a4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po yin pas/ mnyam pa'i ngang las kun tu bzang pos mchod// bde bar gshegs pa khro rgyal gtso// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyi// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod sbyin mchog tu rol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta d+yo shA mu khe b+h+yaHsarba wA'aM u dag te
173a5(rnying rgyud): na mi maM ga gne khaM swA hA/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ chos thams cad ni phyi'i yul dang nang gis sems su 'dus so// phyi dag par mchod pa'o// oM pa na pe ma be nu su ra ti pa ra mu sarba ta thA ga ta si te hu/ sa ma yo ta muH/ badz+ra dzA pe/ badz+ra puSh+pe/ badz+ra A lo ke badz+ra
173a6(rnying rgyud): gan d+he/ pU dza khA hi/ zhes pa ni mchod pa'o// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ ma dad pa chen po bsgral ba'i phung po 'di dag bdud rtsid byin gyis brlabs te rol lo// 'di yang rtsa ba brgyad do// lo ma stong / rtsa ba sems rje chen po brgyad la rgyu bas rtsa ba brgyad do// yan lag tra
173a7(rnying rgyud): dbang po ni ra sA la na la sogs pa'o// de rnams ni bdud rtsi chen po'o// des ni lha rnams la mchod pa'o// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ rtsa ba brgyad dang lo ma stong // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'o// sha gti mug/ zhe sdang rus/ 'dod chags
173b1(rnying rgyud): khrag/ dug gsum ma spangs dag pa'i 'dod yon gtor ma'o// rgan gyis bskus pa'i khrag dang mAM sa dang / ma dad pa'i khrag rnams sbyangs par ltar rol ba'o// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems ni gsang bar mchod pa'o// de dag thams cad bslus te phul ba na sma da
173b2(rnying rgyud): stong tshig mchod pa'o// de dag thams cad gnyis su med par mchod pa ni/ blta ba'i mchod pa'o// de ltar sangs rgyas mchod na dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tar+thA las/ mchod pa'i rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa
173b3(rnying rgyud): nas las kyisems de ras/ gar gyi dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan gsang ba gar gyi bdag/ dbang gi lha tshogs thams cad la// de ltar mchod cing bstod pa ni// dngos grub mas ni ji ltar 'thob// ces gsol to//
173b4(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon// de ltar mchod cing bskyod pa na// dngos grub chen po de lta bu// su dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan yin las dngos kyu thob// gzhan yang 'dod sa phun sum tshogs// thams cad
173b5(rnying rgyud): chen po yi// yi ge gsum du 'dus pa'o// sbyangs kyi na zothos na bu gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob// 'phros pas bcung bsdus sbyar bsgres dbyings su thi ma// thugs kar thim nas pra yi dbyig/ gsung mchog gsung gi dngos grub tob// rta mchog rol pa
173b6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des// pad+ma gar gyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o bde gshegs bdud rtsi mchog gi bdag/ dregs pa ma dang nyon mongs lnga la zhen pa zag
173b7(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rnam pa lnga po zag med bdud rtsir rol pa dang // thugs rje yongs su mdzad pa yis// sman dang 'bru rnams thams cad kun// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi gnyis su mdzad pa'i tshe// rjes su 'jug pa ji ltar bgyi/
174a1(rnying rgyud): la bdag mnyan 'tshal// zhes gsol pas/ bdud rtsi mchog gis bka' stsal pa// e ma'o las kyi sems dpa' che// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// bdud rtsi'i don zhus ya mtshan che'o// bdud rtsi'i don 'dangs bshad kyis/
174a2(rnying rgyud): las kyi sems dpa' yid la zung // nyon mongs pa yi bdud nyid la// thugs rje chen po'i rtsi btang nas// khyab pa'i ye shes chen po yi// dbyings su dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i don// kun rdzob rtags su bslab bya na// kun rdzob kyis ni bsrub pade// sred ga sum d+ham bza
174a3(rnying rgyud): yud// ye nas ma bcos rang bzhin snod// de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman// bdud rtsi rtsab lo ma rnams// dbyer med ngang du bsog pur bya// de la nges pa'i bsam pa yis// nges pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o// mi phyed rgyur ldan slob dpon gyis// thams cad ma lus don bya phyir//
174a4(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi dam pa bsgrub par bya'o// rin chen ri dang sman ljongs yul// rtsi sman 'khungs pa'i sa phyogs sam// nags tshal me tog rgyas par bsgrub// 'khor du bya ba'i rim pa yang // skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi// nyi shu'am bcu 'am yang na lnga// khrims dang sdom pas bci
174a5(rnying rgyud): sa// / mas su sa
174a6(rnying rgyud): bkra shis mtshan ldan b+han d+ha lnga// dam rdzas lnga dang shu lnga dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i rtsa brgyad sogs// dang phor rA sA ya na kun// so so'i rigs dang sde phye la// sman gyi srung ma pos mchod bstim// dam rdzas rnams kyi rtog pa gzhom// rigs kyi kha dog dar gyis dgab//
174a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan ldan bkra shis gzungs zag gdags// de ni bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs ci tsam par// bar chad bgegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i rgyu 'phrul bsdams// 'bar ba mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ro// nyon mongs bag
174b1(rnying rgyud): chags sbyang ba'i phyir// 'thun snga'i bshags pa byab te// ngan mong myong ba'i dkyis 'khor // sgrol tha la ni 'khor po ste// gdung bzhig pa brgyad btang ba'o// bzhib rgyang sgo dang bcas pa'o// kye ma'i dus na bcad rnabazhi// kabang khor lo la na zin no/
174b2(rnying rgyud): gong bu'i dros na blag ma/ bsrong rno bzhi re bcas// gzugs brtan 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rigs bcas kyang dang rigs lnga'am// gsang chen rigs gcig bsnyen pa yis// de ni khrol bu myang ba ste// ye shes lnga yi 'gro 'dus phyi ma spyang // dgra pa'i rdzogs
174b3(rnying rgyud): ni gong byu ro// oM A hUMs rlung rnas mr-i tak+ShISh+TiH// 'gro 'dra 'dra 'dul dkyil 'khor ro// gtan pa sngal ma bad+ma lda byings// rjeng byed lnga la gas pa'i mtshan thos la// btsag brji tshogs sngod labs mi t+te// srin mthi thabs dang shes rab pa// btags
174b4(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi 'akyil ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// thag ma sgo gar bsdus pa la// badz+ra 'a dab ma brgyad bris la// d+ha mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khod do// ste ba d+ma med ga dang dubaste// spyod pa tu med ga deng du spang// dmachog bsrung babru med gdeng // phrin las tha mad ga deng du bshad/

180a2(rnying rgyud): su bza'// gang dang 'phrad pa yang ni gnan cing brdeg par bya// bang yang ngal dub med par chug/ khros pa'i tshul gyis las rnams bya// brtul zhugs bzhi yi chas su zhugs nas ni// phyogs bzhir gdug pa'i ngaro gdon// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// brjod pa'i
180a3(rnying rgyud): tshul du byas nas ni// mngar gsum mchongs shing nga rog don// lag pa mdun dang rkang pa rgyab tu gdengs// ngal dub med par 'dug gam 'chag/ hrIHlas rta mchog 'bar ba'i tshogs// khro bo gdug pa'i nga ro gdeng pa// rta mgo can gyis khams gsum btang //
180a4(rnying rgyud): gdug pham lus 'dul// rta mchog can yang char du 'bebs// gdug pa'i tshogs la brdeg cing chug/ 'di ni rta yibatu la zhugs yin// khri yi btul zhugs drag 'bar te// brjid pa gdug pa'i nga ro can// g.yas pa lag gi 'du byed de// g.yas pa brkyad pa rkyang mcho
180a5(rnying rgyud): po'i tshul// dzaHmes ye shes 'byur ba'i khri// khro bo gdug pa'ing ro gdengs// khyi mgo can gyis khams gsum gang // gdug pa'i nga ra grags bcur sngags// phyags spong kyil rnams 'dar khrag sngags// ngal dub med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gdug pa ma lus 'jal
180a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yi// drag po brjid du ldan pa yis// srid pa'i gdug pa bskal ba de// ku dang ye las bya mgo'i tshogs// 'bar ba 'phros pas khams gsum spos bkang ste// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab gshog pa gdengs// sngon du rdo rje sdeng

181a1(rnying rgyud): yi rigs yin te// drag po myur ba srin po khro bo ste// gdug pa 'dul ba dbang phyug tshangs pa ste// gnyis min brtag par dkar ba dregs pa can gyi rigs// de la dregs pa rnam pa dag// zhe sdang rang bzhin bdud du l+lin/
181a2(rnying rgyud): ni ring la sngo ba'o// nga rgyal las ni btsan du sdin// btsan ni thung la rtsub pa'o// gti mug rgyal po chen po ste// dal ba dang ni sdod du bcas// 'phar dang sdod du thung ba dang // phrad la phra bze brang ste// de wAr patag cing rab tu brtag/ de ni ma dang sems can na
181a3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol ba 'i tan+da las/ ma dad pa'i gnas dang phye rabs don du rtsa'i dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// / de nas yang las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang gi rgyal po che/

181a5(rnying rgyud): par nyon la yid la zung // byang chub sems ni rmad du byung // thams cad ma lus byang chub sems// gang du yang ma sbas pas mthong ba nyid de mthong ba rmad du byung ba'o// brjod du rdul tsam yang med pas kun tu khyab pa nyid de khyab pa rmad du byung ba'o// ma shes 'khrul pa'i sems
181a6(rnying rgyud): kud ci yang shes pas sems can te gnyis ka rmad du byung ba'o// sems las bgrod du med pa'i mthar thug pas rmad du byung ba'o// chos thams cad bsgom du med pa ste bsgom pa rmad du byung ba'o// bsgrub pa ni sems kyi rtsal 'byongs pa ste bsgrub pa rmad du gyur ba'o// dam tshig
181a7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi gnya' gnon te dam tshig rmad du byung ba'o// phrin pas sems kyi byed las te phrin las rmad du byung ba'o// dkyil 'khor sems kyi gnas yul te dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba'o// dri byung ci yang byang chub sems te dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba'o// ji ltar snang ba dang ni
181b1(rnying rgyud): snang ba gnyi sa dang gnyis med du bcas pa sems su blta ste ba ba rmad du byung ba'o// ji ltar spyad pa thams cad sems kyi spyod pa ste spyod pa rmad du byung ba'o// thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbang ste rmad du byung ba'o// bsrung ba dang bsrung du med pa gnyis sems kyi dam tshig ste
181b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzang du byung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rdol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bla med byed chub sems kyi le'u sa so bdun pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bcom ldan dag gi rgyal
181b3(rnying rgyud): phyi rabs pa yid ni skad du// bka' gzhung spyod pa rnams la ni// dam tshig bsrung ba ci ltar bgyi// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// phyi rabs don du dam chog bshan par bya
181b4(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i don du dam tshig blta ba ni// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig go// dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad las// su yi dam tshig lnga rnams dang // gsung gi dam tshig lnga rnams dang // zugs kyi dam tshig lnga rnams te// yon tan dam tshig lnga dang phrin las dam tshig lnga// lha yi dam
181b5(rnying rgyud): gsum du gsung ba// klu yi dam tshig nyams pa tsha tsha babum gyis bshags// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa gsung rab babum gyis bshags// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa sgrog 'don 'bum gyis bshags// yon tan dam tshig nyams pa tshogs mchod dbyam gyi

182a2(rnying rgyud): las kyi sems dpa' che// dbang mchog bshad kyis legs par zung // dang po drag po'i gnas chen byed// sa yi chog bya ba de// go ma ye dang gad brdad bya'o// lha gon la ni gnas par bya'o// bum pa ste gon du gnas pa dang // nya sta gon du gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor
182a3(rnying rgyud): dbus su thag ma la// sgo gcig pa ni dgod par bya'o// tha ma zla ga ma brgyad kyis bskor// sgo dang sgo khyung de bzhin bya// de yi dbus su bum pa ste// b+hA ru mang po'i bum pa la// rin chen sA lnga tshang ba dang // spyan wa 'bru lnga snying po sa// dbang gi lha rnams
182a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bum pa'i kha rgyan dpag bsam shing la bya// mgul chings ras dkar gtsang ma la// gzungs zag gtsang ma'i gzungs kyis gdags// dkyil 'khor dang ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'o// de nas slongab ma sta gon la gnas par bya'o// lus gtsang gos
182a5(rnying rgyud): brgyan ku sha'i gdan// der ni sems bskyed bzlas pa bya// dang po dbang gi rdzas rnams bso// slob dpon dbang dang ldan pa des// slob ma la ni bsrung bar bya'o// bskyed dang spyan drangs bzhugs gsol mchod// bstod de zhu ba gsol ba'o// rdzas kyi dbang dang
182a6(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i dbang // gsang ba'i dbang dang bcas par bskur// dang po mig ni dbye bar bya// sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// shel gyi gtsug pu thogs nas ni// mngag ba rib bsal ba bzhin// bu yi ba babasal bar bya'o// ci d+yA Tha be sha ya maH la~M dz+dza 9/

182b2(rnying rgyud): gyi dbang thob shog/ ma hA a mr-i ta/ mahA ra p+te/ ma hA keng ni roti tra~M/ glang chen ko rnon stobs dang ldan pa dang // shing chen g.yang gzhi thabs la mkhas pa dang // stag lags mi bzang dpa' bar ldan pa dang // na bza' gsum dang rgyan gyi dbang mchog thob par zhan

184a3(rnying rgyud): pa yang rim bzhin bya// sdong gcig ma yi khrag gis ni// dur khrod ras la ping+ga bri// 'brub khung nang du de bcuka la// de la dgug gzhug bstim gdab ste// bskal nas lhag ma bstab pa yis// rjes shul dag la bro brdung ngo // gdug pa'i rdzas rnams ma lus

184b2(rnying rgyud): yang lha bskyed spyar drang bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal mchod// smon lam gdab pa 'dod don gsol// de nas bsnyen bsgrub las su bya// de nas ling+ga bcas la rdzas drag bsags// de nas btab dang bsgrub pa dang // gad ba dang drag po'i las bya'o//

184b7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal mchod la mas bcol lo// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen te// yan lag de dang ldan par bya// ha ha las ni bskyed pa hU~M// gau rI ta/ hi/ pra mo ha ta/ be tA lI ha/ pun hrI he/ swA hrI ha~M/ sA sharI ta/

185a5(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ las kyi pad+ma sems dpa' nyon cing // dbang mchog nyid kyi sku bstan pa// stong pa'i ngang las yi ge ste// yi ge'i sprin las gzhal yas bcas// yi ge hUM ni sra brjod pas// rtse ba'i yon tan dpag las 'das// de las
185a6(rnying rgyud): gi srud gsal te// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// nyi shu las ni ye shes ngo bor gsal// phyag ni brgyad cu rtsa gnyis byung // zhabs ni dmar po bcu ru shar// na bza' gdug pa'i pags pa sna tshogs dang // bse khrab la sogs gsol ba'o// lo
185a7(rnying rgyud): gdul phyir rgyan dang chas// ma lus tshang bar bsdams pa'o// yum ni thugs kar sbas pa'o// sangs rgyas stong gi 'byung gnas so// ma lus skul bsdams pa yis// ma lus zags med ring du sgrol// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i
185b1(rnying rgyud): pas/ dbang gi rgyal po las dang ye shes grub cing che ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma gas kyi sems dpas dkang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ gyi rabs pa yi don gyi ra
185b2(rnying rgyud): tshigs 'di rnams bsgrub pa yi// thun dang zod gyi rdzas 'di gang // las kyi mtha' ni ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal ba// las kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon// drag po'i thung+ga dang rdzas bstan pa// srubs
185b3(rnying rgyud): med byas mo dang mar po rnga// sman dang sha khrag bcas pa ni// dmar po'i dar kyis zil ba ni// dbang gi rgyal po'i rdzas yin no// thod pa tshal babacu drug tu// khrag zhag nyung drug bcas pas dgang // yi ge 'bru brgyad bkod pa ni// ko d+hi si d+ha'i rnga snga yin no//
185b4(rnying rgyud): na po dum med thod parba// skyed sna tshogs dang sha khrag dang // dug dang nyung mda' bcas pa ni// khyi spung tshogs kyi rdzas yin no// bre lug pa yi thod pa rba// gdug pa'i sems can khrag sa drug sA rdzas// brdeg pa'i rjes kyis bkang nas te// mtsha
185b5(rnying rgyud): gagis kha bcad pa// long ba'i tshogs kyi rdzas su dgod// mtshan ngan sub med nang du ni// gdug pa'i sha khrag bsog pa ni// kham rgya dang ni go la'i rdzas// lcang lor bcas pa sha khrag bkang // gau rI dang ni tsau dI si d+ha'i tshogs/ seng ge nyi shu brgyad
185b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi// thun dang zor gyi rdzas bstan pa'o// rnam bzhi'i las dang brdeg par bya// bsreg dang gnan pa rtsa ba'i sngags gzhug sham bu can// 'phang ba la ni b+h+yo dang thun// spyan drangs sngags la dzaHgdags so// gzhug pa la ni A be sha/ phyag ni shin mo'o//
185b7(rnying rgyud): mchod dang bstab sa la khA ti sngags gzhug tu// las kyi rnam pa de lta ste// lha bskul de sngags bzlas ting 'dzin gsal bas gdab// ting 'dzin sngags dang tshig rnams la// bar chad med par bsgrims te bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i taSh+Tha la/
186a1(rnying rgyud): las kyi thun bsags pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa la// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi bdag la yang gsol ba// phyi rabs 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// mkha' 'brang chags rnams pashan du gsal// zhes
186a2(rnying rgyud): gsol to// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams ni// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa ste// gdul bya ma dang btul ba'i tshe// 'khor ba'i 'khor rnams dbang bsdus te// 'gro ba'i don du
186a3(rnying rgyud): bskrun pa'i phyir// ye shes dang ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// 'phags pa'i lus la gdug pa'i dbu// 'bum phrag g.yas dang g.yon du gnas// lhag ma sdud cing las rnams mthar 'byin pa'o// ye shes mkha' 'gro mchod cing las kyi mkha' 'gro rnams// dam
186a4(rnying rgyud): la btags te gnyer gtad las bcol lo// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la gsol pa// kye ma dbang gi rgyal
186a5(rnying rgyud): gapate 'a ba // zheng gas/ dang ni la sgra/ mapas kyib da/ ga pas kyi sa dasag rgyan du/ gags ga
186a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba rlung gi bu mo bzhi ni bskul// ba dan rdzi la 'phyar zhing 'byung ba'i me yang 'bud// gdug pa ma lus tshogs ni spong zhing brnags pa'i las byed do// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tar+yA las/ ho ma gyi le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o// / de nas las
186a7(rnying rgyud): kaM sems dpas yang gsol pa// dbang gi rgyal sa ma ma ho// dgug cing rdzob pa'i las rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// dbang gi/ la po ched po yis// baM ni ljags kyi na spong // hUM dang ldan
186b1(rnying rgyud): drus/ to nags ba gnas nas spang// da las phyag sna tshogs byung bya// lcags pacan dang zhagasu pa can// lcags zlog can da rmi brtan// bzhi yi sbyin pas rnam pa najigs// lus ni thams cad 'ga' bar byed// ces gabyung /
186b2(rnying rgyud): mchog ro la tan+d+ha las/ phyag rgya bzhi'i le'u ste lnga badru pa'o// / de nas yang d+ga las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la gsol pa// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ dmigs pa'i rten ni gang la badz+ri// zhes gsol to// bcom
186b3(rnying rgyud): 'das dbang gi rgyal ngos bka' stsal pa// ling+ga btsa' ba'i rgyu nyid ni// mi phungs dang marungs pa// gal gyi dum bu ngu tsho zhug/ su ba ka'i lo ma tig tu rnams// bong bu yi ni 'dud rjes hA// de la yin mtshan ldanaH// mgo dang yan laglegs gnas bcam/
186b4(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs lnga dang ldan par byas// yan laganyid lag rdzogs la dod par byas// lha lnga dag dang phral nas ni// mnyis gzu dang dbang btsug te// tshon sA lnga yis byang du gzhug/ tshon dz+haiM swa yi blangs kyis gnan// sme ba gsum gyi khrig gis thug/ zhen
186b5(rnying rgyud): mkhar nag dag gis gdags// 'brub khung gsang ba'i gnas su bcug/ de la dbang drag las bya'o// de la phyag rgya chen po yis// bkug cing brti ngas la gdab pang bya// gdug pa dug gi rgyu dag la// de la phur ba sor lnga ste// lpags
186b6(rnying rgyud): sam dngul dang gser dag la// de la byinangapa rlab dbang bskur te// yab yum gsang ba'i gnas nas su// byang rlab sems kyi 'gro 'dulas// min mo dang A~M daMr hUM// rim pas bskur hUM ga thugs su brlab// de la sangs rgyas thams ca
186b7(rnying rgyud): mde nyid kyis du byin gyis brlab// sgrol ba dbang yang bsgru// dayis gad parjing bsgril byos na// mi tho ba ni gang yang mad// byang chu sams pa smos pa 'i// zug rje khams she m-igasas bsgral// thams padag ta
187a1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs sa// rtamachog rol pa'i tarna mas/ lin bza' ba dang phur thugadab pa'i le'u ste gcig pa / de nas yang bsgralas ni sems dpas dbang gi rgyal po la 'di ga ces gsol to// rtsem ba
187a2(rnying rgyud): ge 'dag/ tshe 'das kyi dge ba'i las kyi stongs bya// yas kyi rnam pa ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// tshe 'das dge ba'i las kyi stongs can// dang po l+r-i
187a3(rnying rgyud): du
187a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin nga ni// 'og gi 'gram pa ting dag ba bcu// ba ma rim dang badzin pa nyid gzhag bzhi// gnyis pa yang dag spong ba bzhi// gsum pa rdzu 'phrul gang ba bzhi// bzhipa snang ba'i dbang po la// bum pa'i rten ni spobs chen mA// kha khyer 'phags pa'i yan lag cu
187a5(rnying rgyud): srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yin te// 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer gzhag gsum// chang khebs skyabs chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de// gya ru thabs dang shes rab la// tog ni mi dmigs chos kyi sku// dril bu chos nyid stong pa'i sgra// dad dpyangs 'khor ba'i mtha' ya
187a6(rnying rgyud): 'das// byung zas chos las grung pa'i sku gdung la// sru phyis phru lus gso te bzhugs par bsam// de nyid mnor gzhal yas bsam// sku gsum ngo bo gang yang rung ba'am// 'di ni sprul pa'i sku nyid de// spyan drangs bstims mchod don gsol gdab//
187a7(rnying rgyud): mthang mu yi bar du'am// 'khor ba mthar brlag bar du ni// mu gdung mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// sku gzugs tsha tshe gdab pa ni// zangs lcags gser dngul la sogs pa// zhu nas lugs su thugs kyang rung // drang zong tsha
187b1(rnying rgyud): rje sna lnga yis// khrung bu logs sam thang ba la// thabs la mkhas pas bris pa'am// rwa dang bso jo shings// kun la 'bur du btod pa ste// mkhan po gang yang shes dang ldan gyur pas// legs shing dod de tshad dang ldan par bya// rang 'dod lha/ yi gzugs
187b2(rnying rgyud): nyid la// nges pa'i ting 'dzin rtse gcig tu// yang dag par ni bsam byas nas// sru phyis sku khrus gsol ba dang // dbu bshad snyan bsal spyan dbye shangs su 'thog/ tshems drud pa dang ljags bzhad nas// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang ba stim// phyag
187b3(rnying rgyud): byas mchod je bslab byas nas// bkur ngos phyag rgya mchod pa'i gnas// 'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni// zhal bsro bkra shis mnga' gsol dbang bsrud nas// sku gzugs mchod pa'i rten du bya'o// phreng ba yi ge 'bru brgyad de// phreng thag dbugs kyiHnyid du/
187b4(rnying rgyud): phar 'phro ba dang tshur 'du ba// mtheb mdzub gnyis kyis bgrang // gser gyi ba zag gzings bzhin no// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ mchod rten dang / tshe tshe dang / phreng ba'i le'u steng gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sa ma
187b5(rnying rgyud): dpas/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang drag che// dbang gi rgyal la bdag nyan 'tshal// mchod pa chen po ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal gyis bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// dbang
187b6(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba// mdad sems can chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// phung po dur khrod gyurab pa'i tshe// bde gshegs rigs tshogs ma lus pa// thams cad rdzas kyis mchod pa
187b7(rnying rgyud): ste// phyi yi dngas ma lnga ni mchod par phul// zhi ba chen po'i tshul du phul ba'o// rnam shes dbang po yul bcas pa// zhi ba rdo rje dbyings la phul// thams cad zhi bas sbyang ba'o// phung po khams dang dbang po yul dus te// phung po lnga ni khrag 'thung lnga la
188a1(rnying rgyud): phul// yul lnga khro mo lnga la phul// rnam shes brgyad ni go ru dri ma la phul// yul ni sing ta ma la'o// yid chos kun bzang yab yum gnyis la phul// mi dge dag ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// sing da dbang mo rnams pa la// mi
188a2(rnying rgyud): ni sgo ba yab yum la// de ni 'gro ba 'dul bar skyeng ba'o// gsang ba spyi yi dbang gi rgyal la phul// yul dang chos bcas gzi ldan can// tshogs brgyad yul brgyad khyi spyang tshogs la phul// dbang po lnga dang yul lnga kham rgya ger ma la// dngas ma ba
188a3(rnying rgyud): la// rtog tshogs rnams ni long ba'i tshogs la dbul// drug lnga dbang gi rgyal dang brtul zhugs bzhi la ste// yan lag khro bo mgo brtsegs bzhi la dbul// nang rol pho nya dang ni mchogs rnams la phul// dbang gi mtshogs gsang ba yis/
188a4(rnying rgyud): lnga dbang du sbyang ba'o// rus pa ma lus mchod par phul// zhe sdang gnyen nas dag pa'o// sha chen ma lus mchod pa dbul// gti mug gtan nas dag pa'o// chu ser ma lus mchod par phul// brgyal gtan nas dag pa'o// slang pa dag pa
188a5(rnying rgyud): par dbul// gnyis med sems kyi mchod pa ste// nyon mongs ma lus dag pa'o// thams cad bdud rtsi chen por sprul// gsang ba yi ni mchod par phul// gnyis su med dang blang dor med pa dag pa'o// sgra tshogs ma lus mchod pa ste// nyon mongs gang
188a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra ni ye shes gnyis med dag pa'o// rdos pa rnams kyang gzhal yas ngag gdan du'o// zhes gsungs pa la the tshom med// de ltar ma dad bskal te mchod pa phul// ma chags mchod pa ma spangs gnas su dag pa'o// phyi rabs rnams kyang de bzhin te// mchod pa
188a7(rnying rgyud): nang gsang bar bya'o// de yis las grub the tshom med// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tat+tA las/ mchod pa'i rim par bye ba'i le'u steng gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la/ las kyi pad+ma sems dpa' des/
188b1(rnying rgyud): chags pa yi mchod pa phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ gyi rabs pa yi don gyi phyed// drag po thog seng las ni bdag tan 'tshal// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal
188b2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ drag po'i thog ser dbab pa na// rta yi ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// dang po gnas ni btsal bar bya'o// gnod sbyin mo yi spar rjes sam// brag dmar mchi ris yod pa'am// gnod sbyin mtshon chas bshal rjes sam/
188b3(rnying rgyud): dang 'brel pa can dag gam// yang nas ni bla ga ma 'dra ba'am// gru gsum sa ni rnam par bsgrub// de ru yang kyi chos la 'jug/ de ru bshags shing bsnyen pa bya// de nas phyi mchod las rnams bya'o// srubs med spyi thugs thod pa ru// dbus su wa ga ma ga
188b4(rnying rgyud): tha ma 'khor bzhi pa bzhi nang // de ru thog bdag ma bzhe dgod// zla ga masgo bdun gzung mchog dgod// phyi ma las dang dpa mchog tshogs// de ltar bkod la bsgrub pa ste// dkyil du seng ge phur dbung pod// dbang gi rgyal por mnga' gsol 'o//
188b5(rnying rgyud): mdun du gza' yi rgyal po ste// drag po thog ser phrin las bcol// 'khor lo pad+mar las kyi gdug pa mo// bzhi ni bkod de chu 'khrugs 'bebs// de ltar gsal zhing dbab pa'o// dang po spyan drang mchod pa'o// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsdu
188b6(rnying rgyud): dang ni bsgrub chen no// bsnyen bsrub bzhi du shes par bya// dbang gi rgyal po yab yum par// ma las thog gi rgyal mo bzhi du byung ngo // zhabs kyi gza' chen po dAhru la/ ya ma nag po bton te// de ltar bkod de gnas pa las/ dbus su gtso bo hrIHlas so//
188b7(rnying rgyud): 'khod de la rim par ro// oM hri ru lus ma ya dza/ ya ma snying la mkhag dug si sa ma ya dza/ ma ma dag sha trag ru tsar li ma sham pa de sa mag+ho/ rak+Sha la la ti sa ma ya b+h+yo// ga bi sa ma ya ru ru tsa ba tsa ba drag tu cir s+ho// chad pa nag po'i thod pa ru// las
189a1(rnying rgyud): rim pa gang bzhin te// gdug pa'i sha khrag ma lus dang // snying sna dang ni spyan gyis mdzad// ngag du rig shal sham pob/ drag lding bab ying / sa maru ti ya // dug dang ma sa su byar// gnas gsung dang
189a2(rnying rgyud): gzhug/ kan ma la skya deng gser chen te// bar du lha gtan gdugaser gta'// sa la gdug pa'i khrag zor ro// de yis las rnams grub pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thog 'bebs pa dang ser ba 'bebs pa'i leT dwe //
189a3(rnying rgyud): ling+ga dag po bcas nas ni// mtshan dang ldan pa'i yin la// seng ldeng bur pas bsdigs shing gzir// khrag sna 'dus pa sme bar bcas// thong pa dag tu zhugs nas ni// dur khrod rkang gi spag \u0f7f// 'o ma sna gsum bsres nas ni// gdug pa'i ting la mes
189a4(rnying rgyud): dug sngags bzlas shing zab bcas la// thal 'jam dur khrod sol bas phyogs bzhir gtor// de yis thogase 'bebs par byed// rta mchog rol pa'i rten+ta las/ rdo rje thog ser 'bebs pa'i le'u steng lnga pa'o// / de nas ya bas kyi sems dpas/
189a5(rnying rgyud): dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan gsang ba dbang gi bdag/ phyi rabs don dang bdag la yang // zor gyi las rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan dbang gis bka' stsal pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon//
189a6(rnying rgyud): gi zor du bstan pa nI// bsgrub pa chen po rdzogs pa'i tshe// drag po zong du bya ba ni// dbang gi rgyal po skyes bu yis// gshod ma dregs pa'i b+han d+ha ru// khyo dgu shi ba'i dri ma can// de lta bu yi thod pa du// drag po'i rdzas rnams ma lus bsog/ gdug pa'i rdzas
189a7(rnying rgyud): bkang la// byin gyis brlabs shing bskul byas te// gang dmigs gnas su 'phang byas la// de la zor gyi gdug bdag bskul// yi ge bzhi yis 'phro 'du bya// zhe sdang gdug pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// zod kyi las mkhan mtshogs 'phrul// zhe sdang ldan
189b1(rnying rgyud): brdeg par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ dbang gi zor gyi le'u steng drug pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la gsos pa/ kye ma dbang gi rgyal po lags// phra rabs rnams
189b2(rnying rgyud): na// rkun du ting 'dzin ji ltar lags// dpa' bo dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ phyi rabs rnams kyi don du kun gyi ting nge 'dzin bstan par bya'o// mngon du bzhag ste sems bskyed de/ ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan par bya// sde ni nga
189b3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yom la// bzung na dag pa lha yi tshogs// gnyis su med par lha mos mchod// spyan drung bzhugs gsol phyag btsal nas// mchod pa 'dod don gsol ba gdab// dgyes pa bskyed de gshegs su gsol// oM badz+ra ba len ta bi sha tsadra pa/ d+hI e rje
189b4(rnying rgyud): ma ya sa ma ya phaT/ byin brlab mchod de lha rnams dgyes pa bskyed// bstod cing bskul la phrin las bcol// bza' ba thams cad mchod pa de// btung ba thams cad bdud rtsir mchod// lha mchod bdag rol dngos grub yin// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra lis/
189b5(rnying rgyud): gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u steng bdun pa'o// / pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon// yi ge phreng ba'i bzlas pa dang // dgongs pa'i phrin las chen po ni// dang po phyi mo 'khor lor gsal// bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas spyi// 'khor lo sum cu rtsi gnyis
189b6(rnying rgyud): byi mo yige oM dugs la// de lus 'brub rgyang du lu'i tshogs// yig 'bru rin chen phrer ba ste// yi ge 'od kyi byung bar gnas// longs spyod 'khor lo 'dab bcu drug/ kye mo yi ge Ang ma mo// de la bu lu 'bru brgyad bskod// thig la sa bung bskor ba//
189b7(rnying rgyud): kyi tshang ro rab ma brgyad// gyo mo yi ge du gnas// tham bu lu 'thub rgyad bskod// ri chen rtsang la bcus pa bzhin// ti'i 'bru bzhin du gnas pa'o// lte ba rin chen gzhal yas te// 'khor lo drug rngu gnyis dang ldan// phyi mo yi ga sna seng po// de la du
190a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad bskor// tshwa tshwa lta bur gnas pa'o// lngas kyi gzhal yas 'bar ba bzhi// me dang rlung ga 'khor mor gnas// yige gzhu dang gugasum bdan mtshan// phyi ma yi ge r+b+ha ljang gu// dal tu lu 'bru brgyad bzha
190a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin du gnas pa'o// de las 'phro dang 'du ba ste// phrin las ma lus rdzogs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan las/ yi ge phreng ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dbang gi sems dpa' la/ dbang
190a3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa// nyon cig brnalas kyi sems dbang che// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// nga yis gsungs pa'i chud 'di la// yon tan dpag gis mi lang // ji ltar snang ba yang ngayi sdod yul lo// chos 'di thams cad nga nyid rdo// sung da
190a4(rnying rgyud): gsungang nyid do// thugs nga nyid do// yon tan nga nyid do// phrin las nga nyid do// zhing khams thams cad kyang nga nyid do// rgyud 'di la ni spyod pa dag/ zag med pade ldan dbyings nyid do// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ che ba dang yon
190a5(rnying rgyud): na bstan pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o// / sangs rgyas ston 'che la bstod// thams cad kun gyi de skong ba// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu ste// dgos 'dod skong 'khyod la bstod// log rtog 'khor ba ma lus pa// bdud rtsi lta bur mnyam sbyar nas/
190a6(rnying rgyud): sa bde ba che 'dod pas// bdud rtsi chen po khyod la bstod// 'khor ba mun pa lta bu la// gsal ba dri ma med pa yi// sgron me lta bu'i sku mnga' 'a// sangs rgyas ston bakhyod la bstod// ces bstod do// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ 'khor gyis bstod pa'i
190a7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste drug cu ba ra// / de nas dbang gi rgyal pos 'khor rnams la/ thams cad ma lus dbang gi rgyal// dbang rgyal dam pa 'di bstan te// sems nyid skye ba med pa la// skye mched dang las thams cad 'thung // 'byung ba nyid na dngos po med//
190b1(rnying rgyud): na
191a1(rnying rgyud): nyid hUM gi dang / rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi dngos grub ni// 'gro 'dun ma mkhar 'khrugs pa'i byin rlabs las// dpal gyi thugs gcig nges par byung ba ni// lha ma'i rang bzhin ye shes kya mtsho ste// dbang gi rang bzhin
191a2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi phyag rgyang gsal// kha dog me 'bar b+hu ru'i 'od 'jigs pas// sa gsum zil gyis gnan cing khams gsum b+hin sreg mdzad// ral ba mar gad 'jig rten mtha' las 'dris// srid rtsing 'bar bas ni sdang gdug sang tshogs// cho sa dang
191a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dz+haiM sma rban// spyan mig me 'bar stong gsum nyi bla 'khrugs// smin ma glog 'gyu dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// sman gyi 'od 'phro rdo rje'i khong gseng nas// 'byug gi sgra sgrogs khro bo'i hUM s+tha can// shangs kyi klong ru me khro bo'i dkyil 'khor nas// mtshan
191a4(rnying rgyud): dang bskal ba'i bu lug 'bebs/ hom lnga 'brel ba'i mkha' dbyings klong rum nas// rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad gangs ri 'bum gyis gtams// leb rgan me 'bar pad+ma stong gi ljags// ut+pa li dmar po 'od zer glog tu 'gyu// ag tshom me 'ber spar dmar po
191a5(rnying rgyud): log rtog bdud kyi 'jig rten thal bar rlog/ phyag gi khyad par shin tu mi bzad de// ye shes bcu drug 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gdul bya thabs la mkhas pa phra men tshogs// phyag dang phyag rgyar thabs kyis 'brel ba ni// zhi gnas lhag mthong thung du
191a6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba bzhin// byams dang snying rje phyogs ris mi mnga' yang // dur khrod 'dul ba'i don la tho da ru sa ra k+tam 'gengs// srin po 'dul slad lcags kyi zhags par bcas// klu chen 'dul ba'i don la sdigs 'dzub bskal mar 'bar// bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i don la
191a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar bas rde ba// khro bo zil gyis gnon pa'i don la rgyu snying chad par bzums// zhabs kyi khyad par shin tu mi bzad de// khro brgyad gan grub bsre zhib mid gsum zhabs kyis gnon// gdug mdzad gdug 'joms lha la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid dbyings kyi ye shes
191b1(rnying rgyud): man// kun ma thog ste// phragasung thugs kyin tan ga pa gyul// dang sa blang stsa sa shes suya // na las rbang byung bsathabs rgyad// gas pan rjes bu ba 'i gnam pang gatshags
191b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings yongs su bye pa da ca gzhog pa las/ te zlab 'dapas rgyal ba stong thug rdzogs// rin chen tson gyis phul du byung bstan// sri gsum 'khor ba'i bag chags thal bar rdzog/ rdo bral mini rig pa'i 'arjod rdulas// na/
191b3(rnying rgyud): gsum khyab par 'khrub// gdu bu dpung rgyan klu rgyal 'brum gyi zhabs// brlangs sprin gyi gsebs nas ljags kyi glog 'gru ma// rdo rje dmar po 'od kyi lce 'bebs shing // hUM gi 'brug sras nam mkha'i mtha' klas pas// zhe sdang gdug pa'i rgyal po dbang
191b4(rnying rgyud): thod pa'i gyen gyi rngom brjid mi zung ni// sra chen dri mar po rim par spel ba bzhin// lung long 'thil ba'i 'od zeng gzha' ltung 'gyu// na bza' rgyan gyi cha lugs me bzad de// zhing ljags 'bum gyis bklubs pa'i slad g.yogs la// ga khrag 'phro 'du
191b5(rnying rgyud): bur 'khrugs// su lus dpal gyis brgyan pa'i ye shes gzi 'bar bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa'i mchog/ zab mo dbyings su sbas pa'i thugs ka nas// gsang chen snyan khungs byud pa'i btsun mo na// khro mo gzi ldan chal bkun
191b6(rnying rgyud): 'das dang mabyon kun gyi 'byung gnas ma// gzi byin tshe mchog gnas su bsgrim pa dang // rgyu drug rnam shes dbyings su sdud la mkhas// thugs dam gser 'greng yab yum ye nas 'brel// dgyes pa'i longs spyod don dam dbyings na rtsa// dag
191b7(rnying rgyud): dregs pas myos pa'i lha tshogs mar po kun// dbang drag 'joms pa'i zhabs kyis bsnol mar brdzis// tshogs chen mdun par sdud cing nyi zlas skul brgyan// dug gsum byed nas gcod pa'i hom lnga zhal nas 'bar// rta skad gtsug nas sgrogs shi
192a1(rnying rgyud): 'od zer char du 'bebs// tshogs chen rdzogs pa nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ dbang gi rgyal po'i las dang khyad par bstan pa'i le'u steng gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bad+ma las kyi
192a2(rnying rgyud): dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdang // dbu yi gzhal yas las bskor pa// dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'bar ba dbu yi las bshad
192a3(rnying rgyud): nyon// dbus ni nyid dang nyid du ldan pa ste// shar du gzigs pa'i dbu yi ga zhal yasa? na// mdzod bdag sems ma brtan ma rin chen 'bar// chos dang las dang sdud ma skyod ma'o// lho ru gzigs pa'i dbu yi gzhal yas na// ldan lung rin chen phreng ba ga
192a4(rnying rgyud): thogs// rgyal mtshan zhags pa thogs pa bde ba'o// nub tu gzigs pa'i dbu yi gzhal yas na// dbyangs dkar chos dang dbyangs len blon po ma// 'khor lo lcags sgrog smra ba bde ba'o// gyang du gzigs pa'i dbu yi gzhal yas na// 'khor lo
192a5(rnying rgyud): lcags sgrog sgrol mas gar byed srung ba dbyug/ gnod sbyin dril 'kho la 'bebs ma'o// bskyod bzangs sems pa sgeg mo rgyal po gdugs// 'dod pa lcags kyu legs par sgrol ma'o// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin bsgyur ba'o// zhes gsungs so//
192a6(rnying rgyud): mchog la ba'i tarna las/ zug tu bstan pa'i se rgyu / de nas yang brdalas kyi sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyim bcom ldad bang gi bdang // srid pa kun pa dbang byed pa/
192a7(rnying rgyud): dbang gi las byed srid pa'i bdag/ khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad ni// rigs dang lde ni ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon// khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad 'di/
192b1(rnying rgyud): mar me mdzad kyi bstan pa la// gdug byed bu mo bco brgyad ste// gdug byed spun gyis smon lam btab// shAkya'i bstan pa chen po la// nged kyis bstan pa bsrung bar shog/ dus der skyes la las byed shog/ ces smon lam btab/ zhe sdang rang
192b2(rnying rgyud): dgar spyad pas bdud mor sbyin// smon lam dbang gis dus der skyed// ma taM bsgral ba'i khrag gi thigs pa bco brgyad las// khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad byung // srog snying phul te las mkhan ma// ngag sha kha lang dung te ma zad/ rag sha nag mo ha la tshogs
192b3(rnying rgyud): ya/ rag tu dzad sha ma/ kha la ru ti rbad/ sa ma ya rutI rbad/ ki ri rbad ya/ muti rbad sha/ shar marbad/ ru ru rag sho rbad/ ma mo do sha nA ram/ pa tra dag sho zad/ kha la ma ting he ra/ sum ba de zad/ ru ru ro la sham/ ma hing ka ga ya
192b4(rnying rgyud): brud/ mdza ru sham byo// ka la ru shar ya/ rtsal ta re ting rbad/ ces gsungs so// rta mchog dol ba'i tan+na las/ khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad kyi khungs dang sngags phul ba'i le'u ste de lnga pa'o// / de nas yang las kyi khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad
192b5(rnying rgyud): kyi/ bsgrub pa byang byed pa'i tshe// dam rdzas dang ni las rnams gang // dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal ba// khrag gi ma mo 'di rnams kyi// sgrub pa'i rdzas dang rten pa'i rdzas// dkyil khor
192b6(rnying rgyud): bsrub pa ni// brag dmar logs sam nags kyi tshal// chu yi gling la bsgrub pa ste// de ru dkyil 'khor chen po brtsig/ drid+hi lnga yis byug par bya// dbus ni zla gam sgo gcig pa// mtha' la zla ga ma bco brgyad bskor// sgo dang sgo khyud khro bo gnas//
192b7(rnying rgyud): dbus su gtso dang gsang ba'i yum// pad+ma zla gam bco brgyad la// khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad dgod// sgo la khro bo mgo brtsegs bzhi// de ltar dkyil 'khor bca' ba'o// rdzas kyi rim pa bstan pa ni// dbus su lung lo mtshan dang ldan// de ru bdud rtsi sha lnga
193a1(rnying rgyud): khrag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa gsum// zla ga ma re 'thun phor re// wag sna dug sna snying sna dang // nus mthu yod pa'i rdzas rnams bsag/ de ltar bsags la bsten cing bslab// de yis ji ltar 'dod pa 'thung /
193a2(rnying rgyud): nan dang bsreg dang 'phang bar bya// thun dang sngags dang bskul bcol bya// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+na las/ khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad bsgrub pa'i le'u ste re drug pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ @
193a3(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma pad+ma gar gyi bdag/ 'go ba phyi rabs don du ni// dbang gi bsgrub pa de ltar na// las kyi mthang ni gang la bgyi// las kyi gnyer rje gang la gtad// srid pa'i las bcos gang la brtsol// zhes ga
193a4(rnying rgyud): to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// dbang gi las ni gnyer gtad pa// bstan pa thams cad bsrung ba'i bdag/ ma dad pa las byung ba ste// 'byung ba chu yi gting shed na// gser gyis gzhi'i bar shed na// 'bri mig gsum ni yod pa la// gcig
193a5(rnying rgyud): gzu yi rgya mig yod// chu ni rdzol dngas par 'byung ba yod// dbyibs ni lugs kyi sdom bur yod// byi ni rin chen mchong gi gzer bu srid// de na gsang ba dbang gi phul ba'i las byed ma// dbang gi ma mo brtse gsum yod// nang gi g.yu yi chu mig
193a6(rnying rgyud): tsho ma mo bcu gsum gnas// phyi na las kyi bdud mo bcu gsum ste// mchod gi zo bzor ba'i nang na gnas// par ma 'byung ba'i ma mo bcu gsum gnas// lcags kyi sbom bu zhes bya ste// de na chu mig gsum par rnga// gyi nang gsang ba'i ma me
193a7(rnying rgyud): bcu gsum gnas// skye 'grong dung ba'i gnyen po yin// de la las bcol gnyer gtad bsgrub par bya// de bcu gsum ni srid pan dbang che ba yin// de yis las rnams 'grub par byed// ces gsungs so// pad+ma las kyi sems dpas yang gsol/
193b1(rnying rgyud): pa/ dbang gi rgyal po chen po de dag bsrub par bya ba na/ rten dang bsgrub pa ji ltar lags/ dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bkang stsal pa// nyon cig pad+ma las kyi sems dpang che// bdud mo chen mo bcu
193b2(rnying rgyud): gsum bsrub pa na// dkyil 'khor dbus zlu ma nang ni zla gam sgo gcig pa// tha ma 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gsum// de la bdud mo bcu gsum dgod// mtshan ldan zhal bu phud dang bcas// tha ma 'khor lo bcu gsum la// dbang gi mchog phur bcugs
193b3(rnying rgyud): dkod// dbus su zangs kyi phud pa dgod// nag mo rtsing mgo'i thod pa ru// de du snying sna khrag sna dang // dug dang sha khrag mchod par bya// 'khor lo de la dran por re// da ltar gsad pa'i las bya ste// zod dang chad dang gsad dang 'phrul// de la drag po
193b4(rnying rgyud): las rnams kyi// de yis las rnams ma lus 'grub// ces gsungs so// d+hi mtshag rol pa'i tAn+d+ha las/ bdud mo chen mo bcu gsum sgrub pa'i leT ster bdun pa'o// / de nas yang brlalas kyi sems dpas dbang gi rgyal po la
193b5(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ ma mo bcu gsum bsgrub pa'i sngags rnams bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ srid pa'i dam can bsgrub pa na/ sngags 'dri yis bslab pa ste/ oM ru ru rag ngan rbad ya ma na// bal dul
193b6(rnying rgyud): dzad/ mati shang b+h+yo// / mi ma ti la ting mid/ rba sha mdzad/ srog tsapa la rag shi ni rbad/ mam du ti shaM pang shang yang / patu kha lo badzang / ka ma mdu dzing / bai ban ci da rdzi mu gan rbad/ shag ti dzad/ sngar zad/
193b7(rnying rgyud): shin zad / de ba nyid drub mtshod dang lam bcom gtad// de'i gang 'dod la dgas 'jud// ci gsus so// mchog nga di tan las/ ma bajug du ma ra bcad // denas ya
194a1(rnying rgyud): rdza sa sa/ nga gil ba ma sa gas than/ na/ basmra chud na/ dus pa lan na na nas / da
194a2(rnying rgyud): spang ba/ brlangs kyims dang nyon cig/ 'ason pas srung mi byed pa'i ri pa'i tsabar dris byab/ mamyong nga zhes te// rgyal logs pa na gyir// nga nis byab gras pa te// thams cid gsong cing dpyas dung zhes bya/
194a3(rnying rgyud): tshe chen mo sbyang pa na// rtsed mo dz+wal pa du gling ngam// yang na 'bru shing de tshams par bcu ba// de bu dkyil lakhong bu bzhi sgo dang bcas// dbus su zug ma gyi ni d+ma brgyad// de du mtshan ldan rje rigs thod parla// 'brang ba'i bdud dang rtsi thog 'bras rnams dang /

194a5(rnying rgyud): 'dre 'bung zhes// byin gyis rlobs la dbang ba ni sngar// dbang gi rgya' pos ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du 'chi'o// sdod pa'i gsang stags 'di rnams lags/ i e ka dza dza dus ma yarba bra'i ho// sa ma swa ga shas ma byung zad/ kha ya ga sha ru
194a6(rnying rgyud): 'di yis las rnams kyang ni grub// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// srid pa'i rgyal tshwa khyod kyis 'di'i las rnams 'thung bar gyis zhes bsgo/ chog do pa tar+tha las/ rgyal ma drung brngub pa'i le skye dpung ngo //
