195b2(rnying rgyud): bcud dang rtsi bcud dang // mthun pa'i rdzas la mchod cing bsgrub// gsang ba'i thun bzhi thod par 'phang // oM ma mang du shan shan mazad/ ma ma dag mo do shan rbad/ ra go pa la tshal du yaM/ sa ma kar ma ma ti zad/ de ltar mchod 'phrul las
195b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol bi'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi rbad pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dbang gi rgyal pos/ gol ma dang lam rgya mo drug cu rtsa gnyis bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// zla gam kha spod maN+Dal
195b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs drug dag tu bya// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma drug/ sgo dang sgo khyud de bzhin bya// de la rdzas dang phur pa re// zangs phur drug drug dgod pa'o// blag ma kha spong dbang gi rgyal po yab yum ste// 'khor lo drug la kham rgya drug/ pad+ma drug la gol ma/
195b5(rnying rgyud): 'khro bo de bzhin no// b+han d+ha tshal bu dag tu ni// de ru thun rdzas bsags nas su// de la bsgrub par bya ba'o// khrag dug ma dungs thun rdzas bsags// sha dang rkang dang glo snying dang // dur khrod rdzas rnams ma lus bsags// mchog gi gzhu dang nyung mo'i mdang /
195b6(rnying rgyud): zhing gi lag pa'i g.yab mo dang // rgyu ma'i 'phreng dang lca du ma dang // ha ta dang ni cha lang dang // b+han d+ha rdzas rnams tshogs par bsgrub// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tar+d+ha las/ go la ma dpa 'am rgya mo sgrub pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o//
195b7(rnying rgyud): nas yang dbang gi rgyal po la/ sgeg mo la gcig mas 'di skad ces smras te/ hi hi mngon rdzogs dbang gi rgyal// srid pa gsum na dbang gi bdag/ skye 'gro la gcig srid pa spol// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi dung
196a1(rnying rgyud): 'debs bdag/ srid pa gsum gyi rgyan mo bdag/ hi hi mngon rdzogs las rnams bdag gi bgyi// sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i phrin las gdags par bgyi'o// bdag la dbang gi rgyal po yis// byin gyis rlob cing dbang
196a2(rnying rgyud): bskur mdzod// ces gsol to// bse phor demang po srubs med du// bdun rtsi dang snyan gyi mchog/ mi d+hing dang ni rgom chen dang // dug zhag sbya ba bsags nas su// del brtson cing slab ste// blag ma tshem bu d+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// slong
196a3(rnying rgyud): rgyan sbas pa'o// s+ye ka dza ti drag sha sa ma ya ma ma ting re zang / de ltar bsgrub cing 'phang ba'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tAn+t+ra las/ sgeg mo la gcig bslab pa'i le'u ste don drug pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ bcom ldan
196a4(rnying rgyud): 'das dbang gi rgyal po la gsol pa// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi mchog/ dbang mchog dam pa bsgrub pa la// dngos grub dam pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// dbang mchog
196a5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i dngos grub ni// dbang gi dngos grub bdud ci ste// bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos dub ni// bdud ni me chus rlung nam mkhar che// 'byung ba sde yi yum du byin brlab rtsi yin no// bdud ni nyon mongs lnga yin te// ye shes lnga ru 'a drab pa kyi yin no// a ni mr-i ta
196a6(rnying rgyud): ba med pa'i don// bdud rtsi a nr-i ta zhes bya// de nyid blangs na sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las lnga// byin rlabs mngon shes skye ba dngos grub po// thams cad lha yi phyag rgyar gsal// dngos grub dang la rang chas yod// don rtogs dngos grub dam pa'o
196a7(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ dngos grub bstan pa'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan dbang dang tshe yi bdag/ tshe dbang rgyal po
196b1(rnying rgyud): dal bdagatan 'chal// zha gas // bang rnam pas bkang sum pa// nyan bya rna sems gyur// dadang bachung ma pa brdud dan// slo kya nyid // rgyu du bya rdzas padang byung // byang
196b2(rnying rgyud): dbang // grags pa chen po ma pa dbang // gsang ba'i dbang ni byung chub sems// mngon shes dam pa lnga yi dbang // ting nga nags la bsangs rgyas dbang // 'dul ba'i don du po po rnams kying dang // de bzhi na gsang brdzogs 'khor dbang
196b3(rnying rgyud): gang pa mi ga bru'i dbang // thun mong du ni rdzas kyi nga // gnyis med sems kyi bang du'o// de yi gnas dang las kyang bzhin no// skra dang mo ba pon mched dang gangs mi dang // dang po stu gon la gnas par bya// dedas mi sa ma tang sa sa
196b4(rnying rgyud): dri'i martan nal ba bya// rdzi nga bris byas nas can pa// denas nyes pa bshags dang ston 'phyos// da nas pasnyen chu chogs nga // ngas par me man tshad yangs tha la// yel ba dang de nyind kyi// dbyi pang yang brtan pa
196b5(rnying rgyud): des byung rnams pargya ste/ sa bye pa rnams gang bzhin bajud/ la ba chags dun pas cu/ nga sar shes pa rjid pa badzud// de lta gas kyi ma rnye pa dag nga/
196b6(rnying rgyud): sbyin yi sa// sa ba mkhyen cing gsan pa dang / ye shes sa rnams dbang po shos hU~M 'phrul ba ni bas dru ldan// thogs med 'i skyes 'dral na/ rdzu phral na 'dzi napas na/ mang bdi kyi 'khor bgrang po
196b7(rnying rgyud): dbang po'i rgog// hU~M mi ldan ni nam ngag pas// dade lal pa drim med// thams cad gsamapa pa zhes rkyen// gas pa dkyil por mthong ba nga ban // da na kyi gnas dran pas// sa yang das la 'ang lags te// / gnas dpa
197a1(rnying rgyud): dran pa'i dbang tho shog/ sbyapha rol sems rnams mngon shes pas// lha yi dgongs par ldangs lem khyen// mchags skyon bral pad+ma'i dpe bzhin// spyod kyis mgoms le mkhyen pa rab pa dra nadu/ tun maN+Dal ba
197a2(rnying rgyud): trA~M yi ge 'aku lnga ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas lnga yi che ba'i rgyan// 'phrul ye shes rigs lnga'i sangs byas te// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang thob shog/ oM AHhUM swA hA// rtog tshogs ma lus rnams spangs nas// dbyings spyod kyi ling long dam par
197a3(rnying rgyud): gsal// sangs rgyas rgya gnyis rigs su gnas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang thob shog/ dz+nyA na maN+Da la hUM a// hUM 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo las byung ba// skyang dang spel ba'i las byas nas// khro mchog 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dang
197a4(rnying rgyud): thob par shog/ badz+ra kro ta dz+nyA na maN+Da la hU~M a/ thugs rje rten gyi ye shes dbang brgyad la// dpal be'u 'bar ba'i rin chen la// ye shes lnga yi thig le 'bar// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal ba'i ye shes te// ye shes sems dpa'i dbang thob shog/ gnya
197a5(rnying rgyud): naswa ta ma d+ha la hUM/ dpal be ye shes sgo srung ni// zla ga ma 'od kyi thig le che// 'bar ba'i ye shes rta mgo lnga// rta mgrin dbang gi sku thob shog/ ha ya grI ba ma d+ha la hUM a/ khams gsum ma lus rnam par rgyal// don gyi ye shes thig le che// sangs rgyas
197a6(rnying rgyud): gi dbang gi mchog/ las las rgyal ba'i dbang thob shog/ kro ta ma d+ha la hUM/ hUM bde ba'i ye shes lhun gyis grub// ma btsal spyan rdzogs gsang ba'i ngang // 'bar ba'i yi ge sku dang ldan// lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ a d+hi pa ta maN+Da
197a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus d+hi gi sra// spra chen lha ni gsang ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas dab 'byams zos pa'i dpal// hUM gis las mdzad dbang thob shog/ hUM kro ta maN+Da la a/ hUM ngan song gnas rnams 'joms pa'i mgon// jo tshogs ye shes me ltar 'ang
197b1(rnying rgyud): gro 'du gsal ba ye shes pa// ngan song gnas stongs ye shes dbang thob gang // kro ta ga N+Da maN+Da ladz+ra/ hUM dung khrod chen mad+hUg tshogs// ye shes tho brgyad 'bar bze// thams cad ma lus 'joms pa'i tshogs// dUng skor rje chen dbang thob shog/
197b2(rnying rgyud): ma ma rdzam/ rdzogs pazhing 'dul chug ma pa zan// nan mongs bdud byeng bcomanas// be shes pan po 'ad las pa g.yos par// mi sbyang dul mang da pa na ya ba gag/ bta sgyu da drus/ mangs
197b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po nyid rdzogs// 'bar ba'i lha tshogs gsal bar bkod// thams cad ma lus dbang du 'dus te dbang gi rgyan du byas// thugs kyi pad+ma'i gdu nas// gsang ba'i ye shes 'od du 'bar// 'od kyi thig le tshom bu'i tsho gas// dam
197b4(rnying rgyud): ladangs pa'i 'od kyi 'grong dur gsal// sangs rgyas dbang gi dbang mchog thob par shog/ ha ya grI ba bid ma d+ha la bruM/ gnyis med gsang ba thugs kyi yum// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i gzi ldan pad+ma can// dkar dmar ye shes 'od kyi 'tshal
197b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs// yum chen gsang ba'i dbang thob shog/ gnya' na ma dz+wa la hUM a/ srid gsum sgrol zhing sangs rgyas las mdzad dam srung ma// gdul bya drag pos 'dul ba'i dbang mo ste// gsang ba'i las mdzad ma sri dbang rdzob shog/ ma ma ru tsam
197b6(rnying rgyud): la hUM/ gnyis med mkha' gsang dag pa las// byang chub sems ni drangs bstims te// byang chub sems kyi dbang bsrung bas// gyi shi med pa'i dbang thob shog/ po d+hi tsit+ta ma d+ha la hUM/ rim par bskur ba'o// rta mchog rol 'a'i tan+t+ra las/ lha dbang
197b7(rnying rgyud): bskur ba'i le'u ste don brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag/ tshe yi las rnams ma lus pa// tshe dpag med kyis bshad du
198a1(rnying rgyud): gsal// zhesags sa to// dbang gi rgyal pas bkub stsal hA/ nyon cig pad+galas kyi sems dpa' cha// tshul la sa rnams ngas bshad gyis// lags par nyan la med 'byung // gsung pa/
198a2(rnying rgyud): pa// nges pa'i tshe dang bstan pa'i tshe// don dam nges pa'i tshel ni// rig pa nyid la mchog nyid do// 'brel 'grib bden pa'i tshe la yang // don de nyid la rig par bya// dang po che 'di gnas par bya// rdzas la bston te bsgrub pa'o// ga rung dmar
198a3(rnying rgyud): bum pa ru// bur chad bgegs rnams bskrad byas nas// trAM las rin chen gzhal yas te// oM dang paM ni gdan dang bcas// snying po sngags kyis gsal ba ste// tshe dpag med ni dkar po la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis phyag rgya gas pa/
198a4(rnying rgyud): pa las mA~M yang gtso bo bzhin// bum pa'i mkha' la zla dkyil ga'u lta bu ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bu la// ga'u lta bur gnas pa ste// ma N+Dal gyen du blta ba'o// de yi dbus su a dkar gnas// A yu ga nya' na bin du zhes brjod pas/
198a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi gzugs brtan te// zla ba'i maN+Dal thig le wA bu s+t+waM// de ni A lu'i gnas nyid do// de yi phyogs bzheng rigs rnams de bzhin te// lha rnams rdzogs par gsal bar 'bar ba'o// zhi ba'i las kyis sgrub de bzhin// tshe dpag me
198a6(rnying rgyud): ni thob b+ha// blud mar gsal la 'tshor ba las// khro bo dmar po grangs med 'bros// drug gi gnas bcom tshwa la rang bzhin 'gug// de yi phyag rgya bzhis bkrug nas// lha rnams thug+sa kar gsal ba ni// dbang du bya ba zhes bya'o// de las yab yum sbyor ba yis// 'grol
198a7(rnying rgyud): gsal ra'i sbyor ba yis// btu drug zugam brgyad pa ltar// bsgyur ba A yu spel ba'o// de las rten rnams dmigs bya de la bstim pa la// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab ste// dbang du bsdu bstim phyag rgyas bsdam pa ni// do ni A yu swa ba'o// lha mo rnams kyis cho babya
198b1(rnying rgyud): sa// mtshan po lab su mthor b.las// thams dudas thung bal// dngas pa dang ba dang/ lasrab shes cag/ rnams tum man canan pa// dab man na gas gyu/ ta byan ya dad
198b2(rnying rgyud): don grub // / de nas yang drub bkyisapas pa das/ ban dang sa dang kyi bdag drung/ ces gso te// khyim bcom ldan gang gyi bdag/ rtab tu te du gas/
198b3(rnying rgyud): gags pa na /
198b4(rnying rgyud): sa / 'byung brji gas// stsal gas kyi sugashi // dmas pa shes pas // da
198b5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba ste// hU~M las rin chen gzhal yas khang // thalas du brjod 'bar za'o// ya~M las rtag sang ba ba ste// baMlas rnam po de bzhin dang // de las dpung chen ri ma du 'bar// hUM las thong 'bar phyogs bcur 'phrong // byin pa snga gzha
198b6(rnying rgyud): las// de'i sa gi rnal ba gasmra// la sa// sbyong ba men 'i ga gsapa// mashing mas khyong gyi srung ga lag/ ngadzin rjezung bcomamatshad sngag
198b7(rnying rgyud): sa na sa da ngas 'jug
199a1(rnying rgyud): sa /
199a2(rnying rgyud): sa//
199a3(rnying rgyud): sa
199a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
199a5(rnying rgyud): smra mas/ sa gang
199a6(rnying rgyud): sun su
199b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal pos bshad du gsol// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// long ba chen po 'di rnams ni// skul ba'i las rnams 'di ltar ro// skye dmar la dngas pa sprul pa'i sku// 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba'i mthu// khyab pa ye shes thugs thang rtsi// dang
199b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal bdud ci khyod la bstod// sprul pa ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// gdug pa long ba'i tshogs su sprul// long 'chen po sum cu gnyis// shar nas long ba brgyad byung ste// shel gyi sku lus ldem pa lnga// shing dkar dkar ni lde ma bu brkyang // tshi
199b3(rnying rgyud): su stag dgu re re chibs// g.yas pa brgyad na ljags kyu re re bsnams// g.yon pa brgyad na sbya re thogs// lcags kyus bzung nas sta des gsheg/ dbu la gza' rgod char du 'bebs// rdo rje rigs kyi las rnams mdzad// lho nas long ba brkya
199b4(rnying rgyud): byung ste// rin chen gser gyi long ba brgyad // chibs su gser kyi glang po che bas// g.yas pa brgyad na gser zhags ser po thogs// g.yon pa brgyang na gser gyi phur pa 'debs// ya ma gshin rje chang ltar 'bebs// rin chen rigs kyi phrin las mdzad/
199b5(rnying rgyud): nas long ba brgyad byung ste// rwag dmar po'i spu lus la// chibs su rba glang sngon po chibs// g.yas pa rin chen lcags sreg brgyad// g.yon pazangs kyi phung pa brgyad// dbul zangs stag char par 'bebs// pad+ma rigs kyi las mdzad pa// byang nas long
199b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad byung ste// chibs sug zu yi bya ba chibs// g.yas pa brgyad na g.yu yi dril bu 'khrol// g.yon pa brgyad na dril zhags 'phen// las kyi rigs kyi las mdzad ma// byed kyi phrin las rdzogs mdzad de// ye shes las mdzod khyed la bstod// ces gsungs so//
199b7(rnying rgyud): mchog rol pa'i tan+d+ha las/ long ba bskul ba'i le'u ste gya gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang drag po'i ling+ga bshad par bya// li na bca' ba'i mtshan nyid ni// marungs rdzas las grub pa ste// de la nus mthu yod pa ste// gangs kyi dum bu ru tshe'i phub// sug kha'i
200a1(rnying rgyud): mthong bu bdud rtse dang // mdzungs dang de rjes rnams// de la pa bya 'o// grog mkhangs dang dri mdzes// nga yang li ng+ga chu ru shas// da lta rdzas la 'an 6// lan yan lag nya gadzugs par bya'o// da
200a2(rnying rgyud): dgug bstim gsal// de la drag po'i las rnams bya// zhes gsungs so// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ling+ga la// de la ba la tshon sna lnga'i thungs// mkhar ni gasrud pa dag gis rgya sam bsdam// gtor mtsho kye dug rnams dang // mun pa
200a3(rnying rgyud): byad dmar la de bzhin bkyon// blag ma gru gsum nang du gzhug/ de ltar byas te las la sbyad// de yis drag po'i las rnams rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tang+ka las/ ling+ga dang drag rdzas brtan pa'i le'u skye gsul pa'o//
200a4(rnying rgyud): nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' yis// dbang gi rgyal la 'di skad gsol// kye ma dbang mchog he ru ka/ thams cad dbang gi lha zhes bya ba ji lta bu// dbang gi bdag pos bshud du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// pad+ma
200a5(rnying rgyud): po'i gzhal yas su// zla gam dmar dang 'od du bcas// nga d+ma 'bar ba'i gdan de ste// lha de la yang pad+ma'i gdan// dbus ni pad+ma brtsegs pa'o// de ltar dbang gi lha tshogs gsal bar bkod// sku mdog thams cad dmang rdo d+he// pad+ma me tog phung pos
200a6(rnying rgyud): bskor// g.yas pa thams cad lcags kyu le brgan cod pan can// g.yon pa thams cad bum pa tshe yis bkang ba'o// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyi// thugs kar dpal be'u bar zla gam// zla ga ma kha sprod de de la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khord re re la// tshe yi
200a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin yi ge a re gnas// dkar dmar 'od kyi thig la lnga lngas bskor// tshe yi nga bzhin 'od du 'khyil// bar na ta mgrin sems dpa' de// 'brel zhing bskor bas phyogs bzhi bsrung // de ltar lha rnams gsal ba la// tshe bsrung tshe dgug de la bstim/
200b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i mchog ma ched bang sbyin// 'dod pa'i mchog la yang bstan te// dkar dmar 'od kyi zhig med// 'dod pa de la rab bsgrims pas// 'dod pa deyi gnas chen pa// dkar dmar gyi
200b2(rnying rgyud): cha lus rgyas paste// bum la 'thilal mnyen la 'thil// tshu la gang gtams pa la// khro ba ni mamo pan mas bzung // tsha nagadas dngul ma// thug sa ba bas byas btab // sang+yas thas kyi ma gajigs pa/
200b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rgyamatshog rol pa'i tanA las/ sgrub pa'i 'i bzhipas/ danas pa ni bshad pa \u0f7f// chags kyang sro n+nata// sogacesanan// cho srog pa ma yi ga gsung // a dag gsu
200b4(rnying rgyud): ngam TI byeg la gnas// de ltar rtogs pas pa du bya/ med pa na dgas mas thong mdzad dang/ mig ze ma ba bzu dang // tshogs kyis pa ma nga
200b5(rnying rgyud): bla ma mnyes par bya 'i phyir// gdungs pa de dang gnangs bya// byang chub sems kyi dbang bzung te// gcog ba'i byang chub sems// grangs la de basbyin par bya// gsang ba gzhan labastan pa phrin// mi brang dpu nga ldan pa pa'o//
200b6(rnying rgyud): yang thu// 'dul lag sa la / dra bya ba / sa gdung ra/
200b7(rnying rgyud): mas dang pa
201a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa dbang gi dkyil 'khor la// dbang gi lha rnams dgod pa ni// dbyes kyi blag ma chen po la// dbang gi rgya lo padagod pa ni// gzi ldan pad+ma gtso dang 'khril// 'khar lo rtsibs nang cu drug la// gol ma drug
201a2(rnying rgyud): rgya drug/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi la sogs te// brda drug rim par dgod par bya// phyi yi pad+ma sum cu rtsa gnyis la// long ba sam cu rtsa gnyis dgod// gru chad bzhi dang phyogs dag la// khyi brgyad tshogs ni dgod par bya// de yi phyi rim gru bzhi la//
201a3(rnying rgyud): spyang brgyad dag ni dgod par bya// byams la ma mo rnams ni dgod// sgo bzhir khro bo mgo brtsegs dgod// gtso bo'i zur brgyad mdun rgyab zur bzhi la// btul zhugs chen po bzhi ni dgod// de ltar bkod la bsrub pa ni// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal
201a4(rnying rgyud): ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste gya drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ dbang gi lha rnams bsgrub pa la// gyen gyi dkyil 'khor dgu po
201a5(rnying rgyud): la// bsgrub pa bya na ji ltar bya// rdzas dang bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bcu bdun la// rgyu dang tshad ni ji ltar lags// dgod pa'i rim pa ji ltar sbyar// las kyi dkyil 'khor brgyad cu la// bya ba'i thabs ni ji ltar lags/ lha dang dkyi
201a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// las kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dgu po la// las ni rnam pa dgu ru yod// rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lha grangs
201a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin// spar dang stod dang bsgrub pa ste// las de bsgyur cing bya ba'o// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bcu bdun la// phyi nang gsang ba bsgrub pa'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor brgyad rdul// ji ltar 'dod par las rnams rdzogs par sbyar// rta dang gdan la sngags
201b1(rnying rgyud): te// yig bcu'i tshul du dgod pa'o// de ltar gsal bar bkod pa ni// dbang gi sgra tshogs ma lus la// dkyil 'khor brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyis// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsrub// zas gsungs so// rta bzlog rol pab tu tu las/ dkyil
201b2(rnying rgyud): dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gyi bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// dbang gi lha rnams bsgrub pa la// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i bsgrub pa gces// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i bsgrub pa ni// ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa de sa/
201b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro dbang mo de rnams bsgrub// dkyil 'khor thig bzhi le'u tshe dgu// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o// dbus su dbang gi rgyal po'o// phyogs bzhi ling tshe bzhi la ni// g.yas kyi mkha' 'gro bcu drug bkod// zur gyi ling che bzhi la ni// g.yon gyi mkha
201b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro bcu drug dgod// sgo la de bzhin khro ba'o// de la sngags dang tshig bskul bas// nang gi tshul du bsgrub par bya'o// ba spu khab kyi dkyil 'khor nas// mgo brnyan gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'byung // sha dang khrag la rngam pa'o// stag dang seng ge bya rog
201b5(rnying rgyud): stobs la rmi go bu brgyan// srin mo'i gdong la lha mo'i ngang tshul can// la la long ba mche ba gtsigs// de ltar mkha' 'gro gsal bar bsam// gnan bsreg 'phang dang lan gsum sbyar// zhes gsungs so// sku las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro dang // las
201b6(rnying rgyud): dang khyad par rdzogs par bya// mkha' 'gro rnams la las gnyer gtad// sprin dmar 'khrig pa'i dkyil shed nas// gdug pa'i mgo brtan mang po 'phro// las bsgrub gsang ba'i dam bsrung tshogs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tar+b+ha las//
201b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ba rnams bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gya brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi lha// las kyi rnam pa ci zhig bya// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal
202a1(rnying rgyud): pa// mi dge gzhom par bya ba'i phyir// gnyis med gzi ldan pa rnams kyis// dran song gnas kyi khro mdzad de/ gzi ldan dpal gyi dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma dbang garga pral// rgyas rgya
202a2(rnying rgyud): pas mchod// phyi yi mchod pa tshig drug la// bro gu drug gi dbyangs kyis bya// glu yi yon tan dpag las 'das// grub pa'i glus ni thugs dam badz+rapa// tshangs pa'i glus ni zhib bams sbyong // gdung ba'i glu nim sring mnyes// kyi lus na
202a3(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma'i glus ni dgongs rgyud dgas la// hUM gi glus ni bdud bzhi dadul zhing 'gro 'du dakhrugs// klu drug rdzogs pa blta bar bzhag/ bro drug rdzogs pa de spyod lam bzhi// gan gyi thos ni byin rla bas che// dbang gi blos ni dug gsum 'joms// pad+ma'i sa
202a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa bde/ khri 'i drug tu che mas// la mun rnam 'a bya chags/ mo dbang gin pa na// ba shi yang du ba bzhin paganon// 'di ni gsang ba san// thugs mjug dasung ba'i snying me
202a5(rnying rgyud): dang mnyam sbyar bas// ma yi tshogs kyi 'du 'phro bsgom// rta bro 'khor cig dang po la// khro bo sprin gyis dbang bsdus na// dus gsum rgyal ba rol pa mdzad// ta bro 'khor ni gnyis pa la// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rigs 'dzin yun dang
202a6(rnying rgyud): rol pa mdzad// 'di ni sku gsung thugs kyi bro// pad+ma gar gyi thugs dam bskad// 'dul ba'i tho bzhi byung ba la// gsang ba'i gnas bzhi dag nas su// sprul pa chen po bzhi byung zhing // phyogs bzhi dag tu dro bzhi brdung // nub kyi phyogs su bro gcig
202a7(rnying rgyud): brdung // klu rnams 'dul ba'i thob che// byang gi phyogs su brog cig brdung // gnod sbyin bskal ba'i snying nas brdud// shar gyi phyogs nas brogacig bdung // drin 'dul ba'i thob che// sro gcig rtswa yi phyogs su 'jud // yul bum 'dul ba
202b1(rnying rgyud): bro bo che// ye shes bro gar chen po 'byung // mtshams nas bro bzhi mkha' las byung // yi ge bzhi las sprul pa brgyud// rdo rje'i phra ni shar nas brdung // rta li ni lho nas brdung // phur pa'i bro ni nub nas brdung // sprul ba bran byang nas brdung // byang sha
202b2(rnying rgyud): mtshams nas gzig gi mi chen brgyad// shar lho mtshams nas lcags kyi khyi yi dro// lho nub mtshams nas bse yi byan lag bro// nub byang mtshams sum che gtsigs phag gi bro// la lan byed chen po 'dul// la la g.yo 'dul med par gnon// yal
202b3(rnying rgyud): gyis dbang du sdud// la la drug gsum btson dar sbyor// la la phur pas dbyings su thebs// la la sbyor ba'i las rnams 'joms// la la nga rgyal gshog pa'i phyir// la la thams cad brtan par byed// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// tshom bu brgyad
202b4(rnying rgyud): ru gtams// rgyal ba kun nang mnyam par sbyor// kun tu bzang mo mkha' dbyings dag pa la// rgyal ba stong gi dkyil 'khor bcas// khro bo chen po'i rta bro ste// tshom bu bdun gyi phyogs mtshams su// la la ye shes rol pa'i bro// la la dpal gyi yongs spyod dro// la la
202b5(rnying rgyud): dbang gi yul gyi bro// la la thabs dang shes rab bro// glu ni blta ba'i rgyal po yin// bro ni phrin las chen po yin// tshig ni 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// dang po pad+ma rol pa'i bro// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis brdung // yum gyi mkha' dang sbyor ba'o// de nas shes rab
202b6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi tho// b+ha ga'i gnas nas rdo rjes bzung // de nas dbang po yul gyi bro// lha mo brgyad la thabs kyis sbyor// de nas gdul bya dbang gi tho// rta mgrin gyal pos 'khor la brdung // de nas mos pa bskyed pa'i gro// ma sring rgya mtsho'i 'khor la bzung // de nas gdug
202b7(rnying rgyud): byed thabs kyi phrin las zo// phyogs brdu ma lus dbang du phud// thabs dang shes rang ldan pa'o// gru brod dam tshig chen po yin// rtag par bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i phyir// bro ni bar chad med par brdung// lta ba chen po bskyed pa'i phyir// glu ni 'du 'bral med par blang // dkyil
203a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang la gsal ba'i phyir// tshig ni snying po 'dzab tu bzlas// phung po gtan nas gzhom pa'i phyir// bdud kyi tshogs la tho gcig brdung // sngon mongs gtan pa gzhom pa'i phyir// nyon mongs bdud la thog sa badrug/
203a2(rnying rgyud): lha yi bdud ni gzhom pa'i phyir// lha bdud tshogs la bro gcig brdung // skye shi med par bya ba'i phyir// 'chi bdag tshogs la dro gcig brdung // bdud bzhi gtan nas brlag nas ni// bde ba tshad med bzhi dang sbyar// dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// rta
203a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsum brdung bar bya// mnyes skong dgyes pa chen po'o// tshom bu lnga yi bro brdad pas// nyon mongs kyang bcad ye shes lnga// lu gu drud du spel bas mi 'phral gzungs// zhes gsungs so// ta mchog rol pa'i ti ng+ga las/ gla drang bro dang las kyi ltang dang gnas dang /
203a4(rnying rgyud): nges pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gya dgu pa'o// / de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal// dbang gi las mchog 'di dag la// ma dad klu rnams btul
203a5(rnying rgyud): baji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// kye ma pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' che// dbang gi lha rnams ma lus kyis// ma dang klu rnams btul ba ni// nub phyogs dbang gi zhing khams su// pad+ma bsil ba'i dur khrod du// dbang gi rgyal po
203a6(rnying rgyud): chen po des// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa gsum// sku yi sprul pa khro bo rnam rgyal te// gsung gi sprul pa rta mchog rkyal// thugs kyi sprul pa gsang chen gad pa// bse khrab srug po'i 'od zer las// ba se yi byan lag smug po gcig/ sprul pa chen po
203a7(rnying rgyud): mkhang la lding // ye shes sbyin la rin tshe ni mchu// gshog pa nyi khri lde stong la// bse yi khro mchog lnga stong gnas// bya bu lnga brgya sprul pa ldeng // ye shes dri med spyan dang ldan// zhe sdang 'thab sder me 'bar ro// de ni lding zhing 'dzum pa'i tshe// rta mchog rgyal pos
203b1(rnying rgyud): gsung ba'i dbyangs thos tshe// klu rnams ma lus dmyal thag gcod// dregs pa 'khor bcas dbang bsdus nas// thams cad dbang gis bsgral ba'o// zhes gsungs so// las kyi sems dpas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal po che// bla rnams ga
203b2(rnying rgyud): pa de dag la// rdzu 'phrul bstan pa ji ltar lags// rdzu phrul dbrog pa ji ltar bgyi// las kyi tha ma ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// klu rgyal chen po 'di dag gi// rgyal po brgyad ni rgyan duH// klu bran gzhal yas rkun
203b3(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul sngags kyi bden pas dbrog/ drag po dbang gi las byas na// ma bsgral kyang ni ldang mi nus// rdzu 'phrul mthu rnams sngags kyis bsdu ba'o// thams cad zhi bar bya'o zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+na las/ nyid kyi sku las sprul pa 'thon te/
203b4(rnying rgyud): grul sogs pa bskal ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dbos pa'i le'u ste dgu bcu pa'o// / de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan gsang ba dbang gi bdag/ bdag la sogs pa'i don slad du// chos thams cad
203b5(rnying rgyud): dbang gi zhing du yongs dag go// zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' che// chos thams cad dbang gi zhing du yongs su dag do// zhes
203b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni thams cad pa ba sems nyid de// lo ma chos ni 'bras bu'o// rtsa ba byang chub gnyis su med// gnyis med 'bras bu sems can 'di// kun la dbang bas dbang zhes bya// skyon gyis mgos ning yin te// kun tu rtogs pas yang dag go// snod ni sangs kyis zhing du
203b7(rnying rgyud): dag/ bcud ni byang chung sems su dag/ snod ni dung khrod gzhal yas khang // bzung ni brag 'thung phyag rgya'i tshogs// sdod bcud ye nas rnam dag pas// de las golas gang yang med// snod bcud gnyis ka byang chub sems// byang chub sems las ma gtogs med
204a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni thams cad rten// de ltar snang ba sems yin te// rtsa ba yang ni sems nyid de// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// ldan natha bsags pa'i bag chags sa la// thams cad
204a2(rnying rgyud): chos su mya ngan 'das// sems ni sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas sems su mya ngan 'das// dug gsum dag la sku gsung zhugs// sku gsung thugs kyang sems can mya ngan 'das// sems can thams cad mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas sems can mya ngan
204a3(rnying rgyud): 'das// rgyu 'bras sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas byang chub sems su 'das// byang chub sems las ma byung med// kun kyang byang chub sems nyid de// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas med// sangs rgyas nyid kyang med pa ste// sangs rgyas ming du btags pas
204a4(rnying rgyud): nor// ma nor ma bcos de nyid dang // rang phyung rang zhi bde ba la// ji ltar snang ba sems nyid de// sems nyid la ni dngos po med// dngos med dngos po de nyid don// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid sna tshogs cing snga
204a5(rnying rgyud): yang // chos kun byang chub sems su gnas// lha rnams so so'i snying po sde// de nyid byang chub sems chen po// byang chub sems su 'dus pa'o// rnam par mi rtog ye nas skye med cing // gzung 'dzin skyon bral mtha' gnyis ma chags dbyings// ye nas mnyam
204a6(rnying rgyud): nyid rang bzhin ji bzhin dang // rnam rtog spyon bral smra bsam yul las 'das pa ste// de ni byang chub sems chen po// yod pa dang ni med pa dang // rtag pa dang ni chad pa dang // dngos po dang ni mtshan ma dang // gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa brgyad// spros pa'i mtha
204a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad sems kyi sgo mo ste// de ltar gnas pa'ang ni sems kyi las// sems kyi yul ni nam shes brgyad// sems kyi 'bras bu sangs rgyas so// sems kyi rtsal spyod bsgrub pa'o// sems kyi gnya' gnon dam tshig go// lta ba gdeng dang ldan par blta/
204b1(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa sems kyi srog shing yin// thams cad skyed dang thams cad srung // thams cad gcig pa sems nyid do// da ltar byang chub sams can po// yod par srung bzung chub sems// chag par snang ba byang chub tums// gnyis ka yang ni sems cad
204b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dang ni sems nyid do// sems nyid la yang dngos po med// gang du yang ma sbas pas mthong ba nyid do// brjod du rdul tsam yang med pas// kun tu khyab pa nyid do// ma shes 'khrul pas sems can no// ci yang med pam shes rab po// dgrod du
204b3(rnying rgyud): pas mthar thug go// byang chub sems ni me long ltar// mnor ma bcos de bzhin te// rang byung rang bzhin de nyid de// skad cig ting 'dzin byang chub sems kyi don// rig pas mkha' la rlung gis sprin phyags ltar// sngon nas bsags pa'i bag chags sel// dpe
204b4(rnying rgyud): mun lung smon ba tags ltar// mun nyid snang bar gyur pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyi dan rig pas// 'dzin tog kun kyang byang chub sems sngags la// yod mtha' med mtha' de ru rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po zhes kyang bya// de ltar gnas de lta ba che// rtsod pa
204b5(rnying rgyud): ba nal yangs ba che// byang chub sems chen kun tu bzang // kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings// thams cad ma lus rdzogs pa cha// de ltar gnas pa phun sum bad// sems kyi sangs rgyas bde ba la// sprul pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nyan// zhes ga
204b6(rnying rgyud): rnamachog rol ba'i tAn+da lapa/ chos thams cad dbang gi zhing du yongs su dag pa dang sems su bstan pa'i la ng+yas go gcig pa'o// / de nas yang ni bshad byab// las kyi sems dpa' chen pa nyan// thams cad dbang du bsgru ba ni// thagam
204b7(rnying rgyud): gdangs pa'i rgyal 'khod du// dbang gi lharnams chang bar dgod// dbang gilas kyis thams cad 'gugs shing sbom// gdug pa shing gi sung bdag // tho ba sngags su dgrasu pa snams// gzhan yang dbang gi dal dgram la// dal las kyis thams
205a1(rnying rgyud): dgug/ spyan drang bzhugs dang phyag 'tshal mchod// smon lam btab la 'dad don gsal// lpags pa'i lha rnams gsal ba dang // bstad bcas las la bsgru bar// dbang spyad las kyi ting nga 'dzin du zhugs pa pa
205a2(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i dbang chen rnams kyang las la brtson// sum brgya drug cu bka' yi las la brtson// srin las mnyan pas 'khor du grags// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tat+tA las/ 'khor mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdu ba'i lo'u ste go gnyis pa'o//
205a3(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po bad+ma te ru ka la/ bad+ma las kyi sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dbang mchog dbang gi rgyal// ma rungs gdug pa krug nyan 'di// gzug pa che zhing ma rungs pa// 'byung po phal tsher kun gyi rten/
205a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung po kun gyi rten yin pas// 'di la gdul zabs ji ltar lags// dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsol cig/ ces smras so// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ ting 'dzin 'bum phrag gi nang nas/ dbang sdud las kyi ting
205a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang / 'joms byed 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gdug pa spa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rol pa khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
205a6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa dbye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rol pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtse gcig bsam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khyab byed sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos nyid mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'joms byed chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang
205a7(rnying rgyud): dkar bu ba drag po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ting nga 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnor gru'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gdal ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thugs rjes mi gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sprul pa gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
205b1(rnying rgyud): rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dang ba 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ste/ de'i nang nas klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul dbrog pa/ gdug pa can tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu klu de dag thams cad ma dang pa nyams/
205b2(rnying rgyud): 'phrul klu'i gdug pa thams cad chad de rgya gyu med/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad phrogs te nyams par gyur to// de nas yang slar dran pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdug pa klu'i bu 'di la/ 'di lta bu'i las 'di byung ba ci/ zer nas
205b3(rnying rgyud): yang lus 'di thams cad gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mgo stong lnga brgya rang gis sbreng ba'o// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ drag pa'i sgosgrol sngags 'di brjod de// oM nA ga du wAr/ nA ga du gyur/ a lo ka ta la pra be sha phaT/
205b4(rnying rgyud): ga wAn ba su b+han d+ha pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bAn grI ba ro sha pra be sha phaT/ oM ru ru s+phu ru ta sha ma ru ra ka ti bi tsa bruM shi laM ru ru dra e h+ye hi sa ma ya ma tad pra be sha pra ta da dza le yaM ha ha hi hi hUM phaT/ oM ba hu bin d+ha nA ga bin du nA ga hi ra ya/ nA ga dung dung pra be sha phaT/ ha he hUM
205b5(rnying rgyud): be sha phaT/ d+ha ga wAn/ hrIHhrIHpra de sha phaT b+ha ga bAn/ rag sha pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bA na/ nA ga le nA ga le/ dum pa le du ma pa le/ a ka le a ka le/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta le/ a kar ba in+d+ra pra ba sha phaT/ dung bram dung bram/ pra ma pram phaT nA ga kar
205b6(rnying rgyud): tIk+Sh+Na hu ya sa me ru ni kar sha ya/ nAM ga pra ma pra ma shag/ nA ga ge rams dpra ga ma ta nA ga hu ra pra be sha ya dza/ zhes brjod pas/ klu de dag thams cad bsgral te/ phung po zhabs dmar po brgyad kyi 'og tu dar gcig bcug/ de nas slar yang ston te/ sbrul ma ga
205b7(rnying rgyud): nas bzung ste klad la bskor na dmyal zag bcad do// dar tsam du slar sos pas/ nyam thag par gyur nas da ci bskal ba'i klu'i gzugs dang ro de gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du bor ro// de nas klu de rnams slar sos pa'i gzugs can klu rnams/ phyag bcu drug gi ga
206a1(rnying rgyud): pa brgyad kyi dang por dga' bo gzung ngo // gnyis par nye dga' bo gzung ngo // gsum par klu'i rgyal po stobs ldan gzung ngo // bzhi par legs ldan gzung ngo // lnga par sog ma med gzung ngo // drug par mtha' yas so//
206a2(rnying rgyud): bdun bar dung skyong ngo // brgyad par pad+ma'o// g.yon pa brgyad du/ dang po mgo dgu pa'o// gnyis par mgo lnga pa'o// gsum par chu lha'o// bzhi par ka ra ko Ta'o// lnga pa ba ru Na'o// drug par klu gdol pa'o// bdun par klu ma go/ gsum pa'o// ba
206a3(rnying rgyud): par gdol pa nag po'o// de rnams phyag mtshan du bsnams pa'o// bar bar na yang klu bran kyang 'dus pa min no// de nas yang klu rnams dmyal thag bcad cing dbang du bsdus te/ gshog pa g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdengs/ bar bar zla ba dang nyi ma stong stong gis
206a4(rnying rgyud): gshog pa'i bar de de nas/ gnam lcags kyi mchu dang / phyogs kyi sder mo byung / gshog pa g.yas g.yon gyi rtse mo nas/ sprul ba'i bya khyud re re gtibs te long pa/ byu ru'i rkang pa la lcags kyi sded mor yod pa/ mig me dang chur yod pa/ de ltar sprul nas
206a5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i klu rnams bzung zhing zos so// pags pas rgyal mtshan byas/ sbrul mgo thams cad bregs nas gshog pa la brgyan pa/ gti mugadag par byas pa'o// de nas klu gnyan thams cad sdigs pa'i sngags ni dbang gi rgyal po'i sku dang gsung las 'thon to//
206a6(rnying rgyud): oM nAM ga pa sha he ra he shag tshal bu ram sad/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang kluganyan thams cad bskul ba'i sngags 'di 'thon to// oM nA ga nyes pa ram duM pa le sang / pra me sham sa da/ nA ga ter mdun ru khA lo rbad/ mar leng sad na rbad ya/ de ni bsadapa
206a7(rnying rgyud): sngags su gsungs so// de nas yang grug tan rnams gso ba'i sngags 'di 'dzin to// nA ga pa sha pra ti ba la ma/ thunams gso ba'o// de nas yang klu dang 'byung tshor gcad pa'i sngags 'dig sung ngo // oM pa gaR+Sha gadzi la matang shag gnas ma ya k+ShahA/
206b1(rnying rgyud): sata par ti he ra sad bAn h+ya la/ thams cad char bcad bsrung ba'o// de ltar dbang gi rgyal po bad+ma dbang chen das/ gdug pa'i ru tshogs tshar bcad de bskal nas/ lA la gdan du byer/ lal phyag mtshan du bsnams byung// la la N+Da la mtshan du btsugs
206b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// la la las la btsud pa'o// de nas gsos nas srar bkod pa'o// de ltar bsrung ba dang tshar bcad pa dang / sprul pa yan chad dbang du bsdus te/ gru rgyal 'bum gyis dbang gi sgo bsrungs pa'o// klu dang gnyen gyi rje rnams kyang shin tu ston pas gsungs
206b3(rnying rgyud): la rjes su yi rang nas/ mgu ba dang rangs pas kun nas khyab pas kun gyis ston pa la bltas te gnas so// hA mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gru gnyan dbang du bsdus shing bsngal nas las la bsko ba dang tshur brjid bsrung ba'i sngags gsungs pa'i le'u
206b4(rnying rgyud): go gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka la/ las kyi rgyal po dang / pad+ma sems dpa' dang / phyag na rdo rje dang gsum gyis zhus shing don gtan la dbab pa ste/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas
206b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i yab// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i mchog/ bcom ldan yab las bdag nyan 'tshal// 'dus par chos kyi rnam grangs gsung // zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan dbang mchog des// sde med chos kyi dbyings chen nas/
206b6(rnying rgyud): 'gag pa med pa'i srung mtshon nas// sprul sus 'gro don mdzad pa'o// de nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje la sogs nyon// chos kyi rnam grangs dbye bar bya// chos kyi rnam grangs dbye ba la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs
206b7(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa bsam me dzad // thugs ninam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra // nam mkha'i dbyings la dpag tu med// dpag med pas ma las 'das pa'o// thugs ni dpag par dka' bayin// su dang gsung yang de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgengs
207a1(rnying rgyud): pa yang // dpag par dka' bar gsungs pa ste// de bzhin gsung gi chos 'di la// skra dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// de yi rnam pa bshad pa ste// dbye ba'i rnam grangs dpag dka' yang // bkun gcig las meng par
207a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la// ma nor rtogs na blta ba yin// ma nor pa dang ma bcos pa'i// ngang la gnas na bsgom par bstan// lta ba ma nor gdeng du gzhag/ bsgom pa ma bcos ma yengs pa// phrin las rol pa ma 'gags pa
207a3(rnying rgyud): yon tan zad med gter dang ldan// gsang sngags bsgrub par bstan pa ni// lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // dbang dang dam tshig shes pa gces// sangs rgyas 'dod pas spong bar bsgom// stong pa'i ngang las ye shes ste// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// 'gag
207a4(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i ye shes shar// skye 'gag med pa'i chos kyi sku// chos kyi sku yang sems yin te// sems nyid ye shes shar ba'o// nam mkhas gar khyab sems nyid de// sems kyis gang khyab nam mkha' yin// ci snang cir srid cir bsgo ma kyang /
207a5(rnying rgyud): sems la ma rdzogs ye shes med// thams cad sems nyid dang du shar// lta ba nam mkha' 'dra ba la// spyod pa yang sa dag med par spyod// rdzogs kyab rang byung ye shes yin// gcig dang du ma'i sgra las 'das// sems nyid kun tu bzang po la/
207a6(rnying rgyud): sbyar brjod kyang g.yod med// de ltar rtogs na rdzogs pa'o// gsang ba yang ni brjod pa yin// byang chub sems ni rmad du byung // rmad byung byang chub sems chen la// rig pa ye brdal chen po yin// sems nyid rang byung ye shes yin// rig pa'i ye shes
207a7(rnying rgyud): sposlong brdal bas// brdal ba chen po'i chos nyid gang // ngang la mi g.yo bsgom pa yin// de las bsgom du med pa ste// ngang las ma yengs gnas par bya// kun bzang bde chen lhun grub pa// rig pa'i ye shes sems nyid de// ma bsgoms bzhag na bsgom pa
207b1(rnying rgyud): yin// ma btsal ba nyid rtsol nyid yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud chen po las// lta ba bstan pa'i ladu ste go bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang ni gsol ba'i don/ dbang gi rgya
207b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje las kyi rgyal// pad+ma sems dpal la sogs nyon// chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa ni// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la goms par bya'o// lam gyi 'bras bu 'thob pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bzung zhig/ skyon gyis ma gos
207b3(rnying rgyud): 'thob pa'o// mngon par shes pa bsgom pa sgoms shig/ dngos grub thob cing nyes pa med pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bzung zhing rig par gyis shig/ golas med pa 'thob pa'o// gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rtog cing spyod la reg par gyis shig/
207b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu re dogs med par 'thob pa'o// byang chub phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la nye bar spyod cig/ 'gag pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la spyod cig/ thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa bsgoms pas 'bras bu ma spangs gnyis med pa
207b5(rnying rgyud): ro la phyin pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas chags med ye shes chen po 'thob/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba'i ngang gi ye shes 'thob/ bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas mi g.yo ba shes 'thob/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
207b6(rnying rgyud): rol tu phyin pas bya ba nan tan ye shes 'thob/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gsal la rtog med ye shes 'thob/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas me long lta bu'i ye shes 'thob// stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'thob/ smon
207b7(rnying rgyud): lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gsal la rtog med chos kyi ye shes 'thob/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes 'thob/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pas gsal dag ye shes 'thob pa'o// pha rol phyin pa'i don shes na/ sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal mi dgos
208a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa gnas// thugs kyi mdo las chog gi// yan lag nam grangs dag pa yis// gang la thogs pa med pa yin// zhes gsungs so// tam tsha garol pa d+hAlas/ chos kyi ma grangs brtan
208a2(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa/ gas 'a
208a3(rnying rgyud): byung ba las// bral sngags drag po 'di rnams su dang gsung thugs las 'thon to// oM ya ma kram her na 'dun san r-i ngaM raM/ ba sha ru tri sa ma pra be sha phaT na nA ya/ ka le ma ai ne sa da ram/ kha la ngur bas da dr-i ti pra ma yas ma ya shi kar 'ang/ ya /
208a4(rnying rgyud): ma tham pa shA na/ klul mdun dun rnam pa/ mjug lang sad ha sa d+hig rbad/ b.ris tas kyi thu ma/ sa ton ma shas ma thung mA la/ gam par te/ pra sha da ma/ ying nad la/ bdud rigs bcu gsu mad las bsgral// dam
208a5(rnying rgyud): nas sngags 'di brjod/ oM nA gA bin du gra he nan/ tra sa bso sad na ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ro sha tsa lid/ stim sta ban d+ha ban khang ri sad/ nA ga ru ya pri sha saM/ keng du kram na sha ma khyer ya/ pra sha laM sad ma phro ro nga ya/ nAgs ma ya~M dun pa ro sad lam ya/ da
208a6(rnying rgyud): kra ma d+ha ga se se san yaM/ dum pa ling dum pa ling / pradad tshwal khal te sad lam/ nA ga shag tshal/ he ra la tid yanan/ nAgs ngu ram/ pra ma r+tha maM/ mu tsal mAr tsas to rA ga pri ya/ bu di ri ngam du/ ken+d+ra ga u lu rbad/ nA ga mu sha ba laM Sha /
208a7(rnying rgyud): nags dro ba la/ nyes par ma yan mdun ni na gyi byas ya/ praM ya waM ya/ mur brel/ tsata tsa ta mung galing nan/ du ni dun nA shag nA gsas grang sa de/ de yis gdug pa'i zla gtan bsgril// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'dron/ aH ba tsi la sham ya ling /
208b1(rnying rgyud): yA/ thal za mA ya ya rbad na ling / sa ma ya dur tri hes rbad ling ya/ slar cal lag ga rAg ga stad+ha ni/ tshal pa chal pa/ zang su rbad su/ khad dang kha 'drar/ mur g+ha lang ya/ de yis gnod sbyin ma rungs bskal// da ma thag nas sngags
208b2(rnying rgyud): 'ding pon// oM skad du sra ma lam pa/ shanan thAs ya ki le he yA/ tsi ta ka laM sum kr-i kr-irbad y-i// ba la rba 'i mur tshwa kha ladun/ sha le phrag pa pa/ dir dar/ ra tsa dra la tham sa ya/ pre ka na sad de ni sarbad na 'di/ dI ye'i bza'
208b3(rnying rgyud): dang sngar ma bsgral ba yin// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'thon// oM tri shA tsa pA la gug tsar ling / ha ma pa sha dur yang pra pi sha laM ba ya/ kha laM mur ti sa ni sad/ trI ling rbad/ gung lund la/ dzu ba shaM rbad/ ti sa d+hu rbad ya/ i la ta da/
208b4(rnying rgyud): ma sngon ni med pa/ dmis 'byung snyothams cad brnam// de nas pang byed kyi nga gsung dang thugs lapa sngags 'di rnams rtson to// bra shag gdus / mur bulas du la mdu du phyir/ rnas pa rnas pa/ zur ba shas la/ batsha
208b5(rnying rgyud): zad/ ra tsa a ti ba la rbad chad/ oM sang kar du ya ma du ri ya/ zhes rgyal po'i rigs thams cad bsgral lo// de nas yang nyid kyi su dang gsung dang thugs las sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// oM tsa tso ba'i grig li di/ tsag sha kur pa sha ya/ mar ba shan ma
208b6(rnying rgyud): yA/ sad+d+ha pa sha la tsar 'ad ma?/ ka taka te mu tsacag sha rbad ya/ phra mgur du ling ya/ sang du ma pa gzad na ling la/ kha yad na du mur yaM/ pratA TA/ la ta sa sad/ shral d+ha ka li la/ tsa pa sha na dA ya/ mung ti btang ma rang bti/ sar+b+ba ma
208b7(rnying rgyud): drug / sang+yas ma mings/ 'a ga za tsam 'i/ ma ga zugs me/ sa te ring da zu sapa da 'i/ doni can myo gas thams cad phrul 'o// spro rdzags da rnapas kyi / rjegs pa dag sa cad drul
209a1(rnying rgyud): sa nan / masus na tu nal chun
209a2(rnying rgyud): bon pa la rtse gadrug // / de nas yang yang gal bo theg sung rdugs pas/ 'byung ba rdzing ma yang / gaman+ta / ba kyis ga ste/ ya da da/
209a3(rnying rgyud): sam mjug/ dum ma ma btang nga/ rtsol tsi la/ phung bzung ba/ sham pa dgag mang la thung la/ ta leH le/ kab pe bri btu / dan don kyis ston pa/ 'dzin bye ba rgyad kyi ba lags 'artson pa/
209a4(rnying rgyud): che zeng / bcu na ma ladum shed dang / gad se d+hA me te ji la dzang / grwa brnyan ti nga mdzad/ gzur 'khri la yongag pa'i la zang / sna bani gang 'i ri la dzad/ gdang / rje ma pa po la bad/ sa su gi yo da ka
209a5(rnying rgyud): ba rbad/ de nas spang cad kyi gas 'thor te/ yong yis drag ling cad/ gaunagag yo seM drag meng da / tsag shag sa/ na dang / mu te ka mra li thung nad / sa ta sa ta the bang / gad sham 'i ling dzad// khu ye shwa pa zad/
209a6(rnying rgyud): lus tsam zed dang / de na snyayang po ba tu spel dum rda rtsa gnyis kyi ga dgas 'don te/ oM li ba la drung / kha rol rjed/ pa shi'i rbad/ sum pa sde'i rbad/ kang sha'i rbang / gung bi'i drud/ cing te'i zad/ 'bru'i'i zad/
209a7(rnying rgyud): kyi long babargyad kyi'o// oM da king zad/ mu ka li nad/ sum pa she le rbang / mu ba li drang / ke tsa'i rbad/ gag le rbad/ gson sug li dzang / yu ta'i rbad/ lho long ba brgyad kyi'o// pad d+ha'i zad/ mu la'i rbad/
209b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa li rbud/ kang ka li Ta / khaSh+ka lI rbad/ sa ba tsa'i zad/ klang gi li rbad/ nub kyi long ba brgyad kyi'o// karma bar yi rbad/ thag na le nad/ sum pa'i zad/ bcang nal zad/ hasa? pi 'i nang/ kaN dza ling zad
209b2(rnying rgyud): mi'i rbad/ mu la tsa'i zad/ byung gi long ba brgyad kyi'o// de nas yang dbang phyug ma nyi shurtsa brgyad gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsabagyad du sprul nas/ las la dbang ba'i dbang dpal gyis bskur te/ drag sngags 'di rnams kyi sgra brjod do// au me lI 'dra/
209b3(rnying rgyud): drung / gab li rbad/ trang sa li rbad/ mud tsa rbad/ su kha ye rbad/ ha e rbad/ re tri rbad/ ha sa rbad/ shr-I rbad/ bai rba na rbud/ ti ri nad/ kha ro rbad/ ma ke rbad/ ba tri rbad/ kha ta rbad/ ha sa li zad/ ka mA li zad/ si pa li rba
209b4(rnying rgyud): ba ro zad/ da lo rbad/ hri marbad/ kar sha rbad/ tsa ka rbad/ muka rbad/ ra ti ma rbad/ ga ro rbad/ sha la ma ti rbad/ seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sngags de rnams 'thon to// de nas yang khro bo mgo dgu brtsegs la sogs pa bzhi'i sngags 'di rnams
209b5(rnying rgyud): krota ti ri ling zad/ kro d+ha lug ling rbad/ kro ta maM ngaM ti rbad/ kro d+ha ka rag ma paM ril zad/ slob mgo brtsegs pa khro bo'i sngags de rnams 'thon to// de ltar yang drag sngags 'di rnams gsungs so// de nas yang gsang ba yum gzi ldan pad+ma can la sogs
209b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i yum rnams kyis/ mdad pa chen po de'i yum dang / 'khor gyi rig ma la sogs pa marungs pa gdug pa'i mtshon thogs pa marungs pa'i sgra byin pa de dag bskal ba'i phyir/ drag po sgrol ba'i sngags 'di rnams 'dzin to// oM ka ma ni lam matas pra sha ya/
209b7(rnying rgyud): kai ta tsita mang li/ gas pa rod dngo ma mdum pa ling / ha sas duM pa sha lings pa/ pa tsa rags ma la/ sa du pas ngam 'aM kha li ter rbad ya/ ma mdum du ma ling ya ya/ bum pa bum pa zad/ mu long rdobs ya/ ka lams pa pra ka li rbad ya/ ru ti has
210a1(rnying rgyud): dug ga nga na dang/ sa pa dag/ rgyunang na// /
210a2(rnying rgyud): da' du shes ci 'a'abor rnams kyi sdug pa 'di rnams na to// yong du bar ra ba ngabyadun b+ha stopar dun 'i dzis du pa brnam pa ni skyes tsal/ drag pa gas de rnams 'thon to// dag pa'i sdigs de che rnams kyis dadug pa da bab ba
210a3(rnying rgyud): da sa ba dag smras ga pa de ba bar rnyed do// zhes su sa pa so// margyag ma na te/ mas kyi rgyas bdun pa'i go na denas ni rgyas rjesu bad / ces ga pa
210a4(rnying rgyud): me dang chen 'dus pa'i gas// spangs rgyas thun gyi rangab dzin pa// gsung mchog dam pa'i na sgrub / sangs kyig kun 'dang gcos bdag tan ci/ gis gas papas/ dbang girga la pos 'di da sug / na ci/ sas padang du
210a5(rnying rgyud): smra / pa na// 'gas pa zhi kyim sa ba // gsum tshabadrim pa pa 'an/ bajug/ du gcod pa grags
210a6(rnying rgyud): byang nga legs sas 'byung ba sa/ ya zu tshan // pa u kyis 'gyur ba yin/ chub pan ga pags byung//
210a7(rnying rgyud): ses dpa gas pa'i bdag/ dbangagis rnams bsgrib pa la// dra su tshogs parjon pa \u0f7f/ matog kyi na can tha~Mng // 'bru zhing mams la rnams dag gnas// ga na sa sakyings pa da // mni bad+ma ca
210b1(rnying rgyud): stsa// ga smra san/ sa/ du rdzu du/ su // dad sa
210b2(rnying rgyud): lamadzes pa pong gas la// de'i gi ste gang de/ rkyen cig su ni sdig dad/ dang po mchod pa ngas kyang dadrung // byin rnab pa nga de sgride nyid dzin dmigs ma sa grub// ts+tshang+ga yin rjod pang/
210b3(rnying rgyud): rnam \u0f7f'i sra brjod pas// sgrub pa'i spyi rje gas la bar bskyed// de las rig pa byang chub sems// dmadal ba pa'i hUM du gsal// de la bskyed rdzogs tshig kyang brjod// hUM las 'byung ba'i yi ge rgyad// de las 'byung ba'i ma yang bsnyam// de'is hU~M ma cha dang
210b4(rnying rgyud): sa ni 'bar pa'i gzhal las bsgom// nang du khrod chen po te// gdug pa bskal ba'i zod lpags mdzes// ka ba ka zu ga gden dang // gdung dang lham dang dral dag dang // tshil mtshan la sogs de bzhin te// dregs chen kun bsnol gdan tshogs dang
210b5(rnying rgyud): spyi zla bad+mar bcas pa'o// de la dbang gi lha bskyed pa// de yi steng du hUM mang de// pad+ma d+ha ra'i lo ta shI te rug grang grang krung kyang krang krang klung grang zhes brjod pas/ dbang chen pad+ma he prak+Sha/ su Tu ru'i sdong bu 'dra ba/ phyag bcu drug pa dbu lnga pa/ zhabs dpa
210b6(rnying rgyud): byabargyad drug tams pa/ keng rdo nus pa'o// 'bar pa'i gshog pa bzhis brtson pa/ gshig pa'i rje gnyis lam du sa mtshan pa/ de ga/ ngags pa pa'i dbye can gyi la bu la/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sems dpa' dang sems
210b7(rnying rgyud): thob dang bcas pas bsko pa/ du dkyi 'kho gas papa// bang rdzu ga yong grong grog pa'i ban pal bdag hU~M ste/ dbyi bdag padri byed pacad bu'i ga gtangs pa/ rnabag tu mig
211a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang bzhin/ rgya'i lha mo bzhi gsung sbyin pa/ tshe dang dbang rlung gi sgra babyung ba/ rmugam sgo gcig pa'i chung na bzhugs pa/ snyam bzhi dang bcas pa gas la ban// byings ma du ba da
211a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas bzhi badz+ra rtsa gnyis bzhugs pa'o// thugs gan ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ snying po sngags kyis bskor ba yum dang bcas pa ste/ de ni ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro//
211a3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyag ni g.yas g.yon dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i khrag 'thung lnga bcu brgyad// dbus ni zlum po pho brang la// de dbus bla gam sgo gcig pa// zlum po'i 'khor lo tham gyibs brgyad te// phyi rol grwa rgyad gru ba'i sgo dang bca
211a4(rnying rgyud): de la khrag 'thung lha tshogs gsal// gsal lo ming nge gsal ba'o// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas gshog pa g.yas g.yon dbus pa ni// dbus ni zlum por bskor ba li// tham bla gam bcwa brgyad// gru chad bzhim ng+ge dang bcas/
211a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi phra men bskor ba'o// rdo rje khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor ro// lte ba ngan song spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbus su zlum pos bskor ba la// tham zla gam bzhi yis bskor// de la rtag pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid 'bar// 'khor bzhi gco
211a6(rnying rgyud): bcas pa dgod// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor te// dbus kyi zlum pos bskor ba las// thig bzhi btab pas ling tsho dgu// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la ni// pho brang de res bskor ba'o// gru bzhi sgo dang @
211a7(rnying rgyud): bas// de la yig dgod pa no// pad+mal ma mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'o// de ni dung khrod can po dkyil 'dzir ro// d+he mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// zhabs kyi 'og tu gsalab ste// thig bzhi btabags yang che dgu// nang du zag mar yis bsko
211b1(rnying rgyud): glu rbad gu 'gi sgo dang brdas// dal zab pa cu mnan // ts+li chags 'bar ba'i dkyilang khor \u0f7f// sal bar ni gsal nag// rdu mdzad dran pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zhabs kyi 'og tu gsal ba ste// dbang chen skra ya la brgyad do// gcig tu bsnga
211b2(rnying rgyud): nam gcig tu gsal ba ni// rigs bsdus spyan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// yul gzi ldan pad+ma can gyis thugs ka nas 'dud pa dang 'khril ba dang sbyor bar gnas pa ni/ gsang ba yabal sbyor ba'o// da ltar baN+Dal zhugs chen po bzhi dang / phra ma
211b3(rnying rgyud): ma kha mgyi mo drug kyi spyang dang long ba dang khro 'i mgo brtsegs kyis bskor ba'o// rin po che'i khri rkang gi bar na dbang phyug ma gcer gyi sang ga nyi shu rtsabargyad gzhug bsngal du 'dogs so// de ltar gsal ba rA/ thugs kan rten la hu lu lig 'bru bcu gsum gyis ba
211b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// da la 'di skad brjod do// hUM su bzhi gcig tu bsdus pas kun tu zhal// phyogs pani rigs pazhi 'bar ba'i skur bstan pas// spyi mthon lnga lngar snang yang nam mkha'i gyen du ston// rigs kyi dpang rnams rdzogs pas thams cad ma lus slob//
211b5(rnying rgyud): ngo chen po brgyad kyi snyed// chad par bcu gnas nang du bsres te gsol// byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i tshul mnga' ba// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// be con rje'u chung dang shel gyi rde'u chung 'dzin// zod rlon khrag dang nang du bsres te gsol/
211b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi rgyun du d+h+r-i gi b+ha sgrogs pas// rdo rje byin chen 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ gdu bu dpud rgyan sbrul rtag mi srun pa// hUM gi sgra sgrogs bskal pa'i me lce 'dra// sdigs mdzub rtse las bskal pa'i me 'bar bas// ma rig rmongs pa'i mun nag 'thib po se la// mi ldogs
211b7(rnying rgyud): la lazhi ba 'dren pa'i rtags// thabs kyi gags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje rin chen las byung gshig pa ni// nyi ma steng gis brgyan pa'i the'u gshog can// zhe sras dbang dang mngon spyod phran las kyis// thams cad bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol// dbang
212a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnon po stag gi chas// nog dug zlog byed rgyu bye lcags kyi chas// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje 'chol ba'i chas// dbang gi bse khrab sdug po gze bar chas// dpa' brjed mnyen lkug sbrul nag 'grel ba'i chas// dam
212a2(rnying rgyud): gsal dbang phyug za byed ting 'dzin pa che ba'i chas// mthing ga le brgan bu ken dar gyi can/ gcan gzan rgyal po gtum pa gzig gi chas// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi brgyad du yang // 'dul ba'i zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams brgyad du bsrang // snying gar
212a3(rnying rgyud): mkhrig ma nub cid sbrul tshig khong du 'joms// sdug bsngal ha ma thag 'bod sgrob skad chen 'byin// oMn+da sha smr-i d+ha ni/ a ga sha sum d+ha ni/ gar ni sha d+h+waM kA ra pra be sha phaT/ gan da gan ta hUM/ tsits+tshats+tshin+te kro d+ha ni kro d+ha ni DI/ de ltar phyag rgya chen po ga
212a4(rnying rgyud): bar bskyed// hUM dbang gi rta gdong phrin las mgyogs pa'i mthu// ye shes skyer mgyogs shes rab rtsal gyi pha rol phyin// rtsal gyi rlabs kyis sa gsum cig car gnon// 'tsher skad gdangs su snyan bas gsang ba'i thugs dam 'phrul/
212a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i Sha rtsal tsha bas 'khor tshogs dbang du sdud// stobs drug 'gros su mgyogs pas rgyud drug thazla kyis 'dren// rol pa'i rta tho brdungs pas bdud bzhi thal bar rlog/ 'jig rten sgrol la mkhas pas mi mnyam thabs kyis 'dren// de nas yum ni bskyed
212a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM e h+ye hi sa mA ya hUM/ ma hA shrI ka ma la sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA badz+ra shrI badz+ra ka ma la ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM a ka te pa te te ma hA ka ta ye sAhA/ zhes brjod pas yum gni ldan pad+ma can gyi skur bskyed do// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog
212a7(rnying rgyud): rol ba'i tan+da las/ dbang gi phrin las kyi ting nge 'dzin byed dkyil 'khor skyed pa'i le'u sdig brgyad pa'o// de nas yang ni gsungs pa ste// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo // sde med ces dbyings dag pa nas// rlag ma dmar po dbang da
212b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'dir// dbang gyen lab sum gshegs sugs lnga// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// chos dbyings dag pa pho brang nas// ye shes khyad par gzhal yas su// ye shes dgu brtsegs dkyil 'khor kun// gnas 'dir brtse lding gshegs su gsor//
212b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po'i klong dkyil nas// ma lus gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya dza/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pra be sha phaT/ A be sha a/ 'dod chags dag pas shes rab pha rol phyin// ma 'gags rol pa'i phyag rgya cir yang snang // bde gshegs yab yum
212b3(rnying rgyud): skul phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rtog pa'i dra ba kun bcom nas// ye shes dgu yi don dang rab ldan pa// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku la bkod gnas tshul// rigs chen lha dgu dag la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing // nyon mongs pas 'joms
212b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// pra tIts+tsha ho// shrI na maH/ kun bzang mchod pas mnyes par bya// yang dag don gyi spu lang bsil// d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke// gan+d+he la sogs lha mo bzhi// mchod pa dag pa'i tshul du 'dul/

220a1(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa daso sa kyan smras du/ g.yas pa dang rtsigal ba dang ma// g.yon pa mthing gibras pa parnams// tham pa dres par gyibs gtams// smonas 'gugs pa pa ma cig/ mngasas pa ta rnam
220a2(rnying rgyud): hUM nub phyogs bad+ma rAga'i zhing khams nas// dmar mo 'od kyi mtha' chag rten// nag 'od byin patha gsol// mtha' ma gse ga zu'i 'od kyis mdzes// g.yes pa yi burgan gyi ya dong pa// g.yon badra ru bum pas //
220a3(rnying rgyud): pa tshi dang shes gtams// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ I gI tri sa saM la b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu Ne b+h+ya saH/ byang phyogs in+d+ra ljang bu'i dir khams nas// ljang du 'dzes ma 'od kyi mtha' chag d+han/ na bzang ldang phye mdzes pa/
220a4(rnying rgyud): g+hu ru'i 'od kyi satshom bus brgyan// g.yas pa ljang gu dang gyi ka ba ba dong ma// g.yon pa ga yu li bum pa bsgoms// bum pa nges par tsho yis gtams// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cing // oM ni te sa ma ya b+h+rUM badz+ra A lu Sha hUM aH
220a5(rnying rgyud): paM lha mo chen mo bani// bskor cing tshe 'gugs 'di skad gsungs// hUM de ni lA skye dashA mo ste// rdo rje sems dpa 'thugs dam skong // ma bslangs par du phru mi gyi// nga ni mi yi cho ga yang 'gugs// sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// sangs rgyas kun

222a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo mo// bskrad pas mi 'gyur dge ba'i chos// sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang ni gzigs par dka'// bzhi pas rgyas btab pas// d+hU r+m+ma kun gyis zhigs pa 'thar/

222a4(rnying rgyud): gdongs pa na// gnon pa'i rol du byas pa ni// dbang chen nyid kyi phyag rgya yin// srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong bsnol// mdzub mo mthe'u chung bsgreng ba ste// gung mo sbyar la dbus su bsgreng // de ni rta mgrin phyag rgya yin// sor mo bcu po bsnol byas nas//

226b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thong shog/ byang chub sems ni tshul khrims ldan// tshul dang khrims ni 'bras bu gnas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni bzod pa'i dbang // sems kyang por kun kyang 'thong // bzod pa
226b2(rnying rgyud): mas kyi dang pa gnas// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni brtson 'grus che// brtson la 'grus pa ye shes che// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni bsam pa gtan// bsam med dang la gnas
226b3(rnying rgyud): pha rol phyin// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni shes rab che// shes rab ye shes gting dpag don// gnyis med rol pa bde ba'i mchog/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni stong
226b4(rnying rgyud): ma nyid dag pal/ ni ba rtogs pa cad ni dang rdzun// bas kyi pa'i dzin pa'i dbang thob shog/ thabs shas tha smran// shes tsun bas so nas// byang chubasams byas pa dang
226b5(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni smon pa'i lam// smon lam dag pa chos nyid don// smon lam pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni snying rje che// snying rje'i lam mchog chos nyid don// snying
226b6(rnying rgyud): la phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ ma bgrod la ma la pha rol phyin// ci la ma g.yos thams cad snang // / pha rol phyin bcu ye shes dbang thob shog/ b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha a a a hUM// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+na las/ gsad bshes rab ye
226b7(rnying rgyud): shes kyi byang chub sems pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dbang gi le'u ste brgya dang bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang tshon kun 'dus che// dbang gi rgyal
227a1(rnying rgyud): po dbang rgyal che// dbang gdon rnams du ltur na// rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams bdag tan 'tshal// kun 'dus rgyal pos bka' stsal cig/ zas gas ng+ka// de nas dbang gi rgya ma 'das/
227a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i don gas su chud nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa rgyag na rdo rje nyon// rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams bshad pa // dbang gi blangs ni de bzhin te// rdzogs pa'i dbang zhes bya ba ni// yA shes lnga yi dpying yin te/
227a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus gcig kyang med// ye shes lnga yi dbang bsgyur ba// sangs rgyas lnga pa de nyid do// 'og min gnas kyang de nyid do// chos kyi sku yang de nyid do// bde gshegs kun bzang de nyid do// hrI byang chub sems pa g.yos pa med// gsapa/
227a4(rnying rgyud): mdag bachos kyi su// sdang la rang bzhin med pa ste// me long ye shes dbang thong shog/ chos rnams spyod pa 'o bo'o// dang las ma ga yos la zhes mthong // stong pa gsal brgyas kyi hU~M// rgyu nyid ye shes dbang thob shog// sbyong dang gas
227a5(rnying rgyud): blar byung ba dang / nyis med pang 'ganas pa ni// de nga ba sems dang sanyam// mnam nyid lags dbang tho nag/ rgyus nyid ma ga yos danas ste// mkhas rigs rnam sanas nga tog// gas la la ma 'dris kyang rnabs mas
227a6(rnying rgyud): nyid dang // sor rtog ye shes dbang thob shog/ chos rnams so sor gang bstan kyang // mnyam nyid dang la gnas pa yis// bya rtsom thams cad byas ma med dang du 'dus// bya ba nan tan ye shes dbyang // de ltar ye shes rnam lnga'i dbang bsgyur/
227a7(rnying rgyud): ro// ye shes lnga la pa dro zhog/ dbang rnams thams cad der 'dus to// dus gsum pa dgashegs kun gyi dbang // des dpang thams cad rdzogs pa yin// de sbyar dbang bsgyur 'bras bu 'phrod/ ces gsungs so// ta mchod da /
227b1(rnying rgyud): tha sa sa pa rgyu / smra/ du ga
227b2(rnying rgyud): gas dpas nas ga di coM sa rnaMs
227b3(rnying rgyud): byung sa rdeg pa// ga sa smra ste/ smral / na pa mig/ sa /
227b4(rnying rgyud): dus / gas/

227b6(rnying rgyud): kyi byo// sa sa ba ma // mas sa ma // sa // seMn su tha ga ga dungs drugasapa/
227b7(rnying rgyud): du gan // / / sa
228a1(rnying rgyud): skyes// thug sung thugs kyi sa spyo tum// chos skyugs pa ga na dngos srung sdom// bdag byas gyum pam rdzas te// chos tun pa byangs myo ba mad pa'as// thabagacags
228a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil dakhong meng / dang la zhis dngos su bstsol// ya shes da sa las 'bar ba'i skyer bstan pa// rnam tha~M dargyal po 'khor bcas kyang // maud nga yo gas tshogs pa'i dngos sru rtsol// rigs pa grags
228a3(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi gdan sted na// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i gnas// 'phro 'du dgongs pa tshang legs kyi// 'bum phrag ting 'dzin spyod pa'i dngos grub stsol// thugs mchog zhi ba'i dang las ma g.yos kyang // 'bar ba'i cha lugs bzhugs pa
228a4(rnying rgyud): 'thung rol pa'i phyag rgya 'bar ba'i tshogs// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtse dang lha mo'i chags// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas zhi ba'i dngos grub stsal// tshe dang ye shes byang chub mchog gi dngos grub rtsol// gdag pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun brtsal na /
228a5(rnying rgyud): las rgyal ba'i rgyal thabs bdud rtsi bsnams// mthu byin longs spyod dngos grub stsal du gsol// ngan song gnas rnams ma lus btul nas kyang // byang chub bde ba'i gnas la dgod mdzad pa// gnyis med bde ba'i dngos grub rgyal du gsol// bud khrod 'bad pa'
228a6(rnying rgyud): chas dang rab ldan pas// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor gdug pa 'dul// rig pa mahA yi dachos grub stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni rig pa'i gnas// hUM mdzad chas ldan dur khrod brgyad dang ldan// khrag 'byed rol pa'i dngos grubastsal du gsol/
228a7(rnying rgyud): paka thogs med gdug pa 'dul ba'i tshogs// myur mgyogs longs spyod dngos grub sbal du gsol// ye shes bzhi las gdug pa'i sku sprul nas// phrin las rgya mtsho gro don mtha' du phyin// rig pa'i brtul zhugs nyon mongs thab 'joms//
228b1(rnying rgyud): 'brum dras pa gang la da yidzin ldas so// don las ni nyams kyang rgyub skye byo ga nas// dari bad+hAl zhugs ma la ngas grub col// dbyings las 'byung ba'i bstan nus// myub 'grom ba napa rgyas pa// ca da /
228b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// yi shes dbyings las bskyed pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// thugs kyi phrin las sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang // gdug pa 'dul phyi ma mo'i sku sprul nas// phrin las myur mgyogs pho nya mang po'i thugs// mthad
228b3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub stsal du gsol// las las grub dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // 'jig rten nor dang longs spyod dang // tshe ring nad med pade skyid phun sum tshogs// gang la des 'dul tshe yi dngos grub stsol// dag pa byang chub dngos grub thob// dgos pa gang
228b4(rnying rgyud): la gang 'dod pa// nor burin chen po bzhin dngos gru bkrol// rtam chog rol pa'i tshu las/ dbang gi ni rnams la dngos grub stong ba'i'i ba rgya dang bcu bzhi 'o// de nas yang dang gi rgyal po 'dus kyis/ dbang ga
228b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la/ skong ba'i las nyams tshig bshags pa dang / bkang ba 'di gsungs so// 'dab chags kyi byud mar sgo dang / shel phrug tsho ma kham dang / de yis thugs dam bkang bste// nyams pa chag pa bkang ba dang / dngos grupa dam pa 'thob par
228b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi byeng // rdo rje'i mda' ma phog pa'i mang la khrag dang // thig le zags pa'i khrag chan dang // sha khrag sbyar ba'i gtor ma dang // rgya mchog dang ni mkha' snying dang // 'di yis thugs dam bskangs byas pas//
228b7(rnying rgyud): padz+ra rigs kyi thugs dam pa skang gyur cig/ 'di la 'di dang bzhig zhigis// dbang rten papa rgya drugs ngas padang // 'di'i sags pa'i thabs thagags// / mgrin gyul ba'i thugs dom bdang // 'di la rtag chags bzhi brgya / dbyings kyi zab
229a1(rnying rgyud): dam bskung // 'di yi gzugs kyi phung po yis// rnam par snang mdzad thugs dam bskang // 'di mchor ba'i phung po yis// rin chen 'byung gnas thugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'du shes phung po yis// snang pa mthar
229a2(rnying rgyud): sarmugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'du byed phung po yis// don yod grub pa'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rnam shes phung po yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'byung ba lnga rnams kyis// sangs rgyas yum lnga'i thugs da med slang //
229a3(rnying rgyud): di yi rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // 'di 'i rnam shes yul brgyad kyis// sems ma brgyad kyi thugs dam bsrung // 'di yi yid dang chos rnams kyis// kun bzang yab yA ma thugs dam bkang // 'di ya
229a4(rnying rgyud): no'ongs drug rnams kyis// bcom ldan zub rgyag thugs dam pa dang // 'di yi dag che dang ni rnams nI sa// zhob yab rgya thugs ma bskang // 'di'i 'ad phung la po yis// 'a shes sems dpa'i thugs dam pa skang // 'di yi phreng ldag nas sbyir pas/
229a5(rnying rgyud): ga 'drang hi rba tra li thugs dam bskang // 'di la rgya gnas kyang bas// khrag 'thung yum pa'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi nam zhes tshogs brgyad gnas byung bas// go slo mo brgyad kyi thugs dam pakang // 'di yi yul brgyad gnas gyur pas// si
229a6(rnying rgyud): gyi zugs pa padang // 'di'i rnas chud pa'i'aM ga nas gyu ngas// no pa ni rdzogs da bad// 'di lag nga shin turdza brgyad kyis// gasred kyi nga kyi da kyi sudam pa dang / 'di'i ci ba mag sas g.yan gyis// 'grob
229a7(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor rdzogs dpa dang // 'di mi ga zhag pa gangasag rnams// khams pa na / di'i 'a sa/ dgas dam pa dang // 'dis rgya rngubs can gyis/
229b1(rnying rgyud): khrod ma dang ldan pa'i thugs dam bkang // 'di'i skye bskul pa yiste// ngan sang skyosbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs dam pa sang // 'di'i na po gabrag gis// du mthod chen po'i dkyil 'khod thags dam bsung // 'dil brgyad ni bzhi po las// btul
229b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs bzhi 'i thugs dam bskung // 'di 'i khrag bcud snying mchin gyis// rta li brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang // 'di yi bskyed dus nang tshil gyis// khyi yi brtul khrugs thugs dam bskang // 'di yi sems bcud glang pa sa// bra li baN+Da
229b3(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskang // 'di yi shu bcud tshil bu yis// phag gi brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang // 'di yin khrol slad lnga yis// spyang mo brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi mkhar bu brtsigs pa yis// long brgya bang brel sum cu rtsa gnyis thugs
229b4(rnying rgyud): dam bskang // 'di yi khrag mchod ngas ma yis// mkha' 'gro mtshogs thugs dam bskang // 'di yi yan lag sde bzhi yis// mgo brtsegs khro bo'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi dngas ma 'od chen dang // 'di yi tsi D+ha srog phrag gis//
229b5(rnying rgyud): ma bcugasu mthugs dam bskang // zhes gsungs so// rgya mchog rol pa ng+kad+ha las/ dbang gi sgra rnams thags dam dong pa'i le bu brgya dang btsang badz+ra// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// de nas dbang gi
229b6(rnying rgyud): pa bshad par bya// yang dag sems kyi phur ba de// gzhan du gdab pa'i gnas med pa// rang rig byang chub sems la gad pa// byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// sems can ma lus dag lag rab// thabs kyi rdo rje phrar pa de// b+ha ga yang
229b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil du gdab// thugs las bskyed pa'i phur pa de// mtshan ma rdzas la brten te gad ba// ru tra nag po'i snying la gdab// phur pa bskyed pa'i rim pa ni// rin chen byu ru phur ba de// spyod ni khro bo'i rang bzhin la// dbul rta mgo ljang du
230a1(rnying rgyud): nga// rgyud na thags bcwa/ dab gsangs ga// 'a du gastsa pa dang // rgyugasas// gsug zhan pa sa gsus thal po brgyad// nga
230a2(rnying rgyud): khrod smad brgyan pa// phyag kyang blag ma phur pa 'dril// dug gsum gcad cing gsad pa dang // khams gsum gdar shag cad pa'i phyir// phur pa gzi brjid bskyod cing gdab// gsal ba gsum dang ldan par bya// drug pa'i rtsa ba khrag yin pas/
230a3(rnying rgyud): khrag ni 'dod chags chen po ste// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// dbang gi phur bas gdab par bya// thugs kyi sprul pa he ru bzhi// gsal bar bskyed cing gdab pa'o// dug lnga rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// sprul pa he ru bzhis kyang
230a4(rnying rgyud): gdab// bsgral nas gdab dang slar gso ba'o// oM pad+ma kI la ya/ a mo kI la ya/ tsa tsa ma ma kI li kI lA ya/ sa ma ya tsit+ta la phaT rbad ya/ de yis thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur// lha dang klu yang de dang 'dra// de yi las kyis thams cad dpa
230a5(rnying rgyud): du bsdus shing bsgral bar bstan pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ dbang gi phur pa gdab cing las bya ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dbang gi rgyal po des// sbyin sreg las rnams bskrun pa ste// de nas yang ni bka' stsal
230a6(rnying rgyud): pa// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pa dang // yang na dmigs pa gtan bcol las// de yi las su srin sreg bya// rigs bzhi yan lag shes pa des// me yi thab ni brtsig par bya// me thab bya ba'i las ri ma ni// thag ma gdengs pa'i
230a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bya// de mthang zlum por bskor bar// de mtha' gru gsum dag tum// rnga mgrugu bzhi snyam par bya// rgya shug dkar po tsher ma can// de yi nang ni brjongs pa la// dadra ngas sna bzhi po dang // dbang gi rngas rnams pasog pa ste// dmis
