231a1(rnying rgyud): la dag pa phyid// byin sreg 'bar pa'i mdzod pa 'di// rnamathon khro ba'i skal mchod par 'thag// dmigs rgya ga par wA ste// ha/ cholabya nga yi kyi 'khor du// bad gshegs rigs pa
231a2(rnying rgyud): yum mas dakhor bcas// dag pa'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// phrin las bskyab phyir ba zhes su gsol// hU~M oM i swA hA/ shwang+ga trI ku ru swA hUM/ me ltar 'bar ba'i klong zu ma nas// hom lnga 'brel ba'i grong yangs lnga// khrag 'thung 'gro
231a3(rnying rgyud): 'bul ba'i tshogs// dam rdzas 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// drag po'i phrin las bsgrub phyir bzhes su gsol/ kro d+ha shrI he ru ka ma hA mAM sa rak+ta p+pa tsa ba ri khA hi/ hU~M g.yas g.yon thabs shes 'brel ba'i klong dkyil du/ khams
231a4(rnying rgyud): gsum rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dam rdzas sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dmigs pa brlag cing 'khor bstongs par mdzod// sI b+ha gr-ir+b+he kro d+ha mA ra ya kha ri khA 'i/ rigs pa hom gyi dkyil 'khor nga // hU~M mdzad chen po'i dkyi
231a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ma lus la// drag po'i sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa dbul// dmigs pa gtan nas dbo ba'i las mdzod cig/ ba liM pU dzad snang l+yA kha raM khA hi/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i klong yangs su// khro bo 'bar tshogs ma bzad pas// rig pa ye
231a6(rnying rgyud): sba rlabs// nyon mongs gdug pa gtan nas bsreg/ dmardzas sbyin sreg mchod 'bul bas// phrin las rgya mtsho 'grub par mdzod// oM rak+Sha krod+ha mA ra ya khA hi/ bde chen rigs pasdus dkyil 'bod du// dbang gi lha tshogs bcas pa la// @
231a7(rnying rgyud): byin theg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di 'bul bas// lha rnams mnyes shing gdug pa 'joms par shog/ shrIny+dzi pa shaM pa ma ta b+h+r-i swAhA/ de ltar mchod pa phul ba dang // lhag ma gago bsgag pa dang // drag pod smon lam btab pa dang // phrin pas
231b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi rdzogs pa dang // thabs la dbang ba'i bro yang bzung // de yis las kyi mtha' yang 'grub// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi sbyin sreg bya ba'i leng+ga ste brgya dang bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang ni bka' stsal
231b2(rnying rgyud): pa// rU tra nag po bsgral ba ltar// de la pho brang bca' ba dang // rU tha bsgral ba'i sha khrag de// bstab dang sbyin sreg bya ba'o// bstab pa 'di ltar dbang gi lha rnams la bstab po// ma dad chen po bsgral ba 'di// thugs dam gnyen po 'dis bskang
231b3(rnying rgyud): ngo // 'di yi kun gzhi gnas chen 'di// dbang gi rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi gtsug gi phud ka 'di// rta mgrin rgyal po nyid la bstab/ 'di yi bcud dang 'od tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi zhal du bstab// 'di yi 'od chen dngas ma 'di//
231b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes sems dpa' nyid la bsgrub// 'di yi sha khrag phung po 'di// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i zhal du bsgrub// 'di yi sbrul chen gzhung bu 'di// khams gsum rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi zhabs ni g.yas g.yon ni// b+h+rUM mdzad chen po
231b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bstab// 'di yi yid ni nag po 'di// ngan song sbyong ba'i lha la bsgrub// 'di yi dur khrod nang khrol 'di// dur khrod chen po'i lhal bstab// gsang ba'i rigs can 'di dag ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i lha la bstab// 'di yi yan lag dpung
231b6(rnying rgyud): byazhi yang // brtul thugs chen po bzhi la bsgrub// 'di yi nang khrol skad lda ni// mkha' 'gro po nya'i tshogs la bsgrub// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang // dug gsum bskal ba'i mchod pa 'di// me mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bsgrub// ces gsungs
231b7(rnying rgyud): rta mchog rol pa'i / rlabs/ btung pa'i las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste ba kyi dang bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas lhag ma gagos/ bro brdung ba 'di gsungs so// sangs kyis rgyal ba rnams kyi bka'// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po ste// raskam lus
232a1(rnying rgyud): bskal ba ste// phung po lhag myu ga gol// gdul bya'i bro gcig brdung ba ni// bro na brtul grags chen po ste// rnam pani rdzogs pa'i zo brdungs pas// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'i 'o// rigs pa
232a2(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung 'khrigs pa'i bro// bde gshegs rgyal bas dgongs pa'i blo// ma sring rgya mtsho gdung pa'i blo// ngan song 'khor ba 'joms pa'i bro// dug lnga gnas su dag pa'i bro// dug gsum dbyings su brdung ba'i dro// sangs rgyas dgongs pa
232a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub pa'i bro// nyon mongs gdung bsil ba'i bro// rta yi bro ni nub nas brdung // khyi yi bro ni lho nas brdung // phag gi zlo nI shar nas brdung // bya yi bro ni byang nas brdung // blor chen po bzhi bcas nas// dang po po yi gdangs bton pa/
232a4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// bar du bro yi ga dngas bton pa// grub po dag la dngos grub 'bebs// tha mar bro yi gdangs skra yis// 'khor ba ngan song gtan nas grol// brdungs pas byang chub sems smin 'khrigs// skye
232a5(rnying rgyud): 'gag med pa'i dbyings rum du// blangs pas rgyal ba'i thugs dum bskul// 'khor ba'i sbubs lding chen po la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rab mdar gnyer// ye shes dpag gi phan ka can// ru dpon ye shes lnga yis mdzod// kun
232a6(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i mkha' dbyings su// khams gsum yang sgrol chen po mdzod// lhag ma rjes shul dag la ni// brtul zhugs chen po'i bro brdungs pas// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i bro// rta yi brtul zhugs bro brdungs pas// srid gsum
232a7(rnying rgyud): lus dbang du spyad// khro bo rdo rje gagon pas// rta skad rngam pa'i ngang las rol// shangs kyi drung sgrom chen po nas// rdo rje mtshon cha'i char phab pas// dbang gi rta bro brdungs pa yis// dang pog go gzhom par byas// bar mas lhag
232b1(rnying rgyud): myabya byas// thams gdug nubaca pa shes// lhag mame par nus nu // dug gsas gnas sa ngas par bya// podas phyog cag nas nus// dpa nam tshogs pas/ man ma tud 'dugs
232b2(rnying rgyud): drug ga sus po san ner mdod// thugs ka log tu 'thos pas// thul bu dbang du sdud pa po// lhag ma med par shA pa nag tsang// rtonas kyi ba tho brdungs dang // btul thugs chen po ma rgyaH// drug go gsum ngon
232b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bzhi mtshams pazheb cid dag tu/ sprul pa rgyas tho bdangs paste/ thams cad pa ma med 'dis da// 'dug shegs rnams kyi thugs drim pagang // 'be pa nas yong sa pa
232b4(rnying rgyud): yi tho brdungs pas// srid gsum khams gsum zil gyis mnan// klu la sogs pa'i gdug pa can// zas su za zhing rngam stabs byed// chu drug lings su 'debs par byed// sprul pa yongs su lding bar byed// sprul pa mi
232b5(rnying rgyud): bzad ma rungs pa// la la lding dang la la 'phur// la la gzan la stod pa'i tshul// la la lding zhing la la 'dzums// kha dog sna lnga 'bar ba la// mi mthun gdug pa so sor 'dul// sprul pa bye ba las la 'gyed// gdug pa
232b6(rnying rgyud): gtum po gtan nas 'joms// dbang gi bro gar yongs su ldir// lhag ma rjes shul med pa'i zo// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam skong // bro gar yongs su gding bar bgyi// shar nas phag gi brtul zhugs byung // gti mug
232b7(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa'i las la mkhas// blang dang dor med drug po ste// sra spyi med par 'joms pa // phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// pas ni gtsang dam med par bza'o// bang ni ngal dub med par rgyug/ tshems ni pra sti med par 'joms/
233a1(rnying rgyud): zhon du ma thur gang yang med// sring pa'i lon pakod ra mkhas// nyon mongs pab gtan nas 'joms// 'od cigs rgya nas zhes// ngan ma zas kyi nas brtol// jug dog zug rdug tunan
233a2(rnying rgyud): choms// gti mug mun pa gtan nas choms// zhe sdang rtse me rum du song // ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lhag ma'i rjes shul bro rdung ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas dbang gi rgyal pos lus
233a3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag gsungs so// gsang ba'i dngos grub bsgrub 'dod na// rta mgrin rta yi rgyal po la// skul pa'i he ru bzhis bskor ba// de ni yang dag bsgrub par bya// de yi yon tan rdzogs pas ni// 'di yi mtha dang dngos gru thob// byang chub snying po
233a4(rnying rgyud): 'grub par the tshom med// rigs dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// phun sum tshogs pa'i sgrub po des// las kyi rim pa gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor zla gam sgo gcig pa// tha ma zla gam bzhis bskor ba// sgo dang bcas par bya ba'o// chag
233a5(rnying rgyud): chag thig dang bri ba dang // rdzas dang ldan par bsham pa'o// dug shing phur pa lnga bsags te// byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni// zla gam lnga la dgod par bya// mthun pa'i phyi nang gsang ba'i rdzas// bdud rtsi gtor ma bzhin du ste// ma dad pa de
233a6(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba las// rdul la sogs pa'i chu gsum gyis// lha rnams su yi khrus su gsol// byang chub sems dang dri chen dang // mI sa dang ni rak+ta dang // dri chur sA ya la sogs// bdud rtsi dam pa sman sbyar nas// lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya//
233a7(rnying rgyud): mdad pa de bsgral ba yi// dbus ni snying la tha mdza ma skye// sha dang kag gis brgyan pa dang // rgya ma klad pa dbang po dang // bcas pa lha rnams dag la 'bral// d+hU tra'i snying khrag dngas ma ste// khrag chen mchod pa sbeng bar bya// de ltar mchod
233b1(rnying rgyud): pa bya ba'o// de nas bslab pa brtsam par bya// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ rta mgrin sgrub pa rdzas dang dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyi shu pa'o// / de nas las kyi gzhung bstan te// de ngadang rta sa
233b2(rnying rgyud): ni// chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin panom// kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin ni// 'bras brel maci gzhi du gzhag/ thun mong ma yin grub pa'i nying rje rid// de madran paskyed keng rje mchod// spyi rje lam tha dag nga//
233b3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi 'bras bu bstan pa yin// hU~M las 'byung ba e shar byas// 'byung ba'i gzhi mo nam mkha' yin// hU~M las yi ge yaM shur bas// rten pa'i rlung zhes shar ba yin// hUM las yi ge bI shar bas// chu yi dbyung bas bon ba rten//
233b4(rnying rgyud): yi ge suM shar bas// srab sa yi rten du gyur// hUM las yi ge raM shar bas// smin cing brtas par byas pa yin// hUM las yi ge ko shar bas// ri rab chen po byung ba yin// b+h+rUM las ri rab gzhal yas khang // rA ga padz+ra pa /
233b5(rnying rgyud): ra ti zhes pa brtsegs pa yin// ni gzhal yas zla ga ma dmar// de dkyil dmigs pa'i rten mnan pa// bdud dang srin po la sogs pa// nyi zla bad+ma brtsegs pa'i tshul// gsang ba'i gnas ni dkyil du'o// de'i steng yi ge
233b6(rnying rgyud): bas// dmar la bkru ba'i yi ge hUM// de las sa bon sngags brjod pas// rta mgrin rgyal por gyur pa yin// de la rigs bzhi'i sngags brjod pas// he Ta'i rgyal por gyur pa yin// de ltar rang bzhin gsal bar bsgom// oM hu lu hu mu
233b7(rnying rgyud): de brjod tamagrin rgyal por gyur// swA hA he ruka kI la ya hU~M phaH// sa mo d+ha mA~M he ruka r+m+ma phaT/ ratA a ma~M ta shrI he rug hU~M phaT/ karma a mo g+ha gli Ta/ de ltar ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ rta mchog rol pa'i taN+Da las/
234a1(rnying rgyud): bcas bgam pa'i bag rta pa nas mdas sbyar snang ba ga ma smrasanas// sa byung dgas nayon na du/ mthon cim rtand 'thong ga gshegs sa
234a2(rnying rgyud): klung bang gangan la bzugs// chos dbyings dga' 'i gnas chen nas// dung wa~M kl-i k+Sham gdengs pa'i dkyil khor 'dir// sprul pa'i hi khro ba'i rgyal po bzhi// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas ni// dang
234a3(rnying rgyud): thabs drug pa phrin las m-i dan mi na mam/ jizag sbyi ni ga na 'dus/ dzini'i sa dbang drug drug kyi yis// mi bzad gdug pa 'dul mdza mam-ig/ sprul bti bzhil rgyag byal// d+hI madz+ra
234a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po mchog/ lcang lor bcas pa'i pad+mA b+hAr d+ha la// tshe 'dzin mo cho ga dang de mad chen dam pas bkang // myong dang sgrol gyis thugs dAm bskang legs kyis// rta mgrin rgyal po'i thugs dam bslang bar mdzod// sha chen mkhad rdzing na pa
234a5(rnying rgyud): stags dang brtag/ bun chen pa na byinas// rdo rje las kyi chu dang pa ma mr-i ta// rkyor dang sgrol ba'i thugs dam mchog lags kyis// he ru bzhi le thugs dam bskyang bar mdzod// pad+ma zil tig dri dang byung // rdo rje las kyi 'u dang pa
234a6(rnying rgyud): khyod dang sbos kyis thugs dam bskang legs kyis// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs thugs dam bskang bar mdzod// pad+ma b+han d+ha lcang lor bcas bdud rtsi// dang gi rgyal po khro borta mchog pa// bla med dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa mthong // sa
234b1(rnying rgyud): bu med pa'i tshul gyis 'bul lags na// byugs rjes pa sa nas dbang ga dngas grub krol// dbang ba'i sprul pa mngon par shar ba ni// rigs kyi sprul pa rna ba bzhi rnams la// dAm dag bdu d+hi dmangasas sa mchod 'dag/ ma rje zang dag na
234b2(rnying rgyud): dIbang dang da mi grub stsom// zhes smin mtshad dam pa'o// yig 'brug sum thu gsung grags// byin rlapas dam pa mdzadu nas su// phra gsung thugs kyi mdzad drugasas// sbrulas sa/ d+ham+ba hrIH/ d+hI be ban zed
234b3(rnying rgyud): phyir// bdud kyi chen po bsum mr-i tA// bla med sman gyi mchod pa 'bul lags na// 'khor ba'i thug bsngal bzlog phyir bzhes bu gsol// bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa sbyar ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yin pa
234b4(rnying rgyud): brgyan nas// dam tshig gsang ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// zhes mchod pa dbul lo// de nas 'dod don smon lam btab// dngos grub blang dang phrin las bcol// nye bar bayul dang bsnyen pa brgyal// de nas las kyi bya ba bya// tshogs kyi mchod
234b5(rnying rgyud): pa bya ba dang // bskang ba dang ni bshags pa dang // las bcol ba dang gdab par bya// oM hrIHba shak+Shi la ya hUM phaT/ des ni dbang gi phur pas gdab// swA hA kI la ya rbad/ a mo kI lA ya rbad/ rad ka ta na kI la ya nad/ kar sha a mo kI la ya hUM phaT/ de
234b6(rnying rgyud): ltar gsal bas gdab pa'o// de nas bro de 'khor gsum brdung // de nas mchod pa dbul bar bya// bstod pa dang ni las bya'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ rta mgrin he ru bzhi dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas pa
234b7(rnying rgyud): bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hUM dmar nag zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma rta mgrin rgyal// rta mgrin rgyal po dreg pa 'dul ba'i lha// rdzu mdog dmar po me dpung 'bar ba 'dra// 'bar ba'i phyag gis gdug pa'i phyag mtshon dzem
235a1(rnying rgyud): ral gri skul zhags thod pa kri gug 'dzin// gadrug pa'i thabs kyis ma phyogs gdan dubating // nabatha' bar ba kyu la can du ston// glang can ga rlan brjod chen ma can// zhing zhugs ka yang ga de dag pa gsung ginas//

235a3(rnying rgyud): gagi pags pa dpa' bar 'gro bzugs kyichas// gdu ba dpung rgyan sbrul dgazil gnon nas// rdo rje'i gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa smos// thabs dang shes rab ldaH gdug pazil gyis gnon// rdo rje rtse mo bya khyung 'bar bas klu gtan
235a4(rnying rgyud): ra 'bru// mcho gtsigs rkan s+kha drag pos bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// sprul pa mang po sbyar tshogs bkyebs pho nya mang po 'gugs// dbu yi gtsug na rta mgo 'bar bas dran song 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas// lung lgang tsor cor lan ga
235a5(rnying rgyud): pas// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshams na co re re// ngan song gnas rnams stongs shing ye shes don la bskul// gsung rab mnyes pa sgra spogs shing // bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// 'khor ba gtan nas 'joms shing byang chub don
235a6(rnying rgyud): 'god// snyan pa'i sgra rnams bsgrags pas lha mo dbyings su dgyes// ral pa dmar po bsdigs pas bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// gdung bzhi bcom nas ye shes bzhi yi ngang la 'jog/ ngan song gnas rnams stongs te byang chub lam la 'god// dang
235a7(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal po rta skad 'tsher ba khyod la bstod// sprul pa'i he ru khro ba'i rgyal po bzhi// rigs bzhi'i sprul pa khro bo bzhir sbal pa// phyogs bzhi dag na gnas pa ste// gdug pa 'dul gyir sku sprul pa// sdug nag ral pa 'bar ba'i zod phreng can/
235a8(rnying rgyud): bza' 'bang ba gsum mnabs pa// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsdams// g.yas pa dang po dgra sna glags kyu dang // tha ma gdug pa'i phur ba 'dril// g.yon pa mi dpung ba dan no// gdug pa 'dul phyir drag po'i las la brtson// sprul ba

236a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyis rgyar ba'o// bla ma pa las dag pa 'dra/ khong nas smraba'o// nab mad pa las bla rnams cang byud nas zhus pa'o// dmus yang dag byu su las gang la yang thogs pa med par byed pakra/
236a2(rnying rgyud): 'grub par bya ba ni/ dbus su d+ha mchog nyal po de// le tsho brgyad la dmus long brgyad/ lha dgras du bsrub par bya'o// dkyil 'khor cig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// tshon ni dgas dang mthun par bya// sgo gcig pa ni shar du'o//

236a4(rnying rgyud): rab brtan par bya// de las ci rin chen gzhal yas khang // nang ngur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // dbus ni thig ma gdings pa 'od dang bcas// tha ma me dpung me ri 'bar ba'o// de la dU tra gdan du bsam// to k+She pa sum brtsegs so//

236a6(rnying rgyud): ling+gaM ba rti hUM/ li dza a sa me hUM/ li bu sha hUM/ li kha du h+yaM/ le pra ma shar hUM/ lI kha ma le d+h+waM/ sngags de re re brjod pa yi// dmus lod 'khor ba re rebaskyed// ling tshe brgyad la bkod pa'o// bcom ldan dbang chen he ru ka/ khro bo'i

236b1(rnying rgyud): dbus long ma nom pa// dbang gi zhing khams chen po bskyang ba dang // bdud dang sbyin po klu rnams tshar gcad dang // dngas grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// dbang chen kun 'dul bka' 'khor basbyang ba dang // dbang drag las kyi phrin las bsku

237b2(rnying rgyud): bano// danas rnal pa dang byang bad// ba sa pa ba byung ba ni// dngas gzhas rnas gas byung ba rnam// me ba d+mo 'i gas byung ba dga' phrums dang // kyid nga maud kun tu dang // dbang ba 'thod pa cings
237b3(rnying rgyud): la// rmuchad par thams gru ba'i dz+nyAn// de ltar gsal bya'i ting 'dzin pasgom// de yi dkyil dus rnams so// oM hu lu rba lu hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-id+b+ha trAMk+Sha ra/ oM bar+d+ha kAd+ha ba dza la/ badz+ra wa r+d+ha nI lad t+te/ bad kro ta yA mAn ta ka/ @
237b4(rnying rgyud): AHatsA la~M/ badz+rag d+ha ha ya ts+tshin/ badz+re ga~M d+hA.a par dzota/ badz+ra kr-i d+ha sa mr-i ta kA ma~M/ dz+dzaHd+ha d+ha sa ts+yai dz+wa la/ brdarba d+han hA ba la d+h-i/ 'khor la brgyal kyi dgod// rim pa ltang du shes pa \u0f7f// hU~M hrIhU~M d+hI dz+dzad+hats+tshin+dan+d+raH/
237b5(rnying rgyud): bus bu hU~M dmar la bkra ba yin par gsungs/ hU~M las sngags de brjod pa yis// 'bar ba'i khro bor phreng ba'o// de ltar gzhal las khang gi nang na ni/ rang ngo bzhugs pa'i gzugs dag pa skyed pa dang / lha'i ting 'dzin gyi dkyil ngo kho lo nas

238a1(rnying rgyud): gsol// kro d+ha sa ma ya gr-i dza/ bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs chen popa// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// dbang mchog kun 'dul bzang po che ba'i lha// che bas che bar btad pa'i dbang phyug ya
238a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba wA'i sbrul phyag/ 'tshal lo// srid ga snam gdug pa ma lus kun 'joms pa// gdug pa 'dul mdzad ye shes g+ha yi lha// stobs kyi rim pa'i blo ba d+hU can// hUM mdzad khrob brgyal phyag/
238a3(rnying rgyud): dgu nas shing sa dgu rim gyis sbyid// pha rol phyin bcwa rdzogs shing mtha' gnyis mi rlung dang la gnas// slo ba mgo brtsegs zhi la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mchod pa rim pas 'bul// sngon lam gad ba dang 'dod gsol bya// lha
238a4(rnying rgyud): yo bsnyen pa grangs su bskyal// ga 'dod dbang drag las dang sbyar// de nas lha rnams dag la bstod// hUM khrag 'azung 'bar ba'i sgrar bstan pa// dbul phyag ni bcu drug ste// 'bar ba'i zhabs ni brgyad du gtams// gshog pa g.ya
238a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon gnyis su gdengs// gshog rte khu khyung 'bar ba'o// nyi ma zla bas 'bar bar brgyan// dpal gyi chas brgyad skal brgyan// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan mang po rnams// dbu steng sangs rgyas lha yis brgyan// dbu lnga rta mgo 'bar ba
238a6(rnying rgyud): tshon gang 'od kyi 'bru dang banas// dbang gi rgyal po'i skul phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM khro bo chen po hUM chen 'bar// brjid pa'i stabs dang 'degs pa'i stobs// mi bzad gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// khro tshodza~M hU~M kA ra la bstod//
238a7(rnying rgyud): ngas kun pas rnam par rgyal// rgyal brgyal ba'i rtags brtas pa// chos dbyings dag dang mnyam par sbyor// bdud 'dul rnam par rgyal la bstod// rdzu 'phrul dang la mnga' brnyes shing // rtags kyi chos dbyings dbug par
238b1(rnying rgyud): nyid pa ma pa 'a dmas mad pa/ pag tsun can pa pad/ sa dbyung sa dag pa'ang na du/ pa lashes kya bstan pas// log par ga ga nan/ dgan na nga gtu pa spyad/ dpa da
238b2(rnying rgyud): nyidalas// g.yo ba med pa yis/ gon// de sprul bdud dang srin po tshar gcod pa// khro mchog me g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags gnas mu dag byed pa// theg pa'i rtul rab brgyud nas// mchog tu gu dang gnyen po 'dral
238b3(rnying rgyud): phyaga'atshal bstod// dag pa'i don mchog mtshon pa yis// mnyam nyid ngang gis thams cad 'joms// de phyir gzhan gyis mi thub ste// gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings dag pa'i brjid rtsi yis// nyon mongs ma lus gnas ma
238b4(rnying rgyud): bcom// 'khor ba'i bdud la ye shes rje gtong ba// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa de la bstod// khams gsum nyon mongs kun las rnam par rgyal// de don ma nor dbyings su sud byed pa// de yi don gyis dug gsum gnas su stongs par byed//
238b5(rnying rgyud): chen dmas gsum rgyal la phyag 'argya lja snod// ye shes stobs dang ldan pa yis// nyon mongs dra ba gcod byed pa// de las ma g.yos stobs po d+ha// 'joms byed sto bas po che la phyag 'tshal ba stong // ces gsungs so// ta mjog rim ma
238b6(rnying rgyud): tad+hA pe sa?/ spyi la brgyad pa sbyin pa'i ga ba rgya dang nye bdun pa 'o// / de nas drag pags pa'i rtags bstan pa/ aSh+NIg+b+hi ts+tsha ladza dwa paT/ ga~Mdzag dza d+ha paT/ han t+yan d+hA phaT/ daM ha r+d+ha phaT/ paHma tsa tI Ta/ brtan na d+h+waM gr-i dra la sa da/
238b7(rnying rgyud): na/ rkyen byin rje / dade sprid hU~M Ta/ l+r-iT sgo rgyad du/ ces pas rim par gdab pa / spyi rmi la ga ba ni/ oM dz+riM bang drug ga sam pa rjod/ spyir dri da ga da 'o// de das byugs pa sti pa kyi// des rnyeg pa sa dz+r-id pa// seM
239a1(rnying rgyud): 'gro'i rtsalas// khrab cu rnams smos tha brdungs pas// yang sbrul/ khachung ljon gang gis// drag po'i las byed bre bdung ngo // de nas mnanu gzar bya ba yis// yi ge sngags kyi 'khor la dgod// de ltar bsam pa'i las
239a2(rnying rgyud): rnams rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ sngags kyi gdab pa dang zos mnan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// de nas rigs 'dus gsang ba yis// lhun gyis grub pa'i
239a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil khar gyis// thams cad byas pa'i dkyil 'khor te// sgrub pa chen po byed pa dang // drag brdal drag po byed bran// rigs 'dus gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi snyam pa la// dbus su'o thang zlum po bkod// theg bzhi bta/
239a4(rnying rgyud): pas ling tshe dgu// ling tshe dgra la pho brang dgu// dbus su pad+ma tha ga ma brgyad// shar gyi ling tsho dag la ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor te// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor ro// lho yi le'u tshe dag la 'gro ba 'angal ba ste// dbus su zla gam mtha' ma 'khor lo brgyad//
239a5(rnying rgyud): d+hA tu rta mgrini dbang gi ste// zlag ma kha spod dag dang ldan// byang du khams gsum nam rgyal te// zlum po pad+ma 'ad ba brtsad do// shang d+ha'i ling tshe dag la ni// ngan song skyong ba'i dal ba ste// gru gsum tha ga ma bzhis bskor ba'o// lho nub ling tshe dag la ni/
239a6(rnying rgyud): hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor te// 'a tsho dgu dang ldan pa // nub byung 'i tshe dag la ni// ngur khrod chen po'i dalab ste// gru gsum mthara' ma zlum po bzhi// byang shar zlag ma sgo gcig pa// ye shes sems dpa'i dal bste// tha ma bu bzhi sgo yas bskur/
239a7(rnying rgyud): nga yi mtha' ma yang // bu bani go dang bcas pa'o// blo chad kun la byung ning 'jug/ de la lha rnams gsal na ste// de ltar gsal bar bris bsgom nas// dab ngag sbyin rlabs chen po 'byung // dbang bsku bdangs gru bring ba yang // de ltar byas na dngos drung/
239b1(rnying rgyud): can gapa ma// rtamaca gangs panatanags/ dbang gi rlogs thams cad badras pa das rgyal ba sa kyang kyad dgra pa// nas sna maman 'das dang gtul pas bka'athal pa// sems dnga'al sags
239b2(rnying rgyud): gas pa yi// drin chen sna chags grub pa'i gzhas las kyang // de la badz+ra rigs kyi lha rnams bskyed// dus rnams rtag par bzhugs par bsgom par// spyan drangs pas yang de la bstim// mdzod pa rnam pa smra po dang // rmad du byung ba gsum mdzad nas// de ra
239b3(rnying rgyud): snyan pa'i sgra bsgrags shing // 'grob rgyud lnga'i 'khor los 'khor bcu// sdug pa lngapa 'khrul 'khor gzir ba'i 'gro gzigs nas// thugs rjes sdug bsngal me lus 'joms mdzad pa// thug rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can sman cang
239b4(rnying rgyud): grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir// chos nyid de bzhin nyid la bzhugs gyur nas// chags pas mgos bad+ma ltar dag pa'i// 'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la bstod// sems can 'bor du'i rgya mtshor nub pa la// thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab zung bzhag nas//
239b5(rnying rgyud): zhib rin rten rgya margya'i gling brtsod pa// kun gyi ded dpon chen gakhyod la 'dud// sems can bkren pa chos kyis phongs gyur pas// ma rig mun 'thibs nang du song ba rnams// 'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim mdzad pa// ye shes rlon mchod la phyag 'gyur
239b6(rnying rgyud): bstod// sems can las kyi chu bas bdas pa rnams// dam chos bdud rtsi'i tham pas sgrol mdzad cing // 'phags lam yan lag brgyad la 'god mdzad pa// thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod rten do na pa kyi sde tshogs las thub/
240a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i drugs rjes shes kyi rang bzhin du bsams pa/ de'i bum pa'i dang du gnas pa'i rnying po dang / mdzod rten chen po dalas 'od zang du mgrangs spyad cing bzang du med pyas/ 'phrul ba'i sems can rnams cad kyis// las du ston mongs rlong/
240a2(rnying rgyud): pa yis// tshogs rnams thams cad byung byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs// ye shes 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus byas nas// mchod rten de la thim pa yis// mchod rten chen po de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// chos
240a3(rnying rgyud): longs su sbal pa'i sgra// ngo bo nyid du bsgom byas la// de la mchod pa kun mchod la// rten dang 'brel pa'i snying po bzlas// rigs kyi bstod pa kun byas la// de mthag nas tshig 'di brjod// bcom ldan 'das te de bzhin gshegs// dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs
240a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// rig pa zhabs ldan bde bar gshegs// skyes bu 'dul dang kha lo sbyar// lha dang mi yi ston pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar tshe 'phrul zung ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas su gsung sman zab pa// deng 'dir bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi sems can
240a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbugs dbyung phyir// bdud dang mu stegs la sogs bum par bgyi ba dang // sems can las dang nyon mongs rtog pa bsal bar bgyi// de las bdag cag rnams pa ni// bsgrag cing snang ba mdzad du gsol// de brdung la ni sngon lam btab// ces
240a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ mchod pa'i rten gyi le'u ste brgya dang snyam cu pa'o// / de nas rab tu gnas par bya// thugs rje ldan pa'i ston pa yis// 'gro ba bde la dgang ba'i phyir// sku gdung dang ni ring bsrel dang // mchod pa
240a7(rnying rgyud): ni pa nis pa gsungs// sang ma sa byin pa dang // srin pa dang ni grol pa myong / mdzad nyan can po banil shed // phyag pa dang ni kyang 'jug dang // klu nga la gas gyur// mtshad tan nayang zhengs pa bya// gling gnyis
240b1(rnying rgyud): nas chags gnyis rdzogs// dem myong yang bzhi pa // las dang nyon mongs babyung nas// 'bras pa kyang chu ba thub pa byur// de yang gnags pa blag par bya// bdud kyin pa dang gnad sbyin mngan sa dang // gdag bzlag da byung tsun pas/
240b2(rnying rgyud): de/ gsu zhi pa'i phyir yang dgod par bya// thugs rjes de la mchod tan pagengs pa ni// rgyu mi mchod rten 'bras bu'i mchod rten no// rgyu dang 'bras bu brel ba snang bas mdzad rten dang bzhin len// shang zhi bar dang rigs kyis khyong rnyed pani A nga /
240b3(rnying rgyud): mchod rten thum pa rdo rje brtsegs pa'i ka ba can// gzor ma dang ldan rin chen lngas sbas nas// 'khong po dang ni gadrug can dang // b+hu dang ni skabs mdzad pa// dang dbyings dang ni rin chen 'phreng // mi 'byung rgyags nag pa ni // rin tshon rigs kyi zhing khams
240b4(rnying rgyud): su// rin chen mchod rten sngon po la// gru bzhi pa la rin chen brtsegs// ka ba rin po che dang ldan// sgo ni rin chen nor bu'i dbyibs// nub phyogs pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// pad+ma stong dang ldan par bya// zhabs ni phrag ma tshul du gnas// rdo rje ka ba
240b5(rnying rgyud): rin chen sgo// dmar po rgyan dang ldan pa'o// byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi mchod rten te// ljang gu gru gsum 'bur dang bcas// rgya gram brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas// rin chen sna lnga'i rgyan dang ga bas mtshan// dbus su gser gyi mchod rten bkra gis so/
240b6(rnying rgyud): mngal// 'khor lo 'bar ba rdo rjes spras// snyan pa'i sgra spogs dril bu dang // g+hu ru dang ni ye shes dang // 'khor lo thugs dam mchod rten te// 'khor lo mi 'gyur chos sra bskrod// dar dbyangs g.yas dang g.yon du ste// g.yas pachis su 'gyur ba med// g.yon pa zhes//
240b7(rnying rgyud): phyordzogs pa med// de ltar mchid pa'i nyan pa dngas pa// de la mchod pa rnams kyis ni// shar phyogs byams pa brdzogs pa'i mchod rten dang // snying / rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang // dgang ba brla brtsigs pa'i mchod rten dang // btang snyoms don pa thub
241a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdzu nyan ni/ 'i tshad med mchod rten yin// mtshad tan rgyun chos kyi dbyings nyid de// byin gyis brlabs dang ldan par bya// sug nanas kyi dbyings sa nganab// 'bang dge ba brgya dang ldan par byin gyis 'ang ba//
241a2(rnying rgyud): rim bu ni ni dran pa nyer gzhag pa'i// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pabazhi/ yang dag par spong ba ba zhi/ dbang po lnga/ bum gdan stobs lnga dang / bum pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun/ rje ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de la sogs pa bskyed pa'o// yid kyi cho
241a3(rnying rgyud): ti 'dzin lnga// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho rdzing dag na// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten bris// de la ting 'dzin yid kyi mchod pas mchod// yang na mchod pa'i rten bshad pa// khri 'phang ye shes bzhi ru ste// gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum// chags med
241a4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan steng du// bum po zlum po chos kyi rtse// gser gyi dre 'u la 'od zer 'gro// srog shing drang srong bla na med// dag pa rnam lnga'i mchod pas mchod// rang byung grub pa'i mchod rten brgyad la// byams ldan gter gyi mchod rten dang // ther legs yongs
241a5(rnying rgyud): mchod rten dang // sprul pa'i mchod rten dam pa dang // yid bzhin ldan gyis grub pa'i mchod rten dang // dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang // yon tan brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang // rmang grags chos nyid mchod rten dang // khams gsum bde rgyas spong
241a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i mchod rten no// de ni rang byung mchod rten brgyad// sprul ba'i mchod rten yang na bshad// grangs dang dpag las 'das pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i zhing khams na// sku yi mchod rten bsam las 'das// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i mchod pas mchod// rnam par
241a7(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i di khams nas// shes rab spyan dang rdzu 'phrul snyan// sra yi rang sra rgyas kun gyis bskor// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// gsung gi mchod rten bsam las 'das// gsung gi mchod rten thams cad kyang // tshangs pa'i sgra skad phun bum tshogs/
241b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba drug lags la mdzad pa// sma dang dbyangs dang lnga yis mched// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// thugs kyi mchod rten bsam las 'das// mkhyen pa'i ye shas gasngal ba yis// ma rig mun pa sel par mdzad// dmigs pa mdapa' mchad pa
241b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar dbye dang bya ba ste// de skyed dang spyan drang bstim pa dang // phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa 'bul// bstod de 'dod yon gsol ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tA t+pa las/ mchod rten bye dbyed bstan pa dang ngo bo bsnyen pa'i le'u ste brgya
241b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang ni las gsungs pa// mchod rten gzhal yas bskyed pa dang // lha rnams bskyed pa bstan pa yin// rdo rje rigs kyi mchod rten du// khog par gzhal yas bsgom par bya// tshom bu lnga yi gzhal yas la// rin chen
241b4(rnying rgyud): bas brgyan pa dang / rdo rje ka bas mtshan pa'o// ka ba gdung dang bre phul re mig brgyan// 'khor lo rin chen 'od 'bar ba'o// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yin// tham rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas yin// de la dang rang sems dpar ldan// de la mchod
241b5(rnying rgyud): dang las bya'o// rigs dang mthun pa'i mchod pa'o// rin chen rigs kyi mchod rten du// ka gdung bre phul re mig bzhi// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su rin chen 'byung ldan la// rigs bzhi sangs rgyas dag gis bskor// sems dpa' sem
241b6(rnying rgyud): ma 'khor dang bcas// de la rigs mthun mchod pas mchod// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor yin// dbus su snang ba mtha' yas la// phyogs bzhi rigs bzhi sangs rgyas yin// rang rang sems dpas bskor ba'o//
241b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs las kyi rigs kyi mchod rten du// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su don yod grub pa yin// tha ma rigs bzhi sangs rgyas te// rang rang sems dpa' dag dang ldan// de ltar rigs kyi mchod pas mchod// sngags dang phyag rgya gong bzhin
242a1(rnying rgyud): sum mchod rten can pa ni// dbyas sa rnam par blang ma dadal// sems dpa' sems sus bskod ra// gang gi mchod rten chen pan// dab+h+yas su srung bamatha' mas la// sems dpang semasams pad dag
242a2(rnying rgyud): ci mchod rten chen po ni// dbus mdza sems dpa' la// sems dpa' semasams bskod pa'o// de la mchod dang 'dod ni gsol// zhes gsungs sa// rta mchog rol pa'i ta las/ mchod rten ba byed pa'i dang
242a3(rnying rgyud): pa// / de nas tshig pa sgrub bde de bka' stsal pa// gnyis med dag pa'i zhing khams nas// rang byung mchod rten chen po batha~Md // 'gro ba'i don du ldan drangs te// gzugs brtan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis po rlabs shing ga shegs
242a4(rnying rgyud): gsol// gsal la dag pa'i gnas mchog nas// sprul pa'i mchod rten brgyad pa yang // 'gro ba'i don du sbyin drang te// gzugs brtan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis brlabs shing ga sheg su gsol// rnam par dag pa'i dang khams nas// 'i
242a5(rnying rgyud): rkyen ba ma las 'das// shes rab ca' dang rngu 'phrul ldan// s+yA yi sangs rgyas gan gyis bkod// 'gro ba'i don du phyin drangs te// gzugs brtan mtshad rten dam pa lA// byin gyis brlab sa shing gshegs su gso// rnam par dag pa ning khams na
242a6(rnying rgyud): gra ni mchod rten pasam las dngas// wa dang dbyangs dang sde y-i'aM// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal ba yis// ma rig mun pa kun sa dab// dmigs pa mad pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// 'gro ba'i don du sman drangs te// gzugs brtan mchod rten dam pal/
242a7(rnying rgyud): da kyipang drang du zhing gshegs su gsol// rnam par dge pa'i bams nas// thugs kyi mchod rten bsamasas 'das// mthun pa'i mi shes gas pa pa gyis/ mang gsun sapa marjod // dmigs pa yod du kyi dzin pa sgom//
242b1(rnying rgyud): don du kun drung nas// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// yid kyi mchod rten ting 'dzin su// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mcho'i dang // byung chub sems kyi mchad rten bri// ma lus bzhugs pa thams ca
242b2(rnying rgyud): kyang // ting 'dzin gsal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas kyang // gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// rigs kyi mchod rten chen po lnga// rang byung rten pa'i gnas yin te//
242b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i don du spyan dradra nas// gzugs brtan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// yang dag don du dag mod kyang // 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil nas kyang // rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs su
242b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// oM e ha ra a hA ra sarba bi ta ra su tsi te ga gnas ma ye swA hA/ d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke/ gan d+he/ de ltar mchod dang bstod pa bya// sngags kyi rim pa bzla bar bya// phyag rgya yang ni de bzhin gshegs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol
242b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tan+da las/ mchod pa'i rten spyan dradra pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so gsum pa'o// / de nas gzungs sngags 'thon pa ste// na maHsa man+ta/ bud d+hA nA na/ ga d+he d+har ma d+hA tu swA hA/ sa gzhi chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags
242b6(rnying rgyud): so// leg pa thal mo khong stod sbyar// sngags pa'i phyag rgya de yis ni// byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o// lag pa thal mo khong stong sbyar// sor mo rnams ni phyir bgyid de// pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'dra bar b+ha// na maHsa man+ta shun+yA ta dz+nyA na sA traM/ mang khri byin gyis
242b7(rnying rgyud): brlad pa'o// lag pa thal mo sbyar ba phyir bkyed de// mthe'u chung gnyis ni nang du bkug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo ru// mdzub mo gnyis ni bkug la sbyar// na maHsa man+ta byAd+d+hA nAn ta thA ga ta sI ti swA hA/ tri ba aM bud ga gnas ma ya swA hA/ dran pa
243a1(rnying rgyud): bar gzhag pa'i phyag rngu yin// lag pa khang stong thal ma sbyang // mdzub ma gnyis bsgrer tshogs ni gsum pa dgug/ namaHsa mahAHtAnAn/ a ta sra ga ta sa ma tapra ta bi sh+tsad+d+he swAdz+dza/ de 'din gshegs
243a2(rnying rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin no// bum rten stobs lnga dang / bum pa byang chub yanI lag bdun dang / 'khor lo de bzhinani gshegs pa'i stobs brgya dang /
243a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / de la sogs pa 'bras bu'i chos nyid dbyings su byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ stobs bcu'i sngags dang phyag rgyar 'dus te/ lag pa gnyis thal mo 'ong rting du srur te/
243a4(rnying rgyud): bang gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du bcug la/ gcig dang sprad la 'di ni stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn da sha ba la kata ras d+hi sa dza swA hA/ tog dkar byin gyis brlab pa ni// lag gnyis khu tshurab sangs pa la// gung mo gnyis bslangs te/
243a5(rnying rgyud): tshegs dbus mar dgug/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor bsgrengs te/ rdo rje rtse lnga par byas la/ ni maHsa mat+te bud+d+hA nAn d+harma ka ya swA hA/ dar dbyangs mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlab pa ni/ lag gnyis rdal mo khong stong kyang // mdzub mo gnyis dgu
243a6(rnying rgyud): mthodor nang du bzung / srin lag gnyis kyang mtho bong bar du mdzub mo btegs pa'i bar du bzung / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ sarba d+ha mo sa man+ta pra ba te thA ga ta ma nu ga ta swA hA/ chos thams cad mnyam nga nyid du rtogs par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de ltar gA
243a7(rnying rgyud): 'ang byas pa dang // dbang bsrur spyan drang zhal sro dang // lha yi sun ni dbye bya'o// bskor ba bya dang sgra stan bsgrag/ da gyi lnga ldi phyang 'phrul gdags// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+na las/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste brgya dang so bzhi
243b1(rnying rgyud): ba// denas yang thag nang nga dang ga stan las langs te/ dbang can 'das pa'i rgyal pa la 'dis du tsas gas pas+ho// sems can kyi yonas byas nas// ngan ma gnas su 'tham par// dal drang thabs yarang lags/ mdun
243b2(rnying rgyud): 'das sdes bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// dbang rkyen kun 'dus bka' stsal pa// sams ldan las kyi 'khyams pa de// 'khor ba ngan song gnas nas drang ba ni/ thabs dang shas rab ldan pas drangs// nyon cig rje rnams dpa rtse//
243b3(rnying rgyud): midus byas hU~M/ ngan song 'bar pa'i gting nani// rtog pa'i drabs ba'i ngas nas 'khor ba'i sti yis bzung // tshul badzin chom nyid dang du bsngal dgas pas// de nas sems can byin bdang ste// gnyen pa dang las byung ba yin// mig las sa
243b4(rnying rgyud): dgod pas// yi shes mi yi dkyil 'khor gyur// ye shes mo dang byung chub sems kyis mes// sems can mtshan mang bag chags bsgeg par mdzad// lba las drang gi dkyil 'khor gyur// bdag gi ting 'dzin yaM shus drung // sde mched chos kyi rlung gis
243b5(rnying rgyud): hU~M// 'gag/ mang ni dag stong par bsgom/ lce stengs ba nas rgya 'di la byung // ting 'dzin la zhes chu bo dang // byang chub sems kyi na po yis// dge zugs de dge bkrus par bsgo pa// de nas hU~M sa rab brjod pas// sems can phung po rin pa
243b6(rnying rgyud): gad+hA lAms khang du byang pung // gzhayo yis pa rnyed na dang/ tu zhes ni rjod pa yis// sems can ti mig ga 'dug/ rdugs kyi mi gdudagis spangs// ngad ga te nyid pa ba rdzung byung // de lasrung pa'i ba'adral byung /
243b7(rnying rgyud): drug tu ma yin te// 'i yig mags mtshan// ting gang rkyeni dag dpa ste// skye gang mig smra yinan// gang pa'i marjel du tu snang bsgom// smras smras pa yin pan/ hUM sa oM// tshig pacad 'di las pagachags srung /
244a1(rnying rgyud): oMms ma sa namam par gyung// tshad kyi bgachags de snang // skalas pa shes yad pas// dza byung gnags das patha'// sbrulas sa nas sa sgrubs// da kyi das gnan// skangs

244a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhi dang ldan// zug tu chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dkyil rigs kyis sgra bcud pas// lha ma yin gyi gnas kyang stong // rin chen rigs kyi drug sbe ma stong // 'byung ldan gnasasasgra spa na pa// steng gang yig d+ha skem pas/

244a6(rnying rgyud): bar// lce snying mig oM bskam pas// spang ba mtha' mas yab sum bapyod// thag tu chen pa bzhi dang rtan// phyag tu chen po'i na rlabs kyis// 'dad chags rigs kyi bcud pas// mi dwags rnams kyi gnas spongs sa// badz+ra gas
244a7(rnying rgyud): thugs dam rgong // mtha' yas gnas su wa rin phaT// spyi bor yig oM bsgom pas// rnam par snang mdzad yab sum bskyed// phyag rgya chen ba bzhi dang ldan// phyag tu blon pa'i byin drags kyi // gti mug rigs kyi slobacad pas// rgyam
244b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyaganas bya shAs// da zhon gshegs pa // gas dam thong // sbyad mdzu gan sus ma nApan// dgang bad pa gnas na// rgyun gyi panangs pad+ma ng+tha/ sa kyi su kya pa // nas cang ba snang bdang // na
244b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad srung ba yi// don gyi 'di rnams brjod par gsungs// hUM sems can chen po khyod nyen cig/ khyod kyi lnga phung yan lag ni// gzugs kyi phung po snang mdzad do// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan te// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas yin// 'di byed don yon
244b3(rnying rgyud): grub pa la// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' yin// phung po lnga yang mngon sangs rgyas// snyigs ma lnga yang bde ldan gnas// shig b+ha ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan nas gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi gzugs kyi
244b4(rnying rgyud): lag la// 'byung ba chen po lnga gnas te// khyod kyi sha ni sa yin te// sa ni yum chen sangs kyis sun// khyod kyi drod ni mo yin te// me ni yum chen gos dkar mo// khyod kyi khrag ni chu yin te// chu ni yum chen mA ma ki// khyod kyi dbugs ni rlung yin te// rlungani
244b5(rnying rgyud): yum chen dmatshig sgrol// khyod kyi sems ni nam mkha' yin// nam mkhang kun tu bzang mo yin// 'byung ba lnga yang mngon sangs rgyas// sdigs ma lnga yang bde ldan gnas// shi ba bya ba'i ming yang med// mi 'gyur brten pas gser bzhin no// sems

245a1(rnying rgyud): gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi yan lag sgo bzhi ni// khro bo chen po bzhi yin te// lag pa g.yas pa stobs po che// lag pa g.yon pa gshin rje gshed// rkang pa g.yas pa rta mchog dpal
245a2(rnying rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// de yi yum bzhi khro mo bzhi// mi pham ma dang khro gnyer ma// ral gcig ma dang ro langs ma// yan lag bzhi yang mngon sangs rgyas// shi ba bya ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtad pas gser bzhin no// de nas

245a7(rnying rgyud): mdangs 'dus pa'i thig le che// rtag pa chen po dag la gang gnas pa// rtag pa chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lha// thig le chen po kun nas thams cad gnas// mkhas pas btsal kyang rnyed par ga la gyur// mi 'gyur yum gyi gzhal yas su// skal bldan
245b1(rnying rgyud): brjod nyid kyi// rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed par byar// pha ral phyin pa bcu rdzogs shes rab dbyings kyi ba zla// dam chag snying rjer 'brel pa'i shul zor zhing // dam tshig kun gyi mchog la rin chen gsad// ka la ping ka la yi chud phreng la// mtha' gnyis nas
245b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes smyug ma la// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i me la sros// nyon mongs dug gsum 'joms pa'i chu phyung la// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgo bzhi de la bskyon// rno dpal ting 'dzin mde'u yin// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yang gsum gyis// nga dang
245b3(rnying rgyud): bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa bcom// sru las bskyed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras su bsgom// mi 'gyur yum gyi mkha' dbyings rnam dag pas// rgyal ba'i sras su ma lus bskyed par bya'o// bral ba dgongs pa kun 'dus pa// dbang yang de nyid nyid du rdzogs
245b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro de ni thabs kyi bskul ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// yang bzhu yang brtul gser dpe bzhin// bzhu brtul ting 'dzin rtsal yang sbyang // de la nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol// dkyil 'khor
245b5(rnying rgyud): yang dkyil 'khor thim// zhes gsungs sa// rta mchog rol pa'i tar+d+ha las/ nyon mongs 'khor ba'i gnas nas drang zhing don la dgod pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so lnga pa'o// / bcom ldan dbang chen kun 'dus la// phyag na rdo rjes yang gsolapa

248b4(rnying rgyud): brI darje buM phres/ shrI badz+ra A mokaDI/ shrI badz+ra d+ha ts+tshe gan/ spos kyi sprin lding bdag pa mo// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khong bajug pas 'gengs// byams pa'i thabs dang shes rab la// badz+ra d+ha pa mchod pa rol// uthal mthing ka me tog 'thod// b+hag marin chen 'phro

248b6(rnying rgyud): dbor gsal ba'i thig le 'bebs// btang snyoms thabs dang shes rab la// badz+ra gan+d+he mchod pa rol// phyi yi mchod pa dam pa 'di// tshad med bzhi dang mnyam par gyod// a la la ste mchid pa 'bul// thabs dang shes rang ldan gyur cig/ byang chub sems dang

249a1(rnying rgyud): 'du na [рд╜] // mas nga pa byur// sa // sa 'du // /
249a2(rnying rgyud): sbyi ga de// blo song lta bu ye nus te// do dang ma na// 'did sngon lhagan ba rnams pa ni// rkang pas stobs byed lag gir bgyur// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blangs nas ni// dkyil bong rtswa la mchod par 'phrul// 'a ba cim byed padzi na chos
249a3(rnying rgyud): mchog/ tshem stong ngo nyid kyi gzhi// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te// rdo rje lha ma dri mchog ma// 'dod yon phyag na bsnams pa ste// rkang pa stabs byed lag gar bsgyur// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blangs nas ni// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par 'bul// bde'ang/
249a4(rnying rgyud): mis sa/ mang / 'du nga 'as ga byas ma sbya pastod/

249a6(rnying rgyud): gi rdo rje dbyings dang lha rnams la// byang chungab rdo rje lha mdul lha mo brgya gnyis kyi mchod pa 'brel ba'i le'u ste brgya dngas dgu pa'o// / de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i khro ba'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa 'bul ba 'di gsungs so// debang shug chen
249a7(rnying rgyud): royi'i grong dang // byang cung rdo sum dral dang // khro ba'i rgyal po mtha'alas dang // mamam par 'gro tshogs chen dang // lha dang lha min rnal dbyor pas// thag dang 'thad pa'i gnas chen 'dir// kun zang mchod ljin mchog tu la// dam tshig bzhin 'i rtsa
249b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang gagags sa gsal// gzugs dang spa dang dra dang // ngag na rgyas la sogs pas// 'dad lan sngam mchad pa 'di/ bde ba dag grags pa rnams la 'bral// ul la nye ba nas sugs la// al la nyi dgyes par mdzod// btod pa dang ni gshags
249b2(rnying rgyud): dgas dang 'dzi da brda 'a da gtub/ brgyu ldanas ma ma can pa/ nyim sbyin 'di ba ba la da/ sa dpa 'dzin pa 'ad kyil 'khri nga / dpal dang ci dU ba mag la lo// 'du byang
249b3(rnying rgyud): ma// 'jigs bye ngam/ stabs brkyang ba ma tshul du 'azhugs// ba byed bskal ba'i ma sbyar 'ab ba ste// gdug pa thams cad rdorje'i zhal du 'dren// mi bzad marde bas brgyan pa'i zhal gdangs shing // khams gsum za par byed pa'i don smra na/
249b4(rnying rgyud): 'ab ba'i rgyun gyi yang migagis// bgags dpa theg par mdang la phyag la bstod// de nas mchod par bral ba ni// lharnams mnyes par bye min// de nas dbang gi stan lastsal// tshogs kyi mchod pa dgralang nI// phrin gsung ba mched pas pa//
249b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs bdag pa rgyun// tshigs kyis nga ba ba shegs sags s+ho// sgra'i bas rnams chags smin pa can// gsang ni skal bcanas kyi s+ho// thugs nas ma rdzogs kyis rtan// da la du tshigs kyis brtan//
249b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis brtson// zhal ni nyi ma tha'ang las brtan// choms ni ma brjid rdzogs kyis brtan// phyag na na man tshogs kyis bstan// bas mi mtha' thags kyis brgyan// tshogs chen sbyin gyi dkyil khong nga // skatshogs rtag ma cing gsheg
249b7(rnying rgyud): nar la// chogs ga gnas nas kyang // dbyini pa tshogs pa la// spyan nas can sal ngas// kunan tu chags pa sa// nangs na dru su mchil sa// sngags tam ba sa// sa ni na shing sa
250a1(rnying rgyud): cu/ zhabs ni slob tshogs pa ngos// gsung na masring tshogs pa sa// tshogs can tshogs pa'i dkyil ra ba dang // lhatshogs mdun mang skad ci gshegs// thugs pa'i lcags lugs padrung 'dral dang // rdzams
250a2(rnying rgyud): zhags pas gnas nas sun yang 'dren// lcags sgrog gnas nas po nyas gnas bskyod la// bde gshegs dgyes pa bskyed cing bzhugs su gsol// gzugs dang spa dang dri dang ngo // reg bya ches la sogs pa yi// 'dod pon lnga yi mchod pa 'di/
250a3(rnying rgyud): ba ga glegs pa dbul lags na// dgyes pa'i dini la gshegs pa smras pa/ de nas pad te// // dbyeng drug byung ba ba dkyil 'bing nas// ba la po khyod sa can// dngus phyag cing brgya med te// 'bad dzigan/
250a4(rnying rgyud): pa bzhi yis brgyan// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bgrang // dpal gyi chas brgyad sA la rab tu rdzogs// gdug pa'i mtshon che sna tshogs phyag na bsdams// rgya skad rngam pa'i dri sgra rdor re// gdug pa'i 'khor rnams mang po las la 'gyed// dbang
250a5(rnying rgyud): mchog 'bar ba'i skul phyag 'tshal bstod// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i phre'u ste brgya dang bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ rol mo sgra yi mchid pa gsungs// de nas yang ni las gsungs pa/
250a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa'i las bya'o// dkar dmar sems kyi 'phro 'du las// byang chub sems su byin brlabs nas// lha la mchod cing las rnams bcol// gsang ba byung chub sems kyi/ mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes
250a7(rnying rgyud): meta ma mchog gi mchod pa ste// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa ste// hUM nyid dag pa ri ngo bo bstan// dag pa'i don gyis de nyid don// chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol// dkyil 'khor la yang dkyil 'khor thim// sprul pa chos nyid ngang dungal// dus gsum dag

256a7(rnying rgyud): dadong bsrur nas// tsu srung thugs su tags byer ba'o// de yidon rnams bshad pa so// phyi nang gesang byug su mdu bshad// byi ltar mngon par byang drub rnga// nang ltar ye shas chen po rje// na long lta khur la shes dang // stan pa nyid kyim nas
256b1(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid kyi ye shes dang // sa sang rtog pa'i ye shes dang // bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang // gsang ba chos su bde chen lnga// de ltar dbang bskur 'bras bu de// de ltar gzhan zhig ga la yod// rgyal bas btsal yang mi rnyed do// zhes gsungs sa//
256b2(rnying rgyud): mchog ral pa'i taSh+Tha las// gro rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bsrung ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bzhi pa'o// / phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyung
256b3(rnying rgyud): med dkyil 'khor ni// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam myong bas// rdzogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa dam tshig mchog/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ khrol khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khrod dpal
256b4(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs med po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya m+me/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho// de yis gshegs dang 'dod don gsol// las la rab tu bkod pa yin/

256b6(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas ni/ dbu'i steng du bskyed/ rig pa'i khro mo ni/ don gyi gas le/ dbu'i gzhal yas la gnang na/ phyi rin po che'i pho brang 'bar ba/ nang rAg dmar po gsal ba'i gzhal yas la/ byi ru'i zla ga masgo gcig pa de re yod pa/ mtha'am

257a3(rnying rgyud): tshags// yum ni gnyis med dang du 'azil// bde gshegs lnga yi thugs kan// mu tig dkar po zhu 'gang 'dril// byang chub sems kyi gnas chen po// bad+ma gshegs yum pa'i mkha' dbyings la// pad+ma rAg 'od du 'chil// dkar dam 'gye ba'i

257b1(rnying rgyud): long brgyad po ma rungs pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyud 'dzin cing // rigs kyi sangs rgyas kun la bskor// zhing khams chen po yongs su myong // 'bar ba'i las kun 'grub par byed// dpal gyi dgyes pa rab tu song // mi bzang 'bar ba'i sku lus pa// ri ring garda /

260b4(rnying rgyud): na byung nas brdung // mtshams pa zhi bri bzhi byung ba ni// byang gang mtshams nas gzil bri// shar d+ha mtshoms nas lcags kyi blo// mi thub mtshams nas bsol khro// drub byung mtshams nas mche ba'i za// lal dbyed chen po 'dul// la lags 'phrul

260b6(rnying rgyud): la// chom bu brgyad kyi blo brdungs pas// tha ma na dang mnyam par snad// shes rab pa la sbyin pa'i blo// 'di ni dpal gyi thug sa ma yin// 'di ni maming dngos grub min// 'din po nyi'i longs spyod min// de pyid kyu bro rgyan mi 'chad// kun tu bzung po

261a1(rnying rgyud): zlo// las 'jig rten bar smad no// la drug po thugs kyis// lal mos pargyan rdzom// lal sangs spyod pa la ba'o// lal srang ba gnas byaza// grol namagrangs pas ma mi khyab// grul yon tan dpag mi rung //
261a2(rnying rgyud): la man ngag sna tshogs te// bro mo ming ni d+ha ho// glu mi ming ni bA sha r+the// tshig gi ming ni ar+tha sha/ 'di yang sugasung thugs kyi phreng // thabs kyi phul po rtogs pa'i dngang // che b.lung gi khyad par pa// bron phrin pas chen por myor// ni da pa'i rdul khor ba dang
261a3(rnying rgyud): chog ni 'bral ba med pa'i don// rgyal po kun dang mnyam skyor bste// sngags kyi ji tshig chen po yin// sA la pad+ma rol pa'i zla// 'gag pa med pa'i tshul gyis brdung // yum rdzim pa' dang myor ba'o// de nas shes rab thabs kyis dz+ra// b+hag ri gnas
261a4(rnying rgyud): bdung // de nas dbang po yul gyi bri// lha mo brgyad la thabs kyis ral// de nas gdul bya dbang gi zo// rtswa mgrin rgyal po'i 'khor la brdung // de nas mos pa rgyan gyi zo// mthing rtse mtsho'i 'khor la brdung // de nas srud byed thabs kyis bri// phyogs bcu'i
261a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor ma lus brdung // thabs dang shes dang ldan sbyor na// gru bro dam tshig rgyal blo yin// rtag par bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i phyir// bro ni bar chad med par brdung // blta ba drang por bya ba'i phyir// glu ni 'du 'bral med par blang // dkyil 'khor rang la gas
261a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// tshig ni snying po 'dzab tu bzla// phung po gtan nas gzhom pa'i phyir/ zhes gsungs so// ta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ glu grogasang ba'i la'u ste brgya dang de gsum pa'o// / 'jig tun rim gyis sdang ba'i phyir// da na
261a7(rnying rgyud): laza ba ngur ste// bra ma ming ni A ka sha/ sku'i ming ni A mur// tshig gi med ni ma man tse// dregs pa lha tshan snying gar brdung // 'khor tshogs ma lus thabs kyis 'dren// longs myod bzhi la chags pa'o// bsad nams chen po dbang du srud//
261b1(rnying rgyud): samar+d+ha badz+rA rtA/ da na bdud la tho brdung ste// bro yi ming ni myur du// klu yi ming ni ma grub// tshig gi ming ni ma nu kA/ bdud kyi snying 'gro brdungs pas// zhe sdang rgyal po thal bar chog/ 'khor ni dag stan chag gi rten// bdud kyi longs spyod dbrog par bya// na
261b2(rnying rgyud): maHsa ma n+ti da ni grul bro brdung ste// zo yi ming ni bal ta// klu yi ming ni n+ya gsu// tshig gi ming nI/ gru 'brug snying gar bro brdungs pas// gti lhag rdul po thal bar rtog/ 'khor ni sgra sbyin tshig gi rten// klu la dngos grubar thog
261b3(rnying rgyud): par bya// ni maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ nA ga dung dung / da ni lha min 'joms pa'i blo// bro yi ming ni a kri shAM/ gru yi ming ni zla mam+mA// tshig gi ming ni A kar sha/ bro brdung lha min snying gang brdung// nga rgyal chen po rdul du rlog/ lha mini dngos byab dbrog pa
261b4(rnying rgyud): byed// namaHa man+ta N+Tat+tha/ tri sha na yAn na/ da ni bro brdung bgegs chen 'joms// bro yi ming ni bin+naka/ b+hU mi ming ni / tshig gi ming ni tsa mun sha/ bgogs kyi snying labre ba dungs pas// phrag dag rgyal po rdul du rlog/ ces gsung
261b5(rnying rgyud): so// rta mchog rol pa'i tar+b+he las/ 'jig rten gyi bro'i le'u ste brgya dang re bzhi pa'o// / de nas ngag gi dbang phyug gis// bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang chen 'dus pa'i gtso// sems can
261b6(rnying rgyud): yi dus byas nas// ngan song gnas su 'gro ba la// de las bzlog thabs ston pas gsungs// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig ngag gi dbang phyug che// sems can de dag bzlog pa ni/
261b7(rnying rgyud): can dbugs dang bral ma thag/ de la las ni gnyis yod de// dge ba can dang sdig pa can// phas kyi shugs kyis 'phen pa yin// de tshe dus la bab pa'i tshe// shi nas par mdo dun// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du gnas// de la las rnams ci byas
262a1(rnying rgyud): dran// dal ba rnam pan ste// de la sangs drug la sadu ga// nam thug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// brdabatud pa la brgyad can// dalal ma da pas ta da// das g+sa bA Sh+Ta da// don dgas
262a2(rnying rgyud): thal ma thag/ lhang bsgom bzlas pa'i sngags rdu las// khrus zas mdzes pas dkris nas gsaci// gru bzhid kyil 'khor gsal ba la// g.yas nas bro bde rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dgeb// dem steng du zhi rdo rjin gyi gyung gi ba 'dug dang/
262a3(rnying rgyud): A/ snying mthing nag dang te 'og min gnas// dkyil 'khor pa skyor ba rA du ni// mdun du mched pa'i rnam pa bsag/ de nas gsang ba me blag mtshams// de nas bum pa gzhal yas bzhed par bya// de nas nyams pa bshags par byung// byin gyis brla'as
262a4(rnying rgyud): byis nas su// las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// oM dngal gyi 'phro 'dra yis// gru gsum mthing nag 'bang ba la// nang du khro bo'i gzhal las bskyed// de nas lha rnams bskyed par bya// mchod pa rim par bya ba ste// 'dzab dang bsnyen pa de bzhin
262a5(rnying rgyud): te// de nas bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor la// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba la// drug tu rtsa brgyad khro bo bgyid// badz+ra he ru ka yi dbu sted khros ste// de yi steng du che mchog bskyed// spyan drang bstim pa la sogs bya// 'gro bu'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor ma
262a6(rnying rgyud): de yi 'gro 'dus sems can don byas nas// thams cad sgrib pa bral ba'o// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang de bzhin bya// tha ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'das pa de la byin gyis rlobs// tsha las 'das pa'i shes pa de// bkug la phra
262a7(rnying rgyud): brtsim// den pa nyid pas sbyangs thas pa// drug gi las bkag rgyal ba'i sras// bkru bya ga chubaskyed pa // ta drug sem pa gzhag pa'o// lharnams sbyor de mang dpalas// byang sems cad kyi 'dradas// mdzag pa'i sunags pa nas//
262b1(rnying rgyud): ris drug lam bkag bde la bkod// de nas rigs lnga che mchog dang // drug sbyor ba yi byang chub sems// de nyid sems dpa' phru gu sgying dkyil na// rtsal rigs drug gis bon drug bod pa de sbyangs nas/ chos nyid rtsal lha dang mi// dud 'gror bro ba 'dra dang /
262b2(rnying rgyud): por gyur// snying po su dang tri yin no// ye shes rtsa la lha dang mir skye ba'i sa bona'ang mthing ga ste/ snying po a dang nr-i yin no// rang rgyud kyi rtsal dmyal ba dang yi dwags su skye ba'i snying po 'od dmar por gyur/ snying po du dang bro yin no// de las 'od kyi gang bur gyur pa de ni//
262b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i ngo bo yin te/ oM dkar la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum bsgoms/ rdo rje sems dpa' byams pa dag pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang gsum du bskyed/ de ltar khams gsum yi ger gyur nas su/ yab yum drug tu gsal tsam na/ pad+ma can gyis/
262b4(rnying rgyud): le'o// de nas sems dpa' phrug des/ he ru ka gsang ba'i skyabs zhugs nas/ nyid kyi dbu mi steng du ni/ tshe mchog ma ba'i nang du phyin pa'o// del tshe mchog yab yum dbang bskur bas/ lha gsum he ru gsum 'gyu te/ de gsum rang yum ldan pa
262b5(rnying rgyud): dbang mchog yeb yum rol pa'i stobs kyis bzhanas/ tshe mchog mkha' lab sgra'o// shes rab ye shes dbang dang ldan// lus la stong phrag ca yod de// bde ba rgyas nas chos nyid mi rtog pa'i// ya~M nas rgyan po gsal can// phyogs btsurasangs rgyas
262b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ldan gyis thub// 'phar mchags canas pasmin// thams cad rigs ni lhan gyis grub// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog dal ba'i tanA las/ tsho'i dus byas pa don bya ba'i gabu ste brgya dang sngangag/
262b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dbang gi rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ ngag ge dbang byug ston gyi// sbyin pa'i bang ba sbyin pa ni// rgyung nyid byeng nyid 'gag med dang // snying rje chen po'i snying po can// sngon pa la sogs paso rnams yin// ye shes tshogs ni mtha' dag bsgrub// des mdzan
263a1(rnying rgyud): na/ par brtan par bya// rgya mchags dang 'bras bu tshogs// chags la yon tan bsam mi khyag/ 'das byas dag pa 'di byas pas// ska ma tsamathod de// phyo ga med pa'i sa la sangs mirgya// byin pa srungang data bya
263a2(rnying rgyud): nams tshogs ni chos la bsgom pa'o// de ltar mnyam par bzhag nas sangs kyis 'bras bu thob// mtshan can ba rnam pas mtshan med thob// snang ba de nyid stod pa min// de yi dang las gnas par bya// de ster bska mo pas sangs rgyas yin// zhes gsung ngo /
263a3(rnying rgyud): mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i le'u sde brgya dang de drug pa'o// / ngag gi dbang phyug lpags par nyon// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa ni// bsgom pa'i gas pa dmigs bstan pa ni// tshul khrims bsrung
263a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan gyis// gzugs dang mthun pa 'thob pa ste// thams cad zin dang ma zin pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar// sems can mtha' dag nyid 'tsho ba'i// yon tan phung po dag dang ldan// don dam par
263a5(rnying rgyud): sems ni nang du yang mi gnas/ phyi rol du yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// 'das pa'i sems kyang mi dmigs/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang mi dmigs/ sems skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa'i tshe gang du/
263a6(rnying rgyud): yang mi 'gro ste/ byang chub sems ma bcos pa'i tshul la gnas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i le'u ste brgya dang de bdun pa'o// / ngag gi dbang phyug da nyon cig
263a7(rnying rgyud): bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// bzod pa'i ngang la gnas par byas te// 'khor ba 'di dag thams cad mi rtag ste// 'khor ba'i chos 'di thams cad ni// thams cad mi tog rang bzhin te// don dam par brtags dben pa'o// bsgom bzhi gnas lhag mthong gnyis//

264a4(rnying rgyud): shes do// 'bod da 'dzin nyid du/ rtogs pa ni nyid ngas// bzod par byed pa 'ang nyid pa// gnas par byed pa nga nyid rin// mtha thug pa yang dad do// deti rtogs pa'i dris nyid na// sangs ces sems cad dbyeng ba dzin// nanan rtog

267b2(rnying rgyud): na rtogs pa gying chubs nas// gzugs med pa yang byang mamams// gzugs pa rtogs pa zang na pa ni seMn// ba rnan pa yang byang chu mamas+ho// gnyis med pa 'a kyang chubs byas// gang ra byang chu sa// da sa bya
267b3(rnying rgyud): chung sems yin pas// sems kyis skyong brtag pa dang // ye shes can pa nyid min// gan bad da nyi man// thams cad sasmras satogs pa ga / mdzongs nadang tog pa nas// dun sa gtsug pa sa med pa bshad/
267b4(rnying rgyud): bran thang byang chubabad chen po// thams cad thams cad sems pa 'dra// sems las ma gtogs gang yang med// rtog pa med pa kyang chub sems// gnyis ka yang ni byang chub sa pas/ de kyi sems kyi de ma d+haM// dka dam mdzad
267b5(rnying rgyud): rnag pa dang // seng pa la sogs rdzug tshang // dz+wal bdag sa sa ni// dmang la dngas la bathun // bdag rdza da 'bang ba// dmangal kra ba nas sa grags// rgyuN+Din pangs bzub ste// byang chub sams kyig pa mye te// des
267b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad bskyed pa yin// de yis thams cad gnas pa meni// yi ga thams cad dalas bgyid// 'thung ba rdza yang de las cad// sprul pa'i nad thams cad mkhyen// 'd-i'i phre byang chubs mam// dran tu sangs pas mongs stong rdzogs// dgyur/

268a3(rnying rgyud): dang yang zhing gam// gsal lam 'dres kha dog gsal// bskyed dang g.yo dang stong pa gsum// sa bon tshul du brten pa gsum// sa ban tshul du bstan pa yin// de las 'bar ba gzugs tshad bshad// thaHsa cad dog 'dzin gsal byed de/

272b6(rnying rgyud): par byab ma yin no// gcig pus ga gnas pa ni// gtso bar bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje gnas pa lu gu rgyud// dral bar bya ba ma yin no// byang chub sems kyi 'bras bul// spang blang byab mo yin no// rig pa'i thugs rje lpags kyul// spad par bya
272b7(rnying rgyud): yin no// dbyings kyi padz+ra 'bung ba la// smad par bya ba ma yin no// mi nub pa yi rgyal mtshan la// de la rtag par bya ba min// gsang ba'i thabs dang shes rab la// de la gnas pasmad pa min// thugs rje 'dren pa'i phu gu rgyud// gtang bar byab ma yin na//
273a1(rnying rgyud): dag gnam ma da da gas so// dam mgag dang sa dpa/ ung gnas smram khas gsangs so// ma gangs 'ablangs da gsuzhan pa'i ponas pa dang gag gangan
273a2(rnying rgyud): dang ston sa sa/ na pa gyid pa min / ni gags di sa sa// bas ca kyang na bsam // na ba/ dag tsu/
273a3(rnying rgyud): laganas pa ste// da ye nga la gnas pa ni// zhom pachen por bsan pa yin// ma bcos pa ni gnyis med don// gsalal ma 'dres so so dag/ gcig dang bdad gran sa ngo bo sa// de yang wA ba'i rdul po yin// byang chub sems sangs chus te/ sangs
273a4(rnying rgyud): chub sems nyid mes// sem pa ni gan mang po da// nab zhed la dngas bskyed// mad pa ma yin pa pa snang // rtag pa pa medang bzed// nang pa ma yin pa ga dang // gnyis mam gnas yangang // gas ngas med pa dang /
273a5(rnying rgyud): dog med par blta ba yin// byed pa med pas thab med// kun nas ma bcos gsal ba yin// rang byung ye shes chen po ste// le nas ma bcos rang bzhin ngang gis gnas// de las dang rim pa med// rdzogs khyab dang byung ye shes yin// thams cad byang chub
273a6(rnying rgyud): sems la 'dus// sems las mya gtogs pa shes med// med pa ma yin dran zhing tshor/ 'di na gsang ba rtog ge la// rnams kyang zhes su gsung bar zad/ klog pa thams cad chos nyid bsdu/ skrod pa thams cad pa gags pa// ci smad kyi sto
273a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs kyang // sems pas ma gtogs pa shes med// thams cad byang chubasemasas la// gaba'i gdeng dang ldan gyur bas// groms mdang 'bras pa 'thob/ spang bsgrub sa yin don rig par// zhes gsungs sa// rta mchog ral pa
273b1(rnying rgyud): ga sa sa mas na na su rnam sa // na
273b2(rnying rgyud): da/ ba pa rjo ba // da pargyal ba su yi/ cid sa bgyid pad/ bamed pa pa gags so// chen po dmi yang/ dpag nga rje
273b3(rnying rgyud): da brtan pa yin// gas pa'i dmachog gsungs pabyed/ gas su thod bad pa pan// myong ba pa dang tshag tu byings// gcang pe med par spyod pa dang // srang ben med pa'i thod padung // thang da med pa spod pa dang // nyes panyid partso
273b4(rnying rgyud): na pa'ispyod pal/ nga ba da da pa skyes thong sa pas 'i / med /
273b5(rnying rgyud): ba byed // / sasu dz+haiM shAg / sa
273b6(rnying rgyud): tha~Mg ga rnal pa/ byung ba pa'i brag danas/ 'od zer bas pa chis mi thob pa bcu ste/ thams cad padabang sbal ba da bar dgar po dang / dper ba dang par po dang / mthing gdang spang bral sogs pa 'thos pa las/ dalas padi dag shegs par
273b7(rnying rgyud): nga skyes pa bang las rgyal das/ spang gdes 'apa/ la bas tha'
274a1(rnying rgyud): gzengs pa lta bu dang / dal sogs pa mang ba 'thon nas/ dbang gzhing yongs su srung ba'o// de nas mkha' 'gro med rnams sha la rngam pa dang / khrag la rngub pa tshul/ gang sku 'tha' ba dral 'an hA/
274a2(rnying rgyud): po 'di 'thon to// ye e e e e e/ a ar li yag shat+taM ta sha hu luka ta ma he b+h+yo/ de lta bu'i snying po thon te gnas la 'bod do// de nas g.yas kyi bkru 'bum phrag las 'bum phrag g.yas kyim kha' 'gro ma dang ga na rtse u bum thag pas/ 'du
274a3(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi mkha' 'gro ma 'thon no// de rnams la tha dang 'ug pa dang bzhad dang / kang ka dang ce spyang gi 'bu srin grol ma dang me 'brug dang / chu grang dang / baglang dang / rnga mo bong bu'i gzugs kyi ma tshul mthun par 'dzin te/ she la rngam pa dang / khrag la drung
274a4(rnying rgyud): dang / rus pa 'cha' ba la sogs pa'i tshul 'dzin te/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'o// lhag ma bdun gyi phud nyul ba ni/ dbang mo la sogs pa rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du dbang gi su las 'thon te/ sems can mi mthun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs par
274a5(rnying rgyud): dang mthun par 'thon te/ de ltar 'thon nas thams cad las byed pa'o// de rnams ni phru'i mkha' 'gro ma 'bum phrag g.yas g.yon gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang dbang mo ste/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro'o// ma dad pa'i bu mo dang sring mo la sogs pa/ de rnams ni las
274a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma'o// ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma las la 'gyed pa'o// 'das dang ma 'das mkha' 'gro ma gnyis so// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i las kyi le'u ste brgya dang go bzhi pa'o//
274a7(rnying rgyud): das bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka des/ phyag na rdo rje dang / pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' dang / las kyi rgyal po gsum la sogs pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// thams cad dbang gi zhing du dag go/
274b1(rnying rgyud): da ba na pas rab tu rgan mo// thams cad kyang na las 'dam sa// thams cad pa ma rgyan to// thams cad bdapa la sag do// 'bar ba don dam byang na 'das// sems ni sangs rgyas myangan 'das// gram na chos su mya na 'angs// sems banasangs kyang
274b2(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam mya ngan 'das// phung po rigs su mya ngan 'das// khams ni dbyings su mya ngan 'das// skye med don dam mya ngan 'das// 'byung ba dbyings su myang ngan 'das// nam shes ye shes mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs mnyam
274b3(rnying rgyud): 'das// rtag cad pa nor theg par gnas// tshig mchos su myang na 'das// myang na thams cad kyang na 'das// nam rtog pa zhes myang ngan 'das// sdug pam ches nyid mya ngan 'das// myang ngan thams cad cings su dang// thas cad can bzung
274b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// myangan 'das pa'i don rtogs nas// sde shig nyis kyi rgyud las brgal// yod med gnyis kyi mthal las 'das// thams cad chos dbyings mnyam gnas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// nyim chog rol pa'i ta rnalas/ thams cad 'a
274b5(rnying rgyud): ngas par bstan pa'i ledreg brgya go ltab po// / de nas pangan pa bstsal pa// thams cad byang chub sems kyi dang // mas cad dang gin ma pa'i sra/ zas chad dang dgin pa po da / thams cad bang stsa la jo ma// thams cad dbang gimed las yin// de
274b6(rnying rgyud): snang ba thams cad kyang / byang chub sems su 'dus pa'o// rtogs pa mngon gyur blta ba'i lung // dbyings su spyad pa sprod pa'i lung // thams cad bsdus pa dbang gi dbang // mi 'gyur brtan pa tshe yi lung // gdeng krung bsrung ba dam tshe galung // drag po
274b7(rnying rgyud): bsgral pa zin las lung // gzhal las gsal ba dkyil 'khor lung // bkod pabs la ba lhal lung // go las med pa don dam lung // bden pa thob pa col ba'i lung // gnyis su med pa rtogs pa'i lung // thams cad gcig pas sems kyi lung
275a1(rnying rgyud): lung chen zab mor snang badra// ji ltar bden pa thob pas dbang mchog dam pa yin// thams cad byang chub sems la gnas/ sems kyang na rtogs rdo rje cha// rtogs pas mngon du bsrel gyur phrin las yang // nga
275a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal bas don byed pa// ting 'dzin 'gro 'du phrin las mchog/ ma dang bdud kyi sde btul ba// log pa joms pa'i phrin las yin// thams cad thags rjes bskal ba rnams// thugs rjes gzhan sgrol srin las yin// rga rtogs
275a3(rnying rgyud): nas pa da pa sa/ ma ca dgas byang rdzu kyin pas skye/ 'as pa na ba mas kyi// sas nga badzin pa pas / ma
275a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro don mtha' ru phyin pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ dbang gi chos thams cad lung dang / sems dang tshe dang / phrin las su bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang go drug pa'o// / de nas dbang chen 'dus pas/
275a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad sems yin pas/ sems las rtogs pa'i don rang grol bsgom pa bde bar bstan pa'o// gsal la rtog med ye shes bsgom// snang stong gnyis kyi go las bcad// mi g.yo ba yi ting 'dzin bsgom// rnam par 'phro ba'i golas bcad// shes
275a6(rnying rgyud): rig bcad bsgom pa bsgom// ma bdal go las gcad par bya// lta ba ma nor bsgom pa bsgom// bsgom du med pa'i goms pa la// yang bu med pa'i ting 'dzin bya// de yi dang la bsgom pa la// dmigs pa phra mo re golas bcad// sgom pa ma no gdong la
275a7(rnying rgyud): mnos// bsam gtan pa mi sgom pa ni// mar me rlung gis ma bskyod bzhin// lcem me mer re gnas par bya'o// rnam par 'phro ba bcad pa yin// byang chub sems ni rtsabs te// gzhi ni gcig tu ma nges pas// thams cad phyogs kyi bdag nyid yin// rtogs
275b1(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa ltab // dam dang la garnas pa bcwam pa sten// deka nga thams pas// dra kya babyang chubasams// dag par du nga gas pa 'ang// dasur ba sgongs byas pasas pa / mas sa gam dngaH/ del gnas grangs 'dus pa
275b2(rnying rgyud): gseb lam gsang ba'i bsgom pa yin// sgom pa de yi don rtogs pas// thams cad sems ni gcig gi dang // gcig las me g.yos tha dad spang // snang ba nyid la dngos po med// dngos med dang la gnas pa'o// da ltar bsgom pa'i byin grangs kyis/
275b3(rnying rgyud): mthag tu sangs rgyas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// te mchog rol pa'i tar+b+ha las/ sgom pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang go bdun pa'o// / de nas dbang chen kun 'dus kyis// phyag na rdo rje la sog pa rnams la/ chos thams cad spa gsung
275b4(rnying rgyud): thugs yon tan phrin las lngar 'dus pas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi dbang bskur ba 'di gsungs so// pad+ma brgyad dang ldan pa la// dbus su yi ge hUM dmar la bkra ba la/ tha ma oM dang sA dang hUM dang aM dang has bskor ba'o// dbang bsrung ba ste/
275b5(rnying rgyud): gsung dbyangs snyan pas 'khor ba'i gnas nas sgrol// skyon gyis mgos chags med pad+ma ste// gsung gi yi ge hUM dmar la sogs 'di yi dbang bskur bas// 'dod chags dag pas so so mngon par byang chub dbang thob shog/ pad+ma maN+Da la oM hUM a/ gseng
275b6(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo de thogs nas// hUM/ chos sku spos med bde chen thig le che// 'gro ba'i don mdzad longs sku sprul sku 'dzin// gti mug rnam dag sku mchog kun la khyab// nyon mongs rtsad gcod stong nyid mngon par byang chub dbang thob shong // tsakra kA ya maN+Da la aM
275b7(rnying rgyud): a/ thugs kyi mtshan ma rdo rje dathogs la// hUM/ rtags kyi rdo rje dbyings su cher 'bar ba// thugs mchog 'bar ba rdo rje rtags kyi hUM// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku rnams mtshon byed pa// zhe sdang rtsad bcad me long ye shes te// mngon par byang chub dbang thob shog/

276b1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i lham chen mo bzhi// 'gugs dang 'dren dang 'bebs dang rtsol pa'i las mdzad ma// bcom ldan gyi mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ shar phyogs dung gi gzhal yas nas// dkar mo zhi ba mgyogs pa'i las mdzad ma// cha dang ye shes 'dra /
276b2(rnying rgyud): las mdzod cig/ sa ma ya de bI ar+tha sha dza// lho phyogs rin chen gzhal yas nas// sngon mo rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ sa ma ya bI pA sha hUM/ nub phyogs rA ga'i gzhal yas nas// dmar mo dbang gi las mdzad pa
276b3(rnying rgyud): tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ de bI dza s+pho Ta baM/ byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i zhing khams nas// ljang gu drag po'i las mdzad ma/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ sa ma ya de bI dza g+hat+te hoHtshe 'gugs shing gang la gnas pa de la bstim pa'o// rta
276b4(rnying rgyud): mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ tshe'i le'u ste brgya dang go dgu pa'o// / de nas dbang chen kun 'dus des// nar mar mchod pa bya ba'i rten// rin chen chu'am sa gzhi la// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// khru gang rab tu brtsegs
276b5(rnying rgyud): par bya// de la dbang gi lha bkod de// bsnyen nas mchod pa byas nas su// rtag tu bskor ba bya zhing phyag 'tshal na// 'khor ba ngan song las brgal nas// pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob// sa la sogs par phyag rgya byas// rnga ma grol rim
276b6(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur// sra'am 'bur du brkos pa'o// de la bsnyen bkur mchod byas na// the tshom med par rgyal ba'i sku yang 'thob/ gzhan yang mchod pa'i rim pa ni// rtag tu dbang gi lha bsgom zhing // spyan drangs mchod dad pa stod pa dang /
276b7(rnying rgyud): de la gus pa phul byas na// 'bras bu nges par thob par 'gyur// bza' ba dang ni btung ba dang // byang ba dang ni bag ba yis// dbang gi lha la de bzhin bya// de ltar ting 'dzin ldan na// 'bras bu dbang dang dngos grub 'thob// ces gsungs so//
277a1(rnying rgyud): rta mchog ngal pa'i danalas/ mchad pa dang ting 'dzin sbyor ma pa bstan pa'i la'u ste nyis brtsamam pa'o// de nas rga ma tho ba ma drangs pani// las ni rnam pa'ang rnams bshad//
277a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i las su bstan pa las// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba la// sgo ba yab sum de bshad do// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// phyogs bzhi dag tu spros pa las// khro bo lus gcig 'bar ba la// mgo dgra brtsegs pa'i chabrad dbyung
277a3(rnying rgyud): gcig ni snang la rang bzhin med// brgyad ni ye shes 'od dang ldan// de yi steng du dbu re bung // dbu ni khro bo 'bar ba ste// kun kyang dkar la gtsigs par byung // phyag mtshan kun kyang lcags kyi bsnams// pags pa gsum gyi zas lda
277a4(rnying rgyud): shar gyi sgol gnas pa'o// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// khro bo'i lus la mgo bdun brtsegs// ser la ag cho ma 'bar ba ste// phyag mtshan zhags pa re re bsdams// pags pa dur khrod chas dang ldan// sprul pas bsu blta
277a5(rnying rgyud): ste/ zhing chung gdan la bgrad pa'o// gzhal yas lha na'i phyogs na gnas// byang chub sems kyi sprin spros pas// khro bo'i lus lazhal bgrad pa/ dmar po ral pa 'gying ba ste// mgo lnga brtsegs pa dur khrod chas// lcags srog re re
277a6(rnying rgyud): pa ste// zhing gi gdan la yang dag gnas// gzhal yas nub phyogs skol gnas// byang chub sems kyi sprin spos pas// khro bo'i lus la mgo gsum brtsegs// ljang gu'i mdog la mche ba can// dur khrod chas dang ldan pa'o// zhi
277a7(rnying rgyud): gdan la bzhugs pa ste// gzhal yas byung na phyogs la gnas// dekar slob bzhi dra gnas// rnam bzhi'i las kun rdzogs par byed// blo thob bAg shang mi shal/ de ltar sngags brjod pas las la bskul ba'o// zhes gsungs so//
277b1(rnying rgyud): rdzus ba dun sad sa sa / da pa / tu gagags ma ca ma du na
277b2(rnying rgyud): dang // snying po dang ni gzungs sngags so// yab kyi gsang sngags dam par gsungs// yum mi rig sngags dam par ro// gnyis med dril ba'i snying po ni// mi 'gyur ba yi gzungs sngags so// kun la spos dang phyag bya'o// de ltar yi ge de rtogs
277b3(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad grangs cha 'gro// bde gshegs kun gyi snying po ste// thams cad de la gnas pa'i// de yis las rnams byas pan// byin rgyabs chen po de las 'byung // byin rlabs sngags dang zag rgya yin// rgyal ba gcig 'brub kran
277b4(rnying rgyud): 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa ste// thams cad gcig par kun gyis mkhyen// des na dgongs pa gcig pa'o// de ltar snying po de brjod pas// sngags las 'od zer 'phros pa yis// de bzhin gshegs kun thugs 'phral nas/
277b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs rgyal ba kun 'dus te// gsang ba'i dngos grub de la 'bebs// ye shes chen po rab tu gsang // byang chub chen po rab tu gsang // sangs rgyas dngos grub rab tu gsang // ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog/ de dag la ni rab tu gsang // sdug

278b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la gnod pa 'khor ba'i rA dzad dgra thams cad bskal/ phung bdur khrod gzhal las su byas pa/ gago gdan du por/ mardungs pa'i gnas bcom// sha zos khrag 'azung rus pa chos/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du byeng bdernams bsngal kyang / dpung ba cu dang / sbe
278b3(rnying rgyud): mal zhen pa de dag/ ngan song 'khor ba'i gzhi 'dzin pa/ lta ba log pa de dag/ gnas yang dag par mdzad pa'i phyir/ spang ba phrin las kyi gnas 'di gsungs so// sems can de dag kun gyi/ dug gsum sbyang ba'i slad du// ma dad chen po khyod lus la/
278b4(rnying rgyud): dug gsum zhe sdang me ltar 'bar// me yi snying po raM yin te// ye shes chen po'i me byung bas// drod kyi kun rtog dug gsum bsreg raM// ma dad chen po khyod lus la// dug gsum nga rgyal rlung du 'tshub// ye shes chen po'i rlung byung bas// dug gsum nga rgyal 'bud
278b5(rnying rgyud): par bya'o yaM/ ma dad chen po khyod lus la// dug gsum 'dod chags chu ltar 'brub// ye shes chen po'i chu byung bas// dug gsum 'dod chags bkru bar bya'o khaM/ ngan song phung po gsum po la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i gnas bkod pas// rgyud lnga 'khor ba'i rgyun

279b1(rnying rgyud): la sogs khyod rnams nyon// theg pa'i rim pa bsam yas kyang // rtogs pa 'don la gcig las med// chos kyi 'bras bu bas ma yas kyang // rtogs na byang chub sems las med// gnas kyi bye brag bas ma yas kyang // rtogs na bgrod med gnas pas med// chos
279b2(rnying rgyud): sgo mo bsam yas kyang // rtogs na 'jug sgo gcig las med// thams cad byang chub sems chen po// de la rtag tu sgom par gyis// zhes gsungs so// rta mcho gdol ba'i tan+t+ra las/ 'jug sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste nyis brgya lnga pa'o// / de nas dbang chen
279b3(rnying rgyud): pa des// pad+ma sems dpa' la sogs nyon// thams cad sems nyid yin pa la// byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yang // chos kyi sgo mo de gsungs kyang // gnyen po nyid du gsungs pa yin// nyon mongs brgya khri bzhi stong yang // rtsa ba nyon mongs lnga ru 'dus/
279b4(rnying rgyud): de las rtsa ba gsum du 'dus// nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags yin// de nyid 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni// 'dul ba nyi khri chig stong yin/ dag byed gnyen po gcig las med// nyon mongs dug sdong chen po zhe sdang yin// deyi 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni// mdo
279b5(rnying rgyud): tshig stong yin// cig car gnyen po gcig las med// nyon mongs dug sdong gti mug yin// de yi 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni// mngon pa nya khri chig stong gsungs// spyod byed gnyen po gcig las med// de ltar rtogs pas de dag na// sdug bsngal
279b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid nyid du'o// nyon mongs lnga yang ye shes lnga// ye shes lnga yang de nyid don// thams cad gnyis med don du bshad// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// sku dang thig le gnyis med pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'o// sangs rgyas sems
279b7(rnying rgyud): can gnyis med pa'o// 'di dang pha rol gnyis med pa'i// skye dang 'gag pa gnyis med pa'o// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+na las/ 'khor rnams la chos gnyen po dang gnyis su med pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste nyis bcu drug pa'o// // de nas pad+ma
