280a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// sangs rgyas gcisam chog rtsod la bstod// em ho/ bde ba na gshegs pa yang po'i zas// sangs rgyas kun 'dus can mkhyen dbul// thams cad kun gyi mdzod 'dzin pa// ston pa'i grod mthod la btod// de ga shegs jug
280a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi char chen 'bebs myedad pa// thams cad gnas su 'dren med pa'i// sangs rgyas thugs rje gcol ba stod/ i ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sems can kun gyi skyabs mdzod cing // yongs den pas kyi ra god/
280a4(rnying rgyud): thugs mgon skabs khyod la bstod/ sam mngod na // ngas spyod dan rnamag 'don no/ dgas 'dod pams cad nang ma da ga// da ba ni med la bcad// e ma gas nga

281a3(rnying rgyud): dras bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skugasung thugs yon tan gsang ba'i bdag nyid ci chog dbang mchog dmi sems pa yin pa'i rang bzhin / mtha' dbus med pa'i 'og men gyi gnas/ drag po mthong nag 'bar ba'i gzhal las

281b2(rnying rgyud): chags pa chen por gyur pa/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ kun tu zhal pad+ma dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / las kyi rigs su gyur pa dang / grangs dang / phyag rgya dang // 'dog
281b3(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so// de yang rigs kyi yab dang / yum dang / sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / khro bo dang / khro mor bcas pa bzhugs so// de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa mtshan mar bcas pas rol par mdzad/

281b5(rnying rgyud): rje 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i phyi rim na/ kun rig chos kyi rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho khyab snang mdzad dang / kun tu zhal dang / mngon par byang chub dang / nye bar gyur pa'i phyi rim na/ rol pa chen po dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /

281b7(rnying rgyud): med mya ngan 'joms pa/ thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor rnams ni// las mchog rdo rje gar dang don yod grub// rdo rje dbang sdud rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje brtson 'grus shug kyis rol par mdzad// gzhan yang thugs rje'i 'khor rnams ni/
282a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad kun las 'gro// rngam zhing gtam dang zhi ba'i sra// dkyil 'khor rnam gsus tshul dubyung // la bar mchags chen ldan rlabs yin// lags can pa'i rkyen rlabs las/
282a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad rol par mdzad pa ni// sa yi snying po nam mkha'i snying po dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang lag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nu byams pa me tri dang // sleb pa sel dang kun du bzang po dang // zhig mo phreng dang dgrangs dang

285b4(rnying rgyud): ga yar tshogs 'jas pa rnams// de me dag pa yi mtshan du// 'ad zhe #// byang chub srid yang yam // yongs nas byung ba la man+dan \u0f7f// sprul pa 'byu ba / ma yang ma
285b5(rnying rgyud): kyin rlapas cho 'phral ya mtshan gyi// dgon dung ska pa ya mtshan // 'gog pa gas pa la mdzan che// bdag cag 'khor chags 'dus pa rnams// dmachog can du byin rlabs ma dang // 'og ma pa de bzhin du/ rnangam pa
285b6(rnying rgyud): 'ang // de skad rjes gas ba bta sa/ bcom ldan 'das pas pa tsho da ma pardugs pa chen po dza'i skyengs/ srag sung thugs gnyis su zad pa ma sa/ 'khyor rnam par spong ba rdorje'i cad zhes bya ba'i rkang nga 'dzin ma rnangs par
285b7(rnying rgyud): sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra ma zad pa gyen gyi 'khor lo mthar phyin pa 'ang ma dpa la gzhon nu gyur pa dang / gsung mi zad pa can ni 'khor la mthar phyed pa srun ngas gzigs dbang phrug dang / thugs mi zad pa kya
286a1(rnying rgyud): mal pa la bar byin pa phraganamangs bskul pa gnas/ byan rnamagan ta bzang mag sa ldan pad+hA na dang thor nam/ 'jig ldan las rab tu langs te/ klung chubasems kyim rnam gnas mar btags pas/ zhwa ba ma
286a2(rnying rgyud): lteng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste/ brkyang phyag btsal nas/ steng ge'i lha stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas/ don bsdus par gsol ba btab pa/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yab yum dgongs su gsol/ 'dus pa'i 'khor mo ga
286a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus dgongs su gsol// dbang rgyas rtswa mchog rol pa'i tAn+t+ra 'di// chos kyi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas de gsum/ sku rdo rje'i bka'/ gsung pad+ma'i bka'/
286a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rin po che'i bka'// kal bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ thugs gsang ba'i mkha' la/ byang chub kyi sems spros pas/ 'khor lo dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rje lag tu lhan gyis bzhag ste/ dbang bskur bas med
286a5(rnying rgyud): yang 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du gyur pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par btags/ snying rje phyogs ris med pas/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug btags/ gsang sngags kyi mdzod du gyur pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag nA rdo rjer
286a6(rnying rgyud): btags te/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbang thob par 'gyur ro// smra ba'i seng ge sla ba'i seng ge zhes ming btags te/ chos kyi spro ba'i dbang thob po// de nas las kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis yod pas/ 'khor rnams snod du rung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// chos
286a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'tshar mobacu gnyis rab tu bskor te/ tsha 'phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te/ 'garten drugagi tsokrab cu thams cad ga yos/ rab tu ga yos 'phrul rabarje 'phral/ ldog rab tu sdig 'khra rab tul bug/ 'a 'ung rab tu'ang/ kun tu rab tu ra lda/ chos chem rab tu ches tshas/ kun du
286b1(rnying rgyud): sa byung chub sams thoms nu pa sa// 'dus pa'i mar tshugs gnas sngar dag par byas/ zla brnas pa yagacas pa la/ blanasams/ namaral pa 'azlas pa byas// 'dus pa can par na gsan da/
286b2(rnying rgyud): rab pa bzhin na/ dorjegs dab thal draganos// zhal bzang da com can pa s+ho// rnams 'das nas bajug par 'gyur// dgad cas ni bka' bslabs// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams snyams rang byas// dmachog tho pa dam pas
286b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// dbang thob las mdzod chen po des// bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag/ rnal 'byor lpags su byas nas ni// phye nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// maskyes nas gsol ba btu ba da /
286b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar ma dpung ngo mtshang rje// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug cha// mngon spyod yamya tshan ston par spyod// bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa de// sgra brjod yul las rab 'das kyang // ngag gi lam nas rab 'don cing // dpes mtshon tshig
286b5(rnying rgyud): mig gis// yig ming dang srog tshogs kyis// gsal bar mtshan tag par mdzod// al la tag par mdzod// ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des// gsal ba btab pa mkhyen nas kyang // brjod du med pa'i nying 'dzin la/
286b6(rnying rgyud): bar zhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// smra ba'i seng ge chen po la// phyogs su btud nas phyag 'tshal nas// rmad byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas// gsol btab sba ba'i seng ka khyod// bdag
286b7(rnying rgyud): bag zhu gdang ga bas byas// smra ba'i sang ga gsang bdag gis// 'dus pa'i 'chir tshogs khyod nyon cig/ bdag ma grus shig slob par byos// 'dus pa'i 'khring tshogs rnams kyis kyang // smra ba'i seng gegasang bdag phyu// sangs rgyas
287a1(rnying rgyud): ma na / na na sa sa
287a2(rnying rgyud): da de gang lags pa// bdag pagarnams la bsnyun du gsol// legs par tshig tu bstan du gsol// smra ba'i mang gas bka' stsal pa/ so sna b+hil lal ho// sangs kyis rnams ni cang me gsung // mag sangs pa nyid tu tshor ba zhan
287a3(rnying rgyud): bshad du med pa'i don de ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi sam bshad de// de ltar smyon pa rgyal mchog kyang // rnal 'byor brjod par mi mdzad de// bka' mi sprul bar dgongs pa'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa
287a4(rnying rgyud): nga ba ni// skabs ma las 'das brjod med pas// tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin// tshig tu smra ba'i dus nyid ni// gos pa yin par bdag nyid ni// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// de ltar nyid kyang der dgongs pa
287a5(rnying rgyud): ma gsungs mi gsung gsung du med// de yang sems dpa'i snying po ni// spros dang bral ba ma yin kyang // kun rdzob bden pa'i dbang tsam du// mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor rnams// don dam rtog dka' bkri ba'i phyir// rgyal bas tshig gi sgo/
287a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs yin// 'dras pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis zhus pa// smra ba'i seng ge de ltar ni// bdag cag ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pa// tshig gi rjes 'breng don dang yang // gsang ba'i lam brjod gsal byed pa// smra ba'i seng ge chen po khrod// da
287a7(rnying rgyud): bsrung bas na zhu bar spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa pa'ang // zhus shig sba ba'i seng ge khyod// smra ba'i seng gegasang bdag gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nam tog mthun// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// phyag 'tshal ma
287b1(rnying rgyud): byas brjo// nan rdzog ga gsapa rdzu man 'dus na da// rdzogs pa thas sa sas thas pa da dus/ tha bsangs na / gtum dpapa'ags kyang / myangs byang nga /
287b2(rnying rgyud): pa// don pa cing zhing tshig le zhib// rtog gis bsam pa rang bya'i phyir// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon chog gi lde mig gis// gsang ba de nyid bstan du gsol// gsol ba btab pas gsang 'dag po'o// sras
287b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mthong // sems rtog pa ma thun pa yang // ma'ongs // jig sud bzugs rnyed dus shes pa ngadzin pa'i di'i// ban tun padu dang gags te// bshas na
287b4(rnying rgyud): ya nas yang dag mar byed ci// thams cad padung snye bul// rang byung chos se nan paslog// oM ste / grardzas ma ya oM/ 'odo gsuMs pabag tu dang / spangs cas grags pa chen pa yang /
287b5(rnying rgyud): dang ngamya shing brgyal bar byar// thams cad mamras seMs dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni skad ces// bka'i rtsa la rigs kyi bran mos nyon// chog brjod thams cad pa rdzob bden pa yin// ji mad pa nga med pa' tsam blang /
287b6(rnying rgyud): dam pa gag ma sa sa/
287b7(rnying rgyud): drugadus pa dang // zas pa'i tshul duldan man / gags sa byung sa su ma/ da chung / na/ bka' stsal nas//
288a1(rnying rgyud): brjod do// sba ba'i seng ges dra ba dres// de ltar lags na bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi lta bar b+h+r-i gnas gang // spyod pa 'ba' zhig thoganas gang // dbang mchog dam pas bka' stsal pa// sba ba'i seng ge gas
288a2(rnying rgyud): 'dag khyod// 'di don zhu bar spobs pa legs// sngags kyi lta ba sangs rgyas kyis// mnyam pa'i don rtogs spyod yul yin// ci phyir zhen kun rdzob 'den pa yin// bden pa gnyis su dbyed med phyir// kun rdzob bden pa ga la yod//
288a3(rnying rgyud): blta dang spyod la blo gnas shing // rnal 'byor sa thobs gnyis yin// ci phyir zhe na rnal 'byor mnyam nyid de// bden pa rnam gnyis tshul 'dod de// meb skyed tshul du blor chud la// kun rdzob mtshan ma thabs kyis su// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du
288a4(rnying rgyud): ni// med pa ma yin mtshan med pa'i// rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir// slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms pas// che chung gis ni grub pa yin// bstan pa bden pa gnyis la gnas// sgra/
288a5(rnying rgyud): yi rjes 'brang rnal 'byor ni// don la rang rgyud spyod la gnas// ci phyir zhen log pa yi// kun rdzob 'ba' zhig blo rtog gis// yang dag pa yi kun rdzob ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong med phyir// smra ba'i seng ge de bas na// log
288a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo yis// de lta bu yi chos la brten nas kyang // yang dag pa yi kun rdzob kyis// bden pa'i lha dngas mo yi// chos rnams dkyil 'khor du shes bya'o// yang dag kun rdzob bden rtogs nas// don dam bden pa
288a7(rnying rgyud): khor chud nus// de ni rig pa'i skyes bur grags// sba ba'i seng ge debs na// yang dag kun rdzob la brten nas// don dam bden pa rtogs par bya'o// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas te mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las// spyod
288b1(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das snying po byang chub la dgongs ba nges par 'grel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas kyang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces
288b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems su 'dus// byang chub sems su snang bar shes par gyis// ci phyir zhe na chos rnams thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang sems su 'dus pas na// lus dang ngag dang sems nyid
288b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rnam par snang // 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis lus dang ngag dang sems dag ni bdag cag rnams kyi ci ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// dbang mchog dam pas bka' stsal pa// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mtshan nyid ni// sems
288b4(rnying rgyud): kyang lus dang ngag gi rnam pa lta bu'o// ngag kyang lus dang sems kyi rnam pa lta bu'o// lus kyang tshig brjod sems kyi rnam pa lta bu'o// rang rang lus dang ngag dang sems rtogs shig/ 'on tang byang chub sems yin bskyed par 'gyur/
288b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma ho dngos po dang bral bas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spang /
288b6(rnying rgyud): chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pas// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
288b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun phye ba med pa la// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// skye dang mi skye med pa ste// byang chub tshul du bstan pa'o//
289a1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas yang me long lta thar gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mdzad che// spangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs
289a2(rnying rgyud): mos kun 'gag pa med pa las// 'gag pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// 'gags dang mi 'gag med pa ste// byang chub la ni bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
289a3(rnying rgyud): nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun gnas pa med pa las// gnas pa 'di de rab tu bsregs// gnas dang mi gnas med pa rtse// byang chub tshal
289a4(rnying rgyud): 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad so sor kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshad la mtshan gyis// sangs ca
289a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun dmigs su med pa las// dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu bzhugs// dmyigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad bya ba nan
289a6(rnying rgyud): tan du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun spros pa med pa las// spos dang bsdu bar rab tu bsdigs
289a7(rnying rgyud): spro ba buM yod dang med pa ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas spro ba'i seng ge gsang ba'i bdag po des// al la zhes sgra phyung te// byang chub sems la bstod pa// e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems// e ma dag pa/
289b1(rnying rgyud): dri ma med// a mar mi sgri ba gsal ba che// e ma' mnyam nyid dbyer mad rgyas// a mdzas so dang rig sems// e ma 'o byar med ldan gyis grub// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal la// zhes bskyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyang byung
289b2(rnying rgyud): chub sems// byang chub nyid kyang thugs chud pa'o// bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams// byang chub sems la smon par 'tshal// 'jug dang ldang dang gnas pa ste// rang rang sems ni g.yo bar bkye// reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi/
289b3(rnying rgyud): nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na// snying rje chen pos dgongs su gsol// bde bar gshegs pa dgongs su gsol// de skad tshig tu gsol btab pas// bcom ldan snying pos 'di skad gsungs// e mdze ye nas rnam dag chos
289b4(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs snang la rtog pa sdang // ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med// snod ma yin la bstan par dka'o// e ma'o// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin las// bdag tu rtogs pa'i srid rtse'i nyes dmigs kyis// yun ring dus nas
289b5(rnying rgyud): 'arnams pa ni 'gro ba rnams// mi mthun bde sdug gnas rnams so sor bzung // log rtog nor ba'i sems kyi kun rtog kyang // rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa rdul tsam med// ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas min mod kyang // rmongs pa'i dbang
289b6(rnying rgyud): gisnga 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams// log rtog nyid kyang dngos med byang chub sems// 'khrul 'khor nyid kyang mi zad rkyen du che// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su gsal// phung po lnga nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku// srid rtse'i nyes
289b7(rnying rgyud): dmigs byang chub snying por gsal// gyi nang sdod bcud byang chub dang du gsal// zhes gsungs pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi ngang du gnas so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ byang chub sems
290a1(rnying rgyud): gsu sa ma na gyu rdzu pasmras na/ ngas bya gas smra sa
290a2(rnying rgyud): thangs su sol ba mangs// de'i kun zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms pa btsugs te// dekyil bar gyini don 'di gsungs// 'bras pa'i mam rgyags rnams nyon cig/ gas sngags byin dbas bas ma yas /
290a3(rnying rgyud): bas ma yis brjod pa yang // mdor bzlas nas pa gas ma yi// / rang sbyin lhun 'i dkyil 'a bar dag/ 'don gas sa pa'i dkyil 'bang dang// tha~M na kyi ba nga // gsum pa ga
290a4(rnying rgyud): zhas ched drugang ngo // swA b+ha'i seng glegs bdag gis// bcom ldan 'das so bdag cag na ma ste// dkyil 'khor gsam du mthong lags so// de nas 'di skad gsol ba btab// yanas sran gyis grub pa'i bdag
290a5(rnying rgyud): 'a ban gyi 'byung gnas ga// dong+kaN+Da la mag 'amal m+b+ha// rdos sman ye nas sangs rnam pani// rang bzhin dag pa drim med// rang bzhin ldan thab bzad na 'dzin// bcom ldan pad thos pa zhid rten pa ma~M// ma /
290a6(rnying rgyud): snyed pa bam ldan dang sa// rang bzhin don sgo kyil 'khor gyi// spros dang bral ba 'di gsungs sa// e na 'o// sangs rgyas can gyi thang chub skams// blan med pa togs gru pa// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shwAs gang/
290a7(rnying rgyud): dkyis nga zhing sa man// zhes srings so// ya na 'ang sa nga gsungs // nga bgan na dam dkyil 'khor 'di// skyon gyis thob pa bsgrus tag su sa// mang sud kyisangs pa sa/ da pa
290b1(rnying rgyud): ba nas sa sa // thung bu na dbyangs phyagasas// khams dang sum na yang po kun// sems dpa sams ma dasal labar rudu// dbus me ga pas ma ma da// klu dang 'bras bu'i glabrags rnamasasas
290b2(rnying rgyud): dang par dang mdzad rang bzhin len// tshor ba rin chen rang bzhin yin// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// 'du byed don yod grub pa'o// rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems// srabs sang+yas kyis spyan yin te// rgya khams nim pa? /
290b3(rnying rgyud): mkhams na pa'ang dkrung ma ste// drung khams dpe rdzog sgrol ma la// nam mkha' san thubazang ba'o// sred gu sgyum sems can thams cad ni// mig ni sa la snying po la// nabaphyag na na dza'o// dz+nyA ni namam kha'i snying po'o// rtse ne sta
290b4(rnying rgyud): ras gzigs dbang yin// gzugs mdzes yA s+ye'i rang bzhin la// Ti na gyud pa ma gyi'o// sgra mi tshogs ni ni r-i tal// ro dra gyur pa bIn+ta yin// mig gi dbang po gang yin pa// rnams pa ma ti'i rang bzhin yin// rna ba'i dbang ma
290b5(rnying rgyud): pa ma la// sna yi dbang po 'jam dpal nyid// lce yi dbang po kun tu btang // rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par dpyad// sngon 'das dus su rnam par grags// sngon 'das dpyid ni spros mA ma// da ltar dbyar ni me tog ma// 'byon pa
290b6(rnying rgyud): rAg snron/ A lo g+h+ra// ma'odra dgun nig rje yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// rig gis gshin rje 'joms pa yin// rag blarnam par rtsalta bste// reg par byed pa rtam rdzog dpal// reg pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// gsum 'dus reg pa'i mtshan nyid yin/
290b7(rnying rgyud): mirtag/ paM deng stong pa dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam pa bzhi// lcags kyu zhags pa lpags smig dril// phyin cim log lha mo bzhi// bcom ldan snying pos rab tu gsungs// sren gas ma sems can thams cad kyi//
291a1(rnying rgyud): rnams pan langs gapa// gang+gA bam par dang gzhan spyos// 'das byas ma byas kyis rnams can// yod pa ma gas sus yin pas// ba nga ba yin pa shags/ tshul sags nyamatha' yas
291a2(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pas// ji snyed sdang grag yod pa'i chos// kun kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin pas// rnam grangs yin par bde gshegs gsungs// zhes ched du brjod pas ched du gleng ngo //
291a3(rnying rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying pos/ rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// kun nas mtshan ma'i gnas chen yang // 'og min tha med gnas mchog gam// lcang lo can dang bde ba can// padz+ra can la sogs pa ye// rang
291a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin lhan grub dkyil 'khor de// mtshan ma'i ngang rol rnal 'byor snang // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// mkha' 'am yid kyi nam mkha' la// bde gshegs snying po hUM bsgoms te// 'gyung chen brtsegs pa lhun gyis grub// dbus ni khams
291a5(rnying rgyud): dbang spyad pa'i/ lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang // zong dris par khyams nyi zlas brgyan// me ri'i bar khyams byin rlabs che// sgo ni chu srin khar gyur pas// sgo gtan 'pho ba'i gzhal yas par// rgyal chen ka bas rnam par mangs//
291a6(rnying rgyud): pho brang de yi rgyan mchog kyang // sgo bzhi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan// rta babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dbus na rin chen khri rkang brgyan// de steng pad+ma mkha' stong ldan// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug/ phyogs bcu 'od zer 'a
291a7(rnying rgyud): bas 'khrugs/ nyi zla nor bu rin chen 'bar// nor bu'ido shal chul mtshan dang // zer tshags su rnam par gnas// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub// rta babs rnams kyi cong cong la// gsar gyi
291b1(rnying rgyud): la ba sang bdag gdu tsugags mnan mang 'do/ ga' brang mam na byas/ rnamam thabs ca rgyam nang/ gzhasams danang ldan 'danam na ba dang
291b2(rnying rgyud): brgyang bas pan du// bzhen pas ma rgyad gyur nyes byed pa// gsar gyi sang gargyanags mug// drag pa'i na 'phags bzhis te thub cad/ thags rnam bas te thab tud// 'jigs pablangs pas /
291b3(rnying rgyud): mdod pas dbang po ti tha brgyang/ srin tu dkyistsal rab gnas pas// den tsam the nang 'donam pa'i stobs dang ldan// dkon gnas rabad gnas gzhan gyis mthong ra dka'/ dadag bskas pa chos nyid lung // lung gi spad kyings
291b4(rnying rgyud): pa med pa gyugs ga gyu/ sag sadon mdu pa sa la dpa // ma ba na rdzogs pas smras nga / pastanam thar brgyad byig pa gas la kyi gas da ban pas

299a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs lu mA nas ba ltams shing gzhon nu rol par ston// la lar khab pa zhes khab nas rab kyang dka' thub dka' ba myong // la lar byang chub sems bsred bdung bzhi btul dang rdo rje'i gdan la gshegs// la lang byang chub shing drang bsngags
299a5(rnying rgyud): dngal yang bskul ba'i sa la gshegs// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo bskor// la lar cho 'phrul ston dang mya ngan 'das dang sku gdung ring bsil ston// la lar thugs bam ston dang phyi rol 'gyung dang chom mthun spa gan /
299a6(rnying rgyud): la lar mu stegs tshul dang bsam gtan bsgo ma dang sa bcu rim gyis la lang 'byung // la lang sman ldan ma dag la lang mngon shes pha rol phyin// thab 'jug dbang phyug che dang la lar 'jig rten myong ba'i tshul// 'gon mas ji skar 'dul zhing byin nungs co 'phrus
299a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar phyin// de 'gro ba rnams cad las gyi gabs kyi dbang gyur pa// log lha'i thugs pa skams me gtogs gzhan nams sangs rgyas bkad ma dad par 'gyur// thang nub kyang grwa snyed nga snyed 'bras bu ba la bgad/ gyung thams cad kyi hrul pong dab
299b1(rnying rgyud): namya zhar la ba'o/ nga/ rdzu 'dum mas sa ba rna na dus mas can 'das gas sa ma 'a pa gagags pa mamags padag sugag gtan / zag pa'adum nam
299b2(rnying rgyud): mngon par 'tshal ba/ mngon pa'i dbul gyi mthas bskams pa/ sangs cas sde bstan pa la mdang pas 'jig tan gyi khyams grang bar byed pa rnams/ zhi bas phan pa'i skabs la ma ban te/ rol pa'i mdzad stod kyis 'dul bar gzigs
299b3(rnying rgyud): bde bdag shegs pas pag bzlob / ldan 'dus phran 'anang gi shing bas 'i tho pa// tham 'das pa'i tshogs can dag/ 'das pa'i rdzas nasngon zung ltar// dka'i dus 'dir 'byung ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsu ba /
299b4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chen po rtog pa ye// khro ba'i tshul ba 'on thang ba// de tsasems cananams cad kun// shin ga dag gtum par gyur// mdad 'bod par ltung bar gyur// ze 'azod sdug bsngal mtha' la zhin// de ltag yi thabs kyis gdul// des
299b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// gti mugatsigs kyis bsgom pa ni// na d+hagarnam pamasams can ran// der bzhag cha gas ngan pa yis// dad+mad 'phel dag 'din rnanag nacis/ snron pa'i gusang rab 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi sran pas ba
299b6(rnying rgyud): 'khyams// dug nad rims nad phraman ma// gnod sbyin gdon dang log 'dren gnod// srid gsum 'jig cing ngam jig 'dral// ji lta bu yi thabs kyis gdul// zhes bsgoms// bde gshags rgyal chen pa'i tshogs kyis bgros pa ni// 'das
299b7(rnying rgyud): chus sngon byung rlu rdzades// da ltar 'an tsha byung ba mo// drag gsum brtsegs pa'i po'od// rgyal ba 'das pa spong ba yis// ji skar 'phams pa bzhin du 'as// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jus nas kyang // mngan tud ral pa'i dbas can gyi // dbar
300a1(rnying rgyud): 'baskul ba'i dras labab// zas 'grams// bde gshegs chags pa can par chags kyis bskos pa// shin rtag dugs dgam par// byas pad pa 'gyur // sa ban na
300a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khra bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag bsreg byed na// sangs kyis thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// zhes bgros so// bde gshegs phrag so da
300a3(rnying rgyud): gyis 'bros pa ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo la// log rtog phyin ci log gis bcings// dngos po rang dgar zhen pa yi// gdul dka' ma lus 'dzul ba dang // dam tshig la sdang rnam gcad khyer// zung dzod gar gyi rtsagazu nga//
300a4(rnying rgyud): so// rgud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ bka' mol ba mdzad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje nges// 'khor 'jus pa'i nang nas/ rigs la bde ga
300a5(rnying rgyud): pa rdo rje rtse gcig pardar gnas pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bde bar gshegs pa dka' thub can gyi sems can 'di// rtswa rkyen gang yin 'bras bu zer sprin rigs sde gang drugatagos// las skal ci byed btul dang ma brtul tshun yon ce
300a6(rnying rgyud): gshegs bka' stsal log pa'i sems can chen po 'di// gzung 'dzin rtog ngan rgyu yin log par spyad pas rkyen// 'bras bu drug lnga sprin cing 'khor ba'i rigs chen 'di// gdol pa'i 'byung por gtogs shing las skal chags sdang spyod// ma brdal lha me'i phred
300a7(rnying rgyud): brlag kha lo log par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing khams stongs shing 'khor bdaman la ngan// sangs rgyas dman des lus nas don la mi phan skyon// btul na yon tan dug gsum gyad gcod 'khor bcos nyid 'gyur// zhe khams ngas pas yon tan chen
300b1(rnying rgyud): 'a// sugs spa sa/ gsang ba'i bdagra po ga ngas du cus// / ma yar ba bang gshegs par bya// gas phyin pa ya bdag can// dasul bab ba'i bska ba 'dar// las sa bab pa thad rdza
300b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par smin pa'i 'byung po 'di// bskal bar gyur ni rdzogs rje'i mchog// rjes ta bar bskul bas// sprul pa'i tshe 'phrul mngon par 'dra mdzad de// ye shes sbed dper pa smin bzhen// 'ab tshogs bzhengs// ra
300b3(rnying rgyud): pathams cad kyis// bden pa'i gsung gis 'dul ba dganasu// rlung dag sa pa so sto khyo ga/ bdag nyid 'i 'ang // go hU~M brjod kyis bdag pa 'jal// rlung nga dga' ba da pado // de med ba mnyan no//
300b4(rnying rgyud): yo nams// khro bo'i 'khor rnams bslaba'i phyir// do rkyen yi tshogs su wAl// tho bo ta ma cog tshogs mchog la// chu 'thul bar bka' brdongs// dpal gyi rgyal po rta mgrin gyis// dzang+ka gsang da'angs lta bu yis// po ma zin dang
300b5(rnying rgyud): bzlas nas// 'dul ba 'drid par byas na yang // khom nyan te ma thul lo// de nas chos dbyings pho brang du// ye shes sprin tshogs char sbyid bzhin// gtibs nas gzugs sgra rigs par bzhengs// sdang srid ye shes spyan gyis gzigs/
300b6(rnying rgyud): chags sgyums lings su// gzigs nas kun rdzob snga ma'i tshul// mthun par mdzad de rnam par rol// rdo rje rta gdong tshogs rnams la// seng zhig rab tu kun tu song // 'jig rten khams na bdud gyi tshogs// mog chags skams langs byed pa la
300b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs zhes ni bka' ba sgonas// rta mgrin rgyal pos de jig rten Ta// tshe 'phral bdan na sa/ shig tan du// rgan sa lcags yod pa'i dzi yi he// ma la ya las so btsugs so// de ltar yum ral gcig ma dang / dz+ri rdzi gur gnyis mnyes// dpa' chen
301a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa tu stanan myud du spyo smras sa pa sa na da
301a2(rnying rgyud): gas ci zug ga sal thos pa no ba bdud bye // m-ig+sa 'ang mchub bsor ba byin pa / sa lags bdud kyil zil mang bdud rtsir rol// srasar nag phyogs nga rgyam 'du da ma// 'tha nga
301a3(rnying rgyud): klu ma sogs// bsngal ba'i shAnas sa'i badz+ra m+b+hi rol// sbyin po'i bum tshogs dang rkun po'i tshogs dag pa// thabs ci ga Nas sras rnams 'phags pa'i khres// sems can mgo rtags mang po'i tshogs su byung // dpyod rnams 'dre
301a4(rnying rgyud): che chags srabasas// srin pa'i sgo srung phreng gyur gyi rol na// tag dong phag gdong zug dang khrigado dmas// shar mo nu bzung dag na gnas pa la// bkral zhugs can po bzhi yang mdzad// dbus kyi gang rus grong khri na// thod ba rtsegs nang na sbyin
301a5(rnying rgyud): mor la gcig gnas// bam gri khri la dung khrag 'thung // padz+ra gar gyi dbang phyug gis// srin po'i gzugs su sprul nas byon// drang por tshe zhal bstabs te gsol// gzhan yang brta pa ste yid ma ches// bzang zhing mdangs chen 'brar ba mdzod//
301a6(rnying rgyud): bdag gi gca ba bas gzi byin na// de skad ces pas sbyin gad brjod// rba gra gsung nas gaN mdzad// sprin mod las mazlang // da nas nyamachog rdzogs dge gis// srin po byung ba'i mtshan ma gzigs// rda rnga phyag dang smon can mdza/
301a7(rnying rgyud): 'drar chen tu 'gros skabs kyis gshegs// dges tshul 'dur klu blangs nas sman// dengs 'dra ga dbang gis// lhag pa'i byang chub sems 'phro'adra// yi ge Ig chags sprul nas// b+haga'i zlaba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'akyil zhingags sa te/
301b1(rnying rgyud): gyin gyis brlabs// srin mo'i mkha' la rab tu bzhag/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pa// dbyings kyi ngang du mi dmigs gyur// srin mo rang gi gnas su phyin// longs spyod mi snang 'khor rnams byer// sngon ma mthong ba'i phra men ma// tshogs kyis
301b2(rnying rgyud): bskor te yid mi dga'// rtog pa skyes te e ma'o// bdag gi gnas 'di ji lta bu// srin mos mdun bsu e ma'o// de lta bu yi tshig ni ma gsungs shig/ khyod kyi dgongs pa bdag gis bsgrub// 'khor la ma gsungs lhums mi bde// rigs shing
301b3(rnying rgyud): 'tsho ba na ci zhig 'khrungs// srin mo'i gzugs mthong skrag ldan ma// bdag gi rigs 'dzin nges 'byung snyam// 'dod sbyar zhi ba'i skabs su ni// srin mor d+hu tra s+ye tshul du// rA tras skad ni thengs gsum phyung // dpal rngam skad phyung srin
301b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs brgyal// brgyal sangs bltas nas 'jigs med pa// bdud kyi rgyal po bdud kyi bdag/ 'bar ba'i zhal gyis kun tu gzigs// srin mo la brten tshul gyis kyang // srin mo pro d+hI shwa rIr 'gyur// mtshan yang rdo rje srin mor gsol/
301b5(rnying rgyud): sngo sems brtas nga rgyal skyes// srin po'i bskul byas ru lnga'i sgra// cho 'phrul grangs med dran pa las// de dag re de la yang sprul pa 'phros// srin mo dag gis srin skad bzlas// oM dang hUM bar ru lu bcug/ dpal chen khro bo'i srog snying bzlas/
301b6(rnying rgyud): srin skad brjod cing nga rgyal byas// lus chan bsam gyis mi khyab la// rkang pa mi yul mgo ni srid rtser reg/ nad kyi bska l-i pa kha nas gtong // 'jigs byed chen po phyag rgya'i phra// tsir yang mdzes gzugs su sbrul// ngag gis ngag zog
301b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'dra// kye med smra ba'i stobs dang bral// 'bros par gzas na gar dbang gis// sa mal hod mchog bayul// srin pos sngon dus bka' nas shing // thachog brtan pa rjes dran pas// rang srog ma bzod mdun gyis bstas// gang dbang
302a1(rnying rgyud): phyag tu brtan// klungs de skad cang bzhin du 'grel// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgyas brdung // sked bzung / ladu med pas su// d+hA tras sngon dus gsang ba'i bka'// skad nang nyon mangs zag pas bcings// ngag lnga ma rdza
302a2(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi lta bu de// do gcig sbyangs pas chos kyi pho brang mthong // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// chos rnams thams cad ye shes te// skye ba bye ma snyed grangs mnyam// lus blangs sdig spyad kun kyang dran// lha log kun shes dge sdig gi/
302a3(rnying rgyud): las rnams dag ni mi bsla ba'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'dus nas thabs cig bgros gyur pa// de dag kun kyang nyams su myong // de ma thag tu bcom ldan gyis// sngam du bton pas kho mi dga'// gdung ba skyes nas dus
302a4(rnying rgyud): te zhus// e ma'o dpa' bo thugs rje chung // shin tu dben pa'i gnas shig nas// snam du bton pa thugs rje chung // gal te bka' las 'da' gyur na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // rul myag nas ni chog par gyur// ma dang
302a5(rnying rgyud): sring mo bu mo rnams// 'bangs su 'bul lo bka' la thogs// dbus su mchis pa'i skal med kyi// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog/ phud la 'tshal ba'i zhal med kyi// lhag ma kha chus bron la stsol// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/
302a6(rnying rgyud): zhes te glengs su gsol btab pa// thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje sems// dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes// ji ltar mkha' la 'od stong shar ba bzhin// srid pa gsum gyis
302a7(rnying rgyud): mkhan ston par grags// khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi bshes gnyen po// byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod dgongs su gsol// bdag cag thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// lam stong lam nor sred pa'i 'khor long la thams// sngon
302b1(rnying rgyud): sa log sdig pa spyad pas nongs// sdig pa'i las rnams ci spyad rab gnod 'gyod// dpa' bo chen ma khyod la skyabs sumache// gar gyi dbang phyug gsan cing dgongs sugs la// dar cing dag pa'i las dbang de bcan pas// 'khor ba'i sdug
302b2(rnying rgyud): bsngal rgya mtshor byings gyur te// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mas ni rang rgyad bsregs// gti mug mun pa 'thibs pas shes rab mdongs// nga rgyal chen po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan// phrag dog rlung dmar 'tshubs mas 'khor bar g.yengs// bdag
302b3(rnying rgyud): tu blta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/ 'dod pa'i me mdag 'dra ba'i 'obs su chud// lug bsngal drag po mi bzang char ltar 'bab// 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal chen po bzod dka' zhing // theg pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas//
302b4(rnying rgyud): shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur te// phung po sku ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na// byams mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam// bdag cag don slad lus 'di bzhes su gsol// gzi byin rgyal po'i mngang bdag dgongs su gso/
302b5(rnying rgyud): bdag 'dra thun rmongs las ngan sdig po che// las kyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes// skyes pas 'gyod do las la yi re chad// yi chad 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med// las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i klung dang 'dra// las dbang
302b6(rnying rgyud): krung 'phral drag la bzlog/ rnam smin thams cad rang gi las las byung // 'di ltar las kyi rlung dmar 'dis btab pas// bskal pa grangs med par du bdag cag rnams// 'khor ba'i btson ra mun par 'khyams lags na// khyed kyi thugs rje chen
302b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i byin rlabs kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa kun byang nas// ma sbyar byams pa'i zhabs drung du lta 'khod// skyob pa dbang po chen pos dgongs su gsol// nyi ltar 'od 'bar shA ltar mdang sa gsal ba'i// thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bar 'tsha
303a1(rnying rgyud): sa ga nas dag than/ na zhugs / na d+hA thA /
303a2(rnying rgyud): dab gas ga pa sa te/ gas rtse ng+yas bas pa gang 'ang// dag shed tshad ma thang
303a3(rnying rgyud): sa min pa'i thob bdag 'dra ba// khams gsus pong ba gan das pa / bani la pa pe sa pa 'i mangs thangs grangs na b+h+ya ste/ sa bas ga 'di na pa dang / de gasngag sa can

304b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyang chus brgyad dang ldan par snang ba'i thugs ka nas/ rig pa'i yaM ge dz+wa rin po che sA lnga lta bur ldan pa'i/ 'thung ba lnga dang / yum lnga dang / ye shes lnga dang / gdul bya'i phrin las rnam pa ldan stor ba'i tshul/ rdo la dkyil
304b3(rnying rgyud): brten pa'i tshul/ dpeng chen tha ma lnga'i dkyil lal ni/ 'drini dag pa tri ga we/ 'thung bar ra la yang rgal po da sa// 'jig nas gas rjel 'byung ba ni// mazhing rnams su bstan pa yang // grangs dang cad ni badzad du sring // sra
304b4(rnying rgyud): rnam mkha'i mtha' dbus pa// rlung gi shi ba ljang grul// lus kyi gtos ni mkha' dang mnyam// 'di nu babyung marnams srabs/ rkang lag bzhi ni mthu dra bzugs// rlung phrar zung drug rab tu drang// 'jig tan drug gi phyogs brtsan
304b5(rnying rgyud): sbeng gsum g.yo 'gal thams cad dang // m+b+hi sha~M las skyes sems can nams// thams cad rlung gis bskyed pa yin// 'di na lag gas m+b+ha// rlung mtshe mkha' mnyam drung gi b+ha mnad kyis// nyi me me shel spyan mig g.yas su byung /
304b6(rnying rgyud): nying thang ba zla mig g.yon drang byung // rlung gi sha ba rba ba cu seM nA baphreng ba ni// pad na k+She dgra 'dor rlung thugs kyis bang sdang khyab par 'jug// rnabachu 'phrulnga nad nas rlung sngon drug drug 'thung // rab cwa drag po skad chen dgu dgra byung ba yang // 'a
304b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'ag 'di kyi bam rdo'i bar du 'gro// bkral badrang rgyags surje padrang sunams du surgya bras/ drugs pa skyes na su spanga'ab 'a rgya babrin badris// ma 'byas dam
305a1(rnying rgyud): ga langags na// bston pa dadang sa pa gdug 'du na/ gas shong bcab cad papa mang gnas// rnasum khar khyab par rgyug nasanan// rnga rje dmar ma ma yang 'a bas/
305a2(rnying rgyud): gapa par smin mdubs nas// rnamamakha' bye pa'i n+tha 'a dgags// ga tu gtogs paras gas gas// ma gro kyid joms shing 'jig rgyan // rje'ab pa'i slang chug sa// ga sa rnam
305a3(rnying rgyud): sa dang/ gas / pa/ dgapa
305a4(rnying rgyud): pa phyi pa 'i spyod ga
305a5(rnying rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'kho rgya lta na ga la pa d+ma shiSh+T+rI// sanas can dubya bdus bya/ nas pa dzan chos parnyan spyod yul ma tshogs shi dang yod// mnyam rji gags// rnal dkyil
305a6(rnying rgyud): skyes pa sa de sa me nga // kun la thab par dag / mi 'dab pa sa// @
305a7(rnying rgyud): sa
305b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o la sang ngo // nga nas li ga sgolas 'di zer 'bum du 'bros nas// tshogs bcu drus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'phros te// rnam par rol par gyur // de'i tshe 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brgyan g.yos rab tu ga yos/ kun ca rab tug pa sas/
305b2(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// tshig rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu chog go// 'thor rab tu 'thor/ kun du rab tu 'thir ro// de'i khams gsum gyi srid pa brlag par byed pa/ lha chen po brgyad bskal ba'i phyir/ khro bo chen po bcang zha
305b3(rnying rgyud): 'og tu bting ste/ dbang chen shugs kyi sgra drag po'i sngags gzer gyis bachub ste/ hUkAr b+hA be sha phaT/ nI la dat+ta pra bA sha prAH/ ya mA n+taka prab sha phaT/ Ar+tha a ts+tsha lA pra be sha phaH/ padz+ra kuN+Da li pra bai sha phaT/ rngagi rlung prab sha
305b4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ ma hA ba la pra baM sha phaH/ a mr-i ta kraN+Da laM pra ba sha phaT/ nA sha ste nya na na shA ste b+ha ni/ yaHswe D+ha ni/ ya~Mk+ka sud+ha ni/ zhes gsungs nas/ khro bo chen po bcud gzir cing mnan pas/ gdug pa'i mchi ma 'ang ga cing /
305b5(rnying rgyud): badzin pas na/ da pa zhes rnams kyis ni thug pa / rgyu la ldan kyis lags babyud/ rgyal po can pa bku rtsab dang myas brgya rdzog pa/ gang dang d+han
305b6(rnying rgyud): rba bzha la su 'gyur rdzog med ba t+ta/ de yang stsa tan dang thad pa lags ma// de nas dbang du bsgra zhing gnan gzing zlab bgyi pa/ ma de la prab sha ya phaT/ de ba kA pA la T+Te/ zhes brjod pas lha thams cad brgyal bar gyur d+he/ gzu
305b7(rnying rgyud): khams kyi gas pa ma hA wa dang khyab 'jug lathar ma can dang // D+ha ga ri ti dga' byed dbang phyug nga/ gzhan nu ldan drug tshogs kyi bdag/ legs ldan sngabs brjid la sog pa// gzhal yas khang gi rmang du bad+hid /
306a1(rnying rgyud): rna / / // / dag pa sa / // pan
306a2(rnying rgyud): yas yang ge gdung bzas/ pa gas/ rathAka pA la d+h+we/ pa da ma sgeg yin / ng+ga bram chu bdag rlung gi // gnod sbyin dbang ldanas yi ma// zhem thab la sogs 'tshong// bsla ba nas gag su byas brjig pa
306a3(rnying rgyud): rlung sru be sha phaT/ spang prA bA shad+de/ rA dza kA pA la tAM/ yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes so// mig mi bzang dang nam thos sras// gan drab ba sres nas bskal par bya// ka ba dang ni rgyal mtshan 'dzugs// 'dod pa'i yon tan ku ldan pa pa/
306a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen sna bdun dbrog pa'i phyir/ tsal brti pra be sha ya phaT/ 'khor los sbyar rgyal bskal nas ni// pags pas dbang gi bla bre byas// phung po tshogs kyi mchod par rol// 'khor los sbyar rgyal dbang phrogs so// Ar+ya dzI ti pra
306a5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ sUr+ya pra be sha phaT/ sU n+ya ka pA la hUM/ nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // dmag dpon gza' lhag phur bu dang // pa wa sangs dang spen pa dang // dA hral ste gza' yi tshogs// bsgral nas bad dang dral ma byas// smin drag dang ni snang ma
306a6(rnying rgyud): dang // mgo dang lag dang nab mo dang // rgyal la sogs pa shAr phyogs bskal// mchu dang gra dang sro dang ni// me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang // saMg rgyog rnam par bskal// me mtshams sngon dang snrubs dang ni// chu rgod chu sra
306a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin dang // gyi kun rnams ni nub tu bsgral// mon dra dang ni mon gru dang // khrims stod dang ni khrums spad dang // nam thu ze skar bu nya rnams// byung gi phyogs su rnam par bskal// de wa e raM ya pra bi sha phaT/ raka ir ya pra be

307a5(rnying rgyud): mang kyad bsngags par byags 'o// rgyad bsas rgyal pa ba sa ga 'byu mas/ lung bstan pa'i la'i ste bcugasas pa/ du sa sbyin pas thub pa'i byes
307a6(rnying rgyud): thug deng kyil la khyor chen po brgyad dang ldan par bzhugs mo// de nas dbu ma na rnga dbyings kyi tshogs rnams kyis gsungs pa/ rgyas dbyangs yod tan 'brang ba rgyas gags meng khu/ nga kyil la mi bams pags
307a7(rnying rgyud): rgya mi byang ba kyirgyal ba ba rgya gra su su na sum spangs rgya sa sa
307b1(rnying rgyud): sman thos thub pa'i sangs mas des/ thams cad can gyi rol bya zhes byab 'ating nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// dang lda sum dang brgyas pa'i rigs m+b+ha sgra dang wAH// shas rab zabs dang yab yum 'du
307b2(rnying rgyud): 'brel med// dug gsum gcig tu bskal bar tshar gsum rgyan bu rol// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad phyir rgyan du che// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ dbu rdo rje dbyings kyi rgyan bkod
307b3(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ rdzu 'phral myur du bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad gsungs so// mi gnas
307b4(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das pas gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrog/ mi sgrib ye nas gsal bas go 'phang 'dzegs par mtho// me ldog yul las sgrol bas skabs drug 'gros su mgyogs// gar yang thogs pa med pas byin rlabs shugs dang ldan// 'tsher skad gdang /
307b5(rnying rgyud): su snyan pas mi srin sprob bskyed// ral pa dmar po'i dbus nas dbu byung ba// dpral ba zhung po brjid pa'i khyad par dang // rta mgrin me ltar 'bar ba'i khyad par ni// don dang mthun pa'i bye brag 'di 'dra ste// ljang gra me 'bar rta mgo'i rang
307b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin no// 'gyur med ye gas chos su ji bzhin gsal// byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gas ma khyad par gzigs// jog ma le brgan 'bar ba'i khad par ni// skrag po bkod pa'i zhing khams rab 'byams nas// rdul gcig steng na rdul
307b7(rnying rgyud): snyed khro bo kun// zhing khams mtha' klas ma lus dbang du sdud// shes rab thabs dang 'brel ba'i rta skad ni// grub pa'i dbyangs dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs yin te// grub pa'i dbyangs ni rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrog/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni re rab
308a1(rnying rgyud): dz+wal 'thar// mam sa/ gdangs sa snyan pa'o khyad par ni// rmad drug mdud pas bcings pa man la ma ston// lhan mig/ ga lhur 'am la na pa d+hA na// shA khra ba tsun pa za ba'i srin po 'dams// nga
308a2(rnying rgyud): bag yed la gdungs pa'i rta skad ni// mtha' nas rmongs pa'i mun bsal bar byed// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i ta d+ha las// te mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ge bzu ngag pa'o//
308a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang lhan gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas ngas/ kun tu gzigs shing kun tu rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad gsungs so// rgyud dang dathibs dang grangs dang gzigs zabs rtogs pa'i don// gang zung cu ni hUM
308a4(rnying rgyud): las dpal chad khro ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// gang skyes gnas ni sna yi dbugs ring dra ba las// phyag rgya'i tshul du phyag rgya 'byung // shangs kyi rlung sgom yangs pas ye shes dbugs sgom nas// gsang ba'i 'dzubs ma langs pas ldag
308a5(rnying rgyud): bsngal gcod rnyeng spong // rgya yangs mchad bag chags tshar gaH dang // de yang 'khor ba lags las bzlog pa yi// rlung dmar drug lnga'i dbyings su skal// bla ma dang dkar dang gzang ring dang // rdo dang ldad pa'i choms dang ni// zhal dra ba ta
308a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i byang chub sa pas// ma byas chos nyid kun la ral/ zhe rgyas dbang dang drag pa ya// cing yang 'gyur ba'i blom khAng ste// hom ldar 'bral bas zhal zhes bya// 'khor ba yongs su smin pa dang // las dang nyan mongs dbang bcan pas/
308a7(rnying rgyud): dag dang maud ga lung ma bstan// de dag smin pas smin mang bshad// 'od sgeg cir yang 'gyur ba dang // rjod byed gnyis ka'i rten gyur pas// 'phyar ba'i phyir na ljags zhes bya// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas te mchog rol pa'i tat+tA las/
308b1(rnying rgyud): kan tur yang zhes bya ba'i laT sa bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyangs rgyas dus// ye shes la rol cing yi shes la dbang bsnang ba zhes thu ba'i ting nga 'dzin la skams par zhugs nas/ 'dagasangs pad/
308b2(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru'i chu ni bde gshegs thugs kyi chu// rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin dmyigs pa'i rten// 'od zer 'phro 'du nyon mongs rnam rtog 'joms// rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang // yig 'brus bon phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya che ba'i phyag rgya'o// rag
308b3(rnying rgyud): la yang rnam gsum ste// blta ba rig pa dang ni rgyud kyi rig/ las kyi rig pa gsum du bshad// de nas ye shes rol pa ni// snying po phyag maman phra mo dag/ brtan par gyur nas mkhar la nub// ces gsungs sa// skad thams cad kyi rgyal
308b4(rnying rgyud): bla skye
308b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// khro chen snyeng 'dzin kha T+wAM 'bar ba bsnams// rdo rje ljags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa rol// lho ru rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// khro chen mod rlon khrag gis bkang da
308b6(rnying rgyud): rje lugu chung // rdo rje btson dang ni rnga'u chung 'dzin pas rol// nub tu rol pa'i lhag bzhin// me yi zhags pa dang ni klung gi khA// sdigra mdzub rtsa la ye shes mi chen 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAMg ni rab tu 'khrol// byang du rol pa'i phyag bzhiH/
308b7(rnying rgyud): dbu dang tsaM lnga dang // rtsegasum ci gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdegs/ khyud thams ched kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tas+thA las/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u suM bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang lhun gyis thub pa'i sangs/
309a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das des/ khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i shing nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'ang gsungs so// ye nas sgra med skye ba'i'acho 'grub stan// ya sha ma lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni// ngan pa
309a2(rnying rgyud): chetshe dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan// dper na gru nag 'dra skye thabs dang shes rab kyi// lte ba e ste glu gsum sku gsung thugs// sprul pas don mdzad pho nya thams cad ston// gsang ba'i yum bzhi lu la 'khril ba ni// rdo rje dram
309a3(rnying rgyud): mo dang rin chen zlog 'gyu ma// khyud gshog a mo de dang the'u gshog sder mo can// sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar// thabs mchog nyis stong rtse gnyis g.yas nas brkyang // shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas brkyang // zabs
309a4(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab 'brel bas byin rlabs che// sprul pa'i phreng ba dus gsum rkyen mi 'chad// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gshog pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
309a5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des/ sna tshogs rnam par rol pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dpa' rtags stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyan/
309a6(rnying rgyud): bye'u lcags kyis shar lho'i zhabs brgyan te// rdo rje 'chol pas lho phyogs zhabs brkyangs brgyan// bse khrab skrag pos lho nub brkyangs pa brgyan// gcan gzan gzeg gis byang shar brkyangs pa brgyan// shu ken dar gyis byang phyogs zhabs brkya
309a7(rnying rgyud): brgyan// mche ba dmar pos nub byang brkyangs pa brgyan// sprul nag 'khyil bas 'og phyogs 'dul ba brgyan// khro brgyad gzir nas rol pa ni// dung chen bcom zhing skal tshigs mnan pa dang // brang mnan ldan pa bcom pa dang // 'khor nyid u la sbas
309b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang // rganya la bar la klas pA la// ral pas gzhal las khang du bstan// ral pas mdad d+h+r-i ga n+tu// ma ba cu zil gnon stobs bcu'i dbang dang ldan// dbus du rdzogs ga ba yin// zhes gsungs sa// rgyud thams tu
309b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dbang rgyas ta mchog rol pa'i tar+tha las/ zhabs khro chen brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u stenyi zla gcig pa'o// / de nas yang stan gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das / dam tshig rgyad dri rim pa zhes
309b3(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dper na dam tshig mchog rab ni// kun tu bzang mo yin pa'i phyir// ji skad bud med yod pa la// gsung gi rdo rje me skud do// gcol rab tu gzugs pa la// drang du sgru ba gang byar
309b4(rnying rgyud): pa// 'gegs pa'i chog gos brgyan nas su// sr-i zhwa'i sems kyi gdung ba la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor nas// mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid ye shes te// gnyis ka'i nges par mnyam na ni// stong gsum dbang por gdon mem
309b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten bams na cal po bzhin// rgyas kun du nani gnas dbarten// ci phyed zhen 'jig rten gyi// dus bzhi dang ni 'jig rten drug/ phyogs bcur gyur pa thams cad na// da mchog la brten kun tu babang // phyi nang gsang ba mthar byin pa'o//
309b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad pad+ma yin pas na// sku ba'i cho 'phrul pa d+ma yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tat+tA las/ yum pa d+ma gzi ldan ma pad+ma can gyi le'u gre nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang
309b7(rnying rgyud): bco ldan 'das sbyin gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas ngas/ srid byang rnam par rol bzhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin ma sgoms par thugs nas/ 'drig grangs sa// dmar gzugs chags pa dbang gis sde 'das// thangs ca ma sras drug byed papa/
310a1(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chags pas bags chags bsreg par mdzad// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms nyon mongs drag gsam bsreg/ ldan gyis grub pas kun tu 'joms pa yin// ci kyi she na phyogs bcu dus bzhi ye/
310a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs ma lngar ldan dus kyi za ma la// sred gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// ye shes 'phro bas kun tu bsreg cing rol// rnam srin las ma zad pa'i sems can dag/ sangs rgyas rnams la las kyang mang po mda'// zhes gsungs so//
310a3(rnying rgyud): chud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nus yang bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas de/ dngos grub thams cad
310a4(rnying rgyud): kyai ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas he ru ka khro bo thabs kyi drag po bsgral ba'i sngags gsungs so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hUM hri dzaH// nye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba// 'di dag bzhi 'bum bzlas kyar na// las rnams
310a5(rnying rgyud): bya ba thams cad 'grub// ces gsungs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bskul to// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi chos rgya mtsho lta bu 'di/ thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge zhing don bzang ba dri ma med par dag
310a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'di la/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams rjes su bsgrub cing dang du len na/ bgegs rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ram/ bar ma dor ltung bar mi 'gyur ram/ zhes smra bsgrags pas/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas 'di skad
310a7(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// phyi rabs rnal 'byor grub pa pos// gsang sngags bsgrub cing rig 'dzin pa// thams cad sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras// de la bar gcod 'byung ba na// bar gcod dngos grub dus gcig 'byung // dang po klu yi bu mo rnams/
310b1(rnying rgyud): rten \u0f7fsa bcan cing mangs byas nas// nal 'tha rjod tshul 'du srid kyis// da lagags pa ma bzed dang // bang bar thaman ma yi tshogs// mau yo thod pa mang pos brdzun// m-i lkug 'gra nags bsgru ba rdul// bdag la mnyan bsang
310b2(rnying rgyud): bair// blang bar gyur nam 'jigs par// dbang che na gar gyi skur sdoms shig/ 'khor dugyur pa rnams kyis// rang dbang med par lhag byed kyi// dngos grub dang po'i rtags sa sbyar// de 'og gnod nyin tshul ston cing // dum pa
310b3(rnying rgyud): mgos pacan// mi yai d+hu mas skar 'dogs shing // sbrul nag mang po dag gas bcan// lus la zang zeng dam kyis te// tshig cog tsam tshom dag tu zlum// 'od srid de la ma 'jigs shig/ gar gyi dbang lhag grwar bsgoms na/
310b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin rnams dang grul bum gyi// dbang por gyur te dngos grub rtags// gnyis pa yin par shes par bya// de 'og bar snang la gnas pa'i// lha yi khro bo rnams byung ste// 'brug sgra drag po'i sgra spogs shing // bar snang la gshegs
310b5(rnying rgyud): sgrogs pa dag/ sbrul nag kha nas mjug ldeg/ al la zhes sgra 'byin cing // mig kyang g.yas ga ya ng+ge nyi myang bsgyur// 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis bkra ba dang // rang gi khag pa khargyanas// mi rogasar rnying bdag pa
310b6(rnying rgyud): tshum ma nam thab lci bar// thams cad bster nus man ba brtar// rkang pa phur ltar bdag la 'dabs// mi mgo lags pa smyon pas g.yogs// lag pas rnaM rjes rjeg pa dag/ blang bar gyur nas 'jigs par// gang gyi dbyung chub
310b7(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na// dngas thu ba rtags sur gsum pa yin// da sbyar thams cad dngas srab 'byung // ba sa cang nyams pan dus gcig 'byung // gsang ba'i bdag pas shes rab kyis// napa gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi ma pa nga
311a1(rnying rgyud): sa mu gyur la pa nanas byas rgyud ngas thabs gyur ba'i gangs tun ga danams bya nas gsadas dan pa bgan rnamapas// gdung btad ba dbasam/
311a2(rnying rgyud): ldan dadra he rba ka'i// sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul ni// cir yang ston cing cir yang snang // gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir// sku cha gsung che thugs che bas// sragasung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las kyis kyang ma bsgribs pas/
311a3(rnying rgyud): khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar dmed// sba la'ang rnam pa gsum du bshad// chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs// skal phras rdzogs 'dul ba'o// gsung la rnam pa gsum d+ma 'i shang // tshig gre gsung dang rig pa'i gsung // 'o
311a4(rnying rgyud): gsung ste rnam gsum mo// thugs kyi che ba yang ni rnam gsum ste// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i thugs dang mya ngan 'das pa'i thugs// gnyis su med pa'i thugs dang gsum// de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par ni// 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du/
311a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum bstan// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthong ga/ ye shes zug gi phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pa rdo rje rnge'u chung dang // mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas rol// dril bu chu zhags zad rnon g.yon gyis 'dzin//
311a6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i me ri sbrul nag grod rlon phreng bas brgyan// nyid kyis nyid la che ba'i rngam tshig 'di smras so// da ni khro bo rnam par rgyal// lte ba med pa'i chos dbyings su// mtshan ma med pa'i chos bshad pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so//
311a7(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe pyad kyis// sang gi glang chen gyi steng na// dus gsums ngas rgyas thams cad la// yod dang med pa'i chos kyang bstan// me long lta bu'i ye shes so// sprul pa'i 'gro don byed pa'o sgras// 'jig rten phal pa
311b1(rnying rgyud): pa// du// ba na // sa gsu dun nas rna das rdzu das// kun gyis thub dungs sunas rnams/
311b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin tug ma/ car yang 'thar ba bzhugs pa ma// mel gyis gdon pa'i gdun mchog rngam// tsamadam chen po'i stobs rgyam // 'do sru 'jam ldan// dalce ba brda me
311b3(rnying rgyud): sprin dngas pa' phrul dang / lha dang 'angags padang / mangs pa dang / ldan lamacir yang 'gyur ba'i bye thugs byabs kyi tshul dang / sred pa'i 'khong ba zal gyis gnon du/ dri med nyim pa pa 'ong kyi rdzogs te/ 'dzin lnga'i tshu du ba shad/
311b4(rnying rgyud): bral bar 'byung ba napa ma yang 'byur ba shas ngan/ sdubs cad nas gsod mangs/ 'brug tu rdzogs par da sa sa/ rnags / la pa ga
311b5(rnying rgyud): babres kyang / rirnam pa ma mams pa'i mdzad pas 'phrul bamarda pa dang / gsung pa rgya 'das rgyas dang bsnye nga ba 'am pas stod pa'i la nga/ gas zag nas drang la na shos
311b6(rnying rgyud): chuming nga/ 'thug sar bklag pa'i ya lag bcungag gis dbyangs kyis bsnang pa'i mad ldag par sgrogs nig/ rdul gyis garton pa'i tshul dang brgyad du na 'dun namamakhang rgyan kyig chags ma/ yo pas kyi ngas
311b7(rnying rgyud): bya / da nang kyi mang ba ma byang sa ga tshobs bung mi 'du na thugs kyi ngam pani ngas can can pa tham rung bzhin pa byed du rgyu lhab mang garang 'dridangs
312a1(rnying rgyud): lcags nang gzhan ma g.yas pa'i tshul dang / zhwa gnas kyi rang bzhin las/ zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyab par 'byung ba'i tshul dang / zhwa gnas can gyis rang bzhin bzod pa las/ lhag mthong gi klan gyis phan 'dog
312a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mgod mi zad pa las/ lhag mthong gis cing yang 'gyur zhing dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshul lo// rA tra bcom pa'i gnas rngam/ zil gyis gnon pa'i grad na rngam// khams gsum bsla ba'i
312a3(rnying rgyud): zhing rngam/ rtog 'joms byed pa'i brtul zhugs rngam/ yon tan rngo ma brjid bzhir grags so// de yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing / cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang / gdan khyad par can zil gyis mnan pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad par
312a4(rnying rgyud): khams gsum yongs su sgrol ba'i tshul dang / spyod pa khyad par can srid gsum dus gcig tu 'joms pa'i tshul lo// de ltar rngam sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan no// de la sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs med rkyen dang 'tshams pas brjid
312a5(rnying rgyud): che// bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid che/ de yang chos kyi sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas che/ thugs rje dang phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas skul par grags/
312a6(rnying rgyud): 'du byed mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas grangs mang / smon lam sgo nas rigs dang mthun/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong / rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang/
312a7(rnying rgyud): 'phred// gsung gi brjid bzhir grags pa/ gdangs chen stong gsum gang bas 'arjid rtse/ tshig sbyar the tshom gcod pas badre che/ don la nyi tshor ston pas brjid che// byad zhugs yon tan ston pas brjid che/ nga yang khyab pas gdangs che/ sbruH/
312b1(rnying rgyud): rnam dru da / sa nga ma mapa/ dag sa ga ga du/ gdus ga rna gas gas ba tu da /
312b2(rnying rgyud): rung ba'ir byugs pa// yodas pa dag med pas // sa 'ablas cug ngas byas dang ga drug pag ci / kyi'i / demi go pa
312b3(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs pas de dogs med// lhag mthong gis dbu ma dugs pa/ zhi gnas kyis mi 'gyur ba'i mtha' spangs// thugs rje kun mi chadabus ngo ba bgrong ga bar du 'grags// shes rab kyis mtshachis sum nga zhin gyis 'dral// @
312b4(rnying rgyud): tan brjid pazhing grags pa dang // med pa zad mi shes pas badzod// gcis la 'dod dgrar gyur pas brjod// gnod song phas par med dpas rjid// thabs pa das sgron gyis rigs da// de yang drug sa na pas zang mi shes padang
312b5(rnying rgyud): nas kyi stonas gcig la bsam pa'i dbang du 'dod dgrang rgyun/ sems parjod kyi stonas gad pa byor/ bam na mas thams padamams can la 'gro/ shes kyi smin sa thabs par // slong 'i paslong pa gang// na pas rjod pa
312b6(rnying rgyud): ba ma sno 'o// byung sa nyams ga ma pa'i rjod// mang ba srin nga mi bsang ma brjid// dgon kyabasan ta dadapas 'dzid/ dgas pa'i don dngas sa ya ma nga na
312b7(rnying rgyud): nga ra ma ma nga sa sa ga du gas nas
313a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang // nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub pa ga// de ltar dbang chen ha ru kar// yon tan sum rba \u0f7f drug gis// dug gsam su gsung thugs su spangs// lug sasngal bdub chen por spang // dbyangs las la gas
313a2(rnying rgyud): chen po ste// ngan 'gro mtho ris skyes btab pas// dmyal tshogs dong spug chen por mdzad// rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang // 'di la rdul tsam bsrung du mahA// srid gsum dbang du 'du sa nas che// khams gsum dus gze
313a3(rnying rgyud): su zhim// thig le chos skur ye gnas pa// dbang chen zhes kyang de la bsngags// zhes gsungs so// chud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ khro bo rngom brjed khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste
313a4(rnying rgyud): nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las kun tu rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' bsgo ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i bdag po dza
313a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings las thabs mchog sprul pa'i phyir/ tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// lung lo can gyi pho brang bcom// snang mdzad chen po a la la// gnod sbyin chen po a la la// chos kyi dbyings nyid al pa// sangs rgyas bden tshig al pa/
313a6(rnying rgyud): tshad gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// 'jig rten phal pa'i sar brdungs pas// mtshan ma dngos po'i chos rnams las/ yod med chos la spyod par shog/ tshar gsum can gyi rde'u chung gis// 'og min gnas kyi sar brdungs pas/
313a7(rnying rgyud): yod med chos la spyod pa rnams// rang bzhin med pa'i don rtog shog/ de skad ces ni gsungs pa ni// stong gsum 'jig rten khams thams cad// de ltar ma gyur gcig kyang med// bka' bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pas/ ga
313b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rdzas gsal pa/ snang ba kun rdob rgyal gnas pas// dza la don gzhung gang lags pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshang drugasol// zhus pa'i lan ni gsungs pa la// dang po chu dang rang bzhan dang // dan
313b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa grangs dang ni// bsnyen par bya dang thabs la sogs// rgyu ni gyi nang gsang ba gsum// b+ha ga yangs pa'i sdod po dang // b+han d+ha wAg sprod rda shing dang // tsan+dan dkar po'i shing sogs la'o// lbab dang skad dang rnga'i rang bzhin
313b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes rig pa'i sgra// rang bzhin don du shes par byos// don la rnam pa gnyis yod de// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i gzi ldan ma'i// b+ha ga me gnas ye shes yin// lta bar bsgom dang lha yi suM// sprul par 'asgom pa
313b4(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i don// sgrub pa las kyi rnga dang gsang ba yum gyi rnga// rol mo dbyings kyi rnga ste grangs yin no// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bslab pa'i 'bras bu bsten pa'i thabs// 'di ni brdung ba'i thabs yin no// dpal chen rnam
313b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i drung thabs ni// rdo rje nam kyin phyed na// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'dug ste// stang ge'i phyag rgya bcas nas kyang // mtshan ma chen pos de la gdab// mdun du nyan d+ha srub med bzhag/ steng du rnga bzhag lug gis brdung //
313b6(rnying rgyud): kyang dngos grub mod la thob// de nas brdung ba'i thabs mchog ni// dza nI gar gyi dbang phyug ste// rnga lag gzi ldanA pad+mo can// rnga skad rdo rje gshog pa mo// gzi ldan pad+mar gyur nas kyang // mi bzung mi bstod dbyings su gzha
313b7(rnying rgyud): dur khrod ma mo'i rdung thabs ni// dza ni thabs kyi rang bzhin la// lug ni shes rab yum gyi dang // yab yum 'brel ba'i gar thabs kyis// rnga skad zab mo'i dbyangs blangs pas// thugs dam ma lus yongs su bskang // nam ched skya rengs
314a1(rnying rgyud): dang po la// dkyil 'khor spyang du bdag 'dug lnga// g.yas kyi mtho bong mthu'u chung skar// badz+rA ga cu bcas nus kyang // sbyinA lag kha la rdu bya sar te// nyi ma shar ci bar du ni// dzas+yAng mi thag pa
314a2(rnying rgyud): phur brdung // ma mo rnams ni bran bzhin 'khol// zod gtong pho nya'i rdung thabs ni// mchog chen brkos pa'i rtsi ba rus la// mchog chen nyid kyi lpags kyis g.yogs// mchog chen phur pas lan dgu drag tu brdung // nyi tshod kri' lo si li
314a3(rnying rgyud): li// dus kyi nyu le shar ra// pho nya las byed khrigs se khrig/ g.yas kyis rnga lcag bzung nas su// grul bum skad ltar ku co 'don// thengs dgu drag tu brdungs nas ni// las bdag ma lngas 'dur gam chad// phra men ko'u ri 'tshogs
314a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdung zabs ni// lus kyi gzhug gu zung ni ltag sprod la// tsa ra shel sgong shun gyis g.yogs nas kyang // bcu drug phyag rgya rol pa yis// khams gsum sred gsum dbang du sdud// tshangs pa'i ze'u brang dmyal zag gcod// rnga ni thabs
314a5(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin la// lhag ni shes rab yum gyi tshul// rnga skad byang chub sems kyi ngang // dpal gyi rnga skad thengs gcig gis// dpal chen yab yum thugs dam bskul// dpal gyi ji skad thengs gnyis kyis// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i re ba skong //
314a6(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dbang du spad// tshangs pa'i ri la rnga brdungs pas// gzugs khams lha tshogs dbang du bsdus// lnga yis ri rab rtse mo la// lha yi dbang po brgya byin yang // longs spyod lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// drug gis 'jig rten khams
314a7(rnying rgyud): su sgra bsgrags pas// mi ye gnas su thim par 'gyur// thugs rje thabs kyi rol pa mdzad// phyogs skyong zil gyis mnan pa'i rlung thabs dang // dngos grub nye bar len pa'i rdung thabs ni// gri na mgrin sngon can du bregs nas ni// mgrin sngon nyid
314b1(rnying rgyud): lhanasacas g.yogs nas kyang // sheg sar byas pa na gsum bdangs na // hrIs gang rgyu gas/ danam mthong mang dubadag 'dug la// g.yon tsam tha ba ga dang 'byung // bslad pang smra bcad pan// dug ga na/
314b2(rnying rgyud): brdud // mamo bcu drug dngos bub thob// ces gsungs so// mud thams cad kyi rgyal pa dbang rgyas tam tshag nam pa'i rtarna las/ lag min gyi gnas dang/ lung po can ci gnas dang / ban mo'i gnas dang / 'ag na

314b5(rnying rgyud): gzhung // gsang ba'i mkha' la rnam par 'thil/ smyeSh+Tati/ g+h+ri Sh+Tha)/ oM shwe Sh+T+r-i hrIT+Te/ 9 \u0f7f/ k+Shi ShA hu~MhrI/ Sh+Tha heha// de skad lan grangs bcu gsungs pas// yang ba tu bskal brgyad rnams rdzogs// AH
314b6(rnying rgyud): tAM hi hUM/ drag ca caganyis byung bas kyang // dmus long 'khor bar rab tu rdzogs// zod rjes par thams rnams khong // rdzogs pa ur+tha yo ga'i lung // t+yai gtsab shAn ma/ kha ba long khwa// 'di ni kyang ma thag tu yang //

315a1(rnying rgyud): hU~M hU~M phaT/ hrIHhU~M phaT/ hA hU~M phaT// 'di ni phyung ma thag tu yang // mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig dang // mgo brgyad phyag brgyad rol pa dang // mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang // mgo gsum lag
315a2(rnying rgyud): gsum nang gsum po// shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi ru// snying rje chen po bzhi yis rol// sprul par rol pa de rnams ni// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i gzhung // ba d+hu pho nya'i lung du bstan// de dag rol pa'i byin rlabs las// steng 'og grogs
315a3(rnying rgyud): mtshams ma lus pa'i// thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// rang bzhin me dang rlung yin te// dper na srid pa'i rgyal po me chu shag bzang dang // na za'i rgyal mo ku mA ra// de gnyis yongs su 'thabs pa'i sgra// 'brug tu grags pa dang 'dra nga /
315a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor bdod spug bag chags bsreg/ me 'brug rlung 'brug phyag rgyar gsal// rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du zung // dzi na lang to tsa ra/ yak+kha ku ban dza hUM/ zhes gsungs pas/ ba spu thams cad pad+ma'i 'od zer du gyur to// chud thams cad kyi
315a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ sprul pa bton pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das ldan gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ rab tu che la rngam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu zhugs nas/

316b2(rnying rgyud): pra shar ga sha/ ro bi ni drung / bi ma ran ta ka/ sgol sngags drag pos bskul nas ni// 'dzam gling lho yi gling khams su// ro las sa gzhir gyur pas na// ro ye srung ma chen mo ni// ma mo chen mo brgyad bzhag go// de yi gnas rten chen po yang /

316b4(rnying rgyud): ltar byin rlabs che ba 'di ltar bdud 'dral ba la mkhas pa yin na/ ma mo'i mer ni gang / dur khrod kyi ming ni gang / mchod rten gyi ming ni gang / tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ji lta bu/ gyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs par bkye/
