317a1(rnying rgyud): mnga'// mchod rten ra bo ta la'o// chu t+tha'i lag pa g.yas shar lha'i// mtshams te dur khrod pal yul yin// glog 'gyu ma dang bukas srang // longs spyod dag dang ldan pa yin// mchod rten kha shor bya //
317a2(rnying rgyud): lag g.yon lho nub mtshams te dur khrod sA la'i yul// sder mo can dang be tAs srung // mthu dbang che bde na gnas// rang byung mchod rten go ma sa la yin// rkang g.yas byang shar mtshoms su te// dur khrod ming nI li yi yul// dra ba mo dang
317a3(rnying rgyud): tsan d+ha sa srung // me chu 'grub pa de na gnas// mchod rten ming ni ge'u ti shan// rkang g.yon nub byed mtshams te dur khrod kha che'i yul// ze'u gshog ma dang phra mos srung // de na bde skyid phun sum tshogs// mchod rten ming ni ka ni ka/ pho
317a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan steng phyogs dur khrod u rgyan yul// mgyogs byed ma dang g+ha smas srung // gzi yi mchod rten chen po ste// dngos grub thob pa de na mang // rU tra'i nang khrol dur khrod za hod yul// lang ka pu rangs srin po'i gnas// a mo de dang sla shas
317a5(rnying rgyud): srung // srin po srin mo sha za dang // 'byor pa longs spyod kun dang ldan// mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu'o// tshangs pa'i gzhal yas khang bstan pa// nyan thos mdo sde kri yA dang // theg pa chen po yo ga dang // gsang ba yi ni theg pa gsum//
317a6(rnying rgyud): gzhung dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang // srin mor glo ya glo bsngal// de yi khog sbubs skye mched las// gzhal yas khang gi rgyu yin te// sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud bcas// drag po khro bo khyams la sogs// tshangs pa'i gdung chen zhig gshag gta
317a7(rnying rgyud): yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg mchog a nu yo ga'i gzhung // yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg rgyal a te yo ga'i tshul/ khyab dang gnas dang 'byung la sogs// rnam pa gsum po'i gzhal yas khang // snod bcud 'byung ba'i yul
317b1(rnying rgyud): gsal// thA ga dkyus pa'i nang du bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur rab rtogs na// gzhal yas khang zhes bya ba yin// debs phye rabs rnal 'byor pas// dpal gyi thugs rje'i byin gyis brlangs// ta nas btu
317b2(rnying rgyud): nas bskal ba'i phyir// sa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// phyi rabs sngags 'chang srub pa pos// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// bka' bzhin bskyed
317b3(rnying rgyud): nas byin brlabs pas// sngags mchog bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// bsgrub pa'i rgyu dang dam rdzas kun// sangs rgyas bsgrub pa'i rgya dang gzhi// dam tshig dam pa bsrub pa'i rdzas// 'bras bu chen po lnga yin pas// bdud dang gshin je la so gas dang /
317b4(rnying rgyud): mchog gi dbang po'i 'byor tshogs la// le l-i spang ba'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chod med par 'bad la bskal// rnam shes hU~M du gyur byas te// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas// yang dgas gsum 'dras par byas// de ltar ta dang dmyal
317b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'dir// dur khrod bdag po btul nas ni// 'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus// srid pa yongs sgrol chen por mdzad// sa nas sa yi rim pa bzhin// mi ldog dbyings su thim par bya// bdud dang srin po ma lus kun// sngon gyi bral bas
317b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa bzhin// btul nas yang dag sgrol mdzad pa// 'di ni sgrol ba'i phrin las so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol ba'i tran+ta las shor ba gzhon nu la sogs pa btul zhing / gzhal yang khang du byin gyis brlabs pa'i
317b7(rnying rgyud): shu nagu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi don du/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ spyi rabs rnal 'byor skal ldan rnams la 'di gsungs
318a1(rnying rgyud): sus pa/ dugs sa nag can na ts+tshag// dngas sa gas pa 'i sa pabyud snying bas bskul/ skrag tapa ga tes ta N+Di \u0f7f/ nyas pas mnyas pa rtsa gtugs pa// gtisas mad par byang bar gyur
318a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje pad+mar ldan byas pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya'i tshe 'phral la// gzi ldan gsang bar e mra gsum// nyi ma badz+raM shes rab ldan// so sor gsang pa'i brdas mtshon te// oM dang mA kyai 'phro 'dralas// byin rlab sa rnam par 'phyo ba yi// 'dabab
318a3(rnying rgyud): par bcos// dad thuzugs / tshogs rji ga yis brjod/ das yang dru brgyad pa'o// thug dkyi sa d+mam ga/ gas sems sa ga// nga mes nas rlo// migadugags
318a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings su dngas// lcags kyi dbang por bar ba // rnapa'i dbyings dpa kla par brtul// tshang ba myed nasanala'ar bsnad// gsang pa'i rdo rje'i lam du blangs// rtag yangs ma dkyil 'khor du// rgyamathab paH dang // rdo rje la gas
318a5(rnying rgyud): 'dres pa dang // b+h+yo 'i nga chub ba zlos pas// phyogs bcu'i bral ba'i thigs dum bapral// mtha' yas sems can lasadon d+has// skur 'das phyug d+ha'i spang snang bas// ma shes sems dpa' tshan gang pa'o// du yang thabs dang zhes
318a6(rnying rgyud): dbya las// byang chub sems ni sbrul bzhag/ rdzas la cha yi dngos smras mang // 'di ni sbyor ba'i lung dgrags// kun rdzob phyag rgya'i slar gang lag// gnyis med byang sems 'od zer las// nong tshe tsam gyi klag kyi lan// ye shes sems dpal
318a7(rnying rgyud): tsho na gang dmar// grang 'bru tsam gyi go mnabs pa// g.yas pas yod bzhin nor bub rnams// g.yen na tshe yaM tha mi tig/ de ltar dkyil 'khor lhun grub pas// sprul pas bdag gzhan don byas pas// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i wa// rgyo/
318b1(rnying rgyud): ba chen pos bskyed pa'o// bsnyen pa bzhi 'bum bton nas kyang // tshe yi rig 'dzin thob 'dod na// zhag ni sram cu phrag bzhi'am// phrag drug phrag brgyad dag gis bsgrub// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mjug dam/
318b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tan+da las/ sbyor ba chos nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das che btsan 'gran gyi bla med gar gyi dbang phyug de la/ phyogs brgya dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / la dang klu dang gnod sbyin srin po
318b3(rnying rgyud): dang // lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'amachi la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dbang mchog dam pa de la/ glu zug blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khod rnams
318b4(rnying rgyud): kyis kyang / tshig dang don dang ldan pa'i klu drug blangs te/ de dag gi zing de ba dang dung de ba dang / sha ta pa dang gar d+hU ba/ cang ka de'u pad ka de'u ste/ de tshe glu drug blangs pas don drug 'grub// breng nge ba yi gru blangs pas// 'jig rten sgron ma
318b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad la// dam chos 'khor lo bskor tshul gyis// tshangs pa lha yi dkyil 'khor nas// sgra yi dngos grub chen po thob// dung dri ba yi kra grangs pas// 'jig rten sgron ma thams cad la// mtho ris chos bzang lha yi mdunas nas// nye dbang
318b6(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // / sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad sogs// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi// gsung gi dngos grub chen po thob// sha ta pa yi klu blangs pas// dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal chen bzhi// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// sgra skad rtogs pa ma lus
318b7(rnying rgyud): kun// lha yi gsung du rtogs par gyur// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// dran byed rnam shes ma lus kun// lha yi thugs su rtogs par gyur// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// gzugs mdzes sna chags ma lus kun// mtshan dang dpe byad rdzob
319a1(rnying rgyud): par gyur// thabanan na gzhan thos// gzugs ma drug dang las du dum sa// mig bdu spangs dag pa'idos// rdul po man po bzhi rnams so// yod dadu tsun pa mangs su 'thob// gang tub sa ba thang sangs
319a2(rnying rgyud): dbang po rje 'chad rgyal te// rtswa y-i rgyal ba 'don sa bdag/ dal sogs pa'i phyogs thong ga/ ma yod pa'i logs sa// thams cad dbyings su rtogs kun nas// dbyings kyi don la sa // ba mchod stsa byugs/
319a3(rnying rgyud): pa gsum gyi tho spa dir// rang bzhin med pa'i bro brdungs pas// phyogs slong chen po bcu rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// cang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// ma mo bdun dang srin mo bzhi// dag mo chen mo ral gcig sogs/
319a4(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i ye shes kyis/ khams gsum dbyings su sgrol bas na// don ni ldan gyis thob pa'i phyir// srid gsum dbang sdud mthu mo che// dregs pa'i yul bdag dbang du sdud// pad ka de'u'i gru blangs pas// gzhon nu'i skra mchog rngu 'a
319a5(rnying rgyud): dbang gi 'phags// glang chen brjid pas lha dbang ga yul du bstod// dmag grags chen mo dag bsnyen chen mo dang // lha sras gzhon nu zla sras gzhon nu dang // drang srong gzhon nu rig 'dzin gzhon nu dang // byin thugs brtan pa'i gzhon nu lnga bcu spun
319a6(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin gzhon du ti ka la spogs// gnod sbyin pal nam srin po mi'am rtse// 'byung po sha za yul bdag 'dri la sogs// dngos gru brlabs chen 'khrigs pa thob// de nas de'i rnga bajug kyi bro drug ni/ bdud bag jal ba brlag pa'i phyis// 'bo ba/
319a7(rnying rgyud): sgra nas 'dren pa'i gro// 'di ni sdug bsngal nad sil gro// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni// 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal du shar// khrag 'thung zugs dam chud kyang bskul// gri b+ha mgrin sngon snying la brdud// zla rdzogs mang po dbang du spyad// dbang phyug
319b1(rnying rgyud): chen po mkha' la bzung // gsang ba'i thugs ma dbyings nas bskul// glu pe rdzu 'phrul a la la// dngos grub rlabs chen a la la// zhes dpal chen po gar gyi dbang phyug gi brjid klu'o// pi wang gi spa lta bur blangs so// sdug bsngal nad
319b2(rnying rgyud): sel thugs rje'i bro// dug lnga nag khrag 'byin pa'i bro// ma rig mun pa gtibs par brdung // pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung gis// 'khor ba skyams lidra chen po mdzad// sdug bsngal gcod 'byin nad la brdung // ma srin rgya mtsho ma la ba
319b3(rnying rgyud): tha tshig gnyen po 'dra' mi byed// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus spring // rul myags nus ni tshig 'gyur pas// srog gi snying po gsungs shig/ oM ru lu rba lu d+h+waM b+h+yo lbA dza// 'di las bdag cag mi 'da' 'o// bde ba chen po a la la//
319b4(rnying rgyud): gsol to// gling bu'i sgra ltar glu blangs so// thugs dam dbyings nas bskul ba'i bro// rnam dag pad+ma rdo rje'i bdag/ ma gos pad+ma'i tshul ston pa// dregs pa la sogs 'joms mdzad pa'i// chos dbyings rnam dag skyon bral bas
319b5(rnying rgyud): bcu gcig 'od la thugs rje shar// pad+ma'i lhan la gzigs nas kyang // thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// thugs rje phrin las chen po yis// khro bo brgyad la gzir mnan mdzad// 'bod stogs mang po de dar// gzung ba'i ma
319b6(rnying rgyud): ma sha ra ra// rA rnga thal bar rdzog pa'i blo// bdud ni phyi mar 'thag pa'i bro// skye med dngos grub a lA la// zhes gsungs so// hA shang gi sgra ltar blangs so// ye shes rkun gyi khro bo che// oM gtsug phud 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'brar/
319b7(rnying rgyud): ga gsum ldan snang mdzad che// yab yu ma gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'khor lo snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// hUM dpral bar rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan sems dpa' che// yab yum gnyis med
320a1(rnying rgyud): shAH stor ba la smra/ na sto dag 'bras sa bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa dadamigs// sbrulas rin thung zung bca dang // tshogags ma ldan na man 'bar/ byams sa gnyis med snang bangs dang
320a2(rnying rgyud): snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// AM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan snang mtha' yas// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// pad+ma snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// hA las
320a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chag ma 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan don yod grub// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// gya gra ma snying gi dbus spu bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// sku gsung yon tan phran las lnga// rigs lnga dpal gyi gle blangs pas// gas
320a4(rnying rgyud): ba yum gyi bro brdung zhing // dpa' bo 'bru lngas dbang bskur bas// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i sku// lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings// d+hIH/ rta mgrin gzug na nor bu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan ha ya gI// yab yum gnyis med spor ba las// nor
320a5(rnying rgyud): gi dbus su bsgos// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// hU~M/ g.yas pa brgyad na lugs kyu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan pa min ma// gtso dang gnyis med 'khyil ba las// lpags kyu snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// g.yod pa brgyad na/
320a6(rnying rgyud): mtshon du 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan badz+ra ste// gtso dang gnyis med la khril ba las// mtshon cha snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// praM/ zhabs brgyad za byed ches brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan yum gyi mkha'// gso dang gnyis
320a7(rnying rgyud): med 'khril ba las// chas brgyad snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// phaT/ sku gsung thugs las sprul pa yi// sgo skyong khro bo mgo dgu bzags// kham rgya ma dang long ba'i tshogs// dmus long tshogs dang khyi lcang tshogs// dpal
320b1(rnying rgyud): sbal rab tu 'bar// chog gas ma ldan sprul pa'i tshogs// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'khor rnams snying gi dbus sra bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// 'di ni ye shes rgyan gyi zla// rgyan nyid ya shas klu blangs pas// 'ad
320b2(rnying rgyud): phyag tu rtags mchog 'bar// oM/ 'khor lo ye shes can rnams ni// 'khor lo rdo rjer bsgom byas nas// de nyid chos su nam mkhar cheho// hUM/ ye shes rdo rje can rnams ni// dong rdo rje rabaskams byas nas// de nyid chos nyid dang 'dza
320b3(rnying rgyud): rten la shes can rnams ni// rin che no rje bas sa nas// de nyid longs spyod ldan gyis grub to// padz+ra ye shes kun rnams ni// pa rdorje ba sgom zlas te// ting skye pa bya ba byed // rgyab pa na canarnam
320b4(rnying rgyud): gyagra ma rdo rjer bsgom byas nas// de nyid sbrul sra ngo mtshar rgyato// rgyan nyid ye shes klu blangs pas// bskul dang don byas 'dus pa dang // thams cad sgra ste gnyis med sba// song ba chen po'i ngangal bzhag to// zhes ga rang ba'i sra lta blangs
320b5(rnying rgyud): 'di ni ma mo 'khrugs pa'i khro bo che// bdud bzhi thal bar rtog pa'i blo// lang ka srin po'i snying la brdung // 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug ma// tshangs pa dbyings kyi bla blangs pas// sad pa ga
320b6(rnying rgyud): las thams cad// gang dang dbyangs kyis mchod nas kyang // dpal chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// phra men 'dus pa'i grwa blangs shing // srin po bskal ba'i tha brdungs pas// dpal dang ma mo'i thags dam spong // ye shes 'khrugs pa
320b7(rnying rgyud): dkyis 'khor nas// khro bo chen po'i thobadrangs te// sa mo bsnyen pa'i grwablangs pas// dpal gyi gzug 'byam a la la// zhes kyang ltar blangs so// yang bskal pa'i che// bdud bzhi thal bar rdzog par // lang ga srid pa
321a1(rnying rgyud): snying la brdung // bdud kyi mig 'bras thang la rlog/ snying khrag dron mo kha ru skyugs// dug lnga brtsegs pa'i ri bo la// 'di ni lang ka bsgral ba'i blo// rus pa thal chem thal la// rol pa'i rta gro chams ma cham/
321a2(rnying rgyud): hUM dang phaT kyi sgra skad 'khrugs// khams gsum dngos grub a la la// de skad pang ka de'u'i gru ltar blangs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu drug gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//
321a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po thams cad sreg pa chun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo las byung ba/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la bos te/ sems dpa' chen po/ ngas sngon la ka
321a4(rnying rgyud): na ma mi mags par/ 'am pa pa phyir thar pa sa/ bgrags dpa rnaMngs pa sung ngam // dpas sa rnam migs pa sa// tha ba sa rnam ngas bzud da // rab briganas pa sa/ gra sa rdzogs pa pa de
321a5(rnying rgyud): rtags pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bya// dang pos blangs byin gyis brlab// 'dom gang gru bzhi khyud skor bcas// zla ga ma dmar po dbang gi gzhal yas su// rak+ta chags pa rdzas kyi myal byugs dang // srid gsum dbang ltad dmar gyi go ma ye// dbang
321a6(rnying rgyud): phyug chen po 'khor bcas bzhugs pa'i gnas// shes rab pha rol chen po bzhugs pa'i thugs ka nas// rata bsgral ba chu bo'i rgyan ltar 'bab// rak+ta maN+Da la/ de nas mtshan dang ldan pa'i yum// drar khrod bka' dang mthun pa yis// gsang ba'i tshig
321a7(rnying rgyud): srid bkal ba yang // khrus byas dang ldan rgyan gyis bgrub// spyi bor bzhag la dbang bskur bya// chags pa chen por mchod pa yang // thugs las sprul pa badz+ra rA ga yis// 'chi bdag gdug pa lang ka'i tshogs bcom ste// rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas
321b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i thag la yis// thabs dang shas rab 'dra 'thal med pa'i gtsug/ chags pas dbang bskur 'khor bzel gyis gnos// kun bzang yangs pa'i mkha' la khrig 'dabs so// rag sa nA ma/ lan gsum 'azlas ta gzi lnga dang // rkar ba
321b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs te dbye bar bya// zlag ma kha spod zlum po lnga'i// dkyil 'khor e zhal grwa gsum la// bu gang mtha' bskor 'bang du bcing // sa tshon mgar ba'i so dag gam// yang na skam chen bsregs pa'i sa// nag po'i sal e zhal che/
321b3(rnying rgyud): mU la rak+ta zla gam sku// 'od lhung mtha' bskor bu yug rnams// dmar po yon tan dbang du srung // de yi dbus su sngags kyi rdzas// dmar po dpal dang ldan pa'i rdzas// bshul la sogs pa'i snum par sngo// de yid bus su yangs par bsham/
321b4(rnying rgyud): 'gram mam steng du sngags kyi rdzas// thod pa rnam gnyis bcud dang ldan// 'phro 'du dmigs pa'i rten du bzhag/ mtha' skor me ri dmar po la// phur pa dang ni rdzas rnams dgram// me sngags btab ste gzhag par bya// gsang ba'i gzung
321b5(rnying rgyud): dmar pos bcings// de nas thal ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// bla gam steng du longs spyod dgram// bam gyi ri bo'i sa phyogs su// ma mo'i gom pa drug cu yis// rdo rje'i 'gros su song nas kyang // rdo rje'i dpung gis sa phyogs su// bcu drug rol pa'i
321b6(rnying rgyud): hrIH/ dbang chen dpal gyi thugs ka nas// bcu drug rol pa'i pho nya mo// zangs kyi 'phar ba rkang gcig de// kha brgyad zla gam tshogs la rol// mig brgyad sdang mig zhal gnon// su tog lugs kyu dmang po la// dung gi cha che dkar po 'gro/
321b7(rnying rgyud): mche bzang yag 'bar ba la// ma mo bcu drug rol pa nyid// nga ro 'brug stong ldi rab las// ta kr-ita rgyal mo rol pa nyid// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// the tshom med par dmyal thag gcod// dzaHdza
322a1(rnying rgyud): zhes bskul lo// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mthong nas kyang // dbang chen gar gyi dbang phyug // bak+ku shis na bro ji ltar bskor// phung nas phul ba'i ltar dmitha// byang shar mtshams srang shA /
322a2(rnying rgyud): rong pa mdzad na ci ltar mdzad// snying dang b+hun d+ha gang gi rten// dbang po lnga ni gang la gzhag/ rkang lag rgya phreng gang la gzhag/ shun dang thod pa gang la gzhag/ bdud rtsi'i char ni ji ltar dbab// de skad ces ni zhus pas na// gar dbang gsung gis bka'
322a3(rnying rgyud): sbal pa// sems dpa' chen po spun ras gzigs// yi ge hU~M ki na gros 'jam// khro bo rdza sa la dmigs nas ka dag// drer khrod las dag sud drangs te// ha yi steng du gzhag par bya// thun te dbang po lnga yi tan phral nas// nag mang ga dag/
322a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// gzi brjid ldan pa'i lha mo lnga'i// rten du dbang po lnga yang gzhag/ rang cha la ni nang krol te// sgo bzhi la ni nang lag ste// bar thams la ni skal tshigs gzhag/ me ra~M la ni chu phreng ngo // shun sde ge yab dang rlung gi phyogs//
322a5(rnying rgyud): yam shing rdzas la gzhag/ de skad gsungs ma thag tu ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang la sogs pa'i// rol pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po yis// lu gu chud kyi thos bskor te// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po yi// byin rlabs yongs su rdzogs pa /
322a6(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskul phyir 'di gsungs so// gar dbang nyid du bdag cag rnams// bdag nyid chen po'i dbang thob phyir// chu drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams// dpa' bo 'bru lngas dbang bslar gyis// ngan song gsum gyi phung po la// 'khor ba'i la
322a7(rnying rgyud): lnga dgag pa'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i phra bkod pas// chu drug 'bros khung gcod pa'i rtsa// lus ngag sems kyis gzhil// yig 'bru 'thigs pa'i bro brdungs pas// drug gsum rdul phran bzhin du ba shig/ phung po khams dang lce mched
322b1(rnying rgyud): sum su pa// na sa / sa gas s+ho//
322b2(rnying rgyud): gapa ba'i dbul mchongs// rdo rjems kyi tho sa// dbang thug ga rtson mthong na'o// rdzogs pa sa ma kyis pa / dpa' ba ci dus pa/ de bangs sa gdubyang dang/ gsu
322b3(rnying rgyud): rlung pa phrang pa'i tho bdangs pas// bsregs dang 'byung po'i snying la brdud // gang chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'khor po zhabs kyi tho brdungs pas// mni rnams kyi snying la bajung // monya 'dres pa byel 'khor // ra
322b4(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyi bro brdungs pas// nab nyan rgan bu'i snying la brdud// kun du bzang ma'i mkha' dbyings su// tsita bang ba'i thobardungs pas// mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la brdung // gsang ba yas kyi blags// las kyi rko'i tha brdung sa pas/
322b5(rnying rgyud): chags gdug pa'i tshogs la brdung // 'khor chen 'jas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// nyung dkar gser gyi tho brdungs pas// bka' las 'das pa'i snying la brdung // babyed chen po'i dkyil 'khor dra// rdo rje ma ba'i choms brda bas// 'da'
322b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying mi brdung // hat+tarba wa hA tA rba u hU~M phaT/ d+hA thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rgyamachog rol pa'i las/ dran song gnas kyi blo'i lenag su ma n+d+ha gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang brtson 'bras chung ba rnams de 'das
322b7(rnying rgyud): thal lags su
323a1(rnying rgyud): di ri ri// rol pa'i rta bro chems se chem// gsang ba'i bshug pa kyu ru ru// rngam pa'i zlog 'bar ldibs sa lji ba// rdo rje'i thog 'beb lams se lam// hU~M gi dbang bskur khams gsum g.yo// phaT d+ha
323a2(rnying rgyud): su sprul 'jig rten khyab// raM gyi me 'bar thams cad bsreg/ gcan gzan mu kha smin ltar gtibs// kang ka 'dab chags skar ltar 'khrugs// sngon gyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings su// khams gsum
323a3(rnying rgyud): yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i phyir// za byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rus pa'i phung po spungs pa las// gcan gzan chen po'i bro brdungs pas// bdag tu blta ba'i nga rgyal bcom// khrag 'thung chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rak+ta'i rgya mtshod kyi
323a4(rnying rgyud): ba la// mchogs mkha' 'gro'i bro bzungs pas// 'dod chags ngo bo rtsad nas bcom// rngam chen 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// sha chen phung po srungs pa la// sder chags 'dus pa'i bro brdungs pas// bdag tu rtog pa'i zhe sdang bcom// su
323a5(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum gzhom pa'i las byis pas// sngon gyi dam tshig chen por skong // ma bdun mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// ta na ga Na sprul pa'i las byas pas// rnal 'byor bskang ba'i phrin las rdzogs// dbang chen
323a6(rnying rgyud): gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i las byas pas// khams gsum bsgral ba'i cho ga rdzogs// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// bka' 'das bsgral ba'i las byas pas// chu rnga mnan pa'i cho ga rdzogs// ha ya bI wa hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/
323a7(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tar+N+Na las/ rta bro'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// / 'du shes chung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i btul zhugs kyi
323b1(rnying rgyud): ting nga 'ang nas nyams par zhugs nas/ 'di skad gsungs su// khrag 'thung chun po'i brtul zhugs ni// zhing bcu bskal ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid ldan por bskum byas te// dbu ni rta mchog chags la ral// thugs ni bye med dbyings la ral//
323b2(rnying rgyud): phyag ni tha men tshogs la rol// gshog pa gti lhag gul rol// zhabs ni khro chen brgyad la rol// pra ni dzam brji zas la rol// rdo rje gsang ba'i yum la rol// gsung ni pho nya'i tshags la rol// 'khor ba'i lhams l+r-id chen po la/
323b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ra mdar gnyer// khong snying yum gyi b+hag la// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad pa las// ye shes lnga yi chu dpon mdzad// khro bo rdo rje'i go tshogs sdoms// sprul pa'i pho nyes dang ru tshugs// drug gsum dpal
323b4(rnying rgyud): gyi mda' mkhar 'grim// rdo rje mtshon gyi char pa phob// lus ni rdul phran bzhin du rtogs// sems ni yum gyi mkha' la stob// hAha ha ru lu hU~M phaT/ ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tAn+da las
323b5(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro'i le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhe sdang can rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ byams pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sgo srung srin po'i 'khor
323b6(rnying rgyud): khyi'i mgo can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral pa'i phung po la// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// dpal gyi khyi brgyad las la dgye// tshems ni sra sti med par rno// skad ni phyi nang
323b7(rnying rgyud): med par zug/ de phyir bdud kyi me la tshe ba// bang ni ngal dub med par mgyogs// de phyir ye shes sprul pa'i khyi// zas su gtsang sme med par 'thung // de phyir khrag dang dri chu 'thung // shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// 'brug sgra ldi bas lha chen 'dul//

325a1(rnying rgyud): gsam mthang nag 'ab ba ma kyang // rtsamam khrag ga can laphel// gang bdwags pa ting gzhag tu gtams// kyang rdzas gshegs pa'i drug sbrul te// dpung chen thog nog sar rgyan 'babs// d+h+r-i k-iShA
325a2(rnying rgyud): 'brug stong ldir// ta kr-ita rgyal po dug gsum 'joms// rol cig dkrugs shig pho nya'i tshogs// bam gyi ri bo spangs pa la// las bdag 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn sa mak+Sha k+ki ne s+t+waM/ zhes gsungs pas/
325a3(rnying rgyud): che btsan 'gran gyi bla med gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos rnam par rol par mdzod de/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ snyigs ma wA la babs pa'i sems can rnams/ drug gsum dbang gi rU tra'i rjes bsrung ba/ da lha'i gdug pa can rnams bskal ba'i
325a4(rnying rgyud): bag chags mnan pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus kyi zhing bcu bskal ba'i phyir/ bskal ba'i phung po'i lhag ma laM/ sgrol ba'i dus dang dus su/ gnas kyi bro brgyad brdung bar bya/ zhes gsungs te/ dug gsum gyi gnas mgo la lang ka man
325a5(rnying rgyud): pA'i bro brdungs te/ hUM ru tra bskal ba'i phung po la// lu gu rgyud du spel ba sdams nas// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dbu gtsug tu// mthing nag grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// hrIHlas grub pa'i ta mgo lnga// hUM gi 'brug stong ldi re re// dA la
325a6(rnying rgyud): da ni na pa las// mi pa na pa pa'i nyid / mags// skad ma mdzag su dam 'du ma/ bad dzinan pas legagags gna'o// tu cig nyes dag
325a7(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas te mchog rol pa'i tin+da las/ lang ka mnan pa'i bro'i le'u lha sum cu brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tsid+ha ni 'khor ba'i 'khor lo yin pas/ stod kyi 'kho
325b1(rnying rgyud): bcu shes na su d+ha/ hUM la ka bsgral ba'i phung po la// sA bu chud du khrel bskams shing // khrag 'thung 'angar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// hUM las grub pa'i dpal bawa las// ye shes lnga li phyag rngur 'khrugs// nam byin rlabs chen po las/
325b2(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i khrag 'brung sbyin ltar 'khrigs// tset+ta 'khor ba'i ridags la// ye shes lnga yi khyeb kyi ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas rimad gtid// go snying yum gyi b+hag sa// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i ling+ga 'debs so// yuM shes brgyad gyid dkyi 'khor
325b3(rnying rgyud): dA// drar khrod brgyad kyi yul byung te// 'khor ba rkyen gcod thugs 'i gro// srin pa bskal ba'i skyed la 'jung // dz+nyAn me d+hi swA rA yai/ zhes gsungs so// chud byams cad kyi rgal ba dbang rgyas tam tshag rol pa'i tatu las/ tsaN+Da' khor bzu la'u /
325b4(rnying rgyud): sum cu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dag par bya ba'i phyir/ dur khrod brgyad du rol te/ hU~M drung bskal ba'i rnam shes la/ lu ku rgyud du spel ba sdams te// mtshungs med che ba'i
325b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// nga rgyal mthu ba snyems bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i de ba chen po brgyad// che ba'i drag dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang che gnon// drag shul chen pos 'dul bar bka' stsal pa// hUM dang kA li 'phro 'bu las/
325b6(rnying rgyud): khro bo mthing nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// hUM kA ra yi phyag rgyar gsal// nyi zla bskal ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU dzathal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i gro// rus
325b7(rnying rgyud): pathal chen brdal ba la// chung nag 'chubra mgyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// hUM dang Ar+ya'i 'phro 'dulas// khro bo ljang sngon srin ltar gtibs// khro chung chen gang skar ltar 'khrugs// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgyar gsapa/
326a1(rnying rgyud): mun pa bskal ba'i rnam shes pa// yo ldan pa dag la gshegs// t+yA bral bar rlog pa 'gro// bdud dkyi mar 'thag pa'o// rngas pa thal chen parda la bul// srang nag dzugs sa kyigs su
326a2(rnying rgyud): 'od chen rdo rje'i bu lug 'tshubs// ya dang me yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo mthing ga srin ltar gtibs// khro zung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgyar gsal// gshin rje bskal ba'i rnam shes la/ chen po
326a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs// du tra thal bar rlog pa'i zo// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i blo// rus pa thal chen ba rdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs mgyogs bcur 'jigs// 'od phyung rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// hrI dngu la yi 'phro 'dulas// khro ljang sngon sprin
326a4(rnying rgyud): ltar gnyibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// dbyug pa sngon po'i phyag rgyar gsal// drang srong bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa
326a5(rnying rgyud): zal chen gdal ba lnga// rlung nag 'tshu ba snam phyogs bzung 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// pad+ma dang ma yi 'gro 'du lus// khro bo dud kha sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bak+ku lakhyil pa'i phyag rgyar gas pa//
326a6(rnying rgyud): chu bdag bskal ba'i rnam shes lnga// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar zlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba las// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu
326a7(rnying rgyud): yug 'tshabs// nA dang ki yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo dmar skya sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// nA ki rA dza'i phyag rgyar gsal// rlung lha bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra
326b1(rnying rgyud): thal par ga pa ba// bdun ni gyi mar 'jug pa'igro// dras pa thal chen padal bal// rlung nag 'dzubs ma phyogs bcud 'jigs// 'ad can na da' jug 'dzubs// u dAng wa la 'gro'abralas// nab+h+yo ldang dag srin snang gtabs/
326b2(rnying rgyud): khro chung tshan gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// gnod sbyin bskal ba'i rnam shes la// taM kr-in chen po dog la gshegs// ru nga thal bar rnyog pa'i bri// bdud ni phyi mar 'phag pa'i gro// dus pa la chen mjapa pa
326b3(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i rnam shes la// ta wan chen po dag la gzhags// hrI thal bar rlog pa'i na// dus pa thal chen bdal ba sus// chud nig 'tshubs mtshogs brgyar zigs// 'od chen na rje'i bu ug 'a grobs// han tan myong / ga gas
326b4(rnying rgyud): grags/ de ha da zugs/ pa rnam byams/ nasbyin cings/ hral zas zhugs/ nyin tu sbyin tu / rjo/ gnas/ sman sbyin thor/ zhes gsungs shing drug par ram mo// chud na byed kyi rgyal pod /
326b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas rgya mchog ral pa'i tAnA pas/ takr-i ta brgyad kyi tshu'i 'a ste bzhi bcu // / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bskal ba'i zhing bcu'i phreng po dang / khams dang skye mched kyi don la rol cing spong ba'i phyir/ zhabs kyi kyis
326b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad tho brdungs te/ hUM srin po rU tra bskal ba'i phur khams skye mched la// lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams te// mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha chen mgo bcad dur khrod brgyad du sprul// zhe sdang gdug pa'i tshogs brgyad gnas su bsgral

327a2(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gar dang brda yis mtshon nas spyan 'dren na// dam tshig gsang ba'i blo la gshegs su gsol// dpa' bo ting 'dzin stag gi chas mchog gis// dregs pa'i mgo bcad b+han+da gsang ba'i po// gnod gdug blon byed
327a3(rnying rgyud): bye'u'i chas mchog gis// rtog 'joms skrod pa brtul zhugs chen po'i bri// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje'i chas mchog gis// mi 'gyur g.yung ngung skyid rtags dpal gyi blo// dbang gi bse thab pazi dbang chos mchog gis// mas ga su dbang du dang
327a4(rnying rgyud): ta chags pa'i bro// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug srul nag chas mchog gis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag gsang ba yum gyi gro// dbang phyug dmar gsal mche ba'i chas mchog gis// lkug bsngal nad sel zug rngugacod pa'i bro// shu ke na smai dag yogaste dar gyi
327a5(rnying rgyud): chas mchog gis// dur khrod gnas spra ma mo mnyes pa'i bro// gcan gzan rgyal po gzig gi chas mchog gis// 'jal sbyor drag po las kyi tshar gcod bro// 'dul byed zhabs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// dza hU~M ba~M hoHspyan 'dren gsheg pu gsol/
327a6(rnying rgyud): khyab 'jug zil gyis mnan pa dang // gsang ba'i drung thal bar rlog pa'i phyir// phung po khams dang skye mched don la gshegs su gsol// rak+Sha rU dza ma hA tsit+ta dza dza/ ces drag tu bskor ro// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i

327b2(rnying rgyud): kele bsdams nas// thogs med las kyis dbang sdud a mo de// yan lag chen po gser gyi sa gzhi la// ljags kyu dmar pos 'khor ba'i nad khrag 'byin// A mo de ba 'drir gshegs oM kle sha/ yon tan ldan grub cir yang nul par
327b3(rnying rgyud): du 'od gsang ba'i ma mo chog 'gum// rdo rje zhags pas khams gsum tshig car bcings// lha mo glog 'gyu 'dir gshegs pA sha hUM// gsung gis thams ca dazil gyis gnon pa'i yum// rdo rje dra ba bka' yi sa gcod ma//

328a3(rnying rgyud): de ma thag tu g.yang gzhi la// ma mo 'khrug pa'i bro brdungs pas// hUM srin po rU dza bsgral ba'i phung po la// lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas// sha khrag dmangal dgyes pa'i ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gsang pa'i go bsrung gsang ba'i dkyil

329a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshags 'joms me dpung skra gre'i so// sha chen tshogs pha rol cing bzhugs su gsol// prA tsam b+ha sa ma ya b+haM/ zhes gsungs nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ khams gsum dbang sdud khrag gi rgya mtsho nas rnam par rtog pa mkhyen pas yum gze ldan parga can
329a5(rnying rgyud): dang / gsung gi slas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ che btsan 'gran gyi tha med gar kye dbang phyug ces bya ba la mchod paphral ba na/ dus gsum gyi sangs kyis mnyes par 'gyur ro// me lha'i rgyal po yang mnyes par 'gyur ro//

329a8(rnying rgyud): sa rnams// sangs rgyas phrin pas ya mtshan che// khro bo rdzogs mdzub ya mtshan che// bsal ba'i mechen ya mtshan che// zhes gsol pas/ gar gyi dbang phyug chen po yis// de bas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // phyi ma'i rnal 'byor rnams

329b2(rnying rgyud): da yang ba can dang rung can dang // ban thang can dang ngam can// dpa'i bum ldan par bya// bstan pa pa'i khri brtan nas kyang// mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes rab na// mchod cing bstan pa'i mas bya byed/ ting 'a ma pas kyi phyid dag/
329b3(rnying rgyud): de ras rdzas kyi mched pas mchod// ces gsungs pas/ rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang po mtshar du gyur nas kun tu bzang mo gzi ldan pad+ma can gyis mchod par yongs su rapa par bya ba'i phyir/ yang ka srin po la sogs pa'i 'dzang bskul
329b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhing badz+ra tsa tu blangs te/ rtse d+ha dpal be'u thugs kyi rang bzhin 'di/ chos nyid lta bu'i rang bzhin la// ye shos sgyu ma lta bur rol pa'i phyir// gar gyi dbang phyug sum dang bcas pa la// blan med pa 'ad mdzes mchod par 'dul// nas
329b5(rnying rgyud): bskyam mo// mtshan dang ngas pablangs te bral ba ni// yid bden rin chems bla char kye rgyun// phozang yid 'ad 'bar ba'i dur khrid no// byin ci log bu'i 'dams pa dbang phyug la// phrugasum che ba brjed pa'i rje sa mchog 'di// debam can 'as
329b6(rnying rgyud): bo'i sbal mchod pa 'bral// rnab mtshad par 'bral ba ni// gsung gi rang bzhin ma 'gagis so sor gsan// sna tshogs sgra ltar snang ba brjod du med// srong nyid stong la rol pas stong pa'i dbyings// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dngos dang dngos med pa'i// 6ra
329b7(rnying rgyud): yang thabs kyis 'dul la mchod pa 'bral// de la bsgral ma btab pa ni// klog 'bru'i sprul pas dgyes pa'i phyir// nyon mongs sdug bsngal chu da'i rgyun gcod dang // rdul phran dul gyi mo gos chags pa'i mchog/ bdag tsog las la dbang bsgyur sprul

330a3(rnying rgyud): long lta bur gsal cing dbyer med pa'i// yon tan ldan zab 'byung gnas chen po'i sra// gnyis med tog bral yid kyi mchod pa 'phrul// lba byed lce yi mchod pa 'thul ba ni/ sna tshogs ro ltar gzung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten bsreg
330a4(rnying rgyud): rdo'i ma prar te// d+had drag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gting spro ba// grwar dbang lu mchog rta yi rgyal po'i sra// dbang po rol sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul// sgom byed sna yi mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ gab pa sbas pa yum mchog gzi dang ldan// rje rgyal kun byer

330a6(rnying rgyud): 'bul pa na// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgyes te rmad// rdo rje sgeg mo phrin las rdzogs pa'i sgra// ye shes su 'chang sder mos log rtog 'joms// chags med yid kyis sbyor la rab brtson zhing // ma bkag cir yang sa ler mkhyen pa'i spyan// lo
330a7(rnying rgyud): rtog phyin ci log gi chu sbyong ba// bde chen dang la gnas pa'i dra ba can// khro ga d+hA ma gdug pa gzhan lha ma yin te// ma chags mi gnas dur khrod 'bar ba'i sku// bu h+ya gsang ba'i lha mo ut+pal mdog/ dug gsum ma spangs sku gsum lhan grub pa'i// khro
330a8(rnying rgyud): gtum nga rgyal sul mchod pa 'bul// rkang dang sra dang tshil dang sha/ pa su ta ye rdzas mchog ni// gcig tu bcas nas dbul bar bya// khro rgyal ba spu pho nya'i lung // khams gsum dbang srung khrag gi lan phran can/ dug gsum zil gnon mgyogs pa'i

331a2(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin 'bar ba'i sra// gser mdog sdug la mdzes pa'i cha lugs can// drag shul sprod pas dgyes par rol pa'i tshogs// zhing bcu gtan nas bskal phyir snyems pa'i mchog/ dmyal log tog 'joms pa 'dir gshegs pA sha taM// dang

335a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje che bas rmad du byung // 'di ni gsal ba thugs rje'i 'od// 'bar bas ye shes mun pa sel// 'od kyis dmyal ba'i nyes sngon kyang // rmad byung rin chen khri yi ldang // bag chags sbyangs pas rnam rtog kyir spangs pa'i// ye shes
335a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gser mdog bde chen ye shes phra men ma// nyig 'bum du 'char ba'i 'od// ye shes chen po brjegs la phyag 'tshal bstod// yi hAkra rnams kyi bkres sgoms 'joms// bde sa chen po thag nga //
335a4(rnying rgyud): men rngam thabs zhes kyang bya// mchen dbang phyug sing ha dzaM b+ha la// don dam gsang sbas che ba'i dpal ldan ma// gcig tu bde ba chen po thugs rje'i 'od zer can// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'od kyis de bsregs nas// thugs rje'i dkyil na
335a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i 'od ltar 'byung // srid gsum bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de la nyi ma bdun gyis rab bskor ba// srid gsum ma lus bsreg pa'i dbang dang ldan// sprin med gsal ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'gro// de steng pad+ma kha kA ldan pa las/
335a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rtse gcig pa tra'i snying por gnas// rnam dag pad+ma'i lte ba zlum po la// ye shes rgya mtsho'i klong du 'khyil ba ni// thig le chen po gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// rdo rje rtse gcig che bas de la bstod// ma chags pad+ma'i rang bzhin mnyes pa'i yum//
335a7(rnying rgyud): dga' ldan kun tu bzang la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di ni dri med pa d+ma'i lung // de dbus hUMlas byol sod phye gnas 'joms// bden gnyis thugs las rol pa'i nyi ma la// 'od zer 'bum gyis bskor ba sum chen mo// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od la phyag
335b1(rnying rgyud): smanag // ga pa rgyu chu stsun// ga ma pa dund// ga sa gnas sa/ sa /
335b2(rnying rgyud): kI la phyag 'tshal baspyod// 'dra'i lte bar gnas pa rdorje'i dkyil// tshulas 'di 'bros mi rnams pa gzigs snar// thugs jom rtsims stong ldan par grags// de ni sems yid pazhi gzhal las 'ang //
335b3(rnying rgyud): ka dang gdung // mi ri tha~Md rnon sbal nag la sogs brgyan// ta kr-ita rgyal po khro bo de na bzhugs// gdan khri drug ldan ye shes bzhi yi dang // khro chen khros pa'i mtshan nyid gdan du bting // ta kr-i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nod du
335b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i phyag rgyar gsal// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lung du grags// rdo rje lta bur mi g.yo 'dzin pa med// chos skra dag pa lta bu'i tshul du snang // mi mnyam mnyam pa'i lha mchog dam pa la// sems dpa' la sogs 'khor gyi da /
335b5(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i dbyings su sdang bas mngon pa med// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal phyag 'tshal ba spyod// zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa'i mu mngon nas// shangs nas khro ba hUM drug sa bton nas// rgyud drug gnas pa'i 'khor bcad bcad de// de nas rim bzhin gas
335b6(rnying rgyud): nas ma// mar byer pa TIg sang gas bya// zhis ni kun cagashegs pa'i dag// sbrulas gzhal las khang palta// ldan tha sangs rgya smra ba rdzogs// leb su mi gnyis maud kying bya mas// ngagag ba sdug su skyabapas// dam ga
335b7(rnying rgyud): mdog dam bgal pa'i mi ltar 'bar// rngam chen thugs kyi yul pa phyogs bcur gzigs// dngu lnga ljang ku rta gdang 'ad kyis brgyan// rigs rdzing bangs rgyas dbar ba'i dbul gdangs// sbrul nag stong gis rgyan du mdzos// thod pa tshang gsum badzin
336a1(rnying rgyud): bA dan// zhang zhugs stod la g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// rkyenang gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dung mnyam// gas ba'i lham rang drab sa// 'thab ma lus dbang du chud pa'i snyam// bca drug cag ba rkang/
336a2(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha bsnams// shar du gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang // rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang thod rlon khrag gis bkang // lho ru gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// rdoni lcags kyu rdzogs ma
336a3(rnying rgyud): gyud// thod pa zhal du slob dang khro brgyad snying 'dzin cing // nub tu gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// me yi zhags pa dang ni khrung gi khwa// sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i mtshon 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wA~M dag ni rab tu 'grol// byung
336a4(rnying rgyud): gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje rtse dgu dang ni rtse lnga dang // ce gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ zhe sdang gtsug pa'i dgra bgegs mang po 'dul// zhabs kyi chas brgyad khro bo brgyad du sbyor// dpa' bo la sogs ting 'dzin
336a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad dang ldan// 'khor ba'i me dpung dmar po la sogs ni// rang gi snying pos phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad thim// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong chen na// thugs rje chags pas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ye shes dpal gyi lha ste bdag nyid ma//
336a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis phyag rgya me dang sbrul bsnams te// spyan mig gnam lcags thog thog a la la// dpal chen zhal du stong cing mchod pa'i bdag/ me 'brug dmar po che la phyag 'tshal bstod// rlung 'brug sngon mo rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskyed// bden gnyis
336a7(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i yum chen mo// 'khor ba mi spong mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // thod rlon drag po'i shugs kyis 'gro ba ste// mi mnyam pa yi klu tshogs dbang du sdud// nam mkhar mnyam pa'i sku lus tshad mnga' ba// rlung 'brug sngon mo nyid la phyag 'tshal
336b1(rnying rgyud): s+ho// yang ba rgyab sbrul mang ba gnas pa yang // yang sprul bye ba 'bum dang bcas pa zla// phyogs bzhi nas ni rnam par 'khrug pa'o// shAr phyags lang ba rgyab thal ta// 'brug can sngon mchibs su bcibs// labar ba ma spangs mya ngan nga/
336b2(rnying rgyud): mig kyang med de cang mi smra// mdun dang rgyab med gcig gi dang // skye ba med pa'i dbyings su bstan// lo rab rgyab spel che la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs long ba rgyab spel ni// mar sngon dmar chibs su chibs// lce med dkyings nang tshong
336b3(rnying rgyud): bstan// 'od zer mthing ga 'phro ba yis// 'o dod drag po phyogs bcur 'bod// nub phyogs lor ba rgyab spel ni// 'brug chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// zag med shes rab pha rol phyin// slu ba mad pa'i tshe 'phrul ston// byang phyogs pa
336b4(rnying rgyud): sku bsgrubs pas// mtha' dbus med par khyab par gnas// shar phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// lus ni me mngon dbyings na bzhugs// yan lag med cing nyung dkar 'dra// 'od zer chen po phyogs bcung 'gyed// g.yo ba med par dbang du
336b5(rnying rgyud): bsdu// lho phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// mig ni ye nas med pa la// spyan ni me re sngon dmar can// zhabs kyang med la nyung dkar 'dra// khyod ni gdung rgyud dang po ste// lan 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// 'od zer chen po phyogs bcur 'gyed/
336b6(rnying rgyud): rlub phyogs dmus long 'a khor ba can// bdud rtsig khrag rlon pa ba// yan lag med cing dbang pa med// lus kyang ce su me mngon pa'i// chos kyi byangs su rol pa mdzad// rtsibagyi zhes dang zas te gnas// byang phyogs dbus yong 'khor ba
337a1(rnying rgyud): can// mgo yang med cing lag kyang med// rgan gyi sgra yis stong gsum bkang // dung gi tshul du gnas pa la// khrag gi mi la khrag sha za// mig dang rnab sgra yang med// 'od zer drag po phyogs bcur 'gyed//
337a2(rnying rgyud): rgya chen mo drug rnams ni// dkyil 'khor grwa yi phyogs su gnas// phyag rgya chen po las la g.yos// gnas pa byang chub sems la rtag gnas pa// 'dug dang smon lam dang ldan pas// 'gro don ma lus mdzad slad du// kham rgya chen lo drug gi lha/
337a3(rnying rgyud): shes dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni dbus nas dgye// ma lus dgra bgegs mche bas gcodadra// phyi rim lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad// dgra bo rnams la rbad par bya// de ltar phyag rgya rdzogs nas kyang // sru nyid 'khor la sbas te bzhu
337a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru sbas// de yang chos dbyings che ba'i rtags// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thod rgal 'jigs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o// / de na
337a5(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang mchog gis/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang pos// gar dbang che la zhu ba zhus// phyogs bcu 'jig rten zug gyur pa'i// chu klu
337a6(rnying rgyud): tsho ji snyed dang // me tog 'bras bu yal ga'i tshogs// snang dang mi snang la sogs dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di// klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul yin pa'i phyir// gru rgyal zil gyis gnon par mdzod// dbang phyug chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
337a7(rnying rgyud): sku// dug gsum dbang sdud sku gsum thugs su sbyor// nga rgyal khro gtum dbang gi rta mgo can// che la brjid pas che ba'i ye shes dang // rno la 'bigs pas thugs rje'i lcags kyu yis// mtha' yas dung skyong la sogs ku yi 'khor// dbang du bsdus
337b1(rnying rgyud): nas mang na ru bsgral ba dang // phyag mtshan tags su pa rnams la phrag 'tshal ma// deskad ces ni bskal nas kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsangs// khams gsam khrag tu dmigs pa'i sa gzhis// 'dod cagacadag cad zhag gi rgya mtshams
337b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal rigs yongs bskal dur khrod kyan du sprul// gti mug mtha' yas nu ga pra be shA/ drag lnga phung po bshig pa'i sa gzhi la// zhe sdang kyad dgatsod keng dus re rab 'khrugs// dmangs rigs yongs babral bung rgod brgyad du yul// gti mug zung kya
337b3(rnying rgyud): za be sha/ rgyud drug gcig char bskal ba'i skugazhil// nga rgyal rtsad gcod khrag gi me 'tshubs 'khrugs// rje rigs yongs bskal dur khrod brgyad du smras// gti mug 'jog po nA ga prA be sha/ sa gsum lun gyis phub po sa gzhi la// thugs
337b4(rnying rgyud): gyad gcod drung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrugs// rigs ngan bu tshogs dbang du b.lus nas kyang // dbang gi mthu bskyed dur khrod brgyad du sprul// gti mug ni ra~M gyisaM nA ga pra ba sha/ dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i sa gzhi la// las bdag phra men 'bum gyi pha rol
337b5(rnying rgyud): dbang chen lhun gyis grub pa'i lu la brgyan// dur khrod bdag po gsang ba'i rgyan du khrul// gti mug ma dros nA ga pra be sha/ tshogs chen 'dus par bkrus pa'i sa gzhi la// 'khor ba rgyan gcod zhe sdang mtshon cha 'khrugs// dargyal dregs pa klu dbang
337b6(rnying rgyud): yongs bskal nas// g.yung gzhi 'brar bas sa gsum zil gyis gnon// gti mug sog ma med kyang nag pra ba sha/ gtum chen rol pas dgyes pa 'i sa gzhi la// mchen dbang phyug gad kyangs sde chen 'khrugs// phyag rgya rtags kyis mu dbang yongs
337b7(rnying rgyud): bskal te// dur khrod bdag po// gsang ba'i kun du sbal// gti mug gzi chen nA ga pra be sha/ khro bo'i gshig tu gtams pa'i sa gzhil// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bskal ba'i phyag rgya lakhrugs// cho 'phrul chen pos bdud kyi dpung bzhig ste// dbang chen yum dang
338a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ bcas pa rgyan du hrul// gti mug rigs lan mug za ba sha/ phra men skar lhung la thugs pa'i sa gzhil// klog stong 'bar ba'i phrin las ldan pa 'khrugs// gnang ma sbyar 'bar ba'i 'brug sa pas// zla legras rgyang
338a2(rnying rgyud): po 'khor los gtubs// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por sprul// gti mug parba Na yang nA ga pra be sha/ phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi la// bka' nyan mgyogs ma stong gi pho nya 'khrugs// bung khrod brgyad kyi rgyan du sprul// gti mug kar ko
338a3(rnying rgyud): pra be sha/ dbang du bsdus pa'i sa gzhi la// gang chen bco brgyad rol pa'i phyag rgya 'khrugs// tshangs pa stobs kyi klu dbang yongs bskal nas// phyag rgya 'jigs shing rngam pa'i se ral kha// gti mug nor bu 'dron pa pra bo sha/ zhing chen gcal
338a4(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i sa gzhi la// pha men go lu ri 'dus pa'i sgra skad 'khrugs// kha dog sna tshogs cer yang snang ba'i bu// zag shul ku rgyal rngam pa'i shugs kyis bskul// gsang ba'i yum chen sprul pa'i rgyan du phul// gti mug bstan sdug kyang pra be sha/
338a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po bsnol ba'i sa gzhi la// ra ro khrag 'thung mtshan las la 'khrugs// mya la mgyogs pa'i thabs kyis klu dbang bskal// dur khrod rgyal po dbang gi thugs dam bskul// gti mug stobs bzang nag pra be sha/ zla gam skar ltar 'khrugs
338a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor la// ci bgyis bka' sdod mang po'i tshogs ni 'khrugs// kha dog sna tshogs cir yang sprul pa'i sku// klu chen yongs pa phrul gsang ba'i rgyan du bklubs// gti mug zla ba can yang pra be sha/ khro bo ya mAn tA ka'i thugs ka nas/
338a7(rnying rgyud): 'dul spong las kyi pho nya ma ngag gzhug gzhan yang 'azugs// ha ha rngam pa'i phyag rgyas chu brgyad 'dul// bstim pa'i stobs kyi gad mor g.yab mos 'debs// gti mug dung skyong nA ga pra be sha/ bruM dang phaT kyis gsang ba'i thugs dam bakhrul//
338b1(rnying rgyud): phyag mtshan phyag na klu chen 'bum bsnams pa// gsang ba'i g.yung drung rgyal sa rtag tu 'dzin// nA ga oM nA ga hUM/ de gnas gsang ba'i mchod 'bul ba// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni 'dis 'bul lo// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ e ka ta/ ma hA su kha hUM/
338b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya ho// nA ga pra be shra dza/ rdzu 'phrul dbrog dang phyag rgya dang // drag po'i phrin las nyi tshe ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ la la 'dod chags kyis 'gro ba sgrol/ la la zhe sdang gi gdug sems las 'gro byed/ la lan rgyal gyi
338b3(rnying rgyud): dbang gis che bar bsnyems shing 'gro ba'i rgyud skyong / la la gti mug dbang gis ngo bo nyid kyi rgyud bsreb/ la la phrag dog dbang gis nga dang bdag tu bzung nas lus sems la nyon mongs lnga smin par byed cing / gdug pa'i shas dang ma dral ba las/
338b4(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab par gnas pa la/ dbang chen gyis gdug pa can du ma gcig tu dbang du bsdus nas/ nyon mongs pa lnga'i bag chags gdar sha bcad nas/ mgrin sngon la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang gser bzhus pa'i kha
338b5(rnying rgyud): dog lta bur gyur te/ yum gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi thugs gsang ba'i b+ha ga la bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ glog stong 'bar ba'i phrin las chen por 'khrugs// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i 'brug sgra yis// bram ze bu yi rgyal po 'khor los gtungs/
338b6(rnying rgyud): dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por 'khrugs// de rings ru khru yi rdzu 'phrul ming yang med// rigs rnams so so'i gnas rnams bsrungs shing bzhugs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skul rin po che'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i bar bar nas/ gser gyi me stag ni me chen 'dum
338b7(rnying rgyud): du 'phro zhing / lha mo klog 'brums skul pa btang ba las/ klu mgrin sngon gyi lus la phogs pas lus tshig go// sems la bogs pas dran pa brlag go// ngag la phogs pas smra ba'i dbang po dang bral/ yan lag nying lag la thogs pas zha bo grum por gyur te/ bye tshan dang khyung gi jigs
339a1(rnying rgyud): zhas dal byar// debs na gyi ma'i dus byin pa 'gyur bas/ dang sa gru bathub par 'dad na/ shA'i bu 'jal du zag par nas// ldan gyis zab pa' dmyal la' dus gnas su byu/ dasumam nan bur gzhas yang dang/
339a2(rnying rgyud): sbrul nag kun gyi khe nas kyang dngos grub kyi char 'bab ste/ la pha'i kha nas me tog ut+pal la/ la la'i kha nas pad+ma dmar po/ la la'i kha nas u dum bA ra'i chang du 'bab ste/ yid bzhin nor bu'i gtun khung du 'khyil pas/ phrad pa'i rgyas su rtsu
339a3(rnying rgyud): mngon par shes pa drug gi dbang thob par gyur to// za ma tog char du babs pas su'i dbyings su 'khyil te/ thugs kyi gnas su thim pas/ mkhyen raba'ang ma dpal gyi dngos su 'arjod par gyur te// ut+pal rnon po chang du mdzu pas/
339a4(rnying rgyud): ge gnas su thim ste/ phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par gyur to// pad+ma dmar po'i char du phab pas/ zhabs kyi g.yas su 'khyil te/ rkang gi sbubs su thim pas/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i sgo nas dngos su bzob ste/ lus mi snang bar sbeng
339a5(rnying rgyud): cing // thogs pa med par rgyag rus par gyur/ u dum bA ra char bzhin du babs pas/ snum gyi mkha' gasdang la 'khyil te/ b+ha ga'i dbyings su thi ma he/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dngos grub dang dbang thob ste/ sprul pa mang po'i rdzing nus
339a6(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// zhes gsungs pas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa thams cad rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yang ched du brjod do/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang zhus te mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ klu rgyal chu 'phrul gyi la
339a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi ba cubargyad pa'o// / de nas pang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug des/ thams cad kyang ngan las 'das bzhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin la rnams par zhugs nas/ rnam pa'i 'khor thams cad la 'dig da ces gsungasas// khams gsu
339b1(rnying rgyud): dbang du spyad pa'i gzhal yas khang // nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam cho 'phrul cir ston pa// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum g+hi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// 'gyur mad 'jigs spangs seng ge'i khri gcal ni// dbang phyug ma ga
339b2(rnying rgyud): bkrus cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // kye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri rkang bzhir snang bas// rigs bzhi'i khrag 'brung tshe 'phrul cir ston kyang // lce med byeng zab sems
339b3(rnying rgyud): las mA g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// pad+ma le brgan kha dog 'bar ba la// kun tu bzang mo'i cho 'phrul cing ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das/
339b4(rnying rgyud): sku nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yang // thabs dang shes rab cho 'phrul cir snang yang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rang sems yi ge drug byin rlabs las// ye shes sems dang
339b5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul cir snang yang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// yi ge hUM drug cho 'phrul chen po las// gar dbang lha yi cho 'phrul cing snang yang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang
339b6(rnying rgyud): ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// brjid pa'i dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor cir ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// srin po 'dul byed
339b7(rnying rgyud): mgo ljang gu ni// rdzu 'phrul myar mgyogs cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // phye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// gas bzugs kyi dpal be'u sbom bu nas// ye shes sems dpa'i cho 'phrul cir ston kyang //
340a1(rnying rgyud): 6// bya med tha bachubasams las ma g.yos byang// gas ba sngal gyi drugar mya ngan 'das// rdzu 'phral chen pa gshog pa'i gzhal yas nas// khams gsum nam rgyal tsham lus car ston kyang // bya ma dbyung thab sams las mag ya kyang // gsang ba sum gyi ga ba
340a2(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das// gnod mdzes zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las// 'jigs byed khro ba'i tshong tshu la cir snang yang // lce med kyang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// sku yi sbyin cha dpal gyi cha lugs dang // thugs kyi gsang yum dur 'dzi
340a3(rnying rgyud): ba 'i// bka' sno ma nya'i tshogs su bstan pa bzang // gdung bya'i bo 'brub pa so nga dang yang // hUM m-i kyang chub sems pas ma gsos mye// gsang ba sum gyi rtag myangan pa sa// da rjegs sanas/ miganas pa ldan gyis zung ba na// spyo
340a4(rnying rgyud): cad kyi nul po dbang khrus bumachog rol pa'i tanA pas/ gsang ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa// de'i tshe 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpas gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btas pa/ lcang na las 'das pa ci'i phyir/ gsar bar gyu
340a5(rnying rgyud): paci'i phyir// zab mo don du gyur pa rnams// bdag cag rnams pa bshad da gsol// nas nus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' nyon// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// nye lam byang chub bstan pa phyi/
340a6(rnying rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan pa// de yang gsang bar shes par bya// nye la ma zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen rgyal po'i grwa rdzogs pa// gdan lnga rim gyis rdzogs pa dang // tshogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// gzhul las gdang
340a7(rnying rgyud): 'chos kyi dbyings// nam mkha' lta bus khyab pa dang // zang mo'i don du shes par byos// de dbus gar gyi dbang phyug dang // gnyis su med pa gzizhan ma// zab mo zhes kyang de la brjog// dra ba can la sogs pa bzhi// gsang ba'i yum bzhi yin pas na/
340b1(rnying rgyud): zang mo zhes ni rgyal bas gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen po yin pa'i phyir// sgo srung zla za mgo dgu brtsegs// theg chen dgu yi rim pa bzhin// de nyid gas bar shes par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yang // rgyal pa 'ang dang ldan pa
340b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// phyi rol long ba rgya ba spel yang // chos sgra gcig pas tha dad min// de ster dmus long 'khor ba rnams// mi 'gyur dbyings las mya ngan 'das// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan 'das// de phyir dmus long 'khor ba can// de ci 'am
340b3(rnying rgyud): chen mo bcu drug gi// gzi ldan sprul par grags pas na// lung dkar tshul bzhin zlum por bzhugs// 'khor ba dbyings su bzlum pa'i phyir// de phyir lcang mo brgyad po yang // zhabs kyi sprul pa yin pas na// pho nya bzang zhing mngags
340b4(rnying rgyud): par mgyogs// de yang chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// zab mo'i don du shes par bya// khyi brgyad dgye zhing mngag pa yang // gsang ba'i sprul pa yin pa'i phyir// phra men sprul par shes par bya// sprul pa mi 'brug dmang po rnams// yab
340b5(rnying rgyud): yum 'dra 'bral med pa yi// sprul pa yin par bstan pa yang // yad na srid pa'i rgyal mor dmigs// rtsab dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa yin// phung po lnga nyid gzhal yas khang // tsi d+ha dpal be'u sems kyi rten// dbang chen yang yum phyag rgya
340b6(rnying rgyud): gsal// ma bzhi bu brgyad dbyings rgyug ma// de yang mtshan ma smos dang bral// nam shes brgyad po gnas su dag/ yang brgya ba spel yaM nas dag/ shes pa yul brgyad gnas su dag/ dkyus long 'khor bar yenas gnas// zhabs kyi
340b7(rnying rgyud): chas brgyad gnas su dag/ lcags kyi skyong mor le nas gnas// khyi brgyad sbyang ma brgyad dang bcas// zhabs kyi sprul par rab tu grags// de rnams rtsa bar bsdus pa'i phyir// zab mo'i bsgrub pa shes par bya// dbyings su yenas bsrung ba'i phyi//
341a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbyings la zhugs pa la// rtag cu gzi ldan thugs kar sbas// zab mo zhes kyang de la bsngags// long brgyab sgrol ya shrIs la dzar// mgo dgu brtsegs pa yan chad kun// mkhor na mos kyi tshangasasu
341a2(rnying rgyud): dmigs// gtso bo yab yum ye shes te// ye shes dbyings las sbyor ba'i phyir// rtogs pa chen por rab rtogs na// zab mo zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma'i do po bshig pa dang // par
341a3(rnying rgyud): gzhom pa'i phyir// pho nya rnams su bshad par bya// bdag nyid chen po rang rdzogs te// rtsa ba med pa'i dbyings gcig na// pho nya zhes kyang de la bya// bya dang byed pa mi dmigs shing // 'phro 'bu la sogs mi rtsol na// 'gyed pa zhes kyang de la rtsa
341a4(rnying rgyud): po nya'i don drug bshad pa ni// rgyu dang rngam dang ye shes dang // srub dang sprul pa'i yig 'bru'o// yang na pho nya gsum du bshad// don dang las dang rig la sogs// pho nya rnams ni dbye bar bya// zhes bshad do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mtsho
341a5(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i tad+ha las/ nye lam byang chub sems kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das pa d+ma gar dbang gis/ phyogs bcu dus drug gi 'jig rten thams cad gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlab pa dang / gyi rabs kyi rnal
341a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa'i bar chod du gyur pa bskal ba'i zhing bcu zhe gcad pa'i phyir/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon// dben nam rang gi gnas khang du// rang gi dri chen maN+Dal bya// rang gi gur gum chag chag gdab// spos dang
341a7(rnying rgyud): du ru a ka ru// l-i shi dang ni ga pur dang // rje te phal mchog tu bsngags// me tog phreng bas kun tu brgyan// de lta bu yi gnas mchog tu// gzhan zhig nges par bsgral na ni// rdo rje srin po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// rashA'i mig gis blta bar bya/
341b1(rnying rgyud): kha nas sngags kyi tshig zlos shing // pha rol rnam shes hUM gis drangs// snying gar mngon sum dmigs byas na// pha rol mngon sum 'chi bar 'gyur// mgo dang snying dang rkang lag rnams// ya mAn ta ka'i 'khor la dbul// gzhan yang lhag ma ci yod pa//
341b2(rnying rgyud): he ru ka la yon du 'bul// gnas lung 'phrul gyi dgongs pa'o// de lta bu yi dus dag hUM// lag cha phur pa mchog yin te// zhi ba'i sor bdun zlum por bya// rgyas pa'i sor brgyad zur yang brgyad// dbang la bla gam nges par bzang // drag po'i sor
341b3(rnying rgyud): zur gsum po// kun gyi rtse mor hU~M bzhag ste// ngos su ha ha ru lu bsgom// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// sems kyi phur pa rang byung ba// 'du byed lag gis bral bas thebs// de bas pho nya ma ngag par bya// pho ny+dza 'od zer dud khang gro// wu dang @
341b4(rnying rgyud): sgo grogs shing // bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa'i rlung dang mtshungs// shar gyi phyogs nas mngag po ni// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus nag po la 'od phung gnag/ ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyar na
341b5(rnying rgyud): lag nag po// mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyed du med// 'di dag dpal gyi pho nya ste// zhums pa med cing stobs chen 'joms// g.yas pa gsum ni sta re 'phyar// g.yon pa gsum ni lcags kyu 'dzin// yan lag sbrul nag mchog gis brgyan//
341b6(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi lcags kyus snying nas 'dren// g.yas kyi lha res nges par 'joms// 'di ni sgo srung mchog yin te// pho nya'i rgyud du mngag par bya// bgegs rnams nges par phung bar byed// rkang gcig de yi pho ha ni// kha dog 'brar ba ci 'dran//
341b7(rnying rgyud): gcig la gcig ni rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa spele te 'gro// mig kyang med de cang mi lba// long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// rta babs kun gyi sgor bsgoms te// lan 'ga' dag tu ma dang / pa'i tshe// gnyis ka sor nas der byin nas// gang
342a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa len par byed// sus kyang bzlog par mi byed do// lto yi phyogs nas dgye ba na// mgo brgyad po la lag brgyad pa// rkang pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad// g.yas pa bzhin rnga 'dzin// ga
342a2(rnying rgyud): bu 'dzin// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gang la dmigs pa len par byed// gshin rje'i gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang brgyad de yi pho nya ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra spogs shing // bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs
342a3(rnying rgyud): rlung dang mtshungs// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gang la dmigs pa len par byed// nub kyi phyogs nas dgye ba ni// mgo drug lag drug rkang drug po// g.yas pa gsum ni phu rapa 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma gtong // mgyogs pa tu
342a4(rnying rgyud): gis bskyed du med// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya yin// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // rang gi rlung phyogs sor ba'i tshe// khro bo kun kyang ngas par 'chi// rkang drug de yi pho nya ni// lcags kyi spyang mo rkang gsum ma// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe//
342a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs la rdog pas brdeg cing 'gro// rang gi rkang pa phur pa yin// lcags kyi phur pa rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud pas reg pas ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jigs byed na// gzugs can dgra bor smos ci dgos/ byang gi phyogs nas dgye ba
342a6(rnying rgyud): mgo gsum lag drug rkang gsum po// lag pa zug ni rgyud drug gcod// mAM sa za zhing bdud rnams sgrol// gnod sbyin gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang gsum de yi pho nya ni// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa mo// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa//
342a7(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ sru ni lcags kyu spel ba bzhin// bang ni glog gis bsud du med// skad ni gnam gyi 'brug pas che// rab tu mi snyan 'di dag ni/ phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ rkang gcig gyen du bsgreng pa ni// ya bdud chen po'i
342b1(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing na dang / sadag nam can dmyal zag gcod// rkang badrug thar du ltung bas na// ma bdudadu can pa'i ster nas 'dzig// dmyal chags ma dpung cad nasu 'bras// rkang gcigazung bar snang ba yis// dgras ma lus kyi nas 'dzan// 'byung mang /
342b2(rnying rgyud): dmyal thag gcod// pra ni lugs thag sril ma 'dra// tshems ni spu gri gshibs pa 'dra// mAM sa za zhing ri krung rgyag/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi skal ba gcod// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// 'jig rten khams kun za ba mo// gnod sbyin byin gyi steng na
342b3(rnying rgyud): rgyug/ blo snying nang khrol 'byin cang za// bar snang khams su khros pa'i tshe/ nyi zla kun kyang thang la rlog/ gza' skar kun kyang dum bur gcod// shin tu 'khrugs nas bayul ba'i tshe// bdud kyi snying khrag dron mo 'thung // bar snang khams
342b4(rnying rgyud): gaM na pa byed kun// rdul che tsam yang med par mdzod// na mo btsa ra b+he/ ha ha ru lu hu~M/ ku ku ra tsa kha lang khA ti zhes zad cing brjod do// rgyung thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rgya mchog rol pa'i hrat+kA las/ gnas bstan pa dang phur bu
342b5(rnying rgyud): pa bstan pa dang / sgo bzhi'i pho nya ma ngag pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar po tsit+ta dbyung ba'i phyir// 'di skad gsungs so// gang la bya ba'i sems can de// spyi bo dzaHlas lcags kyi
342b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings las ye shes 'jug tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// hom lnga spel ba'i gzhal yas kyang // ri las 'od kyi 'phro 'du 'byung // dzaHyi lcags kyus drangs pa yang // rdo la lcags ni 'ju tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya/
342b7(rnying rgyud): snying gar yi ge 'od 'phros 'dus// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zur drag pa// 'khor los rab tu gcod tshul dang // pha rol snying rtsa gcod pa'i phyir// du mar brjod ci dang bar bya// bdag nyid gar dbang chen po yis// bden cing sgrol ba'i pho nya ni// gang sa
343a1(rnying rgyud): drang ba' zhing bcu 'i// lus dag yad la rbad par bya// tsam thag rol pa'i shangs las kyang // rmang gi me la spang gA'i gdang // mchebs bdud kyi steng rtsagacang// nang zlab ste lung la khrang nas// nam tu ma
343a2(rnying rgyud): sbrang bu'i gdong // kha rlangs sprin gyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'od kyi mi la 'anga' tshon gdong // ral pa khrag gi zar bu las// khrag gi mi la gyang ku'i gdong // span mig gru gsum 'bar ba las// thas kyi me le dang // 'al pon pa
343a3(rnying rgyud): zung / gras dri dun dun rbad/ de las bang chen btang ba ni// 'dren cang sgrol ba pho nyan// gshog pa rdo rje gdengs pa sa// pho nya yeng mthogs chung bas sbyar// lcags kyi sA la kha gshog can// phyag rdzabacwa drug bar ba las// sngags
343a4(rnying rgyud): gyi spyang ma brgyad yul ba// ljags gshog khrung gi 'dab mnan// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// lal byan lag mgo la// lus ni sngags kyi sbrang mor sbrul// pa la khung gi mgo sa ma// sras ni zangs kyi phra bar sbal// lal khwa
343a5(rnying rgyud): mgo ba la// lus ne dril nag rkang gsum po// lal khwa yi mgo bo la// lus ni sdig pa rkang gcig par// yal kun yag mgo bo la// lus ni dung gi sbrang mor sbrul// lal chu bu'i mgo bo la// sras ni bcwa drag zang mar spel// phal bzhad
343a6(rnying rgyud): bgo ba la// lus ni byu ru'i seng ker skul// la la kang ka re mgo bo la// lus ni ljags rdol rkang gsum pa'o// yal 'ug pa'i mgo bo la// sus ne dung phag dkar mor sbal// la la pu shud mag pa la// lus ni lcags kyi sdig par sprul/
343a7(rnying rgyud): la la mthing ril mag bal// lus ni dz+wal nag gang gsum po// la la sbyin gyi mgo ba la// lus ni bri la rtsal po che// la la bya rgod mgo bo la// lus ni gser stag ser por sbal// gang la bya ba'i sems can dang // rgyad drug mkho ba'i sems can
343b1(rnying rgyud): nams// dmyal khams bcu drug kha brims te// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'di la byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // dmar po 'byin pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dus las ma g.yel phrin las mdzod// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAn tsi t+ta radz+ra Nan//
343b2(rnying rgyud): oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ de bas phyi ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// gcod dang sbyin sngags 'bum du bzlas// las grub pa la the tshom med// ce si gsungs so//
343b3(rnying rgyud): rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rtsi mchog rol pa'i tan+da las/ tsid+ha dmar 'byin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bang chen btang ba ni// yang gcig cho 'phrul mdzad pa las// 'byung po dgra bgegs 'dral ba'i phyer/
343b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i las dag zad par bya// gzhug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// dpal mchog drag shul stag gi chas// kho bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las byung ba'i pho nya ni// lhag mgo dmar po dbu lngam ltar 'bar// sna
343b5(rnying rgyud): lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu me bzad de// shar phyogs khyab par rgyag cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dri za dbang spus gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// gnod gdug zlob
343b6(rnying rgyud): rgya bye'u lcags kyi zhus// khro bo ya ba yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// lcags mgo sngon po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// lhags lag khra po zhe sdang glog stong 'khrug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de/

344a1(rnying rgyud): skal pan ba nyan// darje mar bdas la bskang da // ngarnga na gang lag pa thog ga/ dngag cag sastsags pa gan sa bang+gAdag// ma phyogs zab par nas cang dang la thub gnam/ gan tung dbangasas da

344a3(rnying rgyud): 'bur// sbub lag phra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khrug/ zang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu me bzang de// sto nag khyab par byug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// srin po dbang pus gdon bgegs thal bar rdzogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od rjeng 'as pa ni//

344a7(rnying rgyud): gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas na// Ta ke na smad g.yogs rba ris dar gyi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byen rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nyin// dar mgo dmar po 'bu lnga me ltar 'bar// daralag khra bo zhe sdang srog stong 'dra/

344b3(rnying rgyud): par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan sa// dbang ldan dbang sngas gdon bgegs thal bar rdzogs// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dadregs pa'i dpung 'joms ma// za byed mche bas bdud kyi dpung yang 'joms// nga rgyal bsnyems pas pha rol zil gris
344b4(rnying rgyud): gnon// drag bcom 'brug zlas sred pa'i thong chus 'joms// rbA rban ma spen pa dbang du bzlas// hUM dang paT gyis sring gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ phrin las bcam thabs yin pa'i phyir// mam bgyis pas ma tho bsngal// dkyis

344b6(rnying rgyud): dpal kyi dran las thas labab// durgad ces gsungs su// byung thams cad kyi sbrel pa dbang sgyus tsam chag rnas pa'i na pas// gle ga nas kyi ny+tsa pa dgas pa'i len la brta gsum par/ gang dpe chen na na
344b7(rnying rgyud): de nas pang can btang bran// yang gcig sprul pa'i yod de// dkris nas sprul pa'i las bdag mo// Tam cag ral pa'i khrel bzhugs// gsu ya sbub sa das 'brab gyis// ba rnangs par snang mar du 'bebs// khrag 'thung na me dbu lnga la /
345a1(rnying rgyud): dung gi ser phreng lnga lnga 'dril// rgyud lngar gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// 'bar ba'i zhal du bsdus nas kyang // bskal pa bye ba grangs pa yi// sdug bsngal zug rngu spyad du gsol// dbang po rdul du rnyog tu gsol// du da

345a4(rnying rgyud): mo la// rlung gi 'tshubs ma 'bum yang 'khyil// rlung 'brug sngon mo'i khri la bzhugs// rlung gi g.yang gzhi lus la gyon// kha nas rlung gi bskal pa gtong // yang sbrul lcags kyi spyang mo 'bum// kha nas ro yi khog stod bshal// dri
345a5(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs kun// thal ba bzhin du brlag par mdzod// bskal pa me yi mi mo la// ye shes dbu lnga'i 'od zer 'gro// zhal gyi hom las rgyud lnga sgrol// me yi bskal pas khams gsum sreg/ me zug dmar mo chibs su bcibs//
345a6(rnying rgyud): me sbrul dmar mo'i sked chings can// mu men phra chas si li li// na bzang sbrul gyi g.yang gzhi gsol// 'o dod 'bod cing g.yab nag 'dor// me yi ral pa dmar po la// gza' chen mig dmar tshom bur gsal// zhal nas hUM gi zla bsgrags
345a7(rnying rgyud): pas/ dug dang me yi phyugs pa 'byin// mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra// phyi skar 'bum gyi tshom bur bcas// sngags pas gdung nas bos pa'i tshe// mchi ma khrag gi bu char 'bebs// rol gnas pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// thal ba bzhin du
345b1(rnying rgyud): brlag par mdzad// rdo rje phra man gtum mo yum// phul nag stong gis lus brgyad cing // dkar khras ser pa mdzad pas rgyal rags dbang du sbas// dmar khas dpung rgyan mdzad pas tham ze dbang du lud// sar zas phyag gdub mdzad pa
345b2(rnying rgyud): rigs dbang du sprad// sbrul na ga zhabs gdub mdzad pas gtsug pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ lus la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// thal ba bzhin du brlag par mdzod// sprul pa'i phreM nya phra mo ni// zhe sdang khrag gi lan phran can// skad ni rung skad klog pas/
345b3(rnying rgyud): rdungs smin de mar klog sbyor 'bya// shangs nas dung bul ga yab mo 'dor// rkang lag sder mo smar pa las// sgra ra lcags kyi tshe tsha 'khrugs// dgra pa bde ga tsong dgra snyid 'byir// dur khrod srung mos las mdzod cig/ rims bye 'i bar
345b4(rnying rgyud): gshog pa pas// g.yas pa rdo rje'i gshog pa laM// nag mo sbrul 'dab chen mo sbal// pheM pi ral pas sto gsum khebs// mi theg spang mo ro khyer bas// dza dza'i mig 'bras zer pa gyur// dgra shesas ma lus rdul du rtogs/
345b5(rnying rgyud): khyod skar chos las mdzod cig/ g.yon pa rin chen gshog pa la// rdo rje rlung 'dag chen mor sprul// rlung gi ba dan rje dgu 'phyar// bskal pa'i 'chubasems srid pag yo// ba dan spe la me 'bar bas// daphung po'i kha so se zur rdzogs/
345b6(rnying rgyud): ye thugs las sbal pa ni// ljags kyi srung mo mgo dgul// kha nas ro bshal dgra dgegs 'dul// lcags kyi mchi bzang lag la// rdo rje dar skong gser phran 'dril// bdud kyi dpung la sa ma ya// rdeg shul lhag las skul pa \u0f7f/
345b7(rnying rgyud): phra man stag gi mag bo // zhing gi ga yang gzhi lus la gyon// mche ba rdo rje rtse gsum la// gnam lpags thog gi skar mda' 'ben// drung khrod sbyang mos las mdzod cig/ lcags kyi sbrang mo mgo dbul// sa pa ru gi mtshab can/
346a1(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa lag na thogs// kha mig sgra yi thAg nas// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho la khrugs// dus la bab po sa ma pa// drar khrod sbyang mas las mdzad ga/ shal gyi sbyang ma ga dang brgyal// dang rtse ldang ma
346a2(rnying rgyud): can// lan 'ga' drag tu zad pa dang // dbang gi sngags pas bskul ba'i tshe// me lha'i gnas su gnas bcas te// gshin rje'i khams kun rdul du rdzogs// rdo rje d+he lnga'i 'phro 'du las// lcags kyi mau la sbyar ku'i gdong // kha nas ro bA sha stong
346a3(rnying rgyud): gsum khyab// mgyogs pa rlung gis bskyed du med// mche bzangs kyi kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje'i zil gyis gnan par mdzod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dur khrod sbyang mos las mdzod cig/ bse yi phung mo gdong brgyad ma// chu srin 'bum gyi gdengs
346a4(rnying rgyud): ka can// g.yu 'brug khros pa'i gdan la bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su gcig mi gtong // klu yi rigs la dbang bsgyur zhing // lus la mdzes pa'i le'u gsol// lag na lcags kyi tsha tsha 'khrugs// kha nas khro hu khol ma 'dzag/ khro bu'i za rlabs
346a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs pa las// lcags kyi mi mo dgu khri 'byung // kha nas ro bshal ri lung g.yengs// dur khrod bdag po ma traM 'joms// srin po 'khor bcas dbang du ldud// dur khrod sbyang mos las mdzod cig/ sbal gyi me mo brgyad zil// gtum chen
346a6(rnying rgyud): dom gyi mgo can zhon// lag na sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs// 'gal byed ma lus 'ching zhing rngom// rab tu khros pa'i thugs ka nas// zangs kyi spyad mo wa mgo can// kha nas ro bshal ri lung 'phyag/ mgyogs pa'i tshad ni rlung dang 'dra// ngal ba med
346a7(rnying rgyud): par las la brtson// gtsang ma mo rigs drug lha rnams dbang du sdud// dur khrod sbyang mos las mdzod sa ma ya// lus ni cir yang mi mngon te// chos kyi dbyings la rol pa mdzad// grul pa skyang mo brgyad khri 'gyed// kha nas ro bshal rar zlogs// 'bar ba'i
346b1(rnying rgyud): khArl-i khrus 'debs ma// stang gsum gang ma'i rje'u chung brdung // dbu stod ngal pa si lI li// rdorje 'brug gi spyang mo grol// de la zas kyi skal phobra la// srid pa'i lha bran zas suza// nam mkha'i chub sgom du 'thung // phrin las chen po'i dus la bab// dur khrod kyang /
346b2(rnying rgyud): mos las mdzod cig/ shel gyi skyang mo gdong brgyam// lag na chu srin 'khor mo thogs// sbyin mig g.yas kyi dkyil 'khor nas// gdung ba'i mchi ma khrag tu 'jog/ dam las 'das pa'i snying zan ma// dam la gnas pa'i tshe 'dzin na// yar sprul ga su
346b3(rnying rgyud): mo la// mche bzang yag gtams pa la// b+hu ru'i spyang mo dgu 'bum 'gro// kha nas ro bshal za zhing stod// ma thob bar du dud mos 'debs// sngags pas lan 'ga' zad pa dang // 'khor ba'i sa nas zhu bzlog med par 'gro// gso blag med par dmyal zar/
346b4(rnying rgyud): gcod// dur khrod srung mos las mdzod cig/ me za khrag 'brang sbyang mo la// rba rlabs mdzes par skabs bskor// ral pa khaman ga 'jigs pa la// gdug pa'i 'od zer 'bum 'bum 'gro// rag srin po sgrol la brtson// khros pas bsul nas mngag pa'i tshe// shang
346b5(rnying rgyud): kyi rlung sgom g.yas g.yon nas// pha wang lus la spyang mo'i gdong// kha nas ro bshal cho nges 'debs// khams gsum khrag tu dmigs te rol// skyang mo ro bo shal dus la bab// drag po las kyi pho nya mo// seng ge gtams pa'i rngams khri la// mi mo seng ge'i gzugs can zhon// /
346b6(rnying rgyud): waM yang seng ge'i lan phran can// ral pa nyag ma re re la// gza' chen skragacan chad du 'bebs// seng ge'i kha nas ro shal bas// srid pa las kyi dgra bgegs 'dul// ma lus dbang du sdud la brtson// phrin las dus la bab pa'i tshe// zas su snying gi phyed tshal la// skom du glo ba'i khrag
346b7(rnying rgyud): mtsho 'phung // mi sha za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// dus la bab po sa ma ya// rin chen 'bar ba'i me mo la// chu dri gtams pa'i mgo bo can// khros nas gnyen pos rbad pa na// gzha' tshon lnga lnga'i spyang mo la// za ba'i phyir yang sbyar mo la// kha nas ro bshal 'dur lam can// dus
347a1(rnying rgyud): labab pos ma ya// dus gnyis las kyi ba nyam// sngags pas lan gcig zad pa ma// ljags kyi srung mam bupa// mcha ba rabashal stobs can 'joms// lag pa gan skar kyog por 'du ga// dus pa bab pas ma ya// lcags kyi ca
347a2(rnying rgyud): mo la// gdan wi pad+ma'i cho 'phrul ni// chu srin dmar po'i mche ba can// mche ba gtsig pa'i bar bar nas// dung gi skyang mo mgo gsum spur // spyan gsum dur khrod brgyad la gzigs// sdang mig zhel gnon pa'i tshe// bdud kyi bshan pa gdug pa'i tshogs// Sha nas
347a3(rnying rgyud): ro khyer dur khrod 'joms// keng dus dkar po zas su za// raH dmar po skom du 'thung // thal ba'i mtshan mas lus la brgyan// ngol khrag gis byug nas kyang // spyang mo'i ngur skad zengs gsum gyis// dgra bo ma lus rdul phran bzhin// dbang ched gar gyi zhabs
347a4(rnying rgyud): drung du// las la bab po srung mo'i tshogs// shra na mu kha kha long kha/ kha long kha/ ha na han/ phye ma phye ma/ rdul phran rdul phran/ thal ba thal ba/ zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog dor pa re tar+tha las/ skyang mo ro bshal gyi le'u ste wa
347a5(rnying rgyud): bcu bzhi pa'o// // yang gcig cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'byung po'i dgra bgegs tshar gcad phyir// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// las dang thugs las sprul pa yi// ye shes gsang bar bsdus pa las// rdo rje thugs kyi go ma la// rdo rje khrag 'thung gzungs ma

347a8(rnying rgyud): 'di rnams la grol ma/ yang
347b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad cig/ khrag 'thung 'bang ba'i lte ba las// yon tan rdo dza ga ma la// rin chen khrag 'thung gzungs mA ste// 'dra 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag bya// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i zhabs dag

348a3(rnying rgyud): tshe// bar ljang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// lus ni ci 'dra 'khor dang bcas// sems kyis mnyam gzhag dgod par bya// bdag nyid phra men 'khor mang dang // gnod sbyin 'khor mang rol par 'dod// des ni dbang chen ting 'dzin zhugs// klu dang blos kyang brtan par bya/

348a5(rnying rgyud): nyal ba'i tshe yang sa zhes bya// cig cog yud tsam gnas par bya// bdag nyid gser ba na bzhin pa rnyer te// kun tu babyung mi nam mkha' dag lnga 'a // mngon snyam 'jom mdzad nyan skra dang // 'dod skyor rtsed ma byed par bsam// da lhur bsam pa'i yon tan ni/
348a6(rnying rgyud): 'og tu mda' 'phangs pas// gnas gyi steng gi lha zan 'chi// spyod lam grub pa 'di lta bu// mtshon pos kun gyi rgyal po ste// ral gri 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur// 'jam dpal 'khor gyi phyag bya'o// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// gnod sbyin tha men 'khor rnams kyis//

348b1(rnying rgyud): na du gyu/ da lda rdzan padas// gas nal pa// bas ga / ma yang dang rna sa/ na san du/ zha ga da

348b3(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs chen po yis// srid gsum khron du bsko bar bya// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// dasngal khams zas su za bar bya// dka' thub smyon pa'i gro brdungs nas// ru lu'i bsten pa 'brum bzlas na// bdag gi dbang du 'dra bar 'gyur// glu dbyangs kyi skad bya du
