350b1(rnying rgyud): dang ldan par bya// thig bzhig dab pa'i zhing tsho dgu// dbus su gru gsum ba sbyor bar zla// gtid khung gu gang kha khrur la// mkhyud gang kha dug mdzes yang ni// rma ga stad pa tshon d+hi wA// dbus su mthi ga pa
350b2(rnying rgyud): tsher bcas// rgyan dang gdugs la sogs pa dang // mtshan dang ldan pa'i yam shing la// dpal dang ldan pa'i b+han d+ha rnams// e yi dbus su rdzas dgram pa// 'di rnams bsgrub pa'i rgyu ru gsungs// de ma ba
350b3(rnying rgyud): tu spyan ras gzigs// the tshom skyes nas zhus pa'i tshig/ gar dbang lha mchog rol pa'i tshogs// mchod sbyin bsreg pa'i las tshul gang // rdzas rnams dgod pa'i rim pa gang // basbyin ba med ma min shin las

350b7(rnying rgyud): sgrol mchod pa 'jug/ hU~M/ spyi med thos na dri me gas 'jis// / mnyam nyid ye shes gsal bar rabasgyur na// dus gas ma thal ba'i sbrul mchod pa 'phrul// hU~M/ skye byed gro ldan na ga sang ba'i rjema~M/ rton
351a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen por rab sbyangs te// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gsung la mchod nga 'bul// thAM/ skye med zla ldan bA sa rin na// 'grob kun gyir 'dod skong brtse// chas dbyings ye shes dag pas
351a2(rnying rgyud): sbyangs te// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sbrul mchod pa 'bul// hUM/ skye med blo ldan gyi med zag pa'i chu// skye shi 'du 'bral med par grogs kyis bzung // nan tan ye shes dag par rab sbyangs te// phran las rlabs kyi 'gro drug slol
351a3(rnying rgyud): bar mdzad// gdug pa'i tshogs kun 'joms la mchod pa 'bul// de nas rdzas mchog bsnyen pa'i phyir// rdo rje chu ni gzi ldan no// zil mngar lho yi phyogs su nye// sha chen nub kye phyogs su dbul/ dri la sogs pa bu du
351a4(rnying rgyud): sha khrag gtor ma la sogs kun// pho nya rim pa bzhin du dgod// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// bsgom dang bsnyen dang bslab pa dang // 'dzab la sogs pa ma rdzogs tshe// bcu gcig phrin las gzhung bzhin mdzad// bsnyen pa
351a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa dang // dpal dang ma ma mtshang ba'i bya// sbyin phrag gzung bzhin brtson par bya// dbang bu bzlas nas dbyings su rol// zhes gsungs so// klung thams cad ga rgyal ba dbang rgyas \u0f7fmtshag ram pa'i d+ha sa/
351a6(rnying rgyud): sreg gi leru ste lnga bcwa rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de mthag tu gar dbang ldan mchog gis// thugs rje'i stobs kyi phrin las 'di gsungs so// thugs rje'i phrin las mang pa che// sngon gyi las dbang drag pa dang //
351a7(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzin pa'i rnamachog gis// lan cig ldang ba'i bag chags mnan// oM nAg sa s+thA na/ nA sha sAm+ba ni/ ya Sh+Ta kr-i \u0f7f/ yaSh+TAn kr-iHd+haM/ kr-it+takr-ih+NatrAM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/ An ya \u0f7f/
351b1(rnying rgyud): dum thub na// mtshungs med che par khyang par rab sun byar// ngan la mtha ba skams badrad byed drang btsam nas// 'angag can 'das pa'i dang can pa bcang // che ba'i dgas dang ldan pa dbang zag par zag dang/ ba
351b2(rnying rgyud): dzinas rgyad kyi chas ldan pas// bka' dang dam tshig gnas par bya ba'i phyir// snying gar mkhrig ma nub cing skam tshogs 'joms// nyon mongs nyam thag 'bong slod ngar// d+hu kAr brab sha ya Tanan/ nI la
351b3(rnying rgyud): phaT nan/ ya mAn+ta ka pra be sha phaT nAn/ Ar+ya a tsa la pra be sha phaT nan/ TAk+ki rA dza pra be sha phaT na na/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da le pra be sha phaT nan/ ma hA ba la pra pe sha phaT nan/ pad+ma kun+da le pra de sha phaT nan/ phyag rgya chen po'i phur
351b4(rnying rgyud): bsgoms nas// gzir gnon drag po'i las byas pas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyan bskams pas// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi bkas// zhi bas thams cad tshim par mdzad// rgyas pas ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// dbang gis dang
351b5(rnying rgyud): du ma 'dus med// mngon spyod byin rlabs rmad po che// gsad cing gnan dang spang bar mdzod// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog ral pa'i tan las/ gzer gnon drag po'i mdzad pa'i le'u ste lnga ba
351b6(rnying rgyud): dgu pa'o// / spyan ras gzigs kyis de ltar mnan cing gzir bas/ don ni dbyings dang ye shes te// rtags ni thabs dang shes rab po// me dmigs dang du thim pas na// de bas nga sngon sangs kyis// da ltar byung
351b7(rnying rgyud): 'di bshad dus// tshig tu brjod pa med do// phyi ma'i nal 'byor rnams pa'ang // sprin gyis grub par sangs rgyas// de don snang bar gyis shig/ 'di lda rgyud 'dagatad kyis// phyag rgya chen po byen rdzoms// sun ras
352a1(rnying rgyud): kyang bang byug/ gsung du mangs su rmugs shig/ daskad ces bka' stsal pas// brlang ba ldan gar gyi dbang phyug ste/ gsang sngags 'dri'i mtshan khyad pa gang lags/ tsalar 'phrag par /
352a2(rnying rgyud): sa pa dang / gar nga sa ma rdzogags gang sum / na/ nga rgyas tsamatshig gas nga / ga ba rnam tha brjid kyin pa lags bya ba de ma na// na ma gas skyes pa
352a3(rnying rgyud): sa nupa / sa pa sa/ ma ma pa'imang chags da/ ma ngas nam sna lam tsha / bathu pa'i tshum du bya// bathags pa gsu lus
352a4(rnying rgyud): ya mi gas sa gyur to// da ba c+doM du sa ga gan / blang bams kyis bdapa ma
352a5(rnying rgyud): bdags pa/ mi pa thang byung gnas yang kya'i rgyab gas na pa ma gyur ga na pa /
